qwm tftnwn twqf ʕn aːlsˤraːχ fmaː aːsttˤaːʕwaː mn qjaːm wmaː kaːnwaː mntsˤrjn waʔiið ʔaawħajtu ʔiilaaː aːlħawaaːrijːijna ʔaan ʔaːminuwaː bij wabirasuwlij qaaːluwaː ʔaːmanːaaː waaːʃhad biʔaanːanaaː fndq ʕbr aːlʃaːrʕ ql lj kjf ʔasaːʕdk wlqd ʔahlknaː maː ħwlkm mn aːlqraː wsˤrfnaː aːlʔaːjaːt lʕlhm jrd͡ʒʕwn wjχrwn llʔaðqaːn jbkwn wjzjdhm χʃwʕaː wamaʕnaaː qawlihi ʔaantaqu ʔaarħaaːmanaː ʔaaj ʔaakθaru taʕrifu fij wud͡ʒuwhihim nadˤraaa aːlnːaʕijmi laː ʔatklm aːlʕrbja bʃkl d͡ʒjd d͡ʒdaː qrʔat ʔijmjlj ktaːbaːan jqwl aːlʔinsaːn jwmʔið ʔajn aːlmfr lahu maaː fij aːlsːamaaːwaaːti wamaaː fij aːlʔaardˤi waʔiinːa aːllːaha lahuwa aːlʁanijːu aːlħamijdu ʔiilaːːa ʔaasˤħaaːba aːljamijni fmaː lhm ʕn aːltðkra mʕrdˤjn wʔamaː mn d͡ʒaːʔk jsʕaː jʕlm maː bjn ʔajdjhm wmaː χlfhm wʔilaː aːllh trd͡ʒʕ aːlʔamwr mn aːχtrʕh jaː traː  aːlːaðijna jasˤudːuwna ʕan sabijli aːllːahi wajabʁuwnahaaː ʕiwad͡ʒanaː wahum biaːlʔaːχiraai kaaːfiruwna waʔiinːahu laqasamun law taʕlamuwna ʕaðˤijmun aːħfðˤ aːlqsˤjda llʔasbwʕ aːlqaːdm qm bzjaːrtj rʔajtu tˤaːʔiraːan juħlːqu fwqa ʃd͡ʒrain sˤfʕth kfaːan ʕlaː wd͡ʒhh jaʕlamu maaː bajna ʔaajdijhim wamaaː χalfahum walaaː juħijtˤuwna bihi ʕilmanaː bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm laː ʔaqsm bhðaː aːlbld ʔawlʔik aːlðjn kfrwaː bʔaːjaːt rbhm wlqaːʔih fħbtˤt ʔaʕmaːlhm flaː nqjm lhm jwm aːlqjaːma wznaː samiʕtu rasuwla aːllhi sˤalːaaː aːllhu ʕalajhi wasalːama jqwlu: ʔaajna aːld͡ʒarijdaau aːllːahu ʕanhu ʔilaaː ʔaabij muwsaaː aːlʔaaʃʕarijːi kalːaaː ʔiinːa aːlʔiinsaaːna lajatˤʁaaː bdʔawaː aːlʕml ʕlaː aːlfwr kaðːabat qawmu luwtˤin biaːlnːuðuri mːarfuwʕaain mːutˤahːaraain ʔin aːlðjn jχʃwn rbhm baːlʁjb lhm mʁfra wʔad͡ʒr kbjr waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi kulːu ʕaqlin laaː judaaːraaː bihi aːlkulːu falajsa biʕaqlin taaːmːin ʔajmknnj sʔuaːlk ʕn aːlsbb ðlk aːllħm lħm dd͡ʒaːd͡ʒ aːðhabuwaː biqamijsˤij haðaaː faʔaalquwhu ʕalaaː wad͡ʒhi ʔaabij jaʔati basˤijranaː waʔatuwnij biʔaahlikum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna hl ʔant aːlʃχsˤ aːlmsʔuwl mtaː juʁlq aːlmtˤʕm  jــــaː rbaːnــــــaː aːħfــــــðˤ lnــــــــaː ʔamaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aːlsˤaːlħaːt flhm d͡ʒnaːt aːlmʔawaː nzlaː bmaː kaːnwaː jʕmlwn wlqd naːdaːnaː nwħ flnʕm aːlmd͡ʒjbwn ʕamːaaː kaaːnuwaː jaʕmaluwna wmaː mnaː ʔilaː lh mqaːm mʕlwm ħqaː  ʔant lst ʁbjaː tbdw mrjdˤa wbaːlljl ʔaflaː tʕqlwn waʔaanːaaː lamasnaaː aːlsːamaaːʔa fawad͡ʒadnaaːhaaː muliʔiat ħarasanaː ʃadijdanaː waʃuhubanaː kamaaː jaqtadˤijhi dalijlu aːlħaaːli taʕlijlanaː wakaʃfanaː ʃkranaː ʕlaː qdwmk faʕamijat ʕalajhimu aːlʔaanbaaːʔu jawmaʔiiðin fahum laaː jatasaaːʔaluwna wkðlk nd͡ʒzj mn ʔasrf wlm jʔumn bʔaːjaːt rbh wlʕðaːb aːlʔaːχra ʔaʃd wʔabqaː waman aːstaʁnaaː fijhaaː futina ʔiinːa haðaaː larizqunaaː maaː lahu min nafaaːdin ʔajn ðhb waqaaːluwaː quluwbunaaː ʁulfun bal laʕanahumu aːllːahu bikufrihim faqalijlanaː maaː juʔuminuwna hðh mdrsa lmaːðaː ʔant mtʔaχr lkl mqaːm mqaːl wlkl zmaːn rd͡ʒaːl tsttˤjʕ qjaːda sjaːra  sˤħjħ  wamaaː jantˤiqu ʕani aːlhawaaː hl ttðkr maː qaːlth  maːðaː qlt ʔams ʔaafaraʔaajtumu aːlmaaːʔ aːlːaðij taʃrabuwna ʔin aːlðjn aːlmrslwn χatˤhu rdjʔ ʔamj ʁaːdˤba lwlaː ʔan tdaːrkh nʕma mn rbh lnbð baːlʕraːʔ whw mðmwm faʔiinːaka laaː tusmiʕu aːlmawtaaː walaaː tusmiʕu aːlsˤːumːa aːldːuʕaaːʔa ʔiiðaaː walːawaː mudbirijna mn laː jʕrf hðh aːlmʃkla  fasˤaaːra min aːlʔaaχsarijna ʔaaʕmaaːlanaː aːlːaðijna dˤalːa saʕjuhum fij aːlħajaaːai aːldːunjaaː wafij aːlʔaːχiraai waaːlʕarabu taquwlu fij ʔaamθaaːlihaaː faʔiiðaaː bariqa aːlbasˤaru laː tlum fʃlk ʕlaː aːlħðˤ aːlsjʔ jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː laaː taʕtaðiruwaː aːljawma ʔiinːamaaː tud͡ʒzawna maaː kuntum taʕmaluwna ʔiðaː ʔardt ʔan tnd͡ʒħ baːlʔimtħaːn  ʕljk ʔan tdrs bd͡ʒdː saʕijdu bnu ʔaabij hindin ʕan aːbni ʕabːaaːsin radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhumaaː qaaːla jwm tblaː aːlsraːʔir ʔauχttm aːlmʔutmr qbl saːʕtjn ʔiið tabarːaʔaa aːlːaðijna aːtːubiʕuwaː mina aːlːaðijna maː ldjh mn ktb fqtˤ walaw naʃaaːʔu latˤamasnaaː ʕalaaː ʔaaʕjunihim faaːstabaquwaː aːlsˤːiraaːtˤa faʔaanːaaː jubsˤiruwna ʕlaː sˤraːtˤ mstqjm qaaːla rabːi ʔiinːij ðˤalamtu nafsij faaːʁfir lij faʁafara aːlmaːdˤaː bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ħm wðlkm ðˤnkm aːlðj ðˤnntm brbkm ʔardaːkm fʔasˤbħtm mn aːlχaːsrjn ʃkraːan ʕlaː aːltafahːum waqad qaaːla aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː linabijːihi sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama lmaːðaː jħdθ hðaː daːʔimaːan lj  ʔin dʕwtah  rbmaː sjʔatj flaː ʔaqsm bmwaːqʕ aːlnd͡ʒwm ʔiinːaaː ʔaanʃaʔanaaːhunːa ʔiinʃaaːʔan kjfa sʔasdd djwnaː aːlʔaːn  wʔiðaː qrʔi aːlqrʔaːn faːstmʕwaː lh wʔansˤtwaː lʕlkm trħmwn jwm laː tmlk nfs lnfs ʃjʔiaː waːlʔamr jwmʔið llh wlaː tħzn ʕljhm wlaː tkn fj dˤjq mmaː jmkrwn lawlaaː d͡ʒaaːʔuwaː ʕalajhi biʔaarbaʕaai ʃuhadaaːʔa faʔiið lam jaʔatuwaː biaːlʃːuhadaaːʔi faʔauwlaʔiika ʕinda aːllːahi humu aːlkaaːðibuwna ʔiðaaː kaaːna aːlːaðij janbaʁij ʔaan jaʕmalahu fij ħajaaːtihi maʕmuwlanaː jaː mwsaː ʔinh ʔanaː aːllh aːlʕzjz aːlħkjm waʔiin kaaːnuwaː min qabli ʔaan junazːala ʕalajhim min qablihi lamublisijna mn kaːn jrd͡ʒw lqaːʔ aːllh fʔin ʔad͡ʒl aːllh lʔaːt whw aːlsmjʕ aːlʕljm ʔanti ln tbtʕdj hða aːlmra hðaː maː nrjd ʔan nʕrfh maaː kaaːna maaːniʕanaː min ħifðˤihi baʕda tasˤawːurihi wafahmihi ljst sˤʁjra  ʔaljs kðlk  qaːla: sˤadaqta qaːla: faʔaaχbirnj ʕani aːlʔiħsaːni ljs mʕj ʔakθr mn χmsa dwlaːraːt fj ktaːb mknwn raaːma ʔaamranaː muʕwizanaː ʔaalam jaku nutˤfaaan min manijːin jumnaaː bal jakuwna minhum ʕalaaː ħaðarin wtħbwn aːlmaːl ħbaː d͡ʒmaː laː aːtklm ʕrbj km ʕmr waːldk  ʔinhm kaːnwaː laː jrd͡ʒwn ħsaːbaː ʔaraːdt mnːj aːlkðb waqaaːla ʔibrwjs ʔaatˤiʕ man fawqak  jutˤiʕk man duwnak wʔiðaː ʔanʕmnaː ʕlaː aːlʔinsaːn ʔaʕrdˤ wnʔaaː bd͡ʒaːnbh wʔiðaː msh aːlʃr kaːn jʔiwsaː wmaː ʔarslnaː fj qrja mn nbj ʔilaː ʔaχðnaː ʔahlhaː baːlbʔasaːʔ waːldˤraːʔ lʕlhm jdˤrʕwn qaːlwaː ʔinkm kntm tʔatwnnaː ʕn aːljmjn qljlaː klaː bl laː tkrmwn aːljtjm rabːanaaː ʔiinːaka man tudχili aːlnːaaːra faqad ʔaaχzajtahu wamaaː lilðˤːaaːlimijna min ʔaansˤaaːrin falaaː dunjaaːhum ʔaasˤabtum wajaʔanisu bihi aːldˤːaʕijfu jʔakl twm aːllħm fqtˤ wʔiðaː qjl lhm tʕaːlwaː jstʁfr lkm rswl aːllh lwwaː rʔwshm wrʔajthm jsˤdwn whm mstkbrwn fij aːlʕaðli nafʕun walaaː fij aːlʔiisˤlaaːħi matˤmaʕun bl ʔijaːh tdʕwn fjkʃf maː tdʕwn ʔiljh ʔin ʃaːʔ wtnswn maː tʃrkwn kl ʃjʔ ʕlaː maː jraːm ʕan ʕaaːʔiiʃaaa radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhaaː ʕan aːlnːabijːi sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʔaanːahu qaaːla lamawadːaaun mimːan juħibːuk muχlisˤanaː χajrun min aːlrːaħimi aːlqarijbi aːlkaaːʃiħi waqaaːla ʔaːχaru rbmaː twm jsttˤjʕ ʔan jfʕl ʃjʔiaːan llmsaːʕda qaːlwaː d͡ʒzaːʔuh wawajlun lilkaaːfirijna min ʕaðaaːbin ʃadijdin waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlbulaʁaaːʔi zaaːʔiidu aːlʔiimhaaːli raaːʔiidu aːlʔiihmaaːli ʔanti ʕljki fqtˤ ʔan tʕidjnj bʃjʔ waːħd fahaðaaː ʔaaslamu aːlmalalajni waʔaaqrabu aːlrːad͡ʒulajni jusaaːmiħu fij waqti aːstaraaːħathu waħijna fatratihi whw aːlðj jħjj wjmjt wlh aːχtlaːf aːlljl waːlnhaːr ʔaflaː tʕqlwn swf nuqlʕ fj ʁdˤwn dqaːʔiq taðˤunːu ʔaan jufʕala bihaaː faaːqiraaun faʁulibuwaː hunaaːlika waaːnqalabuwaː sˤaaːʁirijna fsnjsrh lljsraː waʔaanːa aːlʔaaħmaqa maħðˤuwðˤun aːnaː mtʕb d͡ʒdaː lkj aːmʃj aːkθr mn ðlk bqj aːlqljl mn aːlħljb fj aːlzd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa "twm"sjqʕ fj ħb "maːrj" ʔanaː lw knt ʁnja, knt ʔawd ʔan ʔaʕtˤjk aːlmaːl fj aːlħrb aːlʕaːlmja aːlθaːnja qtl aːlkθjr mn aːlnaːs ”maː aːlðj tχfjh wraːʔ ðˤhrk“ ”laː ʃjʔ“ hl hðaː lka flmaː d͡ʒaːʔ aːlsħra qaːlwaː lfrʕwn ʔaʔin lnaː lʔad͡ʒraː ʔin knaː nħn aːlʁaːlbjn lqd fʕl ðlk mraːraːan wtkraːraːan kjf td͡ʒrʔ ʕlaː qwl ʃjʔin khðaː  θumːa baʕaθnaaːhum linaʕlama ʔaajːu aːlħizbajni ʔaaħsˤaaː limaaː labiθuwaː ʔaamadanaː maaːðaaː ʕalajka ʔiðaaː ʔakramta ʔamsijatijbiـ: kajfa ʔanti masaaːʔu aːlχajri muʃtaaːqu waaːʕlam ʔaanːa sˤalaaːħa aːldːunjaaː muʕtabarun min wad͡ʒhajni hl ʔant mn kwkb laː tʕjʃ fjh ʔilaː aːlnsaːʔ  ltrtaːħ fj tswqk aːlʔasbwʕj  jd͡ʒb ʔan tmlk sjaːraan kaːn saːmj raːʁbaː fj ʔiχraːd͡ʒ ljlaː mn aːlsˤːwra nħn aːlqmrjwn mn ʔijmaːnin waːħd kaːn ðlk aːstʕraːdˤaː bʔatm mʕnaː aːlklma ʔiinːa aːlʔiinsaaːna lafij χusrin wataðaruwna maaː χalaqa lakum rabːukum min ʔaazwaaːd͡ʒikum bal ʔaantum qawmun ʕaaːduwna waʔiin kaaːduwaː lajastafizːuwnaka mina aːlʔaardˤi lijuχrid͡ʒuwka minhaaː waʔiiðanaː laaː jalbaθuwna χilaaːfaka ʔiilːaaː qalijlanaː waqaaːla ʔaabuw aːlʔaaswadi aːldːuʔualijːu nðˤrt ħwlj wudˤiʕa saːmj tħt rʕaːja ʔasra ħaːdˤna judχilu man jaʃaaːʔu fij raħmatihi waaːlðˤːaaːlimijna ʔaaʕadːa lahum ʕaðaaːbanaː ʔaalijmanaː ʔinhu ʔiqtbaːs mn ktaːb lnraː wasahula ʕalajhi kulːu ʕasijrin fj hðh aːlljla qmt bhðaː bdwn ʔan tfkr qaaːla haðaaː firaaːqu bajnij wabajnika saʔaunabːiʔiuka bitaʔawijli maaː lam tastatˤiʕ ʕalajhi sˤabranaː waːtqwaː aːlðj χlqkm waːld͡ʒbla aːlʔawljn waʔaamːaaː ʔiin kaaːna min ʔaasˤħaaːbi aːljamijni wqaːl aːlmlk aːʔitwnj bh ʔastχlsˤh lnfsj flmaː klmh qaːl ʔink aːljwm ldjnaː mkjn ʔamjn laː bd lj ʔan ʔatˤlb mnk ʔan ttˤjʕ ʔawaːmrj ʔiinːa aːlʃːajtˤaaːna lakum ʕaduwːun faaːtːaχiðuwhu ʕaduwːanaː ʔiinːamaaː jadʕuw ħizbahu lijakuwnuwaː min ʔaasˤħaaːbi aːlsːaʕijri ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ lqlm ʔajn jnthj hl kaːn kjn fj aːlbjt baːlʔams sjkwn ħfl mjlaːdh ʁdaː ʕnd aːlθaːlθa ʔaðˤhrt aːlntaːʔid͡ʒu χtˤʔa aːltnbʔuaːt jrsl ʕljkmaː ʃwaːðˤ mn naːr wnħaːs flaː tntsˤraːn waʔiin kulːun lamːaaː d͡ʒamijʕun ladajnaaː muħdˤaruwna ldjh ndbh ʕlj ðqnh wd͡ʒʕlnaː aːbn mrjm wʔamh ʔaːja wʔaːwjnaːhmaː ʔilaː rbwa ðaːt qraːr wmʕjn lqd aːnhaːr mn ʃda ħbh lhaː qaaːla famaaː χatˤbuka jaaː saaːmirijːu θumːa qaraʔaa ʔinːamaaː jaχʃaaː aːllːaha min ʕibaaːdihi aːlʕulamaaːʔu waʔaamːaaː aːlqaaːʕidaau aːlrːaaːbiʕaau jkmn fj aːlqsˤa ʃjʔ mn ʕnsˤr aːltraːd͡ʒjdjaː jħb twm aːlħjaːka jmtrwn wajastaqilːu ʕinda aːstiqlaaːlihi wajudχiluhumu aːld͡ʒanːaaa ʕarːafahaaː lahum aːlðj jraːk ħjn tqwm ljs ʕndj aːlwqt lʔasaːʕdk fj ħl waːd͡ʒbk fjqwlwaː hl nħn mnðˤrwn wql rb ʔaʕwð bk mn hmzaːt aːlʃjaːtˤjn wanufiχa fij aːlsˤːuwri ðalika jawmu aːlwaʕijdi aːlːaðijna d͡ʒaʕaluwaː aːlqurʔaːna ʕidˤijna ʔaskn fj mdjna kbjra waqijla man raaːqin bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi wajlun lilmutˤafːifijna wahum ʕalaaː maaː jafʕaluwna biaːlmuʔuminijna ʃuhuwdun kaʔaanːahu d͡ʒimaaːlatun sˤufrun twm jrqd fj aːlfraːʃ mħmwmaːan hl tnwj aːlqdwm ʁdanaː  ʔanaː bħaːd͡ʒa ʔilaː qasˤia ʃaʕr hl hj sˤʕba llʁaːja lkj tuktb aːlmqaːrna bjn aːlʔiθnajni lm tkn lsˤaːlħihi faʔiiðaaː d͡ʒaaːʔati aːlsˤːaaːχːaau aːsttˤaːʕ ʔan jbnj bjtaːan sˤʁjraːan ʔinaː d͡ʒʕlnaːhaː ftna llðˤaːlmjn faʔaamːaaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aːlsˤːaaːliħaaːti fajudχiluhum rabːuhum fij raħmatihi ðalika huwa aːlfawzu aːlmubijnu kaːn saːmj jqdˤj wqtaː ʔakθr mʕ ljlaː hl ttħdθ aːlfrnsja ʔam lhm ʃrkaːʔ fljʔatwaː bʃrkaːʔihm ʔin kaːnwaː sˤaːdqjn nzlaː mn ʁfwr rħjm wkðbwaː bʔaːjaːtnaː kðaːbaː flnqsˤn ʕljhm bʕlm wmaː knaː ʁaːʔibjn frd͡ʒʕwaː ʔilaː ʔanfshm fqaːlwaː ʔinkm ʔantm aːlðˤaːlmwn ʔanaː ʔaʕd, ln ʔafʕlhaː md͡ʒddaːan maːðaː fʕlta  knt ʔafkr hl trjd aːlzwaːd͡ʒ  ln nnsaː ʔabdaː ltˤfk kaːrjn nmsaːwja laː jʃtrj ʔilaː maː hw dˤrwrj haːa kaːnt jaːʔisa mn ʔan ttzwd͡ʒ bitarki aːliaːstitˤaaːlaai ʔatnaːwl aːlʁdaːʔ ʕnd aːlðˤhjra mʕ ʔasˤdqaːʔij ʔasˤirːa ʕlaː aːlʔafdˤl hl hðh hj ħqaː aːlħqjqa waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi biaːlʕadli waaːlʔiinsˤaaːfi takuwnu mudːaau aːliaːʔitilaaːfi ʔiinːa aːlʔaabraaːra lafij naʕijmin wanasuwqu aːlmud͡ʒrimijna ʔiilaaː d͡ʒahanːama wirdanaː θumːa ʔaafijdˤuwaː min ħajθu ʔaafaaːdˤa aːlnːaaːsu waaːstaʁfiruwaː aːllːaha ʔiinːa aːllːaha ʁafuwrun raħijmun sʔaltuh ʕn aːlħaːdθ ʔanaː lstu χaːʔifaan waaːlʔiidlaaːla ʕalajhi waʔiin taqadːamat sˤuħbatuhu walakin aːunðˤur ʔilaaː man fawqak min aːlʕulamaaːʔi ðaːk aːlʃχsˤ sˤdjqj χaːlj jʕjʃ fj lndn ql lmn aːlʔardˤ wmn fjhaː ʔin kntm tʕlmwn hl ʔant mstʕd ʔan ttˤjr  maːðaː tqtrħ fad͡ʒumlaau aːlʔaansaaːbi ʔaanːahaaː tanqasimu θalaaːθaaa ʔaaqsaaːmin wʔawrθkm ʔardˤhm wdjaːrhm wʔamwaːlhm wʔardˤaː lm ttˤʔiwhaː wkaːn aːllh ʕlaː kl ʃjʔ qdjraː hðaː ʔabj hw jrtbik ʕndmaː jraːhaː ðlk aːlmħl jʁlq fj aːlsaːʕa aːltaːsʕa kl ljla sʔanðˤf aːlmtˤbχ bʕd qljl ʔaam χalaquwaː aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waaːlʔaardˤa bal lːaː juwqinuwna walaaː tukaaːfiʔiuwaː ðˤaaːlimanaː fajabtˤula fadˤlukum waliðalika qijla tafaqːahuwaː qabla ʔaan tasuwduwaː sʔard͡ʒʕ ħaːlaː hjaː bnaː nðhb lnraː ʔiðaː kaːn twm jsttˤjʕ ʔan jsaːʕdnaː hnaːk ðbaːba fj aːlqhwa tabsˤiraaan waðikraaː likulːi ʕabdin munijbin hðaː srjr kjf bʔimkaːnnaː ʔan nħkm ʁjrnaː ʕndmaː laː nsttˤjʕ ʔan nħkm ʔanfsnaː  jasʔaaluhu man fij aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waaːlʔaardˤi kulːa jawmin huwa fij ʃaʔanin jaʔatuwnanaaː fij ħaaːli aːlquwːaai binaaː ʕalajhim wʔiðaː naːdjtm ʔilaː aːlsˤlaːa aːtχðwhaː hzwaː wlʕbaː ðlk bʔanhm qwm laː jʕqlwn wajatawaqːaaːhu aːlħaaːzimu min suwʔi ʕawaaːqibi aːlfitnaai waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami min aːldːunjaaː ʕalaaː aːldːunjaaː dalijlun aːlsjd ʔisbraːntw bχjr, aːljsa kðlk aːlktaːb ʕlaː aːlmktb ʁdaː  sjkwn fj bjth ʔant ʁnjː jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlnːaaːsu qad d͡ʒaaːʔakum burhaaːnun min rabːikum waʔaanzalnaaː ʔiilajkum nuwranaː mubijnanaː wad͡ʒazaaːʔu sajːiʔiaain sajːiʔiaaun miθluhaaː faman ʕafaaː waʔaasˤlaħa faʔaad͡ʒruhu ʕalaaː aːllːahi ʔiinːahu laaː juħibːu aːlðˤːaaːlimijna fij maqʕadi sˤidqin ʕinda malijkin muqtadirin aːlrːaħmanu ʔaʕndk qlm "nʕm ʕndj waːħd" jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː aːtːaquwaː aːllːaha wakuwnuwaː maʕa aːlsˤːaaːdiqijna ðhbt ʔilaː aːlmstʃfaː lzjaːrth ʔin lm tkn mʕj fʔant dˤdj aːlðjn laː jʔutwn aːlzkaːa whm baːlʔaːχra hm kaːfrwn aːnhaː kswl hl trjdjnj ʔan mʃtˤ ʃʕrk faðarhum fij ʁamratihim ħatːaaː ħijnin hðaː hdaː waːlðjn aːlħufaaːaa aːlʕuraaːaa aːlʕaaːlaaa riʕaaːʔa aːlʃːaaːʔi jatatˤaːwaluwna fij aːlbunjaaːni wqaːlwaː mhmaː tʔatnaː bh mn ʔaːja ltsħrnaː bhaː fmaː nħn lk bmʔumnjn ʔinhaː tnaːdnj knd͡ʒj aːnðˤr ʔilaː farijqanaː mina aːlmuʔuminijna lakaaːrihuwna laaː jud͡ʒaaːdilu ʔilːaaː munaaːfiqun ʔaaw murtaaːbun aːlsmka tχtfj tħt aːlsˤχwr θumːa jud͡ʒzaaːhu aːld͡ʒazaaːʔ aːlʔaawfaaː ʔabj fj aːlmtˤbχ lʔanh jtˤbχ ʔiinːij ðˤanantu ʔaanːij mulaːqin ħisaaːbijah wwd͡ʒwh jwmʔið ʕljhaː ʁbra bħθt ʕnh fj kl mkaːn lknj lm ʔad͡ʒdh lqd trdd qbl aːlʔid͡ʒaːba raʔasu aːlʕaqli baʕda aːlʔiijmaaːni biaːallːahi taʕaaːlaaː fabiʕizːatika laʔauʁwijanːahum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna lm ʔaraː ʃjʔiaː wud͡ʒuwhun jawmaʔiiðin naaːdˤiraaun wamin ʃarːi ħaaːsidin ʔiiðaaː ħasada aːlðjn jqjmwn aːlsˤlaːa wjʔutwn aːlzkaːa whm baːlʔaːχra hm jwqnwn laː ʔamlk aːlmaːl aːskt jaː ʁbj ln ʔaraːh bʕd aːljwm bʕdˤ aːlʔatˤfaːl jsbħwn fj aːlbħr ʔaʔarjthaː waːldjk  wʔið qaːlt aːlmlaːʔika jaː mrjm ʔin aːllh aːsˤtˤfaːk wtˤhrk waːsˤtˤfaːk ʕlaː nsaːʔ aːlʕaːlmjn waʔausaraaːʔi aːlħirsˤi hðaː aːltˤbq mmtaːz mn jsˤrf ʕnh jwmʔið fqd rħmh wðlk aːlfwz aːlmbjn wd͡ʒʕlwaː lh mn ʕbaːdh d͡ʒzʔaː ʔin aːlʔinsaːn lkfwr mbjn rabːu aːlmaʃriqajni warabːu aːlmaʁribajni jwm laː tanzijlun min ħakijmin ħamijdin mʔia hw rqmj aːlmfdˤl ʔiin jasʔaalkumuwhaaː fajuħfikum tabχaluwaː wajuχrid͡ʒ ʔaadˤʁaaːnakum mataaːʕun fij aːldːunjaaː θumːa ʔiilajnaaː mard͡ʒiʕuhum θumːa nuðijquhumu aːlʕaðaaːba aːlʃːadijda bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jakfuruwna ʔam ħsb aːlðjn fj qlwbhm mrdˤ ʔan ln jχrd͡ʒ aːllh ʔadˤʁaːnhm hl bʔimkaːnk ʔan tʕtˤjnj dqjqa  ʔarjd ʔan ʔaqwl lk ʃjʔiaː sʔal aːlsˤaːʔib: " ʔiðn mn kaːn aːlχmsa waːlʕʃrwn  ʔakaːnwaː ʔasˤdqaːʔk  " waʔaadχalnaaːhu fij raħmatinaaː ʔiinːahu mina aːlsˤːaaːliħijna ʕljː ʔan ʔaːχð saːʕtj litusˤlħ ʔatklm aːlʕrbja mn fmk ʔilaː baːb aːlsmaːʔ ʕndnaː klbun  wqtˤ  wθlaːθa mn aːlknaːrj saːʕdnj laː jrjd twm aːlðhaːb aːlj aːlmdrsh bʕd aːlaːn wabiħasabi qadri aːlnːiʕmaai takθuru aːlʔaaʕdaaːʔu waaːlħasadaau aːlðj hm fjh mχtlfwn ʕljk ʔan tʕlm ʔannj ʔaʃχr ʔinmaː twʕdwn lsˤaːdq kjf lj ʔan ʔaʕrf kðlk nd͡ʒzj aːlmħsnjn waʔaanːahu kaaːna jaquwlu safijhunaaː ʕalaaː aːllːahi ʃatˤatˤanaː liʔaanːa aːlrːad͡ʒaaːʔa lahu ʔaakθaru dˤjʕ mblʁaː mʕtbraː fj swq aːlbwrsˤa ʔantm ʕnh mʕrdˤwn qaaːla ʔiinːamaaː jaʔatijkum bihi aːllːahu ʔiin ʃaaːʔa wamaaː ʔaantum bimuʕd͡ʒizijna ʔanaː χaːʔif d͡ʒdaːan mn aːlðhaːb ʔilaː hnaːk bnfsj hj twdː mʕrfa mn ʔarsl aːlwrwd hðaː aːljwm, ʔaʕðˤm ʔaumnjaːtj tħqqt aːlaːʁnja tðkrnj bʔajaːm ʃbaːbj ʔanaː mʕd͡ʒb bk kθjranaː waqaaːla aːlħasanu aːlbasˤrijːu ħaqːu aːlwaaːlidi ʔaaʕðˤamu  wabirːu aːlwaaːlidi ʔaalzamu qul hal nunabːiʔiukum biaːlʔaaχsarijna ʔaaʕmaaːlanaː ʔiinːa rabːaka jaqdˤij bajnahum biħukmihi wahuwa aːlʕazijzu aːlʕalijmu wmaː ʔantm bmʕd͡ʒzjn fj aːlʔardˤ wmaː lkm mn dwn aːllh mn wlj wlaː nsˤjr waʔaamːaaː aːlqismu aːlθːaaːliθu laː ʔatðkr klmaːthaː bħarfjːthaː fsχrnaː lh aːlrjħ td͡ʒrj bʔamrh rχaːʔ ħjθ ʔasˤaːb ʔin hðaː ʔilaː qwl aːlbʃr rabːi nad͡ʒːinij waʔaahlij mimːaaː jaʕmaluwna kaʔaan lam jaʁnawaː fijhaaː ʔaalaaː ʔiinːa θamuwda kafaruwaː rabːahum ʔaalaaː buʕdanaː liθamuwda wahuwa aːlːaðij d͡ʒaʕala aːllːajla waaːlnːahaaːra χilfaaan liman ʔaaraaːda ʔaan jaðːakːara ʔaaw ʔaaraaːda ʃukuwranaː aːlħajaaːʔu min aːlʔiijmaaːni tʕaːla bsrʕa faʔaːmana lahu luwtˤun waqaaːla ʔiinːij muhaaːd͡ʒirun ʔiilaaː rabːij ʔiinːahu huwa aːlʕazijzu aːlħakijmu jwm jʔat laː tklm nfs ʔilaː bʔiðnh fmnhm ʃqj wsʕjd lawlaaː ʔiið samiʕtumuwhu ðˤanːa aːlmuʔuminuwna waaːlmuʔuminaaːtu biʔaanfusihim χajranaː waqaaːluwaː haðaaː ʔiifkun mubijnun qd jsmʕwnaː falaaː ʕaaːʃa fij tuwnis man χaaːnahaaː walaaː ʕaaːʃa man lajsa min d͡ʒundihaaː sjaːrtk tsthlk aːlbnzjn bkθra sanuqriʔiuka falaaː tansaaːaː hl jmknk ʔan tfhm hðh aːllʁa fʔanʃʔanaː lkm bh d͡ʒnaːt mn nχjl wʔaʕnaːb lkm fjhaː fwaːkh kθjra wmnhaː tʔaklwn ʔin hw ʔilaː wħj jwħaː tad͡ʒrij biʔaaʕjuninaaː d͡ʒazaaːʔ lːiman kaaːna kufira ðij quwːaain ʕinda ðij aːlʕarʃi makijnin jursalu ʕalajkumaaː ʃuwaaːðˤun min naaːrin wanuħaaːsun falaaː tantasˤiraaːni twm ʁaːdˤb aːlʔaːn rfjـfu aːlʔamaːnj wχafـqu aːlfʔuaːd ʕـlaː ʕaـlamin dˤamaː ʃaـmla aːlblaːd sanadʕu aːlzːabaaːnijaaa waaːtːasaʕat fijhimaaː aːlħaaːlu smʕtu ʔismj wmaː ʔadraːk maː aːltˤaːrq wʔiðaː mrwaː bhm jtʁaːmzwn waʔiiðaaː takaaːfaʔaa ʔaahlu aːlʔaadjaaːni aːlmuχtalifaai waaːlmaðaaːhibi aːlmutabaaːjinaai lnstmʕ lbʕdˤ aːlmwsjqaː ʔant mwhwbun ħqaːan ʔinːk ʁnjː kaːn twm mʃʁwlaː tmθl aːlχtˤwtˤ aːlħmraːʔ ʕlaː aːlχrjtˤa aːlska aːlħdjdja aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː biʔaːjaaːtinaaː wakaaːnuwaː muslimijna wajabʕaθu ʕalaaː aːltˤːaaːʕaai wlqd d͡ʒaːʔ ʔaːl frʕwn aːlnðr ʔaʕlm ʔank laː tħbnj ʔinaː ʔarslnaːk ʃaːhdaː wmbʃraː wnðjraː waaːlwaznu jawmaʔiiðin aːlħaqːu faman θaqulat mawaaːzijnuhu faʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlmufliħuwna ʔajn aːlʔalm  aːnhaː mðnbh baːlsrqh qaaːla aːlbuħturijːu ʔanaː ʔaʕml hnaːk aːlkθjr mmaː ʔajn nħsˤl ʕlaː tlk aːld͡ʒml  wkjf ntrd͡ʒmhaː  ʔanaː mtʔakd ʔanːh sjd͡ʒtaːz aːlaːmtħaːn kalːaaː ʔiinːahum ʕan rabːihim jawmaʔiiðin lamaħd͡ʒuwbuwna waqad qaaːla ʕumaru bnu aːlχatˤːaaːbi radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu libaʕdˤi χulafaaːʔiihi laː dχaːn bdwn naːr faʔiin ʔauʕtˤija minhaaː lam jaʃbaʕ aːntˤlqt sjaːra aːlsbaːq bsrʕa aːlbrq ʔilaː mn rħm aːllh ʔinh hw aːlʕzjz aːlrħjm faaːnðˤur fij sababi aːlsːajːiʔiaaːti jawmaʔiiðin faqad raħimtahu waðlika huwa aːlfawzu aːlʕaðˤjmu tʕmd ʔan jdws ʕlaː qdmj hl tlʕb kra aːlqdm θumːa laː jamwtu fjhaː walaː jaħjaː laː ʔarjd aːlbqaːʔ wħjdaː sr aːlθlaːθa sr lld͡ʒmjʕ sʔaːχðk ʔilaː mkaːn stkwn fjh fj ʔamaːn walaː taħaːdˤːwna ʕalaː tˤaʕaːmi aːlmiskjni wajuʃijʕuhaaː kalaaːmun saaːbiqun faqaaːla ʔinːij aːʃtarajth lirad͡ʒulin laaː juqaaːsimu ʔaaχaaːhu dirhamanaː hl bʔimkaːnk ʔiʕaːda maː qlt tlqːaː saːmj ʕlaːd͡ʒaː wamin raħmatihi d͡ʒaʕala lakumu aːllːajla waaːlnːahaːra litaskunwaː fjhi walitabtaʁwaː min fadˤlihi walaʕalːakum taʃkurwna kaːn saːmj jntðˤr ʔaħdaː aːʕlam ʔaanːa min ħusni aːltːawfijqi waʔiimaaːraaːti aːlsːaʕaaːdaai aːlsˤːabru ʕalaaː aːlmulimːaaːti waaːlrːifqi ʕinda aːlnːawaaːzili ðˤnː saːmj ʔanː hðaː kaːn mfjdaː lh haaːdin jahdijnij aːlsːabijla fajaðˤunːuwna ʔaanːahu jaʕnij hidaaːjaaa aːltˤːarijqi waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlʕulamaaːʔi laaː samijra kaaːlʕilmi  walaaː ðˤahijra kaaːlħilmi ʔant tfʕlh btˤrjqa χaːtˤʔia waʔiin ʕarija hum d͡ʒaːʔiʕwn hðaː aːlsˤbaːħ waʔaahdijaka ʔiilaː rabːika fataχʃaː balaaːaː man kasaba sajːiʔiaaan waʔaaħaaːtˤat bihi χatˤijʔiatuhu faʔauwlaaːʔiika ʔaasˤħaaːbu aːlnːaaːri hum fijhaaː χaaːliduwna faʔaatˤaːʕwhu ʔiinːahum kaːnwaː qawmanaː faːsiqjna ħaːfðˤ ʕlaː wd͡ʒba ʔiftˤaːrmtwaːzna wsˤl aːlsːjːd baːkr ʔiin kuntum fij rajbin mimːaaː nazːalnaaː ʕalaaːaː ʕabdinaaː faʔatuwaː bisuwraain min miθlihi fʔabkaːnj dmaː mn saːʕdk ʔajdˤaː aːld͡ʒbn ljs shl aːlhdˤm kl kmaː twd tʕd͡ʒːl ħtaː aːlʔaːn kl ʃjʔ kaːn naːd͡ʒħaː qd tmaːdaː aːlfraːt fj tˤʁjaːnh hmst fj aːlljl ʔanwaːr aːlnd͡ʒwm ʔaħjaːnaːan ʔaħlmu dqjq aːlnðˤri kaːtma sirːin ʔaːχðaː baːlħðari ʔaχbrnaː twm bmaː ʕljnaː fʕlh marːa bij sˤilaau bnu ʔaaʃjama famaaː tamaaːlaktu ʔaan nahadˤtu ʔilajhi faqultu tfhːm hðaː mn fdˤlk wlaːsjmaː ʔiðaː kaːnt baːlkrjm fʕlaː wlaː aːlbaːrʕ d͡ʒd bħsn aːltwfjq maː ʃʔit mnh laːsjmaː fj saːʕa aːltʕlumi fðaːk wqt aːlaːdb aːlmuħatːami ðˤnnt ʔanh sjkwn hnaː ðlk fqtˤ rʔajun ʃχsˤj qfzt mn ʕlaː aːlkrsj mn aːlʔafdˤl ʔan tkwn ħðraː ħjn aːχtjaːrk lʔasˤdqaːʔik bdʔat aːlsˤħjfa tfqd qraːʔhaː bʕd tfrjtˤhaː bʔaħd ʔaʃhr ktaːbhaː ðhb aːlsˤdq wʔiχlaːsˤ aːlʕml hl jmknk ʔan tħdˤrhaː ʔajhaː aːlmʁrwr mhlaː laː ʃk ʔan hðaː d͡ʒmaːl rħlt wqd wd͡ʒdt aːlʕjʃ mraː kl ʃjʔ kaːn ʔafdˤl fj aːlmaːdˤj lm jmut saːmj kaːnaː jtsˤaːfħaːn bsˤmjmja wkʔanhmaː lm jrjaː bʕdˤhmaː lsnwaːt hðh hdjːa lfaːdˤl lnrħːb bh fj ʔasrtnaː kaːn faːdˤl jħaːwl d͡ʒaːhdaː ʔan jʃaːrk ljlaː fj hwaːjaːthaː ʕd͡ʒbaː lj wqd mrrt bʔabjaːtk baːt aːlʔamjr wbaːt bdr smaːʔinaː ldjhaː ʔaml lst ʔansaː aːlʔaħbaːb maː dmt ħjaː klaːhmaː ħukim ʕljhmaː baːlʔiʕdaːm hl tʕrf bjt saːmj lw ʔaħsnwaː fj mlknaː ʔaw ʔaʕtqwaː jfkːr twm bnfs aːltˤrjqa hðaː ktaːb klh d͡ʒhl ʔauwlaʔiika aːlʔaakjaaːsu ðahabuwaː biʃarafi aːldːunjaaː wakaraaːmaai aːlʔaːχiraai zaːr aːlfrzdq ʔahl aːlħd͡ʒaːz aːstnsˤħt sˤdjqthaː wʔaanːa hðaː aːldhra fj hazlh jaː aːbn mn tˤaːb fj aːlmwaːljd ħraː ʔarjd ʔan ʔaqbl baːlʔislaːm djnaː aːld͡ʒwd ʔawlaː bh waːlfqr ʔawlaː bnaː bmqaːrna tˤwkjw mʕ lndn td͡ʒd aːlaːχjra sˤʁjra kaːn faːdˤl jʃaːrk fj aːlmsjraːt aːltːwːʕja mn ʔad͡ʒl mħaːrba aːlsːrtˤaːn mn waqaːra ʕaːlimaːan fqd waqaːra rbːh jwmjaː aːħsˤlu ʕlaː ʃjʔ d͡ʒdjd zaːrt ljlaː saːmj fj aːlqaːhra tʕaːl mn fdˤlk wʔafʃjt srj ʔilaː sˤaːħb hl mn aːlmmkn ʔan tnsˤħnj bktaːb tʔalq aːlbrq lh ʕʃjaː hl tʕlm ʔan ʔanθaː aːlbʕwdˤ hj aːlmsʔuwla ʕn kl lsʕaːt aːlbʕwdˤ ʔiin kaːn ʁjbk aːltraːb aːlʔaħmr ʔaqtrħ bʔan tʕml bmaː jqwlh twm faːlħfðˤ llʕlm bdwn aːlfhm kktb fwq aːlħmjr aːlbuhm lmn aːldaːr kʕnwaːn aːlktaːb mn aːld͡ʒmjl mħaːdθtk mlʔat bqaːʕ aːlʔardˤ χjl d͡ʒnwdh ʔanðrtnj ʔam sʕd ʔan sʕdaː srqt aːlħrb mnhm sʕaːdthm jaː lħbr mdˤaː wʔaχlaː aːldjaːraː qlt llaːʔim fj aːlħb ʔafq mn lqlb jhjm fj kl waːdj kl ʃjʔ mn ʕaːlm aːlðraːt laː tdˤjʕwaː mn ʔiljkm slmwaː aːdˤħkwaː θm aːdˤħkwaː jaː haːzljn χfq aːltˤbwl wzmra aːlndmaːn ljlaː hj aːbna faːdˤl aːlmdlːla lmaːðaː ʔawqfth d͡ʒaːd baːlwʕd fj zmaːn bχjl ʔanaː sr aːld͡ʒnwn qbl aːld͡ʒnwn ʔanaː ʔaħs ʕndmaː jkðb ʕlj ʃχsˤ jd͡ʒb ʔan ʔatħdːθ mʕk ʔaqwl lh wlm ʔanfs bnfsj ʕlnaː ʔanaː mʔumn bʔan ʕljk aːlaːrtqaːʔ fj ħjaːtk bd͡ʒhdk aːlʃχsˤj bdt ljlaː raːʔiʕa ħznj mnk jaː aːbna aːlʔamlaːk lqd ʔawqfth ʔaljs kðlk lqd wsˤl aːlbaːrħa aːlaː tˤwkjw ʔaʕrf msbqaːan maːðaː sjkwn mwdˤwʕ aːlbrnaːmd͡ʒ aːlraːdjwj ʔiðaː fj md͡ʒls nðkr ʕljaːan lqd tħsːn kθjraː ljtnj lm ʔakn lʕtˤfk nlt aːltˤqs ljlaːan jkwn baːrdaːan hl tʕlm ʔan aːlklaːb aːlsˤʁjra tʕjʃ ʕaːda ʔakθr mn aːlslaːlaːt aːlkbjra nðˤf jdjk d͡ʒjdaːan baːntðˤaːm baːstχdaːm mtˤhr aːljdjn aːlkħwlj ʔaw aːʁslhmaː baːlmaːʔ waːlsˤaːbwn hm jsknwn χaːrd͡ʒ aːlmdjna aːstbq wd ʔabj aːldˤħaːjaː mʕnaːhm aːlʃhdaːʔ ʔaħbː ʕzf mwsjqaː aːlblwz mθl mqaːbdˤ aːlʔabwaːb waːlħnfjaːt wʃaːʃaːt aːlhaːtf ʁzwa aːlχndq ـ mʕrka ʁjrt wd͡ʒh aːltaːrjχ ʔajhaː aːlnaːtˤqwn baːldˤaːd hðaː jmkn ltwm aːlbqaːʔ ʔin rʁb tqbːl faːdˤl aːlʔislaːm kd͡ʒzʔ mn ħjaːth ʔajhaː aːlsaːʔil ʕnj ʔinnj lʕlh mn aːlʔafdˤl ʔan ʔaʕwd lʕmlj ʔaraː aːldhr ʔafnaː mʕʃrj wbnj ʔabj kl jwm hw ʕtˤla fj mkaːn maː mn aːlʕaːlm sjtm aːlaːmr kaːnt ljlaː mnfzʕa lʕlj bn sˤaːlħ bn ʕlj ʔad͡ʒbnj ʔin tfdˤlt tslqtu d͡ʒbl fwd͡ʒj θlaːθ mraːt ʕnd dˤrb ʔaj rqm fj sˤfr jkwn aːlnaːtd͡ʒ sˤfr lm ʔad͡ʒd bʕd maː tˤlbh mnj twm qd tʕdwaː ʕlaː aːlsˤjaːm wqaːlwaː ftħ aːlbwːaːb aːlbaːba nʃrt aːlmnðˤma ʔasʔila wʔad͡ʒwba ʕn aːlthwja wtkjjf aːlhwaːʔ hðaː ħqaː ħdjθ d͡ʒjd aːbtsmt wqblt hdjtj aːlsˤʁjra maː rʔatnj ʕjnaːk jwm aːlfraːq kjf qd ħaːwlwaː aːʁtjaːlk ʁdraː ðhb aːlðjn thzhm mdaːħhm kamaaː tanaaːmuwna kaðalika tamuwtuwna wʔakθr mn aːlʔiχwaːn maː aːstˤʕt ʔinhm ʔaʃʕr ʔanːj mrjdˤ qljlaː blda χaːb bmn fjhaː aːlrd͡ʒaːʔ waːsˤlt ljlaː aːlsːjaːqa mn maːt jʕlm ʔank aːlħq aːlmbjn ʔajaː ʕjn wʕdtnaː ljlaː qlqa bʃʔank aːlnhr jd͡ʒf laː tql hðaː waːlʔaːlaːm waːlʔawd͡ʒaːʕ waːlsˤdaːʕ ʔin d͡ʒmaːl jswq sjaːrth ʕbr aːld͡ʒsr waruwija ʕan aːlnːabijːi sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʔaanːahu qaaːla fij baʕdˤi χutˤabihi kjf tʕlm bmlkja twm lhðaː kaːn faːdˤl mstʕdːaː ʔan jstqrː mʕ ljlaː klː ʃjʔ jtʁjːr ʔablʁ aːlħaːrθ ʕnj ʔannj maː zaːl jtwd͡ʒb ʕljnaː fʕl ðlk ʔatraː aːlnsjm ʔiðaː sraː mn nd͡ʒdh ʃʕraːʔ msˤr wlaː ʔaqwl d͡ʒmjʕkm ʔahlaː bwd͡ʒhk mn sˤbaːħ mqbl aːlsˤdq ʔafdˤl maː ħdˤrt bh mabaaːsima aːlθaʁri maː ʔaħlaː ħumjaːki hðaː aːltwaːdˤʕ ʔin ʔardt mwaːhbaː laː tʔaχðnk fj sˤdjq ʃbha laː tχf maː sˤnʕt bk aːlʔaʃwaːq χsˤwsˤjtk mhma lnaː mθwba aːlfaːqd ʕn fqdh wmaː fj aːlnaːs ʔad͡ʒwd mn ʃd͡ʒaːʕ ʔanaː raːʕ lmaː sˤfaː mnk qdmaː tħdːθ faːdˤl w daːnja ʕn aːltˤqs maː ʔazmtj aːʃtdt lwqr χtˤjtj fj ðj aːld͡ʒfwn sˤwaːrm aːlʔaqdaːr blaːʁa aːbn fraːs d͡ʒbrjl hll fj aːlsmaːʔ wkbr lʕmrj lqd ʔankrt ʁjr nkjr mn sˤwr aːlsħr aːlmbjn ʕjwnaː sjaːra maːrkw ʔismhaː "θaːndr d͡ʒaːjnt" klaː bl tkðbwn baːldjn ʕmlj aːld͡ʒdjd jtrk lj aːlqljl mn aːlwqt llaːχtlaːtˤ hl bʔimkaːnk aːltʕrf ʕlaː ðlk aːlrd͡ʒl bwaːstˤa hðh aːlsˤwra  sʔakwn ħðraː d͡ʒdaː walakin kaðːaba watawalːaaː nħnu swfa nusaːʕdki, mwaːfqa  tʔaχrtu ʕlaː aːlmwʕd nħn bħaːd͡ʒa lbʕdˤ aːlʁðaːʔ waːtqwaː aːlðj ʔamdkm bmaː tʕlmwn wabaʃːiri aːlmuʔuminijna biʔaanːa lahum mina aːllːahi fadˤlanaː kabijranaː wlw qaːtlkm aːlðjn kfrwaː lwlwaː aːlʔadbaːr θm laː jd͡ʒdwn wljaː wlaː nsˤjraː laː jħtaːd͡ʒ laːmrʔaa kj tʕtnj bh td͡ʒjd jwmj aːlħdjθ baːlʔind͡ʒljzja sbħaːn aːlðj χlq aːlʔazwaːd͡ʒ klhaː mmaː tnbt aːlʔardˤ wmn ʔanfshm wmmaː laː jʕlmwn ʔanta tħtaːd͡ʒ ʔan tnðˤr ʔilaː aːlʔaumwr mn zaːwja mχtlfa, ʔinhaː ljst kaːrθja kmaː tðˤn lqd tχlːjt ʕn ʔatˤfaːlk wajaχuwnuk nafʕuhaaː nʕjʃ fj aːlʕsˤr aːlnwwj wad͡ʒaaːfin ʕan aːlnːawmi d͡ʒanbak wad͡ʒaʕaluwaː lilːahi ʔaandaaːdanaː lijudˤilːuwaː ʕan sabijlihi qul tamatːaʕuwaː faʔiinːa masˤijrakum ʔiilaaː aːlnːaaːri lahum ʕaðaaːbun fij aːlħajaaːai aːldːunjaaː walaʕaðaaːbu aːlʔaːχiraai ʔaaʃaqːu wamaaː lahum mina aːllːahi min waaːqin wlqd ftnaː aːlðjn mn qblhm fljʕlmn aːllh aːlðjn sˤdqwaː wljʕlmn aːlkaːðbjn ʔansˤħk bʕdm msˤaːħba twm laː jkwn waːħdaː mnːaː ʔaðn llðjn jqaːtlwn bʔanhm ðˤlmwaː wʔin aːllh ʕlaː nsˤrhm lqdjr jaχtasˤːu biraħmatihi man jaʃaaːʔu waaːllːahu ðuw aːlfadˤli aːlʕaðˤijmi wataskijnanaː lisˤawlatihim fʔin aːld͡ʒna hj aːlmʔawaː sumjːtu ʕlaː χaːlj qd tkwn aːldˤħja msˤaːba fj aːlrʔas aːlklaːb waːlqtˤtˤ waːlχjwl ħjwaːnaːt faʔaanbatnaaː fijhaaː ħabːanaː laː ʔasttˤjʕ ʔan ʔaθq bh qbːlnj aːjhaː aːlʔaħmq lqd hjʔat nfshaː llʕba aːltns baːltdrjb lsaːʕaːt kl jwm ʔin rbk hw jfsˤl bjnhm jwm aːlqjaːma fjmaː kaːnwaː fjh jχtlfwn bal jurijdu aːlʔiinsaaːnu lijafd͡ʒura ʔaamaaːmahu hl fqadt ruʃdak ʔanaː kbjr bmaː fjh aːlkfaːja lʔasˤwt waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlmutaqadːimijna aːstiʁnaaːʔuuk ʕan aːlʃːajʔi χajrun min aːstiʁnaaːʔiik bihi aːldjaːnaːt aːlsmaːwja aːlθlaːθ hj aːlʔislaːm waːljhwdja waːlmsjħja ħaːla lθtk sjʔia jwd͡ʒd χdʃa hnaː fhl tsttˤjʕ aːʕtˤaːʔij ħsm ʔaj maħal mθld͡ʒaːt ʔanta ðaːhb ʔiljh  rubːijtu ʕlaː mʃaːhda bwkjmwn ðkr rħmt rbk ʕbdh zkrjaː tbdw fj aːlstjnaːt mn ʕmrhaː ʕlaː aːlʔaql warubːamaaː tatbaʕu nafsu aːlʔiinsaaːni man baʕuda ʕanhu aːstihaaːnaaan biman qaruba minhu lm jktb ʃjʔ ʕlaː aːlmrwħja ʔin fj ðlk lʔaːjaːt wʔin knaː lmbtljn km jwmanaː fj aːlʔasbwʕ  rb nd͡ʒnj wʔahlj mmaː jʕmlwn kʔanhn bjdˤ mknwn ʔaatadʕuwna baʕlanaː wataðaruwna ʔaaħsana aːlχaaːliqijna aːtsˤl bj lw smħt bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ʕbs wtwlaː aːlʕadlu ʔaaw aːlʃːud͡ʒaaːʕaau  qaaːluwaː aːħtfðˤ bhðh aːlmʕlwma lnfsk ql ʔinmaː ʔanðrkm baːlwħj wlaː jsmʕ aːlsˤm aːldʕaːʔ ʔiðaː maː jnðrwn qaːlwaː bl lm tkwnwaː mʔumnjn wanamaaːriqu masˤfuwfaaun lilsːaaːʔiili waaːlmaħruwmi tˤbʕaːan qdm lj bʕdˤ aːlnsˤaːʔiħ warubːamaaː taqadːama biaːlχatˤːi man kaaːna aːlχatˤːu min d͡ʒulːi fadˤaaːʔiilihi aːlsˤħa knz laː jʕrf qjmth ʔilaː aːlmrdˤaː faaːntaqamnaaː minhum faaːnðˤur kajfa kaaːna ʕaaːqibaau aːlmukaðːibijna ʔiðaaː aːʃtadːa aːlkalafu fadˤlanaː mina aːllːahi waniʕmaaan waaːllːahu ʕalijmun ħakijmun ʔin hðaː swf jd͡ʒʕl mn aːlmstħjl ʕljh ʔan jħfðˤ maːʔ aːlwd͡ʒh ʔaj qtˤaːr jʔaχðnj ʔilaː wstˤ aːlmdjna lm jtmkn mn aːħtwaːʔ ʁdˤbh w lw lθaːnja ʔajn stkwn jwm aːlʔiθnjn wamaaː ʔaarsalnaaː fij qarjaain min nabijːin ʔiilːaaː ʔaaχaðnaaː ʔaahlahaaː biaːlbaʔasaaːʔi waaːldˤːarːaaːʔi laʕalːahum jadˤːarːaʕuwna ʔatsmħ lj baːlʕzf ʕlaː aːlbjaːnw  liʔaanːahaaː ʔiðaaː manaħat kadːat waʔaatʕabat ʔanaː tħdθt mʕ twm laaː jufatːaru ʕanhum wahum fijhi mublisuwna maː hw aːld͡ʒjnz hðaː laː tdˤf d͡ʒmlaː mn msˤaːdr mħfwðˤa aːlħqwq kjf jsjr aːlʕml laː ʔamlk aːlmaːl lʃraːʔ aːlqaːmws fajakuwnu kaman taqadːama fijhi aːlmaθalu aːlsːaaːʔiiru liʔaabij aːlbatˤħaaːʔi maaː ʔaaʃadːa wad͡ʒaʕa aːldˤːirsi ʔaʁlq aːlbwaːba waman ʁaaːlaba aːlħaqːa laaːna ħdθth ʕn mʃaːklhaː wadaaːru nad͡ʒaaːain liman fahima ʕanhaaː hlaː ʃʁlt aːltlfaːz mn fdˤlk kaːn aːljwnaːnjwn ʔawl mn aːʕtbr aːlʔaħdaːθ aːlsmaːwja ðˤwaːhr tstħq aːlaːktʃaːf lajsa ħaqaaːanaːlʔamr lajsa lahu ʕilaːqaun bik ʔasˤbħ ʕmrhaː waːħdaːan w θmaːnjn sna lkn hðh aːlʕmlja tmt bʃkl tdrjd͡ʒj lmlaːjjn aːlsnjn lm jsbq lsaːmj w ʔan ʔataː ʔilaː mnzlj dˤaːʕ jrbwʕj tʔaqlmwaː mʕ aːltʁjjr bsrʕa ʔanaː baːlfʕl mtʔaχr wlaː ʔaʃk ʔan mʕk fdˤlaː hl mn ʔaħd lmsaːʕdtj ʔaalaaː jaʕlamu man χalaqa wahuwa aːllːatˤijfu aːlχabijru sʔaʃtrj haːtfaː χlwjaː ʁdaː hjhaːt ʃʕbj jstkjn wamaaː wad͡ʒadnaaː liʔaakθarihim min ʕahdin waʔiin wad͡ʒadnaaː waːlrswl wtχwnwaː ʔamaːnaːtkm wʔantm tʕlmwn wd͡ʒaːʔ ʔiχwa jwsf fdχlwaː ʕljh fʕrfhm whm lh mnkrwn zrʕt wrdaːan lam jakun lilsːultˤaaːni lubθun walaaː liʔaajːaaːmihi sˤafwun waaːlsːaaːdisu aːlfaraaːʁu lilmutːaqijna maːðaː jʕnj ðlk  wχlq aːllh aːlsmaːwaːt waːlʔardˤ baːlħq wltd͡ʒzaː kl nfs bmaː ksbt whm laː jðˤlmwn warawaaː aːbnu ʕumara radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhumaaː ʔaanːa aːlnːabijːa sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕlj ʔan ʔaqwm bðlk mra ʔaχraː  hðaː aːlbjt ljs lj tatbaʕuhaaː aːlrːaaːdifaau hw jsttˤjʕ ʔan jfʕlhaː ʔaħsn mnj hl lk ʔan tχbrnj kjf ʔasˤl ʔilaː mrkz lnkn  waman ʔaaðˤlamu mimːani aːftaraaː ʕalaaː sarijʕu aːlħisaaːbi lmaːðaː tdrs lʁa ʔad͡ʒnbja  kjf tʕrft ʕlaː mrjm  ʃrf fj aːlnsb wafasaaːduhaaː mufsidun lisaaːʔiiri ʔaahlihaaː liqilːaai ʔaamaaːnaaːtihim  wadˤaʕfi dijaaːnaaːtihim fatawalːawaː ʕanhu mudbirijna maːðaː tfʕlaːn aːllːaha rabːakum warabːa ʔaːbaaːʔiikumu aːlʔaawːalijna waʔiin kaaːna χajruhu mamnuwʕanaː aːslamij jaː misˤru ʔiniːnaaː aːlfdaː ðiaː jadiaː ʔin madaːti aːldːnjaː jdaː aːlħaaːqːaau kaːnt btj ʔawl aːlħaːdˤraːt ʔilaː aːlħfla ʔant tnaːm fj ħd͡ʒrtj ʔamlk aːlnaːs lnfsh mn ktm srh jstħjl ʔinhaːʔ aːltqrjr fj ʁdˤwn ʔasbwʕ ljs kl maː jlmʕ ðhbaːan laː jðˤhr tħjzanaː lʔaħd bʕjnh tudrsu aːlʔind͡ʒljzja fj aːlsˤjn ʔajdˤanaː hl trjd ʔan tfʕlhaː aːlʔaːn  waðˤilːin min jaħmuwmin ħiraaːsaau aːlbajdˤaai waaːlðːabːu ʕan aːlʔaumːaai min ʕaduwːin fij aːldːijni ʔaaw baaːʁij nafsin ʔaaw maaːlin laː trmj baːlħd͡ʒaːra wfqaːan llraːdjw ʔinhaː stmtˤr ʁdaːan ʔanaː laː ʔaʕrf maː jd͡ʒrj hnaː kjf tʁjːrt ħjaːtk waqihimu aːlsːajːiʔiaaːti waman taqi aːlsːajːiʔiaaːti jawmaʔiiðin faqad raħimtahu waðalika huwa aːlfawzu aːlʕaðˤijmu whw aːlðj jnzl aːlʁjθ mn bʕd maː qntˤwaː wjnʃr rħmth whw aːlwlj aːlħmjd wabuʕdi ʁaaːjatihi aːlðjn jkðbwn bjwm aːldjn waħuwrun ʕijnun χaːldjn fjhaː ʔabdaː ðˤulmanaː walaaː hadˤmanaː ʔaħsntmaː htf djmaː: " ʔanaː djmaː ʔalaː jʕml kaːʃf aːlmtsˤl ʕndk ʔam maːðaː  " ʔanaː hnaː mnð jwm aːlsbt lw jd͡ʒdwn mld͡ʒʔa ʔaw mʁaːraːt ʔaw mdχlaː lwlwaː ʔiljh whm jd͡ʒmħwn ʔinh jʔaml ʔan jd͡ʒd aːlʃhra kʃaːʕr wlw ʕlm aːllh fjhm χjraː lʔasmʕhm wlw ʔasmʕhm ltwlwaː whm mʕrdˤwn hl tχbzj χbz ʔaaʔaantum tazraʕuwnahu ʔaam naħnu aːlzːaaːriʕuwna wamaaː ʔaabradahaaː ʕalaaː aːlqalbi ʔiðaaː suʔiila ʔaaħadukum fijmaaː laaː jaʕlamu ʔaan jaquwla aːllːahu ʔaaʕlamu aːlːaðij hum fijhi muχtalifuwna ʔin aːllh jħb aːlðjn jqaːtlwn fj sbjlh sˤfaː kʔanhm bnjaːn mrsˤwsˤ hl hnaː aːj ʃχsˤ jtklm aːlaːnd͡ʒljzja ʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlkafaraau aːlfad͡ʒaraau bal ðalika munafːirun ʕanhaaː wamaaː χalaqnaaː aːlsːamaaːʔa waaːlʔaardˤa wamaaː bajnahumaaː laaːʕibijna qlwb jwmʔið waːd͡ʒfa tnaːwl hðaː aːldwaːʔ mrːtjn fj aːljwm waqad d͡ʒahiluwaː min aːlmaðaaːhibi maaː jaʕlamu aːlmubtadiʔiu wajatadaaːwaluhu aːlnːaaːʃiʔiu watˤalħin mandˤuwdin fij sˤuħufin mukarːamaain ʔanaː mtʕba d͡ʒdaː aːljwm tˤnd͡ʒrh wlqt ʁtˤaːhaː aːstjqðˤt ʕnd aːlsaːdsa hðaː aːlsˤbaːħ jaχaaːfanːa ʔilːaaː ðanbahu stħbh ʔilaː aːlʔabd wamin ʔaːbaaːʔiihim waðurːijːaaːtihim waʔiiχwaaːnihim waaːd͡ʒtabajnaaːhum wahadajnaaːhum ʔiilaaː sˤiraaːtˤin mustaqijmin ʔin hʔulaːʔ ljqwlwn faman ʃaaːʔ ðakarahu wafij aːlʔaardˤi ʔaːjaaːtun lilmuwqinijna ʕmaː ttħdθwn  maː qaːlh ʕn aːlʔind͡ʒljzja sˤħjħ walaaː jasʔaalu ħamijmun ħamijmanaː aːlkrh laː jðˤhr bkl bsaːtˤa mn fraːʁ ʔinh baːlʕaːda jbdʔa mn aːlħsd ʔaw aːlχwf miskijnun saraqa minhu rad͡ʒulun d͡ʒubːaaan hðaː raːʔiʕ faqad qaaːla qataaːdaau fij qawlh taʕaaːlaaː qaːl rb aːnsˤrnj bmaː kðbwn ʔaʃkrk ʕlaː msaːʕdtk mqdmanaː nbʔi ʕbaːdj ʔanj ʔanaː aːlʁfwr aːlrħjm nsˤħnj ʔalaː ʔaqwd bsrʕa waːlðjn kfrwaː bʔaːjaːtnaː hm ʔasˤħaːb aːlmʃʔama hðh ljst tˤaːwla faqaaːla aːlbuħturijːu qaːlwaː taːllh ʔink lfj dˤlaːlk aːlqdjm lm ʔaraː qtˤ ʁrwbaː d͡ʒmjlaː llʃms mθl hðaː maː aːlðj stfʕlh  kaːn ldjh aːlkθjr mn aːlmaːl fj aːlbnk waʔaanːaaː kunːaaː naqʕudu minhaaː maqaaːʕida lilsːamʕi faman jastamiʕi aːlʔaːna jad͡ʒid lahu ʃihaaːbanaː rasˤadanaː ʔaθld͡ʒt hðaː aːlʕaːm ʔakθr mn aːlʕaːm aːlmaːdˤj ʃaːkraː lʔanʕmh aːd͡ʒtbaːh whdaːh ʔilaː sˤraːtˤ mstqjm ʔiinːaaː ʔaarsalnaaː ʔiilajkum rasuwlaː ʃaaːhidanaː ʕalajkum kamaaː ʔaarsalnaaː ʔiilaaː firʕawna rasuwlaː kjfa ʕlmtji maː kaːnt trjdhu  ʔilaː ʔajn trjd ʔan tðhb  ʔanaː mʃʁwl d͡ʒdaː ljs ldj wqt aːlʔaːn χuði aːlʕafwa waʔamur biaːlʕurfi waʔaaʕridˤ ʕani aːld͡ʒaaːhilijna waqad d͡ʒaaːʔa aːlħadijθu ʕan aːlnːabijːi sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʔaanːahu qaaːla lqd d͡ʒʔitm ʃjʔiaː ʔidaː hðaː maː jʃʕrnj baːlsʕaːda waaːlnːaχla baaːsiqaaːtin lahaaː tˤalʕun nadˤijdun ʔaːkl tfaːħa faaːstaftihim ʔaahum ʔaaʃadːu χalqanaː ʔaam man χalaqnaaː ʔiinːaaː χalaqnaaːhum min tˤijnin laaːzibin hl qmt bʕmlk wʔaχð aːlðjn ðˤlmwaː aːlmukaðːibijna laː ʔaʕrf maː aːlðj sʔafʕlh  jmknk aːlðhaːb aːðhb ʔilaː aːlknjsa mʕ waːldjk waːdʕu lhaː ʔaawːaluhaaː ʕanaaːʔun wʔamaː mn ʔawtj ktaːbh bʃmaːlh fjqwl jaː ljtnj lm ʔawt ktaːbjh tnzhnaː mʕanaː ʔajn hj  qaaːla rabːi ʔiinːij ʔaaχaaːfu ʔaan jukaðːibuwni hðaː aːlmkaːn kbjr  ʔaljs kðlk  waaːlsːamaaːʔi wamaaː banaaːhaaː sitːaau ʔaaʃjaaːʔa hija qawaaːʕiduhaaː mn ʔajn ʔatjt bhðh aːlʔatˤbaːq  waðalika min ʔaaqwaaː aːldːawaaːʕij lisˤalaaːħi aːldːunjaaː waaːntiðˤaaːmi ʔaaħwaaːlihaaː ʔiilaaː jawmi aːlwaqti aːlmaʕluwmi maːðaː tfʕljn saːðhb ʔilaː aːlʃaːtˤʔi ʔinhu jntðˤr wakajfa jakuwnu aːld͡ʒaaːhilu aːlʁanijːu saʕijdanaː waaːld͡ʒahlu jadˤaʕuhu wʔasrwaː qwlkm ʔaw aːd͡ʒhrwaː bh ʔinh ʕljm bðaːt aːlsˤdwr laː ʔarjd lhðaː aːlsr ʔan jnkʃf min nutˤfaain ʔiiðaaː tumnaaː ʁdaːan snwaːd͡ʒh aːlqaraaːbaai wmaːʔ mskwb fajasˤijru ðalika ramzanaː juʕrafu biaːlmuwaaːdˤaʕaai ʕljk ʔan ttʕlm aːlsˤbr ʕlaː hðaː aːld͡ʒwː qaːl aːd͡ʒʕlnj ʕlaː χzaːʔin aːlʔardˤ ʔinj ħfjðˤ ʕljm jaː rħaːb aːlmd͡ʒd ʕdnaː bihi laqaaːdiruwna lmaːðaː tdrs kl jwm aːllːahu laaː ʔiilaha ʔiilːaaː huwa lahu aːlʔaasmaaːʔu aːlħusnaaː lm jʕr ʔaj aːhtmaːm lnsˤjħtj aːqtħm aːlmnzl surqt mnhaː ħqjbthaː tqrjbaː baːlmnzl kaːn saːmj waaːld͡ʒibaaːla ʔaarsaaːhaaː qaːl rd͡ʒl mn aːlbχlaːʔ lʔawlaːdh haðihi aːlnːaaːru aːlːatij kuntum bihaaː tukaðːibuwna hl tħtaːd͡ʒjn ʔilaː sjaːra ʔisʕaːf  maaː lakum kajfa taħkumuwna laː ʔamlk ʔilaː ʔaanta bihaaːdij aːlʕumji ʕan dˤalaaːlatihim ʔiin tusmiʕu ʔiilːaaː man juʔuminu biʔaːjaaːtinaaː fahum muslimuwna aːlsˤbr ʔaumːu aːlʕlwm aːħml hðaː zaːr mnːaːd aːlqaːhra ldj ʁrftj aːlχaːsˤa fj aːlbjt ʃaːrk kθjr mn aːltˤlaːb fj aːlmsaːbqa walaaː jaʁtarːu biaːltˤːamaʕi bl qaːlwaː ʔadˤʁaːθ ʔaħlaːm bl aːftraːh bl hw ʃaːʕr fljʔatnaː bʔaːja kmaː ʔarsl aːlʔawlwn waʔaaχðihimu aːlrːibaaː waqad nuhuwaː ʕanhu waʔaaklihim ʔaamwaaːla aːlnːaaːsi biaːlbaaːtˤili waʔaaʕtadnaaː lilkaaːfirijna minhum ʕaðaaːbanaː ʔaalijmanaː wamaaː ʔaarsalnaaː fij qarjaain min naðijrin ʔiilːaaː qaaːla mutrafuwhaaː ʔiinːaaː bimaaː ʔaursiltum bihi kaaːfiruwna jʕd͡ʒbh aːlaːstmaːʕ ʔilaː aːlmðjaːʕ maaː ʔaanaaː bifaaːʕilin waman kaaːna sˤamtuhu fij ʁajri fikrin faqad lahaaː   lk     ʃjʔ waqaaːla aːlʃːaʕbijːu fadaʕaaː rabːahu ʔaanːa haʔuulaaːʔi qawmun mud͡ʒrimuwna ʔaχbrhaː maː ʔaχbrka bh maː aːlsr  hðaː aːlktaːb mʔulf blʁa ʔind͡ʒljzja mbsːtˤa w hw shl llqraːʔa flaː jsˤdnk ʕnhaː mn laː jʔumn bhaː waːtbʕ hwaːh ftrdaː wkm qsˤmnaː mn qrja kaːnt ðˤaːlma wʔanʃʔanaː bʕdhaː qwmaː ʔaːχrjn ħmdt aːllh frʃ ʃqa d͡ʒdjda jfrdˤ nfqaːt kbjra ʔin fj ðlk lʔaːja wmaː kaːn ʔakθrhm mʔumnjn θumːa jaʔatij min baʕdi ðalika ʕaaːmun fijhi juʁaaːθu aːlnːaaːsu wafijhi jaʕsˤiruwna qaaːluwaː ʔaataʕd͡ʒabijna min ʔaamri aːllːahi raħmatu aːllːahi wabarakaaːtuhu ʕalajkum ʔaahla aːlbajti ʔiinːahu ħamijdun mad͡ʒijdun ʔiħdaaːhumaaː tuksibu aːlwizra waaːlʔauχraaː tuwhinu aːlʔaad͡ʒra ʔiin haðaaː ʔiilaːːa qawlu aːlbaʃari laː ʔasttˤjʕ fhm maː tqwl waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi min ʕalaaːmaai aːlʔiiqbaaːli aːsˤtˤinaaːʕu aːlrːid͡ʒaaːli waːldj ʔanhm ʔiljhm laː jrd͡ʒʕwn ʔiinːamaaː ʔaamwaaːlukum waʔaawlaaːdukum fitnaaun waaːllːahu ʕindahu ʔaad͡ʒrun ʕaðˤijmun mn fdˤlk tklm bbtˤʔiin ʔakθr waʔiiðaaː ʔaaradnaaː ʔaan nuhlika qarjaaan ʔaamarnaaː walijuχzija aːlfaaːsiqijna ʔajn stkwn jwm aːlʔiθnjn  qaaːla aːχrud͡ʒ minhaaː maðʔuwmanaː madħuwranaː laman tabiʕaka minhum laʔaamlaʔaanːa d͡ʒahanːama minkum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna wln jtmnwh ʔabdaː bmaː qdmt ʔajdjhm waːllh ʕljm baːlðˤaːlmjn wmaːðaː jχtbʔi wraːʔ ħqwl aːlnd͡ʒwm ʔaːkl aːlχbz wadaχala qawmun manzila ʕaaːbidin falam jad͡ʒiduwaː ʃajʔianaː jaqʕuduwna ʕalajhi faqaaːla aːllħwm aːlmsˤnʕa saːma walawlaaː ʔiið samiʕtumuwhu qultum maaː jakuwnu lanaaː ʔaan natakalːama bihaðaaː subħaaːnaka haðaaː buhtaaːnun ʕaðˤijmun ʔiilːaaː taðkiraaan liman jaχʃaaː aːlmjaːh aːlhaːdʔia ttdfq bʕmq hl ʔanta ħzjn ʔaχrd͡ʒ aːltˤlaːba mn aːlʁrfa qbl klaːj aːlʕrdˤ ʔam tsʔalhm χrd͡ʒaː fχraːd͡ʒ rbk χjr whw χjr aːlraːzqjn aːnhaː srqh rbmaː nsjt aːlmðˤla fj aːlħaːfla kaːnt trtdj fstaːnaːan ʔabjdˤaːan ln jsˤdqnj ʔaħd wlqd ʔarslnaː nwħaː ʔilaː qwmh ʔinj lkm nðjr mbjn ʔabj, ʔajn ʔanta  ldj aːlkθjr lʔafʕlh aːljwm wdt tˤaːʔifa mn ʔahl aːlktaːb lw jdˤlwnkm wmaː jdˤlwn ʔilaː ʔanfshm wmaː jʃʕrwn fʕtwaː ʕn ʔamr rbhm fʔaχðthm aːlsˤaːʕqa whm jnðˤrwn ʔanaː sʕjd d͡ʒdaːan lrʔujtk aːlmra aːlqaːdma ʃʕrhaː md͡ʒʕd baːltˤbjʕh hðaː ʕtˤaːʔunaː faːmnn ʔaw ʔamsk bʁjr ħsaːb wad͡ʒaʕalnaaː fij aːlʔaardˤi rawaaːsija ʔaan tamijda bihim wad͡ʒaʕalnaaː fijhaaː fid͡ʒaaːd͡ʒanaː subulanaː laʕalːahum jahtaduwna wʔamaː mn χaːf mqaːm rbh wnhaː aːlnfs ʕn aːlhwaː kaaːna aːld͡ʒadbu jaħduθu min ʔaasbaaːbi aːlfasaaːdi maaː dˤaaːdːahaaː hl tʃaːrk fj hðaː aːlħdθ  ʔanaː kbjr bmaː jkfj ʔaaħaduhumaaː laaːzimun biaːltˤːabʕi faʔiinːahum jawmaʔiiðin fij aːlʕaðaaːbi muʃtarikuwna twm jntðˤr sˤlaːħ ʔamrk baːlʔaχlaːq mrd͡ʒʕh  faqawːim aːlnfs baːlʔaχlaːq tstqm falamːaaː ʔaaħasːuwaː baʔasanaaː ʔiiðaaː hum minhaaː jarkudˤuwna waʔaabsˤir fasawfa jubsˤiruwna badijʕu aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waaːlʔaardˤi waʔiiðaaː qadˤaaː ʔaamranaː faʔiinːamaaː jaquwlu lahu kun fajakuwnu fjhaː faːkha waːlnχl ðaːt aːlʔakmaːm wʔilaː aːlʔardˤ kjf stˤħt waʔiin kaaːna taqsˤijru aːllːafðˤi ʕan aːlmaʕnaaː lisuwʔi fahmi aːlmutakalːimi fahuwa ʔaasˤʕabu aːlʔaumuwri ħaaːlanaː hðaː sˤdjqj twm walahum ʕalajːa ðanbun faʔaaχaaːfu ʔaan jaqtuluwni rbmaː jwd aːlðjn kfrwaː lw kaːnwaː mslmjn ʔin aːllh laː jðˤlm aːlnaːs ʃjʔiaː wlkn aːlnaːs ʔanfshm jðˤlmwn bʕzmj wnaːrj wbrkaːn θʔarj wʔaʃwaːq dmj lʔardˤj wdaːrj hl wsˤltnj ʔaj rsaːʔil  liʔaanːa min ʕilali aːlmasˤaaːliħi maaː huwa ðˤaaːhirun faʔiinːahunːa ʔaaquwmu bihaðaaː aːlħaaːli ʁaːjaun tuـʃaــriːfu wraːjـaun trafـrifu jaː haـــnaــaːk fـj ʕuـــlaːk kl ʔinsaːn ldjhi aːlħq fj mmtlkaːthi aːlχaːsˤa faqaaːla aːrdˤa biaːlqawti waχaf min aːlfawti  waaːd͡ʒʕal sˤawmak aːldːunjaaː wafitˤrak aːlmawta faaːljawma nunad͡ʒːijka bibadanika litakuwna liman χalfaka ʔaːjaaan waʔiinːa kaθijranaː mina aːlnːaaːsi ʕan ʔaːjaaːtinaaː laʁaaːfiluwna hj mtˤrba twm laː jmknhu ʔiχfaːʔ sr ʕn maːrjaː wllh aːlmʃrq waːlmʁrb fʔajnmaː twlwaː fθm wd͡ʒh aːllh ʔin aːllh waːsʕ ʕljm wjwm jħʃr ʔaʕdaːʔ aːllh ʔilaː aːlnaːr fhm jwzʕwn jawma tubadːalu aːlʔaardˤu ʁajra aːlʔaardˤi waaːlsːamaaːwaaːtu wabarazuwaː lilːahi aːlwaaːħidi aːlqahːaaːri ʔasˤbħ ʔaχj raːhbaː d͡ʒazaaːʔan wifaaːqanaː wʃaːhd wmʃhwd ʔaʕtrf bʔannj knt mhmlaːan haːa ʔatt ʔilaː hunaː mraan ʔaχraː d͡ʒnaːt ʕdn td͡ʒrj mn tħthaː aːlʔanhaːr χaːldjn fjhaː wðlk d͡ʒzaːʔ mn tzkaː waaːlχaaːmisu aːliaːktifaaːʔu bimaaːdːaain tuʁnijhi ʕan kalafi aːltˤːalabi maː ʔant ʔilaː bʃr mθlnaː fʔat bʔaːja ʔin knt mn aːlsˤaːdqjn wadːat tˤaaːʔiifaaun min ʔaahli aːlkitaaːbi law judˤilːuwnakum wamaaː judˤilːuwna ʔiilːaaː ʔaanfusahum wamaaː jaʃʕuruwna wahaðaaː qawlu aːbni ʕabːaaːsin radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhumaaː maːðaː kunti stqwljna lw knti fj mkaːnj faʔaawd͡ʒasa fij nafsihi χijfaaan muwsaaː jmknnaː aːlbdʔ walam jabqa maʕahumaaː wad͡ʒdun ʔaʕtðr  laː ʔaʕtqd ʔannj sʔakwn qaːdraːan ʕlaː ðlk waʔiin zaaːla aːlsːababu bizawaaːli aːlrːaʁbaai waaːlrːahbaai muχtalifijna fij aːlrːizqi fahaðaaː ʔasnaːnk  χaaːlidijna fijhaaː laaː juχafːafu ʕanhumu aːlʕaðaaːbu walaaː hum junðˤaruwna hðaː aːlsˤaːlwn θmra tʕaːwn mʕ md͡ʒmwʕa raːʔiʕa mn aːlnwaːdj aːltˤlaːbja mn kaːml aːltraːb aːlwtˤnj liʔaanːahu wlhm ʕðaːb ʔaljm lqd ʔaʕdːt ħsaːʔ χdˤrwaːt aːlljla wasˤadːaqa biaːlħusnaaː aːlsˤjdlja bd͡ʒwaːr aːlmʃfaː ʔaad͡ʒaʕala aːlʔaːlihaaa ʔiilahanaː waaːħidanaː ʔiinːa haðaaː laʃajʔun ʕud͡ʒaaːbun faʔiin aːlnːakijru maʕa χaʃjaai aːlʔiidˤraaːri waaːltːalafi km ʕdd aːlʔajaːm fj aːlʔasbwʕ nʔasf, wlkn hðaː aːlfjdjw ljs mtaːħaːan qaaːla ʔiinːij lajaħzununij ʔaan taðhabuwaː bihi waʔaaχaaːfu ʔaan jaʔakulahu aːlðːiʔibu waʔaantum ʕanhu ʁaaːfiluwna ʔafhmth ʔanaː bʃkl sˤħjħ ʔink qmt bðlk ʕn qsˤd liʔaanːa ʔaadaaːʔa aːlwaaːd͡ʒibi jusqitˤu ʕanhu aːlʕiqaaːba kaːn mnːaːd daːʔimaː fj mnzl ljlaː laː jmkn lnaː ʔan nʕjʃ ħjaːa sʕjda bdwn khrbaːʔ fj ʔajaːmnaː hðh wmaː lʔaħd ʕndh mn nʕma td͡ʒzaː ʔanaː ʔarjd ʔan tuħbjnj hl ʔataːk ħdjθ aːld͡ʒnwd jawma tamuwru aːlsːamaaːʔ mawranaː musawːamaaan ʕinda rabːika wamaaː hija mina aːlðˤːaaːlimijna bibaʕijdin bnth mtħmsa llðhaːb mʕh ʔilaː ʔaj mkaːn laː tkn rtˤbaː ftʕsˤr wlaː jaːbsaː ftksr laaː tudrikuhu aːlʔaabsˤaaːru wahuwa judriku aːlʔaabsˤaaːra wahuwa aːllːatˤijfu aːlχabijru lknk lst hnaːk hjaː bnaː nðhb wamaʕa aːntifaaːʔi aːltːaʃaaːkuli juʕdamu aːliaːʔitilaaːfu ʔiilːaaː maaː ʃaaːʔa aːllːahu ʔiinːahu jaʕlamu aːld͡ʒahra wamaaː jaχfaaː raːʔiʕ ʔaj srː jʕtrj ʃwqj ʔiljk klwaː waːʃrbwaː hnjʔiaː bmaː kntm tʕmlwn waqaaːla taʕaaːlaaː: aːntˤaliquwaː ʔiilaaː ðˤilːin ðij θalaaːθi ʃuʕabin waʕad͡ʒibt liman raʔaaaː aːldːunjaaː wataqalːubahaaː biʔaahlihaaː θumːa jatˤmaʔiinːu ʔilajhaaː ʔaʕlm ʔan χbzhaː sjkwn lðjðaː lst χd͡ʒwlaː bajnamaː naħnu d͡ʒuluwsun ʕinda rasuwli aːllhi sˤalːaaː aːllhu ʕalajhi wasalːama ðaːta jawmin qaaːla hal ʔaantum mutˤːaliʕuwna kl maː ʕljk hw ʔimdˤaːʔ ʔismk hnaː hðaː aːlʃaːʕr jmtaːz bħsːh aːlʃʕrj aːlmrhf ʔin lm tstħj faːsˤnʕ maː tʃaːʔ faʔiiðaaː lam jaʕrifhaaː aːlsːaaːmiʕu lam jafham maʕaaːnijahaaː walaː jaħudˤːu ʕalaaː tˤaʕaaːmi aːlmiskijni krjm ldjhi dwr haːm fj aːlfjlm bl hw ʔaːjaːt bjnaːt fj sˤdwr aːlðjn ʔawtwaː aːlʕlm wmaː jd͡ʒħd bʔaːjaːtnaː ʔilaː aːlðˤaːlmwn kjf tʕrfjn hðaː ʔaan jakuwna min kulːi waaːħidin minhumaaː majlun ʔilaaː sˤaaːħibihi fjwmʔið laː jʕðb ʕðaːbh ʔaħd ʔiðaː ʔardt ʔan ttˤaːʕ fʔamr bmaː jsttˤaːʕ hl ldjk ʔaj fkra ʕn mn jsttˤjʕ fʕl miθl hðaː aːlʃjʔ ʔinh jsˤrχ kθjraːan waħukija ʔaanːa aːlrːaʃijda rabːukum rabːu aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waaːlʔaardˤi aːlːaðij fatˤarahunːa waʔaanaaː ʕalaaː ðalikum mina aːlʃːaaːhidijna aːstʁrq aːlʔamr mnj ʔakθr mn saːʕtjn lʔatrd͡ʒm bdˤʕ sˤfħaːt fj aːllʁa aːlʔind͡ʒljzja wanafaχtu fijhi min ruwħij faqaʕuwaː lahu saaːd͡ʒidijna waaːstaðˤhara linafsihi lmaːðaː laː jsttˤjʕ ʔabdaː fʕl ʃjʔ  faʔiiðaaː aːnʃaqːati aːlsːamaaːʔu fakaaːnat wardaaan kaaːldːihaaːni jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlmuzːamːilu law daʕawta aːllːaha taʕaaːlaaː ʔaan jarzuqak ħimaaːranaː  faqaaːla θumːa kaaːna mina aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː watawaaːsˤawaː biaːlsˤːabri watawaaːsˤawaː biaːlmarħamaai walaaː jakuwnu aːlrħjm aːlr tlk ʔaːjaːt aːlktaːb wqrʔaːn mbjn quli aːdʕuwaː aːlːaðijna zaʕamtum min duwnihi falaaː jamlikuwna kaʃfa aːldˤːurːi ʕankum walaaː taħwijlanaː ʔaw nrjnk aːlðj wʕdnaːhm fʔinaː ʕljhm mqtdrwn waqilːaai aːliaːstiʕdaaːdi lahaaː ʔaʕtˤnj rtˤlaː mn aːltfaːħ klnaː llwtˤn nħn d͡ʒnd fj sbjl aːlħq θrnaː dʕjnaː ntqaːsm aːlnfqaːt wʔaːtjnaː mwsaː aːlktaːb wd͡ʒʕlnaːh hdaː lbnj ʔisraːʔijl ʔalaː ttχðwaː waaːlsːamaaːʔi ðaaːti aːlrːad͡ʒʕi ʔanaː mstʕd llʔaswʔ maːðaː laː ʔasttˤjʕ smaːʕkm ʔajhaː aːlrfaːq ʔaalːaaː taʕluwaː ʕalajːa waʔatuwnij muslimijna waʔaan ʔaaqijmuwaː aːlsˤːalaaːaa waaːtːaquwhu wahuwa aːlːaðij ʔiilajhi tuħʃaruwna ʔajhmaː tfdˤl aːlʔaħmr ʔam aːlaːzrq  ʔawaːfqk aːlrʔaj baːltʔakjd waqadˤaaː ħaaːd͡ʒatahu wamaaː naħnu bimuʕaðːabijna hal fij ðalika qasamun liðij ħid͡ʒrin hnaːk aːlsjd ttwjbaː: wsˤltk rsaːla χaːsˤa  jðˤhr ʔank fj wrtˤa ntrd͡ʒm aːld͡ʒml ʔilaː aːllʁaːt aːlʔaχraː ʔaaθmarat mawadːatuhu nadamanaː qul huwa aːlːaðij ʔaanʃaʔaakum wad͡ʒaʕala lakumu aːlsːamʕa waaːlʔaabsˤaaːra ðlk  ʔanaː nʕsaːn laː tqlq ħtaː lw ʃaribt, ln jʔuθrʕlaː qjaːdtj laː jmkn llnʕaːm ʔan jtˤjr ðalikum faðuwquwhu waʔaanːa lilkaaːfirijna ʕaðaaːba aːlnːaaːri wʔink lʕlaː χlq ʕðˤjm ʔasˤbħt aːlʔamwr ʔasˤʕb sʔabqaː bʕjdaːan ʕn tˤrjqk ln ʔaðhb maː lm tχbrnj ʔajn ʔad͡ʒd twm waaːlsːaʕijdu laaː jarkanu ʔilaaː aːlχudaʕi wzrwʕ wnχl tˤlʕhaː hdˤjm hl ʕlj ʔan ʔad͡ʒjb   ʔasʔiltk klhaː takaaːdu aːlsːamaaːwaaːtu jatafatˤːarna minhu watanʃaqːu aːlʔaardˤu wataχirːu aːld͡ʒibaaːlu hadːanaː ʔin aːlklb ʔabjdˤ jʔatj aːlaːθnjn bʕd aːlʔaħd lqd ʔiħtaːl ʕljh aːlʔamaːzjʁ mslmwn ʕaːm sʕjd ld͡ʒmjʕ aːld͡ʒzaːʔirjjn walaqad aːlχjr waaːstiχfaaːfanaː biħaqːihi waʔaaχfawaː maʕaaːnijahu ljs ldj aːlħq fj ʔan ʔaklmk ʕn aːlħaːdθ sjʁlj ðlk aːlmaːʔ bʕd χms dqaːʔiq ʔaw maː qaːrb ðlk mn qaːl hðaː  aːlθlwd͡ʒ thtˤl bkθra waaːlχasˤlaau aːlθːaaːliθaau aːlwlaːjaːt aːlmtħda bld ʁnj baːlmwaːrd aːltˤbjʕja aːlrːaquwbu aːlːatij turaaːqibuhu ʔaan jamuwta fataʔaχuða maaːlahu jaaː ʔisraaːʔiijlu χaf aːllːaha χawfanaː jaʃʁaluk ʕan fij aːlmukaaːtabaaːti waʔiin kaaːna fij kutubi aːlʕuluwmi mustaqbaħanaː naaːʔiibatik  waʔaunsun ʕinda waħʃatik  wazajnun ʕinda ʕaaːfijatk ʔajmknk ʔan tχbrnj mtaː jʁaːdr aːlqtˤaːr  ʔarʔajt mn aːtχð d͡ʒawaaːdin laaː waaːlʔaamala fijhi ʔaaðˤharu laː ʔaħd jdʕnj ʔaħsˤl ʕlaː aːlmtʕa bʕd aːlʔaːn ʔanaː ʔaqrʔa rsaːla ʔanaː ʔaħbː ʕsˤjra aːltfːaːħi maːt aːlkθjr mn aːlnaːs fj hðaː aːlħaːdθ ʔaħdhm jraːqbk ʔam jqwlwn nħn d͡ʒmjʕ mntsˤr wakulːa ʃajʔin ʔaaħsˤajnaaːhu kitaaːbanaː wahuwa aːlːaðij ʔaarsala aːlrːijaaːħa buʃranaː bajna jadaj raħmatihi waʔaanzalnaaː mina aːlsːamaaːʔi maaːʔan tˤahuwranaː hl ttħdθ aːlmqdwnja  kaːn mnːaːd sjwsˤlnaː ʔilaː mnzl ljlaː qaːm aːltˤːbjb aːlʃːrʕj bfħsˤ d͡ʒθːa saːmj w nuqilt bʕdhaː ʔilaː daːr aːld͡ʒnaːʔiz wlqd sˤbħhm bkra ʕðaːb mstqr kaːn jmkn ʔan jkwn fj ʔaj mkaːn tħdθnaː ħtaː aːlθaːnja sˤbaːħaːan balaaː qad d͡ʒaaːʔatka ʔaːjaaːtij fakaðːabta bihaaː waaːstakbarta wakunta mina aːlkaaːfirijna laːbd ʔan aːʃtrj waːħda aːdˤʁtˤaː ʕlaː aːld͡ʒrs mrtjn wakafaaː biaːlmarʔi ʕilmanaː ʔiðaaː ʕabada aːllːaha ʕazːa wad͡ʒalːa fj ʁrftj raːdjw km sʕr hðaː aːlfstaːn hlaː ʔatjt mʕj ʔilaː aːlmtd͡ʒr sʔaːχðh mːuhtˤiʕijna ʔiilaaː aːldːaaːʕi jaquwlu aːlkaaːfiruwna haðaaː jawmun ʕasirun hjaː ʔanta jmknka ʔan tfʕlhaː wakaðalika nusˤarːifu aːlʔaːjaaːti walijaquwluwaː darasta walinubajːinahu liqawmin jaʕlamuwna ʕaːd ʔilaː aːlbjt lʔawl mra mnð ʕʃr snwaːt maː hj aːlχtˤwa aːltaːlja ljsˤbħ d͡ʒaːhz laː tqlq ʔanaː swf ʔaʕtnj bhaː flmaː aːʕtzlhm wmaː jʕbdwn mn dwn aːllh whbnaː lh ʔisħaːq wjʕqwb wklaː d͡ʒʕlnaː nbjaː maːðaː ʕn "twm" waqad qaaːla baʕdˤu aːlʔaudabaaːʔi qul nazːalahu ruwħu aːlqudusi min rabːika biaːlħaqːi lijuθabːita aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː wahudanaː wabuʃraaː lilmuslimijna waqad qijla kulːun jaħsˤudu maaː jazraʕu  wajud͡ʒzaaː bimaaː jasˤnaʕu jbdw sˤʁjraːan  wlkn fj aːlwaːqʕ hw fwqa aːlʔarbʕjn mtaː wuldta  rabːanaaː aːʁfir lij waliwaaːlidajːa walilmuʔuminijna jawma jaquwmu aːlħisaaːbu ʔiðaː tʔaχrt fj aːlsˤbaːħ, swf tkwn mtʔaχraːan tˤwaːl aːljwm wajakuwnu aːlqawlu fijhi kaaːlqawli fij aːlwad͡ʒhi aːlθːaaːnij kaːn ʔabj mstlqjaː  jʃaːhd aːltlfaːz wʔið jrfʕ ʔibraːhjm aːlqwaːʕd mn aːlbjt wʔismaːʕjl rbnaː tqbl mnaː ʔink ʔant aːlsmjʕ aːlʕljm wajaħsabu ʔaanːahu naaːla biaːldːuχuwli fijhi ʔaakθarahu wafad͡ʒːarnaaː aːlʔaardˤa ʕujuwnanaː faaːltaqaaː aːlmaaːʔu ʕalaaː ʔaamrin qad qudira ʔaʃʕr bʔaːlaːm fj mʕdtj bʕd aːlʔakl ʔalaː trjd kʔasaː ʔaːχr mn aːld͡ʒʕa  waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlʕulamaaːʔi halaka man taraka laaː ʔaadrij aːn fj θwrtnaː fsˤl aːlχtˤaːb ʔinh ʔasbwʕ mnð ʔan tqaːbl twm wmaːrj ʔin hðaː maː kntm bh tmtrwn aːlʔaħd ljs jwm ʕml baːlnsba lj hl ʔanta ħzjn fajanbaʁij liman ʔaawd͡ʒadahu aːlzːamaaːnu miθlahu waqalːa ʔaan jakuwna lahu miθlun maːðaː tfʕlwn walahadajnaaːhum sˤiraaːtˤanaː mustaqijmanaː qaaːla faʔiinːaka mina aːlmunðˤarijna mn jqwl hðaː  wʔiðaː aːlsˤħf nʃrt fj hðh aːlħaːla  ʔaʕtqd ʔanh ʕlaː ħq aːlħlaːl bjːn waːlħraːm bjːn wbjnhmaː aːmwr mʃtbhaːt qaaːla aːlmalaʔau aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː min qawmihi ʔiinːaaː lanaraaːka fij safaaːhaain waʔiinːaaː lanaðˤunːuka mina aːlkaaːðibijna jʕrfwn nʕmt aːllh θm jnkrwnhaː wʔakθrhm aːlkaːfrwn θumːa laaː jamuwtu fijhaaː walaaː jaħjaaːaː ʕlj ʔan ʔad͡ʒd ʔaħdaː lmsaːʕdtj lma lm tχbrnj bʔanː aːd͡ʒtmaːʕanaː aːnʕqd aːljwm waqad jakuwnu aːld͡ʒawru taaːraaan bimaqaaːsˤidi aːlʔaːdamijːijna aːlχaaːrid͡ʒaai ʕan aːlʕadli wqd χaːb mn dsaːhaː ʕalaaː sˤiraaːtˤin mustaqijmin tħb lwsj lʕb aːltns sttħsn χlaːl ʔasbwʕ ʔanaː hnaː ksˤdjq knt ʔawːla ʃχsˤin traːhu ʕndmaː ftħt ʕajnjhaː ʕan naaːfiʕin ʕan aːbni ʕumara radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhumaaː qaaːla dfʕt llχjaːtˤa θmn fstaːnhaː fstaːn d͡ʒmjl waːχfdˤ lhmaː d͡ʒnaːħ aːlðl mn aːlrħma wql rb aːrħmhmaː kmaː rbjaːnj sˤʁjraː fsbħaːn aːllh ħjn tmswn wħjn tsˤbħwn kaːnt tmtˤr ʕnd ʔiqlaːʕnaː  lkn  ʕndmaː wsˤlnaː  kaːn aːld͡ʒw mʃmsaː waʕalaaː ħasabi aːltːaʔaːlufi ʕalaaː aːldːijni takuwnu aːlʕadaaːwaau laː ʔaħd jskn hnaːk ʔinhaː trmj bʃrr kaːlqsˤr qaaːla laaː taθrijba ʕalajkumu aːljawma jaʁfiru aːllːahu lakum wahuwa ʔaarħamu aːlrːaaːħimijna ʔanaː raːdˤ tmaːmaː bbjtj aːld͡ʒdjd fkʔajn mn qrja ʔahlknaːhaː whj ðˤaːlma fhj χaːwja ʕlaː ʕrwʃhaː wbʔir mʕtˤla wqsˤr mʃjd ʔatðkr ʔasmh  klmaː aːstmʕt ʔilaː hðh aːlʔaʁnja maːrj tʕrf ʔannj ʔakbr mnhaː ħatːaaː jastaʕtˤifa bihi aːlquluwba aːlnːaaːfiraaa ʔaalam tara ʔiilaaː aːlːaðijna juzakːuwna ʔaanfusahum bali aːllːahu juzakːij man jaʃaaːʔu walaaː juðˤlamuwna fatijlanaː tħdθnaː blʁa aːlʔiʃaːra wkaːn rd͡ʒl mrsl mn aːllh aːsmh d͡ʒwn fajakuwnu aːlmuqasˤːiru fij baʕdˤihaaː taaːrikanaː lid͡ʒamijʕihaaː falaaː juħtasabu lahu maaː ʕamila liʔiiχlaaːlihi bimaaː baqija waqul rabːi ʔaadχilnij mudχala sˤidqin waʔaaχrid͡ʒnij muχrad͡ʒa sˤidqin waaːd͡ʒʕal lij min ladunka sultˤaaːnanaː nasˤijranaː fj aːlljla aːlðˤlmaːʔ jftqd aːlbdr waːlðj hw jtˤʕmnj wjsqjn d͡ʒʔit ʔabħθ ʕnk hajhaaːta hajhaaːta limaaː tuwʕaduwna wakaaːnuwaː janħituwna mina aːld͡ʒibaaːli bujuwtanaː ʔaːminijna lmaːðaː aːlsmaːʔ zrqaːʔ waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlsːalafi aːllːahu aːlmustaʕaaːnu ʕalaaː ʔaalsinaain hw ðhb llnwm fj tmaːm aːlsaːʕa aːlsaːdsa wmaːzaːl naːʔimaːan bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi qul jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlkaaːfiruwna mn hðaːn aːlwldaːn ʔatmnaː lk aːlʃfaːʔ aːlʕaːd͡ʒl km jsˤrf fj aːlʃhr  faʔiin salimat aːlħaaːlu min aːlʔiidlaaːli aːlmufdˤij ʔilaaː aːlmalaaːli aːstadaaːmat aːlʔaulfaau waaːstaħkamat aːlwasˤlaau ʔin ʔilhkm lwaːħd lqd χdʕhu maaː kaaːna lija min ʕilmin biaːlmalaʔii aːlʔaaʕlaaː ʔiið jaχtasˤimuwna maː fʕlth ʔanaː kaːn χaːtˤʔiaːan ħjθ kaːn junfq mn rajʕhaː ʕlaː ʔitˤʕaːm aːlklaːb aːltj ljs lhaː sˤaːħb whðaː ktaːb ʔanzlnaːh mbaːrk faːtbʕwh waːtqwaː lʕlkm trħmwn fqlnaː jaː ʔaːdm ʔin hðaː ʕdw lk wlzwd͡ʒk flaː jχrd͡ʒnkmaː mn aːld͡ʒna ftʃqaː ʔinh nħjf aːstqlt waʔaanʃadt liaːbni aːlʕamijdi ʕndk mftaːħ "nʕm" waliðalika  qijla aːlmarʔaaau rajħaaːnaaun walajsat biqahramaaːnaain ʔaaʔaantum ʔaanʃaʔatum ʃad͡ʒaratahaaː ʔaam naħnu aːlmunʃiʔuuwna ql lj, kjf ʕlmta rkbt qtˤaːr aːlʕaːʃra w aːlnsˤf aːlðj tʔaχr ʕʃra dqaːʔiq mtaːʕaː lkm wlʔanʕaːmkm qul man bijadihi malakuwtu kulːi ʃajʔin wahuwa jud͡ʒijru walaaː jud͡ʒaaːru ʕalajhi ʔiin kuntum taʕlamuwna qaːlwaː lm nk mn aːlmsˤljn waʔaakθaru aːχtilaaːfanaː watamaaːdijanaː ʔaalakumu aːlðːakaru walahu aːlʔaunθaaː wqaːlwaː lwlaː ʔanzl ʕljh mlk wlw ʔanzlnaː mlkaː lqdˤj aːlʔamr θm laː jnðˤrwn waːsˤl mnːaːd aːlmħaːwla wakaðalika d͡ʒaʕalnaaː likulːi nabijːin ʕaduwːanaː mina aːlmud͡ʒrimijna wakafaaː birabːika haaːdijanaː wanasˤijranaː d͡ʒanːaaːtu ʕadnin tad͡ʒrij min taħtihaaː aːlʔaanhaaːru χaaːlidijna fijhaaː waðalika d͡ʒazaaːʔu man tazakːaaː rb aːlsmaːwaːt waːlʔardˤ wmaː bjnhmaː aːlrħmn laː jmlkwn mnh χtˤaːbaː lðaː kl maː tħtaːd͡ʒh hw aːld͡ʒbn aːld͡ʒjd wʔinaːʔ mn mrbaː aːlkrz aːlʔaswd ʕdnaː qaaːluwaː ʔaaʔiiðaaː mitnaaː wakunːaaː turaaːbanaː waʕiðˤaaːmanaː ʔaaʔiinːaaː lamabʕuwθuwna aːbnj mraːhq mtmrd swf ʔaːkl aːltfaːħa waaːllːajli ʔiiðaaː ʕasʕasa faʔaaχaða ʔaabuw aːlʕataaːhijaai haðaaː aːlmaʕnaaː fanaðˤamahu ʃaʕranaː waʔiið qaaːla rabːuka lilmalaaːʔiikaai ʔiinːij χaaːliqun baʃaranaː min sˤalsˤaaːlin min ħamaʔiin masnuwnin waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi aːldːunjaaː ʔimːaaː niqmaaun naaːzilaaun  waʔiimːaaː niʕmaaun zaaːʔiilaaun maː ʔad͡ʒml hðaː aːlχaːtm fj jdk wχsf aːlqmr mina aːllːahi ðij aːlmaʕaaːrid͡ʒi laː thm mwaːfqth tbdw sʕjdaː aːljwm aːlðjn jqwlwn rbnaː ʔinnaː ʔaːmnaː faːʁfr lnaː ðnwbnaː wqnaː ʕðaːb aːlnaːr hl ttħdθ aːld͡ʒwrd͡ʒja ʔinh mʕlm wkðlk aːnaː nsaː ʔan jʕjd lj qaːmwsj lqd tʕmdt ðlk lm jkn ʕljk aːlmd͡ʒjʔ hnaː hw mʕrwf ldaː aːld͡ʒmjʕ ʔantmaː ʔakbr mnj qaːma sʔaːχð nsˤjħtk bʕjn aːlaːʕtbaːr fj ʔamjrkaː  jtħdθ aːlnaːs aːlʔind͡ʒljzja wlqd ʔaːtjnaː mwsaː aːlktaːb lʕlhm jhtdwn ʔam aːtχðwaː ʔaːlha mn aːlʔardˤ hm jnʃrwn lmaːðaː hj ʁaːdˤba aːlʔihmaːl hw nwʕ mn aːldˤrr ʔaw aːld͡ʒrm ðaːk aːlʃχsˤ jðˤn ʔan qtˤj jʕjʃ ʕlaː aːlʃd͡ʒra laː tqlq jmknk ʔan tθq bj ql kl jʕml ʕlaː ʃaːklth frbkm ʔaʕlm bmn hw ʔahdaː sbjlaː lm ʔaħaːwl qtˤ sjaːqa sjaːra tqrjbaː aːlkl d͡ʒaːʔ twm jrjd minj ʔan ʔaqwl ðlk ʔaħb ʔakθr aːlʔamrjkjjn rwzflt qul ʔaaʔiinːakum latakfuruwna biaːlːaðij χalaqa aːlʔaardˤa fij jawmajni watad͡ʒʕaluwna lahu ʔaandaaːdanaː ðalika rabːu aːlʕaaːlamijna qtlt bjtj ʔamk ʔinh ʕlaː rd͡ʒʕh lqaːdr ʔinhu ðˤrjf, wlkn ʁbj χalaqa aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waaːlʔaardˤa biaːlħaqːi wasˤawːarakum faʔaaħsana sˤuwarakum waʔiilajhi aːlmasˤijru fj d͡ʒnaːt wʕjwn aːlʃaːb aːlðj kaːn hnaː ʔaʕtˤaːnj hðh lk hl ʔaʕd͡ʒbtk aːld͡ʒaːmʕa  haːa wdˤʕt aːlmd͡ʒla ʕlaːa aːltˤaːwla ʔinhu jrjd ʔan jnðˤr ħtaː jtzwd͡ʒ ʔilaː mn aːrtdˤaː mn rswl fʔinh jslk mn bjn jdjh wmn χlfh rsˤdaː ʔanaː lst mn hnaː ʔatmnaː ʔan ʔaqjm fj fndq χms nd͡ʒwm waaːlːaðijna aːstad͡ʒaaːbuwaː lirabːihim waʔaaqaaːmuwaː aːlsˤːalaaːaa waʔaamruhum ʃuwraaː bajnahum wamimːaaː razaqnaaːhum junfiquwna sˤbaːħ aːlχjr, ʔajhaː aːltˤbjb fatˤawːaʕat lahu nafsuhu qatla ʔaaχijhi faqatalahu faʔaasˤbaħa mina aːlχaaːsirijna χaːlj jdχn kθjranaː d͡ʒdaː  wlaː ʁnaː lh ʕn aːltbʁ d͡ʒnaːt ʕdn mftħa lhm aːlʔabwaːb ʔin aːlðjn tdʕwn mn dwn aːllh ʕbaːd ʔamθaːlkm faːdʕwhm fljstd͡ʒjbwaː lkm ʔin kntm sˤaːdqjn rafaʕa samkahaaː fasawːaaːhaaː hðh aːlmra  hdfj hw baːrjs waaːlθːaaːnij aːnqijaaːdun faːsˤbr ʔin wʕd aːllh ħq wlaː jstχfnk aːlðjn laː jwqnwn traː maːðaː sjfʕl aːlrʔijs aːld͡ʒdjd ljs ldjk aːlħq fj aːltwqf fj hðaː aːlʃaːrʕ laː jχtltˤ aːlħljb baːlmaːʔ ʔanaː ʕlaː θqa mn ʔan hðaː aːlktaːb sjkwn ðaː faːʔida ʕðˤjma lk kðbt qwm lwtˤ aːlmrsljn wʔarsl ʕljhm tˤjraː ʔabaːbjl law naʃaaːʔu d͡ʒaʕalnaaːhu ʔaud͡ʒaaːd͡ʒanaː falawlaaː taʃkuruwna ʔiinːa haðaaː lahuwa ħaqːu aːljaqijni waaːsˤbir faʔiinːa aːllːaha laaː judˤijʕu ʔaad͡ʒra aːlmuħsinijna aːlħq mn rbk flaː tkwnn mn aːlmmtrjn ʔinh jʕtbr aːltˤbjb aːlʔafdˤl fj aːlblda hm nfs aːlʃjʔ ʔajhmaː ħqjbtk  ʔiin jaʃaʔa juðhibkum wajaʔati biχalqin d͡ʒadijdin wlw dχlt ʕljhm mn ʔaqtˤaːrhaː θm sʔilwaː aːlftna lʔaːtwhaː wmaː tlbθwaː bhaː ʔilaː jsjraː aːldːijnu aːlmufdˤij ʔilaaː aːlsːitri waaːlʕafaaːfi hj ðwdtnj bbʕdˤ aːltˤʕaːm ln jsˤbkn ʔaħd baːlʔaðaː lm jχbrnj ʔaħd bwd͡ʒwdkmaː hnaː waʔaad͡ʒdaaː aːlʔaumuwra nafʕanaː fij aːntiðˤaaːmihaaː wasalaaːmatihaaː lm ʔaraː mθl hðaː aːlbtˤjχ aːlkbjr mn qbl ʔinh mn sljmaːn wʔinh bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm wajakufːuhum ʕan ʔaasbaaːbi aːlmawaaːdːi aːlːatij bihaaː qiwaaːmu ʔaawadihim waaːntiðˤaaːmu d͡ʒumlatihim ʔalqt aːlʃrtˤa aːlqbdˤ ʕlaː aːlrd͡ʒl aːlðj qtl aːlftaːa qaːl nwħ rb ʔinhm ʕsˤwnj waːtbʕwaː mn lm jzdh maːlh wwldh ʔilaː χsaːraː aːlbħr fj ʃwnaːn mzdħm kθjraːan jwm aːlʔaħd slaːm ʕlaː ʔil jaːsjn fij ʔaadnaaː aːlʔaardˤi wahum min baʕdi ʁalabihim sajaʁlibuwna waʔiiðaaː ʔaanʕamnaaː ʕalaaː aːlʔiinsaaːni ʔaaʕradˤa wanaʔaaaː bid͡ʒaaːnibihi waʔiiðaaː masːahu aːlʃːarːu kaaːna jaʔiuwsanaː llχnaːzjr bʕdˤ aːlmjzaːt aːlmʃtrka mʕ aːlbʃr ʔinh ʔamr mχtlf d͡ʒwdj trqsˤ d͡ʒjdaː faaːd͡ʒtamaʕuwaː ʕalajhi faqaaːla wakaðːaba bihi qawmuka wahuwa aːlħaqːu qul lastu ʕalajkum biwakijlin waaːðkur ʔiismaaːʕijla waaːljasaʕa waðaaː aːlkifli wakulːun mina aːlʔaaχjaaːri wabiaːlrːaħmaai aːlħunuwːa waaːlʃːafaqaaa lkl mqaːm mqaːl aːlltˤf lʁaan jsmʕhaː aːlʔasˤm  wjraːhaː aːlʔaʕmaː ʔiilaaː rabːika jawmaʔiiðin aːlmustaqarːu waʔiin ʔaadrij laʕalːahu fitnaaun jarzuquhaaː waʔiijːaaːkum wahuwa aːlsːamijʕu aːlʕalijmu wʕd aːllh laː jχlf aːllh wʕdh wlkn ʔakθr aːlnaːs laː jʕlmwn lituʔuminuwaː biaːllːahi warasuwlihi watuʕazːiruwhu watuwaqːiruwhu watusabːiħuwhu bukraaan waʔaasˤijlanaː dfʕ twm maːrj mn ʕlaː aːldrd͡ʒ kamaaː ʔaanːa ħirmaaːna aːlʕaaːqili lmaːðaː tʕtqd ðlk  hl rddt ʕlaː tlk aːlrsaːla bʕd  walaaː taqbalu ʕaaːʔiidanaː fqdt traːsj nðˤaːrthaː walaqad aːlbrjd  jʕrf " mhrd͡ʒaːn aːlrbjʕ " baːlʕaːm aːlsˤjnj aːld͡ʒdjd ʔajdˤaːan walidafʕi ʕad͡ʒzihi ħijalanaː dalːahu ʕalajhaaː biaːlʕaqli wahuwa aːlfardu aːlʔaawħadu fij sˤalaaːħi aːlʔaːχiraai wamanʕin aːχwtj ʔatˤwl qaːma mnj ʔaʁlq fmk ʔinːa baqaaːʔak ʔilaaː fanaaːʔin ʔasˤjb baːlʔiħbaːtˤ mʔuχraː nʔaml d͡ʒmjʕanaː ʔan jʔatj wqf ʔitˤlaːq aːlnaːr hðaː bslaːm ʕaːlmj fj sˤbaːħ aːlʁd, hm swf jʃtrwn tðaːkr wðkraː lʔawlj aːlʔalbaːb waqaaːla d͡ʒaʕfaru bnu muħamːadin liaːbnihi bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm sbħ llh maː fj aːlsmaːwaːt waːlʔardˤ whw aːlʕzjz aːlħkjm hjaː bnaː ql jtwfaːkm mlk aːlmwt aːlðj wkl bkm jadrij ʔauhmila fahawaaː hl aːstħmmta  ʔafħkm aːld͡ʒaːhlja jbʁwn wmn ʔaħsn mn aːllh ħkmaː lqwm jwqnwn wðllnaːhaː lhm fmnhaː rkwbhm wmnhaː jʔaklwn ʔanta ldjka rʔuja ʔafdˤl mnaː waʕilːaau ðalika ʔaanːa baːlθrwa last ʔaaχaaːfu ʕalajk ʔaan taχaaːfa aːllːaha waʔiinːamaaː ʔaaχaaːfu ʕalajk ʔaan laaː taχaaːfa aːllːaha ʔin ʔardt ʔan jħbk aːlnaːs fʔaħbbh waqaaːla aːlmaʔamuwnu aːlʔiiχwaaːnu θalaaːθu ʔanhm ʔaːmnwaː waːtqwaː lmθwba mn ʕnd aːllh χjr lw kaːnwaː jʕlmwn sʔaʕwd fj aːlʕaːʃra laː ʔasttˤjʕ ʔan ʔafkr fj mθaːl mnaːsb faʔiin ʔaaraaːda aːlʔiiqdaaːma ʕalaaː aːlʔiinkaaːri maʕa luħuwqi aːlmadˤarːaai bihi naðˤara qfz mn aːlnaːfða ʔin lk fj aːlnhaːr sbħaː tˤwjlaː srrtu lrʔujtka watarki aːltːasalːutˤi biaːlquwːaai laː ʔaħd jqtˤn hnaːk bl jrjd aːlʔinsaːn ljfd͡ʒr ʔamaːmh aːlðːanbu laaː faʔaaʕridˤ ʕanhum waaːntaðˤir ʔiinːahum muntaðˤiruwna kaːn jʁlj mn aːlʁdˤb waman aːftaqara fijhaaː ħazina faman qawijat ʔaasbaaːbuhu qawijat aːlθːiqaau bihi lqd ʔasˤbħ mmθlaː mʃhwraː ʔaawaʔaːbaaːʔuunaaː aːlʔaawːaluwna waʔaasˤlu haðaaː ʔaanːa χaʃjaaa aːllːahi tabʕaθu ʕalaaː tˤaaːʕatihi fij χalqihi qaːl ʔawlw d͡ʒʔitk bʃjʔ mbjn wahaðihi ʔaumuwrun ʔin lam taslam lilzːaʕijmi wljbkwaː kθjraː d͡ʒzaːʔ bmaː kaːnwaː jksbwn faʔaaqbaluwaː ʔiilajhi jazifːuwna wʔaːja lhm ʔanaː ħmlnaː ðrjthm fj aːlflk aːlmʃħwn waʔiið qulnaaː lilmalaaːʔiikaai aːsd͡ʒuduwaː liʔaːdama fasad͡ʒaduwaː ʔiilːaaː ʔiiblijsa ʔaabaaː waaːstakbara wakaaːna mina aːlkaaːfirijna mataaːʕun qalijlun walahum ʕaðaaːbun ʔaalijmun wasajːidanaː maðkuwranaː kjf wd͡ʒdt hðaː aːlktaːb  maː ðaːk aːlmbnaː aːldˤχm  walaw qaaːtalakumu aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː lawalːawuaː aːlʔaadbaaːra θumːa laaː jad͡ʒiduwna walijːanaː walaaː nasˤijranaː whðaː sˤraːtˤ rbk mstqjmaː qd fsˤlnaː aːlʔaːjaːt lqwm jðkrwn flnʔatjnk bsħr mθlh qljlaː waaːχfidˤ lahumaaː d͡ʒanaaːħa aːlðːulːi mina aːlrːaħmaai waqul rabːi aːrħamhumaaː kamaaː rabːajaaːnij sˤaʁijranaː ʔinːa min ʔaafdˤali aːlʔaaʕmaaːli kalimaaa ħaqːin ʕinda sultˤaaːnin d͡ʒaaːʔiirin wʔalqj aːlsħra saːd͡ʒdjn ʔalaː tbaːlj ʔin dχnt  ʔiðaː mmkn, ʔawd ʔan ʔastlm d͡ʒwaːb walaqad fatanːaaː qablahum qawma firʕawna wad͡ʒaaːʔahum rasuwlun karijmun waːsˤl aːlmʃj lftra ʔaafaman aːstiraaːħaain  waʔaajːaaːmi ʕutˤlaain waminhaaː maaː huwa ʁaaːmidˤun ʔafhm lʁtk ʔaχj jskn fj tˤwkjw laː ʔaʕrf maː ʔafʕluhu ʁdaːan mðaːq hðaː aːlmaːʔ tˤjb wamalbasuhu ħaraaːmun waʁuðːija biaːlħaraaːma faʔaanːaaː justad͡ʒaaːbu lahu ʔin jwm aːlfsˤl kaːn mjqaːtaː maaː dˤalːa sˤaaːħibukum wamaaː ʁawaaː faːtqwaː aːllh wʔatˤjʕwn lm ʔakn ʔarjd ʔan ʔaħdθ ʔaja dˤd͡ʒa ðalika fadˤlu aːllːahi juʔutijhi man jaʃaaːʔu waaːllːahu ðuw aːlfadˤli aːlʕaðˤijmi ʔalqt kaːjt nðˤra ʕlaː krjs θm td͡ʒaːhlth  aːlʃjʔ aːlðj d͡ʒʕlh jħzn walilfaraaːʁi zajʁun ʔaaw nadamun walaaː jumkinu fijhaaː lubθun tlk ʔiðaː qsma dˤjzaː watasˤilu wisˤaaːla aːlmaluwli ʕasaaː ʔaan jahdijani rabːij liʔaaqraba min haðaaː raʃadanaː waʔiin lam jad͡ʒib ʕalajhi aːlðj jwsws fj sˤdwr aːlnaːs maː aːlðj jubaθːu aːlʔaːn  waqaaːla aːld͡ʒaaːħiðˤu ʔanaː laː ʔarjd ʔan jkwn hnaːk ʔaj swʔ fhm wamina aːlnːaaːsi man jaquwlu ʔaːmanːaaː biaːllːahi wabiaːljawmi aːlʔaːχiri wamaaː hum bimuʔuminijna ʔanaː ʔatttˤlʕ lħfla ʕjd aːlqdjsjjn χaːsˤtk fʔinhm lʔaːklwn mnhaː fmaːlʔiwn mnhaː aːlbtˤwn dʕjnaː nqsm aːlfaːtwra bʔarbʕa tˤrq mn aːlmftrdˤ ʔan jkwn twm hnaː fj aːlʕaːʃra laː faːʔida mn aːlbkaːʔ  fln jsmʕk ʔaħd ʔaħs baːlbrd ʔinaː lmʁrmwn ʔajn ʁrfa aːltˤʕaːm qaːl fʕlthaː ʔiðaː wʔanaː mn aːldˤaːljn aːlzud͡ʒaːd͡ʒa ʕlaː aːlrf aːlʕulwj ttwjbaː mtʕdd aːllʁaːt ħqːanaː kl aːllʁaːt mtsˤla fjmaː bjnhaː wmaː χlqnaː aːlsmaːʔ waːlʔardˤ wmaː bjnhmaː laːʕbjn dʕnj ʔaraːhaː faʔaalqawaː ħibaaːlahum waʕisˤijːahum waqaaːluwaː biʕizːaai firʕawna ʔiinːaaː lanaħnu aːlʁaaːlibuwna ʔanaː mtʔakda ʔanka mħq ʔiinːahu min sulajmaaːna waʔiinːahu bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi naːnsj mn lndn ħaːn wqt aːlrħjl hl jmknnj ʔan ʔaːχð bʕdˤ aːlʕjnaːt  lm jkn "twm" jʕj aːlmʃkla wahaðaaː waaːdˤiħun ؛ liʔaanːa aːlχaaːʔiifa min hðh aːlkaːmjraː rχjsˤa ʔanaː laː ʔanaːm kθjraː laː ʔaħd jhtm ħjaːl ðlk bʕd aːlʔaːn ʃjkaːʁw mχtlfa d͡ʒdaː ʕn bwstˤn aːχðt fsˤlaːan waːħdaːan, lkn aːktʃft baːn td͡ʒrba aːlħjaːa aːlħqjqa hj aːkθr faːʔida jaː ʔajhaː aːlnbj d͡ʒaːhd aːlkfaːr waːlmnaːfqjn waːʁlðˤ ʕljhm wmʔawaːhm d͡ʒhnm wbʔis aːlmsˤjr ʔaam lahu aːlbanaaːtu walakumu aːlbanuwna aːlʔaːn jmknnj ʔan ʔaχrd͡ʒ w ʔalʕb fj aːlbstaːn θumːa tantaqilu ʔilaaː man baʕdu biʔaaswaʔaa min ðalika ħaaːlanaː ħatːaaː laaː junmaaː bihaaː nabtun maːðaː trjd haː aːlbaːb fj nhaːja aːlmmr laʕanahu aːllːahu waqaaːla laʔaatːaχiðanːa min ʕibaaːdika nasˤijbanaː mafruwdˤanaː wjtd͡ʒnbhaː aːlʔaʃqaː wmnaːa aːlθaːlθa aːlʔaχraː ʔalm ʔasmʕk ttklm mʕ ʔaħdhm  kaːnt aːlʔam χd͡ʒilaan mn tsˤrfaːt aːbnhaː aːlsjʔia mrfwʕa mtˤhra ʔinh ʔaχj aːlʔakbr fatanaaːdawaː musˤbiħijna mn jsttˤjʕ tklm aːlsˤjnja waːljaːbaːnja qd jsmʕaːnaː ʔarjd ʔan ʔaskn fj aːlmdjna naħnu muħaːmwn waʔaamːaaː aːlqaaːʕidaau aːlθːaaːnijaau wahija aːlʔaulfaau aːld͡ʒaaːmiʕaau laaː tuχli qalbak min aːlmuðaaːkaraai fataʕud ʕaqijmanaː lʔaqtˤʕn ʔajdjkm wʔard͡ʒlkm mn χlaːf θm lʔasˤlbnkm ʔad͡ʒmʕjn laː tfʕl ʃjʔiaː ħtaː ʔaːtj jqʕ hðaː aːlfndq fj mkaːn mnaːsb fjmaː jχsˤ aːlnql aːlʕmwmj twm ldjhi mtsʕ mn aːlwqt mudhaaːmːataaːni ʔiinːa aːlːaðijna jarmuwna aːlmuħsˤanaaːti aːlʁaaːfilaaːti aːlmuʔuminaaːti luʕinuwaː fij aːldːunjaaː waaːlʔaːχiraai walahum ʕaðaaːbun ʕaðˤijmun aːskt maːrj ʕasraːʔ aːlfadˤaaːʔiilu hajʔiaaːtun mutawasːitˤaaun bajna χalːatajni naaːqisˤatajni walamːaaː ħadˤara biʃra bna mansˤuwrin aːlmawtu fariħa rbkm aːlðj jzd͡ʒj lkm aːlflk fj aːlbħr ltbtʁwaː mn fdˤlh ʔinh kaːn bkm rħjmaː qaːlwaː rbnaː mn qdm lnaː hðaː fzdh ʕðaːbaː dˤʕfaː fj aːlnaːr ʃʕr twm baːlħjrh ʃʕrhaː md͡ʒʕd btˤbjʕth aːlʕaːlm mljʔ bmrwd͡ʒj aːlʃaːʔiʕaːt waːlkðaːbjn ʔanaː laː ʔarjd ʔan ʔatħdθ ʕn tˤflj km aːlʔaud͡ʒra ʔilaː bjkwl  wadaʕaaː biʔaabij aːlʕataaːhijaai faaːstaħalːahu wawahaba lahu ʔaalfa dijnaaːrin waʔaatˤlaqahu mn hw aːlʃχsˤ aːlmsˤwr ʕlaː hðaː aːltˤaːbʕ  ʔanaː ʔaʕtˤus kθjraːan mn sbq aːlbjdˤa ʔam aːldd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa bʔimkaːnk aːlmʃaːrka fj aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕ bʁdˤ aːlnðˤr ʕn snk jʕrf saːmj maːlk aːlmnzl baːlʔams qrʔat ktaːbaːan llʔasf kaːn mumlaːan d͡ʒdaːan ʔanaː lstu mʃʁwla aːlʔan mn aːlʔafdˤl ʔan tʁlq aːlbaːb ʔanaː laː ʔasttˤjʕ ʔan ʔaʕjʃ bdwnk ħtːaaː d͡ʒalasa ʔilaː aːlnːabjːi sˤalːaaː aːllhu ʕalajhi wasalːama faʔaasnada rukbatajhi ʔiilaː rukbatajhi tnbʔa ðaːk aːlʃjχ bfwznaː waʔaaħaduhumaaː ʔaaʁlabu min aːlʔaːχari sʔaʕd lk bʕdˤ aːlqhwa fakaðalika fasaaːdu aːld͡ʒadbi ʕaaːmːun ʔinhaː draːd͡ʒtj χijaaːru ʃubːaaːnikum aːlmutaʃabːihuwna biʃujuwχikum waʃiraaːru ʃujuwχikum aːlmutaʃabːihuwna biʃubːaaːnikum θumːa lanaħnu ʔaaʕlamu biaːlːaðijna hum ʔaawlaaː bihaaː sˤilijːanaː fjhaː ʕjn d͡ʒaːrja dʕnaː nʔaml ʔanhaː tʕml ʔanaː mn tˤwkjw ʕaːsˤma aːljaːbaːn waaːd͡ʒʕal lij lisaaːna sˤidqin fij aːlʔaːχirijna ðwqwaː ftntkm hðaː aːlðj kntm bh tstʕd͡ʒlwn hl jmknk ʔan tsaːʕdnj laː tqlq ʔanaː sʔabqaː mʕk ʔinhaː lðjða aːlmðaːq laː tdˤrbnj baːlmiðˤla fʔatjaː frʕwn fqwlaː ʔinaː rswl rb aːlʕaːlmjn ʔaʁlbja aːlld͡ʒna kaːnt mʕaːrdˤaan llχtˤa wamin duwnihimaaː d͡ʒanːataaːni aːlsrqa χtˤʔa mwsaː ʕljh aːlslaːm kaːn rswlaː mn ʕnd aːllh nðˤrjaː  laː frq bjn aːlnðˤrja waːlttˤbjq  lkn ttˤbjqjaː  jwd͡ʒd frq ʔawdu ʔan ʔadʕwkj ʔilaː aːlħfla ðwq zwd͡ʒtj fj aːlfsaːtjn jχtlf ʕn ðwqj lndn, ʕaːsˤma ʔind͡ʒltraː, ʕlj nhr aːltjmz waːsˤlat aːlbkaːʔ hw sˤbj whj ftaːa waʔiinːa laka laʔaad͡ʒranaː ʁajra mamnuwnin hl ʔant tfkr d͡ʒdjaː fj ʃraːʔ hðh aːlsjaːra aːlqdjma  waaːlθːaaːnij dˤabtˤu maaː aːʃtabaha minhaaː biaːlnːuqatˤi waaːlʔaaʃkaaːli aːlmumajːazaai lahaaː θumːa baʕaθnaaːkum min baʕdi mawtikum laʕalːakum taʃkuruwna aːnqtˤʕ aːtsˤaːlj baːlʔintrnt wʔamtˤrnaː ʕljhm mtˤraː faːnðˤr kjf kaːn ʕaːqba aːlmd͡ʒrmjn jawma jukʃafu ʕan saaːqin wajudʕawna ʔiilaaː aːlsːud͡ʒuwdi falaː jastatˤijʕuwna nuzulanaː min ʁafuwrin raħijmin hj ttdrb ʕlaː aːlbjaːnw kl jwm ʔiilːaaː aːlːaðij fatˤaranij faʔiinːahu sajahdijni ʔaʁdˤbthaː fj aːlwlaːjaːt aːlmtħda  jtħdθ aːlnaːs baːlʔind͡ʒljzja twm md͡ʒthd wjmkn aːlʔiʕtmaːd ʕljh laː jsttˤjʕwn nsˤrhm whm lhm d͡ʒnd mħdˤrwn jwd͡ʒd θlaːθa mtaːd͡ʒr fj aːlmrkz td͡ʒaːrj lm ʔakn ʔarjd ʔan ʔaqwl lk hðaː bdaː ðlk aːlʕml shlaː d͡ʒdaː lknj aːstʁrqt fjh ʔasbwʕaː laː ʔadχn aːltfaːħa daːʔirja aːlʃkl jħtwj aːllħm ʕlaː aːlbrwtjn waaːnʕikaaːsi ħuðˤuwðˤihim ʔaan jasˤijruwaː ʕinda man juʕalːimuwhu mustad͡ʒhalijna  waʕinda man qadːamuwhu mustarðalijna hðh ʔaχtj laː ʔaʕrf kjf lknːj fʕlthaː fkðbwhmaː fkaːnwaː mn aːlmhlkjn lqd tzħlqt ʕlaː aːlθld͡ʒ lʔawl mra man qalːa ðalːa waqaaːla qajsu bnu ʕaaːsˤimin waʔiimːaaː manijːaaun mufd͡ʒiʕaaun mʃt bsrʕa kj tlħq baːlʔaːχrjn ʔinaː mknaː lh fj aːlʔardˤ wʔaːtjnaːh mn kl ʃjʔ sbbaː twm ljs sˤaːrmaːan bmaː fjhi aːlkfaːja mʕ tˤlaːbh waaːsˤtˤanaʕtuka linafsij fj aːlħqjqa lm ʔaːkl ʔaj ʃjʔ mnð hðaː aːlsˤbaːħ waʔiið ʔaːtajnaaː muwsaaː aːlkitaaːba waaːlfurqaaːna laʕalːakum tahtaduwna jʔakl aːlʔasd aːllħm wlʔin ʃʔinaː lnðhbn baːlðj ʔawħjnaː ʔiljk θm laː td͡ʒd lk bh ʕljnaː wkjlaː kiltaaː aːld͡ʒanːatajni ʔaːtat ʔaukulahaaː walam taðˤlim minhu ʃajʔianaː wafad͡ʒːarnaaː χilaaːlahumaaː naharanaː wqaːlt ʔawlaːhm lʔaχraːhm fmaː kaːn lkm ʕljnaː mn fdˤl fðwqwaː aːlʕðaːb bmaː kntm tksbwn hjaː dʕwnaː nðhb ʔilaː aːlbjt bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ʔataː ʔamr aːllh flaː tstʕd͡ʒlwh sbħaːnh wtʕaːlaː ʕmaː jʃrkwn hl jmknnj aːlbqaːʔ hðh aːlljla  ðˤnnt ʔanh lm jkn ʔaħd fj aːlmtˤbχ wʔarslnaː aːlrjaːħ lwaːqħ fʔanzlnaː mn aːlsmaːʔ maːʔ fʔasqjnaːkmwh wmaː ʔantm lh bχaːznjn qaaːla ʕilmuhaaː ʕinda rabːij fij kitaaːbin laaː jadˤilːu rabːij walaaː jansaaː hðaː hw aːlktaːb ʕjnh aːlðj knt ʔarjd qraːʔth waʔaakθara taʕaaːwunanaː watafaqːudanaː laː tlum nfsk waqad χaaːba man dasːaaːhaaː waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlrːid͡ʒaaːlu kaaːlʃːad͡ʒari ʃaraaːbuhu waaːħidun waθamaruhu muχtalifun liʔaanːahaaː kaaːnat taχdumuk wahija tuħibːu ħajaaːtak ʔaħsnwaː mʕaːmla aːlrd͡ʒaːl  jʔatikm aːlχaːm fj slaːm ʔaanaaː ʔaakramu ʕalaaː aːllːahi min ʔaan jad͡ʒʕalanij χaaːdima ħimaaːrin ʔiinːa saʕjakum laʃatːaaː ʁdaː snðhb ʔilaː aːlmdrsa kj nsd͡ʒl ʔanfsnaː fj aːldrs aːlðj nrjd aːlaːltħaːq bh fljʕbdwaː rb hðaː aːlbjt ʔafʔamnwaː mkr aːllh flaː jʔamn mkr aːllh ʔilaː aːlqwm aːlχaːsrwn jntʃr aːlʁʃ waːlχdaːʕ fj ʔajaːmnaː khðh ʔakθr mn ʔaj wqt mdˤaː ʔanaː lstu d͡ʒmlaan jnbʁj ʔan ʔaħðf mn ttwjbaː w ʕzfnaː nʁma aːlrʃaːʃ lħnaː raːʔiħa aːlmsk mn ʔatˤjb aːlrwaːʔiħ faaːstaftihim ʔaalirabːika aːlbanaaːtu walahumu aːlbanuwna tzwd͡ʒ d͡ʒwrd͡ʒ mn ʔaχtj qul ʔiin kuntum tuħibːuwna aːllːaha faaːtːabiʕuwnij juħbibkumu aːllːahu wajaʁfir lakum ðunuwbakum waaːllːahu ʁafuwrun raħijmun aːnsij aːlʔamr ljs ldj nja fj aːlzwaːd͡ʒ fj aːlqrjb aːlʕaːd͡ʒl ʔanaː laː ʔaʕrf maːðaː trjd mnj  hlaː ʔamdˤjt mn fdˤlk  ʔilaː rħma mnaː wmtaːʕaː ʔilaː ħjn qaaːluwaː aːbnuwaː lahu bunjaaːnanaː faʔaalquwhu fij aːld͡ʒaħijmi ljs ldjnaː ʔaj χjaːr ʔaːχr ʁjr aːlmwaːsˤla warawaaː ʕawnu bnu ʕabdi aːllːahi ʕan aːbni masʕuwdin radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu ʔaanːahu qaaːla wlqd ʔanðrhm btˤʃtnaː ftmaːrwaː baːlnðr lilːahi mulku aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waaːlʔaardˤi wamaaː fijhinːa wahuwa ʕalaaː kulːi ʃajʔin qadijrun dχlt ʕlaː zwd͡ʒtj fwd͡ʒdthaː wħjda lm ʔaraː qtˤ zraːfa ħtaː aːljwm aːlðj zrt fjh ħdjqa aːlħjwaːnaːt hðh aːlmnðˤma aːlknjsja tstqbl aːllaːd͡ʒʔijn ھl ʔiʃtrjt tðkra ðhaːb wʔijaːb  tsaːrʕ aːlsaːʔiq bsjaːrth ðlk ʕaːlm aːlʁjb waːlʃhaːda aːlʕzjz aːlrħjm qul maaː ʔaasʔaalukum ʕalajhi min ʔaad͡ʒrin ʔiilːaaː man ʃaaːʔa ʔaan jatːaχiða ʔiilaaː rabːihi sabijlanaː w lħb djnnaː waːlʕaːlm qljl fj aːld͡ʒjb χjr mn kθjr fj aːlʁjb ʔanaː aːmrʔaa biʕamalihim  wajubʁidˤu aːltˤːaaːliħijna wahuwa minhum flmaː blʁaː md͡ʒmʕ bjnhmaː nsjaː ħwthmaː faːtχð sbjlh fj aːlbħr srbaː tʕjʃ aːlʔajaːʔil fj bjʔiaːt mχtlfa falaʔiin kunːaaː muqirːijna ʔinːaaː liħamqaaː  walaʔiin maː zaːʁ aːlbsˤr wmaː tˤʁaː laː ʃk fj ʔan aːlʔisbraːntw mdˤjʕa wqt kbjra χalaqa aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waaːlʔaardˤa biaːlħaqːi taʕaaːlaaː ʕamːaaː juʃrikuwna nħn daːʔimaːan knːaː ʔasˤdqaːʔ waruwija ʕan mud͡ʒaaːhidin fij qawlh taʕaaːlaaː hl trjdjnj ħqaːan ʔan ʔafʕl hðaː qaːl djmaː bnbra χd͡ʒila: " ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ bʕdˤ aːlmaːl  " ʔaːsf lkn laː jmknnj ħdˤwr aːlʔid͡ʒtmaːʕ ʃχsˤjaː wajataʕaaːtˤaaː ʕilma maaː aːuχtulifa fijhi duwna maaː aːutːufiqa ʕalajhi rʔajt dˤwʔaː fj nhaːja aːlnfq aːlðjn kfrwaː lhm ʕðaːb ʃdjd waːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aːlsˤaːlħaːt lhm mʁfra wʔad͡ʒr kbjr hðaː aːlqaːmws laː jnfʕ lʃjʔ walaqad fatanːaaː aːlːaðijna min qablihim falajaʕlamanːa aːllːahu aːlːaðijna sˤadaquwaː walajaʕlamanːa aːlkaaːðibijna hðaː ʃjʔ aːrjd aːn aːʕmlh lwħdj qaːla: θumːa aːntˤalaqa falabiθtu malijːanaːθumːa qaːla lj: ʔiinːa rabːaka huwa ʔaaʕlamu biman dˤalːa ʕan sabijlihi wahuwa ʔaaʕlamu biaːlmuhtadijna kun lilwudːi ħaaːfiðˤanaː waʔiin lam tad͡ʒid muħaaːfiðˤanaː smːaːh ʔasˤdqaːʔuh tid aːlmrʔaa lhaː χdwd d͡ʒmjla θumːa nusˤħuhu fij aːlsːirːi waaːlʕalaaːnijaai wamaaː ʔaanta ʔiilːaaː baʃarun miθlunaaː waʔiin naðˤunːuka lamina aːlkaaːðibijna fahaðaaː ʔaaʕdalu aːlʔiiχwaaːni qaːl twm ʔanh laː jħlm ʔabdaː walajsa tatːafiqu ʔaaħwaaːlu d͡ʒamijʕihim ʕalaaː ħadːin waaːħidin fajasbiqa ʕalajhi aːlkitaaːbu fajaʕmala biʕamali ʔaahli aːlnːaaːri fjadχulahaaː watamahːadat ladajhi ʔaaħwaaːlu man χabarahu ʔiinːij wad͡ʒːahtu wad͡ʒhija lilːaðij fatˤara aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waaːlʔaardˤa ħanijfanaː wamaaː ʔaanaaː mina aːlmuʃrikijna waqaaːluwaː jaaː ʔaajːuha aːlsːaaːħiru aːdʕu lanaaː rabːaka bimaaː ʕahida ʕindaka ʔiinːanaaː lamuhtaduwna ʔajn sˤndwq aːlbrjd  wʔarslnaːh ʔilaː maːʔia ʔalf ʔaw jzjdwn kaːn aːlmnðˤr mn qma hðaː aːlmbnaː raːʔiʕaː lmaːðaː ʔant ʁjr mħbwb hnaː jaː ʔilhj ʔinhaː fwdˤaː ʕaːrma χtˤth χtˤra ʔaraː ʔan hðaː aːlmʕd͡ʒm mfjd llmbtdʔijn maː qtˤʕtm mn ljna ʔaw trktmwhaː qaːʔima ʕlaː ʔasˤwlhaː fbʔiðn aːllh wljχzj aːlfaːsqjn wʔinh lðkr lk wlqwmk wswf tsʔalwn ʔinh kaːn frjq mn ʕbaːdj jqwlwn rbnaː ʔaːmnaː faːʁfr lnaː waːrħmnaː wʔant χjr aːlraːħmjn maaː lij walilwaladi walaqad ʔaadˤalːa minkum d͡ʒibilːanaː kaθijranaː ʔaafalam takuwnuwaː taʕqiluwna laː ʔaʕlm ʔin kaːn d͡ʒwrd͡ʒ qaːdmaː ʔam laː aːlktb hj ʔaʕz ʔasˤdqaːʔij aːlθld͡ʒ jtsaːqtˤ fj aːld͡ʒbaːl nzl qtˤhaː mn srjrj ʔinh ljs χljlj  maː bjnnaː hw ħb ʔaflaːtˤwnj mʕ bʕdˤ aːlmnaːfʕ ʔanaː swf ʔaðhb ʔilaː bwstn aːlʔisbwʕ aːlqaːdm, wlkn ʔanaː ħqaːan laː ʔatttˤlʕ lhðaː laː jsʔam aːlʔinsaːn mn dʕaːʔ aːlχjr wʔin msh aːlʃr fjʔiws qnwtˤ ʔawfـjــــaːʔ mn kــــraːmi aːlʕــــrb ʔam lh aːlbnaːt wlkm aːlbnwn fij samuwmin waħamijmin fʃaːrbwn ʃrb aːlhjm hl ldjk ħbjba  mtaː trjd zjaːrtnaː ʔaʕtˤnj kl aːltfaːsˤjl lqd ʔistχdm rʔash waqaaːla ħamːaaːdu ʕad͡ʒradu ʔaħdˤir ʔakbr bmrtjn mn ðaːk aːlklb kmaː χtˤːtˤ aːlθʕlb aːlʃrjr aːʃtrwaː bʔaːjaːt aːllh θmnaː qljlaː fsˤdwaː ʕn sbjlh ʔinhm saːʔ maː kaːnwaː jʕmlwn faːqd aːlʃjʔ laː jʕtˤjh walaaː ʕan kaaːfːaai ðawijhaaː muʕridˤaaan ʔabsˤaːrhaː χaːʃʕa mn aːlsaːds mn jwljw slmt jdaːk drstu aːlsˤjnja fj d͡ʒaːmʕa aːlbndqja lqd ʔajqðˤtuk laqad wuʕidnaaː naħnu waʔaːbaaːʔuunaaː haðaaː min qablu ʔiin haðaaː ʔiilːaaː ʔaasaaːtˤijru aːlʔaawːalijna aːlqtˤ naːʔim ʕlaː aːlkrsj hnaːk fnd͡ʒaːn waːħd ʕlaː aːltˤaːwla aːlʕaaːlimu kaaːlkaʕbaai jaʔatijhaaː aːlbuʕadaaːʔu nħn nħtfl aːlljla hj ʁbja, wlkn ʔamjna ʔanaː ʔakbr snːaː bθlaːθ snwaːt mn ʔaχj ʔawlʔik hm aːlmʔumnwn ħqaː lhm drd͡ʒaːt ʕnd rbhm wmʁfra wrzq krjm faːsˤbr ʕlaː maː jqwlwn wsbħ bħmd rbk qbl tˤlwʕ aːlʃms wqbl aːlʁrwb jðhb mnaːd ʔilaː bjt d͡ʒdth kl nhaːja ʔasbwʕ ʕadadihi waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlʔaalibːaaːʔi judilːu biaːltˤːaaːʕaai aːlʕaaːsˤij wajansaaː ʕaðˤijma aːlmaʕaaːsˤij wʔin mn ʔahl aːlktaːb ʔilaː ljʔumnn bh qbl mwth wjwm aːlqjaːma jkwn ʕljhm ʃhjdaː waqaaːla laaː jabqaaː ʕalaaː ħaaːlaain jħb "twm" "maːrj" w hj ʔajdˤaː tħbh ʕalːamahu ʃadijdu aːlquwaaː hm jsˤnʕwn aːltlaːfz fj hðaː aːlmsˤnʕ hl kaːn twm bħaːraːan  ʔin aːlmbðrjn kaːnwaː ʔiχwaːn aːlʃjaːtˤjn wkaːn aːlʃjtˤaːn lrbh kfwraː ʔiinːaaː naħnu nazːalnaaː ʕalajka aːlqurʔaːna tanzijlanaː tqwd btj bsrʕa ʔanti lmaːðaː tsʔaljnj kl hðhi aːlʔasʔila waaːlθːaaːnij ʔaanːahu aːlfitanu waaːliaːχtilaaːtˤu  wahaðaaː qawlu mud͡ʒaaːhidin hw qrʔa trd͡ʒma aːlqrʔaːn baːlʕbrja faː ʔaql mn ʔisbwʕ fqdt aːbnhaː aːlwħjd fj ħaːdθ mrwrj waʔiinːaaː lanaʕlamu ʔaanːa minkum mukaðːibijna hw ʔakl aːltfaːħa kl ʔinsaːn ldjhi aːlħq fj aːlħjaːa ; whðaː jʕnj ʔanhu ldjhi aːlħq ljsˤnʕ ħjaːa mrjħa tħtaːd͡ʒ draːd͡ʒtj ʔilaː tsˤljħ baːlfʕl wamaaː ʕamːa bihi aːlsˤːalaaːħu ʔin wud͡ʒida wʔinh lfj zbr aːlʔawljn whl ʔataːk ħdjθ ʁanimtum ħalaaːlanaː tˤajːibanaː waaːtːaquwaː aːllːaha ʔiinːa aːllːaha ʁafuwrun raħijmun ʔin aːlðjn aːtqwaː ʔiðaː mshm tˤaːʔif mn aːlʃjtˤaːn tðkrwaː fʔiðaː hm mbsˤrwn qaːlt lh ʔanh kaːn mħqaː qul juħjijhaaː aːlːaðij ʔaanʃaʔaahaaː ʔaawːala marːaain wahuwa bikulːi χalqin ʕalijmun falamːaaː raʔaaaː qamijsˤahu qudːa min duburin qaaːla ʔiinːahu min kajdikunːa ʔiinːa kajdakunːa ʕaðˤijmun wakaθijrahu ʔaaʃbahu ʃajʔin bikaθijrihi hj tmdˤj wqtaː tˤwjlaː ttmrːn ʕlaː ʕzf aːlbjaːnw qijla ʔinːa aːlχatˤːa aːlħasana lajazijdu aːlħaqːa wudˤuwħanaː walima  qaaːla ʔasttˤjʕ ʔan ʔaraː aːlnwr kaːn mtfwqaː fj aːlmwsjqaː ħtaː fj tˤfwlth hmaː fj aːlʁrfa tʕbt mn aːlktaːba wlw ftħnaː ʕljhm baːbaː mn aːlsmaːʔ fðˤlwaː fjh jʕrd͡ʒwn mzqt aːlsˤħjfa ʔilaː qtˤʕ laː ʃjʔ baːmkaːnh zʕzʕa aːlsˤdaːqaːt aːlħqjqja jubaʃːiruhum rabːuhum biraħmaain minhu waridˤwaaːnin wad͡ʒanːaaːtin lahum fijhaaː naʕijmun muqijmun ʔaflm jdbrwaː aːlqwl ʔam d͡ʒaːʔhm maː lm jʔat ʔaːbaːʔhm aːlʔawljn ʔamr sχjf ʔan jbðr maːlh ʕlaː hðh aːltfaːhaːt aːtːaqi aːllha ħajθumaaː kunta waʔaatbiʕi aːlsːajːiʔiaaa aːlħasanaaa tamħuhaaː waχaaːliqi aːlnːaaːsa biχuluqin ħasanin ʔiinːa lakum fijhi lamaaː taχajːaruwna kjn jrjd draːd͡ʒa maː aːlðj jʕd͡ʒbk bʃʔanj ʔanta lst fj wdˤʕ jsmħ lkj tsʔal ʕn ʔaj ʃʔi faʔaarsala firʕawnu fij aːlmadaaːʔiini ħaaːʃirijna hl ttħdθ aːlʕbrja  nfðt tˤaːqa ljlaː nhaːʔijːaː wʔið qlnaː llmlaːʔika aːsd͡ʒdwaː lʔaːdm fsd͡ʒdwaː ʔilaː ʔibljs qaːl ʔaʔasd͡ʒd lmn χlqt tˤjnaː ʔabwh jnaːdjh twm wajansˤuraka aːllːahu nasˤranaː ʕazijzanaː laː ʔaʃk fj qdrth ʕlaː fʕlhaː ʔanaː ʔatʕlːm aːlsˤːjnjːa fajanbaʁij ʔaan juzijla tilka aːlʃːubhaaa ʕan nafsihi biaːlsːuʔuaaːli waaːlnːaðˤari whw aːlðj ʔanʃʔa lkm aːlsmʕ waːlʔabsˤaːr waːlʔafʔida qljlaː maː tʃkrwn mtaː ʕljnaː ʔan nðhb  ʁjr msmwħ lk ʔan tħdˤr qtˤk ʔilaː aːlmdrsa walaaː lahu budːun min sadːi aːlχalːaai fijhaaː ʕinda ħaaːd͡ʒatihi waʕaradˤnaaː d͡ʒahanːama jawmaʔiiðin lilkaaːfirijna ʕardˤanaː wnmaːrq msˤfwfa waʃarawhu biθamanin baχsin daraaːhima maʕduwdaain wakaaːnuwaː fijhi mina aːlzːaaːhidijna ʔinːa aːlqalba ʔiðaaː ʕaliqa kaaːlrːahni ʔiðaaː ʁuliqa tˤwm laː jʕrf kjf jrbtˤ χjwtˤ ħðaːʔih wkʔajn mn daːba laː tħml rzqhaː aːllh jrzqhaː wʔijaːkm whw aːlsmjʕ aːlʕljm ʔinːa walada aːlʁajraaː laaː jund͡ʒibu χalaqa aːllːahu aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waaːlʔaardˤa biaːlħaqːi ʔiinːa fij ðalika laʔaːjaaan lilmuʔuminijna laː χjr fj ħsn aːld͡ʒswm wtˤwlhaː ʔiðaː lm jzn tˤwl aːld͡ʒswm ʕqwl swf jʔaχðk ʔilaː mħtˤa aːlħaːflaːt waʔiin naʃaʔa nuʁriqhum falaaː sˤarijχa lahum walaaː hum junqaðuwna lnʔakl aːlswʃj maː hw fnk aːlmfdˤl  waʔiin jakaaːdu aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː lajuzliquwnaka biʔaabsˤaaːrihim lamːaaː samiʕuwaː aːlðːikra wajaquwluwna ʔiinːahu lamad͡ʒnuwnun aːlðjn ʔaːtjnaːhm aːlktaːb jʕrfwnh kmaː jʕrfwn ʔabnaːʔhm aːlðjn χsrwaː ʔanfshm fhm laː jʔumnwn wtraː kθjraː mnhm jsaːrʕwn fj aːlʔiθm waːlʕdwaːn wʔaklhm aːlsħt lbʔis maː kaːnwaː jʕmlwn hj ktbt rsaːlaan hkðaː bdʔat aːlʕsˤwr aːlkwnja aːlmðˤlma llkwn faman faʕala ðalika minkum faaːlnːaaːru maθwaaːhu aːlʕks liʔaanːa aːlnːaaːsa bihim jaqtaduwna wakaθijranaː maaː judaaːχiluhum aːlʔiiʕd͡ʒaaːbu litawaħːudihim bifadˤijlaai aːlʕilmi ʔaafalaaː jarawna ʔaalːaaː jard͡ʒiʕu ʔiilajhim qawlanaː walaaː jamliku lahum dˤarːanaː walaaː nafʕanaː qaaːla ʔaalqihaaː jaaː muwsaaː ʕljː ʔan ʔatsˤl btwm waaːltːawasːutˤi fij aːltːaqdijmi whw aːlʁfwr aːlwdwd wlʔin sʔalthm mn χlq aːlsmaːwaːt waːlʔardˤ ljqwln χlqhn aːlʕzjz aːlʕljm lijaslubuwhu fadˤijlaaa aːltːaqadːumi wajamnaʕuwhu mubaaːjinaaa aːltːaχsˤijsˤi ʕinaaːdanaː limaaː d͡ʒahiluwhu wamaqtanaː limaaː baaːjanuwhu watakuwnu aːld͡ʒibaaːlu kaaːlʕihni qul kuwnuwaː ħid͡ʒaaːraaan ʔaaw ħadijdanaː wʔiinːa aːllha ʔaamara aːlmuʔuminijna bimaaː ʔaamara bihi aːlmursalijna faqaaːla taʕaaːlaaː: walamːaaː balaʁa ʔaaʃudːahu waaːstawaaː ʔaːtajnaaːhu ħukmanaː waʕilmanaː wakaðalika nad͡ʒzij aːlmuħsinijna linuħjija bihi baldaaan majtanaː wanusqijahu mimːaaː χalaqnaaː ʔaanʕaaːmanaː waʔaanaaːsijːa kaθijranaː waaːlʃːarafu fij aːltːaʁaaːfuli χaf aːllːaha biaːlnːahaaːri wanam biaːllːajli ʔawh laː qd aːχtfaː d͡ʒwaːz sfrj aːstlf bn ħmjd mn bqaːl kaːn ʕlaː baːb daːrh drhmjn wʔarbʕ ħbaːt ʃʕjr laː ʔasttˤjʕ tħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja bʃkl d͡ʒjd miθlihi bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi wajlun likulːi humazaain lumazaain hlː ʔatsˤlt lj bsjaːra ʔad͡ʒra hl stʕwd ʁdaː  ljbjn lhm aːlðj jχtlfwn fjh wljʕlm aːlðjn kfrwaː ʔanhm kaːnwaː kaːðbjn kaːnt χtˤba twm mmtaːza ðhb surirtu bnd͡ʒaːħika rbmaː stʔatj kl tfaːħa ħmraːʔ aːlmaːʔ raːʔiʕ km ktaːbaːan qrʔat nħn ʔaʃrqnaː fjaː ʃms ʔaʁrbj rabːi aːrd͡ʒiʕuwni laʕalːij ʔaaʕmalu sˤaaːliħanaː fijmaaː taraktu laaː jaʕðilu muʔuminun muʔuminaaan ʕmrhaː θmaːnja snwaːt qul ʔiinːij lan jud͡ʒijranij mina aːllːahi ʔaaħadun walan ʔaad͡ʒida min duwnihi multaħadanaː bwrkt ʔardˤ aːlfraːtjn wtˤn waʔaadχalnaaːhum fij raħmatinaaː ʔiinːahum mina aːlsˤːaaːliħijna wnʕma kaːnwaː fjhaː faːkhjn waaːlwaladu aːlsːuwʔu jaʃijnu aːlsːalafa wajahdimu aːlʃːarafa tbdw htumj sʕjda d͡ʒdaːan mn tkwnjii  wmaː jʔatjhm mn ðkr mn aːlrħmn mħdθ ljs "hw ʔibnj" wlkn " ʔanaː waːldh" ðalika biʔaanːa aːllːaha nazːala aːlkitaaːba biaːlħaqːi waʔiinːa aːlːaðijna aːχtalafuwaː fij aːlkitaaːbi lafij ʃiqaaːqin baʕijdin θm jd͡ʒzaːh aːld͡ʒzaːʔ aːlʔawfaː ʔaan masːanija aːlkibaru fabima tubaʃːiruwna ʕzf ʕaːzf aːlbjaːnw mqaːtˤʕ ʔidˤaːfja aːlðj ʔatˤʕmhm mn d͡ʒwʕ wʔaːmnhm mn χwf jd͡ʒb ʔan laː tħkm ʕlaː aːlʔaːχrjn mn mðˤhrhm kaaːlrːaʕijːaai maʕa sultˤaaːnihaaː bdlanaː mn ðlk  sʔantql ʔilaː nqaːʃ aːlmtʁjrjːan aːlaːqtsˤaːdjjːan aːllðjn ʕrfthmaː qbl qljl ʕalajkum biaːlʔaabkaaːri faʔiinːahunːa ʔaakθaru ħubːanaː waʔaaqalːu χananaː tʕd͡ʒbnj ʔamθla wabiaːld͡ʒazaʕi sˤabranaː hðaː hw sbb tʔaχrj " fhmt " kðbt qblhm qwm nwħ fkðbwaː ʕbdnaː wqaːlwaː md͡ʒnwn waːzdd͡ʒr waqaaːluwaː lawlaaː jaʔatijnaaː biʔaːjaain min rabːihi ʔaawalam taʔatihim bajːinaau " fj ʔaːχr aːlrsaːla θm wqʕ aːsmh ʔawlʔik aːlðjn ħbtˤt ʔaʕmaːlhm fj aːldnjaː waːlʔaːχra wmaː lhm mn naːsˤrjn ʔanaː ʔasˤʁr mnk bθlaːθa snwaːt laaː juʔuminuwna bihi waqad χalat sunːaau aːlʔaawːalijna lm bunija aːlʔiislaːamu ʕalaaː χamsin: ʃahaaːdaai ʔaan laːa ʔiilaha ʔiilaːːa aːllhu waʔaanːa muħamːadanaː rasuwlu aːllhi fj ħaːl tʕtˤl brnaːmd͡ʒ mʕaːld͡ʒa aːlnsˤwsˤ  ndˤmn lk tʕwjdˤh md͡ʒaːnaː ʔarjd bihaaː aːlkaaːtibu ʔiχfaaːʔa ʁaradˤihi fajakθuru kaaːltːaraaːd͡ʒimi mhlaː lħðˤa hl bʔimkaːnk ʔan tʕtˤjhaː hðaː aːlkrsj aːlkθjr mn aːldˤʁtˤ rbmaː jʔudj ʔilaː mrdˤ ʕdˤwj aːltlaːmjð jdrswn fj aːlmdrsa ʔaarsalnaaːka ʔiilːaaː raħmaaan lilʕaaːlamijna ʕasaaː ʔaan jakuwna ħabijbak jawmanaː maaː ʔin aːlʔatˤbaːq aːlχʃbja ʔaχf mn aːlʔatˤbaːq aːlmʕdnja lkn aːlʔatˤbaːq aːlwrqja hj aːlʔaχf waaːlːaðijna flaː tħsbn aːllh mχlf wʕdh rslh ʔin aːllh ʕzjz ðw aːntqaːm wrbk fkbr hl hðaː mmkn daʕahu jðhb drːb mnːaːd baːja hl taʕalama aːljaːbaːnja ʔajdˤaːan  ʔanaː qlq ʕlaː sˤħth aːnnaː ðaːhbwn ʔilaː sjnmaː
