aːlmd͡ʒrmjn lijasˤila ʔilaaː tasˤawːuri aːlmaʕnaaː waʔiidraaːki ħaqijqatihi bmaːðaː twsˤj hl ldjkm mʕrdˤ lmntd͡ʒaːtkm fj aːlmdjna  mjhw ʔaħsn mn nwrjkw fj aːlʕzf ʕlaː aːlbjaːnw ðlk fdˤl aːllh jʔutjh aːlkwb mljʔ baːlħljb lqd tʔaχrnaː faʔaamːaaː ʔiin kaaːna mina aːlmuqarːabijna waʔaːjaaun lahumu aːllːajlu naslaχu minhu aːlnːahaaːra faʔiiðaaː hum muðˤlimuwna waaːsʔaal man ʔaarsalnaaː min qablika min naaːʃiʔianaː ʃʕrt bʔan qlbj jχfq bsrʕa faʔaahlaknaaː ʔaaʃadːa minhum batˤʃanaː wamadˤaaː maθalu aːlʔaawːalijna wamina aːllːajli fasabːiħhu waʔaadbaaːra aːlsːud͡ʒuwdi faʔaaχaða d͡ʒaħðˤaau haðaaː ʔaqwaː aːldwaːfʕ aːlʔinsaːnja ʕlaː aːlʔard͡ʒħ jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː lima taquwluwna maaː laaː tafʕaluwna aːllh ʔaʕlm snfʕl ðlk ʁdaːan waaːlːaðijna kaðːabuwaː biʔaːjaaːtinaaː waliqaaːʔi aːlʔaːχiraai ħabitˤat ʔaaʕmaaːluhum hal jud͡ʒzawna ʔiilːaaː maaː kaaːnuwaː jaʕmaluwna hl hj sˤʕba llʁaːja lkj tuktb  ʔanti lsti d͡ʒaːhzaan bʕd waminhum man janðˤuru ʔiilajka ʔaafaʔaanta tahdij ʔafdˤl wajastaʕd͡ʒiluwnaka biaːlʕaðaaːbi walan juχlifa aːllːahu waʕdahu waʔiinːa jawmanaː ʕinda rabːika kaʔaalfi sanaain mimːaaː taʕudːuwna waqulnaaː min baʕdihi libanij ʔiisraaːʔiijla aːskunuwaː rːaaːfiʕaaun frʕwn wθmwd ʔaalam tara kajfa faʕala rabːuka biʕaaːdin aːltˤrfa aːlχaːmsa ʔin kl mn fj aːlsmaːwaːt waːlʔardˤ ʔilaː ʔaːtj aːlrħmn ʕbdaː trjd ʕbwr aːlnfq  wtraː aːlmd͡ʒrmjn jwmʔið mqrnjn fj aːlqrwjjn baːltˤʕaːm ʕndj ʔalm fj aːlmʕda tˤuwbaaː liman ʕamila biʕilmin hl tðwqta aːlʔarz  waaːlːaðijna hum ʕalaaː sˤalawaaːtihim juħaaːfiðˤuwna sˤfq aːld͡ʒmjʕ qaaːla falaaː dˤajra  ʔinːamaaː ʔafʕl  wlnblwnkm ħtaː nʕlm aːlmd͡ʒaːhdjn mnkm waːlsˤaːbrjn wnblw ʔaχbaːrkm jaː ʔilhj ʔanaː laː ʔasˤdq hðaː faʔaalqaaːhaaː faʔiiðaaː hija ħajːaaun tasʕaaː ʔaχð twm ʃjʔiaː maː mn fwq aːlʔardˤ lm ʔaðhb lʔanj knt mrjdˤaː ʔanaː wtwm snsˤjr d͡ʒaːrjn qaːl djmaː lnfsh: " sʔabdw mθl d͡ʒjms bwnd ħqjqj fj hðh "  θm dχl aːlmħl hl waːldtk fj aːlmnzl qarijbun min aːlmuħsinijna maaː lij ʔaaraaːkum tabnuwna maaː laaː taskunuwna lw knt ʔaχbrtak aːlħqjqa, knta stufaːd͡ʒʔa nħn fj aːlnaːs d͡ʒmʕnaː wħdnaː w qlaːʕ aːlʕz jbnjhaː aːlrfaːq ramza aːlʕuruwbaa duʕjtu ʔilaː ħfla saːtʃikw faðuwquwaː ʕaðaaːbij wanuðuri kaːn saːmj raːʁbaː fj ʔind͡ʒaːb wld kj jrθ ʔismh w θrwth ðhb bdlaːan ʕn waːldh kjf kaːn aːmtħaːn aːljwm  aːlːaðij d͡ʒaʕala lakumu aːlʔaardˤa firaaːʃanaː waaːlsːamaaːʔa binaaːʔan waʔaanzala mina aːlsːamaaːʔi maaːʔan kjf hm aːltˤwaːrq qaaːla jaaː haaːruwnu maaː manaʕaka ʔiið raʔaajtahum dˤalːuwaː ʔaχtˤʔat nfs χtˤʔika aːlmra aːlsaːbqa rbnaː ʔaːmnaː bmaː ʔanzlt waːtbʕnaː aːlrswl faːktbnaː mʕ aːlʃaːhdjn ʔismh ʕـzːh mnð kaːn aːld͡ʒdwd twm ljs tˤwjlaːan d͡ʒdaːan kaðːabat θamuwdu biaːlnːuðuri hðaː maː twʕdwn ljwm aːlħsaːb ʃkrʔa ʕlaː dʕwtka lj ʔilaː aːlħfla waʔaanːaaː lamːaaː samiʕnaaː aːlhudaaː ʔaːmanːaaː bihi faman juʔumin birabːihi falaaː jaχaaːfu baχsanaː walaaː rahaqanaː klmaː bdt bʕjda ʕnaː klmaː zaːdt srʕa aːnħsaːrhaː ʔiinːahu ðˤanːa ʔaan lan jaħuwra swf tħðˤaː baːlmraːm baːtħaːdhm waːtħaːdj ʔaqltu ʃjʔianaː ʁbjːanaː  wd͡ʒʕlnaː fjhaː d͡ʒnaːt mn nχjl wʔaʕnaːb wfd͡ʒrnaː fjhaː mn aːlʕjwn wabaaːkin naaːdimun ʕalaaː ðanbihi χajrun min dˤaaːħikin muʕtarifin bilahwihi bsm ʔarjd ʔan ʔaraːk mra ʔaχraː lawːaaːħaaun lilbaʃari man takabːara biʕilmihi watarafːaʕa wadˤaʕahu aːllːahu bihi ʕilaːqaːtu aːld͡ʒaːri muhimːaun lilnd͡ʒaːħi fqd twm ħaːsa aːlʃm aːrtdj mʕtˤfk ljs ldj ʔaj sʔaħb daːʔimanaː nhaːrk sʕjd ʕlaː nħw mlħwðˤ fhmnaː aːlmtzaːjd llmmlka mtnaːhja aːlsˤʁr daːχl nwaːa aːlðra ʔiinːa haðaaː kaaːna lakum d͡ʒazaaːʔan wakaaːna saʕjukum maʃkuwranaː jχrd͡ʒ mnhmaː aːllʔulʔu maðmuwmun d͡ʒmjʕ zmlaːʔ sˤfːj χaːrd͡ʒ aːlmdjna ld͡ʒʔat ljlaː ʔilaː bjt waːldjhaː lahu mulku aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waaːlʔaardˤi juħjij wajumijtu wahuwa ʕalaaː kulːi ʃajʔin qadijrun qaːla: faʔaaχbirnj ʕani d͡ʒawaaːbun hl jmknk ʔiχbaːrj aːltˤrjq ʔilj aːlmktba  laː tdˤʕ aːlktb ʕlaː aːltˤaːwla laː jmsh ʔilaː aːlmtˤhrwn bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi suwraaun ʔaanzalnaaːhaaː wafaradˤnaaːhaaː aːlkaːħl ʔin aːllh hw aːlrzaːq ðw aːlqwa aːlmtjn waʔiinːaaː lanaħnu aːlsˤːaaːfːuwna wawahabnaaː lahum min raħmatinaaː wad͡ʒaʕalnaaː lahum lisaaːna sˤidqin ʕalijːanaː d͡ʒzʔ mn hðh aːlʔardˤ mlk lj ʔant wataqwaaːhaaː km hðaː mzʕd͡ʒ hl ʔasttˤjʕ ʔan ʔauħdˤr ʔaħdaːan mʕj  qad naʕlamu ʔiinːahu lajaħzunuka aːlːaðij jaquwluwna faʔiinːahum laaː jukaðːibuwnaka walakinːa aːlðˤːaaːlimijna biʔaːjaaːti aːllːahi aːlʔaanbijaaːʔi hl jmknk aːn tsaːʕdjnj  hðaː ʔamr d͡ʒdjd baːlnsba lj walaqad ʔaːtajnaaː muwsaaː aːlkitaaːba wad͡ʒaʕalnaaː maʕahu ʔaaχaaːhu haaːruwna wazijranaː jaaː banij ʔisraaːʔiijla aːlʔaumuwru θalaaːθaaun wkðb baːlħsnaː ʕzmhu laː jχmdu wakaaːnuwaː jaquwluwna ʔaaʔiiðaaː mitnaaː wakunːaaː turaaːbanaː waʕiðˤaaːmanaː ʔaaʔiinːaaː lamabʕuwθuwna ʔajħsb ʔan lm jrh ʔaħd wmʁaːnm kθjra jʔaχðwnhaː wkaːn aːllh ʕzjzaː ħkjmaː waqaaːla ʕabdu aːllːahi bnu tˤaaːhirin law takaaːʃaftum maaː tadaaːfantum hmaːz mʃaːʔ bnmjm hw jħbkm kθjranaː fj aːljaːbaːn aːlsna aːldraːsja aːld͡ʒdjda tbdʔa fj ʔabrjl ʔaʕndh ʕlm aːlʁjb fhw jraː hl sbq lk w ʔan zrt aːlmksjk  aːlʁrjq jtʕlq bqʃa rʔajtk ttˤbχjn wahaðaaː jakuwnu min qabuwli aːlnːafsi ʔiðaaː kufijat munaaːzaʕaaa aːlʃːahawaaːti laː tħrk bh lsaːnk ltʕd͡ʒl bh klaː nmd hʔulaːʔ whʔulaːʔ mn ʕtˤaːʔ rbk wmaː kaːn ʕtˤaːʔ rbk mħðˤwraː tʃthr aːljaːbaːn kθjraːan baːlzlaːzl rd͡ʒaːʔan  aːmlʔa hðaː aːlnmwðd͡ʒ ʔawlanaː rbnaː aːkʃf ʕnaː aːlʕðaːb ʔinaː mʔumnwn ʔarjd tlk aːlħqjba bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ʔiðaː aːlʃms kwrt wlqd ʔarslnaː mwsaː bʔaːjaːtnaː ʔilaː frʕwn wmlʔih fqaːl ʔinj rswl rb aːlʕaːlmjn fʕlt hðaː bnfsj waminhu qawluhum fij aːlqunuwti waʔauχraaː lam taqdiruwaː ʕalajhaaː qad ʔaaħaaːtˤa aːllːahu bihaaː wakaaːna aːllːahu ʕalaaː kulːi ʃajʔin qadijranaː ʔarslt lnaː brqjaan bʔanhaː std͡ʒjʔ nrd͡ʒwaː mn aːllh msaːʕdtnaː daːʔimaːan ; aːlnd͡ʒaːħ laː jud͡ʒnaː mn aːlksl kaːn ʔiðn tˤfl jblʁ ʕʃra snwaːt ʃkraː d͡ʒzjlaː jaː rfaːq wasanijːi ðaχaaːʔiirihi wajumdidkum biʔaamwaaːlin wabanijna wajad͡ʒʕal lakum d͡ʒanːaaːtin wajad͡ʒʕal lakum ʔaanhaaːranaː laaː juzhidanːaka fij rad͡ʒulin ħumidat sijratahu wmaː ʔadraːk maː aːlqaːrʕa ʔinhu jbdw bħaːla d͡ʒjdaːan d͡ʒdaːan qaːl bl rbkm rb aːlsmaːwaːt waːlʔardˤ aːlðj ftˤrhn wʔanaː ʕlaː ðlkm mn aːlʃaːhdjn bihaaː aːlħuruwfu aːlmuʃtabihaau niʕma aːlmatˤijːaau aːldːunjaaː faaːrtaħiluwhaaː tubalːiʁukum aːlʔaːχiraaa walawlaaː ʔaan θabːatnaaːka laqad kidta tarkanu ʔiilajhim ʃajʔianaː qalijlanaː wbdaː lhm ʔaadabu aːlnːafsi aːʕlam ʔaanːa aːlnːafsa mad͡ʒbuwlaaun ʕalaaː ʃijamin muhmalaain hl saːmj jtnfːs walaqad mananːaː ʕalaː mwsaː wahaːrwna smʕt ljlaː dˤd͡ʒːa qwjːa wazurwʕin wamaqaːmin karjmin man faːdˤl jtklːm kθjraː aːlχajـlu waaːllːjـlu waaːlbajـdaːʔu taʕrifunـj waaːlsːjfu waaːlrːmħu waːlqrtˤaːsu waaːlqalaـm laː tlʕb hnaː ʔabdaːan ʔiinːa aːllːaha ʕaːlimu ʁajbi aːlsːamaːwaːti waaːlʔaardˤi biaːlʔaamni waaːldːaʕaai  waaːstamtaʕa biaːlθːarwaai waaːlsːaʕaai ʔaʕtqd ʔanːh ln jʔatj smħ saːmj bʔan tʔatj ljlaː wtʔaχð aːlmχdːraːt md͡ʒaːnanaː aːlbustaːnijːu jad͡ʒmaʕu aːlʔaazhaːra waaːlːaðjna laː jaʃhadwna aːlzːwra waʔiiðaː marːwaː biaːllːaʁwi marːwaː kiraːmanaː ʕalːamahu aːlbajaːna jnbʁj ʕlaː saːmj ʔan jtnaːwl ʔaqraːsˤh tʕrːf saːmj ʕlaː ftaːa mslma wqʕ fj ħbːhaː w tzwːd͡ʒhaː mawfuwra mraːt wajastabqijhi lilaðːatihi laʕanahu aːllːahu walaw ʃiʔinaː labaʕaθnaː fj kulːi qarjaain naðjranaː fqdt mħfðˤtj faqaaːla rasuwlu aːllːahi sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama kajfa taʕdiluwna maʕa aːlʔaaqaaːribi jmdˤj saːmj klː jwm fj aːlħaːna ʔausˤjbt kaːjt baːlbrd ʔaχð braːjn bʕdˤ aːlwrwd ʕaːd ʔilaː aːlmrsˤd wamaː jaʔatjhim min ðikrin mina aːlrːaħmni muħdaθin ʔiilːaː kaːnwaː ʕanhu muʕridˤjna tabijtu aːlbuħajraau haaːʔiid͡ʒaaan fasˤaaːra fardanaː laaː juʕaaːnu biraʔajin walaaː jumadːu bimaʃuwraain waaːdˤtˤarːa ʔilaaː aːstijdaaːʕi sirːihi walajtahu kufija aːliaːdˤtˤiraaːru ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ lhðaː biʔaːjaːtinaː ʔiilːaaː aːlðˤːaːlimwna ʔaaw ħaaːdiθaain qad kadːahu aːlhamːu bihaaː faʔiinːa aːlsˤːabra ʕalajhaaː jaʕqubuhu aːlrːaaːħaau minhaaː laː ttklm fj ʁrfa aːlmtˤaːlʕa waqaaːla baʕdˤu turtad͡ʒaʕu maaː dˤarːanij walam janfaʕ ʁajrij lajta aːlfaaːkihaaa naaːdˤid͡ʒaaun fabiaːlsˤːabri fij haðaaː tanfatiħu wud͡ʒuwhu aːlʔaːraaːʔi walilʕaqli mudˤaaːdːun waaːðkur rabːak ʔiðaaː nasijta ʔamraː mhmːaː aːlaːsʕaːr tnχfdˤ km ʁrfa fj bjtk baːlkaːd jmknnj aːlmʃj wd͡ʒdt hðaː aːlχaːtm fj aːlʃaːrʕ hðaː aːlsˤbaːħ jaʃhaduhu aːlmuqarːabwna aːlbustaaːnu d͡ʒamijlun waman jutˤijqu haðaaː jaaː ʔaabaaː ħaaːzimin  qaaːla wahuwa sˤaaːliħu bnu ʕabdi aːlqudːuwsi aːχtalafa aːlmufasːiruwna fij taʔawijli ðalika faqaaːla qataaːdaau lm ʔant wħdk maːðaː tʃrb  aːtːsˤl aːlmdrːs bmdjr aːlmdrsa qaaːla laħanta d͡ʒanaaː aːlfalːaaːħu aːlqutˤna bal juʕtˤaaː maaː jastaħiqːuhu bisultˤaaːnihi waʕuluwːi jadihi ʔaraːd saːmj ʔan jʕtnq aːlʔislaːm faʔiinːa aːlqaraaːʔiiħa ʔiðaaː aːnfaradat aːstakadːahaaː aːlfikru waaːstafraʁahaaː aːliaːd͡ʒtihaaːdu ldjː bʕdˤ aːlmlaːbs lk wamaː ʔaasˤaːbakum min musˤjbaain fabimaː kasabat ʔaajdjkum wajaʕfw ʕan kaθjrin waʁuruwranaː laaː jankaʃifu ʔilːaaː biaːltːuhmaai waaːrtafaʕat aːltːuhmaau bitˤuwli aːlχibraai naaːma aːltˤːiflu ʕalaaː aːlsːarijri kjf ʔaːkl hðaː ʔaqwl ðlk mn qlbj ʔiinːa aːlharama qadijmun wakaaːna muħadːiθanaː ʕaːd saːmj llʕjʃ hnaː waqad ʔaataaː aːbnu aːlrːuwmijːi biʔaablaʁa min haðaaː aːlmaʕnaaː fij ʃaʕrihi faqaaːla ʕlaː aːlbaːʁj tdwr aːldwaːʔir laaː naqsˤun ʔin lm ttrknaː w ʃʔannaː saːtːsˤl baːlʃːrtˤa walaaː ʔaan taχtalifa aːlʕuqalaaːʔu fij sˤalaaːħihaaː wafasaaːdihaaː walaː ʔaanaː ʕaːbidun maː ʕabadtum qaːl saːmj hðaː lmmrːdˤa ndmt ʕlaː ʕdm ħdˤwrj aːlχtˤba waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlʔaudabaaːʔi man ʁarasa ʃad͡ʒaraaa aːlħilmi aːd͡ʒtanaaː θamaraaa aːlsːilmi faʔaajna taðhabwna ħb aːlwtˤn mn aːlʔijmaːn jabijʕu aːltːaaːd͡ʒiru aːlbunːa wafj θamwda ʔiið qjla lahum tamatːaʕwaː ħatːaː ħjnin kl aːld͡ʒbl jtʁjr bʔalwaːnh fj aːlχrjf faʔiinːa aːlsːunːaaa laaː jad͡ʒuwzu ʔaan tarida biʔiibaaːħaai aːlkaðibi jnbʁj ʕlaː saːmj ʔan jntðˤr waʔiinːa nafaaːða ʔaamrik maʕa kalaaːmik tʕbt qljlanaː rʔaaː saːmj ðlk aːlmnzl taʕd͡ʒijluhu watasˤʁijruhu wasatruhu wamuraaːʔiij aːlmaħaaːsini waaːlʕujuwbi waaːlmud͡ʒaaːharaai bimaaː kaaːna judˤmiruhu ʔaχð saːmj klː aːlsˤːaːbwn mʕh lqd tħqqt mn aːlaːmr waʔaakjdu kajdanaː waqad qijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami aːlħilmu ħid͡ʒaaːbu aːlʔaːfaaːti wrħaː aːlmnjːa ttˤħn fabadːala aːlːaðijna ðˤalamuwaː qawlanaː ʁajra aːlːaðij qijla lahum ʔiinːahaː laʔiiħdaaː aːlkubari ʔajn ʔaqrb mʕrdˤ fnj tˤaʕaːmu aːlʔaaθjmi aːird͡ʒʕ ʔilaː aːlbjt qbl aːlsaːdsa janbaħu aːlkalbu rkːzt ʕlaː ʃjʔ waːħd waaːlquluwba bihaaː waaːθiqaaun waqaːlwaː jaː wajlanaː hðaː jawmu aːldːjni twm jħaːdθ maːrj ʕlaː aːlhaːtf saːmj mn ʔasra jhwdjːa θrjːa wakalːafahaaː luzuwma aːlfasˤaaːħaai waaːlnːad͡ʒmu waaːlʃːad͡ʒaru jasd͡ʒudaːni man ʃakaraka ʕalaaː maʕruwfin lam tusdihi ʔilajhi faʕaaːd͡ʒilhu biaːlbirːi waʔiilːaaː aːnʕakasa fasˤaaːra bajna aːlmaʃriqi waaːlmaʁribi  qaaːla masijraau jawmin lilʃːamsi faʃaːribwna ʕalajhi mina aːlħamjmi waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi man saaːsa nafsahu saaːda naaːsahu wajuʔuθiru aːlwuquwfa ʕalajhi maːlwaː ʔilaː mn ʕndh maːl wafuruʃin marfwʕaain wajazilːa bihaaː saaːhijanaː liʔaanːa aːlʔiinsaaːna qad juðijʕa sirːa nafsihi bibaaːdiraai lisaaːnihi waʔaamːaː man ʔawtija kitaːbahu biʃimaːlihi ʕaaːlimanaː dmːr zlzaːl ʕjaːda saːmj kaːn saːmj jχtls aːlnːðˤr ʕbr aːlnːwaːfð wamud͡ʒaaːnabaaa maaː sˤaaːra mutːafaqanaː ʕalajhi biaːlmuwaaːdˤaʕaai faʔaamːaː man ʔaaʕtˤaː waaːtːaqaː waaːlqatːaaːtu jasbiqwnaː saːʔa maː jaħkumwna fajuθijru ħasadanaː qad χaaːmara buʁdˤanaː qaːm aːlmdrːs bmnaːdaːa aːlħaːdˤrjn waʔiin taraktahum lam jatrukuwka qijla watarku aːlχatˤijʔiaai χajrun min muʕaaːlad͡ʒaai waʔaaχrasa jurijdu aːlχutˤbaaa qad tabasːama ħatːaaː badat nawaaːd͡ʒiðuhu warawaaː aːbnu masʕuwdin ʕan aːlnːabijːi sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʔaanːahu qaaːla lm ʔant mstʕd͡ʒl aːlːaðj ʔauʕaaːlid͡ʒuhu wasˤadaqa ʔaabuw ʕuθmaaːna wakataba kisraaː ʔilaaː aːbnihi hurmuza faaːllːiʔiaaːmu ʔaasˤbaru ʔaad͡ʒsaaːmanaː waqulnaaː jaaː ʔaːdamu aːskun ʔaanta wazawd͡ʒuka aːld͡ʒanːaaa wakulaaː mlaːbsh klː jwm nbdʔa aːldrws jwm aːlʔiθnjn aːlqaːdm ʁajra ʔaanːahu ʔaakθaru χatˤaranaː kaːn saːmj jdrːs ħsˤsˤaː ldraːsa aːlktaːb aːlmqdːs ʔaawsaʕa aːlmaʁfiraaa ʔiðaaː dˤaaːqat biaːlmuðnibi aːlmaʕðiraau tbdw ħzjnaːan waaːlsːahwu ʕan jaqiðˤaai aːlʔaaðkijaaːʔi waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi man aːstaʕaaːna biðawij aːlʕuquwli faaːza bidaraki aːlmaʔamuwli waʔiimːaː janzaʁanːaka mina ʔamrhaː trkt ljlaː dwaːʔhaː fj aːlmχjːm laː tql fj wsˤf ʔaj ʔinsaːn ʔanh sʕjd qbl ʔan jmwt ʔaχbr saːmj aːlʃːrtˤa ʔajn kaːnt tskn ljlaː baːldˤːbtˤ wafij taʔawijlihi wad͡ʒhaaːni ʔaam ʕindahumu aːlʁajbu fahum jaktubwna jusˤbiħu aːlmidaaːdu d͡ʒaaːfːanaː ʃhaːda wfaːa min ʔaasbaaːbihi mlʔat aːlnːd͡ʒwm aːlsːmaːʔ ʃjʔiaː fʃjʔiaː wajaʕlama ʔaanːa qadˤaaːʔa aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː ʕalajhi ʁaaːlibun aːlmktb lj w waʔaamːaː man d͡ʒaːʔaka jasʕaː maː hj aːlmwaːdˤjʕ aːld͡ʒdjda aːltj tʕlmthaː aːljwm  lqd ʔahnt wahaðaaː aːlnːawʕu min aːlħasadi ʔaaʕamːahaaː waʔaaχbaθuhaaː ʔið lajsa lisˤaaːħibihi raaːħaaun waʔaːd͡ʒilahaaː waχijmun aːlsːajːaaːraau sarijʕaaun lqd tʕlːmt aːlkθjr ʔarjd ʔan ʔatʕlːm kjf ʔastθmr bnfsj ʔaan laaː jakuwna lahu fij aːlʔaamri aːlmustaʃaaːri ʁaradˤun jutaaːbiʕuhu faʔiinːa naqsˤa aːltˤːajʃi ʔaakθaru min fadˤli aːlbalaaːʁaai walaaː salaaːmaaa min miθlihi ʔilːaaː biaːlbuʕdi waaːliaːnqibaaːdˤi tʕaːtˤf aːlmdrːs mʕj ʔiinːahu ʕalaː rad͡ʒʕihi laqaːdirun bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi ʕamːa jatasaːʔalwna wiθaaːqi nawaaːʔiibihi  falaaː lawma ʕalaaː mudˤtˤarːin qaːla ʔaataʕbudwna maː tanħitwna kamaaː qijla liʕalijːin radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu laː tθq bʔaħd ʕdaː nfsk hw wtˤnjː min rahbaain jaχaaːfuhaaː qaːla jaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlmalaʔau ʔaajːukum jaʔatjnj biʕarʃihaː qabla ʔaan jaʔatwnj muslimjna wajabʕaθuhu aːllːuʔumu ʕalaaː aːlbaðaaːʔi bisafahihi faʔiin ʁafala ʕan tlqaː aːlkθjr mn aːlmdjħ ʔaaħjaːʔan waʔaamwaːtanaː ʔaan jakuwna laʔiijma aːltˤːabʕi χabijθa aːlʔaasˤli qad ʔaaʁraaːhu luʔumu aːltˤːabʕi ʕalaaː suwʔi aːliaːʕtiqaaːdi waqaaːla aːlʔiiskandaru lirad͡ʒulin baːlðːnb raħmaaan min rabːika ʔiinːahu huwa aːlsːamjʕu aːlʕaljmu naħnu naraaː qabuwla aːlsːiʕaaːjaai ʃarːanaː minhaaː kamaaː qijla lilʔiiskandari faʔaaʕridˤ ʕanhum waaːntaðˤir ʔiinːahum muntaðˤirwna waaːlʔaaħmaqa bimaaː fijhi min aːlrːaðaaːʔiili nafʕun ʕalaaː faaːʕilihaaː fij aːktisaaːbi aːlʔaad͡ʒri wad͡ʒamijli aːlðːikri raħima aːllːahu aːmraʔaan ʔaahdaaː ʔilajnaaː masaaːwiʔianaaː wabaʃːiri aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aːlsˤːaaːliħaaːti ʔaanːa lahum d͡ʒanːaaːtin tad͡ʒrij min taħtihaaː aːlʔaanhaaːru salaːmun ʕalaː ʔiibraːhjma maːðaː ʕndk bʕd ðˤhr ʁd ntˤq saːmj baːlʃːhaːda lkn lmaːðaː naːdraːan maː ʔaraːhaː ʔiinːaː ʔaarsalnaːka biaːlħaqːi baʃjranaː wanaðjranaː waʔiin min ʔaumːaain ʔiilːaː χalaː fjhaː naðjrun jubasˤːarwnahum jawadːu aːlmud͡ʒrimu law jaftadj min ʕaðaːbi jawmiʔiiðin bibanjhi waʔaasˤlu kulːi ðamːin lisuwʔi ʕawaaːqibihi fasˤaaːra waʃjak aːlsːalwaai qalijla aːld͡ʒazaʕi ħasana aːlʕazaaːʔi faʕaltu ʔilajk wafaʕaltu lilkibri mud͡ʒaaːnibanaː waqijla lahu waaːʕridˤ ʕan faqaaːla lahu ʔaaħsin qalijlanaː waʔaanjbwaː ʔiilaː rabːikum waʔaaslimwaː lahu min qabli ʔaan jaʔatijakumu aːlʕaðaːbu θumːa laː tunsˤarwna kamaaː ħukija ʔaanːa rad͡ʒulanaː qaaːla lidˤiraaːri bni aːlmasʔaalaaa ʔaalifahu aːlmanʕu walaaː jad͡ʒidu min aːltːaðkaaːri salwaaan waqaːla aːlːaðjna fij aːlnːaːri liχazanaai d͡ʒahanːama aːdʕwaː rabːakum juχafːif ʕanːaː jawmanaː mina aːlʕaðaːbi ʔasˤbħ saːmj mdrːsaː llʕrbjːa wamaː χalaqa aːlðːakara waaːlʔaunθaː waʔiið ʔaaχaða aːllːahu mijθaaːqa aːlːaðijna ʔauwtuwaː aːlkitaaːba latubajːinunːahu lilnːaaːsi walaaː taktumuwnahu tʕaːrfaː saːmj w ljlaː fj aːld͡ʒaːmʕa fj wstˤ aːltːsʕjnjːaːt walam jumaaːri ʔaaχjaaːruhaaː ʔaaʃraaːrahaaː haːd͡ʒm saːmj ljlaː faqaaːla lahaaː aːlːaðij fij ʕajnihi bajaaːdˤun  faqaaːlat laaː lqd tm aːχtraːʕ aːltˤaːʔira aːlwrqja aːlmakaaːsibi laː jwd͡ʒd ʔaj sbb jdʕw twm lʔilaː jsˤdq maːrj twdˤːʔa saːmj lsˤlaːa aːlmʁrb km ʕmr tˤflk ʔaatadruwna lima d͡ʒalastu ʔilajkum  qaaːluwaː lm jd͡ʒd saːmj ʔaħd fj ðlk aːlmnzl qaːla ʔiinːj waqawmu lwtˤin waʔaasˤħaːbu aːlʔaajkaai ʔauwlʔiika aːlʔaaħzaːbu walaqad ʔaːtajnaː mwsaaː aːlhudaː waʔaawraθnaː banj ʔiisraːʔijla aːlkitaːba waʔaamːaː θamwdu fahadajnaːhum faaːstaħabːuwaː aːlʕamaː ʕalaaː aːlhudaː faʔaaχaðathum sˤaːʕiqaau aːlʕaðaːbi aːlhwni bimaː kaːnwaː jaksibwna qad aːstaħaqːa aːllːawma min wud͡ʒuwhin laaː taχfaaː ʕalaaː ðij lubːin faaːntaqamnaː minhum faaːnðˤur kajfa kaːna ʕaːqibaau aːlmukaðːibjna bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi wajlun likulːi humazaain lumazaain walaw kaaːna aːlʕaqlu muʁnijanaː ʕan aːlʔaadabi lakaaːna ʔaanbijaaːʔu aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː ʕan ʔaadabihi fj ðlika qasamun liðj ħid͡ʒrin laː ʔaʕrf ʔin kaːnt laː tzaːl mʕj ʔaaħasiba aːlnːaːsu ʔaan jutrakwaː ʔaan jaqwlwaː ʔaːmanːaː wahum laː juftanwna jad͡ʒʕaluwna ʔaasˤaaːbiʕahum fij ʔaːðaaːnihim mina ʔakwn bd͡ʒwaːrk fj hðh aːllħðˤaːt aːlʕsˤjba jraː bʔawl rʔajh ʔaːχr aːlʔamwr ðalika aːlfadˤlu mina aːllːahi wakafaaː biaːllːahi ʕalijmanaː laːqt brʃlwna hzjma mnkra ʕlaː jd aːlbaːjrn waaːlkitaaːbi tid͡ʒaaːraain tund͡ʒijkum min ʕaðaaːbin ʔaalijmin ʃkraː ʕlaː hdjtk lːiʔaasˤħaaːbi aːljamijni ql ʔinmaː ʔanaː mnðr wmaː mn ʔilh ʔilaː aːllh aːlwaːħd aːlqhaːr fij quluwbihim maradˤun fazaaːdahumu aːllːahu maradˤanaː walahum ʕaðaaːbun ʔaalijmun bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jakðibuwna biʔisa aːlzːaaːdu ʔilaaː aːlmaʕaaːdi ʔam jqwlwn bh d͡ʒna bl d͡ʒaːʔhm baːlħq wʔakθrhm llħq kaːrhwn krːsa aːltˤbjba aːlʃaːba nfshu lmsaːʕdai aːlfqraːʔi waːlmrdˤaː ʔanaː mdjnun bnd͡ʒaːħj lhm lmsaːʕdthm lj flmaː ðhb ʕn ʔibraːhjm aːlrwʕ wd͡ʒaːʔth aːlbʃraː jd͡ʒaːdlnaː fj qwm lwtˤ faaːmtanaʕa ʕalajhi lm ʔakn ʔarjd ʔan tqrʔa hðaː ʔant ðʔib fj θjaːb χrwf waliðalika qaaːla aːllːahu subħaaːnahu wataʕaaːlaaː waχuliqa aːlʔiinsaaːnu dˤaʕijfanaː aːlmħjtˤ jmtd ħtaː aːlʔafq aːlbʕjd θumːa ʔaaqbala aːlmustadilːu ʕalajːa waqaaːla lij hl rʔajt haːtfj aːlχljwj  " ʔinh fwq aːltˤaːwla " jaː llʔiħraːd͡ʒ bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi n waaːlqalami wamaaː jastˤuruwna θumːa ʔiiðaaː ʃaaːʔa ʔaanʃarahu wmaː jntˤq ʕn aːlhwaː kaːn twm sʕjdaː hj ʁaːdrtnaː nħn swf nsdd hðaː aːlqrdˤ btˤrjqa ʔaw bʔaχraː waqaaːla aːlːaðij ʔaːmana jaaː qawmi aːtːabiʕuwni ʔaahdikum sabijla aːlrːaʃaaːdi χð jdj qaaːla mawʕidukum jawmu aːlzːijnaai waʔaan juħʃara aːlnːaaːsu dˤuħanaː ʔiinːa aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː sawaaːʔun ʕalajhim ʔaaʔaanðartahum ʔaam lam tunðirhum laaː juʔuminuwna hl ttklm aːlʔind͡ʒljzja  aːlwd͡ʒwh mraːjaː aːlnfws tdˤjʔ bdˤjaːʔihaː wtðˤlm bðˤlaːmhaː ʔiilaːːa ʕalaaː ʔaazwaaːd͡ʒihim ʔaaw maaː malakat ʔaajmaaːnuhum faʔiinːahum ʁajru maluwmijna aːlʔikθaːr mn ʃrb aːlmskr sjsˤjbk baːlmrdˤ waaːlfudˤuwlu ʔinːamaaː jantˤaliqu ʕalaaː maaː ʃjʔiaː ʕn hðaː aːlʔamr hl tʕlm maːhw lwn "twm" aːlmfdˤl ʔinhu jʔumn baːlħjaːa aːlʔaːχra drdʃwaː tˤwjlanaː ʕn aːlmaːdˤj tʕaːl bʕd ʁd waʔiismaaːʕijla waʔiidrijsa waðaaː aːlkifli kulːun mina aːlsˤːaaːbirijna ql llh aːlʃfaːʕa d͡ʒmjʕaː lh mlk aːlsmaːwaːt waːlʔardˤ θm ʔiljh trd͡ʒʕwn kaman aːqtasˤara fij aːlʕibaaːdaai ʕalaaː fiʕli waaːd͡ʒibaaːtihaaː fʔaqblwaː ʔiljh jzfwn maːðaː ʃrbt ʔatklm fakubːat wud͡ʒuwhuhum fij aːlnːaaːri hal tud͡ʒzawna ʔiilːaaː maaː kuntum taʕmaluwna slbj ʔiinːahum ʔiin jaðˤharuwaː ʕalajkum jard͡ʒumuwkum ʔaaw juʕijduwkum fij milːatihim walan tufliħuwaː ʔiiðanaː ʔaabadanaː ʔiinːa naaːʃiʔiaaa aːllːajli hija ʔaaʃadːu watˤʔanaː waʔaaqwamu qijlaː ʔinh jʃrb aːlmaːʔ jmknk ʔan tʕtmd ʕljh ln jχðlk ʔabdanaː wʔalqt maː fjhaː wtχlt faqulnaaː jaaː ʔaːdamu ʔiinːa haðaaː ʕaduwːun laka walizawd͡ʒika falaaː juχrid͡ʒanːakumaaː mina aːld͡ʒanːaai fataʃqaaː hðaː hw aːlsbb ʔan ʔauʃaːrk hðh aːlʔaχbaːr laː tqlq bʃʔan maː fʕlth ʔiinːahum ʕani aːlsːamʕi lamaʕzuwluwna haː hw wawaħjinaaː walaaː tuχaaːtˤibnij fij aːlːaðijna ðˤalamuwaː ʔiinːahum muʁraquwna ʔin rbk jbstˤ aːlrzq lmn jʃaːʔ wjqdr ʔinh kaːn bʕbaːdh χbjraː bsˤjraː ʔiinːa aːlːaðijna qaaːluwaː rabːunaaː aːllːahu jud͡ʒaaːdiluwna fij ʔaːjaaːtinaaː maaː lahum min maħijsˤin ʔaʕrf twm wlkn laː ʔaʕrf maːrj kalːaaː bal laaː jaχaaːfuwna aːlʔaːχiraaa lmaːðaː aːlsmaːʔ zrqaːʔ  kamaaː naʕuwðu bik min ʃarːi aːlʕijːi waaːlħasˤri ħsaːb saːmj jbdw mzjfaː wʔibraːhjm aːlðj wfaː hw jħbk kθjranaː wðˤl mmdwd hw aːlðj ʔarsl rswlh baːlhdaː wdjn aːlħq ljðˤhrh ʕlaː aːldjn klh wkfaː baːllh ʃhjdaː θbt mnːaːd mkaːnh aːlsjaːraːt aːlsˤʁjra aːqtsˤaːdja d͡ʒdaː bsbb aːsthlaːkhaː aːlqljl llwqwd waʔiiðaaː aːlwuħuwʃu ħuʃirat jd͡ʒb ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilj aːlmnzl ʔanaː mqtnʕ ʔan hðh aːlwðˤjfa mnaːsba tmaːmaːan lk walaqad raʔaajt min haðihi aːltˤːabaqaai ʕadadanaː qad taħaqːaquwaː biaːlʕilmi taħaqːuqa aːlmutakalːifijna maːðaː wqʕ hnaːk jaː maːsjn θm ʔinj ʔaʕlnt lhm wʔasrrt lhm ʔisraːraː wtsˤlja d͡ʒħjm wajamnaʕaaːni min aːltːaχaaːðuli waaːlfurqaai walaaː tuχzinij jawma jubʕaθuwna qaaːluwaː ʔiin haðaaːni lasaaːħiraaːni jurijdaaːni ʔaan juχrid͡ʒaaːkum min ʔaardˤikum bisiħrihimaaː wajaðhabaaː bitˤarijqatikumu aːlmuθlaaː ʔiinːa aːlmubaðːirijna kaaːnuwaː ʔiiχwaaːna aːlʃːajaaːtˤijni wakaaːna aːlʃːajtˤaaːnu lirabːihi kafuwranaː ʔajmknnj rkwb hðaː aːlħsˤaːn qljlaːan  walilːahi d͡ʒunuwdu aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waaːlʔaardˤi wakaaːna aːllːahu ʕazijzanaː ħakijmanaː ʔiinːakum lataʔatuwna aːlrːid͡ʒaaːla ʃahwaaan min duwni aːlnːisaaːʔi bal ʔaantum qawmun musrifuwna ljs ðlk bmqdwrj ʔinj ʔaχaːf ʕljkm ʕðaːb jwm ʕðˤjm fakaaːna haðaaː wazanuwhum juχsiruwna waʔaamrun aːχtalaftum fijhi farudːuwhu ʔilaaː aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː hl tsttˤjʕ ʔan tʕudː baːlʔijtˤaːlja  sˤnʕ lj ʔabj rfːanaː aːlqaːdˤj aːlbχjl jawma laaː janfaʕu maaːlun walaaː banuwna salaaːmun ʕalajkum bimaaː sˤabartum faniʕma ʕuqbaaː aːldːaaːri fðlk jwmʔið jwm ʕsjr waaːlʃːamsu tad͡ʒrij limustaqarːin lahaaː ðalika taqdijru aːlʕazijzi aːlʕalijmi jbdw lj mθjranaː llaːhtmaːm ʕjnaː fjhaː tsmaː slsbjlaː kalːaaː waaːlqamari aːlʔaqrbwn ʔawlaː baːlmʕrwf ʔijːaaːkum wakaθraaa aːlsːuʔuaaːli faʔiinːamaaː halaka man qablakum bikaθraai aːlsːuʔuaaːli ʔin kl nfs lmaː ʕljhaː ħaːfðˤ fajaðhabuwaː dˤajʕaaan wajahlakuwaː ʕad͡ʒzanaː aːnðˤr kjf fdˤlnaː bʕdˤhm ʕlaː bʕdˤ wllʔaːχra ʔakbr drd͡ʒaːt wʔakbr tfdˤjlaː ʔiinːahu kaaːna laː juʔuminu biaːllːahi aːlʕaðˤijmi lqd mraːt baːlkθjr mn aːlsˤʕwbaːt aːld͡ʒawaaːri aːlkunːasi aːthm twm maːrj bʔanhaː saːrqa ʔaħb sˤwt aːlʁjθ ʔaθnaːʔ htˤwlh   aːlsqf waqaaːlat liʔauχtihi qusˤːijhi fabasˤurat bihi ʕan d͡ʒunubin wahum laaː jaʃʕuruwna falawlaaː ʔiið d͡ʒaaːʔahum baʔasunaaː tadˤarːaʕuwaː walakin qasat quluwbuhum wazajːana lahumu aːlʃːajtˤaaːnu maaː kaaːnuwaː jaʕmaluwna ʔin fj ðlk lʕbra lmn jχʃaː ljs lhm tˤʕaːm ʔilaː mn dˤrjʕ wljʕlmn saħaaːbun markuwmun klaːmh waːʕmaːlh mtaːnaːqdˤaːn aːnhdˤwaː bqwa ʔilaː ħjθ rfʕnaː raːjtnaː flstˤjn aːlmħtlh dwlh mtqdmh wabalaʁahu sˤalːaaː laː tqlq ħjaːlnaː ʔaamːaaː zuhduk fij aːldːunjaaː faqad tuʕaaːridˤu aːlχaaːtˤiri fajaðhalu ʕan tasˤawːuri aːlmaʕnaaː ln jħl aːlqtaːl ʔaj ʃjʔ wjsʔalwnk ʕn ðj aːlqrnjn ql sʔatlw ʕljkm mnh ðkraː χwaːr aːlbqr waːllh mn wraːʔihm mħjtˤ fanuzulun mːin ħamijmin aːlraːdjw qaːlwaː ʔin aːltˤqsa sjkwnu baːrdaːan fðaːqt wbaːl ʔamrhaː wkaːn ʕaːqba ʔamrhaː χsraː ʔaam ʕindahum χazaaːʔiinu rabːika ʔaam humu aːlmusˤajtˤiruwna maː χlqkm wlaː bʕθkm ʔilaː knfs waːħda ʔin wqaːl nwħ rb laː tðr ʕlaː aːlʔardˤ mn aːlkaːfrjn djaːraː hl trjdnj ħqaːan ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilaː hnaːk aːlʔan  θumːa lamːaaː kaaːna aːlʕaqlu daaːlanaː ʕalaaː ʔaasbaaːbi maaː tadʕuw ʔilajhi aːlħaaːd͡ʒaau aːħmd baːltχfjdˤ ʔalm tr ʔilaː aːlðjn jd͡ʒaːdlwn fj ʔaːjaːt aːllh ʔanaː jsˤrfwn ʕaːʃ fj ʔisbaːnjaː bdˤʕ snwaːt ʃjʔiaːan fʃjʔiaːan tzdaːd mʕrftnaː baːllʁa aːlʔind͡ʒljzja hðaː aːlqaːrb sˤaːlħaːan trd͡ʒma llqrʔaːn baːlʕbrja lilʃːaaːfiʕijːi radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu faːlq aːlʔisˤbaːħ wd͡ʒʕl aːlljl sknaː waːlʃms waːlqmr ħsbaːnaː ðlk tqdjr aːlʕzjz aːlʕljm sʔal aːlsˤaːʔib: " ltuʕjːn mħaːmjanaː d͡ʒjːdanaː  " aːlmwz ʔasˤfr aːlːaðijna jaχʃawna rabːahum biaːlʁajbi wahum mina aːlsːaaːʕaai muʃfiquwna kaðːabat qawmu luwtˤin aːlmursalijna wd͡ʒʕlnj mbaːrkaː ʔajn maː knt wʔawsˤaːnj baːlsˤlaːa waːlzkaːa maː dmt ħjaː walajsa liman bulija bihi ʔilːaaː aːlsˤːabru waaːlʔiiqlaaːlu hnaːk ʔazmaːt tdknaː wʔaχraː tχrd͡ʒ mn aːlʔaʕmaːq ʔafdˤl maː fjnaː ʔaʃʕl ʕwd θqaːb kamaaː qaaːla aːlʔaawːalu wʔaːja lhm aːlljl nslχ mnh aːlnhaːr fʔiðaː hm mðˤlmwn waʔiinːij laʁafːaaːrun liman taaːba waʔaːmana waʕamila sˤaaːliħanaː θumːa aːhtadaaː wʔaːtjnaːh fj aːldnjaː ħsna wʔinh fj aːlʔaːχra lmn aːlsˤaːlħjn laaː tad͡ʒʔaaruwaː aːljawma ʔiinːakum minːaaː laaː tunsˤaruwna wlaː jħsbn aːlðjn kfrwaː sbqwaː ʔinhm laː jʕd͡ʒzwn waʔiinːaaː ʕalaaː ʔaan nurijaka maaː naʕiduhum laqaaːdiruwna ʔiðaː lm tkn mʕnaː fʔant dˤdnaː bʔan rbk ʔawħaː lhaː hl ʔant tʕlm  ʔaʕrf kjf ʔalʕb kra aːlmdˤrb wasaχːara lakumu aːlʃːamsa waaːlqamara daaːʔiibajni wasaχːara lakumu aːllːajla waaːlnːahaaːra qaaːla ʔaataʕbuduwna maaː tanħituwna ʔinaː ʔarslnaːk baːlħq bʃjraː wnðjraː wlaː tsʔal ʕn ʔasˤħaːb aːld͡ʒħjm ʔiið qaaːla rabːuka lilmalaaːʔiikaai ʔiinːij χaaːliqun baʃaranaː min tˤijnin faːkhjn bmaː ʔaːtaːhm rbhm wwqaːhm rbhm ʕðaːb aːld͡ʒħjm ʔaχrd͡ʒ dftranaː waliʁajrik nuwruhu ʔajn aːlktb  snbqaː ʔasˤdqaːʔ ħtaː aːlmwt ʔanti ksrti qlbj aːlmutawaaːdˤiʕu min tˤulːaaːbi aːlʕilmi ʔaakθaruhum ʕilmanaː liʔaanːa aːlʔiiʕd͡ʒaaːba bihi jufdˤij ʔilaaː ħaaːlatajni maðmuwmatajni warad͡ʒulun jadrij walaaː jadrij ʔaanːahu jadrij faðalika naaːsin faðakːiruwhu lam jad͡ʒib ʕalajhi aːlnːakijru ʔiðaaː χaʃija tnaːwltu lltw wd͡ʒba aːlftˤwr ʔanta kjf ʕrfta ðlk  twmaːs jʃaːhd fjlmaːan ʔaʕjʃ fj tˤraːbls ljbjaː ðlk bʔan aːllh hw aːlħq wʔanh jħjj aːlmwtaː wʔanh ʕlaː kl ʃjʔ qdjr hðaː hw aːlktaːb aːlðj tbħθwn ʕnh waqul rabːi aːʁfir waaːrħam waʔaanta χajru aːlrːaaːħimijna qrrt ʔan ʔaʕml lħsaːb ʃrka fj ʔamrjkaː tbdw w kʔank rʔajt ʃbħaː ʔanaː ʔaʕml hnaː lst zaːʔiraː lwsmħt laːtnsaː ʔan twqðˤnj ʁdaː fj aːlsaːʕa aːlsaːbʕa lm jtwqːʕ twm ʔajːa msaːʕda mn maːrj ql hl nnbʔikm baːlʔaχsrjn ʔaʕmaːlaː ʔajn jʕjʃ χaːlk  mn tðˤn nfsk  daʕwaaːhum fijhaaː subħaaːnaka aːllːahumːa wataħijːatuhum fijhaaː salaaːmun waʔaːχiru daʕwaaːhum ʔaani aːlħamdu lilːahi rabːi aːlʕaaːlamijna ʔiðhbj ʔilaːa ʁrqtik wʔanhm ðˤnwaː kmaː ðˤnntm ʔan ln jbʕθ aːllh ʔaħdaː ʕn ʕumra radˤij aːllhu ʕanhu qaːla: jbdw saːmj ltˤjfaː man jusˤraf ʕanhu jawmaʔiiðin faqad raħimahu waðalika aːlfawzu aːlmubijnu walawlaaː fadˤlu aːllːahi ʕalajkum waraħmatuhu waʔaanːa aːllːaha raʔuwfun raħijmun waʔiinːamaaː aːlsːaʕaaːdaau ʔaan laaː jakuwna lahu sˤaaːrifun ʕan aːlʕilmi qaːrn bjn ʔasaːljb tlk aːlrsaːʔil tnmw hðh aːlʃd͡ʒra baːlqrb mn bjthaː ʔasrʕ  wʔaʕlaː  wʔaqwaː ʔanðˤr maːðaː ʔaħdˤrt lj fj ʕjd mjlaːdj kwbj kaːml hl ʔanta tsʕl dmaːʔ  hðaː ljs d͡ʒjdaːan rkdˤ aːlklb ʕqb aːlqtˤ laaː tuħsˤuwhaaː ʔiinːa aːllːaha laʁafuwrun raħijmun ʔaami aːtːaχaða mimːaaː jaχluqu banaaːtin waʔaasˤfaaːkum biaːlbanijna twm ʕaːtˤl ʕn aːlʕml ħaːljaː ʔalaː tbʕd jdk ʕnj  ʔarjd ʔan ʔatħdθ mʕk bmwdˤwʕ lkl nbʔi mstqr wswf tʕlmwn hudanaː waðikraaː liʔauwlij aːlʔaalbaaːbi aːklnaː bjdˤ ʔiinːamaaː jaʔamurukum biaːlsːuwʔi waaːlfaħʃaaːʔi waʔaan taquwluwaː ʕalaaː aːllːahi maaː laaː taʕlamuwna wakulːun biaːlʔaaθari jawmuhu ʔaaw ʁaduhu ʔauwlaʔiika ʔaasˤħaaːbu aːld͡ʒanːaai χaaːlidijna fijhaaː d͡ʒazaaːʔan bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jaʕmaluwna twm jqwm bqrʔaːʔa ktaːb taːrjχ marfuwʕaain mutˤahːaraain ql ʔin ʔadrj ʔaqrjb maː twʕdwn ʔam jd͡ʒʕl lh rbj ʔamdaː waaːlːaðijna hum biʃahaaːdaaːtihim qaaːʔiimuwna aːħtfðˤ bh fj mkaːn baːrd aːalʕad͡ʒalaa mina aːlʃːajtˤaaːn ʔam lkm sltˤaːn mbjn aːstmrwaː fj aːlħdjθ lsaːʕaːt qaːl nʕm wʔinkm lmn aːlmqrbjn maː kðb aːlfʔuaːd maː rʔaaː maː aːlχjaːraːt aːlʔaχraː aːltj ʔamaːmj faːtˤma jaaː rasuwla aːllaːhi kajfa jaʔatijka aːlwaħju  tħbnj kl ʕaːʔiltj kaːn d͡ʒbjnj jʁlj mn aːlħmaː ʔin hj ʔilaː mwttnaː aːlʔawlaː wmaː nħn bmnʃrjn hl sbq lk ʔan ðhbt ʔilaː aːlwlaːjaːt aːlmtħda  laː ʔaʕrf ʃjʔianaː aːlbtːa mustakbirijna bihi saaːmiranaː tahd͡ʒuruwna aːljwm hw aːlʔaħd wafirʕawna ðij aːlʔaawtaaːdi ʔaalam tara kajfa faʕala rabːuka biʔaasˤħaaːbi aːlfijli waʔiilajk nasʕaaː kjf ʔaʕaːwdk w hðaː ʔaθr fʔask waminhunːa mamnaʕun tadˤurːu walaaː tanfaʕu tbdw rd͡ʒlanaː sˤdwqanaː jmknk aːjdˤaː aːlmsaːhma fj aːlmsaːbqa mn χlaːl tqjjm w aːdˤaːfa d͡ʒml d͡ʒdjda ʕlaː aːlmwqʕ: ʔiinːij ʔiiðanaː lafij dˤalaaːlin mubijnin hðh aːltˤaːwla mħd͡ʒwza waman lam jarʁab fij aːlsːalaaːmaai bulija biaːlʃːadaaːʔiidi waaːliaːmtihaaːni qaːl wmaː ʕlmj bmaː kaːnwaː jʕmlwn rfdˤt ʕrdˤj lmsaːʕdthaː θumːa ʕabasa wabasara aːħðr waʔaamːaaː aːlrːahbaau famin ʕiqaaːbi aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː litaaːrikij ʔaawaaːmirihi  wamuhmalij zawaaːd͡ʒirihi kaːn saːmj mʕrwfaː bslwkh aːlmtqlːb w aːlʕdaːʔij kamn jbħθ ʕn ʔibra fj kwma qaʃː wajurijkum ʔaːjaaːtihi faʔaajːa ʔaːjaaːti aːllːahi tunkiruwna falamːaaː daχaluwaː ʕalaaː juwsufa ʔaːwaaː ʔiilajhi ʔaabawajhi waqaaːla aːdχuluwaː misˤra ʔiin ʃaaːʔa aːllːahu ʔaːminijna waqaaːla aːlmaʔamuwnu sʔanaːm hnaː waħaraaːmun ʕalaaː qarjaain ʔaahlaknaaːhaaː ʔaanːahum ʔant ttklm aːlʔind͡ʒljzjh mn aːlʔafdˤl ʔan tðhb maː ħdθ lhm laː jzaːl lʁzaː maː jzaːl twm jðˤnnaː ʔasˤdqaːʔ qaaːla nuwħun rabːi ʔiinːahum ʕasˤawnij waaːtːabaʕuwaː man lam jazidhu maaːluhu wawaladuhu aːlðj jsˤl fjh ʕaːda wʔin kaːn qmjsˤh qd mn dbr fkðbt whw mn aːlsˤaːdqjn ʔajmknnj aːlqwl bʔanːk ftaːa d͡ʒmjla lqd fʕlt ðlk ʕn ʕmd aːlrd͡ʒaːʔ aːblaːʁj ʕn ʔaj tʁjjr fj ħaːlth fʕaːl lmaː jrjd fj mntˤqa rwhr  ʕaːda maː tsbb aːlsˤnaːʕa aːlmnd͡ʒmja zlaːzlaː bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi tˤs tilka ʔaːjaaːtu aːlqurʔaːni wakitaaːbin mubijnin laː jzaːl klaː aːlʔaχwjn ʕlaː qjd aːlħjaːa wamarːa bihi ʔaːχaru faʔaaʕtˤaaːhu d͡ʒubːaaan wabuʁdˤi man ʔaasaaːʔa ʔilajhaaː ln jsjʔ lkn ʔaħd waːðkr fj aːlktaːb mwsaː ʔinh kaːn mχlsˤaː wkaːn rswlaː nbjaː ʕaːdaan maː jtʁjr aːltˤqs fj hðaː aːlwqt mn aːlsna qad ʔaaflaħa man tazakːaaːaː wahaðaaː kitaaːbun ʔaanzalnaaːhu mubaaːrakun faaːtːabiʕuwhu waaːtːaquwaː laʕalːakum turħamuwna waaːlːaðijna d͡ʒaaːhaduwaː fijnaaː lanahdijanːahum subulanaaː waʔiinːa aːllːaha lamaʕa aːlmuħsinijna jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː laaː taʔakuluwaː aːlrːibaaː ʔaadˤʕaaːfanaː mudˤaaːʕafaaan waaːtːaquwaː aːllːaha laʕalːakum tufliħuwna aːlðjn dˤl sʕjhm fj aːlħjaːa aːldnjaː whm jħsbwn ʔanhm jħsnwn sˤnʕaː hw ʔatrʕa aːlkʔasa wʔin ʔiljaːs lmn aːlmrsljn     maː   ln jtχlaː ʕnk twm wlqd sˤrfnaː llnaːs fj hðaː aːlqrʔaːn mn kl mθl fʔabaː ʔakθr aːlnaːs ʔilaː kfwraː juʕqd aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕ mrtjn fj aːlʃhr waaːldˤːarbu aːlθːaaːliθu laː baːrd wlaː krjm ʔaʁlb aːlðˤn ʔanhaː tntðˤr mnk ʔan tʕtðr ʔiljhaː sʔanzl fj aːlmħtˤa aːlqaːdma wmn ʔaːjaːth aːld͡ʒwaːr fj aːlbħr kaːlʔaʕlaːm ʔiin haðaaː ʔiilːaaː qawlu aːlbaʃari haːa md͡ʒthda wjuʕtmd ʕljhaː wkm ʔahlknaː qblhm mn qrn hm ʔaħsn ʔaθaːθaː wrʔijaː lam jaʔakul aːlqitˤːu qrːr saːmj ʔan jʔud͡ʒːl ðhaːbh ʔilaː aːld͡ʒaːmʕa fad͡ʒaʕala minhu aːlzːawd͡ʒajni aːlðːakara waaːlʔaunθaː walaaː jufarːiqu bajna maħmuwdin wamaðmuwmin faʔaaqbalwaː ʔiilajhi jazifːwna hðh mkaːtbnaː smʕt ljlaː saːmj w sljma jtχaːsˤmaːn waqad rawaaː aːlʕalaaːʔu bnu d͡ʒarijrin ʕan ʔaabijhi ʕan saaːlimi bni masruwqin qaaːla jaχrud͡ʒu minhumaaː aːllːuʔuluʔuu waaːlmard͡ʒaːnu lm lm ttːsˤlwaː bj msbːqaː ʔadˤʕt saːʕtj fʕljː aːlʔaːn ʔan ʔaʃtrj waːħda ʔaχraː kaːn saːmj jtnaːwl aːldːwaːʔ kaːn saːmj ʕlaː wʃk ʔinhaːʔ ħjaːth waʁadawaː ʕalaː ħardin qaːdirjna bajnahumaː barzaχun laː jabʁijaːni tˤlb saːmj ʔan jtrkh aːld͡ʒmjʕ w ʃʔanh wamiħanahu min ʃawaaːhidi nublihi kaːn saːmj jntðˤr fj aːlħaːna laː jwfr aːlsˤwm aːltˤwjl χbzaːan wamuqaaːranatuhu ʃaqaaː hal tuħibːu aːlsːafara waʕalaaː miθli ðalika kaaːnat maraaːθij aːlʃːuʕaraaːʔi waaːlːaðjna kafarwaː biʔaːjaːtinaː hum ʔaasˤħaːbu aːlmaʃʔaamaai waaːðkur ʕabdanaː ʔaajːwba ʔiið naːdaː rabːahu ʔaanːj masːanija aːlʃːajtˤaːnu binusˤbin waʕaðaːbin faʔiin ʔaaʕwazahu ðalika ʔilːaaː aːstismaaːħanaː fahuwa aːlrːiqːu aːlmuðilːu laː jad͡ʒibu ʕaljaː fiʕlu ðlik ʔaabadaːan laː ʔarjd aːlbqaːʔ lwħdj waðˤuhuwru maaː aːstabhama smʕtkmaː ttχaːsˤmaːn waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlmasijħi bnu nufajlaaa wsˤlnaː ʔilaː aːlmstʃfaː bʔamaːn wafij miθlihi qaaːla aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː wajuzijluhu ʕanhaaː ʃjʔ ljs mntˤqjaː ʔabdaː jmknhaː aːn tʕd mn waːħd ʔilaː ʕʃra waʔiilzaaːmuhaaː maaː ʔaalzama min tˤaaːʕatihi ʔatħbnj aːlʕaaːmilu mutʕibun man ħasˤːana dijnahu wawasˤala raħimahu waʔaakrama ʔiχwaaːnahu faʔiin qanaʕa waaːqtasˤada ʔaataaːhu rizquhu χlʕ saːmj mlaːbsh bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi waaːlʕaːdijaːti dˤabħanaː kaðlika nad͡ʒzij aːlmuħsinjna wafursˤaaa qudratihi qd jtwqaː aːlsjf whw mʁmd wd͡ʒd saːmj lljlaː mnsˤb ʃʁl fj aːlmsbħ aːlʔardˤ  aːlmrjχ  w aːlmʃtrj klhm kwaːkb ntˤqaː saːmj w ljlaː baːlʃːhaːda mʕaː aːtːsˤl bj mdrːsk wajabʕaθu ʕalaaː aːlqatˤijʕaai waaːlʕuquwqi sqtˤt aːlkθjr mn aːlʔaʃd͡ʒaːr faʔiinːa aːlmuluwka tuʕaaːqibu qudraaan laː tns ʔan tqdːm ʔikraːmjːa llnːaːdl jmkn lltwtr ʔan jʔuθr tʔaθjraː slbjaː kbjraː ʕlaː sˤħtk mn aːlʔafdˤl ʔan tsrʕw qaːla faaːlħaqːu waaːlħaqːa ʔaaqwlu jmknk aːlmd͡ʒjʔi mʕj kaːn saːmj jstħqː qdˤaːʔ wqt ʔakθr fj aːlsːd͡ʒn aːħtimaaːlu aːlsːafijhi χajrun min aːltːaħalːij bisˤuwratihi waaːlħirsˤa ʕalajhi ħaðˤːanaː kamaaː d͡ʒaaːʔa fij aːlħadijθi aːlʔaːχari ʔiðaaː hamamt biʔaamrin fafakːir fij ʕaaːqibatihi faʔiin kaaːna ruʃdanaː faʔaamdˤihi bdʔa saːmj jqdˤj wqtaː ʔakθr mʕ ljlaː waaːallːahi maaː manaʕahu min d͡ʒawaaːbij ʔilːaaː hawaaːnij ʕalajhi waχaaːdaʕa nafsahu biʁalatˤihi ʔinːamaaː maaːluk lak ʔaaw lilwaaːriθi ʔaaw lild͡ʒaaːʔiiħaai falaaː takun ʔaaʃqaaː aːlθːalaaːθaai saːmj tzwːd͡ʒ mrːa θaːnja bʕd wfaːa zwd͡ʒth kaːn ðlk mmtʕanaː ħatːaaː sˤaaːra kaðibanaː sˤuraaːħanaː faʕinda ðalika jazuwlu aːlʁadˤabu ʔiinːa tutlifu ʃijʔianaː liʁajrika tadfaʕ θamanahu karmanaː waraʁbaaan ʔanaː ʔaraː hðaː mʕ mn trjd ʔan ttħdθ faaːlmuqasːimaːti ʔaamranaː kjf lj ʔan ʔansaː ʃjʔiaː khðaː waman kalːafathu aːlnːafsu fawqa kafaaːfihaaː famaaː janqadˤij ħatːaaː aːlmamaaːti waaːlnːaːsi falanuħjijanːahu ħajaaːaan tˤajːibaaan qaaːla laː bd ʔan lhðaː mʕnaː ʔaχð saːmj mʕh mfaːtjħh w haːtfh aːld͡ʒwːaːl kaːn laːʕbj kra aːlqdm mtʕbjn lknːhm sʕdaːʔ laː tns ðlk ʔabdaː wamaː wʃd͡ʒr blaː θmr faaːnðˤur kajfa kaːna ʕaːqibaau makrihim ʔaanːaː damːarnaːhum waqawmahum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕjna faqad kamulat fijhi ʔaasbaaːbu aːlχajri bdʔa saːmj jsmʕ sˤwtaː jsˤdr mn aːlʕlːjːa wafijhi taʔawijlaaːni ʔaaħaduhumaaː ʕilmu maaː laaː jasaʕu d͡ʒahluhu min aːlʕibaaːdaaːti ʔanaː χd͡ʒl d͡ʒdaː mmaː fʕlt bal ʕad͡ʒibta wajasχarwna wamaː min ʁaːʔiibaain fij aːlsːamaːʔi waaːlʔaardˤi ʔiilːaː fj kitaːbin mubjnin ʔin aːstatˤaʕt ʔaan taʕmala lilːahi biaːlrːidˤaaː fij aːljaqijni faaːfʕal aːlθːawru jaħriθu aːlʔardˤa ʕaːd saːmj walaaː juħmala ʕalajhi biaːlkaθijri fajuðˤlamu wqd trwn ʃhaːb aːlmwt qd stˤʕaː kalːaː ʔiinːahu taðkiraaun jaaː banijːa taʕalːamuwaː aːlʕilma faʔiin kuntum saaːdaaan fuqtum kaːn saːmj aːlʔawːl fj qsmh ʔaalbasu θawbanaː ʔaaqij bihi nafsij ʔaaħabːu ʔilajːa min θawbin jwqnwn waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlbulaʁaaːʔi aːlʔaamalu kaaːlsːaraaːbi ʁarːa man raʔaːhu  waχaaːba man rad͡ʒaaːhu ʔanaː ʔaʃʕr baːlʕtˤʃ waqaaːla muħamːadu bnu baʃijrin raħimahu aːllːahu radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu ʔaawːaluhumaaː maaː jantaðˤimu bihi ʔaumuwru d͡ʒumlathaaː watˤalabt mink mawadːaaan lam ʔauʕtˤahaaː ʔinːa aːlmuʕanːaaː tˤaaːlibun laaː jaðˤfaru waqaaːla aːlʕabːaaːsu bnu aːlʔaaħnafi wabiaːlʔaasħaaːri mulaaːquw rabːihim waʔaanːahum ʔiilajhi raaːd͡ʒiʕuwna waʔiin minkum ʔiilːaaː waaːriduhaaː kaaːna ʕalaaː rabːika ħatmanaː maqdˤijːanaː ʔinː ʃwqj ħaːʔir fj mqltjk kun ʕdjm aːlrħma waaːlːaðijna hum ʕani ʔaj kaːn lam jazdad min aːllːahi ʔilːaaː buʕdanaː wlaː ttˤjʕwaː ʔamr aːlmsrfjn ʔanaː ʔatttˤlʕ lrʔujtk fj qbʕtk wrdaːʔik bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm waːlmrslaːt ʕrfaː faːtχðt mn dwnhm ħd͡ʒaːbaː fʔarslnaː aːlmtlqjaːn ʕn aːljmjn wʕn aːlʃmaːl qʕjd ttħrk aːlħlzwnaːt bbtˤʔ mn ʃr maː χlq hj kʔaχjhaː waaːlʃːuʕaraaːʔu jatːabiʕuhumu aːlʁaaːwuwna twd͡ʒh ʔilaː mħtˤa ħaːflaːt aːld͡ʒzaːʔir aːlʕaːsˤma hl ħaːwlt aːlaːstmaːʕ ʔiljhaː saːmj kaːn ʕlaː fjsbwk lqd ʔauħrd͡ʒt ħqaːan maːðaː  laː ʔasttˤjʕ smaːʕkm ʔajhaː aːlrfaːq mn hðh aːltˤfla aːltj mʕk ʔanaː ʔarjd ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilj aːld͡ʒna, wlkn laː ʔarjd ʔan ʔamwt llwsˤwl ʔilaː hnaːk wad͡ʒanːaaːtin ʔaalfaaːfanaː jbdwaː lj ʔanh jʕlm aːlsr lijad͡ʒzija aːllːahu kulːa nafsin maaː kasabat ʔiinːa aːllːaha sarijʕu aːlħisaaːbi walaʔiin saʔaaltahum man χalaqahum lajaquwlunːa aːllːahu faʔaanːaaː juʔufakuwna waʔaanʃada ʕabdu aːllːahi bnu aːlzːubajri θalaaːθaaa ʔaabjaaːtin d͡ʒaaːmiʕaaan likulːi maaː qaaːlathu aːlʕarabu aːʕtni bnfsk waʔaːχaruwna murd͡ʒawna waaːlnːahaaːri ʔaafalaaː taʕqiluwna ʔaʕjdh ʔilj jħwl aːld͡ʒsm aːlsʕraːt aːlħraːrja aːlzaːʔida ʔilaː ʃħm kaːn ʕlaː aːlmdrs ʔan jqjm d͡ʒmjʕ aːltˤlb ʔin aːlðjn ʔad͡ʒrmwaː kaːnwaː mn aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː fj aːlʁrfa waʔiin lam takun radaaːʔaau aːlχatˤːi saʕaaːdaaan aːqraʔa warabːuka aːlʔaakramu hðaː kθjr ʔalaː tʕrf ʔin kaːnt lwsj qaːdra ʕlaː tklm aːljaːbaːnja  ʔajn aːlħbl  hl jmknnj ʔan ʔasʔal, ʔilaː ʔajn ʔanta ðaːhb  waːltft aːlsaːq baːlsaːq lmaːðaː sˤʕdt ʔilaː sqf bjthaː  ʔanaː ʕlaː aːlqaːʔima ldjh sjaːra d͡ʒdjda w ʔaχraː qdjma jʕd͡ʒbh hðaː aːld͡ʒjtaːr hnaːk mn jnðˤr ʔiljk hl hðh ʔawl zjaːra lk aːbq saːktaː bjnmaː nʔakl qaːl rbj jʕlm aːlqwl fj aːlsmaːʔ waːlʔardˤ whw aːlsmjʕ aːlʕljm faʔiinːa aːlrːaʔaja aːlmaʕluwla laaː jabqaaː ʕalaaː ħaaːlihi faminhum man ʔaːmana bihi waminhum man sˤadːa ʕanhu wakafaaː bid͡ʒahanːama saʕijranaː mimːaaː χatˤijʔiaaːtihim ʔauʁriquwaː faʔaudχiluwaː naaːranaː falam jad͡ʒiduwaː lahum min duwni aːllːahi ʔaansˤaaːranaː faʔiinːa fadˤla aːlmaʃhadi ʕalaaː aːlmaʁijbi luʔumun walakum fijhaaː d͡ʒamaaːlun ħijna turijħuwna waħijna tasraħuwna ʔaʕtqd ʔan hðaː ʕðˤjm wʔadχlnaːh fj rħmtnaː ʔinh mn aːlsˤaːlħjn mrħbanaː baːlʕaːlm ʔink lmn aːlmrsljn jd͡ʒb ʔan jkwn aːlbaːb ʔimaː mʁlqaː ʔaw mftwħaː qul ʔiinːa aːlʔaawːalijna waaːlʔaːχirijna ʔad͡ʒaːbt baːkjaan fj rq mnʃwr waʔiiðaaː qaraʔata aːlqurʔaːna d͡ʒaʕalnaaː bajnaka wabajna aːlːaðijna laaː juʔuminuwna biaːlʔaːχiraai ħid͡ʒaaːbanaː mastuwranaː maːkθjn fjh ʔabdaː waaːðkur ʕabdanaaː ʔaajːuwba ʔiið naaːdaaː rabːahu ʔaanːij masːanija aːlʃːajtˤaaːnu binusˤbin waʕaðaaːbin wabiʔiiðˤhaaːri maknuwnihi takuwnu aːlfaaːʔiidaau wabiaːstidaaːmaai sˤabrihi jakuwnu aːlʔiikθaaːru lqd sqtˤ twm fj ħwdˤ aːlsbaːħa ʁajra ʔaanːa aːldːunjaaː ʔiðaaː sˤalaħat kaaːna ʔisʕaaːduhaaː mawfuwranaː  waʔiiʕraaːdˤuhaaː majsuwranaː lm jd͡ʒd twm nðˤaːraːth jariθunij wajariθu min ʔaːli jaʕquwba waaːd͡ʒʕalhu rabːi radˤijːanaː waʔiiχwaaːnuhum jamudːuwnahum fij aːlʁajːi θumːa laaː juqsˤiruwna ldjhaː sbʕa sˤbjaːn wamina aːlnːaaːsi man jaʃrij nafsahu aːbtiʁaaːʔa mardˤaaːti aːllːahi waaːllːahu raʔuwfun biaːlʕibaaːdi qaːl rb ʔinj laː ʔamlk ʔilaː nfsj wʔaχj faːfrq bjnnaː wbjn aːlqwm aːlfaːsqjn waʔiimːaaː taχaaːfanːa min qawmin χijaaːnaaan faaːnbið ʔiilajhim ʕalaaː sawaaːʔin ʔiinːa aːllːaha laaː juħibːu aːlχaaːʔiinijna kaːnt tlk aːltfaːħa ħqaː lðjða jwm jqwm aːlrwħ waːlmlaːʔika sˤfaː laː jtklmwn ʔilaː mn ʔaðn lh aːlrħmn wqaːl sˤwaːbaː aːlbndqja mdjna rwmnsja kaðalika jatˤbaʕu aːllːahu ʕalaaː quluwbi aːlːaðijna laaː jaʕlamuwna rd djmaː bʔan sʔal: " hl jqtl aːlʔasˤdqaːʔ bʕdˤanaː bʕd aːlmʕaːʃra  " haːa kaːnt ʁaːdˤba ʕlaːa ʔibnhaː ʔanta laː tsttˤjʕ ʔan tʔaklhaː fqtˤ lʔanhaː mʁðja hðh aːlklma sˤʕba llntˤq waʔaahdijaka ʔiilaaː rabːika fataχʃaaː wʔajwb ʔið naːdaː rbh ʔanj msnj aːldˤr wʔant ʔarħm aːlraːħmjn qaːl aːltlmjð: ʔin aːlmʕlm laː jħtrm nfsh waqaaːluwaː ʔaːmanːaaː bihi waʔaanːaaː lahumu aːltːanaaːwuʃu min makaaːnin baʕijdin rfdˤt ʕn ʔasbaːb ʃχsˤja aːlːaðij ʔaaħalːanaaː daaːra aːlmuqaaːmaai min fadˤlihi laaː jamasːunaaː fijhaaː nasˤabun walaaː jamasːunaaː fijhaaː luʁuwbun wmaː jdrjk lʕlh jzkaː hl fhmwaː  waqaaːla mahbuwdun kaːn ðaːk aːlfndq qrjbaːan d͡ʒdaːan mn aːlbħjra waʔaanːa aːlmasaaːd͡ʒida lilːahi falaaː tadʕuwaː maʕa aːllːahi ʔaaħadanaː kalːaaː ʔiinːahu kaaːna liʔaːjaaːtinaaː ʕanijdanaː qaːl ʔaraːʁb ʔant ʕn ʔaːlhtj jaː ʔibraːhjm lʔin lm tnth lʔard͡ʒmnk waːhd͡ʒrnj mljaː θalaaːθun man kunaː fijhi wad͡ʒada ħalaaːwaaa aːlʔiijmaaːni aːχfdˤj rʔask falanaqusˤːanːa ʕalajhim biʕilmin wamaaː kunːaaː ʁaaːʔiibijna hl ldjk aːlkθjr ltfʕlh aːljwm  ʔið aːnbʕθ ʔaʃqaːhaː taqdijru maaː jatawalːaaːhu min aːlʔaamwaaːli bisunani aːldːijni min ʁajri taħrijfin fij ʔaaχðihaaː waʔiiʕtˤaaːʔiihaaː ʔawlʔik aːlðjn aːʃtrwaː aːldˤlaːla baːlhdaː waːlʕðaːb baːlmʁfra fmaː ʔasˤbrhm ʕlaː aːlnaːr ʔiin tad͡ʒtanibuwaː kabaaːʔiira maaː tunhawna ʕanhu nukafːir ʕankum sajːiʔiaaːtikum wanudχilkum mudχalanaː karijmanaː χrd͡ʒt mʕ ʔasˤdqaːʔihaː ʔaʕtqd ʔannj sʔaʕtˤs ʔaʕtˤnj mndjlaːan ʔaadabu aːlmutaʕalːimi fasˤlun wasaʔaaðkuru tˤarafanaː mimːaaː jataʔaadːabu bihi aːlmutaʕalːimu wajakuwnu ʕalajhi aːlʕaaːlimu jamudːu jadajhi ʔiilaaː aːlsːamaːʔi jaː rabːu jaː rabːu ʔanaː χlfh mbaːʃra watanħituwna mina aːld͡ʒibaaːli bujuwtanaː faaːrihijna waaːlːaðijna jumasːikuwna biaːlkitaaːbi waʔaaqaaːmuwaː aːlsˤːalaaːaa ʔiinːaaː laaː nudˤijʕu ʔaad͡ʒra aːlmusˤliħijna waʔiin tadʕuwhum ʔiilaaː aːlhudaaː laaː baʕdˤu aːlʕulamaaːʔi libanijhi qumi aːllːajla ʔiilaːːa qalijlaː nntðˤru mnki ʔan tunafiːðij lnaː maː wʕdtijh lnaː ðaːt mra sˤnʕtu mudˤaχːimanaː ʔams nakːt wlaː tunkːd mn twfj  aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː watatˤmaʔiinːu quluwbuhum biðikri aːllːahi ʔaalaaː biðikri aːllːahi tatˤmaʔiinːu aːlquluwbu wskntm fj msaːkn aːlðjn ðˤlmwaː ʔanfshm wtbjn lkm kjf fʕlnaː bhm wdˤrbnaː lkm aːlʔamθaːl ʕaaːlimun jad͡ʒrij baʁtaaan ʔaaw d͡ʒahraaan hal juhlaku ʔiilːaaː aːlqawmu aːlðˤːaaːlimuwna ʔatrjd ħqaː mn twm ʔan jfʕl ðlk ʔiið daχaluwaː ʕalajhi faqaaːluwaː salaaːmanaː qaaːla salaaːmun qawmun munkaruwna laː ʔanaː lst bmtzwd͡ʒ jrjd ʃraːʔ ʕqd lʔulʔu lzwd͡ʒth hl bʔimkaːnk ʔan tʔawjnj hðh aːlljla  fajaʔatijahum baʁtaaan wahum laaː jaʃʕuruwna min ʔaajna ʔaantum hðh d͡ʒhnm aːltj kntm twʕdwn tʕrft ʕljh aːlʕaːm aːlmaːdˤj fj ħfla lqd knt fj ʁfla mn hðaː fkʃfnaː ʕnk ʁtˤaːʔk fbsˤrk aːljwm ħdjd fj mqʕd sˤdq ʕnd mljk mqtdr knt fj aːlħmaːm ʕndmaː rn aːlhaːtf bal rafaʕahu aːllːahu ʔiilajhi wakaaːna aːllːahu ʕazijzanaː mandˤuwdin aːlðj χlqnj fhw jhdjn walaaː liaːstiqaaːmatihaaː ʔaaθaranaː wʔazlfnaː θm aːlʔaːχrjn nðˤfj ʁrftki kdt aːʁrq laː ʔaħd jʕlm bmaː ʔaʃʕr bh waʔiið qataltum nafsanaː faaːdːaaːraʔatum fijhaaː waaːllːahu muχrid͡ʒun maaː kuntum taktumuwna ʔaajaħsabu aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʔaalːan nad͡ʒmaʕa ʕiðˤaaːmahu wmaː td͡ʒzwn ʔilaː maː kntm tʕmlwn faχafija ʕalaaː aːlkaaːtibi ðalika watilka ʕaaːdun d͡ʒaħaduwaː biʔaːjaaːti rabːihim waʕasˤawaː rusulahu waaːtːabaʕuwaː ʔaamra kulːi d͡ʒabːaaːrin ʕanijdin ʔawlʔik aːlðjn lhm swʔ aːlʕðaːb whm fj aːlʔaːχra hm aːlʔaχsrwn saːmj ldjh maː jrjd tmknt mn ʔiqnaːʕ aːbn ʕmj lahaaː maaːlikuwna saːmj sajfʕl ʔajaː ʃajʔin lijħsˤula ʕalaː maː jurjdu hl tʔumn baːlmsjħja  laː jmknnj aːlaːntðˤaːr llwsˤwl aːlaː aːlmnzl waːlnwm fj srjrj fʔaχrd͡ʒnaː mn kaːn fjhaː mn aːlmʔumnjn qtl ʔasˤħaːb aːlʔaχdwd ʔanaː ʔaʁnj ʔaʁnjaan faːdnu mnːj ʔinːnj mlk jdjk sbaːħa twm srjʕa d͡ʒdaːan htlr krh aːljhwd ʔarjd ʔan ʔastʔad͡ʒr ħaːfla laː jwd͡ʒd ʔaħd fj aːlbjt hðaː d͡ʒml twm hw jʕjʃ fj kaːrdjf walaw tanazːaha fij miθli haðihi aːlħaaːli ʕan aːstibðaaːli aːlħaraaːʔiiri ʔilaaː aːlʔiimaaːʔi kaaːna ʔaakmala limuruwʔatihi qrʔat rsaːlth ʕda mraːt ʔin aːlmsˤdqjn waːlmsˤdqaːt wʔaqrdˤwaː aːllh qrdˤaː fatˤamasnaaː ʔaaʕjunahum faðuwquwaː ʕaðaaːbij wanuðuri kalːaaː ʔiinːahaaː laðˤaaː saːmj lm jktrθ mn qablu aːlbta lkn ʔamh ʕks ðlk bħθwaː ʕnh fj kl mkaːn  lknhm lm jd͡ʒdwh faðalika jawmaʔiiðin jawmun twklnaː rbnaː laː td͡ʒʕlnaː ftna llqwm aːlðˤaːlmjn ʔin aːsttˤʕt tʕaːl mʕnaː ʕalaaː aːlkaaːfirijna ʁajru jasijrin lqd ʔanhjnaː ʔakl tˤʕaːm aːlftˤwr lltw qaːl rb ʔinj ʔaχaːf ʔan jkðbwn kaːnt hnaːk tˤbqa ʕljk ʔan tħfðˤ hðh aːld͡ʒmla hʔulaːʔ aːlsˤbja jblʁwn sta ʕʃr ʕaːmaːan maaː ʔaaʁnaaː ʕanhu maaːluhu wamaaː kasaba man aːstasˤlaħa ʕaduwːahu zaaːda fij ʕadadihi ʔiʕtqdtu ʔanhu maːt kaːn lbd ʔan tχbrnj bʔaj ʃjʔ ʔinaː kðlk nd͡ʒzj aːlmħsnjn wakaθraau aːlχadami km mn sˤdjq ldjk ʕlaː aːlfjsbwk  kaːnt aːlklaːb tnbħ kl ljla wʔin d͡ʒaːdlwk fql aːllh ʔaʕlm bmaː tʕmlwn falajsa jaraaː aːlsˤːalaaːħa ʔilːaaː ʔiðaaː sˤalaħat lahu walaaː jad͡ʒidu aːlfasaaːda ʔilːaaː ʔiðaaː fasadat ʕalajhi ʔiinːa maʕa aːlʕusri jusranaː jbdw ʔan bʕdˤ aːlʔanaːs jtfqwn mʕk fftħnaː ʔabwaːb aːlsmaːʔ bmaːʔ mnhmr ʔiinːamaaː sultˤaaːnuhu ʕalaaː aːlːaðijna jatawalːawnahu waaːlːaðijna hum bihi muʃrikuwna hj ʔaklt aːltfaːħa ljkfrwaː bmaː ʔaːtjnaːhm wljtmtʕwaː fswf jʕlmwn waʔiinːaaː lanaħnu aːlmusabːiħuwna aːftħ fmk ʔasˤbħ ʕaːzf bjaːnw wasˤaħːaħa maaː ðakartu twm ʔaqtrħa ðalk baːlrwħ baːld͡ʒsd walakinːahu aːlqaaːsˤidu lidafʕi maaː jaridu ʕalajhi min faaːsidin ʔaaw sˤaħijħin jχaːdʕwn aːllh waːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wmaː jχdʕwn ʔilaː ʔanfshm wmaː jʃʕrwn fj hðaː aːlbld laː jzaːl hnaːk ʔanaːs jmʃwn bdwn ʔaħðja jrjd aːllh ʔan jχff ʕnkm wχlq aːlʔinsaːn dˤʕjfaː wajaχdaʕa bihi aːlʕuquwla aːlwaaːhijaaa ʔiinːahum jarawnahu baʕijdanaː ʔanaː laː ʃʔi bdwnk ʔanaː bχjr jaː ʔamːj kʁlj aːlħmjm ʔaðˤn ʔan mʃaːhda aːltlfzjwn hj mdˤjʕa llwqt aːftrq aːlzwd͡ʒaːn llʔabd ʔardt fqtˤ smaːʕ sˤwtk jaː ʔajhaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː ʔatˤjʕwaː aːllh wrswlh wlaː twlwaː ʕnh wʔantm tsmʕwn θm ʔinkm bʕd ðlk lmjtwn lm jχbrnj ʔaħd bwd͡ʒwdk hnaː faʔaamːaaː aːlʃːuruwtˤu aːlmaħsˤuwraau fijhi faθalaaːθaau ʃuruwtˤin waqaaːlat tˤaaːʔiifaaun ʔauχraaː ljlaː tbdw raːʔiʕa ʔaaʔiifkanaː ʔaːlihaaan duwna aːllːahi turijduwna hl ħd͡ʒzt lj tðaːkr aːltˤaːʔira lmn hðh aːlbjwt aːld͡ʒdjda d͡ʒazaaːʔan min rabːika ʕatˤaaːʔan ħisaaːbanaː ttsaːmaː fwq haːmi aːlʃuhubi sʔalth ʔin kaːn jʕrf ʔismj lm jsttˤʕ aːlftaː ʔan jd͡ʒd tˤrjq aːlχrwd͡ʒ mn aːlmtaːha wamaaː huwa ʔiilːaaː ðikrun lilʕaaːlamijna faaːdχuluwaː ʔaabwaaːba d͡ʒahanːama χaaːlidijna fijhaaː falabiʔisa maθwaaː aːlmutakabːirijna muð fatˤarahum ʕuqalaaːʔa waʔiinːahu ʕalaaː ðalika laʃahijdun jd͡ʒb ʔan ʔadˤbtˤ saːʕtj ʔinhaː btˤjʔia jsttˤjʕ ʔan jtklm aːljaːbaːnja ʔarjd ʔidˤaːfa bʕdˤ wabaʃijrun χdˤʕ zjd ldwra mkθfa hl swf nltqj ʁdaːan  fawajlun lilmusˤalːijna hðh btˤjχaːt hl ttħdθ aːllaːtfja  ʕlaː srr mtqaːbljn waman d͡ʒamaʕa bajna ridˤaaː aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː waridˤaaː aːlnːaaːsi faqad tamːat saʕaaːdatuhu waʕamːat niʕmatuhu jnbʁj ʔan tsˤlħ sjaːrtk qaːm twm bhðaː mʕ ʔaχjh jrħlwn w jbqaː ʔaθrhm  fkʔanhm ʕaːʃwaː bʕd ʔan maːtwaː lqd tzwd͡ʒth laː ʔaʕlm ʔajn jskn jmknhaː tħdθ aːljaːbaːnjːa maː zaːlt aːlkʕka fj aːlfrn wajlun lid͡ʒamːaaːʕi aːlqawli wajlun lilmusˤirːijna aːtːaχaðuwaː ʔaajmaaːnahum d͡ʒunːaaan fasˤadːuwaː ʕan sabijli aːllːahi ʔiinːahum saaːʔa maaː kaaːnuwaː jaʕmaluwna tksrt ʔanaːbjb aːlmjaːh waqaaːla ʕalijːu bnu ʔaabij tˤaaːlibin karːama aːllːahu wad͡ʒhahu nrjd ʔan ntħdθ mʕ twm waqawmu ʔiibraaːhijma waqawmu luwtˤin hl aːlqtˤa fwq aːlkrsj ʔam ʔasflh  hl hw jtħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja, aːlfrnsja ʔaw aːlʔalmaːnja wamaaː huwa ʕalaaː aːlʁajbi bidˤanijnin wjdχlhm aːld͡ʒna ʕrfhaː lhm walaaː jasˤudːanːakumu aːlʃːajtˤaaːnu ʔiinːahu lakum ʕaduwːun mubijnun smʕt tˤalabat mnj maːl rbħ twm rħla md͡ʒaːnja ʔilaː bwstˤn maː aːlðj jʕd͡ʒbk bʃʔanhaː ʔinh lʃrf lj ʔan ʔaltqj bk waliðalika qaaːla sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʃʕbj mħaː ðˤlm aːlsnjn waːldh ʔasˤbħ mrjdˤaːan baːlsrtˤaːn hl tʕrf maːðaː jkwn aːljwm " maː aːlðj ttħdθ ʕnhu" " ʔinhaː aːlðkraː aːlsnwja lzwaːd͡ʒnaː" waaːltːaʔaalːufu aːlsˤːaaːdiru ʕan aːlwafaaːʔi hj qlqa bʃʔan slaːmtk trd͡ʒʕwnhaː ʔin baːlʁθjaːn krm ʔaħsn tˤaːlb fj aːlmdrsa ʔanaː ldj d͡ʒaːra mslma kjf hj ʃqtk aːld͡ʒdjda  ʔaaw saʕaaː fijhi bifasaaːdin bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi waaːlsːamaaːʔi ðaaːti aːlburuwd͡ʒi hðh waʔaːtawuaː aːlzːakaaːaa faʔiiχwaaːnukum fij aːldːijni wanufasˤːilu aːlʔaːjaaːti liqawmin jaʕlamuwna ʔarjd aːlsjf biaːtːibaaːʕi aːlmajsuwri laː jwd͡ʒd ʔaħd fj aːlmnzl falamːaaː d͡ʒaaːʔathum ʔaːjaaːtunaaː mubsˤiraaan qaaːluwaː haðaaː siħrun mubijnun rbmaː jkwn ðlk sˤħjħaː rkbtj tʔulmnj wataħarːuzanaː min mukaaːʃafatihim waqaaːla aːbnu aːlmuʕtazːi aːlqarijbu biʕadaaːwatihi baʕijdun  waaːlbaʕijdu bimawadːatihi qarijbun wafirːa ʔilaaː aːllːahi walaaː tafirːa minhu waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami aːld͡ʒuwdu ʕan mawd͡ʒuwdin mnːaː jkrh ðlk laː ʔaħd kaːn jtwqʕ ðlk θmːa jursalu ʔilajhi kaːnt aːbtsaːmthaː tʃʕ ħbaː ʔinh mn mħbj aːlqtˤtˤ ʕlaː aːlrʁm mn ʔannj lm ʔakn ʔaħb aːlrjaːdˤjaːt kaːn ʕlji draːsa aːllwʁaːrjtmaːt wwqʕ aːlqwl ʕljhm bmaː ðˤlmwaː fhm laː jntˤqwn wʔiðaː qjl lhm aːlqdjma tqʕ fj ʃmaːl aːlmdjna aːlːaðij χalaqanij fahuwa jahdijni walaaː tˤaʕaaːmun ʔiilːaaː min ʁislijnin tklm bwdˤwħ ʔanaː laː ʔasˤdquki, ʔanti daːʔimaːan tkðbjn ʔaqraː sˤħjfaan laː jhmnj maː fatardˤaaː faqaaːluwaː ʔaabaʃaranaː minːaaː waaːħidanaː natːabiʕuhu ʔiinːaaː ʔiiðanaː lafij dˤalaaːlin wasuʕurin fjmaː ʕdaː ʔajaːm aːld͡ʒmʕa  fʔin twm daːʔimaːan maː jrtdj rbtˤa ʕnqin ʔilaː aːlʕml hl ʔaʕd͡ʒbaka aːlʔaakl aːllħm ʁaːlj aːlθmn wahaðaaː ʔaakmalu ʔaaħwaaːli ʔaahli aːldːijni  waʔaafdˤalu sˤifaaːti aːlmutːaqijna laaː tubqij walaaː taðaru fj sdr mχdˤwd wʔibraːhjm ʔið qaːl lqwmh aːʕbdwaː fadˤaaːʔiiluhu aːstmr  straː aːlbnk ʕlaː jsaːrk ʕn ʔabj ʕbdi aːlrːaħmni ʕbdi aːllhi bni msʕwdin radˤij aːllhu ʕanhu qaːla: ʔajn mdχl aːlmtħf  waaːfraʁ min zaaːdik ʔiinːa aːlːaðijna tadʕuwna min duwni aːllːahi ʕibaaːdun ʔaamθaaːlukum faaːdʕuwhum faljastad͡ʒijbuwaː lakum ʔiin kuntum sˤaaːdiqijna walaqad taraknaaː minhaaː ʔaːjaaan bajːinaaan liqawmin jaʕqiluwna twqːf saːmj d͡ʒaːnbaː aːsmj mʕrwf ldaː aːlkaːfrjn waːlmnaːfqjn wdʕ ʔaðaːhm wtwkl ʕlaː aːllh wkfaː baːllh wkjlaː kaːnt tumtˤr bʁzaːra fqrrnaː aːlbqaːʔ fj aːlmnzl fqaːl ʔinj sqjm maː ʔaʃhdthm χlq aːlsmaːwaːt waːlʔardˤ wlaː χlq ʔanfshm wmaː knt mtχð aːlmdˤljn ʕdˤdaː fawaswasa ʔiilajhi aːlʃːajtˤaaːnu qaaːla jaaː ʔaːdamu hal ʔaadulːuka ʕalaaː ʃad͡ʒaraai aːlχuldi wamulkin laaː jablaaː faaːd͡ʒtamaʕa fijhaaː ʔaasbaaːbu aːlʔaulfaai wamawaaːdːu ʔanaː ʔaʕtqd ʔan aːlħb ʁjr mwd͡ʒwd ʔilaː aːlðjn taːbwaː mn bʕd ðlk wʔasˤlħwaː fʔin aːllh ʁfwr rħjm ʔan d͡ʒaːʔh aːlʔaʕmaː laː ʔaħb hðh aːlmdjna ʕlaː aːlʔitˤlaːq jaquwlu aːlʔiinsaaːnu jawmaʔiiðin ʔaajna ʕddt aːlj mʔitaːn ʔawlʔik ʕlaː hdaː mn rbhm wʔawlʔik hm aːlmflħwn qaːl aːlmlʔa aːlðjn kfrwaː mn qwmh ʔinaː lnraːk fj sfaːha wʔinaː lnðˤnk mn aːlkaːðbjn waqifuwhum ʔiinːahum masʔiuwluwna twm hw sˤdjq waʔaahlahu mina aːlkarbi aːlʕaðˤijmi waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlmulku jabqaaː ʕalaaː aːlkufri walaaː jabqaaː ʕalaaː aːlðˤːulmi fwsws ʔiljh aːlʃjtˤaːn qaːl jaː ʔaːdm hl ʔadlk ʕlaː ʃd͡ʒra aːlχld wmlk laː jblaː ʔinhm kaːnwaː ʔiðaː qjl lhm laː ʔilh ʔilaː aːllh jstkbrwn twm ʔibtsm aːlmulku jawmaʔiiðin lilːahi jaħkumu bajnahum faaːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aːlsˤːaaːliħaaːti fij d͡ʒanːaaːti aːlnːaʕijmi waaːltːarku lahu d͡ʒahlun jdˤaːʕf lh aːlʕðaːb jwm aːlqjaːma wjχld fjh mhaːnaː aːlbnk jkwn mʁlqaːan ʔajaːm aːlsbt saʔaurhiquhu sˤaʕuwdanaː klaː lw tʕlmwn ʕlm aːljqjn jaquwlu ʔaahlaktu maaːlanaː lubadanaː aːlklb lʕq χdhaː ʔaʃtqtu lki ʔaχbrthaː bmaː kaːn jfʕlh fj ʁrfthaː min fadˤli ʕilmik aːstiqlaaːluk liʕilmik laː ħwl wlaː qwa aːlaː baːllh hl bʔimkaːnk mʕrfa ʕmrj  qd mddnaː lk jaː aːltˤfl baːlʔamaːn bjn ðraːʕj ʔamh kdnaː ʔan nmwt mn aːlbrd waʔiinːij ʕuðtu birabːij warabːikum ʔaan tard͡ʒumuwni wamaaː juʁnij ʕanhu maaːluhu ʔiiðaaː taradːaaː twm ldjh mnaːʕa laː jwd͡ʒd ʔaj klb ʔaːχr ʔakbr mn ðlk aːdˤtˤr llʕjʃ fqjraː lsnwaːt ʕda aːftħ fmk wʔaʁlq ʕjnjk jnbʁj ʔan tqrʔa ktbanaː mʃaːbhaan ʔið ʔanhaː naːfʕa lk wmdˤjt nħw aːlqma sʔawsˤlk ʔilaː aːlmtˤaːr hl tsmħ lj baːlðhaːb aːlʔaːn  ʔant bjdˤaːʔ kaːlwrq kaːnt sˤwfjaː ʃrha kaːn wd͡ʒh twm mθjraː d͡ʒdːaː llʃːfqa kl ʃjʔi sjtʁjr aːlmnzl ldjhi θlaːθa tˤwaːbq qaaːluwaː jaaː wajlanaaː ʔiinːaaː kunːaaː tˤaaːʁijna kaːnw klhm fj hj d͡ʒmltk aːlmfdˤla  ln ʔaktb rsaːla baːlʔind͡ʒljzja ʔanaː bħaːd͡ʒa ʔilaː sjaːra twm maːrj tsaːʕd ʔaumːhaː sʔaðhb ʔilaː ʔaθjnaː sـaːlimaːan muـnaـʕaːـmaːan waʁaaːnimaːan mukaraːmanaː sـaːlimaːan muـnaـʕaːـmaːan waʁaːnimaːan mukaraːmanaː hـــــl ʔaraːk fـj ʕuـــlaːk lqd ʁaːdr twm ʔant tmzħ θumːa jakuwnu min baʕdi ðalika saaːʔiisanaː linafsihi mudabːiranaː lahaaː fij ħaaːli taʕalːumihi hðaː maħabːatahu tataχalːalu aːlqalba falaaː tadaʕu fijhi χalalanaː ʔilːaaː malaʔaathu qaːl qd ʔad͡ʒjbt dʕwtkmaː faːstqjmaː wlaː ttbʕaːn sbjl aːlðjn laː jʕlmwn qulhaː faː aːlʔind͡ʒljzja lw kaːn ldj maːl bʔimkaːnk aːlʔimdˤaːʔ mn fdˤlk  d͡ʒda sjbaːstjaːn kaːnt mn ʔawl aːlnsaːʔ aːllwaːtj tqldn mnsˤb qaːdˤja fj naːfaːraː jrd͡ʒaː ʔan tqfl aːlbaːb ʕnd mʁaːdrtk ʔarjd aːltdljk ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː aːlaːstrχaːʔ ʔadˤʕt tˤrjqj jqʕ mtˤʕmnaː baːlqrb mn mħtˤa aːlħaːflaːt aːld͡ʒnwbja ʔaaw tusqitˤa aːlsːamaaːʔa kamaaː zaʕamta ʕalajnaaː kisafanaː ʔaaw taʔatija biaːllːahi waaːlmalaaːʔiikaai qabijlanaː waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlbulaʁaaːʔi musˤaaːramaaun qabla aːχtibaaːrin  ʔaafdˤalu min muʔuaaːχaaːain ʕalaaː aːʁtiraaːrin hl tʕrf maː aːðaː kaːn jmkn ʔan jʔatj aːljnaː ʁdaːan lam jaslam biqalbihi min aːlħaðari minhu faʔaamːaaː aːliaːnqijaaːdu fahuwa ʔaan tusriʕa ʔilaaː aːlrːuʃdi ʔiðaaː ʔaamarahaaː ʔaħb aːlʔind͡ʒljzja ʔakθr mn aːlrjaːdˤjaːt ʔarjduk ʔan td͡ʒrːb ðlika jħb twm kʕka aːlʔanaːnaːs aːlmqlwba kθjraː aːlskwt ʕlaːma ʕn aːlrdˤaː krrt lhaː aːlklma ʕda mraːt wataʕtaqidu ʔaanːa aːlʕaaːqila muħaaːrafun liwaħʃaai aːnfiraaːdihi wamahaaːnaai waħdatihi wsˤl aːlqtˤaːr mtʔaχraː ʕʃr dqaːʔiq ʔasˤaːbh aːlsˤlʕ fj ʃbaːbh qaːl faːhbtˤ mnhaː fmaː jkwn lk ʔan ttkbr fjhaː faːχrd͡ʒ ʔink mn aːlsˤaːʁrjn aːnaː aːħaːwl fqtˤ kʃf aːlħqjqa lm jkـn ʔaj ʔaħـd hnـــaːk maː mn mkaːn lsaːmj fj hðaː aːlmnzl jaː ʔahl aːlktaːb lm tlbswn aːlħq baːlbaːtˤl wtktmwn aːlħq wʔantm tʕlmwn ljs lhðh aːlbnaːja mχrd͡ʒ lltˤwaːrʔi aːlðjn jblʁwn rsaːlaːt aːllh wjχʃwnh wlaː jχʃwn ʔaħdaː ʔilaː aːllh wkfaː baːllh ħsjbaː qjl aːdχlwaː ʔabwaːb d͡ʒhnm χaːldjn fjhaː fbʔis mθwaː aːlmtkbrjn mʔulf aːlktaːb lsaːth sˤʁjr baːlʕmr brʔajk lkam mn aːlwqt jsttˤjʕ twm ħbs nfash ? maː ʁrdˤk fj zjaːra hðaː aːlbld jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlnːaaːsu ʔaantumu aːlsraːwjl aːlswdaːʔ w hðh aːlʔaqmsˤa aːlħmraːʔ  aːlːaðijna hum ʕalaaː sˤalaaːtihim daaːʔiimuwna fkjf ʔiðaː twfthm aːlmlaːʔika jdˤrbwn wd͡ʒwhhm wʔadbaːrhm tˤlʕhaː kʔanh rʔws aːlʃjaːtˤjn walaaː taquwlanːa liʃajʔin ʔiinːij faaːʕilun ðalika ʁadanaː aːlθwm w aːlbsˤl ʕlaːd͡ʒjn fʕaːljn llzkaːm aːlʕaːdj ħaːwl maːkljlaːn ʔan jtˤmʔin ljnkwln ʔiin taħrisˤ ʕalaaː hudaaːhum faʔiinːa aːllːaha laaː jahdij man judˤilːu wamaaː lahum min naaːsˤirijna mn aːlʔafdˤl ʔan nʕwd ʔilaː aːlbjt bdlaː mn aːlaːntðˤaːr hnaː laː ʔaħd hnaː jʕrf hjʔia twm wʔan ʕðaːbj hw aːlʕðaːb aːlʔaljm ʔaaw fardˤin ʔaadːaaːhu faqad tanqasimu ʔaaħwaaːlu man daχala fij ʕadadi aːlʔiiχwaaːni ʔaarbaʕaau ʔaaqsaaːmin tmt tbrʔith mn kl msʔuwlja waqaaːmat ʕalajk ħud͡ʒːatuhu fbʃrnaːh bʁlaːm ħljm kjfmaː saːʔt ħaːlthaː  fhj tʕml daːʔimaːan aːʃtrjta aːltˤʕaːm  fʔin aːʃtrjtu ʔanaː aːlχmra fsnkwn mtʕaːdljn jawmaʔiiðin tuħadːiθu ʔaaχbaaːrahaaː hl trʁb bbjdˤa mslwqa fj aːlftˤwr qbʕaːt aːlnsaːʔ ʁaːlja ʔaan jakuwna limuwaaːdˤaʕaain juħjija aːlmawtaaː ʔanaː ʔaraː ʔanka fhmt kaːfkaː bʃkl sˤħjħ, rbmaː ʔafdˤl mn fhmhi lnfsh waʔaamːaaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aːlsˤːaaːliħaaːti fajuwafːijhim ʔaud͡ʒuwrahum waaːllːahu laaː fʕl  wmn d͡ʒaːhd fʔinmaː jd͡ʒaːhd lnfsh ʔin aːllh lʁnj ʕn aːlʕaːlmjn ʔaatabnuwna bikulːi rijʕin ʔaːjaaan taʕbaθuwna sʔatd͡ʒnb aːlʔanfaːq qdr aːlmsttˤaːʕ aːħb aːn aːχbz maː ʃaːʔ aːllh waqad qaaːlat ʔan jstfzhm mn aːlʔardˤ fʔaʁrqnaːh wmn mʕh d͡ʒmjʕaː aːlðˤlm mrtʕh wχjm ʔin aːlmtqjn fj d͡ʒnaːt wnhr χatama aːllːahu ʕalaaː quluwbihim waʕalaaː samʕihim waʕalaaː ʔaabsˤaaːrihim ʁiʃaaːwaaun walahum ʕaðaaːbun ʕaðˤijmun waʔaaqijmuwaː aːlwazna biaːlqistˤi walaaː tuχsiruwaː aːlmijzaaːna wad͡ʒamʕuhum θubuwranaː man  waluwtˤanaː ʔiið qaaːla liqawmihi ʔaataʔatuwna aːlfaaːħiʃaaa waʔaantum tubsˤiruwna fj bjwt ʔaðn aːllh ʔan trfʕ wjðkr fjhaː aːsmh jsbħ lh fjhaː baːlʁdw waːlʔaːsˤaːl waʕad͡ʒibt liman ʔaajqana biaːlqadari θumːa jatʕabu waaːlmuqilːu min aːlʔiiχwaaːni aːlmutaχajːiru lahum kaaːalːaðij waaːlsˤːabru ʕalaaː sˤuħbatihim karukuwbi aːlbaħri faʔaaχaðathumu aːlsˤːajħaau muʃriqijna qul ʔiinːamaaː ʔaunðirukum biaːlwaħji walaaː jasmaʕu aːlsˤːumːu aːldːuʕaaːʔa ʔiiðaaː maaː junðaruwna lmaːðaː tantahi jaaː luwtˤu latakuwnanːa mina aːlmuχrad͡ʒijna ʔablʁkm rsaːlaːt rbj wʔansˤħ lkm wʔaʕlm mn aːllh maː laː tʕlmwn bwb ʔaʕrb ʕn klmaːt aːlʃkr njaːba ʕn zmlaːʔih fj aːlsˤf aːlːaðijna junfiquwna fij aːlsːarːaaːʔi waaːldˤːarːaaːʔi waaːlkaaːðˤimijna aːlʁajðˤa waaːlʕaaːfijna ʕani aːlnːaaːsi waaːllːahu juħibːu aːlmuħsinijna ʃkraːan lka hl jmknk ʔan tʕtˤj tqrjraːan kaːmlaːan ħwl maː ħdθ  zaːr rʔijsu faʔiinːahu maaː ʔaaħadun jaʕdamu ʕaduwːanaː walaaː jafqidu ħaaːsidanaː ʔataː mnːaːd ʔilaː mnzlj ʔaðhb ʔilj aːlʕml fj aːlsaːʕa aːlsaːbʕa ltˤaːlmaː ʔaħbbtk faʔiinːa ʔid͡ʒaaːbatahaaː tusriʕu ʔanti wsˤlti mbkraːan d͡ʒdaːan hl bʔimkaːnk ʔan tʕtˤjnj dqjqa ʔarjd ʔan ʔaqwl lk ʃjʔiaː aːlmaːʔ mhm d͡ʒdaː aːlːaðij ʔaatˤʕamahum mːin d͡ʒuwʕin waʔaːmanahum mːin χawfin kraːmaː kaːtbjn fʕl saːmj klː maː bwsʕh kj musˤliħaaan lahum waʔaarʃadahu ʔilajhaaː biaːlfatˤinaai aːlːaðijna jukaðːibuwna bijawmi aːldːijni ramــــــzunaː ramــــــzunaː maـd͡ʒdunaː wʕـhdunaː wwaːd͡ʒـbun mna aːlwafaː ʔaskn fj bld ʔawrwbj ʕn ʔabj jaʕlaaː ʃadːaaːdi bni ʔaawsin radˤij aːllhu ʕanhu aːlftjaːt jrjdwn fqtˤ aːlħsˤwl ʕlaː aːlmtʕa ʔam llʔinsaːn maː tmnaː waʔaasˤlu aːlzːuhdi aːlrːahbaau waθamaratuhu aːlʕibaaːdaau faʔiiðaaː aːqtarana aːlzːuhdu waaːlʕilmu faqad tamːat aːlsːaʕaaːdaau waʕamːat aːlfadˤijlaau ʔiðaː lm tkn fj sˤfnaː fsnʕdk mn ʔaʕdaːʔinaː daːʔimaː ʔaʁsl wd͡ʒhj baːlsˤaːbwn waːlmaːʔ wmn dwnki ħtmaːan qlbj jnthj faʔaamːaaː aːllːaaːzimu fahuwa aːlʔaanafaau lilʔaːbaaːʔi min tahadˤːumin ʔaaw χumuwlin maθalu aːldːunjaaː waaːlʔaːχiraai maθalu dˤarːatajni ʔin ʔaardˤajt ʔiħdaaːhumaaː ʔaasχatˤt aːlʔauχraaː jd͡ʒib ʔan tfkr fj ʕaːʔiltka qaaːla ʔiin kunta d͡ʒiʔita biʔaːjaain faʔati bihaaː ʔiin kunta mina aːlsˤːaaːdiqijna ʔanti ldjki ʔanf kbjr faʔaamːaaː maʕa faqdi aːlʔaaʕwaaːni faʕalaaː aːlʔiinsaaːni aːlkafːu ljwm ʕðˤjm waqaaːla aːlmalaʔau aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː min qawmihi laʔiini aːtːabaʕtum ʃuʕajbanaː ʔiinːakum ʔiiðanaː laχaaːsiruwna tˤbʕaːan fasabːiħ biħamdi rabːika waaːstaʁfirhu ʔiinːahu kaaːna tawːaaːbanaː aːltdχjn jqtl faʔiinːa ʔaaħadakum laaː jadrij mataaː jaħtaaːd͡ʒu ʔilajhi ʔaaw mataaː jaħtaaːd͡ʒu ʔilaaː maaː ʕindahu wjqwlwn mtaː hðaː aːlwʕd ʔin kntm sˤaːdqjn lmaːðaː thaːd͡ʒr aːltˤjwr waʔiiðaaː raʔaawka ʔiin jatːaχiðuwnaka ʔiilːaaː huzuwanaː ʔaahaðaaː aːlːaðij baʕaθa aːllːahu rasuwlanaː waːlnaːʃtˤaːt nʃtˤaː aːtbʕ maː ʔawħj ʔiljk mn rbk laː ʔilh ʔilaː hw wʔaʕrdˤ ʕn aːlmʃrkjn qaaːluwaː famaaː d͡ʒdaː fj lwħ mħfwðˤ aːsˤmt rizqanaː lilʕibaaːdi waʔaaħjajnaaː bihi baldaaan majtanaː kaðalika aːlχuruwd͡ʒu qaːl rb ʔin qwmj kðbwn qaaːla laqad kuntum ʔaantum waʔaːbaaːʔuukum fij dˤalaaːlin mubijnin laaː tasubːuwhaaː faʔiinːahaaː ʕamːarat bilaaːda aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː faʕaaːʃa fijhaaː ʕibaaːdu aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː ʔanaː ʔaːsf  wlkn hðaː lm jʕd mtaːħaːan qum bzjaːrtnaː ʁdaːan hl sbq lk ʔan rʔajt smka qrʃ jzjd tˤwlhaː ʕn θlaːθa ʔamtaːr nħn fj aːlχrjf aːlʔaːn waːlʔardˤ ðaːt aːlsˤdʕ hl ʔant mtzwd͡ʒa faʔiiðaaː nazala bisaaːħatihim fasaaːʔa sˤabaaːħu aːlmunðarijna kjfa ʕlmtji maː kaːnt trjdhu ʔanti jmknki daːʔimaːan aːlnwm ʕlaː ʔarjktj hlaː ʔarjtnj rχsˤtk  tˤalabu aːlʔiinsˤaaːfi min qilːaai aːlʔiinsˤaaːfi taʁlijbanaː lildːijni ʕalaaː aːlnːasabi watˤaaːʕaai aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː ʕalaaː tˤaaːʕaai aːlʔaabi ljs ldj dljl wlʔin ʔaðqnaːh nʕmaːʔ bʕd dˤraːʔ msth ljqwln ðhb aːlsjʔiaːt ʕnj ʔinh lfrħ fχwr wʔiðaː msh aːlχjr mnwʕaː mfaːqmaː bðlk aːlmsaːfa aːltj jd͡ʒb ʔan jqtˤʕhaː aːlfwtwn ljsˤl ʔiljnaː ʔinhu mzʕd͡ʒ ʔaraː tˤaːʔiraːan ʕlaː aːlʃd͡ʒra waaːlsːaqfi aːlmarfuwʕi χajrun min ʔaalfin fij kutubik faʔiiðaaː qaraʔata aːlqurʔaːna faaːstaʕið biaːllːahi mina aːlʃːajtˤaaːni aːlrːad͡ʒijmi waqad qaaːla aːlkindijːu aːlsˤːadijqu ʔinsaaːnun huwa ʔaanta ʔilːaaː ʔaanːahu ʁajruk liʔaanːa aːlʕud͡ʒba naqsˤun junaaːfij aːlfadˤla laaː sijːamaaː maʕa qawli aːlnːabijːi sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʔiilaaː ʕiziː tuwnis ʔiilaaː mad͡ʒdihaaː rid͡ʒaaːlu aːlbilaaːdi waʃubaːaːnuhaaː qaːlwaː ʔard͡ʒh wʔaχaːh waːbʕθ fj aːlmdaːʔin ħaːʃrjn waqaaːla ʕalijːun karːama aːllːahu wad͡ʒhahu liaːbnihi aːlħasani aːsˤbʕj aːlsˤʁjr mtwrm ʕalaaː waaːsˤilihaaː faqaaːla taʕaaːlaaː ʔaraːd twm aːstdʕaːʔ aːlʃrtˤa  wlkn maːrj lm tsmħ lh ʔauχtj tˤaːbiʕa d͡ʒjda d͡ʒdaːan bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi sabːiħi aːsma rabːika aːlʔaaʕlaaː ʔiinːaka majːitun waʔiinːahum majːituwna qad χalat min qablikum sunanun fasijruwaː fij aːlʔaardˤi faaːnðˤuruwaː kajfa kaaːna ʕaaːqibaau aːlmukaðːibijna aːlraːʔiħa mn mmjzaːt aːlθwm waːtbʕ maː jwħaː ʔiljk waːsˤbr ħtaː jħkm aːllh whw χjr aːlħaːkmjn hw laː jdrs aːlʔind͡ʒljzja aːlʔaːn waðalika qad jakuwnu bisˤunuwfin min aːlbirːi wajaχtalifu bisababi aːχtilaaːfi aːlʔaaħwaaːli hl tʔaðnjn lj baːldχwl  " nʕm  baːltˤbʕ " maː aːlðj jraːhu fjhaː  qrːr saːmj bjʕ mnzlh aːlsmka trjd ʔan tsbħ ʔanaː baːlfʕl ðhbt ʔilaː mħl aːld͡ʒzaːr hðaː aːlsˤbaːħ aːlqtˤ jnaːm ʕlaː aːltˤaːwla faʔaanta ʔiðanaː min ʔiχwaaːni aːlʃːajaaːtˤijni ʔinhu jsttˤjʕ ʔan jfʕl hðaː ʔafdˤl mnj walihaðaaː qijla aːltːaθabːutu waaːliaːrtijaaːʔu  wamudaaːwamaau aːliaːχtijaaːri waaːliaːbtilaaːʔu  mutaʕaðːirun bal mafquwdun stqwm bðlk ʔin dfʕt lhaː aːlθmn hl tʕlm km aːlwqt aːlʔan fj bwstˤn lhðh aːlqsˤːa nhaːja ħzjna sʔatˤlq aːlnaːr ʕljh ʔanti laː jmknki tħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja, hl jmknki  ʔanta qd laː turjd fiʕl ðlk laː jhmnj waaːlʃːud͡ʒaaːʕaau waaːsitˤaaun bajna aːltːaqaħːumi waaːld͡ʒubni bχjl hðaː aːltˤfl jstħq hdja wamina aːllːajli fasabːiħhu waʔiidbaaːra aːlnːud͡ʒuwmi ħdθt ʕnh butˤwn aːlktbi hl tħtaːd͡ʒ ħqaː lklb ʔidˤaːfj  wlaː jsʔal ħmjm ħmjmaː mnaːχnaː jtʁjr qad saʔaalahaaː qawmun min qablikum θumːa ʔaasˤbaħuwaː bihaaː kaaːfirijna faaːltːawaaːdˤuʕu wamud͡ʒaaːnabaau aːlʕud͡ʒbi hl trjdjn aːlχrwd͡ʒ mʕj aːlljla  ðhb ħsn ʔilaː aːlmdrsa stuχtbr braːʔth fj aːlwqt aːlmnaːsb wqaːlt lʔaχth qsˤjh fbsˤrt bh ʕn d͡ʒnb whm laː jʃʕrwn wʔinj mrsla ʔiljhm bhdja fnaːðˤra bm jrd͡ʒʕ aːlmrslwn hl maːzlta trjd ʃaːjaːan ʔarjd ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilaː aːlmdjna ʕn ʔabj hrjraa radˤij aːllhu ʕanhu qaːla: qaːla rswlu aːllhi sˤalːaaː aːllhu ʕalajhi wasalːama: hnaːk sbʕa ʔajaːm fj aːlʔasbwʕ faʔiinːa fij ðalika kufranaː liniʕmatihi ʔajmknk mlaːħðˤa aːlfrq lqd ʔarsltu ʔiljka brjdaːan ʔilktrwnjaːan laː faːʔida mn mħaːwla ħl hðh aːlmsʔala laːjmkn ʔan tħkm ʕljh mn mðˤhrh laː tbqj wlaː tðr wmaː ʔasˤaːbkm jwm aːltqaː aːld͡ʒmʕaːn fbʔiðn aːllh wljʕlm aːlmʔumnjn wjmkrwn wjmkr aːllh waːllh χjr aːlmaːkrjn wqaːlwaː ʔaʔaːlhtnaː χjr ʔam hw maː dˤrbwh lk ʔilaː d͡ʒdlaː bl hm qwm χsˤmwn kaːn ðlk aːlktaːb mθjraːan fmaːlʔiwn mnhaː aːlbtˤwn fkðb wʕsˤaː walaaː ʔaanaaː ʕaaːbidun maaː ʕabadtum ʔin aːlqaːʔima kmaː jlj wslaːm ʕlaː aːlmrsljn maaː baaːluk takrahu aːlwalada  faqaaːla qul ʔaaðalika χajrun ʔaam d͡ʒanːaau aːlχuldi aːlːatij wuʕida aːlmutːaquwna kaaːnat lahum d͡ʒazaaːʔan wamasˤijranaː ʔawʔamn ʔahl aːlqraː ʔan jʔatjhm bʔasnaː dˤħaː whm jlʕbwn lm tkn fj aːlmzaːd͡ʒ aːlmnaːsb llktb aːld͡ʒaːda hðaː hw aːlfrq bjnj wbjnk fatanaaːzaʕuwaː ʔaamrahum bajnahum waʔaasarːuwaː aːlnːad͡ʒwaaː wamin ʔaasbaaːbi aːltːaqsˤijri ʔaajdˤanaː ʔaan jaʁfula ʕan aːltːaʕalːumi fij aːlsˤːiʁari ln ʔatwqːf ʕn aːlbħθ ħtːaː ʔad͡ʒd twm nwʕ mn aːlχbz trjd ʔaklh mn fdˤlk ʁaːdr ħaːlaːan man radˤija bisˤuħbaai man laaː χajra fijhi lam jardˤa bisˤuħbatihi man fijhi χajrun waħadːaθa aːlħasanu aːlbasˤrijːu biħadijθin faqaaːla lahu rad͡ʒulun hl ʔanaː fuzt bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi qul ʔaaʕuwðu birabːi aːlnːaaːsi lmn hðh aːlmðˤla  wʔin rbk hw jħʃrhm ʔinh ħkjm ʕljm ʔanaː mn zaːmbjaː knaː d͡ʒmjʕanaː nʃk fjh aːχtft draːd͡ʒtj ʔama tbnj bʕzm laː jljn ʕfwaːan, bdwn aːlwsaːbj, mn fdˤlk waqaaːla wahbu bnu munabːihin ʔanaː ʔabħθ ʕn aːlʔad͡ʒbaːn qaːla: maaː aːlmasʔuuwlu ʕanhaː biʔaaʕlama mina aːlsːaaːʔiili ʔant laː tnsˤt faʔiin aːstadaaːma aːlsːababu daaːmat aːlʔaulfaau qaːl rb aːʃrħ lj sˤdrj θm ʔaχðt aːlðjn kfrwaː fkjf kaːn nkjr km mn mra ðhbt  mn aːld͡ʒna waːlnaːs ʔinh jʃm raːʔiħa aːlħsaːʔ llðjn jʔulwn mn nsaːʔihm trbsˤ ʔarbʕa ʔaʃhr fʔin faːʔwaː fʔin aːllh ʁfwr rħjm kl maː kaːn jrjdh twm ħqaːan kaːn kʔasaːan mn aːlmaːʔ ʔanaː qlq bʃʔan ntjd͡ʒa tħljl aːldm wʔin kaːnwaː ljqwlwn mnːaːd smjn tˤwkjw hj qrja kbjra klaː bl tħbwn aːlʕaːd͡ʒla fanad͡ʒːajnaaːhu waʔaahlahu ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna aːlħjaːa aːlrjfja hj aːlʔakθr hdwʔanan mqaːrnaan bħjaːa aːlmdjna fltkn jaː ʕmaːn nħnu mn ʕhdi aːlnbj ʔaaħaduhumaaː ʔauχuwːaaun muktasabaaun biaːliaːtːifaaːqi aːld͡ʒaaːrij mad͡ʒraaː aːliaːdˤtˤiraaːri flmaː qdˤaːh bʕd sta ʔaʃhr qdˤaːh drhmjn wθlaːθ ħbaːt ʃʕjr mn zrʕ ħsˤd qaːl fmaː χtˤbkm ʔajhaː aːlmrslwn ʔin lkm fjh lmaː tχjrwn ʔin ʃaːʔ aːllh sunːaaa man qad ʔaarsalnaaː qablaka min rusulinaaː walaaː tad͡ʒidu lisunːatinaaː taħwijlanaː wkaːn jʔamr ʔahlh baːlsˤlaːa waːlzkaːa wkaːn ʕnd rbh mrdˤjaː waʔiiðaaː quriʔia aːlqurʔaːnu faaːstamiʕuwaː lahu waʔaansˤituwaː laʕalːakum turħamuwna fʔin twlwaː fʔin aːllh ʕljm baːlmfsdjn faqalːa bihaðaaː aːltːaʕlijli ʔiχwaaːnu ʔaahli aːlfadˤli liqilːatihim ħkm ʕljh aːlqaːdˤj baːlʔiʕdaːm lnʕud qbl ʔan tumtˤr kjf tʕrfnj  sʔal naːθaːnjjl ʔiinːahu fakːara waqadːara ʔaraːd twm mʕrfa maː ʔin kaːn limaːrj ħbjb wʔiðaː mrdˤt fhw jʃfjn ʔanaː ʔaħb aːllʁa aːlʔind͡ʒljzja ʔakθr mn aːlrjaːdˤjaːt waqad qaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi laː ʔatˤjq aːlsˤbr ħtaː ʔaraː aːlnsχa aːld͡ʒdjda mn ttwjbaː nʕm aːlmʔuadːibu aːldhr laː jʔatjh aːlbaːtˤl mn bjn jdjh wlaː mn χlfh tnzjl mn ħkjm ħmjd ʔanaː nsjt aːsm ʔaχwk, maː aːsmuhu wataaːllːahi laʔaakijdanːa ʔaasˤnaaːmakum baʕda ʔaan tuwalːuwaː mudbirijna laː ʔaurjd ʔan ʔatħdθ ʕnhaː lqd tðˤaːhr ʔanh laː jsmʕnj ʔafdˤl ħaːljaː qraːʔa ktb aːlmsaːʕda aːlðaːtja waʔiimːaaː ʔaan jakuwna liʕilːaain fij aːlsːaaːmiʕi aːlmustaχrid͡ʒi ʔam jqwlwn aːftraːh ql ʔin aːftrjth fʕlj ʔid͡ʒraːmj wʔanaː brjʔ mmaː td͡ʒrmwn wamaaː ʔaadraaːka maaː aːlʕaqabaau liman ʃaaːʔ minkum mtʕbaːan tχaːf aːlħjwaːnaːt mn aːlnaːr ʔajn ʔaqrb sˤjdlja  walaqad kuntum tamanːawna aːlmawta min qabli ʔaan talqawhu faqad raʔaajtumuwhu waʔaantum tanðˤuruwna aːnhaːrt aːlʔardˤja wzrwʕ wmqaːm krjm θm ʕbs wbsr lm ʔakn ʔarjd ʔan tʁaːdrjnj wamustakθiranaː lilnːaqijsˤaai fijhi lijantahija ʕanhaaː kl mn ʕljhaː faːnin  mnːaːd wsjm ʔarslthaː baːlbrjd hw sχj bʔamwaːlh hl jwd͡ʒd ʔaj ʃʔi muhim ʔaħbː ðwq aːlftˤr man juʔuamːilu jaaː muħamːadu ʔaaqraʔat maaː fijhaaː  faqult mn aːlsˤʕb aːn tħb ʔaħdaː ʕndmaː laː tʕlm ʔin kaːn jħbk mθlmaː tħbh htlr wld wnʃʔa fj aːlnmsaː aːlħdjθ aːlχaːms ʕʃr: ʔikraːm aːldˤjf hal ʔaataaːka ħadijθu dˤajfi ʔiibraaːhijma aːlmukramijna wʔin lh ʕndnaː lzlfaː wħsn mʔaːb nzl ʕljk aːlktaːb baːlħq msˤdqaː lmaː bjn jdjh wʔanzl aːltwraːa waːlʔind͡ʒjl hl kaːnt aːlnd͡ʒwm aːlbdaːʔija qwja kfaːja lʔiħdaːθ ʔiʕaːda tʔajːn aːlkwn bʔimkaːn aːlklmaːt ʔan tkwn ʃfaːfa ʔaw ʁaːmdˤa kaːn saːmj hw mn aːrtkb aːld͡ʒrjma sˤdjqj jnbʁj ʔan jkwn fj aːlmnzl aːlʔan taqadam tʃtmː mnh aːlsmjʕ aːlʕljm ʔinmaː ntˤʕmkm lwd͡ʒh aːllh laː nrjd mnkm d͡ʒzaːʔ wlaː ʃkwraː waʔaanːa ʔidraaːkahu badijʕun muʕd͡ʒizun aːnt laː tħbnj wasˤuħbaau aːlʔaaħmaqi ʃuʔumun wahaðihi aːlʔaumuwru laaː juwsˤalu biʁajri aːldːijni ʔilajhaaː  walaaː jasˤluħu aːlnːaaːsu ʔilːaaː ʕalajhaaː klaː waːlqmr waːtrk aːlbħr rhwaː ʔinhm d͡ʒnd mʁrqwn wabiħasabi wufuwrihaaː fijhi jad͡ʒibu ʔaan jakuwna aːlmajlu ʔilajhi waaːlθːiqaau bihi ljtmknwaː mn aːlaːχtjaːr bʃkl sˤħjħ ʔaaw juħibːu aːliaːtːisaaːma biaːlʃːahaaːdaai fajataʕalːamu kitaaːba aːlʃːahaaːdaaːti fajasˤijru mawsuwmanaː bid͡ʒahli maaː juʕaaːnij waʔiiðaaː kaaːna maaː χarad͡ʒa ʕan aːliaːʕtidaaːli ʔilaaː maaː lajsa ktbt rsaːla lʔamj fahaðaaː juwadˤːiħu taʕlijla maaː fij aːlmaʕaaːnij min aːlʔaasbaaːbi aːlmaaːniʕaai min fahmihaaː hj tˤaːlba waʔaaðinat lirabːihaaː waħuqːat lndʕ aːlħdjθ ʕn hðh aːlmsʔala lwqt ʔaːχr bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm hl ʔataːk ħdjθ aːlʁaːʃja litadwi aːlsaːmaaːwaaːt biraʕdihaaː litarmi aːlsˤaːwaaːʕiqu nijraaːnahaaː fmn jʕml mθqaːl ðra χjraː jrh wʔamaː mn χft mwaːzjnh sʔaftqdk χalaqa aːlʔiinsaaːna min ʕalaqin qalaba aːllːahu aːldːunjaaː taaːllːahi ʔiin kunːaaː lafij dˤalaaːlin mubijnin ʔamaː zlt tðkr waqaaːla saʕijdu bnu ħumajdin maaː sˤiħːaaun ʔaabadanaː binaaːfiʕaain ħatːaaː jasˤiħːa aːldːijnu waaːlχuluqu ʔaam lakum sultˤaaːnun mubijnun maː mʕnaː klma " " fj hðh aːld͡ʒmla  ħatːaaː balaʁat biʔaulfaai aːlʔaansaaːbi tanaaːsˤurahaaː ʕalaaː aːlqawijːi aːlʔaajːidi wataħakːamat bihi taħakːuma aːlmutasalːitˤi aːlmutaʃatˤːitˤi faʔaːmanuwaː famatːaʕnaaːhum ʔiilaaː ħijnin ʔanaː ħtaː laː ʔaʕrf maː ðlk fijhinːa χajraaːtun ħisaaːnun lm jsttˤʕ aːltʁlb ʕlaː aːlrʁba fj sjd͡ʒaːrain ʔaχraː aːlrd͡ʒaːʔ ftħ ħqjbtk waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlʕulamaaːʔi χajru aːlʕilmi maaː nafaʕa  waχajru aːlqawli maaː radaʕa laː tχjb ðˤnj bk ʔism sˤdqj aːlʔisbaːnj ʔinrjk waraʁbaaun fij muʔuaaːχaaːtihi waqul rabːi ʔaanzilnij munzalanaː mubaaːrakanaː waʔaanta χajru aːlmunzilijna ʔaʕrfhaː mnð kaːnt tˤfla sˤʁjra mn jwld fj aːsbaːnjaː jkwn aːsbaːnjaːan aːʕtqdt aːnk ln tʔatj aːlaː hnaː ʔiinːaaː ʔaanzalnaaːhu fij lajlaain mubaaːrakaain ʔiinːaaː kunːaaː munðirijna laː tdˤʕ wqtk   ʔaʔantm tzrʕwnh ʔam nħn aːlzaːrʕwn faːstʕdj wχðj mnaː aːld͡ʒwaːb man ʕamila sˤaaːliħanaː falinafsihi waman ʔaasaaːʔa faʕalajhaaː wamaaː rabːuka biðˤalːaaːmin lilʕabijdi maː aːlðj tʕnjh klma " " fj hðh aːld͡ʒmla  aːlħdjθ aːlraːbʕ: mraːħl aːlχlq lm jʕrf ʔaħd mn fʕlhaː ʔaam baʕijdun maaː tuwʕaduwna waqismun mawluwduwna wakaðalika nuwalːij baʕdˤa aːlðˤːaaːlimijna baʕdˤanaː bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jaksibuwna wnjsrk lljsraː hl tʕtqd ʔanh qaːm baːlʕml wħdh  aːtχðwaː ʔajmaːnhm waaːχtalafa aːlnːaaːsu hal wad͡ʒaba ðalika biaːlʕaqli ʔaaw biaːlʃːarʕi hl ʃaːhdt aːltlfaːz aːlljla aːlmaːdˤja  ʔiiðaaː aːlʃaːʕbu jawmanaː ʔaaraaːda aːlħajaaːa falaaː budaː ʔaan jastad͡ʒijba aːlqadar waʕajʃuhaaː qasˤijrun fd͡ʒʕlhm kʕsˤf mʔakwl aːlqmr fj aːlsmaːʔ aːlbqaːʔ llh ʔanta ldjka rʔuja ʔafdˤl mnaː  wmaː ʔarslnaː qblk ʔilaː rd͡ʒaːlaː nwħj ʔiljhm faːsʔalwaː ʔahl aːlðkr ʔin kntm laː tʕlmwn qdraːth wamaaː ʔaakθaru aːlnːaaːsi walaw ħarasˤta bimuʔuminijna hl hðhi hdja lj  ktbn mʃrwʕ qaːnwn jχsˤ aːlsˤħa waminhaaː maaː huwa maʁijbu ħikmaain aːstaʔaθara bihaaː rfʕt sˤdrhaː hðaː aːsˤbʕj nsˤħ quwːaaan min qarjatika aːlːatij ʔaaχrad͡ʒatka ʔaahlaknaaːhum falaaː naaːsˤira lahum ʔant ttmtʕ bʃχsˤja ʕdjma aːlʔiħsaːs lnftnhm fjh wmn jʕrdˤ ʕn ðkr rbh jslkh ʕðaːbaː sˤʕdaː ʔaʁdˤbwnj qaːm baːlʕml ʔistjqðˤtu mtʔaχraːan aːljwm wamaaː julaqːaaːhaaː ʔiilːaaː aːlːaðijna sˤabaruwaː wamaaː julaqːaaːhaaː ʔiilːaaː ðuw ħaðˤːin ʕaðˤijmin ʔilaː mtaː sjkwn d͡ʒwaːz sfrk sˤaːlħaːan rabːi maaː ʔaabjana aːltːabaaːjuna fijhi manzilun ʕaaːmirun waʕaqlun χaraaːbu waʔaanʃada fij baʕdˤi ʔaahli aːlʕilmi wahum muχtasˤːuwna maʕa salaaːmaai ʔaaħwaaːlihim biχuluqajni ʔaaħaduhumaaː laaːzimun  waaːlʔaːχaru muntaqilun ʔatˤlʕ aːlʁjb ʔam aːtχð ʕnd aːlrħmn ʕhdaː maː aːlfrq bjn aːlkmaːn waːlbjaːnw  aːlbjaːnw jħtrq mda ʔatˤwl nasˤuwħanaː lahaaː fij mulimːaaːtihaaː ʔiilːaaː ʕalaaː ʔaazwaaːd͡ʒihim ʔaaw maaː malakat ʔaajmaaːnuhum faʔiinːahum ʁajru maluwmijna km mn fʔia qljla ʁlbt fʔia kθjra bʔiðn aːllh waːllh mʕ aːlsˤaːbrjn wajawma taʃaqːaqu aːlsːamaaːʔu biaːlʁamaaːmi wanuzːila aːlmalaaːʔiikaau tanzijlanaː waaːtːaχaðuwaː min duwni aːllːahi ʔaːlihaaan lijakuwnuwaː lahum ʕizːanaː waʔaaħwaaːlin kunt ʔauχfij ʕanhum maaː jasˤħabunij min maħbaraain wakitaaːbin liʔialːaaː ʔaakuwna ʕindahum mustaθqalanaː faːtˤlʕ frʔaːh fj swaːʔ aːld͡ʒħjm nafasi tasˤawːurihi watadfaʕu ʕan ʔidraaːki ħaqijqatihi waʔiimːaaː janzaʁanːaka mina aːlʃːajtˤaaːni nazʁun faaːstaʕið biaːllːahi ʔiinːahu samijʕun ʕalijmun qaaːla walima wafij daaːrik naʃaʔaat  qaaːla ʔinːahaaː tataʃarːafu naħnu d͡ʒaʕalnaaːhaaː taðkiraaan wamataaːʕanaː lilmuqwijna fʔamaː mn θqlt mwaːzjnh ʕani aːlnːabaʔii aːlʕaðˤijmi maaː aːlnːaaːfirijna faqad qijla libaʕdˤi aːlʕarabi mtʔakd mn nd͡ʒaːħh wajaraaː ʔaanːahu qad χusˤːa min bajnihim biaːlrːazijːaai baʕda ʔaan kaaːna musaaːwijanaː θumːa limaaː fijhi min aːʕtijaaːdi aːlrːadːi waaːstishaaːli aːlmanʕi aːlmufdˤij ʔilaaː aːlʃːuħːi ʔaasraʕtu kaj ʔaudrika aːlqitˤaaːra hl ʔasˤbt baːlbrd wakaaːlθːawbi ʔiðaaː χaliqa kaaːna aːtˤːiraaːħuhu biaːld͡ʒadijdi lahu ʔaad͡ʒmala ʕfwaː  faqaaːla lahu sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama aːlħsˤaːn d͡ʒaːhz knaːtˤħ sˤχra jwmaː ljksrhaː flm jdˤrhaː wʔawhaː qrnh aːlwʕl bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi waaːldˤːuħaː liman ʃaːʔa minkum ʔaan jastaqjma kaːn ldaː saːmj mwʕd mʕ aːltˤːbjb ðlk aːljwm waʔiinːamaaː takuwnu zijaaːdaau aːlfadˤaaːʔiili aːlmaħmuwdaai naqsˤanaː maðmuwmanaː faaːʕfuwaː juʕizːukum aːllːahu ʔaħb aːlqhwa saːχna waaːlθːaaːnij aːtːibaaːʕu aːlʃːahwaai ʔithmt hjʔia aːlmħlfjn aːlkbraː twm bd͡ʒrjma qtl waqaaːla sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama aːlmustadijnu taaːd͡ʒiru aːllːahi fij ʔaardˤihi ʔiinːa saʕjakum laʃatːaː wasaaːʔat tˤaraaːʔiiquhu rabiħa aːltːaaːd͡ʒiru aːlʔaamjnu ʕljk ʔan tdrs bd͡ʒdː waaːllːajli ʔiiðaː jaʁʃaːhaː mʕ mn knti ttħdːθjn "mʕ ʔamːj" "lm ʔaʕlm ʔanː lʔamːki sˤwt rd͡ʒl" fahuwa jaqdamu ʕalaaː maaː jaʃaaːʔu wajaʔatij maaː θumːa laaː sabijla limatˤlihi baʕda aːlwaʕdi kaːn faːdˤl χtˤjraː d͡ʒdːaː baːlnːsba llnːaːs walaaː min ʃuruwtˤi aːlkarami ʔizaaːlaau aːlnːiʕami kaaːna aːlbaðlu manduwbanaː sˤijaaːnaaan laaː d͡ʒuwdanaː wamin aːlwaħʃaai maaː laaː jadˤurːuhu θumːa d͡ʒaʕala naslahu min sulaːlaain min maːʔin mahjnin aːlmatˤaru ʁazijrun ʕaːʃ saːmj ħjaːa haːdʔia fj aːlqaːhra kaːn ntqaːbl qbl aːljwm  sʔaðhb laːsˤtˤħaːb saːmj mn mnzl ljlaː faʔaamːaaː ʔiðaaː kaaːna aːlbaðlu waaːlʕatˤaaːʔu ʕan suʔuaaːlin faʃuruwtˤuhu muʕtabaraaun min wad͡ʒhajni wamaʕnaaː qawlihi sˤalːaaː aːllːahu aːlmmrːdˤaːt aːlʔaχrjaːt lknːhn lm jtmkːnː mn ʔijd͡ʒaːdhaː qaːla naʕam waʔiinːakum ʔiiðanaː lamina aːlmuqarːabjna faʔiinːamaː hija zad͡ʒraaun waːħidaaun faʔiiðaː hum janðˤurwna wajaʕbudwna min dwni aːllːahi maː laː janfaʕuhum walaː jadˤurːuhum wakaːna aːlkaːfiru ʕalaː rabːihi ðˤahjranaː waʔiið qad wadˤaħa aːlqawlu fij ʔaasbaaːbi aːlmawaaːdːi wad͡ʒihaaːti aːlkasbi waruwija ʕan ʕalijːi bni ʔaabij sˤfːj liʔaanːahaaː qad tamnaʕu man faʕala maaː kaaːna mustakrahanaː aːlfaqri wabatˤri aːlʁanijːi aːlːaðij balaʁa maaː laaː jabluʁuhu sˤarijħu aːlsːuʔuaaːli waman aːltamasa aːld͡ʒazaaːʔa biaːlrːijaaːʔi aːltamasa maaː laaː jakuwnu ʔaχð saːmj ljlaː ʔilaː aːlʕjaːda liʔaanːa aːlkufra aːltːaʁtˤijaau maː mstwaːk fj aːllʁa aːlʕrbja wabihi nazala aːlkitaaːbu wad͡ʒaaːʔat aːlsːunːaau waʁanaaːʔiimi ʔimkaaːnihi nħn nsaːmħ aːlχjaːna lkn laː nnsaːhaː walaʔiin tusˤibka musˤijbaaun faaːsˤbir lahaaː ʕaðˤumat musˤijbaau mubtalin laaː jasˤbiru waqaaːla ʔaːχaru waaːstuʕd͡ʒima d͡ʒawaaːbuhu falam jud͡ʒibhum maːðaː nsjt walaaː sabijla ʔilaaː ʔitˤraaːħihi wamutaaːrakatihi lm jrd saːmj qdˤaːʔ wqt fj aːlsːd͡ʒn waʔiibraːhjma ʔiið qaːla liqawmihi aːʕbuduwaː aːllːaha waaːtːaqwhu ðlikum χajrun lakum ʔiin kuntum taʕlamwna jħbː saːmj aːlqjaːm bhðaː dχl aːlmdrːs ʔilaː aːlqsm walajsa bisababin ʔaan jafʕala ðalika liʁajri maaː sababin waʔiinːamaaː hija sad͡ʒijːaaun qad futˤira ʕalajhaaː kaːn saːmj jsbħ fj msbħh waʔaanʃadt liʔaabij aːlfatħi aːlbustijːi waʔaːχiruhaaː χizjun jawma aːlqijaaːmaai waaːsˤbir ʕalaaː maaː ʔaasˤaaːbak ʔinːa ðalika min ʕazmi aːlʔaumuwri tqwl ʁraːʔib laː ʔasttˤjʕ ʔan ʔafhm wajuqaaːbila dawaaːʕija ʃirːatihi biħazmihi fajarudːuhaaː d͡ʒazaːʔan wifaːqanaː ʔiðaaː maaː kunta ðaaː bawlin sˤaħijħin ʔaalaaː faaːdˤrib bihi wad͡ʒha aːltˤːabijbi waliðalika ʕilːataaːni ʔasˤnʕ mn dwd aːlqz twm faman ʁalːaba ʕaqlahu ʕalaaː ʃahwatihi fahuwa χajrun min aːlmalaaːʔiikaai laː tns ʔan tbʕθ aːlrːsaːʔil faaːqatij ʔilaaː kalaaːmikum aːlħisˤaaːnu jad͡ʒurːu aːlʕarabaaa wad͡ʒaʕalnaːhum ʔaaʔiimːaaan naʕiduhum ʔaaw natawafːajanːaka faʔiilajnaː jurd͡ʒaʕwna kaːnt tsχr mn zwd͡ʒhaː ʔiiðaː raʔaathum min makaːnin baʕjdin samiʕwaː lahaː taʁajːuðˤanaː wazafjranaː qul tarabːasˤwaː faʔiinːj maʕakum mina zulzilati aːlʔaardˤu zilzaːlahaː waħaðaranaː min aːstiħqaaːqi aːlðːamːi waaːlʕiqaaːbi aːltˤbjb ʁjr mwd͡ʒwd aːlʔaːn llʔasf walaaː liman wusˤima bihi χatˤarun walaaː miqdaaːrun ʔiðaː rklk mn χlfk fʔiʕlm ʔank fj aːlmqdma tarʁijbuhaaː fij aːlħalaaːli ʕiwadˤanaː sirːuk ʔaasijruk faʔiin takalːamt bihi sˤirt ʔaasijrahu ʔaan juχfijahu ħatːaaː laaː jantaʃira fijhi matˤaaːmiʕu aːlsːufahaaːʔi fajatawasˤːaluwna ʔilaaː aːd͡ʒtiðaaːbihi bisabːihi falaaː jad͡ʒidu sˤidqanaː juʕðabu walaaː ħadijθanaː justaðˤrafu wafasaaːdu rawijːatihi waʔiið qad madˤaaː aːlkalaaːmu fij aːlmaʔakuwli waaːlmaʃruwbi fajanbaʁij ʔad͡ʒraː saːmj bʕdˤ aːltːħqjqaːt ʕn ljlaː waaːʕlam ʔaanːa min aːlʔaasraaːri maaː laaː justaʁnaaː fijhi ʕan mutˤaaːlaʕaai sˤadijqin musaaːhimin aːlskrtjra mtʕba mn aːltˤbaːʕa wahuwa jaquwlu fħsˤ saːmj d͡ʒrħ ljlaː ʔaqwm baːltmaːrjn aːlrjaːdˤja lʔaħaːfðˤ ʕlaː sˤħtj saːmj jstħqː ʕtˤla qsˤjra aːsˤnaʕ aːlχajra ʕinda ʔimkaaːnihi jabqaaː lak ħamduhu ʕinda zawaaːlihi waʔiin jukaðːibwka faqad kaðːaba aːlːaðjna min qablihim d͡ʒaːʔathum rusuluhum biaːlbajːinaːti wabiaːlzːuburi wabiaːlkitaːbi aːlmunjri sˤrχt ʕlaː aːlmdrːsa kaːnt rsaːla saːmj mljʔia baːltːðmːr waaːldˤːaaːlːaaa laaː tutraku liðilːaai waaːd͡ʒidihaaː maaː lak waaːlʁadˤabu ʔinːamaaː ʔaanta baʃarun ʔaaqalːu maaː jad͡ʒibu lilmunʕimi biħaqːi niʕmatihi ʔaan laaː jatawasˤːala bihaaː ʔilaaː maʕsˤijatihi χð ħbtjn bʕd aːlʔakl ʔinː fakaaːna haðaaː tafadˤːulanaː minhu wataʔaalːufanaː ʔaħdˤr saːmj sˤdjqa mʕh kaːnt ʕnd ljlaː ʕlba mχfwq ħljb bðwq aːlfrwla faʔiiðaaː aːχtaaːra waʔaard͡ʒuw ʔaan juwafːaqa liliaːχtijaaːri lndʕuhm ʔilaː d͡ʒaʕala lakumu aːlʔaardˤa bisaːtˤanaː hl tʕaːnj mn ʔalm fj aːlbtˤn ljs ðlk aːlqmjsˤ bl aːlʔaːχr waʔiinːamaaː aːstad͡ʒaaːza sˤuhajbun ʔaan juʕarːidˤa lirasuwli aːllːahi sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama biaːlmazħi fij d͡ʒawaaːbihi jħsn saːmj aːlsːbaːħa mθl ljlaː tqrjbaː wajufsiduwna fij aːlʔaardˤi ʔauwlaaːʔiika humu aːlχaaːsiruwna ʔinːa aːlnːafsa laʔaamːaaːraaun biaːlsːuwʔi kaːn saːmj jtmtːʕ baːlħjaːa waʔiiðaaː sˤaʁːartahu ʕaðˤːamtahu waaːʕlam ʔaanːa biħasabi fadˤli aːlʔiinsaaːni waðˤuhuwri aːlnːiʕmaai ʕalajhi jakuwnu ħasadu aːlnːaaːsi lahu watad͡ʒanːabuwaː aːlkaðiba waʔiin raʔaajtum ʔaanːa fijhi aːlnːad͡ʒaaːaa faʔiinːa fijhi aːlhalakaaa sttzwːd͡ʒjn w stnd͡ʒbjn aːlkθjr ðlika ʔaamru aːllːahi ʔaanzalahu ʔiilajkum waman jatːaqi aːllːaha jukafːir ʕanhu sajːiʔiaaːtihi wajuʕðˤim lahu ʔaad͡ʒranaː wajarawnahu kaaːlsˤːadaaː ʔin radːa sˤawtanaː lam jad͡ʒid nafʕanaː saːmj jħbː aːlqhwa faħaqːa ʕalajnaː qawlu rabːinaː ʔiinːaː laðaːʔiiqwna waːsˤl saːmj aːlaːntðˤaːr qul ʔiin kaaːnat lakumu aːldːaaːru aːlʔaːχiraau ʕinda aːllːahi χaaːlisˤaaan ʕan ʔaabij salamaaa lm jsmʕ saːmj ʔajː sˤwt sˤdr mn tlk aːlχjma ʔaan juraaːʕija maχaaːrid͡ʒa kalaaːmihi biħasabi maqaaːsˤidihi waʔaaʁraaːdˤihi faʔiin kaaːna tarʁijbanaː qaranahu biaːllːijni waaːllːutˤfi wabadaː lahum sajːiʔiaaːtu maː kasabwaː waħaːqa bihim maː kaːnwaː bihi jastahziʔiwna ðˤnː saːmj ʔanː ljlaː kaːnt sttˤlq ʕljh aːlnːaːr kaːn saːmj jħbː aːlħjaːa aːld͡ʒjːda aːstuqbl χbr ħml ljlaː brdwd ʔafʕaːl mtbaːjna maː zaːlt qdmajː tʔulmaːnnj jaʕnij sajfa nafsihi ʔaħdˤr saːmj aːlbjtˤrj tħsˤːl faːdˤl ʕlaː maː aːstħqːh tmaːmaː laː tns ʔidχaːl aːlklb kaːn ðlk aːlħml sbbaː fj tbaːʕd ljlaː w saːmj tˤaːlʕ saːmj ktbaː tˤbːjːa ħðˤ fj aːlsħaːb wʕql fj aːltraːb fajanbaʁij liðij aːllːubːi aːlsːawijːi waaːlħazmi aːlqawijːi ʔaan jatalaqːaaː quwːaaa aːlʁadˤabi biħilmihi fajasˤudːahaaː ʔiðaaː dˤaħika aːlʕaaːlimu dˤiħkaaan mad͡ʒːa min aːlʕilmi mad͡ʒːaaan wazinwaː biaːlqistˤaːsi aːlmustaqjmi lm tqsˤd ʔajː ʔaðaː aːlʁðaːʔ dˤrwrj llʕjʃ ʔaamːaaː ʕuluwːu aːlhimːaai faliʔaanːahu baaːʕiθun ʕalaaː aːltːaqadːumi wadaaːʕin ʔilaaː aːltːaχsˤijsˤi ʔaanafaaan min χumuwli aːldˤːaʕaai faraʔaajt ʔaan ʔaaχrud͡ʒa minhaaː tˤaaːʔiiʕanaː man aːtːaqaaː aːllːaha aːtːaqaaː aːlnːaaːsa ʔaknt mʕ ʔaħdhm faʔaaqbala baʕdˤuhum ʕalaː baʕdˤin jatalaːwamwna wamaː χalaqtu aːld͡ʒinːa waaːlʔiinsa ʔiilːaː lijaʕbudwni aːntql saːmj ʔilaː hnaː lm jkn saːmj mstʕdːaː llnːtˤq baːlʃːhaːda ħjːaː saːmj aːlzːbaːʔin jtħdθ aːlktaːb ʕn mlk jfqd taːd͡ʒh ðlika biʔaanːahum kaːnat taʔatjhim rusuluhum biaːlbajːinaːti fakafarwaː faʔaaχaðahumu aːllːahu ʔiinːahu qawijːun ʃadjdu aːlʕiqaːbi mrː saːmj baːld͡ʒaːmʕa bdwn ʔan jraː ljlaː ʔiinːa aːlʔiinsaːna χuliqa halwʕanaː waliltːud͡ʒːaaːri zijːanaː maʔaluwfanaː mħsˤwl aːltˤmaːtˤm d͡ʒwdth ʕaːlja jmknnj ʔan ʔaqfz kaːn ðlk sˤʕb aːltsˤdjq mtaː aːχtrʕt aːltˤbaːʕa  ldjhaː aːbna tʕzf ʕlaː aːlbjaːnw haː hj draːd͡ʒtj ʔarjd ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilaː aːljaːbaːn maː zaːlt tmtˤr mnð ljla aːlbaːrħa ʔinhaː lʔaχj ʔajn rʔajt naːnsj qrb aːlmdrsa tʕaːl bsrʕa mnð mtaː wʔant tntðˤr  ðˤnnt ʔanh mrjdˤ saːfrt ʔilaː ʔijtˤaːljaː aːlsˤjf aːlfaːʔit laː ʃkraːan ʔanaː mtʕb  smʕt sˤwt dˤd͡ʒa ʁrjba hðaː aːlħjwaːn ʔakbr mn ðaːk ʔaʕdt ʔiljh ktaːbh aːrtdt mʕtˤfhaː θm χrd͡ʒt jtħdθ aːlktaːb ʕn mlk jfqd taːd͡ʒh ʔaðkr ʔanj ʔaʕtˤjth aːlmftaːħ ʔinhaː tʕjʃ fj bjt ðaː tˤaːbqjn  jaː lhaː mn ʔazhaːr d͡ʒmjla jmkn ʔan jʃjr ʕdd mn aːlʔaʃχaːsˤ aːlðjn ʃaːrkwaː bshwla ʔilaː aːlmʃkla sʔaʃtrj aːlsjaːra bʃrtˤ ʔan jsˤlħwaː aːlmkaːbħ ʔawlaːan rkbwaː aːlsfjna ʔaχaːk ʔaχaːk ʔin mn laː ʔaχaːan lh ksaːʕin ʔilaː aːlhjd͡ʒaː bʁjr slaːħ mtaː bdʔat ttʕlm aːllːʁa aːlʔalmaːnja  haː qd wsˤl aːlbaːsˤ rwaːja " aːlʔaːjaːt aːlʃjtˤaːnja " lslmaːn rʃdj tuʕtbr mn rwaːʔiʕ aːlʔadb aːlħdjθ lmn hðjn aːlħðaːʔijn  kaːnt rχjsˤa aːlθmn d͡ʒdaːan jtklm aːlfrnsja ʔajdˤaːan trd͡ʒmt aːlnsˤ ħrfjaːan ʔajn aːlħmːaːm  hðaː aːlktaːb shl ʕlj qraːʔth ʔanðˤr ʔilaː ðlk aːlmbnaː aːlʔaħmr ʔinhaː fkra d͡ʒjda ʔaħbhaː w tħbnj ʔinnj ʔatbʕ ħmja ʔaħbhaː tʕzf ʔamj ʕlaː aːlbjaːnw bmhaːra rʔaaː aːlħaːdθ whw fj tˤrjqh ʔilaː aːlmdrsa ʔinhaː maːhra fj tħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja sˤħħ aːlʔaχtˤaːʔ  ʔin wud͡ʒdt lma lm tsˤdqnj  mn ʔaθql bin ʔam maːjk  laaː tuħarːik bihi lisaaːnaka litaʕd͡ʒala bihi hnaːk aːlkθjr maː jmknnaː aːlʔitfaːq ʕljh ʔaw maː jʕrf baːlsdm wd͡ʒdnaːhaː ʕlaː qjd aːlħjaːa ʔinaː nħn nħjj aːlmwtaː wnktb maː qdmwaː wʔaːθaːrhm wkl ʃjʔ ʔaħsˤjnaːh fj ʔimaːm mbjn jʕd͡ʒbnj ʔaslwbk waliman aːstakθara minhu ʔaan jakuwna bihi ʕaaːmilanaː wʔiðaː aːld͡ʒbaːl sjrt lm ʔaʕd ʔaħbːk bʕd aːlʔaːn wlwlaː fdˤl aːllh ʕljkm wrħmth wʔan aːllh rʔwf rħjm lmaːðaː laː trjd ʔan tqwl lnaː aːlħqjqa
