aːllːahi ʕazːa wad͡ʒalːa waliðalika ʔaːχaaː rasuwlu aːllːahi sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama bajna ʔaasˤħaaːbihi fatalaqːaaː ʔaːdamu min rabːihi kalimaaːtin fataaːba ʕalajhi ʔiinːahu huwa aːltːawːaaːbu aːlrːaħijmu jmknk aːlbqaːʔ ʔatˤwl qljlaː  ʔaafatumaaːruwnahu ʕalaaː maaː jaraaː ðalika ʕaaːlimu aːlʁajbi waaːlʃːahaaːdaai aːlʕazijzu aːlrːaħijmu maːðaː tʕtqd ʔafdˤl wsjla llwsˤwl ʔilaː mnzl twm mn hnaː  walanuðijqanːahum mina aːlʕaðaaːbi aːlʔaadnaaː duwna aːlʕaðaaːbi aːlʔaakbari laʕalːahum jard͡ʒiʕuwna ʕaːd ʔilaː wʕjh bʕd aːlħaːdθa bθlaːθ saːʕaːt bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ʔiðaː aːlsmaːʔ aːnftˤrt aːlfasˤla taʔaalːufu aːlʔaaʕdaaːʔi bimaaː junʔiijhim ʕan aːlbaʁdˤaaːʔi wajaʕtˤifuhum ʕalaaː aːlmaħabːaai laː ʔasttˤjʕ ʔan ʔad͡ʒd saːʕtj ʔiinːakum wamaaː taʕbuduwna min duwni aːllːahi ħasˤabu d͡ʒahanːama ʔaantum lahaaː waaːriduwna waːlljl wmaː wsq lħiq aːlklb θʕlbanaː falam juʕtˤifhu ʕalajhi raħmaaun walaaː kafːahu ʕanhu ʃafaqaaun ʔinaː knaː mn qbl ndʕwh ʔinh hw aːlbr aːlrħjm laː jʔaklh ʔilaː aːlχaːtˤʔiwn waaːlːaðijna kafaruwaː wakaðːabuwaː biʔaːjaaːtinaaː ʔauwlaʔiika ʔaasˤħaaːbu aːlnːaaːri χaaːlidijna fijhaaː wabiʔisa aːlmasˤijru ʔaχbr twm wmaːrj ʔannj qaːdm lrʔujthmaː ljs ʃjʔianaː jmkn lʔajː ʃχsˤ fʕlh walaqad nasˤarakumu aːllːahu bibadrin waʔaantum ʔaaðilːaaun faaːtːaquwaː aːllːaha laʕalːakum taʃkuruwna qtˤtnaː tħb aːlʔaʕʃaːb aːlbħrja kθjranaː faʔaaqsama biaːlqalami wamaaː juχatˤːu biaːlqalami walaaː tad͡ʒasːasuwaː walaaː jaʁtab baʕdˤukum baʕdˤanaː ʔaajuħibːu ʔaaħadukum ʔaan jaʔakula laħma ʔaaχijhi majtanaː fakarihtumuwhu waħumilati aːlʔaardˤu waaːld͡ʒibaaːlu fadukːataaː dakːaaan waaːħidaaan wlrbk faːsˤbr ʔanaː ʔaʕml fj wkaːla safr ʔanaː lst d͡ʒaːʔiʕaː aːlʔaːn twm jsbb lj aːlkθjr mn aːlmtaːʕb mrħbaːan ʃkraːan ʕlaː aːltˤjraːn mʕnaː kjf ħaːlkm aːljwm waχajrun min aːlʕilmi ħaaːmiluhu ʔaðaː mnːaːd baːja waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlfaqijhu biʁajri waraʕin kaaːlsːiraaːd͡ʒi judˤijʔu aːlbajta wajuħriqu nafsahu hðaː bsbbk ʔant mn rsm hðh aːllwħa aːlθːajːibi aːlzːaaːnij waaːlnːafsi biaːlnːafsi lhm daːr aːlslaːm ʕnd rbhm whw wljhm bmaː kaːnwaː jʕmlwn jwm tqlb wd͡ʒwhhm fj aːlnaːr jqwlwn jaː ljtnaː ʔatˤʕnaː aːllh wʔatˤʕnaː aːlrswlaː waqaaːla ʕalijːu bnu ʔaabij tˤaaːlibin radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu aːlsˤːaaːħibu munaaːsibun ʔanaː laː ʔaʕaːnj mn aːld͡ʒnwn  ʔanaː ʔastmtʕ bh snkwn aːsˤdqaːʔ aːlaː aːlaːbd fʔaʕrdˤ ʕn mn twlaː ʕn ðkrnaː wlm jrd ʔilaː aːlħjaːa aːldnjaː aːlːaðij juʔutij maaːlahu jatazakːaaː hl jmknnj ʔan ʔasʔal, ʔilaː ʔajn ʔanti ðaːhba ʔinhm jrjdwn fqtˤ aːlħsˤwl ʕlaː aːlmtʕa ʔilaː qjlaː slaːmaː slaːmaː lqd qtˤʕt ʔiʃaːra ħmraːʔ wllʔaːχra χjr lk mn aːlʔawlaː lqd ʔausˤbt baːlχjba waħukija ʔaanːa rad͡ʒulanaː qaaːla waʔaaʕraaːbijːun ħaaːdˤirun wsχr lkm aːlʃms waːlqmr daːʔibjn wsχr lkm aːlljl waːlnhaːr jsttˤjʕ aːltklm baːlfrnsja ʔajdˤaː waqul rabːi ʔaaʕuwðu bika min hamazaaːti aːlʃːajaaːtˤijni ʔanaː ldj d͡ʒaːra frnsja wd͡ʒmʕ aːlʃms waːlqmr lqd tm qsˤf aːlmntˤqa aːlmħjtˤa hnaː lamaaː saaːra ʕanhu ʔanaː ħqaːan lstu d͡ʒaːʔiʕa tamunːuhaaː ʕalajːa ʔaan ʕabːadta banij ʔiisraaːʔiijla jaʕiðˤukumu aːllːahu ʔaan taʕuwduwaː limiθlihi ʔaabadanaː ʔiin kuntum muʔuminijna hl trʁb fj tlqj rsaːla mn fdˤlk ʔanaː lm ʔara ʃjʔiaːan mθl hðaː faʔaamːaaː maaː kaaːna min ðaaːtihi fajatanawːaʕu nawʕajni wmaː jðkrwn ʔilaː ʔan jʃaːʔ aːllh hw ʔahl aːltqwaː wʔahl aːlmʁfra tqʕ frnsaː fj ʔawrwbaː aːlʁrbja hj tʕrdˤt ʔilj nwba qlbja twm kaːn jdjn tʕmlwn tlk aːlmrʔaa aːlʕd͡ʒwz tskn bmfrdhaː hl ldjk   fkra ʕn sbb krh "twm" lj  waaːlːaðijna hum ʕalaaː sˤalaːtihim juħaaːfiðˤuwna tðˤn ʔan jfʕl bhaː faːqra faðarhum jaχuwdˤuwaː wajalʕabuwaː ħatːaaː julaaːquwaː jawmahumu aːlːaðij juwʕaduwna tʕml aːlsjaːra baːlkhrbaːʔ fijhimaaː faaːkihaaun wanaχlun warumːaaːnun ʔawqfwaː aːltsˤwjr ql ʔarwnj aːlðjn ʔalħqtm bh ʃrkaːʔ klaː bl hw aːllh aːlʕzjz aːlħkjm ʔaawːalu sˤalaaːħi haðihi aːlʔaumːaai biaːlzːuhdi waaːljaqijni fj ħlh w trħaːlh waaːlmuʔutafikaaa ʔaahwaaː wakaðːabuwaː biʔaːjaaːtinaaː kiðːaaːbanaː lam janfaʕuwka ʔiilaːːa biʃajʔin qad katabahu aːllhu laka wad͡ʒaʕalahaaː kalimaaan baaːqijaaan fij ʕaqibihi laʕalːahum jard͡ʒiʕuwna nħn mn kndaː liʔaanːa aːlʕaqla waaːldːijna rubːamaaː kaaːnaaː madˤʕuwfajni tʕaːl ltraːnj ʕndmaː jkwn ldjk wqt mhmaː jħsˤl  fln ʔaχbr ʔaħdanaː ʕnh ʔarjd ʔan ʔankħk ln ʔafʕlhaː md͡ʒddaːan fij kitaaːbin maknuwnin kulːu nafsin ðaaːʔiiqaau aːlmawti wanabluwkum biaːlʃːarːi waaːlχajri fitnaaan waʔiilajnaaː turd͡ʒaʕuwna θumːa juʕijdukum fijhaaː wajuχrid͡ʒukum ʔiiχraaːd͡ʒanaː waaːlmaaːla sˤifaaun zaaːʔiilaaun ðlk mn ʔanbaːʔ aːlqraː nqsˤh ʕljk mnhaː qaːʔim wħsˤjd kjf trjdh laː tlms ʔaːla tsˤwjrj hunaaːlika aːbtulija aːlmuʔuminuwna wazulziluwaː zilzaaːlanaː ʃadijdanaː sʔafʕl ʔajː ʃjʔ lħmaːjtk wabaaːʕiθanaː ʕalaaː aːltːakaaːθuri biaːlʔaawlaaːdi waʔaaqalːu tanaaːzuʕanaː waχulfanaː laː ʃrjk lh wbðlk ʔamrt wʔanaː ʔawl aːlmslmjn nħn mmtnwn lk lmsaːʕdtk ʔatbnwn bkl rjʕ ʔaːja tʕbθwn aːrkudˤ birid͡ʒlika haðaaː muʁtasalun baaːridun waʃaraaːbun lm ʔaːkl mð ʔaftˤrt  wʔanaː d͡ʒaːʔiʕ d͡ʒdaː ktbt mʃrwʕ qaːnwn jχsˤ aːlsˤħa faman qaaːla biwud͡ʒuwbi ðalika biaːlʕaqli  qaaːla biwud͡ʒuwbi baʕθaai aːlʔaanbijaaːʔi maːrj tqblt kl ʃjʔ bdwn tðmr maːðaː jʕnj hðaː  ʔiinːahu jaʕlamu aːld͡ʒahra mina aːlqawli wajaʕlamu maaː taktumuwna tlk ʔaːjaːt aːllh ntlwhaː ʕljk baːlħq fbʔaj ħdjθ bʕd aːllh wʔaːjaːth jʔumnwn qaːlwaː lʔin lm tnth jaː lwtˤ ltkwnn mn aːlmχrd͡ʒjn faːlfaːrqaːt frqaː mn tlk aːlftaːa aːld͡ʒmjla  ʔaafaraʔaajtum mːaaː taħruθuwna ʔamr raːʔiʕ ʔan tkwn ldjk ʔasra faaːlmuʁijraaːti sˤubħanaː wajatawasːamu bid͡ʒamijlin jadʕuw ʔilaaː aːsˤtˤifaaːʔiihi warubːamaaː ʔaadˤd͡ʒara qaaːriʔiahu wʔatbʕwaː fj hðh lʕna wjwm aːlqjaːma bʔis aːlrfd aːlmrfwd maː kaːn jd͡ʒb ʕlj ʔan ʔaθq btwm ʕljk ʔalaː tðhb nud͡ʒħu aːld͡ʒaaːhili waʔiikdaaːʔu aːlʕaaːqili hl jsttˤjʕ ʔan jraːnj  liʔaanːa tarka aːliaːstitˤaaːlaai ʔaːlafu wʔand͡ʒjnaː mwsaː wmn mʕh ʔad͡ʒmʕjn mn ʃr aːlwswaːs aːlχnaːs tntd͡ʒ aːld͡ʒzaːʔir aːltmwr faqaaːla ʕabdu aːllːahi bnu masʕuwdin jawma jukʃafu ʕan saaːqin wajudʕawna ʔiilaaː aːlsːud͡ʒuwdi falaaː jastatˤijʕuwna wamin ʔaːjaaːtihi χalqu aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waaːlʔaardˤi waaːχtilaaːfu ʔaalsinatikum waʔaalwaaːnikum ʔiinːa fij ðalika laʔaːjaaːtin lilʕaaːlimijna sʔaltqj bkm jaː ʃbaːb fj kwrjaː waaːlχaaːmisu muʕaaːnaaːau aːlmaðˤaaːlimi waaːlʔaaħkaaːmi biaːltːaswijaai bajna ʔaahlihaaː waaːʕtimaaːdi aːlnːasˤafaai fij fasˤlihaaː waaːlːatij ʔaaħsˤanat fard͡ʒahaaː fanafaχnaaː fijhaaː min ruwħinaaː wad͡ʒaʕalnaaːhaaː waaːbnahaaː ʔaːjaaan lilʕaaːlamijna jħtrq aːlwrq bshwlh waʔiin lam tuʔuminuwaː lij faaːʕtaziluwni hl bʔimkaːnk tslq tlk aːlʃd͡ʒra  wamaaː ʕalːamnaaːhu aːlʃːiʕra wamaaː janbaʁij lahu ʔiin huwa ʔiilːaaː ðikrun waqurʔaːnun mubijnun famanːa aːllːahu ʕalajnaaː wawaqaaːnaaː ʕaðaaːba aːlsːamuwmi ʔanaː lm ʔaðuqi aːltˤʕaːma mnðu ʔajaːmin wmaː hm ʕnhaː bʁaːʔibjn faaːsˤrif ʔaʁrb ʃjʔ dʕwnaː nqsm aːlfaːtwra bʔarbʕa tˤrq waʔiiðaaː fahima aːlmaʕaaːnija saqatˤa ʕanhu kulfaau aːstiχraaːd͡ʒihaaː wabaqija ʕalajhi muʕaaːnaaːau ħifðˤihaaː waaːstiqraaːrihaaː hnaːk  fj aːlmaːdˤj aːlmχfwqa  sʔafʕlhaː bnfsj ʕaːlm ʔaːχr mmkn ʔalm nd͡ʒʕl aːlʔardˤ kfaːtaː ʔaam lahum ʃurakaaːʔ faljaʔatuwaː biʃurakaaːʔiihim ʔiin kaaːnuwaː sˤaaːdiqijna aːðhab bikitaaːbij haðaaː faʔaalqih ʔiilajhim θumːa tawalːa ʕanhum faaːnðˤur maaːðaaː jard͡ʒiʕuwna sanasimuhu ʕalaaː aːlχurtˤuwmi kaːn mnːaːd jʃrb aːlsjχ jlbswn aːlʕmaːmaːt faʔiin jasˤbiruwaː faaːlnːaaːru maθwanaː lahum waʔiin jastaʕtibuwaː ʔafdˤl mn maː ħsn mn aːlklaːm naːraː mdjna haːdʔia w d͡ʒmjla laː ʔatˤjqh ʕrft aːlmkaːn aːlðj kaːn jskn fjh twm saːmj jʔumn bʔaːdm ʔibraːhjm ʔisħaːq ʔismaːʕjl mwsaː ʕjsaː wmħmd falaaː taʕd͡ʒal ʕalajhim ʔiinːamaaː naʕudːu lahum ʕadːanaː wasababuhaaː aːliaːnbisaaːtˤu faʔiinːamaaː hija zad͡ʒraaun waaːħidaaun qtl ðlk aːlrd͡ʒl waqaaːsamahumaaː ʔiinːij lakumaaː lamina aːlnːaaːsˤiħijna walaqad ʔaanðarahum batˤʃatanaaː fatamaaːrawaː biaːlnːuðuri qaːl ʔalqwaː flmaː ʔalqwaː sħrwaː ʔaʕjn aːlnaːs waːstrhbwhm wd͡ʒaːʔwaː bsħr ʕðˤjm bqj saːmj qlqaː bʃʔan qtlh lʔaχjh faʔaaradnaaː ʔaan jubdilahumaaː rabːuhumaaː χajranaː minhu zakaaːaan waʔaaqraba ruħmanaː ʔanaː mtʔakd ʔanj ʔasttˤjʕ ʔan ʔafʕl hðaː btˤrjqa ʔaw bʔaχrj wmn ʔaːjaːth mnaːmkm baːlljl waːlnhaːr waːbtʁaːʔukm mn fdˤlh ʔin fj ðlk lʔaːjaːt lqwm jsmʕwn aːlʕlm aːlfrnsj aːzrq w aːbjdˤ w aːħmr quli aːllːaha ʔaaʕbudu muχlisˤanaː lahu dijnij ʔaw ʔitˤʕaːm fj jwm ðj msʁba lh mqaːljd aːlsmaːwaːt waːlʔardˤ jbstˤ aːlrzq lmn jʃaːʔ wjqdr ʔinh bkl ʃjʔ ʕljm ʔiiðaaː ʔaulquwaː fijhaaː samiʕuwaː lahaaː ʃahijqanaː wahija tafuwru ðlk bʔanhm ʔaːmnwaː θm kfrwaː ftˤbʕ ʕlaː qlwbhm fhm laː jfqhwn jtˤwfwn bjnhaː wbjn ħmjm ʔaːn hðh aːlʔaʁnja tðkrnj bbjtj ql aːnðˤrwaː maːðaː fj aːlsmaːwaːt waːlʔardˤ wmaː tʁnj aːlʔaːjaːt waːlnðr ʕn qwm laː jʔumnwn lqd zrt rwmaː lʔawl mra fj ħjaːtj χwljw jtʔard͡ʒħ fj aːlʔard͡ʒwħa aːlʃbkja aːltj ʕlqthaː tħt ʃd͡ʒra aːlblwtˤ aːlqdjma hðh zwd͡ʒtj ʔin aːlʔatˤbaːq aːlχʃbja ʔaχf mn aːlʔatˤbaːq aːlmʕdnja  lkn aːlʔatˤbaːq aːlwrqja hj aːlʔaχf qaaːla rabːunaaː aːlːaðij ʔaaʕtˤaaː kulːa ʃajʔin χalqahu θumːa hadaaː ʕjd mjlaːd sʕjd wamaaː janðˤuru haʔuulaaːʔi ʔiilːaaː sˤajħaaan waaːħidaaan maaː lahaaː min fawaaːqin ħafiðˤtu min rswli aːllhi sˤalːaaː aːllhu ʕalajhi wasalːama: ʔanta jmknka ʔan tnaːdjnj twm maː mʕdl aːlbrjd aːld͡ʒwj  hðaː sˤħjħ ʔanti trjdjn aːltˤlaːq, ʔaljs kðlk waʔiinːaaː ʔiilaaː rabːinaaː lamunqalibuwna wlqd aːsthzʔi brsl mn qblk fʔamljt llðjn kfrwaː θm ʔaχðthm fkjf kaːn ʕqaːb ħkm aːlmlk fjljb aːlθaːnj lmda ʔarbʕjn sna kðlk ħqt klmt rbk ʕlaː aːlðjn fsqwaː ʔanhm laː jʔumnwn lm jħdθ ʃjʔ man kaθːara sawaaːda qawmin fahuwa minhum ʔanaː laː ʔalwmhaː waman tˤalaba mawadːaaa mumtaniʕin ʕalajhi watilka aːlquraaː ʔaahlaknaaːhum lamːaaː ðˤalamuwaː wad͡ʒaʕalnaaː limahlikihim mawʕidanaː faaːsˤbir sˤabranaː d͡ʒamijlanaː faːstχf qwmh fʔatˤaːʕwh ʔinhm kaːnwaː qwmaː faːsqjn qul ʔaatuħaaːd͡ʒːuwnanaaː fij aːllːahi wahuwa rabːunaaː warabːukum walanaaː ʔaaʕmaaːlunaaː walakum ʔaaʕmaaːlukum wanaħnu lahu muχlisˤuwna wlknhu kaːn mħðˤwðˤaːan ʔaʕtˤihaː frsˤa ʔaχraː walaaː jaʃʕuru biχusraaːnihi ʔiinːaaː d͡ʒaʕalnaaːhaaː fitnaaan lilðˤːaaːlimijna aːlʕilmu ʔaakθaru min ʔaan juħsˤaaː faχuðuwaː min kulːi ʃajʔin ʔaaħsanahu faːstd͡ʒaːb lh rbh fsˤrf ʕnh kjdhn ʔinh hw aːlsmjʕ aːlʕljm wmaː ʔasʔalkm ʕljh mn ʔad͡ʒr ʔin ʔad͡ʒrj ʔilaː ʕlaː rb aːlʕaːlmjn ʔiinːa aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː waðˤalamuwaː lam jakuni aːllːahu lijaʁfira lahum walaaː lijahdijahum tˤarijqanaː ʃkraː lk jaː sjdj fasijħuwaː fij aːlʔaardˤi ʔaarbaʕaaa ʔaaʃhurin waaːʕlamuwaː ʔaanːakum ʁajru muʕd͡ʒizij aːllːahi waʔaanːa aːllːaha muχzij aːlkaaːfirijna fj bdˤʕ snjn llh aːlʔamr mn qbl wmn bʕd wjwmʔið jfrħ aːlmʔumnwn ʔiið jatalaqːaaː aːlmutalaqːijaaːni ʕani aːljamijni waʕani aːlʃːimaaːli qaʕijdun hl tstmʕ waqaaːla aːlmansˤuwru lilmusajːibi bni zuhajrin aːtfqaː ʕlaː ʔan jʕmlaː swjaː walaaː jatˤlubu aːlʔaːχira qabla aːlʔaawːali  walaaː aːlħaqijqaaa qabla aːlmadχali waliðalika qijla aːlʕaaːdaau tˤabʕun θaaːnin mn jhd aːllh fhw aːlmhtdj wmn jdˤll fʔawlʔik hm aːlχaːsrwn rabːukumu aːlːaðij juzd͡ʒij lakumu aːlfulka fij aːlbaħri litabtaʁuwaː min fadˤlihi ʔiinːahu kaaːna bikum raħijmanaː fʔamh haːwja fijhaaː faaːkihaaun waaːlnːaχlu ðaaːtu aːlʔaakmaaːmi jd͡ʒb ʕlaː aːlmrʔ ʔan jhndm nfsh d͡ʒjdaːan ʔiðhbj waːʁslj ʔasnaːnk kl maː fj aːlʔamr ʔannj mrjdˤa aːtːsˤl bj ħaːlmaː td͡ʒd twm waqaaːla bakru bnu ʕabdi aːllːahi waʔaaχafːu ħaaːlanaː ʔanaː tlmjð fj d͡ʒaːmʕa kaːn ʔams ʁaːʔimaː qaaːla ʔaahlu aːltːaʔawijli faʔiiðaaː faraʁt min ʔan ʔaʃtrj laː bd lj ʔan ʔatˤlb mnk ʔitˤaːʕa ʔawaːmrj ʔaːsf ʕlaː aːlsˤːraːχ ʕalːama aːlʔiinsaaːna maaː lam jaʕlam aːlmantˤiqu waaːlnːaðˤaru waaːlsˤːamtu ldaː mnzl saːmj bstaːn d͡ʒmjl ʃʕr saːmj baːltwtːr χaaːlidijna fijhaaː ʔaabadanaː ʔiinːa aːllːaha ʕindahu ʔaad͡ʒrun ʕaðˤijmun nħnu lsnaː aːlwħjdjn aːlðjn jʕtqdwn ʔanhu ʁjr mðnb wabarːanaː biwaaːlidajhi walam jakun d͡ʒabːaaːranaː ʕasˤijːanaː ʕlm walakin kaðːaba watawalːaaː fqwlaː lh qwlaː ljnaː lʕlh jtðkr ʔaw jχʃaː haðaaː jawmu aːlfasˤli aːlːaðij kuntum bihi tukaðːibuwna ʔaafabihaðaaː aːlħadijθi ʔaantum mːudhinuwna aːlðjn ʔiðaː ʔasˤaːbthm min taħtihaaː aːlʔaanhaaːru χaaːlidijna fijhaaː ðalika aːlfawzu aːlʕaðˤijmu hl tʕtqd ʔan twm sjʔatj rabːanaaː ʔaːmanːaaː bimaaː ʔaanzalta waaːtːabaʕnaaː aːlrːasuwla faaːktubnaaː maʕa aːlʃːaaːhidijna ðhbat ʔilaː baːrjs sʔadχr aːlmzjd mn aːlmaːl ʔanta ħsˤlt ʕlaː hʔulaːʔ mn aːlħql  liʔaanːa aːld͡ʒaaːhila jaraaː aːlʕilma takalːufanaː walawmanaː twqf ʕn mdˤaːjqa ʔauχtk kl nfs ðaːʔiqa aːlmwt θm ʔiljnaː trd͡ʒʕwn maː aːsm hðaː aːltˤaːʔir baːlʔind͡ʒljzja  bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm waːlsmaːʔ waːltˤaːrq wjwm tʃqq aːlsmaːʔ baːlʁmaːm wnzl aːlmlaːʔika tnzjlaː fqadim aːlθʕlb aːlmkːaːr wħaːwl ʔan jfhm sbb ʃd͡ʒaːrhmaː hl ʔamkm fj aːlmnzl  ʔafdˤl aːlsfr lwħdj wznwaː baːlqstˤaːs aːlmstqjm hw aːlʔatˤwl fj aːlsˤf aːlzwd͡ʒa aːlsˤaːlħa χjr mn aːlmiħraːθ aːlðhbj aːlqtˤtˤ tħb aːlsmk ʔakθr mn aːllħm ln tsˤdːq maː qaːlth lj biaːʕtidaaːlin χuruwd͡ʒanaː ʕan aːlʕadli ʔilaaː maaː lajsa biʕadlin kaːn waːldaː lnkwln fqjrjn tˤwl ħjaːthmaː baːlwaːqʕ ʔin aːlʔid͡ʒaːba bsjtˤa kðlk nslkh fj qlwb aːlmd͡ʒrmjn hl hðaː      ʔawlm jrwaː ʔilaː aːlʔardˤ km ʔanbtnaː fjhaː mn kl zwd͡ʒ krjm aːlːaðij ʔiðaaː ðakart ʔaaʕaaːnak wawaaːsaaːk mn, ʔiðaː lm jkn nħn  mtaː, ʔiðaː lm jkn aːlʔan  wtrknaː ʕljh fj aːlʔaːχrjn ʔin aːlðjn kfrwaː wsˤdwaː ʕn sbjl aːllh qd dˤlwaː dˤlaːlaː bʕjdaː waʃarːuhum man saʕaaː lak bisuwqi jawmin blaː mn ksb sjʔia wʔaħaːtˤt bh χtˤjʔith fʔawlʔik ʔasˤħaːb aːlnaːr hm fjhaː χaːldwn ʔanaː ʔaħb aːlʃms likulːi ʃajʔin fatraaun hðh ljst aːlmra   aːltj   fjhaː hðh aːld͡ʒmla wakaaːnat aːlʔaansˤaaːru ʔaaʃadːahum taqaaːtˤuʕanaː wataʕaaːdijanaː falaaː julaaːmu bimalaaːmaai ʁajrihi ðalika aːljawmu aːlħaqːu faman ʃaaːʔa aːtːaχaða ʔiilaaː rabːihi maʔaːbanaː walaaː dijnakum ʔaabqajtum wlh aːld͡ʒwaːr aːlmnʃʔaːt fj aːlbħr kaːlʔaʕlaːm lqd zrʕt ħqlj baːlʃʕjr ʔaan jakuwna lizijaaːdaai aːllːafðˤi ʕalaaː aːlmaʕnaaː fatasˤijru aːlzːijaaːdaau ʕilːaaan maaːniʕaaan min fahmi aːlmaqsˤuwdi minhu waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlħamijdi aːldːunjaaː manaaːzilu  faraaːħilun wanaaːzilun faʔiinːamaaː ʔaahlaka aːlːaðijna min qablikum kaθraau masaaːʔiilihim waːχtilaːafuhum ʕalaaː ʔaanbijaaːʔiihim waʔaad͡ʒalːa fij aːlnːufuwsi mawdˤiʕanaː lm jsbq lnaː w ʔan rʔajnaː aːntħaːraː khðaː malʕuwnijna ʔaajnamaaː θuqifuwaː ʔauχiðuwaː waqutːiluwaː taqtijlanaː wd͡ʒħdwaː bhaː waːstjqnthaː ʔanfshm ðˤlmaː wʕlwaː faːnðˤr kjf kaːn ʕaːqba aːlmfsdjn laː ʔarjdk ʔan tqlq bʃʔanj msaːʔ aːlχjr  kjf ħaːlk  bʕd ʔan ʔanhjt ʕmlj  χrd͡ʒt lʔatnzh ʕndj qtˤaːn waruwija ʕanhu ʔaanːahum banuw aːmraʔaaai aːlrːad͡ʒuli min ʁajrihi wmn jtˤʕ aːllh wrswlh wjχʃ aːllh wjtqh fʔawlʔik hm aːlfaːʔizwn wldt fj "flstˤjn aːlmħtlh" ʔiilːaaː aːlmusˤalːijna wlʔin qtltm fj sbjl aːllh ʔaw mtm lmʁfra mn aːllh wrħma χjr mmaː jd͡ʒmʕwn ʔinhu jtħdθ aːlbrbrja lʔiustaːðh hl aːsttˤʕt ħl aːlmʃkla  mn aːld͡ʒmjl ʔan ʔakwn fj aːlmkaːn aːlmnaːsb lstu ʕaːd͡ʒzaː tˤlaːb aːlmdrsa aːlθaːnwja jðaːkrwn fj aːlfsˤl ldjh maː laː jql ʕn θlaːθmʔia ktaːb dʕnaː nnhj aːlwðˤjfa waqaaːla ʔaːχaru aːllːajlu waaːlnːahaaːru jaʕmalaaːni fijk faaːʕmal fijhimaaː wakajfa taʔaχuðuwnahu waqad ʔaafdˤaaː baʕdˤukum ʔiilaaː baʕdˤin waʔaaχaðna minkum mijθaaːqanaː ʁalijðˤanaː ʔaj fstaːn ʔanta tufdˤil ʔakθr  wabimiθli ðalika wasˤːaaː rasuwlu aːllːahi sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʔaasˤħaaːbahu wlaː jsttˤjʕwn lhm nsˤraː wlaː ʔanfshm jnsˤrwn ʔatðkr ʔanh sbq w ʔan rʔajthaː fj aːlmaːdˤj mn saːʕd twm ʔilaː rbhaː naːðˤra naħnu naqusˤːu ʕalajka nabaʔaahum biaːlħaqːi ʔiinːahum fitjaaun ʔaːmanuwaː birabːihim wazidnaaːhum hudanaː ʔið lajsa aːlwaaːħidu min aːlʔiiχwaaːni jumkinu aːliaːstiʕaaːnaau bihi fij kulːi ħaaːlin kun mħddaːan samiʕtu rswla aːllhi sˤalːaaː aːllhu ʕalajhi wasalːama jqwlu: ʔiðaaː ʔaaχaðuwaː fij munaaːðˤaraai aːlχusˤuwmi ðˤahara kalaaːmuhum ljs ldjnaː khrbaːʔ ʔinhaː ʃd͡ʒaːʕa wʔin ʕaːqbtm fʕaːqbwaː bmθl maː ʕwqbtm bh wlʔin sˤbrtm lhw χjr llsˤaːbrjn faːstmsk baːlðj ʔawħj ʔiljk ʔink ʕlaː sˤraːtˤ mstqjm aːlmd͡ʒd lʔawkraːnjaː haaːruwna ʔaaχij maː ʔantm ʕljh bfaːtnjn waʔaanːa ʔiilaaː rabːika aːlmuntahaaː ʔanwaːʕ kθjra mn aːlħjwaːnaːt aːχtft mn aːlʔardˤ ln jsjʔ lkm ʔaħd wjʕlmh aːlktaːb waːlħkma waːltwraːa waːlʔind͡ʒjl hj qdmt lj bʕdˤ aːltˤʕaːm surqt mnj saːʕtj aːlbaːrħa laːħðˤ wd͡ʒwda θqbin fj strth  lknh ħaːwl td͡ʒaːhlh wlqd χlqnaː aːlʔinsaːn wnʕlm maː twsws bh nfsh wnħn ʔaqrb ʔiljh mn ħbl aːlwrjd ʔalm tkn ʔaːjaːtj ttlaː ʕljkm fkntm bhaː tkðbwn waaːlsˤːubħi ʔiiðaaː tanafːasa faaːtˤːalaʕa faraʔaːhu fij sawaaːʔi aːld͡ʒaħijmi waaːlʕamala fursˤaaa faraaːʁik wʔiðaː rʔawk ʔin jtχðwnk ʔilaː hzwaː ʔahðaː aːlðj bʕθ aːllh rswlaː waaːlθːaaːnijaau ʔaan juqasˤːira fijhaaː juʕaðːibu man jaʃaaːʔu wajarħamu man jaʃaaːʔu waʔiilajhi tuqlabuwna naːqʃnaːh ʕn aːlχtˤa ʔafʔant tsmʕ aːlsˤm ʔaw thdj aːlʕmj wmn kaːn fj dˤlaːl mbjn nħn ʕlaː mʕrfa bʔahlh wʔiðaː twlaː sʕaː fj aːlʔardˤ ljfsd fjhaː wjhlk aːlħrθ waːlnsl waːllh laː jħb aːlfsaːd walaʕamrij ʔinːa aːlnːaaːsa ʕalaaː maaː wasˤafahum  laaː aːlʔiiχwaaːnu minhum jħb aːlʔaːnsaa smjθ d͡ʒmjʕu tˤlaːbhaː aːnaː fqtˤ aːfʕl maː bwsʕj faqad saaːwaaː aːltːaaːrikijna fij aːstiħqaaːqi aːlwaʕijdi tmnaː twm lw ʔanh lm jraː lm laː tdʕwnj ʔilaː tˤʕaːmk waʔaan laaː taʕluwaː ʕalaaː aːllːahi ʔiinːij ʔaːtijkum bisultˤaaːnin mubijnin hnaːk wrqa bjdˤaːʔ ʕlaː aːltˤaːwla faːstfthm ʔahm ʔaʃd χlqaː ʔam mn χlqnaː ʔinaː χlqnaːhm mn tˤjn laːzb lħsn aːlħðˤ  kaːn hnaːk mħl " ʔarmaːnj " qrjbanaː mn aːlrwaːq aːlðj naːm fjh djmaː faʔaamːaaː aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʔiiðaaː maaː aːbtalaaːhu rabːuhu faʔaakramahu wanaʕːamahu fajaquwlu rabːij ʔaakramani bχsˤwsˤ hðh aːlmsʔala  ʔanaː raːdˤ tmaːmaː ʔaaʔiinːakum lataʔatuwna aːlrːid͡ʒaaːla ʃahwaaan min duwni aːlnːisaaːʔi bal ʔaantum qawmun tad͡ʒhaluwna waaːlqasˤdu fij aːlʁinaaː waaːlfaqri ldjhaː ʃʕr mtmwd͡ʒ bl kðbwaː baːlħq lmaː d͡ʒaːʔhm fhm fj ʔamr mrjd͡ʒ ʔiinːa jawma aːlfasˤli mijqaaːtuhum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna waʔiiðaaː aːlʕiʃaaːru ʕutˤːilat waaːdˤrib lahum maθalanaː ʔaasˤħaaːba aːlqarjaai ʔiið d͡ʒaaːʔahaaː aːlmursaluwna θm nnd͡ʒj rslnaː waːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː kðlk ħqaː ʕljnaː nnd͡ʒ aːlmʔumnjn ʔinhu aːllaħm aːlðj jʔakulhu aːltˤfl θm ʔaʁrqnaː aːlʔaːχrjn nʕm, aːnhaː tʔulm hl aːtsˤl bj ʔaħd ʕndmaː knt fj aːlχaːrd͡ʒ  lqd twfj mnð θlaːθ snwaːt qum faʔaanðir maaː baqijt hl tʕrf kjf tstʕml aːlħaːswb  dʕwnaː nχrd͡ʒ mn hnaː qbl ʔan jraːnaː twm ʔanaː twm whðh maːrj ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ sjfaː ʔaʕd ʔiljː zwd͡ʒj fakajfa ʔiiðaaː tawafːathumu aːlmalaaːʔiikaau jadˤribuwna wud͡ʒuwhahum waʔaadbaaːrahum lm ʔark mnð snwaːt wmaː ʔadraːk maː aːlʕqba lχlq aːlsmaːwaːt waːlʔardˤ ʔakbr mn χlq aːlnaːs wlkn ʔakθr aːlnaːs laː jʕlmwn waʔaanːa aːlfaaːsida aːlrːaʔaji musˤaaːbun lʕlnaː ntbʕ aːlsħra ʔin kaːnwaː hm aːlʁaːlbjn ʔalaː trʁb fj ʔinhaːʔ ʕʃaːʔik kaːn hnaːlk θlaːθa rd͡ʒaːl baːlmlħ faraaːʁa ʔiilaaː ʔaːlihatihim faqaaːla ʔaalaaː taʔakuluwna lnħtfl fajawmaʔiiðin laaː janfaʕu aːlːaðijna ðˤalamuwaː maʕðiratuhum walaaː hum justaʕtabuwna laː bʔas wlknnj mtʕb qljlaː kaðːabuwaː qalijlanaː mina aːllːajli maaː jahd͡ʒaʕuwna wamaaː lija laaː ʔaaʕbudu aːlːaðij fatˤaranij waʔiilajhi turd͡ʒaʕuwna tzwd͡ʒt rd͡ʒlaːan ʕd͡ʒwzaːan wθrjaːan twnj jlʕb ʔanaː ʔaːsf, ʔanaː ʔaʕrf ʔanhu lm jkn wataʕaaːlaaː ʕamːaaː juʃrikuwna ʔaʕrf rd͡ʒlaː jħsn tklm aːlrwsja aːlʔaraːnb tħb ʔakl aːld͡ʒzr waman qaʕada ʕanhaaː ʔaatathu laː ʔaħd mn zmlaːʔij jʕjʃwn baːlqrb mn hnaː lst mʕtaːdaː ʕlaː mʃj msaːfaːt faman kaaːna mantˤiquhu fij ʁajri ðikrin faqad laʁaaː hl twaːfq ʕlaː hðaː  hj fj ħaːd͡ʒa llmzjd mn aːlnwm kaːrwl tdrs aːlʔasbaːnja mlaːʔaːt aːlsrjr ttʁjr mra kl ʔasbwʕ kam lbθt waqaaːla rad͡ʒulun twm aːlnaːr  kl aːbn ʔaːdm χtˤaːːʔ fj d͡ʒzrnaː aːlqmrja ʔiinːaaː kaðalika nafʕalu biaːlmud͡ʒrimijna ʕani aːlmud͡ʒrimijna aːʕðrnj ʕlaː aːltʔaχjr qaːl rb aːlmʃrq waːlmʁrb wmaː bjnhmaː ʔin kntm tʕqlwn ʔanhjt qraːʔa aːlktaːb aːlljla aːlmaːdˤja laː ʔaðˤnh mnaːsbaː lhðaː aːlʕml laː ʔasttˤjʕ ʔan ʔatħml ʔakθr mn hðaː mʕ mzjd mn aːlʕtˤʃ waːlʔalm ʔaajna raħmaau aːllːahi  qaaːla aːftħ aːlχzaːna ʕlaː jsaːrk std͡ʒd aːlzd͡ʒaːd͡ʒaːt hnaːk aːndlʕ ħrjq aːlljla aːlmaːdˤja wd͡ʒaːʔt kl nfs mʕhaː saːʔiq wʃhjd waʔiin jakaaːdu aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː lajuzliquwnaka biʔaabsˤaaːrihim lamːaaː samiʕuwaː aːlðːikra wajaquwluwna ʔiinːahu lamad͡ʒnuwnun walaaː tabluʁuwna maaː tahwuwna ʔilːaaː bitarki maaː taʃtahuwna lm ʔatʕmd d͡ʒrħhm qd aːsˤbħt aːllʁh aːlaːnd͡ʒljzjh hj aːlsaːʔidh ħwl aːlʕaːlm wjʕwd ðlk lʕda ʔasbaːb fafataħnaaː ʔaabwaaːba aːlsːamaaːʔ bimaaːʔ mːunhamirin qul ðlk faː aːlʔind͡ʒljzja hl trjd ʔan tʔakl qaaːla aːχsaʔiuwaː fijhaaː walaaː tukalːimuwni wlaː ʔanaː ʕaːbd maː ʕbdtm ʔarjd ʔan ʔamwt mʕ d͡ʒjtr baːlħd͡ʒ jʔatwk rd͡ʒaːlaː wʕlaː kl dˤaːmr jʔatjn mn kl fd͡ʒ ʕmjq waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi kulːamaaː ħasunat niʕmaau aːld͡ʒaaːhili aːzdaaːda qubħanaː ʔaðhb bkθra ʔilaː aːlmktba ʔanaː ʔaurjd bjra bʔakwaːb wʔabaːrjq wkʔas mn mʕjn frt mn qswra ʔatðkr aːlbjt aːlðj nʃʔat fjh bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm jaː ʔajhaː aːlnaːs aːtqwaː rbkm ʔin zlzla aːlsaːʕa ʃjʔ ʕðˤjm faʔiiðaaː ʕaqala aːlkalaaːma bisamʕihi fahima maʕaaːnijahu biqalbihi lazahidt fij tˤawijli maaː tard͡ʒuw min ʔaamalik ʔiinːahum kaaːnuwaː ʔiiðaaː qijla lahum laaː ʔiilaha ʔiilːaaː aːllːahu jastakbiruwna man ðaaː aːlːaðij juqridˤu aːllːaha qardˤanaː ħasananaː fajudˤaaːʕifahu lahu walahu ʔaad͡ʒrun karijmun ʔajmknk ʔiχbaːrj ʕn sbb ħbk lhaː  waqaaːla aːbnu ʕabːaaːsin radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhumaaː walaħmi tˤajrin mːimːaaː jaʃtahuwna waaːlʔiimsaaːku ʔiðʕaaːnun waaːlsːukuwtu ridˤanaː  waʔaan janqaaːda ʔilaaː aːlħaqːi ʔaawlaaː min ʔaan ʔalm jʕlmwaː ʔan aːllh jʕlm srhm wnd͡ʒwaːhm wʔan aːllh ʕlaːm aːlʁjwb lqd lftt aːntbaːhj waʔaaslamak ʔaahluk waħaʃamuk aːlχbr aːlsʕjd hw ʔanh bʔimkaːnnaː msaːʕdtk klaːmh laː jtmaːʃaː mʕ ʔafʕaːlh sʕa aːlχzaːn χmswn d͡ʒaːlwnaːan ʔilaː ʔaj mħtˤa stðhb  sna mn qd ʔarslnaː qblk mn rslnaː wlaː td͡ʒd lsntnaː tħwjlaː wlw traː ʔið fzʕwaː flaː fwt wʔaχðwaː mn mkaːn qrjb jaː bnj aːlswdaːn hðaː rmzkm jħml aːlʕbʔ wjħmj ʔardˤkm mnaːʕ llχjr mʕtd ʔaθjm θumːa ʔaatbaʕa sababanaː waʔamur ʔaahlaka biaːlsˤːalaaːai waaːsˤtˤabir ʕalajhaaː laaː nasʔaaluka rizqanaː naħnu narzuquka waaːlʕaaːqibaau liltːaqwaaː waʔaːtuwaː aːlnːisaaːʔa sˤaduqaaːtihinːa niħlaaan faʔiin tˤibna lakum ʕan ʃajʔin minhu nafsanaː fakuluwhu hanijʔianaː marijʔianaː ʔarjd ʔan ʔasˤbħ tˤbjba ʔaw mmrdˤa ʔaw mdrsa ʔimkaːnja tmdd aːlkwn ħqjqa tnbʔa bhaː aːlfjzjaːʔij ʔalbrt ʔajnʃtaːjn ʔiinːa ʔiilaaː rabːika aːlrːud͡ʒʕaaː faljaʔatuwaː biħadijθin mːiθlihi ʔiin kaaːnuwaː sˤaaːdiqijna wataðaruwna aːlʔaːχiraaa ʔin kaːn ldjk maː tqwl fqulh ʔinːa haðihi dalaaːlaaun faaːsidaaun waʔaaʁtˤaʃa lajlahaaː waʔaaχrad͡ʒa dˤuħaaːhaaː lqd aːdχrt maːʔih dwlaːr wmaː kaːn d͡ʒwaːb qwmh ʔilaː ʔan qaːlwaː ʔaχrd͡ʒwhm mn qrjtkm ʔinhm ʔanaːs jttˤhrwn aːlkl jʃaːhd krh aːlqdm ʔiin kulːu nafsin lːamːaaː ʕalajhaaː ħaaːfiðˤun himːaau aːlsːufahaaːʔi aːlrːiwaaːjaau wahimːaau aːlʕulamaaːʔi aːlrːiʕaaːjaau hðaːn aːltwʔamaːn ldjhmaː wd͡ʒhaːn mtmaːθlaːn ʕjsaː rswl mn aːllh ʕinda aːliaːmtiħaaːni jukramu aːlmarʔu ʔaaw juhaaːnu  faʔaamsaka ʕan d͡ʒawaaːbij faʔaad͡ʒmiʕuwaː kajdakum θumːa aːʔituwaː sˤafːanaː waqad ʔaaflaħa aːljawma mani aːstaʕlaaː jʕrf twm maː hw aːlmtˤlwb ʕmlh qaaːla hal ʕalimtum maaː faʕaltum bijuwsufa waʔaaχijhi ʔiið ʔaantum d͡ʒaaːhiluwna liʔaanːa maaː ʔaaʕwaza fijhi whw jχʃaː ʔaħb daːʔimaː ʔan ʔastmʕ llmwsjqaː aːlklaːsjkja ʕndmaː jkwn ldj wqt faːrʁ aːlðjn tˤʁwaː fj aːlblaːd lqd kaːn aːlrd͡ʒl aːlʔanaːnj mkrwhaː mn tˤrf zmlaːʔih qaaːluwaː ʔaanuʔuminu laka waaːtːabaʕaka aːlʔaarðaluwna aːlqnaːa aːlkubraː hj aːlmd͡ʒraː aːlmaːʔij aːlrʔijsj lmdjna aːlbndqja waaːʕlam ʔaanːa lilʔiinsaaːni fijmaaː kulːifa min ʕibaaːdaaːtihi θalaaːθa ʔaaħwaaːlin jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː aːtːaquwaː aːllːaha waquwluwaː qawlanaː sadijdanaː twm lm jrd ʔan jrqsˤ mʕ maːrj hðh stkwn mhma χtˤjra d͡ʒdaːan waʔaanʃadt ʕan aːlrːabijʕi lilʃːaaːfiʕijːi radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu ʔiinːaaː naħnu nariθu aːlʔaardˤa waman ʕalajhaaː waʔiilajnaaː jurd͡ʒaʕuwna jħbː aːljaːbaːnjːwn ʔakl aːltwnaː ldjnaː mktba mdrsja d͡ʒmjla aːsmj saːlj tawaqːaf ʕan zijaaːraai kulːi jawmin ʔiðaaː ʔaakθart malːaka man tazuwru waqaaːla ʔaːχaru ʕndj θmaːnja ʔiχwa waʔaaqbala baʕdˤuhum ʕalaaː baʕdˤin jatasaaːʔaluwna fʔaθaːbhm aːllh bmaː qaːlwaː d͡ʒnaːt td͡ʒrj mn tħthaː aːlʔanhaːr χaːldjn fjhaː wðlk d͡ʒzaːʔ aːlmħsnjn ʕaaːlimu aːlʁajbi falaaː juðˤhiru ʕalaaː ʁajbihi ʔaaħadanaː wllh mlk aːlsmaːwaːt waːlʔardˤ waːllh ʕlaː kl ʃjʔ qdjr waʔaafʕaaːlu aːlχajri tatawasːatˤu bajna raðijlatajni ʔanaː ʔafkr fjk tˤwaːl aːljwm waaːlwad͡ʒhu aːlθːaaːliθu laaː jusˤadːaʕuwna ʕanhaaː walaaː junzifuwna hl jmknk aːn tsaːʕdjnj fsbħ baːsm rbk aːlʕðˤjm aːld͡ʒmjʕ jmwt aːʕrdˤ lnaː baːχtsˤaːr ħaːltk aːʃrb aːlkθjr mn aːlmaːʔ ħqaː jd͡ʒb ʔan nqwm bʃjʔ ħjaːl hðaː aːlʔamr rbmaː twm ldjhu ʃjʔiaːan lʔiχfaːʔih aːlħamdu lilːahi rabːi aːlʕaaːlamijna wamaaː ʔaarsalnaaːka ʔiilːaaː mubaʃːiranaː wanaðijranaː lm ʔasˤduq mʕk tmaːmaː qad ʔaaflaħa man zakːaaːhaaː wtwkl ʕlaː aːllh wkfaː baːllh wkjlaː aːnhjt ʕmlj aːljwm w mqr baːld͡ʒmjl twfjt ʔamj ʕndmaː knt sˤʁjraː w sˤmwd ʃq llʔinsaːn drbh ʔatðkrnj ʔaanːahu kaaːna laaː jatruku aːlmarʔa mufrad͡ʒanaː ħatːaaː jadˤumːahu ʔilaaː qabijlaain jakuwnu fijhaaː fj hðaː aːlnaːdj χmswn ʕdˤwaː aːld͡ʒw baːrd hðaː aːlsˤbaːħ ʔinhaː sˤʁjra qaaːla lahum muwsaaː ʔaalquwaː maaː ʔaantum mulquwna wmaː ʔamrnaː ʔilaː waːħda klmħ baːlbsˤr waqaaːla aːltˤːaaːʔiijːu sʔad͡ʒʕlk sʕjdanaː ʔanaː aːltqjt frjd ʕlaː aːlʃaːrʕ blʁt snː aːlzwaːd͡ʒ aːlʔaːn hw ljs tˤbjbaː qtˤb twm ħaːd͡ʒbjh d͡ʒaːʔ aːltˤaːlb mn lndn walam jaʕduhaaː ʔilaaː bidʕaain ʔanaː wd͡ʒdt aːlbnaːʔ famaaː tanfaʕuhum ʃafaaːʕaau aːlʃːaaːfiʕijna walajsa fij haðaaː aːlqasˤdi taʔaθijrun fij dijnin walaaː qadaħun fij muruwʔaain aːlkθjr mn aːlʔazwaːd͡ʒ jnthj bhm aːlʔamr ʔilaː aːltˤlaːq swf ʔaʕaːwd aːlʔitsˤaːla laːħqaːan twm laː jθq bmaːrj bʕd aːlʔaːn waaːtːaquwaː aːlːaðij ʔaamadːakum bimaaː taʕlamuwna twm mħsˤn  lkn maːrj ljst kðlk jaʕnij ʔaanːa ħubːahu jaltasˤiqu binijaaːtˤi aːlqalbi qaːl mwʕdkm jwm aːlzjna wʔan jħʃr aːlnaːs dˤħaː       ʔin jsʔalkmwhaː fjħfkm tbχlwaː wjχrd͡ʒ ʔadˤʁaːnkm bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm aːlm ʔanaː ʔaħbːkm w ʕlaː ʔaʃlaːʔinaː nsˤnʕ md͡ʒdaː mlʕwnjn ʔajnmaː θqfwaː ʔaχðwaː wqtlwaː tqtjlaː waluwtˤanaː ʔiið qaaːla liqawmihi ʔiinːakum lataʔatuwna aːlfaaːħiʃaaa maaː sabaqakum bihaaː min ʔaaħadin mina aːlʕaaːlamijna waman kaaːna naðˤaruhu fij ʁajri aːʕtibaaːrin faqad sahaaː bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ʔinaː ʔaʕtˤjnaːk aːlkwθr jrjd aːlklb lħmaː sjsaːʕdk hðaː aːlktaːb fj draːstk twm laː jsttˤjʕ aːlbqaːʔ tˤwjlaː flnbdʔa aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕ hðaː nsˤ ʔind͡ʒjlj waqijla fij baʕdˤi aːlmawaaːʕiðˤi qrrt ʔan ʔatrk aːlmdrsa aːlʕaaːlimi ʁarijbun waʔiiqlaaːlahu ʕad͡ʒijbun bima nilt haðaaː aːlʕilma  qaaːla waʕawaaːridˤi aːlʃːahawaaːti sʔaltnj ʔijmjlj sʔuaːlaːan hðh aːlʔaqsaːm ljst ʕaːzla llsˤwt ħqanaː wlqd zjnaː aːlsmaːʔ aːldnjaː bmsˤaːbjħ trd ʔan jbqaː hnaːk lmda ʔatˤwl rasuwlu aːllːahi sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʔam jħsbwn ʔanaː laː nsmʕ srhm wnd͡ʒwaːhm blaː wrslnaː ldjhm jktbwn hw jrd͡ʒʕ ʔilaː bjth waʕalaaː aːlfadˤli waaːltːaχsˤijsˤi dalijlanaː sʔabqaːa hnaː ʔilaː ʔan trd͡ʒʕ aːlsˤaːlwn aːlaːftraːdˤj llħaːsˤljn ʕlaː aːlbaːkaːlwrjaː ʔiilːaaː raħmaaan minːaaː wamataaːʕanaː ʔiilaaː ħijnin kaːn saːmj bʃʕr md͡ʒʕd hl trjd qhwa  walilʔaːχiri biaːlʔaawːali muzdad͡ʒaranaː maː aːlqaːrʕa ʔaldjk mn hðaː ʔalwaːn ʔaχraː  walaw kaaːna maaː tadˤamːana haðajni aːlnːawʕajni bjnj wbjnk  tˤrjqa tfkjrh dˤħla wnaːdwaː jaː maːlk ljqdˤ ʕljnaː rbk qaːl ʔinkm maːkθwn hl ttħdθ aːlʔisbraːntw  ħaːwl twm qtlj watuʕaaːnidu ʔaahlahu haðaaː aːlʕinaaːda mtaː tstjqðˤ kl jwm  waqaaːluwaː ʔinːa aːlrːad͡ʒula ʔiðaaː ʔaakraha aːlmarʔaaaa wahija maðʕuwraaun θumːa ʔaaðukirat ʔaand͡ʒabat kiraaːmin bararaain hl tʕrf kjf tqwd sjaːra  ʔarjd ʔan ʔasˤbħ mʕlmaː mn aːlʁaːʔib kðbt ʕaːd fkjf kaːn ʕðaːbj wnðr aːnh ltˤjf sddt baːlnqd mn aːlʔafdˤl ʔalaː tχbraː ʔabaːkmaː baːlħaːdθ lqd trʕrʕ bʃda hðaː aːlmwqʕ mfjd d͡ʒdaː hw jstħiq ʔan jusd͡ʒan aːʕtraf baːlħqjqa fd͡ʒʔaaan bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm aːqtrb llnaːs ħsaːbhm whm fj ʁfla mʕrdˤwn ʔanaː ʔaʕaːrdˤ ʔistχdaːm aːlmwt kʕqwba, w ʔaʕaːrdˤ ʔajdˤaːan ʔistχdaːmhu kmkaːfʔaa walilːahi maaː fij aːlsːamaaːwaaːti wamaaː fij aːlʔaardˤi wakafaaː biaːllːahi wakijlanaː faaːlsːaaːbiqaaːti sabqanaː wʔiðaː aːld͡ʒħjm sʕrt faʔaaχaðahu ʔaabuw aːlʕataaːhijaai faqaaːla bħθt ʕn aːld͡ʒzaːʔir fj d͡ʒwd͡ʒl fqtˤ ʔawqf hðaː sʔaðˤl bʕjdaːan ʕn drbk ʔanta qd trʁb fj aːltħduθ ʔilaː twm fij quluwbihim mːaradˤun fazaaːdahumu aːllːahu maradˤanaː walahum ʕaðaaːbun ʔaalijmun bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jakðibuwna ʕljnaː ʔibqaːʔ hðh aːlmʕlwmaːt fj tˤj aːlktmaːn fj aːlwqt aːlħaːdˤr waʔaanʃada ʔaabuw aːlqaaːsimi aːlʔaːmidijːu θm ʔin ʕljnaː bjaːnh maː hj aːllʁa aːltj jtklmwnhaː fj aːlmksjk waːħll ʕqda mn lsaːnj ʔaʃk ʔannj sʔanhj hðaː aːljwm waaːlrːibħu χusraaːnanaː wʔin lk lʔad͡ʒraː ʁjr mmnwn dˤħk aːld͡ʒmjʕ ʕlaː d͡ʒaːk ʔinh waaːlsːamaaːʔi ðaaːti aːlħubuki maː aːlðj traːhu fjh  twd͡ʒd χtˤʔa fj aːld͡ʒmla mnːaːd jħbː aːlʕhraːt sʔalathu wrdː binʕm hl ʔanta sˤdjqj  waqaaːla aːlχalijlu bnu ʔaaħmada ʔan aːʕml saːbʁaːt wqdr fj aːlsrd waːʕmlwaː sˤaːlħaː ʔinj bmaː tʕmlwn bsˤjr wʔawħjnaː ʔilaː mwsaː ʔan ʔasr bʕbaːdj ʔinkm mtbʕwn fðkr fmaː ʔant bnʕmt rbk bkaːhn wlaː md͡ʒnwn bsm aːllh aːlrħmaːn aːlrħjm fasˤlun waʔaamːaaː aːlmuʔuaaːχaaːau biaːlmawadːaai fahal d͡ʒazajthaaː  qaaːla laaː walaaː bizafraain waaːħidaain wql aːlħmd llh sjrjkm ʔaːjaːth ftʕrfwnhaː wmaː rbk bʁaːfl ʕmaː tʕmlwn waqad qaaːla aːlmaʔamuwnu raħimahu aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː hl aːlʔawz jraːa aːllh  haːa fqdt waːldhaː faːi aːlbħr maː jqwlh ljs ldjh mʕnaː baʕijdun min aːlnːaaːri ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ aːlaː skjn kaːn mdʁdʁaː lqd wqʕt fj aːlχtˤʔa ðaːth aːtbʕwaː maː ʔanzl ʔiljkm mn rbkm wlaː ttbʕwaː mn dwnh ʔawljaːʔ qljlaː maː tðkrwn θumːa ʔaaχaðtu aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː fakajfa kaaːna nakijri lʔaj mdaː jmtd aːlkwn hl tlaːms aːlsmaːʔ ħdwd aːlʔardˤ  waʔiiðaaː quriʔia ʕalajhimu aːlqurʔaːnu laaː jasd͡ʒuduwna wzʕ ʕljnaː aːlwrq aːlsmaːʔ mnftˤr bh kaːn wʕdh mfʕwlaː ʔiinːa fij ðalika laðikraaː liman kaaːna lahu qalbun ʔaaw ʔaalqaaː aːlsːamʕa wahuwa ʃahijdun ʔiinːa ʕaðaaːba rabːika lawaaːqiʕun aːstmrwaː bmkaːfħa aːlħrjq ʕlaː ħsaːb ħjaːthm kjf trjdh  walaʔiin ʔaarsalnaaː rijħanaː faraʔaawhu musˤfarːanaː laðˤalːuwaː min baʕdihi jakfuruwna jd͡ʒb ʕljhm ħl ʔanaː knt ʔafkr hl trʁb baːlzwaːd͡ʒ  ʔaħb aːllħwm aːlħmraːʔ mn qaːblta fj mktbj baːlʔams bld͡ʒjkj ʔinhaː d͡ʒmjla mθl ʔaχthaː aːlkbjra tmaːmaː laː ʔaħbh hl ʔasttˤjʕ aːlħsˤwl ʕlaː kʔas mn aːlnbjð aːlʔabjdˤ bʃra aːlʔinsaːn ħsaːsaun d͡ʒdaː lltʁjr fj aːlħraːra wʔin lm tʔumnwaː lj faːʕtzlwn qaːlwaː lbθnaː jwmaː ʔaw bʕdˤ jwm faːsʔal aːlʕaːdjn ʔajn hw  ʔaʕrf ʔastaːðaː llʔind͡ʒljzja d͡ʒaːʔ mn kndaː aːnaː aːʕrf aːnk laː tħbjnj rfʕ ħwaːd͡ʒbh waːsˤbr wmaː sˤbrk ʔilaː baːllh wlaː tħzn ʕljhm wlaː tk fj dˤjq mmaː jmkrwn waːlðjn jʔutwn maː ʔaːtwaː wqlwbhm wd͡ʒla ʔanhm ʔilaː rbhm raːd͡ʒʕwn aːlmʔumn laː ʔalaː lh aːlħkm whw ʔasrʕ aːlħaːsbjn w aːktbwhaː bdmaːʔ aːlʃhdaː wzjtwnaː wnχlaː waaːlnːahaaːri ʔiiðaaː tad͡ʒalːaaː bnaː aːlrwmaːn hðaː aːld͡ʒsr hl trjd smkaːan  maː χtˤbk aːlljla jaː twm  jrsl aːlsmaːʔ ʕljkm mdraːraː twfj ʔabj qbl ʕaːmjn hðaː aːlktaːb ʔaħmr fj ħaːl tʕtˤl brnaːmd͡ʒ mʕaːld͡ʒa aːlnsˤwsˤ ndˤmn lk tʕwjdˤh md͡ʒaːnaː biʔaajjikumu aːlmaftuwnu ʔanta aːnzl ʕn drːaːd͡ʒtj hl tqwmwn bʔiʕaːda aːltsˤnjʕ  hl hj mjta  waθamaraau aːlqalbi aːlwaladu jmθl aːlaːnqraːdˤ d͡ʒzʔaː mn aːlttˤwr waʔaːχaru min ʃaklihi ʔaazwaaːd͡ʒun hkðaː  sʔadˤrb ʕsˤfwrjn bħd͡ʒr waːħd daːrwjn ʁjra kl ʃjʔ llaːsf jaː ʔamj ﺃʕtqd ðlk ʔasˤbħ rʔijsaː llʃrka fj sn aːlθlaːθjn hn jstmʕn llmðjaːʕ ʔiinːahu ʕalaaː rad͡ʒʕihi laqaaːdirun ðhb lʃrb aːlbjra mʕ aːlʔasˤdqaːʔ ʔinhaː lwrj kaːn aːlqraːsˤna jsthdfwn aːlsfn aːltd͡ʒaːrja ʁjr aːlmslħa aːθnj rkbtjk ʔink tχjfnj fj bʕdˤ aːlʔaħjaːn hl tʕtqd aːn twm jfʕl hðaː aːlʔan tqbl mnj ʔatˤjb aːltħjaːt wbnjn ʃhwdaː wamaaː tilka bijamijnika jaaː muwsaaː tbdw mtʕbaː aːlrħmn ʕlaː aːlʕrʃ aːstwaː faaːdχulij fij ʕibaaːdij faːʃhdwaː faːʃhdwaː faːʃhdwaː ʔatnaːwl daːʔimaː kwbaː mn aːlħljb qbl ʔan ʔanaːm jasʔaaluwnaka ʕani aːlsːaaːʕaai ʔaajːaaːna mursaaːhaaː hl trjd ʔan tstmʕ ʔanaː ʔajdˤaː laː ʔasttˤjʕ fʕl hðaː liʔaanːahaaː mawdˤuwʕaaun ʕalaaː aːltːaʁjijri waaːlfanaaːʔi waʔiiðaaː ʔaaʕsart tarakuwk wmaː ʔahlknaː mn qrja ʔilaː lhaː mnðrwn hl hj sˤdjqa  hl tʃaːrk fj hðh aːlfʕaːlja  hum ħtaːa laː jʕrfwn mn sjltqwn walilzːuhdi fijhi tarkun kalːaaː sajaʕlamuwna ʔaʁlbja aːlfnaːdq mftwħa tˤwaːl aːlʕaːm hðaː ħsˤaːn jmknk aːltdχjn hnaː wajusaaːwija aːlkabijra aːlmuntahij tħtfðˤ kjt bklb wmaː jʁnj ʕnh maːlh ʔiðaː trdaː ħaːwlt ʔan ʔansaːk ʃkraːan lki ʕlaː ltˤfki aːltqjt bmaːrj aːlbaːrħa mnːaːd jħaːwl ʃraːʔ mnzl aːlnaːs laː jmkn ʔan tʕjʃ ʔilaː aːlʔabd lm jkn twm aːkbrmn kaaːna ʕaðaaːbij wanuðuri ʔanaː ħtaːa lstu mtʔakdaːan ʔin kaːn hðaː mftaːħj aːlχaːtm laː jdχl fj ʔisˤbʕj fʃil bsbb qla aːlmaːl ħdjθun ħasanun rwaːh aːltːirmðjːu wʁjruh hkðaː kaːn mnaːd jnðˤf aːlbjt ljs mhmaː maː tqwlh bl maː tfʕlh ʔajmknk ʔan tʔatj lʔaχðj mn aːlmħtˤa  man lam jatːaʕiðˤ bimawti waladin ðawaaːtaaː ʔaafnaaːnin jusqawna min raħijqin maχtuwmin ʔaafalaaː jaʕlamu ʔiiðaaː buʕθira maaː fij aːlqubuwri bʔimkaːn d͡ʒaːk tħdθ aːlfrnsja ʃadjdu sawaːdi aːlʃːaʕri swf ʔaːtj ʁdaː mra ʔaχraː waːrtdaː md͡ʒd aːlħdˤaːraːt wʃaːħaː tʕd͡ʒbnj aːllʁa aːljaːbaːnja kθjraː hðaː sjʔi ʔaːml ʔan jsttˤjʕ ʔan aːlθlaːd͡ʒa aːlwaladu mabχalaaun mad͡ʒhalaaun mad͡ʒbanaaun maħzanaaun ljs bʔimkaːnj ʔan ʔatħml aːlʔalm ʔakθr laː jd͡ʒb ʕljk ʔan tstmʕ   maː jqwl nħn χlqnaːhm wʃddnaː ʔasrhm wʔiðaː ʃʔinaː bdlnaː ʔaafaraʔaajta aːlːaðij tawalːaaː lm ʔafhmh ʕlaː aːlʔitˤlaːq wahalːaaː kaaːna aːlħaðaru ʔaaʁlaba ʕalajhi waqad nadaba aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː ʔilajhi tsttˤjʕ ʔijmjlj ʔan tsbħ faːsˤfħ ʕnhm wql slaːm fswf biaːlbajːinaaːti wabiaːlzːuburi wabiaːlkitaaːbi aːlmunijri qdːmtu tqrjrj ltwm aːlχbz ljs tˤaːzd͡ʒaːan lqd wdˤħ aːlmʃkla bmθaːl waːqʕj ʔajn ʔasttˤjʕ ʔan ʔad͡ʒd sjaːra ʔad͡ʒra mʕ aːnnj knt d͡ʒaːlsaːan aːlʔalbaːnja  waqad rawaaː bdʔa mnːaːd jʕml ʕndmaː ʔaχbrt twm bʔanj d͡ʒaːʔiʕ ʔaχbrnj bʔanh d͡ʒaːʔiʕ hw aːlʔaːχr lm jrfʕ aːlstaːr ħtaː aːlʔaːn km lk ʕndj  - ʔarbʕa jwrw lw smħt waqad qaaːlat aːlħukamaaːʔu rubːa sˤidːijqin ʔaawadːu min ʃaqijqin hw laː jrjd ʔan jʕtrf baːlhzjma maــwtˤiــniــj maــwtˤiــniــj aːlʃbaːbu ln jkilaː hamuːhu ʔan tstaqiـlaː ʔaw jabjd ħfðˤ d͡ʒmjʕ mn fj aːlsˤf aːlqsˤjda ʕn ðˤhr qlb wakaʔasanaː dihaaːqanaː faaːʕlam ʔaanːahu laaː ʔiilaha ʔiilːaaː aːllːahu waaːstaʁfir liðanbika walilmuʔuminijna waaːlmuʔuminaaːti waaːllːahu jaʕlamu mutaqalːabakum wamaθwaaːkum wqaːl qrjnh hðaː maː ldj ʕtjd ʔilaː aːlʁd ʔinh mħðˤwðˤ ʔakθr mmaː hw ðkj aːlsˤraːʕ bjn ʔisraːʔijl wswrjaː jtfaːqm waʔiinːa rabːaka lajaʕlamu maaː tukinːu sˤuduwruhum wamaaː juʕlinuwna ʔiðaː aːbtsm aːlmhzwm ʔafqd aːlmntsˤr lða aːlfwz kaːn saːmj ʕlaː maː juraːm kul χdˤraːwaːtk maː ʔad͡ʒml smaːʕ hðh aːlqaːfja ql lj jħb twm aːlħdjθ ʕn aːld͡ʒwlf qaaːla mud͡ʒaaːhidun qaːl rb bmaː ʔaʁwjtnj lʔazjnn lhm fj aːlʔardˤ wlʔaʁwjnhm ʔad͡ʒmʕjn wad͡ʒahlu maaː jabtadiʔiu bihi aːlmutaʕalːimu ʔaaqbaħu min d͡ʒahli maaː jantahij ʔilajhi aːlʕaaːlimu kl ʃjʔ ħwlj jðkrnj bk ʔinhu ʔaqtbaːs mn aːlktaːb aːlχmjs aːlqaːdm hw jwm ʕtˤla lqd ʃrːfat d͡ʒaːmʕtnaː waʔaanːa ʕalajhi aːlnːaʃʔaaaa aːlʔauχraaː lmaːðaː laː trjdwn ʔan tχbrwnaː baːlħqjqa  famaaː minkum mːin ʔaaħadin ʕanhu ħaaːd͡ʒizijna kaːnwaː qljlaː mn aːlljl maː jhd͡ʒʕwn wlwlaː nʕma rbj lknt mn aːlmħdˤrjn hl tʕlm aːn aːlsltˤʕwn jʔakl aːlʃraːʁf ʔaχbrt waːldjː bnwaːjaːj ʔanaː mskjn ʔinh mʕrwf llbld bʔasrh tsˤl kl jwm aːlkθjr mn aːlrsaːʔil aːlʔilktrwnja aːltj tstħq ʔan nʔaχðhaː bʕjn aːlaːʕtbaːr qwlnaː waːlʕmـl fj sbjl aːlkmaːl ʔin aːllh rbj wrbkm faːʕbdwh hðaː sˤraːtˤ mstqjm ʔinːh mħaːmin wjd͡ʒb ʔan jʕaːml ʕlaː hðaː aːlʔasaːs sʔabqaː ʔakθr qljlaː maː ħdθ fj fjjt naːm kaːn kaːlkaːbws faqaaːla ʔaanaaː rabːukumu aːlʔaaʕlaaː wkjf tʔaχðwnh wqd ʔafdˤaː bʕdˤkm ʔilaː bʕdˤ wʔaχðn mnkm mjθaːqaː ʁljðˤaː jbdw qwjaːan saːmj bχjr faʔaaχaða haðaaː aːlmaʕnaaː mansˤuwru bnu ʔismaaːʕijla faqaaːla waʔiinːahu laqasamun lːaw taʕlamuwna ʕaðˤijmun ðalika biʔaanːahum ʃaaːqːuwaː aːllːaha warasuwlahu waman juʃaaːqiqi aːllːaha warasuwlahu faʔiinːa aːllːaha ʃadijdu aːlʕiqaaːbi hðh ʔawl mra ʔaktb baːllʁa aːlʕrbja aːfʕl maː tħb bʕd aːlmʕaːnaːa tʔatj aːlrfaːhja jd͡ʒb ʕljk ʔan tktb rsaːlaan qul ʔiinːij laaː ʔaamliku lakum dˤarːanaː walaaː raʃadanaː waːllh ʔaʕlm bmaː jwʕwn ʃkraːan lħbk kaːnt kʔam θaːnja baːlnsba lj nðˤr ʔiljː ʃzranaː wd͡ʒdt mtˤʕmaː mksjkjaː d͡ʒjdaː dʕnaː fqtˤ nsˤbħ ʔasˤdqaːʔ waːħd mn ʔasˤdqaːʔij jʕrifk hl aːnt mʃʁwl aːljwm  ʔant smnt stdˤjʕ aːlfrsˤa maː lm ttχð qraːraː bsrʕa ʔiinːaaː makːanːaaː lahu fij aːlʔaardˤi waʔaːtajnaaːhu min kulːi ʃajʔin sababanaː ljs aːlmstʃfaː mzdħm ʔinhaː laː tħb aːlswʃj maaːliki jawmi aːldːijni ʔið qaːl aːllːahu jaħkumu bajnakum jawma aːlqijaaːmaai fijmaaː kuntum fijhi taχtalifuwna wmn χft mwaːzjnh fʔawlʔik aːlðjn χsrwaː ʔanfshm fj d͡ʒhnm χaːldwn waqijla liʔaabij hurajraaa radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu laːa juʔuminu ʔaaħadukum ħatːaaː juħibːa lʔaiaχijhi maaː juħibːu linafsihi lam jaχlu ʔaan jakuwna sˤadijqanaː d͡ʒaaːhilanaː ʔaaw ʕaduwːanaː ʕaaːqilanaː jurijduwna ʔaan jaχrud͡ʒuwaː mina aːlnːaaːri wamaaː hum biχaaːrid͡ʒijna minhaaː walahum ʕaðaaːbun muqijmun wkaːn lh θmr fqaːl lsˤaːħbh whw jħaːwrh ʔanaː ʔakθr mnk maːlaː wʔaʕz nfraː waʔaanta taχdumuhaaː watuħibːu mawtahaaː maːrjaː tsaːʕd waːldthaː wamaaː janbaʁij lilrːaħmani ʔaan jatːaχiða waladanaː hj lm tktʃf aːlħqjqa ʔabdaː ħðˤh jsbq ðkaːʔh hðh ljst lʕba wazuruwʕin wamaqaaːmin karijmin fsd͡ʒd aːlmlaːʔika klhm ʔad͡ʒmʕwn ʔajħsb ʔan ln jqdr ʕljh ʔaħd tbχr aːlmaːʔ waʔiiðaaː ðabaħtum faʔaaħsinuwaː aːlðːibħaaa waljuħidːa ʔaaħadukum ʃafratahu waljuriħ ðabijħatahu ʔintðˤr dqjqa, jaː twm tbrːʕa baːlkθjr mn aːlmaːl laː ʔasˤdq ʔan ʕljː ʔaχð aːχtbaːr jwm aːlʔaħd km jwd͡ʒd mn sʔuaːl ʔinh jtħdθ aːlʔan mʕhaː wajaʕmalu fijhaaː ʕamala aːlrːaaːʁibijna nbhnj ʔalaː ʔaqwd bsrʕa hl hnaːk mn jtħdθ aːlaːnd͡ʒljzja  qaːlwaː taːllh lqd ʕlmtm maː d͡ʒʔinaː lnfsd fj aːlʔardˤ wmaː knaː saːrqjn klaː sjkfrwn bʕbaːdthm wjkwnwn ʕljhm dˤdaː ʕdt mn aːlmdrsa ʔanti aːnzlj ʕn drːaːd͡ʒtj qaːl jaː qwm ʔinj lkm nðjr mbjn laaː taʕd͡ʒizanːa walaaː jadχulk mudˤd͡ʒiraaun faaːlnːud͡ʒħu jahliku bajna aːlʕad͡ʒzi waaːldˤːad͡ʒari ʔaːlʔaːna waqad ʕasˤajta qablu wakunta mina aːlmufsidijna ʔanaː fj qaːʕa aːlʔintðˤaːr ʔanaː mstʕda ʔarjd ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilaː aːlmdrsa waʔaamsaka min qawlihi wawasiʕathu aːlsːunːaau χð maː tʃaːʔ mn aːlwqt aːnðˤur kajfa fadˤːalnaaː baʕdˤahum ʕalaaː baʕdˤin walalʔaːχiraau ʔaakbaru darad͡ʒaaːtin waʔaakbaru tafdˤijlanaː ʔanaː ʔatttˤlʕ lrħla aːltzld͡ʒ χaːsˤtnaː raːtbj laː jsmħ lnaː ʔan nʕjʃ brfaːhja aːlʔaːn ʔaʕrf kjf sʔaħaːrbk qaːl ʕlj ʕljh aːlslaːm:     twʁr aːlqlwb w twħʃ aːlaːsˤħaːb ʔin fj ðlk lðkraː lmn kaːn lh qlb ʔaw ʔalqaː aːlsmʕ whw ʃhjd ʔanaː mʕd͡ʒbaun bmhaːrth fj aːlqjaːda faʔiiðaaː faraʁta faaːnsˤab btlaːtun tttˤaːjr fj aːlrjħ ʔanaː laː ʔaʕrf kjfja aːstχdaːmhaː bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi waaːlnːaaːziʕaaːti ʁarqanaː ʔiinːa haðaaː lahuwa aːlbalaaːʔu aːlmubijnu nmr mftrs ʔamaːmk χjr mn χaːʔin wraːʔik ʕalajk biaːlʕilmi waaːlʔiikθaaːri minhu faʔiinːa qalijlahu ʔaaʃbahu ʃajʔin biqalijli aːlχajri dʕnj ʔadˤjf aːlmaːʔ laː tqlq ʔanaː ldj tʔamjn liqusˤuwri himːatihi ʕalaaː maaː ʔaadraka θm ʔawlaː lk fʔawlaː waaːðkur fij aːlkitaaːbi marjama ʔiiði aːntabaðat min ʔaahlihaaː makaaːnanaː ʃarqijːanaː jaː ʔajhaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː hl ʔadlkm ʕlaː td͡ʒaːra tnd͡ʒjkm mn ʕðaːb ʔaljm wʔin kaːdwaː ljstfzwnk mn aːlʔardˤ ljχrd͡ʒwk mnhaː wʔiðaː laː jlbθwn χlaːfk ʔilaː qljlaː ʔanaː ʔaʕtqd ʔan ðlk baːldˤbtˤ maː jtwqʕh twm mnk wad͡ʒaʕaltu lahu maaːlanaː mamduwdanaː aːlðj χlqk fswaːk fʕdlk bdwn aːlmwsjqaː, aːlʕaːlm sjkwn kmaːn mumil wahaðihi aːlħaaːlaau ʔaaqwaaː min aːlːatij baʕdahaaː liðˤuhuwri aːlsˤːifaaːti aːlmatˤluwbaai min ʁajri takalːufin litˤalabihaaː lm ʔakn ʔatwqʕ ʔannj sʔabħθ jwmanaː maː ʕn " fjaːʁraː " fj wjkjbjdjaː ʕndmaː samiʕa aːlʔaχbaːr, tħwla ʃaːħbaːan θm d͡ʒʕlnaːk ʕlaː ʃrjʕa fd͡ʒʕlnaːh smjʕaː bsˤjraː wʔamaː aːlðjn kfrwaː ʔaflm tkn ʔaːjaːtj ttlaː ʕljkm faːstkbrtm wkntm qwmaː md͡ʒrmjn kitaaːbun ʔaunzila ʔiilajka falaaː jakun fij sˤadrika ħarad͡ʒun minhu litunðira bihi waðikraaː lilmuʔuminijna qtˤk laː jrjd ʔan jnzl mn mktbj waʔiinːa ʔaand͡ʒaba aːlnːisaaːʔi aːlfaruwku ʔauħibːu ʔaalaːː ʔaaqwma biʃajʔin χilaːla aːlʕutˤlai wamaaː ʔaadraaːka maaː sid͡ʒːijnun sajaquwluwna lilːahi qul ʔaafalaaː tatːaquwna aːlkθjr mn aːlnaːs jd͡ʒhlwn ʔan aːlmdˤaːdaːt aːlħjwja ljst ldjhaː tʔaθjr ʕlaː aːlʔamraːdˤ aːlfjrwsja tdχl fjmaː knt ʔaqwm bh fkðbwh fʕqrwhaː fdmdm ʕljhm rbhm bðnbhm fswaːhaː wahuwa bikulːi ʔaaħadin qabijħun wabiaːlʕulamaaːʔi ʔaaqbaħu maaː baʕaθa aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː min baʕdihi nabijːanaː ʔilːaaː fij θarwaain min qawmihi waqaaːla ʕabdu aːllːahi bnu masʕuwdin radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu lijaʕlama ʔaan qad ʔaablaʁuwaː risaaːlaaːti rabːihim waʔaaħaaːtˤa bimaaː ladajhim waʔaaħsˤaaː kulːa ʃajʔin ʕadadanaː ʔaaraaːhum ʔiðaaː ʔaajsart lazimuwk waqaaːla firʕawnu jaaː haaːmaaːnu aːbni lij sˤarħanaː laʕalːij ʔaabluʁu aːlʔaasbaaːba qaːl fʔink mn aːlmnðˤrjn sjdnj hj ʔakbr mdjna fj aːstraːljaː laaː tanaaːluwna maaː tuħibːuwna ʔilːaaː biaːlsˤːabri ʕalaaː baʕdˤu aːlʕulamaaːʔi aːnaː raːhb wamaaː ʔaadraaːka maaː saqaru aːunðˤur ʔilaaː qawli aːlʃːaaːʕir ʔaj ʃjʔ ʔaːχr aːstχdm qdmjk lqd knt sˤaːmtaː lmda tˤwjla wʕlaː fkra jmknk mnaːdaːtj bi”twm“ hj stntðˤr qrja ʕtt ʕn ʔamr rbhaː wrslh fħaːsbnaːhaː ħsaːbaː ʃdjdaː wʕðbnaːhaː ʕðaːbaː nkraː waʔaaʕtˤaaː qalijlaː waʔaakdaaː ʕn aːljmjn wʕn aːlʃmaːl ʕzjn mn jraːqb aːlmraːqbjn  fltbdʔa aːlmbaːraːa wjnsˤrk aːllh biaːlʔaːbaaːʔi ʔaaχasˤːu lim lam tχbrnj ʔank knt fj njwjwrk  kjf ħaːlk aːljwm  sʔalth lmaːðaː kaːn jbkj lknh lm jd͡ʒb raːfqtkm aːlslaːma qabuħa fij aːlʕaqli ʔinkaaːruhu ʔaʕzf aːlkmaːn min ħusni ʔislaaːmi aːlmarʔi tarkuhu maaː laaː jaʕnijhi mn aːlʔafdˤl lk ʔan tʁaːdr w ʃmwsaː td͡ʒʕl aːlljl sˤbaːħaː ʔiinːa ʔiilahakum lawaaːħidun jnaːm aːlqtˤ ʕlaː aːltˤaːwla hl tnaːwlt aːlʕʃaːʔ  aːstjqðˤt fj twfjt fj ljla baːrda mn ljaːlj ʃhr djsmbr twqf ʕn aːllħaːq bj ʔiiðaaː aːlʃːamsu kuwːirat ʔinhaː ʔaθql mnh bkθjr ʔanaː ʔabħθ ʕn mraːsla frnsja dʕwnaː fqtˤ nsˤbħ ʔasˤdqaːʔ aːntðˤr χaːrd͡ʒ aːlbjt mn fdˤlk ʔarjd ʔan ʔatχrd͡ʒ aːlrbjʕ aːlqaːdm maːðaː tʕtqd aːlʔaːn hl stltqj bʔaħd hnaː  faqaaːla ʕumaru radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu qaːla hal jasmaʕwnakum ʔiið tadʕwna waʔiinːa aːltːaqsˤijra fijhi jafudˤːu ʕank aːlmuʔuaaːnisijna aːrtdaː saːmj mlaːbs nswjːa jaaː bunajːa ʔinːa aːlʔaːdaaːba mijraaːθu aːlʔaaʃraaːfi walastu ʔaaraaː ʕindak hrb aːlwld walikulːi ʃajʔin ʕimaaːdun waʕimaaːdu aːldːijni aːlfiqhu ʔinːhaː ʃaːbːa raːʔiʕa lqd ʔaʕd͡ʒbt saːmj aːlfalːaaːħu lam jaħlub baqaratahu aːħtaːd͡ʒt ljlaː llʃːʕwr bʔanːhaː mħbwba faʔiiðaaː ʕad͡ʒːaltahu hanːaʔatahu km hðaː raːʔiʕ ʔaaħabːu aːlʕafaaːfi ʔilaaː aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː ʕafaaːfu aːlfard͡ʒi waaːlbatˤni hl nsjt aːlʔimdˤaːʔ md͡ʒdːdaː twm ʁaːdˤb d͡ʒdaː mnj aːlʔaːn ħatːaaː ʔaaχaða ʕalaaː ʔaahli aːlʕilmi aːlʕahda ʔaan juʕalːimuwaː ʁnaː aːlnfs χjr mn ʁnaː aːlmaːl faqaaːla jaaː bunajːa maaː raʔaajtu mawʕuwðˤanaː ʔaaħaqːa biʔaan jakuwna waaːʕiðˤanaː mink bdʔa saːmj bdraːsa aːlʔislaːm min ħaqːi aːlʕaaːqili ʔaan judˤijfa ʔilaaː raʔajihi ʔaːraaːʔa aːlʕuqalaaːʔi hal jusamːaaː aːldːaaːhijaau minhum ʕaaːqilanaː ʔaam laaː jbdw ʔanːnj ħaːml walaaː tamnun tastakθir ʔinːahu laaː juʕtˤij ʕatˤijːaaan jaltamisu bihaaː ʔaafdˤala minhaaː aːlnːiʕmaau aːlːatij laaː juħsadu sˤaaːħibuhaaː ʕalajhaaː aːltːawaaːdˤuʕu qaːla nakːirwaː lahaː ʕarʃahaː nanðˤur ʔaatahtadj ʔaam takwnu mina aːlːaðjna laː jahtadwna ln ʔans ʔabdaː maː ħdθ kaːn faːdˤl jrjd qdˤaːʔ wqt ʔakθr mʕ ljlaː ʕaːda maː tkrh aːlqtˤtˤ aːlklaːb χlʕ saːmj ħðaːʔh ħjla aːlʕaːd͡ʒz dmwʕh faʔaanʃadt libaʕdˤi ʔaahli haðaaː aːlʕasˤri wafij aːld͡ʒahli qabla aːlmawti mawtun liʔaahlihi faʔaad͡ʒsaaːmuhum lm ʔadrs maːda aːlrjaːdˤjaːt ʕlaː aːlʔitˤlaːq jaaː aːbna ʔaaχij lajtanaaː taraknaaːk mastuwranaː θumːa fj silsilaain ðarʕuhaː sabʕwna ðiraːʕanaː faaːslukwhu ʔaraːdt ljlaː mʁaːdra aːlsjaːra kaːn ʕqaːbhm qaːsjanaː wlknh ʕaːdl lwθ ðlk aːlmaːʔ baːlzjt waʔiin aːustuntˤiqa taχalːafa waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlʃːuʕaraaːʔu fijhi famaaː χalaqa aːllːahu raʔaajtuhum mawtaaː faʔiiðaaː ðˤafira aːlmusˤaaːbu biʔaaħadi haðihi aːlʔaasbaaːbi taχafːafat ʕanhu ʔaaħzaaːnuhu lijasˤijruwaː lahu baʕda aːlχusˤuwmaai ʔaaʕwaaːnanaː walaː tad͡ʒʕalwaː maʕa aːllːahi ʔiilhanaː ʔaːχara ʔiinːj lakum minhu naðjrun mubjnun jnbʁj ʕlaː saːmj ʔan jtħdːθ mʕ aːlmdrːsa bʕd aːldːrs falijastaħij aːlmarʔu faʔiinːa aːlħajaaːʔa jardaʕuhu hl stmtˤr aːljwm warubːamaaː kaaːna aːlkaðibu ʔaabʕada limaaː juʔuamːilu waʔaaqraba limaaː jaχaaːfu waaːlʔiiqlaaːʕu ʔaaħadu aːlʕuðrajni kaːn ʔanf maːrj jnzf waqaaːla ʕalijːu bnu ʔaabij tˤaaːlibin radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu aːlnːaaːsu ʔaabnaaːʔu maaː juħsinuwna bdʔa saːmj ʔaad͡ʒid aːlʔaafdˤaaːla ʔilːaaː tafadˤːulaaː waminhaaː aːmʃ bʔasrʕ maː jmknk laː ttˤrd ʔaħdaː waʔiiðaː qjla lahumu aːtːaqwaː maː bajna ʔaajdjkum wamaː χalfakum laʕalːakum turħamwna waʕabda hawanaː laaː jantahij laː  laː jmknk χaːlidjna fjhaː ʔaabadanaː laː jad͡ʒidwna walijːanaː walaː nasˤjranaː hl fhmt "lm ʔafhm btaːtaː" faqaraʔaahu ʕalajhim maː kaːnwaː bihi muʔuminjna qaraʔatu kitaaːbanaː mufijdanaː likulːi saaːqitˤaain laaːqitˤaain waqaaːla aːbnu ʕabːaaːsin huwa ʔinfaaːqu man laaː juwqinu biaːlχalafi ʔaatuʕlamu kaj ʔaaχduma aːlwatˤana kaːn saːmj jʕlm ʔanː aːlʃːrtˤa kaːnt tbħθ ʕnh lm jrd saːmj ʔan jkwn ltˤjfaː mʕnaː kaʔaamθaːli aːllːuʔuluʔui aːlmaknwni ʔasrʕ mn aːlrjħ liʔaanːa likulːi maqaaːmin qawlanaː ʔiinːaka laː tahdj man ʔaaħbabta walkinːa aːllːaha jahdj man jaʃaːʔu wahuwa ʔaaʕlamu biaːlmuhtadjna biʔaajːi ðanbin qutilat aːlaːwlmbjaːt tqaːm kl aːrbʕa snwaːt maː ktbt rsaːlaan aːld͡ʒbaːh aːlsmr bʃr wmħba waːlljl ʔiðaː sd͡ʒaː bʔimkaːnj ʔan ʔaqrʔahaː klhaː kahuwa fij ʔaawːali ħaaːlin ʔauwlaʔiika juʔutawna ʔaad͡ʒrahum marːatajni bimaaː sˤabaruwaː wajadraʔuwna biaːlħasanaai aːlsːajːiʔiaaa wamimːaaː razaqnaaːhum junfiquwna baːltʔakjd waːlðjn jqwlwn rbnaː hb lnaː mn ʔazwaːd͡ʒnaː wðrjaːtnaː qra ʔaʕjn waːd͡ʒʕlnaː llmtqjn ʔimaːmaː watad͡ʒʕaluwna rizqakum ʔaanːakum tukaðːibuwna wakajfa ðalika  qaaːla sʔaqdːr lw wd͡ʒdt aːlwqt lmqaːbla aːlsjd fwkwkaː  ʔaw ltqdjmh lʔaħdin mn ʃrkaːʔik χaːldjn fjh wsaːʔ lhm jwm aːlqjaːma ħmlaː walilːahi aːlmaʃriqu waaːlmaʁribu faʔaajnamaaː tuwalːuwaː faθamːa wad͡ʒhu aːllːahi ʔiinːa aːllːaha waaːsiʕun ʕalijmun waaːlːaðijna tadʕuwna min duwnihi laaː jastatˤijʕuwna nasˤrakum walaaː ʔaanfusahum jansˤuruwna kaðːabat θamuwdu aːlmursalijna waaːlʔaanʕaaːma χalaqahaaː lakum fijhaaː difʔun wamanaaːfiʕu waminhaaː taʔakuluwna mʕdtj tʔulmnj flmaː d͡ʒaːʔt qjl ʔahkðaː ʕrʃk qaːlt kʔanh hw wʔawtjnaː aːlʕlm mn qblhaː wknaː mslmjn ʔaalam nad͡ʒʕal lahu ʕajnajni walaqad sˤarːafnaaː lilnːaaːsi fij haðaaː aːlqurʔaːni min kulːi maθalin faʔaabaaː ʔaakθaru aːlnːaaːsi ʔiilːaaː kufuwranaː faaːsˤbir liħukmi rabːika walaaː tutˤiʕ minhum ʔaːθimanaː ʔaaw kafuwranaː hw aːlðj jħjj wjmjt fʔiðaː qdˤaː ʔamraː fʔinmaː jqwl lh kn fjkwn waθamuwda aːlːaðijna d͡ʒaaːbuwaː aːlsˤːaχra biaːlwaaːdi aːlðj d͡ʒʕl lkm mn aːlʃd͡ʒr aːlʔaχdˤr naːraː fʔiðaː ʔantm mnh twqdwn faʔaamːaaː man taaːba waʔaːmana waʕamila sˤaaːliħanaː faʕasaaː ʔaan jakuwna mina aːlmufliħijna aːrkdˤ brd͡ʒlk hðaː mʁtsl baːrd wʃraːb qaaːla kam labiθtum fij aːlʔaardˤi ʕadada sinijna aːlsˤjn ʔakbr muntid͡ʒ llʔaurz fj aːlʕaːlm tlk ʔaːjaːt aːllh ntlwhaː ʕljk baːlħq wmaː aːllh jħtaːd͡ʒh twm kaːn ħqaːan bχsˤwsˤ ʕʃra dwlaːraːt ʔanaː sʕjda min ʔad͡ʒlihaː faʔiin kaðːabuwka faqad kuðːiba rusulun min qablika d͡ʒaaːʔuwaː biaːlbajːinaaːti waaːlzːuburi waaːlkitaaːbi aːlmunijri hðh ʔaχbaːr tˤjba ħtaː ʔiðaː ftħnaː ʕljhm baːbaː ðaː ʕðaːb ʃdjd ʔiðaː hm fjh mblswn jwm jrwn aːlmlaːʔika laː bʃraː jwmʔið llmd͡ʒrmjn wjqwlwn ħd͡ʒraː mħd͡ʒwraː lm tkn tlk hj aːlħqjqa ʔilaː rħma mn rbk mħmd nsˤħ msaːfrjn mrdˤaː bʃrb bwl aːlʔibl kʕlaːd͡ʒ wʔiðaː aːlkwaːkb aːntθrt wamud͡ʒaaːnabaai aːlʔiidlaaːli ljs ldj aːlkθjr mn aːlwqt ʔanaː mwaːtˤn ʔamrjkj waħusˤːila maaː fij aːlsˤːuduwri faʔaaðaaːqahumu aːllːahu aːlχizja fij aːlħajaaːai aːldːunjaaː walaʕaðaaːbu aːlʔaːχiraai ʔaakbaru law kaaːnuwaː jaʕlamuwna laaː sijːamaaː watˤaaːlibu aːlʕilmi muʕaaːnun hl sjaːrtk baːlqrb mn bjtk  waʔaamːaaː aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː ʔaafalam takun ʔaːjaaːtij tutlaaː ʕalajkum faaːstakbartum wakuntum qawmanaː mud͡ʒrimijna fsʔalh ʔabwh ʔajn aːllħm waaːlːaðijna jaquwluwna rabːanaaː aːsˤrif ʕanːaaː trjdwnh warawaaː ʔaabuw hurajraaa radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu ʔaanːa aːlnːabijːa sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama qaaːla km θqjl ʔant ʔiiðaaː raʔaathum min makaaːnin baʕijdin samiʕuwaː lahaaː taʁajːuðˤanaː wazafijranaː fajadʕuw ðalika ʔilaaː aːlʔiiʃkaaːli ʔið tstʁjθwn rbkm faːstd͡ʒaːb lkm ʔanj mmdkm bʔalf mn aːlmlaːʔika mrdfjn aːbnj jħb aːllʕb baːlsjaːraːt aːlsˤʁjra kjf tqwl " wdaːʕanaː " baːllʁa aːlʔalmaːnja  kʔanhm ħmr mstnfra nħn mdrswn hl aːlħmːaːm d͡ʒaːhz faʔaamːaaː aːlkabijru faaːld͡ʒahlu bihi ʔaaqbaħu aːʕtqdt ʔan aːlmlaːbs kaːnt ʔakθr tklfa hj aːljwm ʔaħsn bkθjr mmaː kaːnt ʕljh aːlbaːrħa tʕtbr aːljaːbaːn aːldwla aːlraːʔida ʕaːlmjaː fj sˤnaːʕa aːltknwlwd͡ʒjaː aːlmtqdma jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlnːaaːsu aːʕbuduwaː rabːakumu aːlːaðij χalaqakum waaːlːaðijna min qablikum laʕalːakum tatːaquwna lknk lm tχbrnj ʕn hðaː qtˤ nrjd ʔan ntħdθ ʔilaː twm jd͡ʒb ʕljk td͡ʒnb mθl hðh aːlaːχtˤaːʔ ʔanaː bħaːd͡ʒa lʔaħsˤl ʕlaː qasˤia ʃaʕr waltakun minkum ʔaumːaaun jadʕuwna ʔiilaaː aːlχajri wajaʔamuruwna biaːlmaʕruwfi wajanhawna ʕani aːlmunkari waʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlmufliħuwna laː tqlq jmknk aːlʔiʕtmaːd ʕlj km ʔahlknaː mn qblhm mn qrn fnaːdwaː wlaːt ħjn mnaːsˤ faʔiinːa ðalika matˤijːaau aːlnːawkaaː waʕuðru aːlmuqasˤːirijna sjtm aːstχdaːmhaː lkl aːlaːʕlaːnaːt aːlmhma w ltnðˤjm aːlmsaːbqa aːlʔanwaːr mtˤfaːa d͡ʒjn ldjhaː χms ħqaːʔib jd aːlmd͡ʒtmʕ mqsm ʔanaː mtʔakd ʔanj sʔakwn bχjr ʔanaː qlq bʃʔan sˤħtk faðalikumu aːllːahu rabːukumu aːlħaqːu famaaːðaaː baʕda aːlħaqːi ʔiilːaaː aːldˤːalaaːlu faʔaanːaaː tusˤrafuwna wajustadfaʕu bihi ʔaadˤraaːruhaaː jdrs twm fj aːlmktba aːlʔaːn rkbtj tnzf qul ʔiinːa sˤalaaːtij wanusukij wamaħjaaːja wamamaaːtij lilːahi rabːi aːlʕaaːlamijna θumːa taχfijfu aːlʔaaθqaaːli ʕanhu wlqd ʔanzlnaː ʔiljkm ʔaːjaːt mbjnaːt wmθlaː mn aːlðjn χlwaː mn qblkm wmwʕðˤa llmtqjn qaaːla ʔaawsatˤuhum ʔaalam ʔaaqul lakum lawlaaː tusabːiħuwna dˤħk djmaː qaːʔilanaː: " laː bʔas bhaː  fʔanaː maː zlt ʔanmw stsˤbħ mnaːsba lj " ʔalaː ttˤʁwaː fj aːlmjzaːn qdm ʕmj lrʔujtj wʕaːd wfrʕwn wʔiχwaːn lwtˤ law naʃaaːʔ d͡ʒaʕalnaaːhu ʔaud͡ʒaaːd͡ʒanaː falawlaː taʃkuruwna aːχtr ʃχsˤaːan waːħdaːan ʔiinːahu laqurʔaːnun karijmun ðˤlt maːrj ʕzbaːʔ tˤwaːl aːlftra aːltj ʕaːʃthaː fj aːljaːbaːn ʔatmnaː ʔan ttqbl tˤlbj fahija ʕadlun ʃaaːmilun jadʕuw ʔilaaː aːlʔaulfaai faʔiiðaaː tasaaːwaaː d͡ʒamijʕuhum lam jad͡ʒid ʔaaħaduhum ʔilaaː aːliaːstiʕaaːnaai biʁajrihi sabijlanaː mhrd͡ʒaːn aːlbndqja aːlsjnmaːʔij hw ʔaqdm mhrd͡ʒaːn sjnimaːʔij fj aːlʕaːlm hl tsttˤjʕ aːlsbaːħa bmθl srʕth  ldj sˤʕwba fj fhm hðaː aːlsʔuaːl ʔabq aːlʔatˤfaːl bʕjdaː ʕn aːlʔadwja watantahija ʕan aːlʁajːi ʔiðaaː zad͡ʒarahaaː ʔinːa haðihi aːlʔaːdaaːba nawaaːfiru tanidːu ʕan ʕaqli aːlʔaaðhaaːni faaːd͡ʒʕaluwaː aːlkutuba ʕanhaaː ħumaaːaan ʔitbʕnj χuʃːaʕanaː ʔaabsˤaaːruhum jaχrud͡ʒuwna mina aːlʔaad͡ʒdaaːθi kaʔaanːahum d͡ʒaraaːdun muntaʃirun waʔaamːaaː aːlmusˤaaːharaau aːstħq twm aːlʕqaːb aːlðj ħsˤl ʕljh hl stbqjn fj aːlbjt  ʔaχfaː nwaːjaːh aːlʃrjra bslwkh aːlħmjmj waaːtːaquwaː aːllːaha walaaː tuχzuwni bimudaaːhanaai ħisːihi hnaːk aːlʕdjd mn rbaːt aːlbjwt aːllaːtj jʃtkjn mn aːlʔasʕaːr aːlmrtfʕa nħn snʕjʃ ʔatˤwl mnhm lw ʔan ʕndnaː ðkraː mn aːlʔawljn waʔiiħanu aːlbuʕadaaːʔi fʕl maː ʔaumira bh ʔiið aːlsːʔuaːl ðalikumu aːllːahu rabːukum χaaːliqu kulːi ʃajʔin laaː ʔiilaha ʔiilːaaː huwa faʔaanːaaː tuʔufakuwna jaaː ʔaabaaː hurajraaa zur ʁibːanaː tazdad ħubːanaː ʔahm χjr ʔam qwm tbʕ waːlðjn mn qblhm baːlftˤra lmfaːd͡ʒʔaːt tfwq ʔaqsˤaː mχjltnaː ʔaafalaaː jatadabːaruwna aːlqurʔaːna ʔaam ʕalaaː quluwbin ʔaaqfaaːluhaaː ʔajn aːlkrjma aːlmχfwqa hw ʔatrʕa aːlkʔas ʔaafaʔaamina ʔaahlu aːlquraaː ʔaan jaʔatijahum baʔasunaaː bajaaːtanaː wahum naaːʔiimuwna ʔaafaman ħaqːa ʕalajhi kalimaau aːlʕaðaaːbi ʔaafaʔaanta tunqiðu man fij aːlnːaaːri aːtsˤl haːrj ʕlaː mnzl tˤwnj hl ttħdθ aːllʁa aːlʔalmaːnja bjn ðlk qwaːmaː ʔanaː fqtˤ ðhbt lfħsˤ ʃjʔiaː maː waʔaaqijmuwaː aːlsˤːalaaːaa waʔaːtuwaː aːlzːakaaːaa waʔaatˤijʕuwaː aːlrːasuwla laʕalːakum turħamuwna wajantafij ʕanhum tabaaːʁudˤu aːlʕadami wahija ʔaaχbaθu ʔaaħwaaːli aːlmukalːafijna ʔajmknk ʔan ttħdθ bbtˤʔi mn fdˤlk  ʔasˤdqaːʔij ʕaːʔiltj laː ʔarjd ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilaː aːlmdrsa jʕrfnj ʔadʕmh wmaː χlq aːlðkr waːlʔanθaː wfj θmwd ʔið qjl lhm tmtʕwaː ʔakwla aːdχuluwaː ʔaabwaaːba d͡ʒahanːama χaaːlidijna fijhaaː fabiʔisa maθwaaː aːlmutakabːirijna ʔinh jʃbh ʔamh aːlðjn kðbwaː baːlktaːb wbmaː ʔarslnaː bh rslnaː fswf jʕlmwn maːrj hj skrtjra twm walaʔiin ʔaaðaqnaaː aːlʔiinsaaːna minːaaː raħmaaan θumːa nazaʕnaaːhaaː minhu ʔiinːahu lajaʔiuwsun kafuwrun ʔaasˤlu aːlʕilmi aːlrːaʁbaau waθamaratuhu aːlsːaʕaaːdaau jawmaʔiiðin tuʕradˤuwna laː taχfaaː minkum χaaːfijaaun mfaːsˤlj tʔulmnj jaː ʔajhaː aːlʔinsaːn maː ʁrk brbk aːlkrjm d͡ʒmjʕ ʔafraːd ʕaːʔiltj χaːrd͡ʒ aːlmdjna min waraaːʔiihi d͡ʒahanːamu wajusqaaː min maaːʔin sˤadijdin jʕjʃ saːmj fj ħlb swrjaː hl tʕtqd ʔannaː snd͡ʒd bjthaː  lazimathu ħijnaʔiiðin ħuquwquhu ʔamj md͡ʒnwna lqd ħaːwl ʔan jd͡ʒʕl zwd͡ʒth sʕjda lknh lm jsttˤʕ aːlm rkbtj laː ʔasttˤjʕ tħml aːlħraːra mn fdˤlk aːnsχ θlaːθa nsχ mn hðh aːlsˤfħa hw aːlðj ʔalf aːlktaːb hl aːlsjd smjθ ʔamrjkj wjqwlwn ʔaʔinaː ltaːrkw ʔaːlhtnaː lʃaːʕr md͡ʒnwn laaː tunaaːziʕuwaː ʔaahla aːldːunjaaː fij dunjaaːhum fajunaaːziʕuwkum fij dijnikum jsʔalwn ʔajaːn jwm aːldjn ʔanaː ʔaʕlm ʔanh mʃʁwl nʔasf lwfaːth wahaðihi ʔaaħmadu aːlʔaaħwaaːli walaaː tuhdˤamu ʕalajhaaː furuwʕukum ðhb twm ʔalaː bwstˤn dˤrba qwja ʕlaː aːlʕjn ʔidˤħk qbl aːlʔiftˤaːr, swf tbkj qbl aːlʕʃaːʔ sˤrχt aːlftaːa ħjn rʔat ʔalsna aːllhb laʔaaχaðnaaː minhu biaːljamijni ʔalm nns ʃjʔiaːan  swf ʔatrk hðaː lmχjltk nd͡ʒaːħuhu klːfh kθjranaː   aːnnaː nwd aːn nʕlmh baːn hðaː aːlaːmr hw       faʔaamsaka ʕanhu aːlmustadilːu taʕad͡ʒːubanaː ؛ waliʔaanːa ʃajχahu kaaːna muħtaʃimanaː faaːlmuqasːimaaːti ʔaamranaː waːlðjn hm brbhm laː jʃrkwn ʔin ʃaːnʔik hw aːlʔabtr jaaː sˤaaːħibaji aːlsːid͡ʒni ʔaaʔaarbaaːbun mutafarːiquwna χajrun ʔaami aːllːahu aːlwaaːħidu aːlqahːaaːru ʔamdˤjnaː wqtaːan mmtʕaːan w nħn nlʕb kra aːlqaːʕda sjʕlmwn ʁdaː mn aːlkðaːb aːlʔaʃr waʔaanaaː fij  ʔanaː ʔastaːða rjaːdˤjaːt hl tqsˤdjnj  lm jsˤdːq twm ʔajaː mn klaːm maːrj ʔauwlaʔiika lahum rizqun maʕluwmun χuruwd͡ʒanaː ʕan aːlʕadli ʔilaaː maaː lajsa biʕadlin maː aːsmuk mn ʔaj ʃjʔ χlqh fʔin kaːn lkm kjd fkjdwn maːðaː trjd ʔan tʔakl aːljwm faːlmqsmaːt ʔamraː ljs ldj maːl wʕaːdaː wθmwd wʔasˤħaːb aːlrs wqrwnaː bjn ðlk kθjraː walam jardˤa aːlʔaabnaaːʔa lilʔaːbaaːʔi faʔaawsˤaaːhum bihim hl ttħdθ aːlswaːħlja  faaːld͡ʒaaːrijaaːti jusranaː hl ʔant mstʕd ltsmʕ ħkaːjtj fʔaχrd͡ʒnaːhm mn d͡ʒnaːt wʕjwn aːqtarabati aːlsːaaːʕaau waaːnʃaqːa aːlqamaru bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ʔiðaː aːlsmaːʔ aːnʃqt aːlʃrkaːt aːlmtʕdda aːld͡ʒnsjaːt tfwq aːlʃrkaːt aːlʕaːmla aːltqljdja fj dwla waːħda fqtˤ watarka aːltːasalːutˤi ʔaaʕatˤfu ʕalaaː aːlmaħabːaai ʔanaː ʔaʕrf ʔanj fj mʃkla aːlʔaːn bintu aːlrːad͡ʒuli aːld͡ʒawaaːdi ħaaːtimin waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlʔaudabaaːʔi lajsa min aːlħirsˤi aːd͡ʒtilaaːbu maaː jaquwtu aːlbadana waʔaamdadnaaːhum bifaaːkihaain walaħmin mimːaaː jaʃtahuwna ðlk bʔanhm aːstħbwaː aːlħjaːa aːldnjaː ʕlaː aːlʔaːχra wʔan aːllh laː jhdj aːlqwm aːlkaːfrjn waqaaːla ʕumaru bnu masʕadaaa aːlʕubuwdijːaau ʕubuwdijːaau aːlʔiiχaaːʔi laaː ʕubuwdijːaau aːlrːiqːi θm ʔadbr jsʕaː lqd karihtu aːlmadrasaa famani aːbtaʁaaː waraaːʔa ðalika faʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlʕaaːduwna waʔaasˤħaaːbu aːljamijni maaː ʔaasˤħaaːbu aːljamijni lħiq aːlsˤjaːd ʔaːθaːr aːldb wad͡ʒaaːʔuwaː ʔaabaaːhum ʕiʃaaːʔan jabkuwna ʔaħjaːnaː  ʔanaːm fj aːlqsm ʔalqi nðˤraan ʕlaː hðh aːlχrjtˤa ʔawd ħd͡ʒz mwʕd llmʕaːld͡ʒa baːlflwraːjd laːbnj lqd tˤlb lnaː ʃraːʔiħ aːllħm twm ljbraːlj wajalħaqu biʔaaħwaaːli aːlʕaaːmilijna aːlqtˤ tħt aːlmaːʔida twm ljs sʕjdaː waχajru aːlʔaaʕmaaːli maaː aːstaħaqːa ʃukranaː ʔazft aːlʔaːzfa ʔaθq fj qdrtk waːlðjn kfrwaː wkðbwaː bʔaːjaːtnaː ʔawlʔik ʔasˤħaːb aːld͡ʒħjm ʔaam tasʔaaluhum ʔaad͡ʒranaː fahum min maʁramin muθqaluwna wajad͡ʒʕaluwna lilːahi aːlbanaaːti subħaaːnahu walahum maaː jaʃtahuwna waħafiðˤnaaːhaaː min kulːi ʃajtˤaaːnin rad͡ʒijmin ʔasrʕ w ʔilaː fsjfwtk aːlqtˤaːr aːʃtraː twm kaːmjraː rχjsˤaan d͡ʒdaː laː jʔumnwn bh wqd χlt sna aːlʔawljn sttʔaχr aːlrħla bsbb ʕaːsˤfa rmlja jʃbh twm ʔaχaːh kθjraː hw mtˤrb salaaːmun hija ħatːaaː matˤlaʕi aːlfad͡ʒri hðaː aːlktaːb ljs lj  ʔinh lʔaχj qaːl ʔin knt d͡ʒʔit bʔaːja fʔat bhaː ʔin knt mn aːlsˤaːdqjn wamaaː huwa biqawli ʃajtˤaaːnin rad͡ʒijmin wamarħuwmin min saqamin huwa ʃifaaːʔuuhu takawːna aːlsˤdjd fj aːld͡ʒrħ waliðalika qijla waʕumuwmuhu ʔaan jastawd͡ʒiba d͡ʒamijʕa aːlʔaaħwaaːli aːlðjn ʕaːhdt mnhm θm jnqdˤwn ʕhdhm fj kl mra whm laː jtqwn waraħima ʔaahla aːldːajni waaːlmaskanaai blaː ʔin rbh kaːn bh bsˤjraː wqaːlwaː nħn ʔakθr ʔamwaːlaː wʔawlaːdaː wmaː nħn bmʕðbjn twm ljs ʔaħmq ʔaaʔiiðaaː kunːaaː ʕiðˤaaːmanaː naχiraaan kaːn hnaːk aːzdħaːm kbjr llsjaːraːt wstˤ mdjna kjwtw aːllh rbkm wrb ʔaːbaːʔikm aːlʔawljn maʕa qilːatihim ʔaanːa aːlnːabijːa sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama qaaːla laː fjhaː ʁwl wlaː hm ʕnhaː jnzfwn hl bʔimkaːnk ʔiʃʕaːl msˤaːbjħ sjaːrtk  ʔanta trjd aːltˤlaːq, ʔaljs kðlk  ʕalajhaaː tisʕaaa ʕaʃara ʔaaħabːu ʔaasˤhaaːrij ʔilajːa aːlqabru twm jʕrf d͡ʒjdaːan kjf jtm aːlaːħtfaːl baːlʕjd ħkma baːlʁa fmaː tʁn aːlnðr kðlk wʔawrθnaːhaː bnj ʔisraːʔijl ʔajn jʕjʃ aːltˤwaːrq tʁlq aːlbwaːba ljlaː kaːnt tlbs blwza ħmraːʔ wtnwra bjdˤaːʔ ʕljk ʔan tnd͡ʒz waːd͡ʒbaːth fj aːld͡ʒzaːʔir, tmθl aːstqaːla ʕbd aːlʕzjz bwtfljqa nhaːja ħqba waʔiið qulnaaː lilmalaaːʔiikaai aːsd͡ʒuduwaː liʔaːdama fasad͡ʒaduwaː ʔiilːaaː ʔiiblijsa ʔaabaaː aːlm traː qwa aːlʔijmaːn mn aːlshl ʕlaː sˤbj ħdjθ aːlwlaːda ʔan jmrdˤ ʔawlʔik lhm nsˤjb mmaː ksbwaː waːllh srjʕ aːlħsaːb ʔanaː lst tˤbjbaːan walaaː ʔaaħabːak man ʔaabʁadˤa ħubːak fij ʔaajːi sˤuwraain maaː ʃaaːʔa rakːabaka hjaː dʕwnaː nχrd͡ʒ mn hnaː sˤdjqtk hnaː lmaːðaː tfʕl hðaː  limn hðh aːldrːaːd͡ʒa aːlhwaːʔijːa faʔiiðaaː kaaːna aːlʕadlu min ʔiħdaaː qawaaːʕidi aːldːunjaaː aːlːatij laaː aːntiðˤaaːma lahaaː ʔilːaaː bihi laː ʔaʕtqd ðlk aːlmaːʔ daːfʔi χaːfqaːtin fj aːlmʕaːlj ʔaʕlaːmhu walamːaaː d͡ʒaaːʔa ʔaamrunaaː nad͡ʒːajnaaː huwdanaː waaːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː maʕahu biraħmaain minːaaː wanad͡ʒːajnaaːhum min ʕaðaaːbin ʁalijðˤin kaːn mnːaːd jtslːl ʔilaː mnaːzl aːlnːaːs tuʔutij ʔaukulahaaː kulːa ħijnin biʔiiðni rabːihaaː wajadˤribu aːllːahu aːlʔaamθaaːla lilnːaaːsi laʕalːahum jataðakːaruwna wamin ʔaːjaaːtihi aːld͡ʒisaaːmi waʔiiðaaː aːlʔaardˤu mudːat jtklm aːlʔawlaːd maːðaː trjn fj aːlsˤwra  wlkn ʔanaː laː ʔarjd aːlhrwb, ʔanaː ʔarjd ʔan ʔaraː ʔijtˤaːljaː ʔinaː ʔanzlnaːh qrʔaːnaː ʕrbjaː lʕlkm tʕqlwn waħadaaːʔiiqa ʁulbanaː hðh aːlʔardˤ lnaː fljʕʃ swdaːnnaː ʕlmaːan bjn aːlʔamm waːsˤlt aːlʕml stħbh qrjbaː faːrtqb jwm tʔatj aːlsmaːʔ bdχaːn mbjn aːlʕaːlm ktaːb  wmn laː jsaːfr laː jqrʔa ʔilaː sˤfħaan waːħda dʕjnaː fqtˤ nsˤbħ ʔasˤdqaːʔ lʕmrk ʔinhm lfj skrthm jʕmhwn nrjd ħlaːan slmjaːan laː ʔaħd laːħðˤ ðˤhwr aːldb fʔalqwaː ħbaːlhm wʕsˤjhm wqaːlwaː bʕza frʕwn ʔinaː lnħn aːlʁaːlbwn laː ʔarjd ʔan ʔaraːh bʕd aːlʔaːn ʔam χlqwaː aːlsmaːwaːt waːlʔardˤ bl laː jwqnwn hðaː maː aːħb aːn aːfʕlh ħaːwl twm ʔiχbaːrj ʃjʔianaː lknː maːrj qaːtˤʕth qbl ʔan jntˤq bbnt ʃfa ʕanhum jawma jadʕu aːldːaaːʕi ʔiilaaː ʃajʔin nukurin ʔaχbrnj, kjf ʕrfta  lmaːðaː laː trjdwn ʔan tqwlwaː lnaː aːlħqjqa ʔanaː ldj d͡ʒaːr mθlj aːld͡ʒns ʔawlaː lk fʔawlaː wʔið frqnaː bkm aːlbħr fʔand͡ʒjnaːkm wʔaʁrqnaː ʔaːl frʕwn wʔantm tnðˤrwn ʔinhaː ttħdθ bsrʕa nsbjaːan aːlʔab ʕaːʔid ʔilaː aːlbjt ʁdaːa law ʔaanːa ʕindanaaː ðikranaː mina aːlʔaawːalijna hðaː qalam lwsjaː qaːl aːχrd͡ʒ mnhaː aːlrħmn aːlrħjm wjl lkl hmza lmza ʔaħb msaːʕda aːlʔaːχrjn waaːlːaðijna hum mːin ʕaðaaːbi rabːihim mːuʃfiquwna walaqadi aːχtarnaaːhum ʕalaaː ʕilmin ʕalaaː aːlʕaaːlamijna faʔiinːa maʕa aːlʕusri jusranaː muhaðːabanaː laaː jakuwnu fijhi ʕajbun aːld͡ʒsr bnj ʕlaː jdj aːlrwmaːn waqaaːla aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː waaːallːahu fadˤːala baʕdˤakum ʕalaaː baʕdˤin fij aːlrːizqi ʔinh ʃjχ ʁrjb aːlʔatˤwaːr hðaː aːld͡ʒbl mbjn ʔiinːa fij aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waaːlʔaardˤi laʔaːjaaːtin lilmuʔuminijna lmaːðaː laː trjdaːn ʔan tχbraːnaː baːlħqjqa fħq ʕljnaː qwl rbnaː ʔinaː lðaːʔiqwn sanuqriʔiuka falaaː tansaaː ljs lhðh fij surʕaai χawaaːtˤirihim wlaː tkwnwaː kaːlðjn nswaː aːllh fʔansaːhm ʔanfshm ʔawlʔik hm aːlfaːsqwn laː tsttˤjʕ aːlħkm ʕlaː ʃχsˤ ʔin lm tʕrfh d͡ʒjdaː aːlsjd swzwkj ʔaqnʕ ʔibnhu ʔan jusqitˤ χtˤthu lldraːsa baːlχaːrd͡ʒ qutlaː fj aːlmʕrka mhmthaː hj mtaːbʕa ʔadaːʔ mħtˤaːt aːlttˤhjr lmn hðh aːlqtˤtˤ  " hj lfaːtˤma " hj msʔala ðwq ʃχsˤj twm dʕaː mjrj ʔilaː aːlʕʃaːʔ ʔawfaː aːlrʔijs ʔajznhaːwr bwʕdh knt mʕlmaː ljs ldjnaː ħdjqa waʔaumuwruhaaː ʕalaaː mamarːi aːldːuhuwri muntaðˤimaaan ʔiinːahu lajsa lahu sultˤaaːnun ʕalaaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕalaaː rabːihim jatawakːaluwna wahaðaaː jakuwnu min ʔaaħadi wad͡ʒhajni aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕ aːnthaː ʕnd aːlðˤhr wtwl ʕnhm ħtaː ħjn wlkn hl ʔistlmt aːlrsaːla ʔin rbk hw ʔaʕlm mn jdˤl ʕn sbjlh whw ʔaʕlm baːlmhtdjn twqf ʕn fʕl hðaː lw smħt ʔalaː tlʕb aːltns  baʕijdun min aːld͡ʒanːaai tʕaːl ltzwrnj wqaːl aːlðjn kfrwaː laː tsmʕwaː lhðaː aːlqrʔaːn waːlʁwaː fjh lʕlkm tʁlbwn laː ʔaħd jstmʕ ʔiljː jðˤn twm ʔan ʕlaː maːrj aːlaːʕtðaːr mn d͡ʒwn qul laaː tusʔaaluwna ʕamːaaː ʔaad͡ʒramnaaː walaaː nusʔaalu ʕamːaaː taʕmaluwna hl ʔasˤbt bʕjaːr naːrj  waðalika qabijħun fij aːlʕaqli ʔaan jataʕarːadˤa lahu ʔafrʔajtm aːllaːt waːlʕzaː wqaːlwaː aːtχð aːllh wldaː sbħaːnh bl lh maː fj aːlsmaːwaːt waːlʔardˤ kl lh qaːntwn wlm tkn lh fʔia jnsˤrwnh mn dwn aːllh wmaː kaːn mntsˤraː ʔanaː d͡ʒbaːn ldrd͡ʒa ʔannj naːdraː maː ʔazwr tˤbjb aːlʔasnaːn waqaaːla ʕalajhi aːlsˤːalaaːau waaːlsːalaaːmu aːnðˤur kajfa kaðabuwaː ʕalaaː ʔaanfusihim wadˤalːa ʕanhum maaː kaaːnuwaː jaftaruwna twm jrjd ʔiqaːma ʔid͡ʒtmaːʕ ʔaχtj tsttˤjʕ aːlsbaːħa bsrʕa kθjra ʔinh jsˤaːb baːlzkaːm bshwla d͡ʒdaː walaaː jusqitˤu ħurmatahu biaːlðˤːunuwni kulːamaaː ʔaaraaːduwaː ʔaan jaχrud͡ʒuwaː minhaaː min ʁamːin ʔauʕijduwaː fijhaaː waðuwquwaː ʕaðaaːba aːlħarijqi ʔanaː ʔanaːm fj aːlsaːʕa aːlʕaːʃra ʔaʕtˤnaː hðaː aːlqtˤ laː ðˤljl wlaː jʁnj mn aːllhb wd͡ʒʕlnaː fjhaː rwaːsj ʃaːmχaːt wʔasqjnaːkm maːʔ fraːtaː maː hj ʔakθr d͡ʒmla mħbba ʔilaː qlbk  fʔiðaː nzl bsaːħthm fsaːʔ sˤbaːħ aːlmnðrjn wamaaː jaʔatijhim min nabijːin ʔiilːaaː kaaːnuwaː bihi jastahziʔiuwna lqd ʔaʁmrhaː baːlmdħ lqd ʔaʕddt hlaːmaː waaːlmaħduwdu ʔaaqalːu dˤararanaː mimːaaː huwa ʁajru maħduwdin dʕnaː nχrd͡ʒ mn hnaː qbl ʔan jraːnaː twm wʕlaː aːllh qsˤd aːlsbjl wmnhaː d͡ʒaːʔir wlw ʃaːʔ lhdaːkm ʔad͡ʒmʕjn qaːl ʔawstˤhm ʔalm ʔaql lkm lwlaː tsbħwn bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm waːltjn waːlzjtwn fj d͡ʒjdhaː ħbl mn msd waʔiinːa ʔiiljaaːsa lamina aːlmursalijna twm lm jsttˤʕ ʔijd͡ʒaːd mkaːn d͡ʒjd llʔiχtbaːʔ wmkrwaː mkraː wmkrnaː mkraː whm laː jʃʕrwn waːlsmaːʔ wmaː bnaːhaː lilquluwbi ʃahwaaun waʔiiqbaaːlun wafatraaun waʔiidbaaːrun faʔatuwhaaː min qibali ʃahwatihaaː walaaː ʔanaː ʔauħb kulaːan mn aːlqtˤtˤ waːlklaːb hal ʔaataaːka ħadijθu aːld͡ʒunuwdi wmaː ʔaðˤn aːlsaːʕa qaːʔima wlʔin rddt ʔilaː rbj lʔad͡ʒdn χjraː mnhaː mnqlbaː wʔamaː aːlðjn aːbjdˤt wd͡ʒwhhm ffj rħma aːllh hm fjhaː χaːldwn wmn ʔaħsn qwlaː mmn dʕaː ʔilaː aːllh wʕml sˤaːlħaː wqaːl ʔinnj mn aːlmslmjn kamaaː laaː jaʕrifu aːlmuʕaaːfaaː qadra aːlnːiʕmaai ħatːaaː jusˤaaːba bjtr jħb d͡ʒjn wlaː td͡ʒaːdl ʕn aːlðjn jχtaːnwn ʔanfshm ʔin aːllh laː jħb mn kaːn χwaːnaː ʔaθjmaː waːd͡ʒʕlnj mn wrθa d͡ʒna aːlnʕjm wlqd ʔanzlnaː ʔiljk ʔaːjaːt bjnaːt wmaː jkfr bhaː ʔilaː aːlfaːsqwn watarakuwaː minhaaː maaː ʕalimuwaː ʔaanːahu sajatrukuhum laaː ʔaadrij ħatːaaː ʔaasʔaala d͡ʒibrijla ktaːb fsˤlt ʔaːjaːth qrʔaːnaː ʕrbjaː lqwm jʕlmwn ʔanaː lst aːlmʃkla ʕlaː km aːlsaːʕa bʔimkaːnj aːlwsˤwl ʔilaː hnaːk  jʕjʃ zwd͡ʒhaː aːlʔaːn fj tˤwkjw qrjbaː sjsˤdr fjlm ʕn aːlhnd fj qaːʕaːt aːlsjnmaː lw kaːn aːltsˤwjt sjʁjr ʃjʔiaː lkaːn qd tm mnʕh wnrθh maː jqwl wjʔatjnaː frdaː sʔad͡ʒʕlhaː sʕjda - sʔaʃʕrhaː baːlsʕaːda ljs aːld͡ʒmjʕ sʕdaːʔ bðlk kalːaaː ʔiiðaaː balaʁati aːltːaraaːqija ʔauwlaʔiika aːlːaðijna aːʃtarawuaː aːlħajaaːaa aːldːunjaaː biaːlʔaːχiraai falaaː juχafːafu ʕanhumu aːlʕaðaaːbu walaaː hum junsˤaruwna wataaːraaan ʕalaaː aːlʔaahli jtˤwf ʕljhm wldaːn mχldwn mhmaː kaːnt aːlʔaħwaːl ħaːn aːlwqt llnwm ʔam aːtχðwaː mn dwn aːllh ʃfʕaːʔ ql ʔawlw kaːnwaː laː jmlkwn ʃjʔiaː wlaː jʕqlwn aːltlfzjwn laː jʕml lw nʃaːʔ ld͡ʒʕlnaːh ħtˤaːmaː fðˤltm tfkhwn fðrhm ħtaː jlaːqwaː jwmhm aːlðj fjh jsˤʕqwn tzwd͡ʒth mn ʔad͡ʒl maːlh wahuwa aːlːaðij χalaqa aːllːajla waaːlnːahaaːra waaːlʃːamsa waaːlqamara kulːun fij falakin jasbaħuwna laː   aːltdχl θumːa jarudːu ʕalaaː nafsihi fajaquwlu qad ʔaard͡ʒaʕtuk fad͡ʒidːij wamanaaːaa aːlθːaaːliθaaa aːlʔauχraaː waʔiin ʔaaqamtum ʔaaχaðakum waʔiinːa min ʃijʕatihi laʔiibraaːhijma ʔiinːa aːlːaðijna hum min χaʃjaai rabːihim muʃfiquwna ʔanaː mmtn llʁaːja lmsaːʕdtk d͡ʒahanːama jasˤlawnahaaː fabiʔisa aːlmihaaːdu aːrd͡ʒw dʕwa kl aːlnaːd͡ʒħjn aːlaː hðaː aːlmnʃwr w mʃaːrkth ljsˤlhm lw ʔardnaː ʔan ntχð lhwaː laːtχðnaːh mn ldnaː ʔin knaː faːʕljn ʔaalam jaʔatikum nabaʔau aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː min qablu faðaaːquwaː wabaaːla ʔaamrihim walahum ʕaðaaːbun ʔaalijmun waʔiin kaaːna liltːaʕmijaai waaːlrːamzi lam juʕraf ʔilːaaː biaːlmuwaaːdˤaʕaai sˤarfu aːlhawaaː ʕan ðij aːlhawaaː ʕazijzu ʔinːa aːlhawaaː lajsa lahu tamjijzu waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlbulaʁaaːʔi laː waaːlrːuwħu fijhaaː biʔiiðni rabːihim min kulːi ʔaamrin mn dwn aːllh hl jnsˤrwnkm ʔaw jntsˤrwn faaːlʕumuru ʔaaqsˤaru min ʔaan janfada fij ʁajri aːlmanaaːfiʕi qaːlwaː ʔaːmnaː brb aːlʕaːlmjn sˤnʕ lj bil fstaːnanaː d͡ʒmjlanaː maːt aːlʔaχaːn ʔanaː ʔaħb aːllʁa aːljaːbaːnja kθjraːan faːsˤbr sˤbraː d͡ʒmjlaː qtlth btj lnrjk mn ʔaːjaːtnaː aːlkbraː aw quli aːlħaquː min raːbiːkum faman ʃaaːʔ faljuʔumin waman watawalːaaː nsjt aːsmh wanasˤarnaaːhum fakaaːnuwaː humu aːlʁaaːlibijna qaːl ʔalm ʔaql lk ʔink ln tsttˤjʕ mʕj sˤbraː ʔaχbrthm kjf tsjr aːlʔamwr hl wd͡ʒdt kθjraː mn aːld͡ʒzaːʔirjjn fj ʔalmaːnjaː whjdrwd͡ʒjn sˤadjqu maːrj hamasa lahaː ʃjʔiaːan ʔinh hw jbdʔi wjʕjd aːlktaːb tħt aːltˤaːwla mnaːχ lndn mχtlf ʕn mnaːχ tˤwkjw hl wldt fj ʃhr maːjw twm ldjh ʃʕr rmaːdj sʔalt aːlmrʔaa: " qsˤa  " " maːðaː tqsˤd  " mtaːa ʔatjta  wanad͡ʒhala nafʕa ʔiħsaaːnihi ʔilajnaaː walaaː tamnaʕuwhaaː ʔaahlahaaː fataðˤlimuwhum aːlmftaːħ ʕlj aːltˤaːwla tbaː  ʔajn wdˤʕt mfaːtjħ mnzlj  aːnfd͡ʒrt ʔanaːbjb aːlmjaːh ʕndnaː bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ql jaː ʔajhaː aːlkaːfrwn ql ʔin rbj jqðf baːlħq ʕlaːm aːlʁjwb ʔasˤbħ ʔaχwh ʔimaːmaː mn fdˤlk, ʔismʕnj jd͡ʒb ʔan tðhb sttħdθ d͡ʒwdj ʕn aːljaːbaːn ʁdaːan haðaaː ðikrun waʔiinːa lilmutːaqijna laħusna maʔaːbin qaaːluwaː ʔaad͡ʒiʔitanaaː biaːlħaqːi ʔaam ʔaanta mina aːllːaaːʕibijna fsbħaːn aːlðj bjdh mlkwt kl ʃjʔ wʔiljh trd͡ʒʕwn aːltˤrjq ljs lld͡ʒbaːn wlkn llbtˤl wqwmwaː bimaluwmin fʕsˤwaː rswl rbhm fʔaχðhm ʔaχða raːbja faʔiinːa aːllːaaːhija bihaaː maʁruwrun waʔiinːahu laħaqːu aːljaqijni d͡ʒls aːlmχjːmwn ħwl aːlnːaːr lst qlqaː bʃʔanh laː tqlq bʃʔan ntaːʔid͡ʒ ʔiχtbaːrk aːdχuluwhaaː bisalaaːmin ðalika jawmu aːlχuluwdi ʔanaː ħqaː laː ʔasttˤjʕ ʔan ʔafhm fn aːlnħt aːlħdjθ ʔanaː ʔaħsdhaː hðh aːlhdja lsˤdjqj hl knt sˤaːħin fj ðlk aːlwqt  dʕjnaː nstʕd llðhaːb ħtaː ʔataːnaː aːljqjn wkwaːʕb ʔatraːbaː ʔanta qra ʕjnj ʔaʁlq ʕjnjk aːtrknj ʔadχl lw smħt ʔinːa min aːlʃːarijʕaai ʔaan tud͡ʒilːa ʔaahla aːlʃːarijʕaai fanaðˤamahu ʔaabuw tamːaaːmin faqaaːla bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ʔiðaː zlzlt aːlʔardˤ zlzaːlhaː hnaː fqtˤ aːd͡ʒʕal maaː fij aːlkutubi raʔasa aːlmaaːli mnːaːd ln jdχl ðlk aːlmnzl warafʕuhu ðahaaːbu ʔaahlihi sd͡ʒːl maː tnfq ʔiðaː qmt btʁjjr aːlχtˤa fjd͡ʒb ʕljk ʔan tʕlm ʔaʕdˤaːʔ aːlfrjq baːltʁjjraːt waaːld͡ʒahaaːlaaa maʁramanaː baʃijranaː wanaðijranaː faʔaaʕradˤa ʔaakθaruhum fahum laaː jasmaʕuwna ʔaχbr twm maːrj ʕn aːlħaːdθ fahaðaaː ʕalaaː θalaaːθaai ʔaaqsaaːmin waːqrʔawhaː lbnj aːld͡ʒjl ʁdaː rʔajthaː whj tqtˤʕ aːlʃaːrʕ nħn sˤdjqaːn hl ldjk aːj fkra ʕn mn jsttˤjʕ fʕl hðaː  aːlqtˤaːr aːlqaːdm mn d͡ʒnjf sjsˤl aːlmħtˤa qaːla: faʔaaχbirnij ʕani aːlʔijmaːni qaːla: ʔaːsf  lkn ʕlj aːlʕwda ʔilaː aːlbjt aːlʔaːn aːlmuʃkilau muʃkilthm tʔaqlmt mʕ aːld͡ʒw aːlħaːr wttχðwn msˤaːnʕ lʕlkm tχldwn waqaaːla aːbnu masʕuwdin kaːn jnðˤr ʔiljhaː ʔaam jaquwluwna naħnu d͡ʒamijʕun muntasˤirun tðkra mn fdˤlk lm jħdˤr aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕ tˤlaːb kθr walaqad dˤalːa qablahum ʔaakθaru aːlʔaawːalijna ʔanaː ʔantðˤr mnð saːʕaːt ʔalq nðˤraan ʕlaː hðaː aːltqrjr hl ʔinthjt waːsˤl mnːaːd aːlsˤːjaːħ twm jħb ʔan jtʕlm aːlmwsjqaː ʔaatˤʕim qitˤːaka jaʕnij ʕalaaː χatˤarin wakulːu maaː ʕadaaː aːlʔiifdˤaaːla bihi kaaːna hajːinanaː ʔajn aːlʔaħðja ʕlaːqtj btwm ʔasˤbħt mn aːlmaːdˤj kaːn saːmj jʁjːr mlaːbsh klː jwm waqaaːla aːbnu aːlrːuwmijːi laː tns ʔan ttːsˤl bj aːllːjla waqaaːla ʕabdu aːllːahi bnu aːlmuʕtazːi raħimahu aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː km mn aːlwqt bqj llʔiftˤaːr faaːltaqamahu aːlħwtu wahuwa muljmun aːlrːad͡ʒulu sabaħa fij aːlnːahri liqilːaai taħarːuzihi minhaaː juʔulimunj ʔaan tuʕaðːiba aːlħajawaaːna laχalqu aːlsːamaːwaːti waaːlʔaardˤi ʔaakbaru min χalqi aːlnːaːsi walkinːa ʔaakθara aːlnːaːsi laː jaʕlamwna naːdaːnj aːlmdrːs baːlʔaħmq wajastasˤʁiru maʕahaaː kulːa kabijrin liʔaanːa limaħmuwdihaaː ʔaadˤdaaːdanaː muqaaːbilaaan jusʕiduhaaː hawanaː mutˤaaːʕun waʃahwaaun ʁaaːlibaaun aːlmarijdˤu jard͡ʒuw aːlʃːifaaːʔa waʔaaðhalanij aːlsːuruwru ʕan ħifðˤihaaː wawadidt ʔaanːij law ħafiðˤthaaː fabaʃːirhum biʕaðaːbin ʔaaljmin ʔabj mhnds mdnj ʔaan jaðˤhara min aːlmaħsuwdi fadˤlun jaʕd͡ʒizu ʕanhu fajakrahu taqadːumahu fijhi waaːχtisˤaaːsˤahu bihi wahaðaaː jakuwnu min sˤijaaːnaai aːlnːafsi wakamaaːli aːlmuruwʔaai taʕrud͡ʒu aːlmalaːʔiikaau waaːlrːwħu ʔiilajhi fj jawmin kaːna miqdaːruhu χamsjna ʔaalfa sanaain nħn hnaː jartad͡ʒijka raaːʁibun wasˤaaːra biaːlfadˤli maʃhuwranaː salaːmun hija ħatːaː matˤlaʕi aːlfad͡ʒri ʔiðaaː lam takun nafsu aːlʃːarijfi ʃarijfaaan waʔiin kaaːna ðaaː qadrin falajsa lahu ʃarafu waʔaand͡ʒaħu lilmutaʕalːimi wakaaːna kamustanhidˤi aːlmasd͡ʒuwni walaaː jad͡ʒʕala lilʃːajtˤaaːni sultˤaaːnanaː fij naqdˤi ʕazaaːʔiimihi wamuʕaaːradˤaai χaaːliqihi θalaaːθaaun laaː jaslamu ʔaaħadun minhunːa lqd tʁjːr saːmj kn ltˤjfaː hðh aːlmrːa jðhb kjn llsːbaːħa jwmaːan bʕd jwm hl ʁjːrti rʔajki km mn aːlwqt bqj ltnaːwl aːlʔiftˤaːr waaːllːuʔuma saaːqahu ʔilaaː ʔaaχbaθi aːlmatˤaaːʕimi laː tkn qaːsjaːan d͡ʒdaːan mʕj ʔaħbː ktaːba aːlktb blʁtj tʕtˤlt aːlsjaːra lqd ʁjːrt rʔajj kl wqt wlh ʔaðaːnh ʕaːdt ʔilaː aːlʁnaːʔ mutːakiʔijna fjhaː ʕalaaː walaqad raʔaːhu biaːlʔaufuqi aːlmubjni kaːn mdrːsw saːmj jkrhwnh daːʔimaː aːlθːawbu qasˤijrun knt ʔaʕlm ʔanh ʔant maː rʔajk  ʔanðhb baːlsjaːra ʔam baːltaːksj aːld͡ʒanːaau laaː jadχuluhaaː dajːuwθun walaaː qalːaaːʕun aːlʕzjzaːlrħjmaːlrzaːqaːlʃaːfj twsˤːl faːdˤl mn ʔisˤaːba raːmj btˤlqa fj aːlðˤːhr dʕjnj ʔanðˤr ʔiljki ʔasrʕ mn shm aːlquluwbu ʔaawʕijaau aːlʔaasraaːri lqd sˤfqnaː ʕaːda ljs ʕndj wqt d͡ʒaːʔt ʔin ʃtmt ljlaː mrːa ʔaχraː sʔaksr ʔasnaːnk jaʕuwdu aːlʁarijbu ʔiilaaː baladihi waaːlʔaad͡ʒmala min tˤaraaːʔiiqihaaː χrd͡ʒ saːmj ljħtfl kaːn saːmj jħbː kwnh mslmaː ʔawl aːlʃd͡ʒra bðra kaːn saːmj jtʁjːb ʕn aːldːrws drs saːmj mn ʔad͡ʒl ʃhaːda aːldːktwraː aːldχwl llmwðˤfjn fqtˤ jaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlʔiinsaːnu ʔiinːaka kaːdiħun ʔiilaː rabːika kadħanaː famulaːqjhi ʔaam jaqwlwna ʃaːʕirun natarabːasˤu bihi rajba aːlmanwni hðaː ħj sjʔ wakaːnwaː jusˤirːwna ʕalaaː aːlħinθi aːlʕaðˤjmi wabajːana lahum ʃarijʕatahu ʔinː ħjaːtj ljst mʃkltk wakajfa ðalika jaaː rasuwla aːllːahi  qaaːla faʕan aːnd͡ʒltraː ʔakθr aːʕtdaːlaːa mmaː hw ʕljh fj aːskwtlaːndaː ħarːik munaaːk ʔiðaaː aːʁtamamt faʔiinːahunːa maraaːwiħu waqaaːla ʔaːχaru fawaqaːhu aːllːahu sajːiʔiaaːti maː makarwaː waħaːqa biʔaːli firʕawna swʔu aːlʕaðaːbi wataraknaː ʕalajhi fij aːlʔaːχirjna faʔiinːa ðalika ʔaaʕðˤamu liʔaad͡ʒrihim wazaaːda ʕalaaː ħadːi aːlkifaaːjaai jbdw ʁaːmdˤaː ħwl maː ʔaraːd fʕlh ʔinhaː fj aːd͡ʒtmaːʕ aːlʔaːn ʁaaːjaain ħdθ ðlk lj mrːaːt ʕdːa lklin ðwqh dʕaː saːmj ljlaː ltnaːwl wd͡ʒba lħm mʃwj waaːlqismu aːlχaaːmisu aːstjqðˤ saːmj ʔaχjraː mn aːlʁjbwba aːntðˤr saːmj ʔilaː ħjn ʁaːdrt ljlaː ʔaalam naχluqkum min maːʔin mahjnin liʔaanːahaaː mawaaːhibu qad manaħahaaː aːllːahu man ʃaaːʔa fajasχatˤu ʕalaaː aːllːahi ʕazːa wad͡ʒalːa fij qadˤaaːʔiihi ħdθ ðlk lj saːbqanaː fj kitaːbin maknwnin ħqdt ljlaː ʕlaː saːmj saːmj bkaː w bkaː w bkaː tʕrːf saːmj ʕlaː mslmjn mn dwl ʔislaːmjːa mχtlfa waqad wasˤafa baʕdˤu aːlʃːuʕaraaːʔi aːlʔiinsaaːna faqaaːla ʔaalaː ʔiinːahum min ʔiifkihim lajaqwlwna waqaaːla musˤʕabu bnu aːlzːubajri aːltːawaaːdˤuʕu masˤaaːʔiidu aːlʃːarafi waman laaː jastaħiqːuhu ʃarːun min aːlχinzijri kaːn saːmj mħbːaː lʔawlaːdh aːliaːstiħjaaːʔu min d͡ʒazaaːʔi aːld͡ʒawaaːbi faʔaamːaaː faʔaanðartukum naːranaː talaðˤːaː hj qaːdra ʕlaː nsjaːn wʕwdhaː aːlnːaaːsi man ʕasˤaaː hawaaːhu  waʔaafdˤalu minhu man rafadˤa dunjaaːhu mn sjsˤbħ aːldˤːħjːa aːltːaːlja lm jʃfaː aːlħsˤaːn χuðuwaː zijnatakum ʔanaː ʁd͡ʒrjːa ʔaan jakuwna mustawdaʕanaː fij sˤanijʕin maʃkuwrin ʕaːdaan maː ʔalʕb aːltns lqd ʔafsdt kl ʃjʔ maː ʔaltˤfk fasawːaaːhunːa sabʕa samaaːwaaːtin wahuwa bikulːi ʃajʔin ʕalijmun waaːlʕafwu ʕinda aːlqudraai watilka aːlʔaamθaːlu nadˤribuhaː lilnːaːsi wamaː jaʕqiluhaː ʔiilːaaː aːlʕaːlimwna waʔiisʕaaːfuhum fij nawaaːʔiibihim walaaː fusħaaa liðij muruwʔaain maʕa ðˤuhuwri aːlmuknaai ʔaan jakilahum ʔilaaː ʁajrihi ʔiið nad͡ʒːajnaːhu waʔaahlahu ʔaad͡ʒmaʕjna laqad χalaqnaaː aːlʔiinsaːna fj kabadin ħaːwl ʔan jtqn aːlfrnsja θumːa d͡ʒaʕala ʔilaaː rasuwlihi wabiʕuquwlihim naːfðth ʕaːd aːlʔamr ʔilaː nsˤaːbh laː bd ʔanh ʁbj ljqwm bʃjʔ khðaː ln jfwz twm waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlʔaudabaaːʔi fij ʔiʁdˤaaːbik raaːħaau ʔaaʕsˤaaːbik liʔaanːa haðihi ʔaumuwrun laaː jumkinu ʕalijːun karːama aːllːahu wad͡ʒhahu ʕan aːlsːaχaaːʔi faqaaːla waaːlʕaaːʃiru min ʔaasbaaːbihi aːlmakru watawaqːuʕu aːlfurasˤi aːlχalfijːaai kaːn saːmj jsmʕ lħmaːs sˤbjaːnj fj sˤwt ljlaː maːrʔajk bhðh aːlχtˤa lm ʔasmʕ lhaː sˤwtaː tˤwaːl aːllːjl waqaaːla mud͡ʒaaːhidun ʔaaʕtˤaaː kulːa ʃajʔi zawd͡ʒaaan θumːa hadaaːhu linikaaːħihaaː wamaː ʔaadraːka maaː aːlħutˤamaau aːlħsˤaːn ħjwaːn hm jntðˤrwnnj fqdt ʔaʕsˤaːbhaː kaj laaː jakuwna maʕa aːlwasˤmaai laː jzaːl aːlħsˤaːn jrtd͡ʒf lam jalid walam jwlad hðh md͡ʒrːd aːftraːdˤaːt mnki kaːn maːdˤj saːmj jtˤaːrdh llʔabd aːχtbʔa saːmj wad͡ʒamaʕa faʔaawʕaː ʔant btˤlnaː faʔaamːaː man ʔawtija kitaːbahu bijamjnihi waχasafa aːlqamaru waaːʕlam ʔaanːa lilnːafsi ħaaːlatajni jawma hum ʕalaaː aːlnːaːri juftanwna maliki aːlnːaːsi fj raqːin manʃwrin ʔaχrd͡ʒ aːlqmaːma qdˤaː nħbh wajatasalːaaː biʔauwlij aːlʕibari faqaaːla ʔaabuw bakri bnu muħamːadin aːlʃːaaːʃijːu fij ʔausˤuwli aːlfiqhi waʔaaʕtˤifu ʕalajhim jrjd saːmj ʔan jmdˤj bʕdˤ aːlwqt lwħdh bqija aːlwld haːdʔiaːan faman ʔaasχatˤa sultˤaaːnahu taʕarːadˤa lilmanijːaai waman ʔaawħaʃa ʔiχwaaːnahu tabarːaʔaa min aːlħurːijːaai fawajlun lilːaðijna jaktubuwna aːlkitaaːba biʔaajdijhim θumːa jaquwluwna haaːðaaː min ʕindi aːllːahi hðh ʔaʕmq nqtˤa fj aːlbħjra ʕaːd ʔilaː znzaːnth ʔarsl saːmj rsaːʔil ʁrjba lljlaː namaaːʔu ziraaːʕaain wadˤaʕufa raʔajuhu ʕan χijraai ʔaasbaaːbihi wadawaaːʕijhi falaː sˤadːaqa walaː sˤalːaː dˤbtˤ saːmj mnbːhh kj jstjqðˤ lsˤlaːa aːlfd͡ʒr ʔaaw ʔiitˤʕaːmun fj jawmin ðj masʁabaain waʔiiðaaː aːuʔutumina falaaː jaχuwnu jaʃtadːu aːlbardu fij aːld͡ʒibaaːli walilʔaumuwri mutaħamːilanaː warawaaː hiʃaaːmu bnu ʕurwaaa ʔajn hj lwrj faqawluhu saqijmun lajsa fij χisˤaaːli aːlʃːarːi ʔaaʕdalu min aːlħasadi hl nsjt tʃmjʕ aːlʔardˤjːa md͡ʒdːdaː waaːlnːaːʃiraːti naʃranaː ðhbt ʔamj ʔilaː aːlswq ʔaʁzl mn aːmrʔi aːlqjs kaːn saːmj jħbː ħjaːa aːlħflaːt aːlsːaaːʕij bajna manzilatajni qabijħatajni waʔaajːadahum binasˤrihi aːχtbʔat ljlaː χlf aːlʃːd͡ʒra bal qaːlwaː ʔiinːaː wad͡ʒadnaː ʔaːbaːʔanaː ʕalaː ʔaumːaain waʔiinːaː ʕalaː ʔaːθaːrihim muhtadwna dˤaaːʕa aːlmiftaaːħu balaː qad d͡ʒaːʔatka ʔaːjaːtj fakaðːabta bihaː waaːstakbarta wakunta mina aːlkaːfirjna fawajlun tχtbʔuwn jaː rfaːq laː ʃkː ʔanː aːllːʕb hnaːk ʔamr χtˤjr faman tabiʕa hudaaːja falaaː χawfun ʕalajhim walaaː hum jaħzanuwna ʔaakufːaːrukum χajrun min ʔauwlʔiikum ʔaam lakum baraːʔaaun fij aːlzːuburi waaːllːabijba ʁajra aːlħaquwdi laː tns aːlaːtsˤaːl bʔamːk waʔiin χaʃuna maqatuwhu wakaaːna ʕalaaː χatˤarin minhum wasanaðkuru taʕlijla kulːi ʃartˤin minhaaː bimaaː junabːiʔiu ʕan luzuwmihi walaaː jaltamisuwaː ʕalajhi rizqanaː waʔiin taħalːaaː biaːlsˤːilaai waʕilaaːd͡ʒuhu ʔaan jutraka ʕalaaː malalihi fajamalːa aːld͡ʒafaaːʔa kamaaː malːa aːlʔiiχaaːʔa waaːlθːaaːnij fij d͡ʒinsihi waqijmatihi ʔanzl ʁajra aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː aːχrd͡ʒ mn ħjaːtj laː tubqj walaː taðaru wabiaːlħaaːʔi ʔiðaaː manaʕa aːlrːizqa wamad͡ʒdun mad͡ʒduwdin laaː juqaaːlu fijhimaaː ʔilːaaː bimaaː lam jusamːa faaːʕiluhu faminhum jaðuwquwna fijhaaː bardanaː walaaː ʃaraaːbanaː ʔabj jtklm daːʔimaː bsˤwt mrtfʕ d͡ʒdaː fakːu raqabaain famaaː qaaːla lak  qaaːla hj fχwra d͡ʒdaː bmðˤhrhaː hðaː aːlqaːrb lm jʕd sˤaːlħaːan llʔibħaːr ʔidˤaːftj laː jʔumnwn bh ħtaː jrwaː aːlʕðaːb aːlʔaljm hdaː wrħma llmħsnjn maː kaːn ʔibraːhjm jhwdjaː wlaː nsˤraːnjaː wlkn kaːn ħnjfaː mslmaː wmaː kaːn mn aːlmʃrkjn wmaː nrjd ʔan nħðˤaː bh ħqːanaː hw jaʕmaluwna waaːlwad͡ʒhu aːlsːaaːbiʕu fajaqsˤiduwaː aːlʔaumuwra min ʔaabwaaːbihaaː nħn nbħθ ʕn bʕdˤ aːlnaːs aːlbaːrʕjn fj aːlkmbjwtr llʕml mʕnaː ðhb saːfr bħθaːan ʕn aːlmʁaːmra kjn w d͡ʒw ðhbaː ʔilaː aːlzːuwra waʔiiðaaː marːuwaː biaːllːaʁwi marːuwaː kiraaːmanaː kjfmaː saːʔt ħaːlthaː fhj tʕml daːʔimaːan ʔanaː ʔasˤdq ʔank trjd ʔan tsaːʕd jufdˤːl ʔalaː tðhb tˤlb twm mnj aːlmsaːʕda ʔaħs bʔalm fj rʔasj faman kaaːnat fatratuhu ʔilaaː aːlʕilmi faqad nad͡ʒaaː hl ħqaː ʔant ʔamjra  waminhum man jastad͡ʒijbu ʔilaaː fiʕli aːltˤːaaːʕaaːti wajuqdimu ʕalaaː aːrtikaaːbi aːlmaʕaaːsˤij waqad ʔaafsˤaħa labijdun maʕa ʔaaʕraaːbijːaain bimaaː tabajːana bihi ħaaːlu aːlʔaamali fij aːlʔaamrajni jawma laaː juʁnij ʕanhum kajduhum ʃajʔianaː walaaː hum junsˤaruwna raħima aːllːahu aːmraʔaan ʔaaʕaaːna waladahu ʕalaaː birːihi ʔiinːahu kaaːna fij ʔaahlihi masruwranaː ʔinnaː nʕrf ʔahlh nħn nʕjʃ fj md͡ʒtmʕ fad͡ʒaʕalahum kaʕasˤfin mːaʔakuwlin liʔaanːa aːlwaaːħida qad juqtalu qabla buluwʁi aːlʁaradˤi walaʕalːa maaː sˤurifa ʕanhu ʔaaʕðˤamu mimːaaː aːubtulija aːlmktb mkswr watamaaːmuhaaː fij aːlχaaːmisaai muʕalːimun naaːsˤiħun waːldtj aːχðt drws frnsja mn ʕda snwaːt waʔiiðaaː qijla lahumu aːsd͡ʒuduwaː lilrːaħmani qaaːluwaː wamaaː aːlrːaħmanu ʔaanasd͡ʒudu limaaː taʔamurunaaː wazaaːdahum nufuwranaː fqlt aːstʁfrwaː rbkm ʔinh kaːn ʁfaːraː fajaðhabuwaː dˤaaːʔiiʕijna wajasˤijruwaː ʕad͡ʒazaaan madˤʕuwfijna laaː jastatˤijʕuwna nasˤrahum wahum lahum d͡ʒundun muħdˤaruwna sajahdijhim wajusˤliħu baaːlahum bal matːaʕtu haʔuulaaːʔi waʔaːbaaːʔahum ħatːaaː d͡ʒaaːʔahumu aːlħaqːu warasuwlun mubijnun ʔanːaː ldjhaː ʃʕr bunj kstnaːʔij, wlkn maːd͡ʒdaːljnaː ldjhaː ʃʕr ʔaʃqr tlskwb d͡ʒjms waːb aːlmrtqb aːltaːbʕ lwkaːla naːsaː w aːlwkaːla aːlfdˤaːʔija aːlʔawrbja waːlkndja kaːn twm jrjd ʔan jkwn kʔaχjh d͡ʒwn saːmj jkrh mubijnun ħrm aːlʔislaːm aːltrwjʕ faʔaarsalnaaː fijhim rasuwlanaː minhum ʔaani aːʕbuduwaː aːllːaha maaː lakum min ʔiilahin ʁajruhu ʔaafalaaː tatːaquwna waʔauχraaː tuħibːuwnahaaː nasˤrun mina aːllːahi wafatħun qarijbun wabaʃːiri aːlmuʔuminijna wakamaaː ʔaanːa sˤalaaːħa aːlχisˤbi ʕaaːmːun waaːltːaaːsiʕu aːlðˤːafaru biʕaaːlimin samħin biʕilmihi mutaʔaanːin fij taʕlijmihi ʔaamadːakum biʔaanʕaaːmin wabanijna jstʕd͡ʒlwnk baːlʕðaːb wʔin d͡ʒhnm lmħjtˤa baːlkaːfrjn ʔafdˤl aːlsmk ʕlaː aːllħm lðaː  fʔinnaː nħb aːld͡ʒml lknnaː nħb aːllʁaːt ʔakθr ʔanaː dˤd͡ʒr fahuwa aːlquruwdˤu jusʕifu ʕinda ʔaʁbaːnj ħjn sˤdqth aːstrχaː mnːaːd bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi aːqtarabati aːlsːaaːʕaau waaːnʃaqːa aːlqamaru qaaːla jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlmalaʔau ʔaajːukum jaʔatijnij biʕarʃihaaː qabla ʔaan jaʔatuwnij muslimijna wamin aːlsˤːanijʕaai ʔaan tarubːa ħusna aːlsˤːanijʕaai jawma nabtˤiʃu aːlbatˤʃaaa aːlkubraaː ʔiinːaaː muntaqimuwna wamaaː sˤudːa ʕan aːlsːarafi mustadijmun ʕljnaː aːħtraːm waːldjnaː wʔiðaː dʕwaː ʔilaː aːllh wrswlh ljħkm bjnhm ʔiðaː frjq mnhm mʕrdˤwn waliðalika χalaqahum jaʕnij liliaːχtilaaːfi biaːlʁinaaː waaːlfaqri qul lakum mijʕaaːdu jawmin laaː tastaʔaχiruwna ʕanhu saaːʕaaan walaaː tastaqdimuwna qaaːla lam ʔaakun liʔaasd͡ʒuda libaʃarin χalaqtahu min sˤalsˤaaːlin min ħamaʔiin masnuwnin wd͡ʒʕlnaː mn bjn ʔajdjhm sdaː wmn χlfhm sdaː fʔaʁʃjnaːhm fhm laː jbsˤrwn mn kfr fʕljh kfrh wmn ʕml sˤaːlħaː flʔanfshm jmhdwn jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː aːtːaquwaː aːllːaha ħaqːa tuqaaːtihi walaaː tamuwtunːa ʔiilːaaː waʔaantum muslimuwna sˤwːtːu lsˤaːlħ kjn ʃhwr kjf ʔabdw wasˤlu aːlħuruwfi aːlmafsˤuwlaai wafasˤlu aːlħuruwfi aːlmawsˤuwlaai ħatːaaː ʔiiðaaː maaː d͡ʒaaːʔuwhaaː ʃahida ʕalajhim samʕuhum waʔaabsˤaaːruhum wad͡ʒuluwduhum bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jaʕmaluwna kmaː ʔaχrd͡ʒk rbk mn bjtk baːlħq wʔin frjqaː mn aːlmʔumnjn lkaːrhwn waaːʕlam ʔaanːa aːldːunjaaː lam takun qatˤːu lid͡ʒamijʕi ʔaahlihaaː musʕidaaan waʔaatˤijʕuwaː aːllːaha warasuwlahu walaaː tanaaːzaʕuwaː fatafʃaluwaː wataðhaba rijħukum waaːsˤbiruwaː ʔiinːa aːllːaha maʕa aːlsˤːaaːbirijna aːllhm, laː aːʕtraːdˤ waħumilati aːlʔaardˤu waaːld͡ʒibaaːlu fadukːataaː dakːaaan waaːħidaaan bwb ʃχsˤ mħbwb fj aːlmdrsa hija qawaaːʕidu ʔaamrihi waniðˤaaːmu ħaaːlihi faːsˤbr ʔin wʕd aːllh ħq waːstʁfr lðnbk wsbħ bħmd rbk baːlʕʃj waːlʔibkaːr ʔanaː ðaːhb ʔilaː maːjnts θum ʔilaː kwlwnjaː aːlʕaːm aːlqaːdm laʔiin kaaːna ʕumaru jaraaː lahu fijhi ħaqːanaː laaː jarudːuhu likalaaːmij mn qaːl hðaː laː ʔatðkr klmaːth bħarfjːthaː faaːrtaqib jawma taʔatij aːlsːamaaːʔu biduχaaːnin mubijnin ʕlm aːlʔinsaːn maː lm
