fj aːlʔardˤ wln nʕd͡ʒzh hrbaː mn faːz  sraːbjlhm mn qtˤraːn wtʁʃaː wd͡ʒwhhm aːlnaːr lma trkt wðˤjftk waaːʕrif maħabːatahu min ʕajnihi laaː min lisaaːnihi qaːl ʔinmaː ʔaʃkw bθj wħznj ʔilaː aːllh wʔaʕlm waaːltːalaaːtˤufi taʔaakːadat ʔaasbaaːbuhaaː waaːqtarana biħamijːaai aːlnːasabi musˤaaːfaaːau aːlmawadːaai hðaː mn aːlʔaʃjaːʔ aːltj ʔaħbːhaː fj aːlʔislaːm waaːlχaaːmisaaa ʔaanːa ʁadˤaba aːllːahi aːlmsʔala shla ldrd͡ʒa ʔan ʔajː tˤaːlb jmknh ħlːhaː ʔakrh aːlnsaːʔ aːlʁjwraːt ʔaaw maradˤin ʔaadˤʕafahu ʕan ʔaadaaːʔi maaː kulːifa bihi d͡ʒanːaaːti ʕadnin aːlːatij waʕada aːlrːaħmanu ʕibaaːdahu biaːlʁajbi ʔiinːahu kaaːna waʕduhu maʔatijːanaː ql ʔarʔajtm ʔin ʔataːkm ʕðaːbh bjaːtaː ʔaw nhaːraː maːðaː jstʕd͡ʒl mnh aːlmd͡ʒrmwn hl hj sdjqtj  walaqad jasːarnaaː aːlqurʔaːna lilðːikri fahal min mːudːakirin mn ʔanti  aːlbtˤaːtˤaː aːlmslwqa ʔashl hdˤmaː bkθjr mn btˤaːtˤaː aːltraːkwtaː smʕth jnzl aːlmdrd͡ʒ waaːlmajla aːlmadχuwla laaː jaduwmu ʕalaaː daχalihi fahuwa laaː jaʕrifu qadra aːlnːiʕmaai biʔaamnihi ħatːaaː jaχaaːfa hðaː aːlkrsj mkswr walaaː ʔauqsimu biaːlnːafsi aːllːawːaaːmaai ʔantm mħðˤwðˤwn faʕasˤawaː rasuwla rabːihim faʔaaχaðahum ʔaaχðaaan rːaaːbijaaan bdʔ twm tʕlm aːlfrnsja aːlʕaːm aːlmaːdˤj walahu maaː sakana fij aːllːajli waaːlnːahaaːri wahuwa aːlsːamijʕu aːlʕalijmu laː ʔaħd tˤlb bjtzaː hnaː laaːbiθijna fijhaaː ʔaaħqaaːbanaː baːbl fjnaː wʔaːʃwr lnaː waʔiiðaaː aːlnːufuwsu zuwːid͡ʒat qaaːla bal faʕalahu kabijruhum haðaaː faaːsʔaaluwhum ʔiin kaaːnuwaː jantˤiquwna waːldj fj ʁrfth ʔanaː mʃʁwla aːlʔan aːtrknj w ʃʔanj dʕjnaː fqtˤ ntðˤaːhr wkʔannaː laː nʕrf bʕdˤnaː aːlbʕdˤ bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi waaːlʃːamsi wadˤuħaaːhaaː maːðaː jtʕlːmn wmaː ʔanzlnaː ʕlaː qwmh mn bʕdh mn d͡ʒnd mn aːlsmaːʔ wmaː knaː mnzljn wad͡ʒaaːʔa min ʔaaqsˤaaː aːlmadijnaai rad͡ʒulun jasʕaaː qaaːla jaaː qawmi aːtːabiʕuwaː aːlmursalijna waːfq mnːaːd faaːntaqamnaaː minhum waʔiinːahumaaː labiʔiimaaːmin mubijnin fʔamaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aːlsˤaːlħaːt fjdχlhm rbhm fj rħmth ðlk hw aːlfwz aːlmbjn laː jʕrf twm aːnnj fj hnaː klb kjn ʔabjdˤ ldj bʕdˤ aːlsˤwr lʔarjk wlʔin ʔaðqnaː aːlʔinsaːn mnaː rħma θm nzʕnaːhaː mnh ʔinh ljʔiws kfwr wakaðalika ʔaanzalnaaːhu qurʔaːnanaː ʕarabijːanaː wasˤarːafnaaː fijhi mina aːlwaʕijdi laʕalːahum jatːaquwna ʔaaw juħdiθu lahum ðikranaː ljs sˤħjħanaː baːldˤrwra ʔan kl maː jqwlh aːlmʕlm sˤħjħ daːʔimanaː maː hj sˤfaːth waʔiinːamaaː ðakarahu taʕðˤijmanaː lilʕilmi ʕan ʔaan juħaaːtˤa bihi jd͡ʒb ʕlaː aːlmstʔad͡ʒr dfʕ aːlaːjd͡ʒaːr llmʔud͡ʒr fj nhaːja kl ʃhr ʔaħb mmaːrsa aːlʔalʕaːb aːlrjaːdˤja ʔajn tskn kaaːlnːaaːri justadfaʕu biaːlmaaːʔi ʔiħraaːquhaaː waminhum ʔaumːijːuwna laaː jaʕlamuwna aːlkitaaːba ʔiilːaaː ʔaamaaːnijːa waʔiin hum ʔiilːaaː jaðˤunːuwna aːunðˤur ʔilaaː haðihi aːlrːaaːħaai kajfa taʕad͡ʒːalahaaː waʔiilaaː aːlsːalaaːmaai kajfa sˤaaːra ʔilajhaaː waʔaaqimi aːlsˤːalaaːaa tˤarafaji aːlnːahaaːri wazulafanaː mina aːllːajli ʔiinːa aːlħasanaaːti juðhibna aːlsːajːiʔiaaːti ðalika ðikraaː lilðːaaːkirijna ʔilaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aːlsˤaːlħaːt wtwaːsˤwaː baːlħq wtwaːsˤwaː baːlsˤbr fljʔatwaː bħdjθ mθlh ʔin kaːnwaː sˤaːdqjn lqd dfʕt kl maː ʔamlk qaːʕda aːlbjaːnaːt hðh dˤrwrja ltmkjn aːlbaːħθjn mn ttˤwjr tqnjaːt ðkaːʔ aːsˤtˤnaːʕj ʔanaː ldj d͡ʒaːr ʔijtˤaːlj ʔaafamaaː naħnu bimajːitijna ʔanta ksrta qlbj aːllh laː ʔilh ʔilaː hw rb aːlʕrʃ aːlʕðˤjm lh mqaːljd aːlsmaːwaːt waːlʔardˤ waːlðjn kfrwaː bʔaːjaːt aːllh ʔawlʔik hm aːlχaːsrwn waaːʃtuhiruwaː bihi aːʃtihaaːra aːlmutabaħːirijna qjl aːdχl aːld͡ʒna qaːl jaː ljt qwmj jʕlmwn wahuwa jaχʃaaː hl hw jtħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja, aːlfrnsja ʔaw aːlʔalmaːnja  lm tqaːwm lwqt tˤwjl nħn mhtmwn d͡ʒdaː waʔaaʕd͡ʒaza minhu man dˤajːaʕa man ðˤafira bihi minhum waaːðkuri aːsma rabːika watabatːal ʔiilajhi tabtijlaː fkr fj mstqblk waʔaamtˤarnaaː ʕalajhim matˤaranaː faaːnðˤur kajfa kaaːna ʕaaːqibaau aːlmud͡ʒrimijna ʔanta lstu fj mwqf jsmħ ltsʔal ʕn ʔaj ʃʔi ʔin aːltħrr mn aːld͡ʒwʕ ʔamr laː bd mnh lld͡ʒmjʕ aːstʁrqth trd͡ʒma aːlrwaːja aːlfrnsja ʔakθr mn θlaːθa ʔaʃhr wariθnaaː aːlsaːwaaːʕida bajna aːlʔaumam sˤuχuwranaː sˤuχuwranaː kahaðaaː aːlbinaaː wmnð ðlk aːlwqt ʔinh ʁjr mtfq mʕnaː bχsˤwsˤ hðaː aːlmwdˤwʕ hl hðaː jʔulm waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlsˤːulaħaaːʔi aːlʕilmu jahtifu biaːlʕamali  faʔiin ʔaad͡ʒaaːbahu ʔaaqaaːma waʔiilːaaː aːrtaħala aːlaːnwaːʔ aːld͡ʒwja tqwl baːnhaː stmtˤr ʁdaː bʕd aːlðˤhr waʔaanijbuwaː ʔiilaaː rabːikum waʔaaslimuwaː ħalijmihim ʕasaaː rabːunaaː ʔaan jubdilanaaː χajranaː mːinhaaː ʔiinːaaː ʔiilaaː rabːinaaː raaːʁibuwna faʔaamːaaː kaθratuhu faʔiinːahaaː ʔaumnijaaun jd͡ʒb ʔan trkz ʕlaː aːltˤrjq ʔaθnaːʔ aːlqjaːda jnbʁj ʔan tʁlːj hðaː aːlmaːʔ qbl ʃrbih qaaːla ʔaaʁajra aːllːahi ʔaabʁijkum ʔiilahanaː wahuwa fadˤːalakum ʕalaaː aːlʕaaːlamijna maaː jud͡ʒaaːdilu fij ʔaːjaaːti aːllːahi ʔiilːaaː aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː falaaː waʔiiqbaaːlahu mustaʁrabun maaː raʔaajt miθlij wamaaː ʔaaʃaaːʔu ʔaan ʔaalqaaː rad͡ʒulanaː ʔaaʕlama minːij ʔilːaaː laqijtuhu balaaː man kasaba sajːiʔiaaan waʔaaħaaːtˤat bihi χatˤijʔiatuhu faʔauwlaʔiika aːltːirmðjːu: ħdjθun ħsanun sˤħjħun mutːakiʔiijna ʕalaaː sururin masˤfuwfaain wazawːad͡ʒnaaːhum biħuwrin ʕijnin faʔaanbatnaaː fijhaaː ħabːanaː kaːn mnːaːd jswq aːldːraːd͡ʒa ʔilaː aːlqaːhra mtwd͡ʒːhaː ʔilaː mnzlh waaːd͡ʒʕal ʔaabʕada ʔaamlika baqijːaaa jawmik lm jqsˤd twm aːldws ʕlaː qdm maːrj waqismun munaaːsibuwna mn fdˤlk tħdθ bbtˤʔ, kj ʔafhmk dʕaːma llnhwdˤ baːlʔamaːzjʁja ln ʔaqdˤj ħjaːtj mtswlaː ʕn lʁtj fj d͡ʒmhwrja tsˤf nfshaː baːlʕrbja juqalːibu aːllːahu aːllːajla waaːlnːahaaːra ʔiinːa fij ðalika laʕibraaan liʔauwlij aːlʔaabsˤaaːri mn fdˤlk ʔaʕtˤnj qlmaːan w bdˤʕa ʔawraːq jnbʁj ʔan trd aːldjwn aːltj ʕljk bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm khjʕsˤ ʔaaw mutadajːananaː bihi fij aːlʃːarʕi wad͡ʒaaːʔa firʕawnu waman qablahu waaːlmuʔutafikaaːtu biaːlχaaːtˤiʔiaai waaːliaːχtilaaːfu bitadbijrihi ʔaaðˤhara wtlk ħd͡ʒtnaː ʔaːtjnaːhaː ʔibraːhjm ʕlaː qwmh nrfʕ drd͡ʒaːt mn nʃaːʔ ʔin rbk ħkjm ʕljm ʔaafamani aːtːabaʕa ridˤwaaːna aːllːahi kaman baaːʔa bisaχatˤin mina aːllːahi wamaʔawaaːhu d͡ʒahanːamu wabiʔisa aːlmasˤijru bjth ʔakbr mn bjtj bθlaːθ mraːt walaaː julhijhi ʕan tˤalabihi kaθraau maaːlin wad͡ʒadahu walaaː nufuwðu ʔaamrin waʕuluwːu manzilaain ʔajn mrjm  waʔiinːamaaː justakfaaː biaːltːaʔaalːufi ʔiðˤhaaːruhaaː wajastanbiʔiuwnaka ʔaaħaqːun huwa qul ʔiij warabːij ʔiinːahu laħaqːun wamaaː ʔaantum bimuʕd͡ʒizijna aːlʕadli aːlmuqtarini bihaaː walaaː sˤalaaːħa fijhaaː ʔilːaaː maʕahu aːlħilmu sjd aːlʔaχlaːq lakinːaaː huwa aːllːahu rabːij walaaː ʔauʃriku birabːij ʔaaħadanaː lamad͡ʒmuwʕuwna ʔiilaaː mijqaaːti jawmin mːaʕluwmin nħn klaːnaː ʔasˤdqaːʔ ʔasmʕt ʔanh qd ʕaːd ʔaχjraː ʔilaː bjth  ʔin kaːn ðnbj ʔanː ħbːk ʃaːʁlj ʕmːn swaːk aːlħdjθ aːlθaːmn ʕʃr: aːlχlq aːlħsn mdfʔatnaː aːlkhrbaːʔija laː tʕml d͡ʒjdaː jd͡ʒb ʕljk aːlaːltzaːm baːlʕwaːqb ðurːijːaaan baʕdˤuhaaː min baʕdˤin waaːllːahu samijʕun ʕalijmun ðlk ʁjr mmkn lnbdʔa ʕlaː aːlfwr aːlqamaru aːlħulm min aːlʃamsu lmħth llħðˤa wstˤ aːlħʃd stbħr aːlsfjna ʁdaː ʔilaː hwnwlwlw aːlːaðijna jatːaχiðuwna aːlkaaːfirijna ʔaawlijaaːʔa min duwni aːlmuʔuminijna ʔaajabtaʁuwna ʕindahumu aːlʕizːaaa faʔiinːa aːlʕizːaaa lilːahi d͡ʒamijʕanaː aːlʁjra laː td͡ʒʕl ʔaħd mχlsˤ jħbhaː hj ltˤjfa mʕ aːld͡ʒmjʕ fij sˤuħufin mːukarːamaain hðh ljst d͡ʒmlaan lqd qmt brħla ʕbr kndaː fj aːbrjl mn aːlsna aːlmaːdˤja wkðlk ʔanzlnaːh qrʔaːnaː ʕrbjaː wsˤrfnaː fjh mn aːlwʕjd lʕlhm jtqwn ʔaw jħdθ lhm ðkraː qd frdˤ aːllh lkm tħla ʔajmaːnkm waːllh mwlaːkm whw aːlʕljm aːlħkjm aːχtijaaːru χulafaaːʔiihi fij aːlʔaumuwri ʔaan jakuwnuwaː min ʔaahli aːlkifaaːjaai fijhaaː aːʃʕr baːlðnb lawad͡ʒaba miθluhu ʕalaaː aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː qlt lk ʔannj laː ʔaʕrf kjf ʔafʕl ðlk ʔaan jakuwna fiʕlu aːlmunkari min d͡ʒamaaːʕaain qad tadˤaaːfaruwaː ʕalajhi qaaːla laaː taχtasˤimuwaː ladajːa waqad qadːamtu ʔiilajkum biaːlwaʕijdi knt ʔatʕlːm aːlnqd shl lkn aːlfn sˤʕb wajabtaʁij aːlzːijaaːdaaa fijmaaː baqija faʔiin kaaːna aːlʕaqdu raʁbaaan fij aːld͡ʒamaaːli hl tsmħ lj bklma mʕk  ʔin aːlðjn ʕnd rbk laː jstkbrwn ʕn ʕbaːdth wjsbħwnh wlh jsd͡ʒdwn qaaːla bal ʔaalquwaː faʔiiðaaː ħibaaːluhum waʕisˤijːuhum juχajːalu ʔiilajhi min siħrihim ʔaanːahaaː tasʕaaː wknaː nkðb bjwm aːldjn hl nðˤaːraːtk tˤbja  kaːn saːmj raːʁbaː fj ʔan td͡ʒjbh ljlaː ʕn bʕdˤ aːlʔasʔila aːlsˤːʕba ħwl maːdˤjhaː lajsa liwaqʕatihaaː kaaːðibaaun kl maː ʕljk fʕlh ʔan tntbh lnfsk waaːlːaðijna saʕawaː fij ʔaːjaaːtinaaː muʕaaːd͡ʒizijna ʔauwlaʔiika ʔaasˤħaaːbu aːld͡ʒaħijmi laaː jamnaʕanːaka ħaðaru aːlmiraaːʔi min ħusni aːlmunaaːðˤaraai aːlrd͡ʒaːʔ msaːʕdtj fj mlʔ hðaː aːlnmwðd͡ʒ wlaː tħaːdˤwn ʕlaː tˤʕaːm aːlmskjn law ʔaarsalt ʔilaaː aːltˤːabijbi  faqaaːla faʔaaχaðahu aːllːahu nakaaːla waʔaafdˤali aːlʕudadi ʔanaː ʔaħb aːllʁa aːltrkja kθjraːan lm jkn llkwn ʔaj msˤdr dˤwʔ ʔinhaː ʃaːja d͡ʒdaːan waːðkr ʕbdnaː ʔajwb ʔið naːdaː rbh ʔanj msnj aːlʃjtˤaːn bnsˤb wʕðaːb wmaː ʔadraːk maː sqr nql aːlʕlb w hj mljʔia baːlkaːml aːχtartu lakum min aːlʔaumːahaaːti man laaː tusabːuwna bihaaː wjnd͡ʒj aːllh aːlðjn aːtqwaː bmfaːzthm laː jmshm aːlswʔ wlaː hm jħznwn ʔinh ʔajl jʕjʃ baːlʁaːba ʕan ʔaabij aːlʕbːaaːsi ʕbdi aːllh bni ʕabːaːsin radˤij aːllhu ʕanhumaː bʃʕaːr jʔufk ʕnh mn ʔafk faʔaaχaða ðalika ʔaabuw tamːaaːmin aːltˤːaaːʔiijːu faqaaːla ʕndnaː qtˤ klnaː nħb aːlqtˤtˤ swf tħbːhaː maːrj munqalabanaː lm jʕlm saːmj maːðaː kaːn jʕml waqaaːluwaː rabːanaaː ʕad͡ʒːil lanaaː qitˤːanaaː qabla jawmi aːlħisaaːbi hl tʕlm maː jʕmlh twm lksb rzqh tdˤrb aːlzlaːzl aːljaːbaːn bkθra walaw nazːalnaaːhu hðaː aːltqrjr  qaaːla rabːi aːʃraħ lij sˤadrij ʔanaː sˤdjq rwbrts laː tθqwaː bh sʔalʕb kra aːlqdm ʁdanaː θumːa jatuwbu aːllːahu min baʕdi ðalika ʕalaaː man jaʃaaːʔu waaːllːahu ʁafuwrun raħijmun hlaːː faʔiin ʔaanfaqahu lam juqbal minhu rd͡ʒaːʔ nfːð kmaː ʔaːmrk huwa aːlːaðj d͡ʒaʕala lakumu aːlʔaardˤa ðalwlanaː faaːmʃwaː fj manaːkibihaː wakulwaː min rizqihi waʔiilajhi aːlnːuʃwru faʔaamːaaː aːlːaðjna makranaː wamakarnaː makranaː wahum laː jaʃʕurwna kjf ħaːl aːld͡ʒmjʕ waqad tuħdiθu aːlmanaaːzilu waaːlwilaaːjaaːtu liqawmin ʔaaχlaaːqanaː maðmuwmaaan juðˤhiruhaaː suwʔu tˤibaaːʕihim ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː nakaaːlanaː fij aːlʔaawːalijna kaːn saːmj laː jzaːl fj aːlʕjaːda waːsˤl saːmj ħjaːth ʔamlt aːlʃːrtˤa ʔan jqdːm saːmj bʕdˤ aːlmʕlwmaːt ʕn mkaːn twaːd͡ʒd ljlaː lijawmi aːlfasˤli aːlmazːaaːħu mudˤirːun hw jwaːd͡ʒh aːlʕdjd mn aːlʕwaːʔiq waqulnaaː aːhbitˤuwaː baʕdˤukum libaʕdˤin ʕaduwːun walakum fij aːlʔaardˤi mustaqarːun wamataaːʕun ʔiilaaːaː ħijnin waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami wajlun lilðˤːaaːlimi min jawmi aːlmaðˤaaːlimi tisʕaau ʔaaʕʃaaːri aːlrːizqi fij aːltːid͡ʒaaːraai waaːlħarθi waaːlbaaːqij fij aːlsːaaːʔiibaaːti faʔaanʃaʔaa aːbnu ʃihaaːbin jaquwlu waqad kafarwaː bihi min qablu wajaqðifwna biaːlʁajbi min makaːnin baʕjdin waqaaːlat aːlħukamaaːʔu tˤalabu maaː laaː judraku ʕad͡ʒzun waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi jakfijk min aːlħaaːsidi ʔaanːahu jaʁtamːu fij waqti suruwrik ʔin aːlmsʔala aːlʔawlaː aːltj jd͡ʒb ʔan nd͡ʒaːbhhaː hj aːlttˤrf aːlʕnjf bkaːfa ʔaʃkaːlh law kunːaaː natˤlubu aːlʕilma linabluʁa ʁaaːjatahu kunːaaː qad badaʔanaaː aːlʕilma biaːlnːaqijsˤaai hl ʔant tfkːr fj ʔiχbaːrh ʕn ðlk fajaqharu nafsahu ʕalaaː aːlʁadˤabi raʁbaaan fij aːld͡ʒazaaːʔi waaːlθːawaaːbi qdːm saːmj llʃːrtˤa wsˤfaː ʕn aːlmʃtbh bh lam juʁnihi minhaaː kaθraau maaː jad͡ʒmaʕu ʔiiði aːnbaʕaθa ʔaaʃqaːhaː wamaː huwa biaːlhazli ʔaj tˤfl jʕrf ðlk mħmd rswl aːllh ʔiðaː ðˤlmt mn dwnk flaː tʔamn ʕqaːb mn fwqk falilːahi aːlʔaːχiraau waaːlʔawlaː kaːnt ljlaː trjd ʔan tsˤbħ mmrːdˤa waqaaːla saaːbuwru bnu ʔaardaʃijra aːlʕaqlu nawʕaaːni ʔaaħaduhumaaː matˤbuwʕun  waaːlʔaːχaru masmuwʕun waʔaamːaaː aːlmuʕtˤij faʔiinːahu wad͡ʒada ðalika aːtːifaaːqanaː warubːamaaː ʔaamala biaːliaːtːifaaːqi ʔaadˤʕaaːfanaː munjbjna ʔiilajhi waaːtːaqwhu waʔaaqjmuwaː aːlsˤːalaːaa walaː takwnwaː mina aːlmuʃrikjna rakːaba aːllːahu aːlmalaaːʔiikaaa min ʕaqlin bilaaː ʃahwaain mn fdˤlk wzːʕ aːlwrq faqaːla ʔaanaː rabːukumu mwsaː wud͡ʒwhun jawmaʔiiðin naːdˤiraaun waʔiiðaaː aːlʔaardˤu mudːat kaːn ðlk aːlmdrːs mmlaːː d͡ʒdːaː wawadˤaʕnaː ʕanka wizraka waʔiin ʔauwħiʃa takdara tfdˤːl jaː d͡ʒjm lm jzrh qtˤː hðaː mdrːsnaː fj aːlfn mn aːlwaːdˤħ ʔanːh mðnb jaʔakulu aːlʔiinsaːnu kaj janmuwa jtʁjːr aːld͡ʒwː mn jwm ʔilaː ʔaːχr aːftħ aːlbaːb tmː tʕjjn ljlaː kmraːqba d͡ʒdjda llmmrːdˤaːt saːmj jħbː maːdːa aːltːsˤwjr aːʕlam ʔaanːa aːlħaaːd͡ʒaaa ʁaːlbaː maː jnsaː wʕwdh kaːldˤrjʕ laː jsmn wlaː jʁnj mn d͡ʒwʕ takaːdu tamajːazu mina aːlʁajðˤi kulːamaː ʔaulqija fjhaː fawd͡ʒun saʔaalahum χazanatuhaː ʔaalam jaʔatikum naðjrun ʔafrʁ d͡ʒjwbk wamaː kunta bid͡ʒaːnibi aːlʁarbijːi ʔiið qadˤajnaː ʔiilaː mwsaaː aːlʔaamra wamaː kunta mina aːlʃːaːhidjna ʔakðb mn msjlma ʔikraːm aːlmjt dfnh ʁaːb ħwljn wd͡ʒaːʔ biχufaːj ħnjn ʁaːbt aːlsbaːʕ wlʕbt aːldˤbaːʕ aːlʁaːlj θmnh fjh ʔinh waːldj waman ʔaamsaka fahuwa ʃarːun lahu lm tr tˤbjbaːan waʔaasnaaː liðikrihim mn jmlk qtˤʕa aːlʔardˤ hðh kaːn saːmj jʕaːnj mn mʃkl ʔidmaːn ʕlaː aːlχmr sˤaːm saːmj ʃhr rmdˤaːn walaaː tubaaːjinhum biaːlʕuzlaai ʕanhum fajamqutuwk wajutˤaːfu ʕalajhim biʔaːnijaain min fidˤːaain waʔaakwaːbin kaːnat qawaːrjraː ʔiinːaː d͡ʒaʕalnaːhu qurʔaːnanaː ʕarabijːanaː laʕalːakum taʕqilwna jʕml saːmj fj aːlʕjaːda aːlbldjːa faʔaamːaaː aːlʔiinsaːnu ʔiiðaː maaː aːbtalaːhu rabːuhu faʔaakramahu wanaʕːamahu fajaqwlu rabːj ʔaakramani faðahaba baʕdˤuhum ʔilaaː ʔaanːa aːlʔaawlaaː taʕd͡ʒijlu aːlwaʕdi qawlanaː walaqad fatanːaː qablahum qawma firʕawna wad͡ʒaːʔahum raswlun karjmun waʔiinːamaaː aːχtalafat ʕaaːdaaːtu aːlnːaaːsi fij aːllːibaaːsi min haðajni aːlwad͡ʒhajni kamaaː ʔaanːa aːlχajra tawasːutˤun waaːtːasaʕat ʔaumnijːatuhu faaːlsˤːaʁaaːʔiiru maʁfuwraaun ruwija ʕanhu sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʔaanːahu qaaːla laː jnbʁj ʔan ttrkh jðhb bhðh aːlsːhwla waʔaalzamahum ħud͡ʒːatahu wafarijsaaa ʁumuwmihi smħt aːlʃːrtˤa lsaːmj kj jtqaːbl mʕ ljlj waaːstaftaħuwaː waχaaːba kulːu d͡ʒabːaaːrin ʕanijdin famazːaqa aːlmusˤħafa waʔaanʃaʔaa jaquwlu walajsa lilmuqaaːbalaai ʔilːaaː ʔaaħadu haðajni aːlwad͡ʒhajni aːlmuwaaːfaqaau fij aːliaːʔitilaaːfi waaːlmudˤaaːdːaau maʕa aːliaːχtilaaːfi bajdˤaːʔa laðːaain lilʃːaːribjna dχl saːmj ʔilaː aːlmstʃfaː llbħθ ʕn ljlaː waqijla liʔaanuwʃirwaaːna aːlðjn jnswn kl ʃjʔ sʕdaːʔ maː lakum laː tanaːsˤarwna qwmwaː btnsˤjb ljnks maː janðˤurwna ʔiilːaː sˤajħaaan waːħidaaan taʔaχuðuhum wahum jaχisˤːimwna waliʔaajːi ðalika kaaːna fahuwa aːld͡ʒahlu aːlsˤːarijħu  waaːlnːaqsˤu aːlfadˤijħu d͡ʒjms hw aːsmh aːlmsjħj aːlmaʕruwfu kaaːsmihi waʔaawːalu man jadχulu aːld͡ʒanːaaa jawma aːlqijaaːmaai aːlmaʕruwfu waʔaahluhu saːmj jdrːs aːlʕrbjːa fj msˤr ʕan aːlkisaaːʔiijː aːlmblʁ sˤħjħ ʔaan takuwna dawaaːʕij aːlkaðibi qad taraaːdafat ʕalajhi ħatːaaː ʔaalifahaaː ʔiðaː sˤdʔa aːlrʔaj ʔasˤqlth aːlmʃwra wahaðaaːni humaaː farʕun liwad͡ʒhaj aːlmaaːdːaai  fasˤaaːrat ʔaasbaaːbu aːlmawaaːdːi aːlmaʔaluwfaai  wad͡ʒihaaːtu aːlmakaaːsibi ʕaːdaan maː nftˤr aːlsaːbʕa w aːlnsˤf sˤbaːħaːan waʔaanːahum ðˤanːwaː kamaː ðˤanantum ʔaan lan jabʕaθa aːllːahu ʔaaħadanaː wataʕaaːtˤaaː ʔaafʕaaːla aːlfukaaːhaai waaːlbatˤari kaaːalːaðij ħukija ʕan ʔaabij muʕaaːwijaaa aːldˤːarijri laː jħb twm hðaː aːllwn waʔiin sˤadːathu aːlʃːahwaau ʕan maraaːʃidihi faʕadːa aːlnːaaːsu ðalika min mustaħsani aːlkibri faʔiinːa lijna aːllːafðˤi fij aːltːarhijbi waχuʃuwnatuhu fij aːltːarʁijbi χuruwd͡ʒun ʕan mawdˤiʕihimaaː wataʕtˤijlun lilmaqsˤuwdi ʔaasbaaːbu aːlʃːarːi wafij aːlmuʕwizi ʔaan jakuwna mustakmilanaː kaðalika aːlħaðˤːu ʔin sˤaaːdafa nafsanaː ʃarijfaaan nafaʕa ʔaʃhd ʔan laː ʔilh ʔilaː aːllh wʔaʃhd ʔan mħmdaː ʕbdh wrswlh ðˤuhuwru trjd bʕd lm hm ʁaːdˤbjn ʔaqlː saːmj ljlaː mn aːld͡ʒaːmʕa faʔaamːaaː aːlʕuquwdu fahuwa ʔaan jakuwna fijhaaː sahla aːlmunaaːd͡ʒazaai ʔajmknnaː aːlħsˤwl ʕlaː ʃwka bʔimkaːn zwd͡ʒa jaːʔisa ʔan tqwm aːlχaːmsa waħukija ʕan aːlʔaaħnafi bni qajsin ʔaanːahu qaaːla ʔaχfdˤ sˤwt aːlmðjaːʕ ʔaaw maradˤanaː mufsidanaː ʔaaw haramanaː muqajːidanaː falaaː juʕijnuhu ʕalaaː ʔimdˤaaːʔi makrihi  waʔiiʕmaaːli ʃarːihi ʔajmknk msaːʕdtj fj trd͡ʒma hðh aːld͡ʒml ʔilaː aːllʁa aːlsˤjnja haðaaː kitaaːbun mufijdun qaaːla ʔaaħafiðˤt  qaaːla bal nasijtu ʔaunaðˤːifu aːlħiðaːʔa ʔijːaaːka wamuʃaaːwaraaa rad͡ʒulajni waʔiinːamaaː huwa baaːʔiiʕu d͡ʒaaːhihi wamuʕaaːwidˤu ʕalaaː niʕami aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː waʔaːlaaːʔiihi fakaaːna biaːlðːamːi ʔaaħaqːa qaːla ʔiinːa raswlakumu aːlːaðj ʔaursila ʔiilajkum lamad͡ʒnwnun baʕjdanaː wanad͡ʒmi ʔaːdama ʔiðaaː ʔaanaaː lam ʔaaʕlam maaː lam ʔaara falaaː aːlrħmaːn aːlrħjm lm jkn baːsttˤaːʕa saːmj ʔan jtħmːl ðlk aːldˤːd͡ʒjd͡ʒ daχala ʕalajːa rasuwlu aːllːahi sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama waʔaanaaː ʔaatamaθːalu bihaðajni aːlbajtajni waaːlʔaad͡ʒru ʔaad͡ʒdaru bihi min aːlʔiiθmi waaːlʕizːu ʔaaljaqu bihi min aːlðːulːi ʔaːml ʔan tʔatj ʕtˤla aːlsˤjf bsrʕa waqad qaaːlat mustamiʕuhum bisultˤaːnin mubjnin ʔaqbħ mn qrd waaːld͡ʒibaːla ʔaawtaːdanaː wazurwʕin wanaχlin tˤalʕuhaː hadˤjmun faʔaamːaaː aːltːaʔadijbu aːllːaaːzimu lilʔaabi fahuwa ʔaan jaʔaχuða waladahu bimabaaːdiʔii aːlʔaːdaaːbi lijaʔanasa bihaaː ʔaqlʕt ʕn aːltdχjn mnð sta ʔaʃhr waaːlsːarafu fij aːlðːamːi aːntiqaaːmun jasˤduru ʕan ʃarːin wafij sˤuwraai aːld͡ʒahli daaːχilanaː kalːaː ʔiiðaː dukːati fadˤijlatajni naaːqisˤatajni ʔabtsm saːmj bsχrjːa tslːq saːmj ʃd͡ʒra ʕaːlja d͡ʒdːaː naːru aːllːahi aːlmwqadaau jaː lhaː mn ftaːa d͡ʒmjla waʔiin kaːnwaː lajaqwlwna wafij ʕawaaːqibihi saaːlimanaː kulwaː wataslama χajrun lak min ʔaan tastabidːa watandama waqaaːla ʔaanuwʃirwaaːna liaːbnihi hurmuza waqaaːla saʕijdu bnu ʕurwaaa ʔamtlk ðaːkra kaːlsmka aːlðhbja qaaːla aːlʃːaaːʕir waʔiiðaaː waʕada falaaː ʔaawħaʃa karijmun ʔaabsˤaːruhaː χaːʃiʕaaun hðaː ljs wqt aːlʔiħtfaːl knt ʔawaːʕd mdrːstj fj aːlθːaːnwjːa juʁarːida aːlʕasˤfuwru qaaːla ʔiinːahu jaquwlu ʔiinːahaaː baqaraaun laaː faaːridˤun walaaː bikrun ʕawaaːnun bajna ðaaːlika ʔaasˤħaːbu aːld͡ʒanːaai jawmaʔiiðin χajrun mustaqarːanaː waʔaaħsanu maqjlanaː aːbdʔa aːltːsˤfjq hw mdrːsj aːlsːaːbq wamaχrad͡ʒanaː ʔilaaː aːlqatˤijʕaai waaːlʕuquwqi χuðuwaː maaː ʔaːtajnaaːkum biquwːaain waaːsmaʕuwaː θumːa talaaː faman ʕafaaː waʔaasˤlaħa faʔaad͡ʒruhu ʕalaaː aːllːahi tʕaːʃrwaː kaːlʔiχwaːn wtʕaːmlwaː kaːlʔaʁraːb wawakːala man aːstaħaqːa aːlmuqaaːbalaaa ʔilaaː ʁajrihi jkrh saːmj tlk aːlmdrːsa wanumakːina lahum fij aːlʔaardˤi wanurija firʕawna wahaːmaːna wad͡ʒunwdahumaː minhum maː kaːnwaː jaħðarwna mn jħb aːlħrb aːn aːnaːqʃ ħwl mrtbj wasababun likulːi luʔumin fj nhaːja aːlmtˤaːf wd͡ʒd saːmj nfsh fj aːlmstʃfaː kaðːabat θamwdu bitˤaʁwaːhaː wadawaaːʕij aːlkaðibi ʕaaːridˤaaun waʔaan lajsa lilʔiinsaːni ʔiilːaː maː saʕaː waʕalajhi fij tˤalabihi θalaaːθaau ʃuruwtˤin waqaaːla musˤʕabu bnu aːlzːubajri maaː qalːa sufahaaːʔu qawmin ʔilːaaː ðalːuwaː hl jmknnaː ʔan nnsaː ʔan ðlk qd ħdθ mn fdˤlk saːʕdnj aːllːaʔiijmaai  lam jabqa maʕahu χajrun mard͡ʒuwːun walaaː sˤalaaːħun maʔamuwlun laː jsttˤjʕ twm rʔuja maːrj mn mkaːnh tχaːsˤmaː saːmj w ljlaː ħwl msʔala mn sjtkfːl bʔawlaːdhmaː jaː nsaːʔ aːlʕaːlm ʕjdkn sʕjd laː ʔaħd jrjd aːlðhaːb ʔilaː hnaːk saːmj hw mdrːsj aːlmfdˤːl wafij aːlquluwbi maqbuwlaaun faʔaamːaaː man munija biʕuluwːi aːlhimːaai wasuliba ʃarafu aːlnːafsi faqad sˤaaːra ʕurdˤaaan liʔaamrin ʔaaʕwazathu ʔaːlatuhu ʔimːaaː maʕuwzun jantaðˤiru wad͡ʒdahu waʔiiðaaː qijla lahum ʔaːminuwaː bimaaː ʔaanzala aːllːahu man d͡ʒaːʔa biaːlħasanaai falahu χajrun minhaː wahum min fazaʕin jawmaʔiiðin ʔaːminwna aːld͡ʒw daːfʔi aːljwm ʔaːðaː fbʔimkaːnnaː aːlðhaːb llsbaːħa fj aːlmħjtˤ aːlzːiħaːmu ʃadijdun lm ʔarʁb bbðl mzjd mn aːlwqt lʔiqnaːʕ twm bdraːsa aːlfrnsja waqahrahaaː ʕan aːtːibaaːʕi ʃahawaaːtihaaː ʔaaħraaː kaːnt ljlaː ttnaːwl dwaːʔaː kaːn bʔimkaːnh ʔan jsbːb lhaː skta qlbjːa fj ʔamaːn aːllh ʔaalastum taðhabuwna farʁanaː watard͡ʒiʕuwna maʃaaːʁijla  qaaːluwaː qaːla lilmalaʔii ħawlahu ʔiinːa hðaː lasaːħirun ʕaljmun aːχrd͡ʒ mn aːlsːjːaːra mn fdˤlk aːltqjnaː bmdrːsnaː faðalika aːlfaaːdˤilu huwa aːlhaðru wafaaːqaaan jatamakːanu min ʔizaaːlatihaaː sˤanʕa aːlnːad͡ʒːaaːru kursijːanaː waaːlbajaaːnu fij maʕnaaː aːltːaʃaaːduqi aːʕtn bʔasnaːnk sʔaːχð ʔiðnaː ljwmjn faʔiinːa aːldːunjaaː ðˤilːu aːlʁamaaːmi tˤajːiba aːlkalimaai man jafʕal aːlχajra laaː jaʕdam d͡ʒawaaːʔiizahu laaː jaðhabu aːlʕurfu bajna aːllːahi waaːlnːaaːsi waʔaanʃada aːlrːijaaːʃijːu wamuʕaaːnaaːain fij tasˤawːurihi ʔisˤlaːħ aːlmwd͡ʒwd χjr mn aːntðˤaːr aːlmfqwd ʔiinːa aːlbaqara taʃaaːbaha ʕalajnaaː waʔiinːaaː ʔiin ʃaaːʔa aːllːahu lamuhtaduwna kasara maħmuwdun aːlʁusˤna ʕalaː sururin mutaqaːbiljna aːlbas min aːlθːijaaːbi maaː laaː jazdarijk fijhi aːlʕuðˤamaaːʔu min firʕawna ʔiinːahu kaːna ʕaːlijanaː mina aːlmusrifjna ʔasrʕ mn aːlbrq qul ʔiin kaːna lilrːaħmni waladun faʔaanaː ʔaawːalu aːlʕaːbidjna waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlbulaʁaaːʔi aːlbaχijlu ħaaːrisu niʕmatihi  waχaaːzinu waraθatihi waqatˤaʕa ʔaaʕðaaːrahaaː lst bðaːk aːlkaːtb nd͡ʒaː saːmj mn aːlnːaːr ʕbr aːlnːaːfða ʔin ʔaaħsana ʔilaaː ʔaaħadin taraka aːlmutˤaaːlabaaa biaːlʃːukri ʔafdˤl aːld͡ʒwd aːlʕtˤaːʔ qbl aːlmwʕd ʔafdˤl aːld͡ʒwd ʔan tbðl mn ʁjr msʔala waqad qaaːla aːlmutanabːij hðaː tzjjn lʃd͡ʒra ʕjd aːlmjlaːd aːlʔinfsˤaːljwn jrjdwn zʕzʕa aːlblaːd waʔaanːa aːlsːuruwra bihaaː ʔiðaaː ʔaaqbalat maʃuwbun biaːlħaðari min firaaːqihaaː ʔiðaaː ʔaadbarat waqaaːla baʕdˤu qatala aːlħuznu walam jaqtul aːlʁadˤabu liburuwzi aːlʁadˤabi wakumuwni aːlħuzni ʔinːij daχalt aːlbaaːriħaaa fij aːlʔaarbaʕijna waʔaanaaː ʔaastaħij min sinij ʔasˤbħt aːlkra mʕh tˤmwħh ʔan jsˤbħ sfjraː d͡ʒihaai naaːqisˤin  wabalwaaː ʕaaːlimin ʔilːaaː ʕalaaː jadi d͡ʒaaːhilin ʔamskwaː bh maːðaː tʃbh waqaaːla aːbnu aːld͡ʒalːaaːli biχilaaːfi aːlnːawʕi aːlʔaawːali waʔiin katamuwhu tanaaːqasˤa wawahija waqaaːla muħamːadu bnu ʕalijːin radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu tstħq ðlk jutˤijʕu ʔaaħamdu ʔaabaaːh ʔiið qaːla lahum ʔaaχwhum nwħun ʔaalaː tatːaqwna lijaħðˤaaː biʔaad͡ʒalːi aːlχibraai wajasʕada biħamijdi aːlʕaaːqibaai ʔajn wdˤʕt ðlk aːlʃːjʔ ʔahðh hj aːltˤːrjqa aːltj aːktʃfthaː mn ʔad͡ʒl mħaːrba aːlaːktʔiaːb wakaaːna min wud͡ʒuwdi buʁjatihi baʕijdanaː wasˤaaːra biaːqtiraaːħihi fardanaː waħijdanaː ʔinh humaaː baʕda aːlʕuquwbaai ʔaaʕðaru fij tanaqːusˤij waθalbij laː jmknnj ʔijd͡ʒaːd tjm saːmj jntðˤr baːbaː nwjl lm jstħqː saːmj mwta mʔasaːwjːa ktlk wafij miθlihi jaquwlu aːlʃːaaːʕiru watasˤlijaau d͡ʒaħjmin aːʁtnmt ljlaː wħda saːmj w ʔaʁwth laː tns hðh kaːn saːmj mqjːdaː lsrjrh fj aːlmstʃfaː aːntqlj ʔilaː mnzlj kaːn saːmj jstmʕ llrːsaːʔil aːlsˤːwtjːa aːltj tlqːaːhaː ʔiinːa aːlːaðjna juħaːdːwna aːllːaha waraswlahu ʔauwlʔiika fij aːlʔaaðalːjna wahaðaaː jabʕaθu ʕalajhi ħusnu aːlχuluqi wariqːaau aːltˤːabʕi laː ʔaʃaːhd aːltlfaːz kθjraː walaaː juħaqːiruwaː naaːʃiʔianaː kaðlika maː ʔaataaː min qabli ʔaan junazːala ʕalajhim min qablihi lamublisjna χð wqtk jaː jwʃjdaː saːmj aːlʔaːn fj ʁjbwba lw aːsttˤʕt lmaː lkmt saːmj bklː srwr fj wd͡ʒhh jaaː muʕaaːðu ʔaanta saaːlimun maaː sakatːa fijhi wajarawna maaː siwaaːhu qabijħanaː qumi aːllːajla ʔiilːaː qaljlanaː ʔin aːlbʁaːθ bʔardˤnaː jstnsr ʔin aːld͡ʒbaːn ħtfuh mn fwqh waʕda aːllːahi laː juχlifu aːllːahu waʕdahu walkinːa ʔaakθara aːlnːaːsi laː jaʕlamwna lkl fʕl rd fʕl jsaːwjh aːlʃda w jʕaːksh fj aːlʔitd͡ʒaːh tʕrːf saːmj ʕlaː aːlʕdjd mn aːltˤːlba aːlmslmjn fj twrwntw wamaaː laaː janqatˤiʕu namaaːʔuuhu biaːlðˤːaʕni waaːlrːiħlaai ʔaan laaː taʕmala fij aːlsːirːi ʕamalanaː tastaħij minhu fij aːlʕalaaːnijaai waðalika d͡ʒawdaaun aːlħadsi fij zamaaːnin ʁajri muhmilin lilħadsi ʔalaː jwd͡ʒd maː trjd qwlh lj kaːn saːmj fj mkaːn munʕt fjh aːlsːbaːħa ʔijːaaːka ʔaaʕanaaː stʔaχð bdˤʕ dqaːʔiq waljamdˤi fij ʕazaaːʔiimihi waaːθiqanaː biaːallːahi taʕaaːlaaː ʔin ʔauʕtˤija waraaːdˤijanaː bihi ʔin muniʕa mad͡ʒlisi ʔaanuwʃirwaaːna faqaaːla miθla daʔabi qawmi nwħin waʕaːdin waθamwda waaːlːaðjna min baʕdihim wamaaː aːllːahu jurjdu ðˤulmanaː lilʕibaːdi laː ʔaħd kaːnt ldjh ʃhjːa laaː tataʕawːad kaθraaa aːlmazːaaːħi kaːn faːdˤl jħbː aːltːzħlq ʔiinːamaː ʔaanta munðiru man jaχʃaːhaː waħakaaː aːbnu ʕawnin ʔaanːa jaʕlamwna ðˤaːhiranaː mina aːlħajaːai aːldːunjaː wahum ʕani aːlʔaːχiraai hum ʁaːfilwna walam tastaqim lahu dunjaaː sqtˤ aːlqmr aːlsˤnaːʕj qd nħtaːd͡ʒ lbʕdˤh ʔimːaaː min luʔumi tˤabʕin ðhb ʔilaː mwqf aːlsːjːaːraːt waaːlsːamaːʔa banajnaːhaː biʔaajdin waʔiinːaː lamwsiʕwna ħdθ hðaː lsbb aːlʁaflaau ʕan taħaðːuri aːlʕuqalaaːʔi maaː waqafa ʕalaaː aːltːadbijraaːti aːlsˤːaaːdiraai ʕan nataaːʔiid͡ʒi aːlʔaːraaːʔi aːlsˤːaħijħaai kasijaaːsaai aːlnːaaːsi watadbijri aːlbilaaːdi fajabʕudu min aːlsˤːawaaːbi wajud͡ʒaaːnibu aːlʔaadaba ؛ liʔaanːahu waʔiin kaaːna aːlkafːu ʕan aːlmud͡ʒaaːharaai biaːlðˤːulmi ðˤl jmʃj ʕaːd ʔilaː lʕb aːlʃːtˤrnd͡ʒ faʔaaχaðnaːhu wad͡ʒunwdahu fanabaðnaːhum fij aːljamːi faaːnðˤur kajfa kaːna ʕaːqibaau aːlðˤːaːlimjna laː jwd͡ʒd ʃjʔ md͡ʒːaːnj ðˤnː saːmj ʔanː ljlaː kaːnt tnwj ʔitˤlaːq aːlnːaːr ʕljh wajusriʕu ʔilaaː aːld͡ʒawaaːbi waʔiiðaaː laquwaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː qaaːluwaː ʔaːmanːaaː waʔiiðaaː χalaaː baʕdˤuhum ʔiilaaːaː baʕdˤin ʔiinːa lakum fjhi lamaː taχajːarwna hl jmknnj ʔintðˤaːr twm hnaː ðlikum bimaː kuntum tafraħwna fij aːlʔaardˤi biʁajri aːlħaqːi wabimaː kuntum tamraħwna baaːdˤat aːldːad͡ʒaːd͡ʒaau waqad qijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami man katama ʕilmanaː fakaʔaanːahu d͡ʒaaːhilun aːlʔiiʕd͡ʒaaːbu dˤidːu aːlsˤːawaaːbi waʔaːfaau aːlʔaalbaaːbi wajantaðˤiru min niʕmaain jaʔamuluhaaː faʔiinːahu ʔin ʔaadhaʃahu aːltːawaqːuʕu lahaaː jawma jukʃafu ʕan saːqin wajudʕawna ʔiilaaː aːlsːud͡ʒwdi falaː jastatˤjʕwna aːlʕfa d͡ʒjʃ laːjhzm fajaquwmu aːlʕaaːfuwna ʕan aːlnːaaːsi bimaː ʁafara lj rabːj wad͡ʒaʕalanj mina aːlmukramjna ʔaʃʕr baːlbrd aːlsrjr aːlðj nmt ʕljh baːlʔams lm jkn mrjħaːan waqad qaaːla aːlrːijaaːʃijːu walaaːnat lahu aːlquluwbu aːlʁidˤaaːbu ʕaːd ʔilaː aːlħrb wamaaː laaː janfaʕu min aːlkalaaːmi faqad taqadːama aːlqawlu biʔaanːahu haðajaaːnun wahad͡ʒrun naðˤara aːltˤːiflu ʔiilaaː aːltˤːaaːʔiiri wahuwa juħalːiqu fij aːlsːamaaːʔi ʔarʁm saːmj ljlaː ʕlaː mmraːsa aːld͡ʒns aːlʃːfwj mʕh waʔiin turika takalːafa waqaaːla ʕalijːu bnu ʔaabij tˤaaːlibin karːama aːllːahu wad͡ʒhahu lilʔaaʃʕaθi bni qajsin lm jkn ldaː saːmj mrdˤ ʕqlj qaːbl lltːʃχjsˤ faʔaamːaaː aːlnːawʕu aːlʔaawːalu wahuwa ʃahwaau aːlzːijaaːdaai ʕalaaː qadri aːlħaaːd͡ʒaai waaːlmuhmila baʕda aːlmuraaːʕaaːai zaaːʔiiʁun aːlmʕðra ʕalaaː aːlχabijri saqatˤta jaaː ʔaamijra aːlmuʔuminijna hl hðh aːlʕjaːda χaːsˤːa ʔaw ʕmwmjːa jarbaħu aːltːaaːd͡ʒiru rbmaː ʔaraːd aːlʔaħmq nfʕk fdˤrk famakaθa ʁajra baʕjdin faqaːla ʔaaħatˤtu bimaː lam tuħitˤ bihi wad͡ʒiʔituka min sabaʔiin binabaʔiin jaqjnin saːmj w ljlaː mslmaːn lm jlbθ saːmj w ʔan ʕlm ʔanː lljlaː mʃaːklhaː aːlχaːsˤːa bhaː ʔafsħ aːltˤrjq mn fdˤlk wahaðaaː maðhabu man jaraaː tafdˤijla aːliaːʕtidaaːli waqad ruwija ʕan aːlnːabijːi sˤalːaaː waaːlʕatbu ʕanhaaː mawdˤuwʕun kaːnaː saːmj w ljlaː jtχaːsˤmaːn wabaʕdu fadawlaau aːld͡ʒaaːhili kaaːlʁarijbi aːlːaðij jaħinːu ʔilaaː aːlnːuqlaai kaːnt ldaː saːmj ħjaːa srːjːa waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlmdrsa saːʕa mn ðhb wajaqsˤida maaː aːd͡ʒtaraħa min sajːiʔiaaːtihi dʕaː saːmj frjd w zwd͡ʒth ltnaːwl aːlʕʃaːʔ fj mnzlh jaʁsilu aːlwaladu jadajhi ldaː saːmj ħsˤːa fj aːlsˤːbaːħ aːlbaːkr waqad ħukija bihaaː muqtasˤidanaː hnaːk ʃʔi waːħd ʔaːχrʕljː fʕlh ħaːwlt rfʕ mʕnwjaːth ʃrwq aːlʃms d͡ʒmjl hðaː aːlsˤbaːħ fajaʔatij biaːlħimli ʕalaaː aːlnːafsi maaː ʔaamkana min jasijrin jasudːu bihi χalːaaan ʔaalzama aːlʔaamrajni waʔaamːaaː fadˤlu maaː bajna aːlʕilmi waaːlʕibaaːdaai ʔiðaaː lam juχilːa biwaaːd͡ʒibin walam juqasˤːir fij fardˤin waʔaamːaaː aːlʔaawlaaː biaːlʔiinsaaːni ʔaan jadʕuwahu lalħilmi bihi wanadaba ʔilajhi hl hj mrjdˤa ttlqːaː aːlʕlaːd͡ʒ hnaː tˤlb saːmj mn ljlaː ʔan tkfː ʕn mtˤaːrdth aːlzːuhdu bisˤiħːaai aːljaqijni wakafaaː bihaaː lisˤaaːħibihaaː fitnaaan wsˤlt ʔasʕaːr aːlʔashm ðrwthaː fj jwljw aːlmaːdˤj ʔinːa man qanaʕa kaaːna ʁanijːanaː waʔiin kaaːna muqtiranaː wahuwa ʔaanːahu qaaːla mn aːlmmkn ʔanː saːmj sjtħdːaːh ʔabnaːʔuh faʔiinːa aːllːaha jaħtad͡ʒibu minhumaaː wakilaaːhumaaː maðmuwmun qm bʕmlk bnfsk wamaː ʔaanta bihaːdi aːlʕumji ʕan dˤalaːlatihim ʔiin tusmiʕu ʔiilːaː man juʔuminu biʔaːjaːtinaː fahum muslimwna kaːnt ʕnd saːmj stː ħsˤsˤ draːsjːa fj aːljwm baːlhjrwjjn waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlʕaqlu sˤadijqun maqtˤuwʕun  waaːlhawaaː ʕaduwːun matbuwʕun qaːbl saːmj mslmjn mn mχtlf aːldːwl kaːn saːmj jmθːl ʔahmː ʃjʔ fj ħjaːa ljlaː qadiːr lirid͡ʒlika waʔaatˤjʕuwaː aːlrːaswla faʔiin tawalːajtum faʔiinːamaː ʕalaː raswlinaaː aːlbalaːʁu aːlmubjnu kam duwna lisaaːnik min ħid͡ʒaaːbin  qaaːla waman faqadahu min ʔaahli aːldːunjaaː qalːat aːlrːaʁbaau fijhi waaːlrːahbaau minhu χdːrt ljlaː saːmj kaːn saːmj jrjd ʔan jʃtrj mlaːbsaː lljlaː aːntqln ʔilaː hnaː wazad͡ʒara aːlnːafsa ʕan rukuwbi aːlhawaaː waaːd͡ʒʕal munaaːðˤaraaa aːlmutaʕalːimi tanbijhanaː ʕalaaː ʔinːa aːlmusaaːfira wamaaːlahu laʕalaaː qalatin ʔilːaaː maaː waqaaː aːllːahu ʃʕjrnaː wlaː qmħ ʁjrnaː ʃfjt nfsj wlkn d͡ʒdʕt ʔanfj saːmj laː jstħqː ðlk walilːaðjna kafarwaː birabːihim ʕaðaːbu ʔasˤħaːbj qul ʔiin ʔaadrij ʔaaqarijbun maaː tuwʕaduwna ʔaam jad͡ʒʕalu lahu rabːij ʔaamadanaː twm w maːrj jlʕbaːn aːlbwkjr bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi waaːlnːad͡ʒmi ʔiiðaaː hawaaː whkðaː ʕdt ʕamila aːlsˤːaaːliħaaːti faʔauwlaʔiika lahumu aːldːarad͡ʒaaːtu aːlʕulaaː jbdw lj ʔanka sˤaːdq ʔinh ʁnj wlkn ʔaχwh aːlʔakbr fqjr jd͡ʒb aːn nkwn mstʕdjn lʔaj ʃjʔ hl jwd͡ʒd ʔaj ʃjʔ ʔaχr trjd ʔan tuχbrnj lilːaðijna ðˤalamuwaː ʕaðaaːbanaː duwna ðalika walakinːa ʔaakθarahum laaː jaʕlamuwna ʔinh laː jdrj maːðaː jkwn aːlfqr ʔaʃʕr bbrd fj ʕðˤaːmj aːljwm waʔiin d͡ʒaaːdaluwka faquli aːllːahu ʔaaʕlamu bimaaː fqðˤjtk fj aːlʃtaːʔ wkðlk ʔanzlnaːh ʔaːjaːt bjnaːt wʔan aːllh jhdj mn jrjd aːltˤaːqa aːlnwwja ʔaːmna ʔin hðaː aːlqrʔaːn jqsˤ ʕlaː bnj ʔisraːʔijl ʔakθr aːlðj hm fjh jχtlfwn wd͡ʒzaːhm bmaː sˤbrwaː d͡ʒna wħrjraː ðuw aːlʕarʃi aːlmad͡ʒijdu faʔaand͡ʒajnaaːhu waaːlːaðijna maʕahu biraħmaain minːaaː waqatˤaʕnaaː daaːbira aːlːaðijna kaðːabuwaː biʔaːjaaːtinaaː wamaaː kaaːnuwaː muʔuminijna waaːlːaðij ʔaatˤmaʕu aːlʔaardˤi maaː lahaaː min qaraaːrin hjaː ʔanti jmknki ʔan tfʕljhaː kjf kaːn lk hðaː ʕajnanaː jaʃrabu bihaaː ʕibaaːdu aːllːahi jufad͡ʒːiruwnahaaː tafd͡ʒijranaː ʔajn ʔaqrb fndq  ʔanaː misˤrijunː bnaːnj biaːsmi rabːika aːlʕaðˤijmi bʕdˤ aːlʔatˤfaːl jlʕbwn ʔalʕaːb aːlfjdjw fj d͡ʒmjʕ aːlʔawqaːt faʔiiðaaː nufiχa fij aːlsˤːuwri falaaː ʔaansaaːba bajnahum jawmaʔiiðin walaaː jatasaaːʔaluwna laː tsʔal ʔiðaː kntu sʔafʕl nfs aːlʃʔi  walahum maqaaːmiʕu min ħadijdin fahaðaaː ʔaaswaʔau ʔaaħwaaːli aːlmuqasˤːirijna waħaaːluhu laaːħiqaaun biʔaaħwaaːli aːltːaaːrikijna ʔardaː aːlsˤjaːdu aːlθʕlba laː ʔaħb tˤalaʕat ʃamsun  ʔilːaaː waʕaðˤat biʔaamsin ʔanaː ʔaʕrf hðaː mnh ʔanta, rbmaː mħq mraan ʔaχraː aːsmħ lj ʔan ʔarjk aːltˤrjq   aːlmsˤʕd lm jrnj ʔaħd ʔinhaː tntðˤr ħjn nsˤl ʔilaː bldth  sjkwn qd aːntql kaðaba aːlfuʔuaaːdu maaː raʔaaaː lm jkn ldj χjaːr   aːlaːstlqaːʔ   aːlsrjr tˤwaːl aːljwm ʔaʔantm ʔanzltmwh mn aːlmzn ʔam nħn aːlmnzlwn waʔiin kaaːnuwaː lajaquwluwna saːmj ljs sjχj lqd χdʕt kaːn saːmj jmzħ ʔanaː mrjdˤ aːlːaðijna juwfuwna biʕahdi aːllːahi walaaː janqudˤuwna aːlmijθaaːqa ʔiʕtˤj bqlbk w ljs bd͡ʒjbk ʔaaʕadːa aːllːahu lahum ʕaðaaːbanaː ʃadijdanaː ʔiinːahum saaːʔa maaː kaaːnuwaː jaʕmaluwna ql lw ʔantm tmlkwn χzaːʔin rħma rbj ʔiðaː lʔamsktm χʃja aːlʔinfaːq wkaːn aːlʔinsaːn qtwraː hl hðaː     ʔisqaaːtˤuhu ʔaalfaaːðˤin min ʔaaθnaaːʔi aːlkalaaːmi jasˤijru aːlbaaːqij bihaaː mabtuwranaː laaː juʕrafu aːstiχraaːd͡ʒuhu qaaːla rabːi aːnsˤurnij bimaaː kaðːabuwni ʔaaʔuulqija aːlðːikru ʕalajhi min bajninaaː bal huwa kaðːaaːbun ʔaaʃirun ʔiilːaaː aːlːaðijna taaːbuwaː min baʕdi aːlmutːaqijna kaaːlfud͡ʒːaaːri χsrt ʔamwaːlhaː  ʔasrthaː wʔasˤdqaːʔihaː laaː fijhaaː ʁawlun walaaː hum ʕanhaaː junzafuwna waːstftħwaː wχaːb kl d͡ʒbaːr ʕnjd lmaːðaː aːʃtrjt mwza waːħda fqtˤ  hðh hj aːlnhaːja qaːl ʔin hʔulaːʔ dˤjfj flaː tfdˤħwn haðaaː waʔiinːa liltˤːaaːʁijna laʃarːa maʔaːbin ʔið hmt tˤaːʔiftaːn mnkm ʔan tfʃlaː waːllh wljhmaː wʕlaː aːllh fljtwkl aːlmʔumnwn ʔanaː qtˤa  wljs ʕndj aːsm bʕd lqd ʔaħsˤaːhm wʕdhm ʕdaː ʕasaaː rabːukum ʔaan jarħamakum waʔiin ʕudtum ʕudnaaː wad͡ʒaʕalnaaː d͡ʒahanːama lilkaaːfirijna ħasˤijranaː hlaː ʔatjt mʕj ʔilaː aːlmtd͡ʒr  hl tmaːnʕ fj aːlwqwf d͡ʒaːnbanaː  sˤnʕ fj kaːzχstaːn maːðaː trjd jaː ʔaχj nħn θrnaː fħjaːa ʔaw mmaːt faʔatijaaː firʕawna faquwlaaː ʔiinːaaː rasuwlu rabːi aːlʕaaːlamijna hðaː swaːl ʁrjb ʔanaː sʕjd d͡ʒdaːan ʔankan mʕnaː qdˤaːʔija kaːn saːmj jqtˤn fj aːlqaːhra bdʔat ʔaħs baːld͡ʒwʕ aːllːahu latˤijfun biʕibaaːdihi jarzuqu man jaʃaaːʔu wahuwa aːlqawijːu aːlʕazijzu fʔaχðnaːh wd͡ʒnwdh fnbðnaːhm fj aːljm whw mljm ʔaam ʕindahum χazaaːʔiinu raħmaai rabːika aːlʕazijzi aːlwahːaaːbi ʔaumj trjd ʔan tðhb hnaːk, wlkn ʔabj jrjd ʔan jʃaːhd aːltljfzjwn ʔaʕtqd ʔanj fhmt ʔinhm jrwnh bʕjdaː ʔant waːhimun rbaːt aːlbjt fj ʔajaːmnaː hðh laː jʕrfn ʔilaː aːlʃkwaː mn aːrtfaːʕ aːlʔasʕaːr laː bʔas ʔan tðhb kaaːna aːlmaliku ʔaamsi ʔaantˤaqa minhu aːljawma ʁfrlh aːllh ʔarjd ʔan ʔaħlm ʔasˤbħt ljlaː nhaːmjːa ljs hnaːk maː nfχr bh ħuwrun maqsˤuwraaːtun fij aːlχijaaːmi tbdʔa aːlʔawbraː fj aːlsaːʕa aːlsaːbʕa walam tazal aːlʕarabu tad͡ʒtaðibu aːlbuʕadaaːʔa ʔaqsˤaː mda aːntðˤaːr jmknnj tħmlhaː hj ʔarbʕa ʔajaːm waʔaanːa aːltˤːawijla aːlʔaamali maʁruwrun kaːn saːmj wsjtˤ zwaːd͡ʒ wajatad͡ʒanːabuhaaː aːlʔaaʃqaaː ljs hnaːk ʔaj sˤaːbwn ħwr mqsˤwraːt fj aːlχjaːm ʔilaː ʔajn tðhbjn  waːfq ʃn tˤbqa ʔanaː lst mʃʁwlaː aːχlʕ mlaːbsk faʔaamːaaː aːlsˤːilaau fahija aːltːabarːuʕu bibaðli aːlmaaːli fij aːld͡ʒihaaːti aːlmaħmuwdaai liʁajri ʕiwadˤin matˤluwbin θm ʔiðaː ʃaːʔ ʔanʃrh lːamaaː ʔaadˤaaːʔa lahum maʃawaː fijhi waʔiiðaaː ʔaaðˤlama ʕalajhim qaaːmuwaː ʔajmknka tʕljmj aːlʔind͡ʒljzja waqad qaaːla ʕijsaaː aːbnu marjama ʕalaaː nabijːinaaː waʕalajhi aːlsːalaaːmu min ʔaajːi ʃajʔin χalaqahu haðihi d͡ʒahanːamu aːlːatij kuntum tuwʕaduwna frʃj ʔasnaːnk tʃaːd͡ʒrt lsbb taːfh waːlsqf aːlmrfwʕ laː jħb kra aːlmdˤrb w laː kra aːlqdm baːlkaːd ʔasttˤjʕ aːlʕzf ʕlaː aːlbjaːnw ʔaʕndk ʁrfa tχsˤk  nsjtu ʕnwaːn brjdj aːlʔilktrwnj subħaaːna rabːi aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waaːlʔaardˤi rabːi aːlʕarʃi ʕamːaaː jasˤifuwna lm jχbrnj ʔaħd bwd͡ʒwdkm hnaː aːlθqa baːlnfs mftaːħ aːlnd͡ʒaːħ lqd ʔadˤft flflaːan ʔakθr mn aːllaːzm ʔaflaː jnðˤrwn ʔilaː aːlʔibl kjf χlqt ðlk bʔanhm krhwaː maː ʔanzl aːllh fʔaħbtˤ ʔaʕmaːlhm qaaːluwaː jaaː wajlanaaː man baʕaθanaaː min marqadinaaː haðaaː maaː waʕada aːlrːaħmanu wasˤadaqa aːlmursaluwna lqd ʔanhaː ʕmlh hw fqtˤ mn qrʔa hðh aːlrsaːla twm ʁaːdˤb ʕlaː maːraː hl jmknk ʔan tʕtˤjnj fnd͡ʒaːnaː mn aːlʃaːj  waʔiin tafaaːdˤalat aːlʔaaðhaaːnu watafaaːwatat aːlfatˤinu ʔanaː bχjr  ʃkraː aːlwqt ʃjʔ θmjn bimaaː ðˤalamuwaː fahum laaː jantˤiquwna jsttˤjʕ ʔabwhaː ʔiʕtˤaːʔhaː msˤrwfaː kbjraː kl ʃhr aːlʕb aːlʔaːn rabːi hab lij ħukmanaː waʔaalħiqnij biaːlsˤːaaːliħijna fasabːiħ biħamdi rabːika wakun mina aːlsːaaːd͡ʒidijna lʁtj mʕqda llʁaːja ftwl ʕnhm fmaː ʔant bmlwm ʔaħtrm aːlmslmjn lmd͡ʒmwʕwn ʔilaː mjqaːt jwm mʕlwm bl hw qrʔaːn md͡ʒjd waʔaalqawaː ʔiilaaː aːllːahi jawmaʔiiðin aːlsːalama wadˤalːa ʕanhum maaː kaaːnuwaː jaftaruwna ltnðr qwmaː maː ʔanðr ʔaːbaːʔuhm fhm ʁaːflwn ʔinhaː tħb ʔan tmʃj mʕj maaː kaaːna maaːniʕanaː min tasˤawːuri aːlmaʕnaaː kaðalika juwħij ʔiilajka waʔiilaaː aːlːaðijna min qablika aːllːahu aːlʕazijzu aːlħakijmu hl ʔistmtʕt bfjlm aːlbaːrħa whw maː jʕrf aːlʔaːn bـ bjʁ baːnʁ ʔaw aːlaːnfd͡ʒaːr aːlkbjr ʔaam ʕindahumu aːlʁajbu fahum jaktubuwna aːdχl, aːlbaːb mftwħ ʔinh ʔaːχr mn ʔatˤlb mnh aːlmsaːʕda lʔanh ʃχsˤ laː jʕtmd ʕljh jaaː ʔaabati laaː taʕbudi aːlʃːajtˤaaːna ʔiinːa aːlʃːajtˤaaːna kaaːna lilrːaħmani ʕasˤijːanaː ʔiinːaaː ʔaarsalnaaː ʔiilajkum rasuwlanaː ʃaaːhidanaː ʕalajkum kamaaː ʔaarsalnaaː ʔiilaaː firʕawna rasuwlanaː lm ʔasmʕ bhðaː qtˤ hl jwd͡ʒd ʃχsˤ maː jʕlmka aːlfrnsja ʔawlm jrwaː kjf jbdʔi aːllh aːlχlq θm jʕjdh ʔin ðlk ʕlaː aːllh jsjr jmkn aːlqdwm baːlʔams ʔaħb aːlʔaflaːm jawma jaχrud͡ʒuwna mina aːlʔaad͡ʒdaaːθi siraaːʕanaː kaʔaanːahum ʔiilaaː nusˤubin juwfidˤuwna hʔulaːʔ aːlʔawlaːd jblʁwn sta ʕʃr ʕaːmaːan mn aːlʔawqaːf aːltj kaːnt waːd͡ʒbj  waman ʔaaðˤlamu mimːan ðukːira biʔaːjaaːti rabːihi θumːa ʔaaʕradˤa ʕanhaaː ʔiinːaaː mina aːlmud͡ʒrimijna muntaqimuwna aːlmaːl waːlbnwn zjna aːlħjaːa aːldnjaː waːlbaːqjaːt aːlsˤaːlħaːt χjr ʕnd rbk θwaːbaː wχjr ʔamlaː maːðaː ʔafʕl baːlskjn  ln jʔatj ʔaljs kðlk  trjd aːlðhaːb ʕbr aːlnfq  sʔaðhb ʕnd aːlʕaːʃra ʔanta kjf rasamt hðh aːlsˤwra  twm jʃtraː qitˤ ʔaʃʕlat aːldˤwʔ maːðaː tqwl ʕn ʕalajhi aːlnːaʃʔaaaa aːlʔauχraaː haː hj ktbnaː aːltˤaːʔira aːlmqaːtla ʔasqtˤt qnbla wakaaːna lahu θamarun faqaaːla lisˤaaːħibihi wahuwa juħaaːwiruhu ʔaanaaː ʔaakθaru minka maaːlanaː waʔaaʕazːu nafaranaː lkl frd ħrja aːltnql waːχtjaːr mħl ʔiqaːmth daːχl ħdwd kl dwla waʔiinːa aːlmuʔumina bajna maχaaːfatajni θm lnnzʕn mn kl ʃjʕa ʔajhm ʔaʃd ʕlaː aːlrħmn ʕtjaː wanaʕmaain kaaːnuwaː fijhaaː faaːkihijna maaː ʔaantum ʕalajhi bifaaːtinijna wklaː dˤrbnaː lh aːlʔamθaːl wklaː tbrnaː ttbjraː thaːnjnaː aːdχuluwaː aːld͡ʒanːaaa ʔaantum waʔaazwaaːd͡ʒukum tuħbaruwna lmaːðaː hw mwd͡ʒwd hnaː aːntðˤrnj fj aːlmħtˤa mn fdˤlk twm laː jħb aːlʔaʃχaːsˤ aːlðjn jʁdˤbwn bshwla mn fdˤlk, ʔistmʕ ʔilj hl hw sˤdjqj  ln aːlʕb laːnnj lwjt ðraːʕj aːhdnaː aːlsˤraːtˤ aːlmstqjm ʔalm jd͡ʒʕl kjdhm fj tdˤljl qaːl ʔan naku nutˤʕimu aːlmiskijna ʔiið hum ʕalajhaaː quʕuwdun ʔardt aːlðhaːb ʔilaː mkaːn lm jsbq lj aːlðhaːb ʔiljh wʔaːχrjn mnhm lmaː jlħqwaː bhm whw aːlʕzjz aːlħkjm ʔanaː ʔaʕrf maː aːlðaː tħaːwl fʕlh qaːl twm: maːrj lm tkn mtrddh fj fʕl ðlk waːðkr ʕbaːdnaː ʔibraːhjm wʔisħaːq wjʕqwb ʔawlj aːlʔajdj waːlʔabsˤaːr ʔanaː fj wrtˤa snqwm baːsʕaːdk ʔinnj ʔaθq bk χwaːn jnaːm wʕjnaːh mftwħtaːn waaːlħamdu lilːahi rabːi aːlʕaaːlamijna man jubʁidˤu aːlnːaaːsa wajubʁidˤuwnahu aːlʔaaχilːaaːʔu jawmaʔiiðin baʕdˤuhum libaʕdˤin ʕaduwːun ʔiilːaaː aːlmutːaqijna waʔiilaaː mataaː jaħsunu bij tˤalabu aːlʕilmi  qaaːla bkaː wakaaːna aːllːahu bikulːi ʃajʔin muħijtˤanaː tħtwj aːlzd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa ʕlaː aːlmaːʔ wakajfa tasˤbiru ʕalaaː maaː lam tuħitˤ bihi χubranaː wafuruʃin mːarfuwʕaain qaaːla sawfa ʔaastaʁfiru lakum rabːij ʔiinːahu huwa aːlʁafuwru aːlrːaħijmu ʔan laː jdχlnhaː aːljwm ʕljkm mskjn wʔatˤjʕwaː aːllh wʔatˤjʕwaː aːlrswl fʔin twljtm fʔinmaː ʕlaː rswlnaː aːlblaːʁ aːlmbjn sʔal "twm" "maːrj" maː ʔiðaː kaːnt twd aːlrqsˤ ʔanta laː jmknk tħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja, hl jmknk  wʔiðaː bʃr ʔaħdhm baːlʔanθaː ðˤl wd͡ʒhh mswdaː whw kðˤjm ʔiinːa fij ðalika laʔaːjaaːtin waʔiin kunːaaː lamubtalijna aːntðˤr ħtaː ʔad͡ʒls ʔaaʃiʕ aːlʔisbraːntw jaː lh mn ktaːb ʃjq hl bʔimkaːnnaː aːlaːstraːħa qljlaː  waqad rawaaː aːlzːuhrijːu waaːmtaaːzuwaː aːljawma ʔaajːuhaaː aːlmud͡ʒrimuwna kl ʃʔi d͡ʒaːhz ʔiinːa rabːaka labiaːlmirsˤaaːdi ʔinnaː rd͡ʒaːl hl tdrːs aːlʔisbaːnja  walamːaaː balaʁa ʔaaʃudːahu ʔaːtajnaaːhu ħukmanaː waʕilmanaː wakaðalika nad͡ʒzij aːlmuħsinijna aːlħaːswb mwdˤwʕ ʕlaː jsaːr aːlsjdaːt ħrqt aːsˤbʕj maː kntu lʔafʕlh aːlχalːaaːqu aːlʕalijmu maaːta χazːaaːnu aːlʔaamwaaːli wabaqija χazːaaːnu aːlʕilmi ʔaaʕjaaːnuhum mafquwdaaun  waʔaaʃχaaːsˤuhum fij aːlquluwbi twqf ʕn tbðjr aːlmaːʔ wajasˤijra aːlʕaduwːu muwaaːlijanaː min duwni aːllːahi ʔaːlihaaan laʕalːahum junsˤaruwna ðlk qlb jawma tamuwru aːlsːamaaːʔu mawranaː hudanaː wabuʃraaː lilmuʔuminijna wamaaː naqamuwaː minhum ʔiilːaaː ʔaan juʔuminuwaː biaːllːahi waaːljawmu ʕamalun wjstnbʔiwnk ʔaħq hw ql ʔij wrbj ʔinh lħq wmaː ʔantm bmʕd͡ʒzjn qaːlwaː tlk ʔiðaː kra χaːsra χtˤjr d͡ʒdaːan lki ʔan tkwnj hnaː fasˤaaːra kaaːlmarijdˤi aːlːaðij huwa bimaradˤihi mutaʃaaːʁilun lqd ʕwqbwaː ʕlaː d͡ʒraːʔimhm ʕaːml aːlnaːs kmaː tħb ʔan jʕaːmlwk aːntql saːmj mn mnzl llfqraːʔ ʔilaː ʃqːa fχma bjn ljla w dˤħaːhaː laː tlʕb kra aːlqaːʕda hnaː jatˤuwfu ʕalajhim wildaaːnun mːuχalːaduwna twm md͡ʒaːhd faqaaːluwaː ʔaabaʃaranaː mːinːaaː waaːħidanaː nːatːabiʕuhu ʔiinːaaː ʔiiðanaː lːafij dˤalaːlin wasuʕurin wʔin rbk lðw fdˤl ʕlaː aːlnaːs wlkn ʔakθrhm laː jʃkrwn wʔin ʕzmwaː aːltˤlaːq fʔin aːllh smjʕ ʕljm mutːakiʔiijna ʕalaaː sururin mːasˤfuwfaain wazawːad͡ʒnaaːhum biħuwrin ʕijnin kaːnt aːlwljma mn ʔatˤjb maː ðqt θumːa ʔiinːakum baʕda ðalika lamajːituwna qul ʔaanfiquwaː tˤawʕanaː ʔaaw karhanaː lan jutaqabːala minkum ʔiinːakum kuntum qawmanaː faaːsiqijna ʕibaaːda aːllːahi qul jaaː ʔaahla aːlkitaaːbi lima takfuruwna biʔaːjaaːti aːllːahi waaːllːahu ʃahijdun ʕalaaː maaː taʕmaluwna nðˤːif aːlmd͡ʒtmʕ mn ʃrwrh maː hj aːllʁa aːltj jtklmwnhaː fj aːlmksjk  aːfʕl waliðalika qaaːla ʕumaru bnu aːlχatˤːaaːbi radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu hw ʔaʁlq ʕjnjh wahaðaaː qad jakuwnu min ʔaaħadi wad͡ʒhajni fj wqt mn aːlaːwqaːt  kaːn hnaːk qtˤ aːsmh taːnʁw ʔin aːlqbaːʔilja tڨaːftkn bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ʔinaː ʔanzlnaːh fj ljla aːlqdr wʔiðaː ħdˤr aːlqsma ʔawlw aːlqrbaː waːljtaːmaː waːlmsaːkjn faːrzqwhm mnh wqwlwaː lhm qwlaː mʕrwfaː waqaaːluwaː aːtːaχaða aːllːahu waladanaː subħaaːnahu bal lahu maaː fij aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waaːlʔaardˤi kulːun lahu qaaːnituwna kaːnt qlqa bʃʔan sˤħth ʔanta kjf ʕrfta ðlk hðaː laː jhm walikulːi d͡ʒuzʔin minhu qistˤun min aːlfasaaːdi ħatːaaː jastakmila ʔalaː tʕlwaː ʕlj wʔatwnj mslmjn wqaːlwaː jaː ʔajh aːlsaːħr aːdʕ lnaː rbk bmaː ʕhd ʕndk ʔinnaː lmhtdwn tqbl ʔiʕtðaːrj mn fdˤlk maː jbdl aːlqwl ldj wmaː ʔanaː bðˤlaːm llʕbjd jawma tard͡ʒufu aːlrːaaːd͡ʒifaau qijla aːdχuli aːld͡ʒanːaaa qaaːla jaaː lajta qawmij jaʕlamuwna aːlmktba baːlqrb mn aːlħdjqa aːd͡ʒlb lnaː bʕdˤ aːlmaːʔ snraː maː sjħdθ mn fdˤlk aːrfʕ sˤwtk waman fij aːlʔaardˤi d͡ʒamijʕanaː θumːa jund͡ʒijhi ftaːa ħsnaːʔ mθlk ħtmaː tkwn qd lwħðˤt ʔiinːa ʔaaħadakum lajaʕmalu biʕamali ʔaahli aːld͡ʒanːaai ħatːaaː maaː jakuwna bajnahu wabajnahaaː ʔiilaːːa ðiraaːʕun saːmj hw mn tsbːb bħmlj mnh w aːlʔaːn laː ʔarjd ʔan ʔakwn ħaːdˤnth aːlbʃrjːa ʔaalfun waʕabdaaːni waðuwadun ʕaʃrun km aːlʔabwaːb hnaːk fj hðaː aːlbjt  aːrkdˤ bal law aːtːafaquwaː lakaaːna rubːamaaː waqaʕa bihi χalalun fij niðˤaaːmihi maːðaː trjd ʔanaː  w bkl bsaːtˤa  laː ʔarʁb fj aːlχrwd͡ʒ aːlljla jwm jχrd͡ʒwn mn aːlʔad͡ʒdaːθ sraːʕaː kʔanhm ʔilaː nsˤb jwfdˤwn aːsˤbr ʕlaː maː jqwlwn waːðkr ʕbdnaː daːwwd ðaː aːlʔajd ʔinh ʔawaːb waliʔaanːa aːlsˤːaʁijra ʔaaʕaðru waʔiin lam jakun fij aːld͡ʒahli ʕuðrun ʔin aːlðjn kfrwaː wðˤlmwaː lm jkn aːllh ljʁfr lhm wlaː ljhdjhm tˤrjqaː ʕn maːðaː sʔaktb aːljwm  wamahːadtu lahu tamhijdanaː fjwmʔið wqʕt aːlwaːqʕa wʔinh lʕlm llsaːʕa flaː tmtrn bhaː waːtbʕwn hðaː sˤraːtˤ mstqjm hw sˤafː sjːaːrth bħaːnb aːlrsˤjf jaː frnsaː ʔin ðaː jwm aːlħsaːb wʔinj χft aːlmwaːlj mn wraːʔij wkaːnt aːmrʔatj ʕaːqraː fhb lj mn ldnk wljaː laː tqlq bʃʔan ðlk saːtaːrw hw -mn bjnnaː nħn aːlχmsa- aːlʔasrʕ rkdˤanaː ʔatðkru maː fʕlta aːld͡ʒmʕa aːlmaːdˤja durb ʕlaː jd χbjr qaːl twm ʔinh jʕtqd ʔan maːrj lm tħb d͡ʒwn ʕndj aːbnaːn ʔanaː lst ʕbdk aːnsˤrf ʕnj aːntðˤr aːhdinaaː aːlsˤːiraaːtˤa aːlmustaqijma waaːlsːaaːriqu waaːlsːaaːriqaau faaːqtˤaʕuwaː ʔaajdijahumaaː d͡ʒazaaːʔan bimaaː kasabaaː nakaaːlanaː mina aːllːahi waaːllːahu ʕazijzun ħakijmun ʔaawaman junaʃːaʔau fij aːlħiljaai wahuwa waaːnʕitˤaaːfanaː ʔinj ʃaːkr lk mn ʔaʕmaːq qlbj ʔant ʔakbr mnj qaːma waʔaamːaaː aːllːafuwtu faðaaːtu aːlwaladi min ʁajrik wʔin jrwaː ʔaːja jʕrdˤwaː wjqwlwaː sħr mstmr jwsf jʕqwb ʔisħaːq ʔismaːʕjl w faaːstaqaaːmat lahu ħaaːluhu fsaːhm fkaːn mn aːlmdħdˤjn ðuq ʔiinːaka ʔaanta aːlʕazijzu aːlkarijmu d͡ʒrb mra ʔaχraː lmaːðaː knt hnaːk  aːnhaː mmla mn aːld͡ʒld wʔin tʕdwaː nʕma aːllh laː tħsˤwhaː ʔin aːllh lʁfwr rħjm waliðalika tad͡ʒidu χutˤuwtˤa aːlʕulamaaːʔi fij aːlʔaaʁlabi radijʔiaaan laaː jaχutˤːu ʔilːaaː man ʔaasʕadahu famaaː aːstˤaaːʕuwaː ʔaan jaðˤharuwhu wamaaː aːstatˤaaːʕuwaː lahu naqbanaː faʔaaχaða haðaaː aːlmaʕnaaː aːlʃːaaːʕiru faqaaːla laː jd͡ʒb ʔan ttsˤl bh waʔiinːahum lanaaː laʁaaːʔiiðˤuwna muʔuθiranaː lilχajri ʔaːmiranaː bihi waqaaːluwaː aːtːaχaða aːlrːaħmanu waladanaː subħaaːnahu sajasˤlaaː naaːranaː ðaaːta lahabin wfʕlt fʕltk aːltj fʕlt wʔant mn aːlkaːfrjn wʔinkm ltmrwn ʕljhm msˤbħjn kaːn saːmj jʕrf ðlk aːlʃaːʕr aːlmʕrwf ħaːwl aːlʔintħaːr fj mktbh wjrjkm ʔaːjaːth fʔaj ʔaːjaːt ʔajn wuldta  baːlnfــــــــــــwsi jftــــــــــــــdaː qaːlwaː rbnaː jʕlm ʔinaː ʔiljkm lmrslwn ʔinh jħb mʃaːhda aːltlfaːz watarki aːlnːakijri ʕalajhim ʔahðh ʔawl mra tʔakl fjhaː aːltˤʕaːm aːljaːbaːnj aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕ ʕlaː aːltaːsʕa km trkwaː mn d͡ʒnaːt wʕjwn hlaː ʔawqft aːlmwsjqaː ʔanaː lst ʕaːtˤʃa waruwija ʔaanːa ʔaakθama bna sˤajfijːin qaaːla liwaladihi jaaː bunajːa laaː jaħmilanːakum d͡ʒamaaːlu ʔaanta munðiru man jaχʃaaːhaaː ʔantm mdrːswn sˤnʕt lj ʔamj tnwra d͡ʒmjla ʔalaː tzr waːzra wzr ʔaχraː ʔanaː lst fj aːlmdrsa wmn jʕsˤ aːllh wrswlh wjtʕd ħdwdh jdχlh naːraː χaːldaː fjhaː wlh ʕðaːb mhjn rʔajth? mrħbaːan, hl tnaːwltm aːltˤʕaːm  qaːl jaː haːrwn maː mnʕk ʔið rʔajthm dˤlwaː ʔinhaː blaː ʃk mħqa aːlsjd braːwn hw mʕlmnaː fj aːlʔind͡ʒljzja lm trd͡ʒʕ lj nqwdj walaqad ʔauwħija ʔiilajka waʔiilaaː aːlːaðijna min qablika laʔiin ʔaaʃrakta lajaħbatˤanːa ʕamaluka walatakuwnanːa mina aːlχaaːsirijna ʔaudχul wasaaːriʕuwaː ʔiilaaː maʁfiraain min rabːikum wad͡ʒanːaain ʕardˤuhaaː aːlsːamaaːwaaːtu waaːlʔaardˤu ʔauʕidːat lilmutːaqijna ʔiinːa fij χalqi aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waaːlʔaardˤi waaːχtilaaːfi aːllːajli waaːlnːahaaːri laʔaːjaaːtin liʔauwlij aːlʔaalbaaːbi hal ʔaatːabiʕuka ʕalaaː ʔaan tuʕalːimani mimːaaː ʕulːimta ruʃdanaː waqijla lilχalijli bni ʔaaħmada laː jsmʕwn ħsjshaː whm fj maː aːʃtht ʔanfshm χaːldwn laː ʕd͡ʒb ʔanː aːlbʕdˤ jʃʕrwn baːltwtr ʕnd dχwlhm aːlmstʃfaː ʔinmaː aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waaːlʔaardˤa  lqd kðbt rʁmaː ʕnj waʔiimːaaː limaaː jadːaʕij ʔaarbaaːbuhu ʔaanːahu ʕilmun muʕwizun lmaːðaː hðaː χtˤʔa fajastakidːuwaː χawaaːtˤira qad muniħuwaː sˤiħːatahaaː fijmaaː laaː jud͡ʒdij nafʕanaː walaaː jufijdu ʕilmanaː hlaː ʃʁlt aːltlfaːz mn fdˤlk  mud͡ʒaaːlasaau aːlʕuqalaaːʔi lqd ʕmlt fj mzrʕa aːalʕad͡ʒalaa mina aːlʃaːjtˤaaːn aːnaː sʕjd waːstmʕ jwm jnaːd aːlmnaːd mn aːlsaːbʕa ljs ldjnaː ʃjʔ lnχsrh wlaː td͡ʒʕlwaː mʕ aːllh ʔilhaː ʔaːχr ʔinj lkm mnh nðjr mbjn ʔanaː lm ʔaktb ʔilaː waːldj twqf ʕn ʁjðˤ ʔaχtk jaaː marjamu aːqnutij lirabːiki waaːsd͡ʒudij waaːrkaʕij maʕa aːlrsaːla hw ʔiχbaːrhaː ʔanh kaːn mrjdˤaː walikulːi qismin minhum manzilaaun min aːlbirːi waaːlsˤːilaai aːbtsm djmaː: " baːltʔakjd  ʔant tmzħjn " ldjhaː nbd fj wd͡ʒhhaː falilːahi aːlʔaːχiraau waaːlʔauwlaaː lm ʔaðhb lʔan aːld͡ʒw sjʔ laː ʔaħb aːstχdaːm trd͡ʒma ʁwʁl sħb jdh mn aːltˤaːwla wamaaː ʔaadraaːka maaː ʕilːijːuwna trkthaː tðhb jd͡ʒb ʕlja ħfðˤ aːlkθjr mn klmaːt aːlsr wʔaːθr aːlħjaːa mwaːsˤfaːth falazima liðalika ʔaan jasˤrifa aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʔilaaː dunjaaːhu ħaðˤːanaː min ʕinaaːjatihi sjkwn aːsrʕ aːðaː ðhbnaː baːlmtrw ʔinːa aːldːunjaaː kaθijraau aːltːaʁjijri ʔiirama ðaaːti swf tʔatj ʔilaː aːlmnzl lqd aːstʕaːd mħfðˤth aːlmsrwqa watawaqːijanaː min tasalːutˤi aːlʁurabaaːʔi aːlʔaad͡ʒaaːnibi ʔanaː mn aːlʔikwaːdwr tˤaːʕa wqwl mʕrwf fʔiðaː ʕzm aːlʔamr flw sˤdqwaː aːllh lkaːn aːlfaraaːʁi waʃuʁlu ðawij aːlbatˤaaːlaai ʔant d͡ʒmjlun ltdrjb aːlkmbjwtr ʕlaː aːlntˤq θumːa huwa sˤidːijqun ʔaaw ʕaduwːun ʔajd͡ʒb ʔan ʔaqwm bðlk ʕlaː aːlfwr  ʔanaː ldj sˤdjq fj ʔind͡ʒltraː ʔabdanaː nhr aːmlʔa aːlzd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa maːʔaː mn fdˤlk ʔardtu ʔan ʔatsˤl bika wlkn lm jkun ldja rqmk ʔanaː fuzt wʔaʕtðr ʕn rχsˤi aːlhdj waʔaaðːin fij aːlnːaaːsi biaːlħad͡ʒːi jaʔatuwka rid͡ʒaaːlanaː waʕalaaː kulːi dˤaaːmirin jaʔatijna min kulːi fad͡ʒːin ʕamijqin waːʕbd rbk ħtaː jʔatjk aːljqjn faaːsˤbir sˤabranaː d͡ʒamijlaː man ʔaanti  faqaaːlat jaː ljtnj ʕndj ʔasˤdqaːʔ kθr waaːlqamara qadːarnaaːhu manaaːzila ħatːaaː ʕaaːda kaaːlʕurd͡ʒuwni aːlqadijmi ʔaabsˤaaːruhaaː χaaːʃiʕaaun ljs hnaːk ʔaj mʃaːkl ħatːaaː laaː tatˤmaħa lahu ʕajnun lirijbaain walaaː tunaaːziʕahu nafsun ʔilaaː fud͡ʒuwrin fatˤaaːfa ʕalajhaaː tˤaaːʔiifun mːin rːabːika wahum naaːʔiimuwna latarkabunːa tˤabaqanaː ʕan tˤabaqin saʔaalathu lmaːðaː kaːn jbkj ʔaatˤːalaʕa aːlʁajba ʔaami aːtːaχaða ʕinda aːlrːaħmani ʕahdanaː wwfjt kl nfs maː ʕmlt whw ʔaʕlm bmaː jfʕlwn lqd ʕlqt fj aːzdħaːm mrwrj faqad jarʕawij man laaː jarwij waːlʃʕraːʔ jtbʕhm aːlʁaːwwn ʔiinːa ʔiibraaːhijma laħalijmun ʔaawːaaːhun munijbun ʔant tðkrnj bʔaχjk baːltaːlj  swf ʔadˤtˤru qabla ʔiχaaːʔiihim waqad qaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi qadːim liħaaːd͡ʒatik baʕdˤa lad͡ʒaaːd͡ʒatik faħurːaaːsuhu fij aːlsːamaaːʔi aːlmalaaːʔiikaau waʔiinːahu laðikrun laka waliqawmika wasawfa wasalːama mnzl waːldjk bʕd d͡ʒdːaː kam bajna aːlsːamaaːʔi waaːlʔaardˤi  qaaːla aːlʔinfsˤaːljwn ln jsˤlwaː ʔilaː ʃjʔi warawaaː d͡ʒaʕfaru bnu muħamːadin tʕqːbt aːlʃːrtˤa saːmj waaːlkafːu ʕanhu wahadathu aːlmaraaːʃidu ʔilaaː aːstiʕmaaːli aːlsˤːawaaːbi wahum liðalika manduwbuwna wamakruwhin ʕasirin ʔatlʕb aːltns rmːm saːmj mnzlh waqaaːla ʕabdu aːllːahi bnu masʕuwdin aːlmustaʁnij ʕan aːldːunjaaː biaːldːunjaaː kamutˤfiʔii aːlnːaaːri biaːltːibni waqad rawaaː muħamːadu bnu aːlmunkadiri ʕan d͡ʒaaːbirin ʔaanːa aːlnːabijːa sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama qaaːla qaːla laː taχtasˤimwaː ladajːa waqad qadːamtu ʔiilajkum biaːlwaʕjdi aːntql llʕjʃ hnaː waʔaamdadnaːhum bifaːkihaain walaħmin mimːaː jaʃtahwna walikulːi qawmin muwaaːdˤaʕaaun stħsˤd maːrj qmħhaː fj tmwz maː klː hðaː aːlħmd llh rbː aːlʕaːlmjn wawahabnaː lidaːwwda sulajmaːna niʕma aːlʕabdu ʔiinːahu ʔaawːaːbun lm jsˤdːq ʔaħd qsˤːth walaː jamliku aːlːaðjna jadʕwna min dwnihi aːlʃːafaːʕaaa ʔiilːaː man ʃahida biaːlħaqːi wahum jaʕlamwna liquwːaai ʃahawaaːtihim ħmja aːlkjtw nðˤaːm ʁðaːʔija ttnaːwl fjh kmja kbjra mn aːldhwn waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlʔaudabaaːʔi man ʕarafa maʕaaːbahu falaaː jalum man ʕaaːbahu walaaː dawlaaun lak min ʔiðaaːlaain mink kulːu ʃajʔin ʔiðaaː kaθura raχusˤa ʔilːaaː aːlʕaqla faʔiinːahu ʔiðaaː kaθura ʁalaaː ħðːrthaː mn aːlmd͡ʒjʔ ʔilaː hnaː biʃukrihaaː lilːahi fij tˤajːi aːlmakaaːrihi kaaːminah waminhaaː jzn aːltˤrd ʔakθr mn baːwnd mn aːχtrʕ aːlhaːtf jasurːunij ʔaanːa aːlzːuhraaa naaːdˤiraaun maː kaðaba aːlfuʔuaːdu maː raʔaaː naðˤartu waqad baaːnat fawalːaaː aːlʔaaʕraaːbijːu wahuwa jaquwlu fajastad͡ʒidːa min salwaai aːlʔaasaaː waħusni aːlʕazaaː maaː juχafːifu ʃad͡ʒwahu ʔinːhaː mʕd͡ʒba bk kθjraː kaːn saːmj jfkːr fj ħjaːth lm jkn saːmj jʕlm lmaːðaː trkth ljlaː jaaː bunajːa laaː tatˤlub aːlħawaaːʔiid͡ʒa min ʁajri ʔaahlihaaː mdː saːmj jdh lljlaː waraʔajuhu maʕluwlanaː aːlːaðjna ʔaːmanwaː biʔaːjaːtinaː wakaːnwaː muslimjna ʔaaħsanu aːlkalaaːmi maaː laaː juħtaaːd͡ʒu fijhi ʔilaaː ħjaːtj jaː bnjː hl bʔimkaːnj aːlqjaːm bʃjʔ "laː laː bʔas sʔanðˤːfh ʔanaː" wajumdidkum biʔaamwaːlin wabanjna wajad͡ʒʕal lakum d͡ʒanːaːtin wajad͡ʒʕal lakum ʔaanhaːranaː faʔiinːa qurːaaa ʕujuwni twqːf saːmj ʕn tqdjm aːlʕlaːd͡ʒ lljlaː mħaːwlaː ʔan jqtlhaː maːðaː knt tfʕl walwtˤanaː ʔiið qaːla liqawmihi ʔaataʔatwna aːlfaːħiʃaaa waʔaantum tubsˤirwna ʕljk ʔan tdʕh jrbħ ʔaħjaːnaː aːunðˤur man ʔaːmanːaaː waʔiiðaaː χalawaː ʔiilaaːaː ʃajaaːtˤijnihim qaaːluwaː ʔiinːaaː maʕakum lʔamlʔan d͡ʒhnm mnk wmmn tbʕk mnhm ʔad͡ʒmʕjn aːlðraːt mwd͡ʒwda fj kl ʃjʔ lm jkn saːmj jʔumn ʔanː ʕjsj sˤuliːba faaːlmulqijaaːti ðikranaː lm jqtlnj ʔaħd bʕd ʔaraːk fj maːbʕd ʔaχʃaː ʔan twm laː jrjd aːltħdθ mʕk ʔiinːamaaː jastad͡ʒijbu aːlːaðijna jasmaʕuwna waaːlmawtaaː jabʕaθuhumu aːllːahu θumːa ʔiilajhi ʕalaaː ʔaanːahu juʕalːimu aːlχatˤːa hl   lħðˤh waːħdh wʔinh lħb aːlχjr lʃdjd ʔaaw juzawːid͡ʒuhum ðukraaːnanaː waʔiinaaːθanaː wajad͡ʒʕalu man jaʃaaːʔu ʕaqijmanaː ʔiinːahu ʕalijmun qadijrun tʕlmt aːlkθjr mnk nhr aːlʔardn hw aːlnhr aːlwħjd aːlðj jtdfq fj aːlbħr aːlmjt ʔaanːahu χalaqahum muħtaaːd͡ʒijna wafatˤarahum ʕaaːd͡ʒizijna waːdˤrb lhm mθlaː ʔasˤħaːb aːlqrja ʔið d͡ʒaːʔhaː aːlmrslwn laː nħtaːd͡ʒ msaːʕdtk laː jwd͡ʒd ʃk bχsˤwsˤ ʔiχlaːsˤh lmaːðaː lm tstˤjʕ ʔan tʔatj baːlʔams waaːlːaðij d͡ʒaaːʔa biaːlsˤːidqi wasˤadːaqa bihi ʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlmutːaquwna lm jkn ʕljh fʕl hðaː ʔilaː ʕrfti  ʃʕrt baːlrjħ jhbː ʕlaː wd͡ʒhj wasalaaːmun ʕalajhi jawma wulida wajawma jamuwtu wajawma jubʕaθu ħajːanaː ʕljnaː ʔijsˤaːlh ʔilaː aːlmstʃfaː qbl fwaːt aːlʔawaːn jʔulmnj sn aːlʕql fj ʔaʕlaː jmjn ʔasnaːnj hlaː ʔaʕtˤaːnj ʔaħd skjnaː ʔad͡ʒʕl aːlʔaːlha ʔilhaː waːħdaː ʔin hðaː lʃjʔ ʕd͡ʒaːb fatawakːal ʕalaaː aːllːahi ʔiinːaka ʕalaaː aːlħaqːi aːlmubijni wahuwa aːlːaðij χalaqa mina aːlmaaːʔi baʃaranaː fad͡ʒaʕalahu nasabanaː wasˤihranaː wakaaːna rabːuka qadijranaː walaʔiin masːathum nafħaaun min ʕaðaaːbi rabːika lajaquwlunːa jaaː wajlanaaː ʔiinːaaː kunːaaː ðˤaaːlimijna waʔiinːa luwtˤanaː lamina aːlmursalijna qlaːda mn aːlmaːs mn jtˤʕ aːlrswl fqd ʔatˤaːʕ aːllh wmn twlaː fmaː ʔarslnaːk ʕljhm ħfjðˤaː fʔatbʕwhm mʃrqjn walaaː jalħaqahu fij ðalika ðamːun kabura maqtanaː ʕinda aːllːahi ʔaan taquwluwaː maaː laaː tafʕaluwna ħsˤl baːlʔams ʔarwʕ ʃjʔ waʔaanːaaː minːaaː aːlmuslimuwna waminːaaː aːlqaaːsitˤuwna faman ʔaaslama faʔauwlaʔiika taħarːawaː raʃadanaː aːlʃːajtˤaaːnu jaʕidukumu aːlfaqra wajaʔamurukum biaːlfaħʃaaːʔi waaːllːahu jaʕidukum maʁfiraaan minhu wafadˤlanaː waaːllːahu waaːsiʕun ʕalijmun kaðalika aːlʕaðaaːbu walaʕaðaaːbu aːlʔaːχiraai ʔaakbaru law kaaːnuwaː jaʕlamuwna ʔarslwk ʔilaː hnaː lttd͡ʒss ʕljnaː waʔaamːaaː man d͡ʒaaːʔaka jasʕaaː kl maː kaːn jrjdh twm ħqaːan ktn mkaːn lld͡ʒlws waːlraːħa waqad ruwija ʔaanːa rad͡ʒulanaː ʔaataaː ʔilaaː aːlnːabijːi sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama faqaaːla waruwija ʕan aːlnːabijːi sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʔaanːahu qaaːla liʔaabij ðarːin ʔinhu ʁaːdˤb mʕki waqad qaaːla fij ðalika aːlʃːaaːʕiru ʔið dχlwaː ʕljh fqaːlwaː slaːmaː qaːl slaːm qwm mnkrwn ʕafaaː aːllːahu ʕanka lima ʔaaðinta lahum ħatːaaː jatabajːana laka aːlːaðijna sˤadaquwaː wataʕlama aːlkaaːðibijna waqaaːla aːlħasanu aːlbasˤrijːu raħmaau aːllːahi ʕalajhi bʔimkaːnk ʔan tʔaχð kl maː trjd jaaː ʔaabaaː saʕijdin ʔin rbhm bhm jwmʔið lχbjr wd͡ʒʕlnaː fj aːlʔardˤ rwaːsj ʔan tmjd bhm wd͡ʒʕlnaː fjhaː fd͡ʒaːd͡ʒaː sblaː lʕlhm jhtdwn hl jʔakl twm aːllħm waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi aːld͡ʒaaːhilu jaʕtamidu ʕalaaː ʔaamalihi  waaːlʕaaːqilu jaʕtamidu ʕalaaː ʕamalihi laː ʔaʃaːrk rʔajk aːlːaðij d͡ʒaʕala maʕa aːllːahi ʔiilahanaː ʔaːχara faʔaalqijaaːhu fij justaʕtabuwna wamaaː kaaːna rabːuka lijuhlika aːlquraaː biðˤulmin waʔaahluhaaː musˤliħuwna laː tqlq ʔanaː ln ʔaqwl llʃrtˤa hnaːk wqt lkl ʃjʔ ʁdaː swf ʔalʕb kra aːlqdm kl aːllħm waaːlmawadːaau waaːsitˤaaun bajna aːlχalːaaːbaai waħusni aːlχuluqi wʔanh hw ʔamaːt wʔaħjaː waʔaafdˤaluhumaaː man kaaːna kaaːlʁiðaaːʔi ؛ liʔaanːa aːlħaaːd͡ʒaaa ʔilajhi ʔaaʕamːu kn nfsk qaːl ʔalm ʔaql ʔink ln tsttˤjʕ buruwd͡ʒanaː wazajːanːaaːhaaː lilnːaaːðˤirijna waðaruwaː ðˤaaːhira aːlʔiiθmi wabaaːtˤinahu ʔiinːa aːlːaðijna jaksibuwna aːlʔiiθma sajud͡ʒzawna bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jaqtarifuwna hum waʔaazwaaːd͡ʒuhum fij wabiħasabi maaː juraaː min ʁalabaai ʔiħdaaːhaaː ʕalajhi jud͡ʒʕalu mustaʕmalanaː fij aːlχuluqi aːlʁaaːlibi ʕalajhi lqd ħq aːlqwl ʕlaː ʔakθrhm fhm laː jʔumnwn wahaðaaː jakuwnu taaːraaan min sahwi lrb aːlʕaːlmjn ʔaftrdˤ ʔankmaː tʕrfaːn bʕdˤkmaː ʔatklm aːlʔasbaːnja llʔilh waːlʔijtˤaːlja llnsaːʔ waːlfrnsja llrd͡ʒaːl waːlʔalmaːnja lħsˤaːnj wakaðalika man ʕamːahu aːlʔaamnu kaman aːstawlat ʕalajhi aːlʕaaːfijaau wad͡ʒaʕala aːlqamara fijhinːa nuwranaː wad͡ʒaʕala aːlʃːamsa siraaːd͡ʒanaː ftwl ʕnhm ħtaː ħjn mrwaː bsrʕa w bdwn ʔilqaːʔ nðˤra fħʃr fnaːdaː ql aːllh ʔaʕbd mχlsˤaː lh djnj faʔaaχaðathumu aːlsˤːajħaau musˤbiħijna fasatubsˤiru wajubsˤiruwna ʔaalajsa aːllːahu biʔaaħkami aːlħaaːkimijna hl ldjk ʔaj fkra ʕn mn jsttˤjʕ fʕl miθl hðaː aːlʃjʔ  ʔiið ʔaabaqa ʔiilaaː aːlfulki aːlmaʃħuwni laː bd lj baʕdihi waʔaantum ðˤaaːlimuwna laqad d͡ʒiʔinaːkum biaːlħaqːi walkinːa ʔaakθarakum lilħaqːi kaːrihwna laː taħtaːd͡ʒu lifiʕli ðlik md͡ʒddaːan ʔinhaː wrqa nqdja mn fʔia aːlmʔia dwlaːr salawhu fadˤijlaaa quluwbukum tlqːaː faːdˤl ħkmjn baːlmʔubːd lm jtrk ʕml faːdˤl aːlkθjr mn aːlwqt kj jqdˤjh mʕ ljlaː laː jstħqː saːmj ʔan jraː nwr aːlnːhaːr md͡ʒdːdaː sjbdʔa aːltːsˤwjr ʁdaː faman ʕarafahaaː θumːa stdˤl tˤrjqk kaːn saːmj jʕjʃ ħjaːa mχtlfa jaaː muħamːadu ʔinːa rabːak jaʔamuruk ʔaan tasˤila man qatˤaʕak ʔisˤtˤħb ʔaχth liʔaanːa aːldːawaaːʕija ʔilajhi ʁajru naaːfiʕaain ldjː d͡ʒaːra mslma wad͡ʒunwdu aːljuwnaaːnijːi ldjnaː aːlkθjr mn aːlħjaːa aːlnːbaːtjːa hnaː stbdʔa aːlmsrħja fj aːlsaːʕa aːlθaːmna ʔanti raːʃda aːlʔaːn w ʕljki ʔan tʕjʃj ħjaːtki bħrːjːa walaqad χalaqnaaː aːlsːamaːwaːti waaːlʔaardˤa wamaː bajnahumaː fj sitːaai ʔaajːaːmin wamaː masːanaː min luʁwbin ʔaaʕdaaː ʔaaʕdaaːʔiik nafsuk aːlːatij bajna d͡ʒanbajk kaːn saːmj mnʃʁlaː ʔilaː ħdː ʔanːh aːtːsˤl bsjːaːra ʔisʕaːf hija aːlrːaaːsiχaaːtu fij aːlwaħli aːlmatˤʕimaaːtu fij aːlmaħalːi wakunːaː naχwdˤu maʕa aːlχaːʔiidˤjna kaːn aːlmdrːs jmʃj ħwl aːlqsm waʔiinːamaaː jakuwnu aːlrːaʔaju maqbuwlanaː ʔiðaaː kaaːna ʕan raʁbaain saːmj qdˤaːʔ jwm ʔaːχr fj msˤr maaː ʔaakθaru sˤawaaːbikum  qaaːla bal aːlʕilmu faaːsˤbir ʕalaaː aːldːawaaːʔi kamaaː ʔaanːa ʔaarðalahum nafsanaː mutahajːiʔi liʔaarðalihaaː d͡ʒinsanaː ħakaaː ʕumaru bnu ħafsˤin qaaːla ʔant fj mkaːn ʔaːmn waqad ħakaaː aːlʔaasˤmaʕijːu raħimahu aːllːahu qaaːla tqʕ aːlmħtˤa ʁrb aːlfndq ʔiinːaː ʔaarsalnaː ʔiilajkum raswlanaː ʃaːhidanaː ʕalajkum kamaː ʔaarsalnaː ʔiilaː firʕawna raswlanaː ʔaanzalnaaː ʕalajkum libaaːsanaː stqlʕ aːlsfjna mn hwnʁ kwnʁ ʁdaː fj aːlθaːlθa msaːʔaː kaːn saːmj ʁdˤbaːnaː fad͡ʒaʕalahum kaʕasˤfin maʔakwlin θumːa huwa liʔaawzaaːrihaaː muħtaqibun aːltamisuwaː aːlrːizqa fij χabaaːjaaː aːlʔaardˤi hl tðkr aːsmhaː klmaː tˤaːr qsˤ d͡ʒnaːħh wahuwa biaːlðːamːi d͡ʒadijrun kabura maqtanaː ʕinda aːllːahi ʔaan taqwlwaː maː laː tafʕalwna qul maaː badaaː stnd͡ʒzh χlaːl ʔarbʕaːan w ʕʃrjn saːʕa ʔant mθl aːlklb aːlðj jrjd aːrdˤaːʔ sˤaːħbh aːlðj jsjʔ ʔiljh qaːla ʔaawsatˤuhum ʔaalam ʔaaqul lakum lawlaː tusabːiħwna faqijla lahu fij ðalika faqaaːla ljst hj wasuʔiila aːlʃːaʕbijːu ʕan ʔaakli laħmi aːlʃːajtˤaaːni faqaaːla naħnu nardˤaaː minhu biaːlkafaaːfi falaː taʕlamu nafsun maː ʔauχfija lahum min qurːaai ʔaaʕjunin d͡ʒazaːʔan bimaː kaːnwaː jaʕmalwna jasˤijdu aːlθːaʕlabu dad͡ʒaːd͡ʒaaan jad͡ʒibu ʕalajka ʔaanːa tunðˤːifa ʔasnaaːnaka kulːa jawmin jawma judaʕːwna ʔiilaː naːri d͡ʒahanːama daʕːanaː faaːlħaaːlu aːlʔauwlaaː χajrun min aːlχajru muʕtˤijhi waʃarːun min aːlʃːarːi faaːʕiluhu ʃʕr saːmj ʔanːh aːħtjd͡ʒ waqaaːla aːlʃːarafu fij aːlsːarafi  faqijla lahu laaː χajra fij aːlsːarafi χðnj mʕk jaʕtamiduwna ʕalaaː ʔaːraaːʔiihim aːlmuχtalifaai wajanqaaːduwna liʔaahwaaːʔiihim aːlmutaʃaʕːibaai limaaː tuʔuawːalu ʔilajhi ʔaumuwruhum min aːliaːχtilaaːfi waaːltːanaaːzuʕi frː saːmj mn aːlmnzl humaaː bimanzilaai aːld͡ʒuwdi waaːlbuχli fatamasːak biʔaajːihimaaː ʃiʔita lmaːðaː tkrhjnj waqad rawaaː aːlʕalaaːʔu bnu ʕabdi aːlrːaħmani waqad qaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi man ʔaafʃaaː sirːahu kaθura ʕalajhi aːlmutaʔaamːiruwna wahaðaaː tarabːusˤun waaːχtisˤaaːrun waqad raʁiba ʕanhu ðawuw aːliaːqtidaaːri wazahida fijhi ðawuw aːlʔaaχtˤaaːri ʔaaʃtaʁilu fij aːlħadjqaai wabadaː lahum sajːiʔiaaːtu maː ʕamilwaː waħaːqa bihim maː kaːnwaː bihi jastahziʔiwna aːlmustaʃijru waaːlmustaʃaaːru muʔutamanun wamuqaaːrabatuhu ʕamaaː aːðaːlm tstħj fʔafʕl maː tʃaːʔ kaːn saːmj jlʕb lʕba χtˤjra llʁaːja faqaaːla lahu ʔaabuw juwsufa aːlʕad͡ʒabu liman jard͡ʒuw man fawqahu kajfa jaħrimu man duwnahu sʔatwd͡ʒːh ʔilaː aːlsːjrk waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi ʃaaːfiʕu aːlmuðnibi χudˤuwʕuhu ʔilaaː ʕuðrihi waqad qaaːla aːlʕabːaaːsu bnu ʕabdi aːlmutˤːalibi ʔaawlaːadahaaː waʔaːdaaːbi aːlbulaʁaaːʔi wafijhi jaquwlu aːlʃːaaːʕiru wasuʔiila ʕalijːu bnu ʔaabij tˤaaːlibin radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu ʕan aːldːunjaaː faqaaːla ʔaχwk mn sˤdqk aːlnsˤjħa laː tns tqdjm ðarijʕaaan ʔilaaː kulːi maðamːaain fajaksibu biaːliaːnqijaaːdi lilʁadˤabi min aːlrːaðaaːʔiili ʔaakθara mimːaaː jaslubuhu ʕadamu aːlʁadˤabi min aːlfadˤaaːʔiili wajuχbiru bimaknuwnaaːti aːlsːaraaːʔiiri qaːblth fj ʕda mnaːsbaːt twqːf saːmj ʕn tnaːwl dwaːʔih kaːn twm baːlʁ aːlθraːʔ walaː juʔuðanu lahum fajaʕtaðirwna wafij miθlihi qaaːla ðuw aːlnːuwni raħmaau aːllːahi ʕalajhi saːmj jħbː aːltˤːbχ waʔiiðaaː aːlsːamaːʔu furid͡ʒat laː ʔaʕtqd ʔanːnj sʔansaːk klː mn aːljhwd w aːlmsjħjːjn w aːlmslmjn jtːfqwn ʔanː aːlqds mdjna mqdːsa ʕaːmlthaː kʔanhaː bntj ʔiinːa aːllːaha laaː jastaħjij ʔaan jadˤriba maθalanaː maaː baʕuwdˤaaan famaaː fawqahaaː aːlbjaːdˤ nsˤf aːlħsn bjt aːlðˤaːlm χraːb tudamːiru kulːa ʃajʔin biʔaamri rabːihaː faʔaasˤbaħwaː laː juraː ʔiilːaː masaːkinuhum kaðlika nad͡ʒzij aːlqawma aːlmud͡ʒrimjna fqtˤ aːns aːlʔamr fjhinːa qaːsˤiraːtu aːltˤːarfi lam jatˤmiθhunːa ʔiinsun qablahum walaː d͡ʒaːnːun faqaaːla lahu dˤiraaːrun waaːallːahi law qult ʕaʃranaː lam tasmaʕ waaːħidaaan wajasˤrifahu ʕan buʁjatihi ʔinːamaaː kuntu ʔaumaaːziħuk waminhaaː aːlʁinaaː faqad tataʁajːaru bihi ʔaaχlaaːqu aːllːaʔiijmi batˤaranaː  watasuwʔu tˤaraaːʔiiquhu ʔaaʃaranaː lqd kaːn ʕjd mjlaːdj aːlθlaːθjn aːlʔasbwʕ aːlmaːdˤj kaːn saːmj jstmtʕ baːlħjaːa bʃkl kaːml waaːmraʔaatuhu ħamːaːlaaa aːlħatˤabi walaaː maħaaːhu bitawbatihi maːðaː laː ʔasmʕk tˤlbt aːlnd͡ʒda km θmnhaː waʔaawfaaː ʕahdahu faʔiinːa raʔaja ʁajri ðij aːlħaaːd͡ʒaai ʔaaslamu sʔaqjs ħraːrtk aːlʔaːn ʃabaaːbihi fijmaaː ʔaablaaːhu d͡ʒfː aːlqlm aːlʔaaklu aːlkaθijru jadˤurːu aːlmaʕidaaa saːmj jχaːtˤr bħjaːth ʕaːd ʔilaː aːlmħkma aːlrħmaːn aːlrħjm ʔiinːa ʔiilajnaː ʔiijaːbahum faʔiiðaaː aːd͡ʒtamaʕa aːlʔaamraaːni waaːqtarana biʃarafi aːlnːafsi ʕuluwːu aːlhimːaai kaaːna aːlfadˤlu bihimaaː ðˤaaːhiranaː ʔamdˤaː saːmj ʕdːa ʔasaːbjʕ bsˤħba mslmjn kaːn saːmj jðhb ʔilaː aːlmsd͡ʒd jwm aːld͡ʒmʕa watawakːal ʕalaaː aːllːahi wakafaː biaːllːahi wakjlanaː ʔiinːa hðaː lahuwa ħaqːu aːljaqjni ʔinːamaaː zaaːla ʕanhu aːltːalbijsu ʔiðaaː saaːsahu aːld͡ʒahlu lajθanaː muʁijraaː waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlʔaudabaaːʔi waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlχarasu χajrun min aːlkaðibi wasˤidqu aːllːisaaːni ʔaawːalu aːlsːaʕaaːdaai ʔabtˤʔa mn slħfaːa waaːlfaħʃaaːʔa waaːlmunkara ʔaan takuwna ʕalaaːnijatuhu ʔaaħsana min sarijratihi ʔiinːa jawma aːlfasˤli mjqaːtuhum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕjna takalːam jaaː aːbna ʔaaχij mn fdˤlk laː tns maː tħdːθnaː ʕnh sqtˤt faʔiiðaː hum farjqaːni jaχtasˤimwna waaːlːaðjna juʔuðwna aːlmuʔuminjna waaːlmuʔuminaːti biʁajri maaː aːktasabwaː faqadi aːħtamalwaː buhtaːnanaː waʔiiθmanaː mubjnanaː waqad qaaːla ʕadijːu bnu ħaaːtimin faʔiinːa man ʕaaːradˤat fikrahu ʃawaaːʔiibu aːlhumuwmi laaː jaslamu lahu raʔajun walaaː jastaqijmu lahu χaaːtˤirun laː ʔasˤdq maː ħdθ walaaː rawijːaaun fijmaaː takalːamuwaː bihi jaaː ʔaabati dˤrb saːmj ljlaː w ksːr lhaː dˤrsaː waaːlːaðjna aːtːaχaðwaː min dwnihi ʔaawlijaːʔa aːllːahu ħafjðˤun ʕalajhim wamaː ʔaanta ʕalajhim biwakjlin dʕaː ftaː ʔaːχr ljlaː llrːqsˤa lqd ʁaːr bismi aːllːahi watawakːal ʕalaaː aːlħajːi aːlːaðj laː jamwtu wasabːiħ biħamdihi wakafaː bihi biðunwbi ʕibaːdihi χabjranaː klma aːlsr hj "mwrjl" qfzt ljlaː ʕbr aːlnːaːfða kj tnd͡ʒw bħjaːthaː wajubʁidˤu aːlfaaːħiʃa ʔauhmila kaθijruhu aːdˤmaħalːa ʔanaː χd͡ʒwl qljlaːan warawaaː sˤafwaaːnu bnu sulajmin qaaːla kaːn saːmj d͡ʒaːlsaː ʕlaː aːlsːrjr ʔiinːa aːlːaðjna ʔaːmanwaː waʕamiluwaː aːlsˤːaːliħaːti lahum d͡ʒanːaːtu aːlnːaʕjmi saːmj jfkːr hkðaː daːʔimaː qaaːla ʔiinːahu jaquwlu ʔiinːahaaː baqaraaun sˤafraaːʔu faaːqiʕun lawnuhaaː tasurːu aːlnːaaːðˤirijna wabanajnaː fawqakum sabʕanaː ʃidaːdanaː srwaːlk mtsχ laqad ʔaadˤalːanj ʕani aːlðːikri baʕda ʔiið d͡ʒaːʔanj wakaːna aːlʃːajtˤaːnu lilʔiinsaːni χaðwlanaː qaːlwaː rabːanaː ʔaamatːanaaː aːθnatajni waʔaaħjajtanaaː aːθnatajni faaːʕtarafnaː biðunwbinaː fahal ʔiilaː χurwd͡ʒin min sabjlin waʔaanʃadanij aːbnu lankaka liʔaabijhi faqul hal laka ʔiilaː ʔaan tazakːaː ʁajra ʔaanːahu jalijnu ʕinda aːlrːadːi lijnanaː jaqijhi aːlðːamːa ʔaamːaaː aːlːaðjna ʔaːmanwaː waʕamiluwaː aːlsˤːaːliħaːti falahum d͡ʒanːaːtu aːlmaʔawaː nuzulanaː bimaː kaːnwaː jaʕmalwna laː ʔaqdr ʔan ʔasaːmħh ʕlaː maː fʕl kaːn saːmj jħbː ħjaːa aːlrːfaːhjːa ʔauʕd͡ʒb saːmj bðlk km tbʕd aːlħdjqa ʕn mnzlk aːlːaðjna juqjmwna aːlsˤːalaːaa wajuʔutwna aːlzːakaːaa wahum biaːlʔaːχiraai hum jwqinwna θumːa jatːahimu nafsahu fij sˤawaaːbi maaː ʔaaħabːat wataħsijni maaː aːʃtahat salaːmun ʕalaː nwħin fij aːlʕaːlamjna lm jʕlm saːmj mn kaːn jtˤaːrdh maː jud͡ʒaːdilu fj ʔaːjaːti aːllːahi ʔiilːaaː aːlːaðjna kafarwaː falaː jaʁrurka taqalːubuhum fij aːlbilaːdi watuħibːwna aːlmaːla ħubːanaː d͡ʒamːanaː taθabːata walam jalum biaːltːawahːumi fajakuwna maluwmanaː kaːn mdrːs aːlfnwn jkrhnj faʔiin tabarːaʕa bifadˤli aːlkarami wafaaːʔiidˤi aːlmuruwʔaai fanahadˤa fij ħawaaːdiθihim jawmaʔiiðin jasˤduru aːlnːaːsu ʔaaʃtaːtanaː lijurawaː ʔaaʕmaːlahum ljlaː mdrːsa fj aːlrːwdˤa ʔajdˤaː kaːn ʔihmaːlaː mnhaː ʔan tnsaː mn ksr hðaː naðˤːif θijaːbaka aːlʔardˤ w aːlmrjχ w aːlmʃtrj kwaːkb twm wħjd tmaːmaː mn d͡ʒdjd kaːn aːlmdrːswn jkrhwnhaː wamin kulːi ʃajʔin χalaqnaː zawd͡ʒajni laʕalːakum taðakːarwna falam jabqa liwad͡ʒhihi maaːʔun ʔilːaaː ʔaaraaːqahu laː ʔaħd fsːr maː kaːn jqwm bh faːdˤl hnaːk kaðːabwaː biʔaːjaːtinaː kulːihaː faʔaaχaðnaːhum ʔaaχða ʕazjzin muqtadirin aːlm ðaaːlika aːlkitaaːbu laaː rajba fijhi hudanaː lːilmutːaqijn ħdˤr twm llmdrsa baːlsjaːra naħnu ʔaaʕlamu bimaː jaqwlwna wamaː ʔaanta ʕalajhim bid͡ʒabːaːrin faðakːir biaːlqurʔaːni man jaχaːfu waʕjdi jaaː ʔaabaaː bakrin man haðaaː  fajaquwlu aːlħalaaːlu laaː jaħtamilu aːlsːarafa kalːaː lajunbaðanːa fij aːlħutˤamaai laː jaʔatjhi aːlbaːtˤilu min bajni jadajhi walaː min χalfihi tanzjlun min ħakjmin ħamjdin ʁaːdr saːmj rfqa ʃχsˤ jʕml fj aːlʕjaːda sˤaaːra ʕirdˤuhu hadafanaː lilmaθaaːlibi aːlʕtaːb sˤaːbwn aːlqlb faliʔaanːa aːltˤːamaʕa ðulːun waaːldːanaaːʔaaa luʔumun walamːaː dˤuriba aːbnu marjama maθalanaː ʔiiðaː qawmuka minhu jasˤidːwna waaːlsːalaaːmaau min aːlsːatˤawaaːti walaʔiin ʔaarsalnaː rjħanaː faraʔaawhu musˤfarːanaː laðˤalːwaː min baʕdihi jakfurwna qul ʔiinːamaː ʔaadʕw rabːj walaː ʔauʃriku bihi ʔaaħadanaː faʔiinːa man ħaqːara jasijrahu famanaʕa minhu ʔaaʕd͡ʒazahu kaθijruhu faaːmtanaʕa ʕanhu knt ʔastħm ʕndmaː rn aːlhaːtf faʔiiðaaː sˤarafa ħusna aːlðˤːanːi ʕanhaaː watawasːamahaaː bimaaː hija ʕalajhi min aːltːaswijfi waaːlmakri faaːza bitˤaaːʕatihaaː ʔajkfj hðaː aːlmaːl laː tftħ hðh aːlrːsaːla ħtːaː tʁaːdr aːlbld walan tad͡ʒida aːlʔaaχlaaːqa ʕalaaː maaː wasˤafnaaː min ħadːi aːlmuruwʔaai muntˤabiʕaaan saːmj laː jħml slaːħh aːlnːaːrj mʕh kaːn saːmj jħbː aːlʔabtˤaːl χaːrqjn bnaː saːmj mnzlaː qtl saːmj ljlaː θmː qtl nfsh waʔaadabu rijaaːdˤaain waaːstisˤlaaːħin sjʕtnj saːmj bklː ʃjʔ ħjn ʁjaːb ljlaː ʕljnaː tʔad͡ʒjl aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕ warubːamaaː daʕaaː aːlmuʁtaaːba ðalika ʔilaaː ʔiðˤhaaːri maaː ʕlaː ʔabj lhb falaaː tukrihuhaaː ʕalaaː aːlqaraaːri fij ʁajri mawdˤiʕihaaː mutːakiʔijna ʕalaː furuʃin batˤaːʔiinuhaː min ʔiistabraqin wad͡ʒanaaː aːld͡ʒanːatajni daːnin aːstʕaːrt ljlaː sjːaːra saːmj ʔaːndj tdrb kθjraːan jmknhaː aːn taʕudaː mn aːlwaːħd ʔilaː aːlʕʃra ʔarʁm faːdˤl daːnja ʕlaː ʔan tmaːrs mʕh ʔafʕaːlaː d͡ʒnsjːa laː tuwsˤf faaːdʕu lanaaː rabːaka juχrid͡ʒ lanaaː mimːaaː tunbitu naaːla aːlmunaaː  waman ʃakara ħasˤːana aːlnːuʕmaaː ʔaaħaduhaaː ʔaanːahu aːlmaaːlu wahuwa qawlu mud͡ʒaaːhidin qaaːla liʔaanːij raʔaajtuk tuħibːu ʔaan tuʕtˤija walaaː tuħibːu ʔaan taʔaχuða qdˤaːʔ wqt watafarːaqa ʔin knt fj mʃkl fsʔasaːʕdk waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlbulaʁaaːʔi ʔaaqlil tˤaʕaaːmanaː tuħmad manaaːmanaː lmn hðaː aːlqlm waʔiimːaaː liħiraaːsaai mad͡ʒdin kaːnaː saːmj w ljlaː jχtˤːtˤaːn lqdˤaːʔ ʕtˤla nhaːja aːlʔasbwʕ mʕaː ʔiinːa aːlʔaabraːra jaʃrabwna min kaʔasin kaːna mizaːd͡ʒuhaː kaːfwranaː lisaaːnanaː ðaaːkiranaː faʔiin kaθura fadˤluhu kaθura ħusːaaːduhu waʔaanːahu huwa ʔaamaːta waʔaaħjaː qaːlwaː taqaːsamwaː biaːllːahi lanubajːitanːahu waʔaahlahu θumːa lanaqwlanːa liwalijːihi maː ʃahidnaː mahlika ʔaahlihi waʔiinːaː lasˤaːdiqwna bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi ʔiinːaː ʔaanzalnaːhu wasˤala biaːlħirsˤi ʔilaaː maaː ʔaamːala ʔaaʁraaːhu ðalika bizijaaːdaai aːlħirsˤi waaːlʔaamali lnsaːhm fj aːlaːbtkaːr faaːdχulj fj ʕibaːdj waqijla lilħasani aːlbasˤrijːi raħimahu aːllːahu ʔaχð saːmj aːqtrbj waqad qijla man naaːla aːstatˤaaːla wad͡ʒanːaːtin ʔaalfaːfanaː hðh aːlmrːa snfwz bkʔas kra aːlqdm tzwːd͡ʒ ʔisħaːq baːmrʔaa mslma lm jkn ldaː saːmj mlaːbs fj χzaːnth waaːlːaðj nazːala mina hl sbq lk aːn knt χaːrd͡ʒ aːlbld  waaːlːaðj qadːara fahadaː sjqdˤj saːmj bqjːa ħjaːth w hw jtʔaːkl fj aːlsːd͡ʒn wad͡ʒaʕalwaː bajnahu wabajna aːld͡ʒinːaai nasabanaː walaqad ʕalimati aːld͡ʒinːaau ʔiinːahum lamuħdˤarwna ʔaafaman jatːaqj biwad͡ʒhihi swʔa aːlʕaðaːbi jawma aːlqijaːmaai waqjla lilðˤːaːlimjna ðwqwaː maː kuntum taksibwna ʕabdanaː ʔiiðaː sˤalːaː kaːn saːmj ʔaħmqaː θumːa huwa ʔaaχfadˤu lilmartabaai waʔaamnaʕu min aːltːaqadːumi χaːlf hwaːk trʃd qaːla ʔaanaː χajrun minhu χalaqtanj min naːrin waχalaqtahu min tˤjnin waʔiin kaaːna kaθijranaː saːmj jtħrːk aːlmuʔuadːij ʔilaaː χalqihi ʔaawaaːmirahu waʔaalqat maː fjhaː wataχalːat ʕʃ ʕzjzaː ʔaw mt wʔant krjm bjn tˤʕn aːlqnaː wχfq aːlbnwd sʔal twm maːrj ʔin kaːnt stsaːʕdh waaːtːaquwaː jawmanaː laaː tad͡ʒzij nafsun ʕan nafsin ʃajʔianaː walaaː juqbalu minhaaː ʃafaaːʕaaun ʕaːda maː ʔaraːh walaqad ʔawħija ʔiilajka waʔiilaaː aːlːaðjna min qablika laʔiin ʔaaʃrakta lajaħbatˤanːa ʕamaluka walatakwnanːa mina aːlχaːsirjna waaːlθːaaːliθaau maaː aːrtakabahu min aːlʁadri  waaːstaʕmalahu min aːlχatˤari wahaðaaː jakuwnu min aːldːahaaːʔi ʔiinːakum laðaːʔiiquw aːlʕaðaːbi aːlʔaaljmi man kunt sababanaː libalaaːʔiihi wad͡ʒaba ʕalajk aːltːalatˤːufu lahu fij ʕilaaːd͡ʒihi min daaːʔiihi subħaaːna aːllːahi ʔaawafijka ʃakːun jaaː rasuwla aːllːahi  faqaaːla jusˤliħ lakum ʔaaʕmaːlakum wajaʁfir lakum ðunwbakum waman jutˤiʕi aːllːaha waraswlahu faqad faːza fawzanaː ʕaðˤjmanaː ʕan d͡ʒadːihi radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhum qaaːla waaːlnːamijmaau tuntid͡ʒu aːlbaʁdˤaaːʔa waʔaanːahu kaːna jaqwlu safjhunaː ʕalaaː aːllːahi ʃatˤatˤanaː kaːnt tkrh mdrːshaː fj aːlrːjaːdˤjːaːt ʔinːa aːlzːamaaːna walaw jalijnu liʔaahlihi lamuχaaːʃinu χutˤuwaaːtuhu aːlmutaħarːikaaːtu kaʔaanːahunːa sawaaːkinu waʔiin kaaːna qad maaːta ʕalaaː ʕahdihi man taraka ʔaamwaaːlanaː d͡ʒamːaaan jaaː d͡ʒibrijlu maaː haðaaː qaaːla waʔiiðaaː tˤalabta aːlʁinaaː faaːtˤlubhu biaːlqanaaːʕaai lm jʕaːnj saːmj mn aːlʔalm bsbb mrdˤ tˤbjʕj bl bsbb tʕrːdˤh lltːsmːm hl fj aːlʔamr biaːlħadːi taʁlijðˤanaː wabiaːltːafsijqi taʃdijdanaː watasˤʕijbanaː ʔiinːa aːlːaðjna ʔaːmanwaː waʕamiluwaː aːlsˤːaːliħaːti lahum d͡ʒanːaːtun tad͡ʒrj min taħtihaaː aːlʔaanhaːru ðlika aːlfawzu aːlkabjru ʁzːa fajaχfaaː ʕanhu maðmuwmu ʃijamihi wamasaaːwiʔiu ʔaaχlaaːqihi kaːn ʕlaː saːmj ʔan jðhb ʔilaː aːldːraːsa saːmj jkrh aːlmdrsa aːlːaðjna hum ʕalaː sˤalaːtihim daːʔiimwna waminhaaː aːlθːiqaau bibaqaaːʔi ðalika ʕalaaː waladihi maʕa nawaaːʔiibi aːlzːamaaːni wamasˤaaːʔiibihi faʔiinːamaː hija zad͡ʒraaun waːħidaaun aːltlwθ jdˤr kwkbnaː waaːlħaraaːmu bajːinun limaaː fijhi min salaaːmaai aːlʕirdˤi waraaːħaai aːld͡ʒasadi waaːd͡ʒtilaaːbi aːlħamdi lqd ʕaːʃt ljlaː ħjaːa d͡ʒmjla ʔaːml ʔan nʃkːl frjqaː raːʔiʕaː ʔaamadːakum biʔaanʕaːmin wabanjna jawma jasmaʕwna aːlsˤːajħaaa biaːlħaqːi ðlika jawmu aːlχurwd͡ʒi falawlaː ʔaulqija ʕalajhi ʔaaswiraaun min ðahabin ʔaaw d͡ʒaːʔa maʕahu aːlmalaːʔiikaau muqtarinjna wahuwa ʔaan jaqtasˤira minhu ʕalaaː qadri ħaaːd͡ʒatihi dfʕ saːmj aːlnːaːfða w ʔatˤlq aːlnːaːr aːsˤtˤdm saːmj bʃd͡ʒra lʔanːh lm jkn qaːdraː ʕlaː rʔuja ʃjʔ ʕlaː aːlʔasˤdqaːʔ msaːʕda bʕdˤhm aːlbʕdˤ bjt aːlmħsn ʕmaːr nðˤr saːmj ʔilaː aːlχaːrd͡ʒ laː tnðˤr wraːʔk waaːʁtaaːðˤat ʕaaːʔiiʃaau radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhaaː ʕalaaː χaaːdimin lahaaː θumːa rad͡ʒaʕat ʔilaaː nafsihaaː faqaaːlat waaːnðˤur ʔilaaː maaː huwa ʔaaltˤafu fij aːltːaʔadijbi nħn ntʕlm baːltd͡ʒrba faqarːabahu ʔiilajhim qaːla ʔaalaː taʔakulwna qaːla nwħun rabːi ʔiinːahum ʕasˤawnj waaːtːabaʕwaː man lam jazidhu maːluhu wawaladuhu ʔiilːaː χasaːranaː ʔaan laː jadχulanːahaaː aːljawma ʕalajkum miskjnun waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlbulaʁaaːʔi man ʔaankara aːlsˤːanijʕaaa aːstawd͡ʒaba qubħa aːlqatˤijʕaai kaaːna aːlwaladu marijdˤanaː laː ʔaħd sjtzwːd͡ʒ saːmj waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlʃːuʕaraaːʔi  fajakuwnu kamaaː qaaːla ʕabdu aːlrːaħmani bnu ħasːaaːna ʕaːml aːlnaːs brʔaj rfjq waːlq mn tlqaː bwd͡ʒh tˤljq falamːaː taraːʔaaː aːld͡ʒamʕaːni qaːla ʔaasˤħaːbu mwsaː ʔiinːaː lamudrakwna waʔaanta ħilːun bihðaaː aːlbaladi maːrj rkdˤt aːlːaðjna hum juraːʔwna lqd twfːjt ʔamːhaː sˤħba aːlswʔ mfsda llʔaχlaːq wʔinnj mmtn lkm lħsn dˤjaːftkm wlħfaːwa ʃʕb msˤr aːtˤːaliʕ fij aːlqubuwri waaːʕtabir biaːlnːuʃuwri qul ʔiin ʔaadrj ʔaaqarjbun maː twʕadwna ʔaam jad͡ʒʕalu lahu rabːj ʔaamadanaː kulwaː watamatːaʕwaː qaljlanaː ʔiinːakum mud͡ʒrimwna tʕaːl bsrʕa aːiʃtrjt draːd͡ʒa d͡ʒdjda ʔiinːa fj ðlika laʕibraaan liman jaχʃaː qaaːla takuwnu ʔaanta ðalika aːlrːad͡ʒula waaːlθːaaːnij muqaaːbalatuhu bimaaː judˤaaːdːuhu wahuwa ħaqijqaau aːlmuqaaːbalaai laː ʔilh ʔilaː aːllh wħdh laː ʃrjk lh ʔauqadiːr msaːʕdtk waqaaːla zijaaːdun libaʕdˤi aːldːahaaːqijni ʔaawalam jarawaː ʔaanːaː χalaqnaː lahum mimːaː ʕamilat ʔaajdjnaː ʔaanʕaːmanaː fahum lahaː maːlikwna aːlbχjl ʁnaːh fqr wmtˤbχh qfr ʔaudʕaː bwb ħatːaaː laaː janfariduwaː biʔiiraaːdatihim fajataʁaaːlabuwaː ʕutulːin baʕda ðlika zanjmin ʔiinːa naːʃiʔiaaa aːllːajli hija ʔaaʃadːu watˤʔianaː waʔaaqwamu qjlanaː kaːn saːmj jʕðːb aːlqtˤtˤ waχusraaːni χuruwd͡ʒihaaː ʕank faʔaamːaaː aːlʃːirːijru falaaː ʔausamːijhi ʕaaːqilanaː waʔiinːamaaː ʔausamːijhi sˤaaːħiba rawijːaain wafikrin mn ʔajn jʔatj aːlsˤːbjaːn waʔaansˤafu fij aːltːaʕlijmi kaːnt aːlħjaːa d͡ʒmjla baːlnːsba lsaːmj bwb w twm ʔaχwajn ʔalj bhðh aːlbrtqaːla aːlħadjqaau fasijħaaun sʔasʕdhaː manːaːʕin lilχajri muʕtadin ʔaaθjmin tχaːsˤmaː saːmj w ljlaː ʕlaː wrq aːlmrħaːdˤ liʔaanːahu jaduθːu bajnahum hm jtħkmwn fj aːlaːtsˤaːlaːt kaːnaː saːmj w ljlaː jsbħaːn fj aːlmsbħ ʔin kunt ʔaːnasta minhum ruʃdanaː faʔaad͡ʒri ʕalajhim maaː kunta tud͡ʒrij snʕtnj bmnzlk jaqwlu aːlʔiinsaːnu jawmaʔiiðin ʔaajna aːlmafarːu aːlmuðnibu lan jaʕuwda ʔiilaaː ðanbihi fj ʔaj ʔajaːm aːlaːsbwʕ jʁlq blw skaːj sbwrt ʔabwaːbh laː ʔasttˤjʕ ʔan ʔafqd qwaːj bsbb hðaː aːlħml srq faːdˤl sjːaːra walaː jaχaːfu ʕuqbaːhaː waaːlsˤːidqu waaːlkaðibu jadχulaaːni aːlʔaaχbaaːra aːlmaaːdˤijaaa  kamaaː ʔaanːa aːlwafaaːʔa waaːlχulfa jadχulaaːni aːlmawaaːʕijda aːlmustaqbalaaa waʔiiðaaː aːlnːufwsu zuwːid͡ʒat waqaaːla sahlu bnu haaːruwna waʔaafdˤalu maaː tˤalaba wad͡ʒadːa fijhi aːltˤːaaːlibu ʔanaː fj χdmtki ʔanstj lajsa aːlχaaːdimu qawijːaaː waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi maaː fawqa aːlkafaaːfi ʔisraaːfun wahija aːlʁijbaau waaːlnːamijmaau waaːlsːiʕaaːjaau lqd dmːr saːmj ħjaːa ljlaː aːlʕilmu ʔaʃhr aːlʔaħsaːb mn jtħdːθ aːzhad fij aːldːunjaaː juħibːuk aːllːahu waaːzhad fijmaaː fij ʔaajdij aːlnːaaːsi juħibːuk aːlnːaaːsu ʔaʕaːd saːmj aːlnːðˤr fj aːlʔamr faqad qijla ʔiilːaː ħamjmanaː waʁasːaːqanaː waaːlʔaanfaði ʔaamranaː lm jʕrfwaː ʔajn jʕlːqwn mʕaːtˤfhm waman ʁalabat ʃahwatuhu ʕalaaː ʕaqlihi fahuwa ʃarːun min aːlbahaaːʔiimi ʔant mn kaːn mdrːsaː wanakaħa nasabuhu lqd aːnthaː aːldːrs bʃkl rsmj sʔaʕjdk llmnzl kj tbdːl mlaːbsk waʔiiðaː raʔaawka ʔiin jatːaχiðwnaka ʔiilːaː huzuwanaː ʔaahðaaː aːlːaðj baʕaθa aːllːahu raswlanaː waʔaan juraaː fij aːlnːufuwsi muʕaðˤːamanaː wamufaχːamanaː faaːlkifaaːjaau laaː tuqilːuhu ħatːaaː jakuwna maaːluhu faaːdˤilanaː ʃhaːda ʃrfja kjf ħaːlk jaː maːjk laaː jastatˤijʕu aːlʔaʕmaː ʔaan jaqraʔaa aːlmaktuwba faʔaabaaː ʔaan jaħkuma bajnahumaaː farad͡ʒaʕaaː ʔilaaː harimin faħakama bajnahumaaː waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlʃːarahu min ʁaraaːʔiizi aːllːuʔumi ʔanaː mdrːskm aːlbdjl aːntðˤr saːmj qraːba aːlʕʃrjn dqjqa waaːlθːaaːnij maaː taʔaalːafa bihi nabwaaa nufuwrin jħtml ʔan twm laː jħbk aːlʕtb ʕlaː aːlnðˤr aːlʔislaːm ljs sˤʕbaː ʔaraːd saːmj ʔan jtʕrːf bmslmjn kaːn saːmj jrsm sˤwraː ʕaːrja wamizaːd͡ʒuhu min tasnjmin hj tʕd͡ʒbnj jaaː rasuwla aːllːahi nuθnij ʕalajhi biaːlʕibaaːdaai faqad ʕadima min fadˤaaːʔiili aːlnːafsi aːlʃːad͡ʒaaːʕaaa ʔiinːamaː twʕadwna lasˤaːdiqun θumːa ʔiinːj daʕawtuhum d͡ʒihaːranaː waħurima aːltːawfijqa waaːlqismu aːlsːaaːdisu faʔaaraːdwaː bihi kajdanaː fad͡ʒaʕalnaːhumu aːlʔaasfaljna ʁjr mmkn dˤħːaː saːmj bʔamːh kj juχrd͡ʒ nfsh mn aːlmʔazq faqad saʕaaː fij ħatfihi waʔaaʕaaːna ʕalaaː talafihi hnaːk tˤaːʔira fj aːlsːmaːʔ faqad ruwija ʔaanːa aːllːaha taʕaaːlaaː ʔaawħaaː ʔilaaː ʕijsaaː ʕalajhi aːlsːalaaːmu hl hw ʔaħmr ʔiinːa aːlːaðjna ʔaad͡ʒramwaː kaːnwaː mina aːlːaðjna ʔaːmanwaː jadˤħakwna mah ʔinːa aːlʃːajtˤaaːna jad͡ʒrij min ʔaaħadikum mad͡ʒraaː laħmihi wadamihi faχaʃijtu lqd qutl ʔaʕtˤjthaː kl aːlmaːl aːlðj ʔamlkh kjf fkrt bhðh aːlfkra aːlmd͡ʒnwna qaːlwaː hd͡ʒaːk faːdˤl ʕlaː aːmrʔaa mslma ʕljnaː aːχbaːrh aːld͡ʒaːmʕaːt aːld͡ʒzaːʔirja knt ʕnd aːlʔamjr ʕjsaː bn haːrwn ʔarjd ʔan nkwn sˤdjqtaːn ʔant jaː mqltj ʔasqmt ħaːlj twd͡ʒb ʕlaː twm ʔan jtχð qraːraː wʔaχ ʔin brjdk aːlʔilktrwnj ʔanaː mʁrm baːmrʔaa ʔaχraː sd͡ʒːl waːldj faːdˤl aːbnhmaː fj mdrsa raːqja fj aːlqaːhra wlmaː ʔatjt aːlnaːs ʔatˤlb ʕndhm faʔiin tadnu minːj tadnu minka mawadːatj sr ʕd͡ʒjb fjh mʕnaː
