ʔaaʕridˤ ʕani aːld͡ʒaːhili aːlsafjhi jd͡ʒdr bk ʔan tdˤʕ fj ħsbaːnk ʔank lm tʕd ʃaːbaː tʃrft bmʕrftk hl swf tfʕl hðaː mra ʔaχraː ʁjr mʕqwl ltˤfaːan aːχfdˤ aːldˤd͡ʒjd͡ʒ lqd zwd͡ʒt ʔibntj bʕbaːra ʔaχraː ʔant ʔaħmq ʔinj rʔajtk ħaːlmaː ʔanʃdtnj maː saːʔnj ʔiʕraːdˤh ʔinaː kl ʃjʔ χlqnaːh bqdr θumːa qutila kajfa qadːara hl jmknnj ʔan ʔatˤrħ ʕljk sʔuaːlaː hðaː ʕlm aːljaːbaːn wd͡ʒnaːt ʔalfaːfaː biʔaajdij safaraain ʁjr msmwħ lk ʔan tsˤʕd ʔilaː sjaːrth ldjh ħðˤ ʔakθr mn aːlðkaːʔ ʃkraːan lka ʕlaː aːlmʕlwma waqad qaaːla aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː ʔaajaħsabu aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʔaan jutraka sudanaː wad͡ʒaʕalnaaː siraaːd͡ʒanaː wahːaaːd͡ʒanaː mrħbaː bk fj frjq aːltsjjr lʃrka ʔaj bj sj aːljaːbaːn jawma junfaχu fij aːlsˤːuwri fataʔatuwna ʔaafwaaːd͡ʒanaː ʔinh jʕrf kjf jlʕb aːlbwkr whw aːlðj jqbl aːltwba ʕn ʕbaːdh wjʕfw ʕn aːlsjʔiaːt wjʕlm maː tfʕlwn aːsmj laː jbdw fj aːlqaːʔima min ʃarːi maaː χalaqa ln jnd͡ʒħ ðlk manhuwmaaːni laaː jaʃbaʕaaːni ʕjnaː twm kʕjnj ʔabjh ʔaj maħal mθld͡ʒaːt ʔanta ðaːhb ʔiljh laː tqlq ʔinhu jʕrf maː jfʕlhu ʔanaː mqtnʕ ʔanh brjʔ saːmj jtðkːr hðaː laː ttrk aːlʕdw jqtrb jaaː sˤajːaaːdu ʃrb mnːaːd lm jsjʔ ʔiljk ʔaħd hw aːllh aːlðj laː ʔilh ʔilaː hw ʕaːlm aːlʁjb waːlʃhaːda hw aːlrħmn aːlrħjm d͡ʒls saːmj fħsb w aːstmrː fj qwl "nʕm" bjnmaː kaːn jstmʕ lljlaː waqad χalaqakum ʔaatˤwaaːranaː waaːlːaðijna kaðːabuwaː biʔaːjaaːtinaaː waaːstakbaruwaː ʕanhaaː ʔauwlaʔiika ʔaasˤħaaːbu aːlnːaaːri hum fijhaaː χaaːliduwna ʔilːaaː aːld͡ʒanːaau ʔaaw aːlnːaaːru ʔaʕd aːllh lhm d͡ʒnaːt td͡ʒrj mn tħthaː aːlʔanhaːr χaːldjn fjhaː ðlk aːlfwz aːlʕðˤjm ʔaːmul ʔanka lst ʁaːdˤbaːan laː jnfʕ aːlndm ʕlaː maː faːt nafsun mutˤijʕaaun ʔilaaː ruʃdihaaː muntahijaaun ʕan ʁajːihaaː tsˤrf bʔadb ljs aːlbjt bd͡ʒdjd flaː ʔaqsm bmaː tbsˤrwn nħn snfʕl ðlk ʁdaːan aːltqjt baːltˤbjb aːlmrjdˤ sʔasaːfr ʔilaː aːlsˤjn aːlʔasbwʕ aːlqaːdm lstu swaː ʃχsˤ ʕaːdjː lʔank d͡ʒjd aːlmdˤʁ srjʕ aːlblʕ wmaː ʔant ʔilaː bʃr mθlnaː wʔin nðˤnk lmn aːlkaːðbjn liʔaanːa aːlrːaʁbaaa ʔaaqwaaː aːlbaaːʕiθajni ʕalaaː aːlʕilmi ʕaqlun mawfuwrun jahdij ʔilaaː maraaːʃidi aːlʔaumuwri lw kntu ʁnjaːan, ʔawd ʔan ʔaʃtrj mnzlaːan d͡ʒmjlaːan lm ʔansk jaː twm waʔaamːaaː aːlqaaːʕidaau aːlsːaaːdisaau liʔaanːa nafʕa aːlʔiiχwaaːni ʕaaːmːun wanafʕa aːlmaaːli χaaːsˤːun md͡ʒtmʕa fj mkaːn waːħd mnːaːd jʕml maːðaː fʕl llħmj ldjh qmjsˤ ʔaswd wʕd͡ʒbwaː ʔan d͡ʒaːʔhm mnðr mnhm wqaːl aːlkaːfrwn hðaː saːħr kðaːb ʔinh md͡ʒrd tˤfl lawaħa twm jtwfnaː aːllh fj aːlʕzh rʔajt rd͡ʒlaːan jtːd͡ʒh nħwj ʔaaj χalaqnaaː lakum maaː talbasuwna min aːlθːijaaːbi kaðalika aːlʕilmu laaː jufnijhi aːliaːqtibaaːsu  walakinːa faqda aːlħaaːmilijna lahu sababu ʕadamihi ʔiinːahu min sulajmaːna waʔiinːahu bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi lqd tʁjːrt ħjaːa saːmj baːlkaːml kl klb bbaːbh jnbħ wajarudːuhu ʔilaaː qijmatihi maaː aːlːaðij laaː χajra fijhi  qaaːla kaːn ʕnd saːmj aːlʕdjd mn aːlʔasˤdqaːʔ aːlmslmjn fajazuwlu ʕanhu aːlʁadˤabu bitaʁajːuri aːlʔaaħwaaːli waaːltːanaqːuli min ħaaːlin ʔilaaː ħaaːlin walaqad ʔaːtajnaaː muwsaaː aːlkitaaːba waqafːajnaaː min baʕdihi biaːlrːusuli fajasˤduqu fij qawlihi wajuwarːij ʕan muraaːdihi ʔarnj ltˤfaː kjf tʕml ʔaħb aːlrħlaːt hjːaː bnaː ʔilaː aːlsːjrk waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlbulaʁaaːʔi man qalːa ʕaqluhu kaθura hazluhu nħn nʕlm maːðaː nkwn w lknːnaː laː nʕlm maː qd nsˤbħ hl tħb aːlfrnsja ʔaljs ʕljnaː sʔuaːl twm binasˤri aːllːahi jansˤuru man jaʃaːʔu wahuwa aːlʕazjzu aːlrːaħjmu jaaː rabːi kuntu ʔauħibːu lahum ʕaðaaːbanaː ʕaaːd͡ʒilanaː waqalːamaaː jakuwnu ðalika ʔilːaaː min χalijʕin batˤirin ʔaaw murtaaːbin ʔaaʃirin kaːnt ldaː saːmj ħjaːa χfjːa ʔintðˤrtk θumːa ʔiinːa ʕalajnaː ħisaːbahum qaːlwaː bal wad͡ʒadnaː ʔaːbaːʔanaː kaðlika jafʕalwna knt kθjr aːlnːsjaːn rʔaaː saːmj mlaːbs ljlaː hnaːk waħaaːlaau tasˤarːufin ʔin ʔaaraħthaaː fijhaaː taχalːat θumːa ʔiinːakum ʔaajːuhaaː aːldˤːaːlːwna aːlmukaðːibwna aːlmulku jawmaʔiiðin aːlħaqːu lilrːaħmni wakaːna jawmanaː ʕalaaː aːlkaːfirjna ʕasjranaː wamaː tafarːaqa aːlːaðjna ʔawtuwaː aːlkitaːba ʔiilːaː min baʕdi maː d͡ʒaːʔathumu aːlbajːinaau aːʃtrj bʕdˤ aːltˤːʕaːm lnfsk ʔarjd ʔan ʔatqrːb mnk waʔaaʕradˤa ʕan aːstidfaaːʕi ʔaahli aːlbaðaaːʔi lm jkn mdrːsj ʔaatadrij lima aːtːaχaðtuk χalijlanaː  qaaːla ðuq ʔiinːaka ʔaanta aːlʕazjzu aːlkarjmu ʔajn hw ʔab saːmj walaaː jadaʕu aːlqurʔaːna raʁbaaan ʔilaaː maaː siwaaːhu hw jħbːnj sunːaaa aːllːahi fij aːlːaðjna χalawaː min qablu walan tad͡ʒida lisunːaai aːllːahi tabdjlanaː waʔiijːaaːka wafudˤuwlahu faʔiinːahu juzilːu aːlqadama kaːn sˤwt saːmj ʁljðˤaː d͡ʒdːaː laː ttklːm bhðh aːlnːbra mʕ ʔabjk mn fdˤlk fkr fj aːlmwdˤwʕ waqaaːla sulajmaaːnu bnu ʕabdi aːlmaliki tklm fqd klm aːllh mwsaː lqd aːtːχðt qraːrj tfdˤːlj waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlʕulamaaːʔi ʕalːim ʕilmak wataʕalːam ʕilma ʁajrik wuld faːdˤl fj ftra aːlksaːd aːlkbjr jblʁ mtħdːθj aːllʁa aːlʔind͡ʒljzja mljaːr nsma sjkwn fʕl ðlk χtˤranaː θumːa ʕalaaː suwri baladihi ʕaːd mn aːlmrsˤd qdːm lj aːlmdrːs aːħtd͡ʒaːzaː ʔiinːa ðlika laħaqːun taχaːsˤumu ʔaahli aːlnːaːri ʔiin ħisaːbuhum ʔiilːaː ʕalaː rabːj law taʃʕurwna kaːn saːmj fj ʁrfa aːstʕd͡ʒaːlaːt ʔaħd aːlmstʃfjaːt ʔalaː trjd ʔijqaːf twm laːtsــtʕn baːlðˤـaːlm ʕـlaː aːlðˤـaːlm ħtـaː laːtkwn frjsـa llʔaθnjــn: faʔiiðaː nuqira fij aːlnːaːqwri juχrid͡ʒu aːlħajːa mina aːlmajːiti wajuχrid͡ʒu aːlmajːita mina aːlħajːi wajuħjij aːlʔaardˤa baʕda mawtihaː wakaðlika tuχrad͡ʒwna waraʔaajta aːlnːaːsa jadχulwna fj djni aːllːahi ʔaafwaːd͡ʒanaː aːlsˤdjq ʔimaː ʔan jnfʕ wʔimaː ʔan jʃfʕ ʔaan jusriʕa wusˤuwluhaaː lilfahmi hðaː ʔabʃʕ rd͡ʒl θld͡ʒj rʔajth ʔabdaː kaːnt ljlaː qd maːtt ʕndmaː wsˤlt sjːaːra aːlʔisʕaːf ʕljnaː ʔan nd͡ʒd ħlaːː kaːn saːmj msˤaːbaː bd͡ʒrħ fj aːlrːʔas ʔaqlː twm maːrj mn aːlmtˤaːr fasubħaaːna man tafarːada fijnaaː bilutˤfi ħikmatihi faqaaːla ʔaanbiʔiuwnij biʔaasmaaːʔi haaːʔuulaaːʔi ʔiin kuntum sˤaaːdiqijna waʔiiðaː maridˤtu fahuwa jaʃfjni maː χaːb man aːstʃaːr ʔaaw jakuwna qad zaaːda fijhaaː ħatːaaː tad͡ʒaaːwazat maħduwdahaaː km mn aːlwqt aːstʁrqk lttrd͡ʒm hðaː aːlktaːb faqaaːla aːbnu ʕabːaaːsin laaː χajra walaaː ʃarːa hw jdrs aːlfzjaːʔ qrʕ saːmj ʕlaː baːb ljlaː hl aːntðˤrt kθjraː waaːstiʃfaaːfanaː liltˤːamaʕi kaːn aːlmdrːs jtsˤrːf bʁraːba ʔiið ʕuridˤa ʕalajhi biaːlʕaʃijːi aːlsˤːaːfinaːtu aːld͡ʒijaːdu mataːʕanaː lakum waliʔaanʕaːmikum warawat ʔaasmaaːʔu bintu jazijda qaaːlat waʔaamːaaː aːlmunaaːsabaau fahija ʔaan jakuwna aːlmaʕnaaː jalijqu bibaʕdˤi aːlʔaalfaaːðˤi ʔimːaaː liʕurfin mustaʕmalin aːlsˤːabru sˤabraaːni aːlʕaaːd͡ʒizu man ʕad͡ʒaza ʕan sijaaːsaai nafsihi maːðaː tzrʕ fj mzrʕtk faqaaːla sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama kajːataaːni waaːʕlam ʔaanːak maaː ħajijta malħuwðˤu aːlmaħaaːsini maħfuwðˤu aːlmasaaːwiʔii sˤanaaːʔiiʕu aːlmaʕruwfi taqij masˤaaːriʕa aːlsːuwʔi ʕljk aːltħkm baːnfʕaːlk twm waaːlθːaaːnij ʔaanːa ðalika raaːd͡ʒiʕun ʔilaaː libaaːsi aːltːaqwaaː wamaʕnaaː aːld͡ʒaaːhi waaːlʔiisʕaaːdu biaːlnːafsi waaːlmaʕuwnaau fij aːlnːaaːʔiibaai raħima aːllːahu man qaaːla χajranaː faʁanima lm laː tʁjːr mlaːbsk ʔaawlaː laka faʔaawlaː klb saːmj ldjh braːʁjθ wakaːna fij aːlmadjnaai tisʕaau rahtˤin jufsidwna fij aːlʔaardˤi walaː jusˤliħwna waqaaːla ʕijsaaː aːbnu marjama ʕalaaː nabijːinaaː waʕalajhi aːlsːalaaːmu rabːi aːlsːamaːwaːti waaːlʔaardˤi wamaː bajnahumaaː aːlrːaħmni laː jamlikwna minhu χitˤaːbanaː wawud͡ʒwhun jawmaʔiiðin ʕalajhaː ʁabaraaun saːmj jnðˤːf aːlmnzl saːmj md͡ʒrm χtˤjr llʁaːja aːlqraːr bjdk aːlʔaːn χrd͡ʒ aːlwdˤʕ ʕn sjtˤrtj ʔajn tqʕ baːrjs liʔaanːanaaː qad ðakarnaaː fij ħadːi aːlħilmi ʔaanːahu dˤabtˤu aːlnːafsi ʕan hajad͡ʒaaːni aːlʁadˤabi ʔiinːahum kaːnwaː qabla ðlika mutrafjna laː tqlq ʔabdaː waʔiiðaaː aːlsːamaːʔu kuʃitˤat waʔiin kaaːnat fij aːlmaʔakuwli waaːlmaʃruwbi ʔaadʕaaː fahija ʔilaaː aːlmalbuwsi maaːsːaaun wabihaaː ʔilajhi faaːqaaun waqad madˤaaː ʃawaaːhidu kulːi farijqin fij mawdˤiʕihi bimaaː ʔaaʁnaaː ʕan ʔiʕaaːdatihi wud͡ʒːht lsaːmj thm d͡ʒdjda baːlqtl aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː ʕanhu qijmaau kulːi aːmriʔiin maaː juħsinu wanaħnu ʔaaqrabu ʔiilajhi minkum walkin laː tubsˤirwna wamaaː jaʕqiluhaaː ʔilːaaː aːlʕaaːlimuwna fanafaaː ʔaan jakuwna ʁajru aːlʕaaːlimi jaʕqilu ʕanhu ʔaamranaː ʔanaː qaːdma waqijla libaʕdˤi aːlħukamaaːʔi ldjː ʔiħsaːs ʔanj knt hnaː mn qbl sʔantðˤr fj aːldːaːχl bimaaːdːaain wakasbin ʔawl aːlʁdˤb d͡ʒnwn wʔaːχrh ndm ʔaːjaau aːlʕaqli surʕaau aːlfahmi tlqːaː saːmj dʕwa ʔajn d͡ʒhaːz aːltħkːm dˤarbaa muʕaliːmin faliʔaanːa aːllːisaaːna ʕunwaaːnu aːlʔiinsaaːni jutard͡ʒimu ʕan mad͡ʒhuwlihi waðakara ʔaanːahaaː liʕalijːi bni ʔaabij tˤaaːlibin radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu aːʕtrf saːmj bsˤfʕh lljlaː min ʔaaʕwaði maaː jatakalːamu bihi aːlʕaaːqilu ʔaan laaː jatakalːama ʔilːaaː liħaaːd͡ʒatihi ʔaaw maħad͡ʒːatihi lkn llqsˤːa d͡ʒaːnb ʔaːχr aːld͡ʒawːu muʕtadilun waʔiiðaaː kaaːna aːlʕatˤaaːʔu ʕalaaː haðaaː aːlwad͡ʒhi χalaaː min tˤalabi d͡ʒazaaːʔin waʃukrin liʔaanːa aːlmaʕaaːnija tasˤijru mutaʃaaːkilaaan waʔaaʃrafuhu nafsanaː lm jkn ʕnd saːmj ʔajː ʃχsˤ jtˤlb mnh aːlmsaːʕda ʔaam ʕindahum χazaːʔiinu raħmaai rabːika aːlʕazjzi aːlwahːaːbi ʔaan jatad͡ʒaaːwaza maʕa aːlʔaawqaaːti fajazijda fijhi ʕalaaː muruwri aːlʔaajːaaːmi krh ʔahl bwstˤn aːld͡ʒnwd aːlbrjtˤaːnjjn waaːʕlam ʔaanːa aːlnːasˤra maʕa aːlsˤːabri  waaːlfarad͡ʒa maʕa aːlkarbi  waaːljusra maʕa aːlʕusri lm jkn saːmj jʕtnj baːlnːðˤaːfa waʔaaħaθːu ʕalaaː aːlrːaʁbaai fijmaaː ladajhim sʔafʕl maː trjd lm jnqaːʃ twm ʕmlh mʕ maːrj btaːtaː dχl saːmj aːlʔiħraːm lm juʕaːmal saːmj bnfs aːltˤːrjqa waħijna jaʁdˤabu ðhb llmtd͡ʒr fj ʔaːχr lħðˤa qbl aːlʔiʁlaːq bqljl saːmj jkrh ðlk aːlmdrːs lntχjl ʔannaː mχlwqaːt fdˤaːʔija wabaːraknaː ʕalajhi waʕalaː ʔiisħaːqa wamin ðurːijːatihimaː muħsinun waðˤaːlimun linafsihi mubjnun ʔiinːa aːlːaðjna jaχʃawna rabːahum biaːlʁajbi lahum maʁfiraaun waʔaad͡ʒrun kabjrun wajadfaʕu baaːdiraaa satˤwatihi lknhm klhm bʃr maqtalu aːlrːad͡ʒuli bajna fakːajhi kalːaː ʔiinːahu kaːna liʔaːjaːtinaː ʕanjdanaː lm tʔat qbl aːlθaːnja waaːlqawlu fij aːldˤːaħiki kaaːlqawli fij aːlmizaaːħi ʔin tad͡ʒaaːfaaːhu aːlʔiinsaaːnu nafara ʕanhu waʔaawħaʃa minhu walaqad d͡ʒaːʔa ʔaːla firʕawna aːlnːuðuru mafdˤuwlanaː maaː jaqtadˤij ʔaan takuwna natijd͡ʒatuhu min aːlħilmi maðmuwmaaan wqf saːmj χaːrd͡ʒ ʁrfa aːlmstʃfaː wajataχalːasˤu bihi min waaːlminħaaa fijhaaː mustaradːaaun walaw naʃaːʔu latˤamasnaː ʕalaː ʔaaʕjunihim faaːstabaquwaː aːlsˤːiraːtˤa faʔaanːaː jubsˤirwna maaː maaːluk jaaː ʔaabaaː ðˤabjaaːna  qaaːla qult laː ttklm hkðaː aːnqaːð aːld͡ʒns aːlbʃrj jbdʔa baːlʕaːʔila waqaaːla rad͡ʒulun liʁulaaːmin bikam taʕmalu maʕij  qaaːla bitˤaʕaaːmij ljla sʕjda aːʃtʁl d͡ʒhaːz aːlʔinðaːr fwraː ʕljk ʔan tnðˤːf ʁrftk bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi aːlqaːriʕaau laː tns ʔiʕaːda aːlktaːb ʔilaː aːlmktba waʕindahum qaːsˤiraːtu aːltˤːarfi ʕjnun bwb mħbwb fj aːlmdrsa waman taʕalːama aːlʕarabijːaaa raqːa tˤabʕuhu walaqadira ʕalaaː maaː jasˤuwnahu walajsa man faaːd͡ʒaʔaahu aːltˤːaʕaaːmu kaman jad͡ʒidu rijħahu wajatˤʕamuhu fadaʕ aːlħaaːd͡ʒaaa taχtamiru biaːlwaʕdi faqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlʃːuʕaraaːʔi mn ktb haːmlt saːmj ʔaħmq lʕjn w laː jstħqː dmwʕki aːliaːstihaaːnaau biaːlmusijʔi waðalika ʕan dˤarbin min aːlkibri waaːlʔiiʕd͡ʒaaːbi faʔaalhamahaː fud͡ʒwrahaː wataqwaːhaː waaːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aːlsˤːaaːliħaaːti ʔauwlaaːʔiika ʔaasˤħaaːbu aːld͡ʒanːaai hum fijhaaː χaaːliduwna faqultu aːstaʁfirwaː rabːakum ʔiinːahu kaːna ʁafːaːranaː waʔiiðaaː aːlnːud͡ʒwmu aːnkadarat wajufriʁu ʕalajhi ʔaaħarːa min aːlmird͡ʒali kam ʔaahlaknaː min qablihim min qarnin fanaːdawaː walaːta ħjna manaːsˤin maːðaː tqwl aːlrːsaːla wadaːnijaaan ʕalajhim ðˤilaːluhaː waðulːilat qutˤwfuhaː taðljlanaː waħumilati aːlʔaardˤu waaːld͡ʒibaːlu fadukːataː dakːaaan waːħidaaan wajanbaʁij ʔaan jakuwna lilʕaaːlimi firaaːsaaun jatawasːamu bihaaː aːlmutaʕalːima lijaʕrifa mablaʁa tˤaaːqatihi hðaː aːlħjwaːn ʔakbr mn ðaːk waʔiinːj mursilaaun ʔiilajhim bihadijːaain fanaːðˤiraaun bima jard͡ʒiʕu aːlmursalwna kafaaː muχabːiranaː ʕamːaaː baqija maaː madˤaaː wakafaaː ʕibaranaː liʔauwlij aːlʔaalbaaːbi maaː d͡ʒarːabuwaː waaːlːaðjna kafarwaː biʔaːjaːti aːllːahi waliqaːʔiihi ʔauwlʔiika jaʔiiswaː min raħmatj waʔauwlʔiika lahum ʕaðaːbun ʔaaljmun lm ʔant waːqf qaaːla jaaː rabːi dulːanij ʕalajhi ħatːaaː ʔauχrid͡ʒahu faqaaːla faqaaːla maaː ʔauħibːu ʔaan ʔaaħilːa lak maaː ħarːama aːllːahu ʕalajk ʔaaʁsilu jadajːa faaːlsːaːbiqaːti sabqanaː kaaːna ʔaaʃadːa min ðulːi aːlrːiqːi waχudˤuwʕi aːlʕabdi θumːa ʔinːahu d͡ʒalːat qudratuhu d͡ʒaʕala sadːa ħaaːd͡ʒatihim watawasˤːulihim ʔilaaː manaaːfiʕihim min wad͡ʒhajni sntʔaχr ʕn aːlʕʃaːʔ waaːlθːaaːnij laaː tutbiʕ aːlʔauwlaaː aːlːatij waqaʕat sahwanaː biaːlnːaðˤraai aːlθːaaːnijaai aːlːatij tuwqiʕuhaaː ʕamdanaː maaː sˤabara man baθːa falaaː jadaʕhu aːlkarmu ʔaan jaʁfula walaaː aːlħajaaːʔu ʔaan jakufːa aːlħadijqaau d͡ʒamijlaaun qaaːla lij aːlrːaʃijdu waʔiinːamaaː juqadːimu aːlwaʕda ʔaaħadu rad͡ʒulajni lqd tmt aːlmhmh bnd͡ʒaːħ waħijna jaʃtahij bʕdˤhm mʕtdl  w aːlbʕdˤ aːlʔaːχr mtʃdd kaːn saːmj jtħrːk bbtˤʔu ʔiinːaː ʔaaʕtadnaː lilkaːfirjna salaːsila waʔaaʁlaːlanaː wasaʕjranaː ʁjːr saːmj mlaːbsh lm laː tfʕl ðlk bnfsk waʔaːχiruk d͡ʒijfaaun qaðiraaun walada aːllːahu waʔiinːahum lakaːðibwna watawakːal ʕalaaː aːlʕazjzi aːlrːaħjmi lijasʔaala waːlsˤdq dwaːʔ laː ʔatðkːr ʔajn wdˤʕt mfaːtjħj waqijla lilʕatːaaːbijːi wahuwa jaʔiuwlu ʔin aːstamarːa ʔilaaː fitnaain ʔaaw d͡ʒalaaːʔin faʔaamːaaː aːlqawlu fahuwa tˤijbu aːlkalaaːmi waħusnu aːlbiʃri waaːltːawadːudu bid͡ʒamijli aːlqawli qaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlʔiiħsaaːnu riqːun  waaːlmukaaːfaʔaaau ʕitqun waʔiinːa laka laʔaad͡ʒranaː ʁajra mamnwnin ʔalf saːmj ħjaːth aːlmzdwd͡ʒa ʔilaː ħdː kbjr nhaːja aːlʔasbwʕ kaːn twm dʕmaː kbjraː lj miħanu aːlfataaː juχbirna ʕan fadˤli aːlfataaː kaaːlnːaaːri muχbiraaun bifadˤli aːlʕanbari waqalːamaaː takuwnu miħnaau tkfːl aːlʔisʕaːfjːwn bd͡ʒrwħ saːmj ʔalj bdljl aːlhaːtf ʔaarbaʕaau ʔaaχlaaːqin naaːhijka bihaaː ðamːanaː wahija waʔiin lam jakun lilʔaamri dawaaːmun fafijma aːlsːuruwru aːlsˤːabru dˤijaaːʔun liʔaanːa maaː ħaramahaaː min fiʕli aːltˤːaaːʕaaːti biaːlʕad͡ʒzi waaːldˤːaʕfi ʔaakθaru θawaaːbanaː waʔaaʕðˤamu ʔaad͡ʒranaː walaʕalːa harimanaː ʔaaraaːda ʔaan jadfaʕahumaaː ʕan nafsihi faaːʕtaðara bimaaː qaaːla ʔajn tʕml kamaaː aːstaqarːa ħubːu man bʕd aːlaːstħmaːm litantahija biaːltːadrijd͡ʒi ʔilaaː aːlʁaaːjaai aːlmatˤluwbaai watastaqirːu biaːlrːijaaːdˤaai waaːltːamrijni ʕalaaː aːlħaaːli aːlmaħbuwbaai tˤlb saːmj mn ljlaː ʔan tʕtˤjh rqm haːtfaː radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhumaaː fij qawlh taʕaaːlaaː ʔimːaaː liχawfi ʃarːihi ʔaaw lilːuzuwmi ʔaamrihi waʔaanaaː ʔaanðˤuru ʔilajhi aːljawma falaaː ʔaaraaː ðalika fij wad͡ʒhihi jmknk tdlnj ʕlaː aːltˤrjq aːlmwld blaː ħumːsˤ aːlsˤbaːħ rbaːħ sʔaʕaːwd aːlʔitsˤaːl bk kaːn qlb saːmj tʁmrh aːlsːʕaːda man laː mʕrfa ldjh laː qwa lh rkːzi tfkjrki mʃjt ʔanaː w hw swja waʔiibdaaːʔi aːlʃːuruwri ʕaaːlimun faaːd͡ʒirun wad͡ʒaaːhilun mutaʕabːidun kaaːna ʔaaqbaħa liðikrihi sʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː aːlmzjd mn aːlwqt taʕrifu fj wud͡ʒwhihim nadˤraaa aːlnːaʕjmi ʁjːr saːmj aːlmwdˤwʕ mn aːlmfrwdˤ ʔan jkwn saːmj fj aːlqsm kaːn saːmj jħbː aːlħjaːa aːlmrjħa waqad qaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi kulːamaaː kaθurat χizaaːnu aːlʔaasraaːri aːzdaaːdat dˤajaaːʕanaː tlqːaː saːmj rsaːla sˤwtjːa mn ljlaː hðh aːlrsaːʔil mn jqdˤj saːmj mʕðˤm aːljwm bmfrdh fj aːlmnzl laː lst nʕsaːnaːan ħatːaaː ðˤahara ħasaduhu waaːʃtadːa kamaduhu aːns maː qlth lk lltːw aːlħaːswb d͡ʒdjd wamin ʔaːjaːtihi ʔaan χalaqakum min turaːbin θumːa ʔiiðaː ʔaantum baʃarun tantaʃirwna jad͡ʒnij aːlfalaːaħu aːlqutˤna θumːa ʔaawlaː laka faʔaawlaː ʔarjd aːltːħlːsˤ mnhaː waaːlʔaardˤa wadˤaʕahaː lilʔaanaːmi bqj faːdˤl fj aːlʔaʕlaː ʔaadːaː qdraːan mstʕjrhaː ʔadnaː mn ħbl aːlwrjd karamu aːltˤːabʕi faʔiinːa aːlkarijma musaaːʕidun laː jmknnj ʔan ʔabqaː fj aːlsːrjr tˤjla mdːa hðaː aːlħml ʔaudχil saːmj ʔilaː mstʃfaː llʔamraːdˤ aːlʕqljːa ljs hðaː maː zawd͡ʒaːni waaːlʃːamsu tad͡ʒrj limustaqarːin lahaː ðlika taqdjru aːlʕazjzi aːlʕaljmi wamusaaːmaħaau ʔinkaaːrin liʕusraain bdʔa saːmj jmdˤj wqtaː ʔakθr fj aːlʕml walaqadi aːχtarnaːhum ʕalaː ʕilmin ʕalaaː aːlʕaːlamjna man lam jardˤa biqadˤaaːʔiij wajasˤbir ʕalaaː balaaːʔiij faljaχtar rabːanaː siwaaːja kaːn saːmj naːʔimaː taʕalːamuwaː waʕalːimuwaː faʔiinːa ʔaad͡ʒra aːlʕaaːlimi waaːlmutaʕalːimi sawaaːʔun qdːm faːdˤl daːnja lraːmj saːmj sjttˤjʕ rbtˤ ħðaːʔih dˤmjrj mrtaːħ sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama bajaaːna maaː kaaːna mud͡ʒmalanaː dʕaː saːmj ljlaː llʕjʃ mʕh ʔawl aːlqsˤjda kfr ʔawl nawʕajni waaːχtalafa aːlnːaaːsu fijman sˤarafa fadˤla ʕaqlihi ʔilaaː aːlʃːarːi kazijaaːdin ʔanʃʔa saːmj ʕjaːda mʔuqːta fj aːlqaːhra saːmj ʔaħmq ʕdn ʔilaː kra aːlsːlːa jaʕnij ʔaanːahu kamaaː laaː kunːaː mursiljna kalːaː laʔiin lam jantahi lanasfaʕanaː biaːlnːaːsˤijaai qaːl faːdˤl ʔanːh kaːn jsmʕ ʔasˤwaːtaː fj rʔash lqd dmːr saːmj ħjaːth walwtˤanaː ʔiið qaːla liqawmihi ʔiinːakum lataʔatwna zawaaːd͡ʒirihi lm ʔansk aːlfn jtˤrq baːb aːlχjaːl w aːlχjaːl jftħ baːb aːlʔibdaːʕ hl rʔajt wd͡ʒh mtˤlq aːlnaːr lijasˤila ʔilaaː fadˤijlaai aːlʔaamrajni biaːlmuknaai min aːljasaaːri waaːlʔiiʕsaaːri tˤurd saːmj mn hðh aːlʕjaːda ʔaaw tawad͡ʒːaha ʕalajhi radːun nuwqidˤa ʔanaː wtwm klaːnaː mʃʁwlaːn kaːn saːmj jħtfl lst baːrʕaː fj aːlkðb jaʕnij waaːallːahu ʔaaʕlamu ʔaanːahu jakʃifu ðˤulma aːlħijraai  wajuwadˤːiħu ħaqaaːʔiiqa aːlʔaumuwri faʔiinːahu man aːstawʕaba aːlħalaaːla taaːqat nafsuhu ʔilaaː aːlħaraaːmi ðaːkrt saːʕa wakaaːna tˤabʕuhu ʔilajhi maaːʔiilanaː lijanfija ʕanhu wajukfaaːhu wajaslamu min dˤararihi waʕadaaːwatihi dχl saːmj ʔilaː aːlmstʃfaː jsˤaːħb aːlbrq aːlrʕd ʕaːda saaːlibaaːtu aːlfadˤaaːʔiili waaːltˤːajra maħʃwraaan kulːun lahu ʔaawːaːbun ʔijːaaːka wakaθraaa aːldˤːaħiki faʔiinːahu jumijtu aːlqalba wajuðhibu binuwri aːlwad͡ʒhi waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlʔaudabaaːʔi aːlbaχijlu lajsa lahu χalijlun aːlʔinsaːn jraː ʕjwb nfsh bʕjwn ʁjrh fqtˤ wajuqilːu halaʕahu kaːn faːdˤl jħbː kasaba wataraktum ʕalajhi maaː aːktasaba kaːn ʕlaː saːmj ʔan jðhb ʔilaː aːlmdrsa jrjd saːmj ʔan jbjʕ klbh mn fsˤjla aːlʃːjbaː ʔijnw ʔin kaːnt θmːa tˤrjqa lʔastmtʕ baːldraːsa hlːaː ʔaχbrtnj ʕnhaː famaː waːlʃrf kulːu nafsin ðaːʔiiqaau aːlmawti θumːa ʔiilajnaː turd͡ʒaʕwna min qawlik ʔaan tuχtˤiʔia walimiθli ðalika qaaːlat aːlħukamaaːʔu wqf saːmj ʔamaːm aːlnːaːfða lqd χudʕ saːmj mn tˤrf ʔabjh kaːlħaːdj wljs lh bʕjr wamutasalːitˤun ðˤaluwmun χð aːlkrsj aːlʔaːχr waqad qaaːla aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː laaː tulquwaː aːld͡ʒawhara lilχinzijri faaːlʕilmu ʔaafdˤalu min aːllːuʔuluʔui fij aːlʁanami simanuhaaː maʕaaːʃun sˤrːħ aːlʔatˤbːaːʔ ʔanː ljlaː kaːnt ttʕaːfaː mn srtˤaːnhaː wataʃʁalu aːlqalba falam janfi ʕanhaaː qabijħanaː walam jahdi ʔilajhaaː ħasananaː ʔajːhaː aːlʔaħmq kjf td͡ʒrʔu ʕlaː sˤfʕj walam aːlrːaðaaːʔiili ʔaʃaːr ʔan tnfjð aːlχtˤa sjklf aːlkθjr mn aːlmaːl aːiftarasa aːlðːiʔibu kabʃanaː bal naħnu maħrwmwna χuðhu baːlmwt ħtaː jrdˤaː baːlħumaːaː χðw aːlħkma mn ʔafwaːh aːlbstˤaːʔ bismi raswlun mubjnun wawasˤːaaː baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi aːbnahu faqaaːla waqaaːla taʕaaːlaaː ʔiilːaː ʔiibljsa aːstakbara wakaːna mina aːlkaːfirjna ʔanaː ʔaʕjʃ mn ʔad͡ʒl ʔasrtj waħulmu aːlnːijaaːmi qaːl saːmj ʔanː ʔibljs hw mn ʔamrh baːltːdˤħja bljlaː waaːltamasa barijʔianaː min nabwaain lm tðkr ʔilaː ʔajn ðhbt ʔaraːd saːmj ʔan ttrkh ljlaː w ʃʔanh waaːlːaðjna jad͡ʒtanibwna kabaːʔiira aːlʔiiθmi waaːlfawaːħiʃa waʔiiðaː maː ʁadˤibwaː hum jaʁfirwna hðh hj aːlmmθːla ljlaː baːkr aːltd͡ʒrba aːlʕlm aːlkbjr aːtːsˤl aːlmdrːs bwaːldjː d͡ʒazaːʔan min rabːika ʕatˤaːʔan ħisaːbanaː maaː jukadːiru birːahu naːrun ħaːmijaaun jaaː bunajːa nafsij matˤijːatij waʔaakrahu ʔaan ʔautʕibahaaː falaaː taquwma bij laː tns ʔan tħdˤr saːndwjʃaː mn fdˤlk wahaðaaː miθlu qawlihi sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama fij manaaːkiħi aːlʔaːdamijːijna qurʔat lsaːmj ħqwqh walilmuʕsiri duwnahu ʔatʕrfaːn bʕdˤkmaː d͡ʒaʕala aːltˤːijaraaa ʕuðra χajbatihi limaaː fij aːlmatˤli min takdijri aːlsˤːanijʕi watamħijqi aːlʃːukri laː tns mʕtˤfk ðhbt ʔilaː aːlħdjqa ʔaχʃaː ʔanː aːlʔatˤbːaːʔ lm jtmkːnwaː mn tʃχjsˤ mrdˤ saːmj kaːn jtsˤrːf bʃkl ʁrjb maaː qaaːla aːlʃːaaːʕiru laː tns ʔanːnj rd͡ʒl waman lam jakun minhum bimawdˤiʕi rahbaain walaaː raʁbaain aːstahaaːnuwaː bihi wawasˤafa baʕdˤu aːlʃːuʕaraaːʔi qawmanaː faqaaːla kaːn saːmj mslmaː tʕbt ljlaː mn aːlaːntðˤaːr waːd͡ʒh saːmj ljlaː bʃʔan aːlħml lmaːðaː ʁurst tlk aːlʔaʃd͡ʒaːr wstˤ mwqf aːlsːjːaːraːt ðlk walahu aːld͡ʒawaːri aːlmunʃaʔaːtu fij aːlbaħri kaaːlʔaaʕlaːmi kaːn saːmj tˤflaː mʕrːdˤaː llχtˤr waqad ruwija ʕan ʕalijːi bni ʔaabij tˤaaːlibin radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu ʔaanːahu qaaːla ʔaljst swdaːʔ waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlbulaʁaaːʔi man baðala maaːlahu ʔaadraka ʔaːmaaːlahu ʔiinːa hʔuulaːʔi juħibːwna aːlʕaːd͡ʒilaaa wajaðarwna waraːʔahum jawmanaː θaqjlanaː liʔaanːa haðaaː min sˤifaaːti aːlħamijri td͡ʒmːʕwaː ħwl naːr aːlmχjːm ʕndmaː tsˤfːr aːlsˤːfːaːra ʕlaː aːld͡ʒmjʕ ʔan jtwqːf ʕn maː jfʕlh w jstmʕ ʕaːdt mn aːlmktba faaːsd͡ʒudwaː lilːahi waaːʕbudwaː kaːn ldjː mdrːs mtʕsːf θumːa tamaθːala aːlʔaaħnafu biqawli aːlʔaaʕwari aːlʃːanːijːu klːmh w aːtˤlb mnh ʔan jʕwd ħadaːʔiiqa waʔaaʕnaːbanaː fij aːlsːamaaːʔi nud͡ʒuwmun laːamiʕaaun aːʕtqd aːn twm jħtaːd͡ʒ aːn jrjh aːħdhm kjf jfʕl ðlk waaːʁfir liʔaabj ʔiinːahu kaːna mina aːldˤːaːlːjna nʃʔa saːmj kmsjħjː mʕmdaːnj stbqaː blaː ʕml waʔaazlafnaː θamːa aːlʔaːχarjna kaːn saːmj jqdˤj wqtaː fj aːlʕjaːda mʕ mmrːdˤa mutːakiʔijna ʕalaː rafrafin χudˤrin waʕabqarijːin ħisaːnin watakθijrun jakuwnu haðranaː w ʔaχjraː wd͡ʒdthaː qaːlt ljlaː lsaːmj ʔanːhaː stqtlh ʔaamːaaː aːlmamnuwʕu faliʔaanːahu qad fadˤːala ʕalajhi man siwaaːhu wataħkijmuhaaː daaːʕin ʔilaaː salaaːtˤatihaaː wafasaaːdi aːlʔaaχlaaːqi bihaaː ʔaanːak ʔiðaaː ʃakːaktahu fijhi taʃakːaka ħatːaaː jakaaːda jard͡ʒiʕu fijhi walaaː jud͡ʒijbu ʔilːaaː ʕunfanaː ʔaalːaː taziru waːziraaun wizra ʔauχraː walaaː jaχluw fijmaaː ʔaataaːhu min ʔaarbaʕi ʔaaħwaaːlin waaːstarðaluwaː ʔaahlahu kalːaː ʔiinːaː χalaqnaːhum mimːaː jaʕlamwna aːlmisˤbaaːħu mutːaqidun waqad biaːlʕurfi waʔaaʕridˤ ʕan aːld͡ʒaaːhilijna ʔalm tns ʃjʔiaː watad͡ʒaaːwaza qadrahu aːʕtqd saːmj ʔanː hðaː kaːn mfjdaː lh ʔaaw majlin jakuwnu ʕan ʔihmaaːlin wamaː jaʔatjhim min nabijːin ʔiilːaː kaːnwaː bihi jastahziʔiwna waʔaanʃadanij baʕdˤu ʔaahli aːlʔaadabi haðihi aːlʔaabjaaːti lm jsbq lsaːmj w ʔan rʔaaː tˤbjbaː fj ħjaːth rdː saːmj fabalaʁa maaː ʔaaħabːa min ʔiχfaaːʔi nafsihi wasˤadaqa fij χabarihi kjf td͡ʒd aːʕtnaːqk llʔislaːm waqad qaaːla aːbnu aːlsːamːaaːki dʕmkm mqdr waʔaamːaaː aːlmuʕtˤij ʔiðaaː aːltamasa biʕatˤaaːʔiihi aːld͡ʒazaaːʔa aːlʔaːχrwn ʕlaː wsˤwl aːlfasˤlu aːlsːaaːdisu fij ʔiinːahu laː juħibːu aːlkaːfirjna wajakufːa ʕan aːlðˤːulmi wataʔaalːufahaaː biaːlmuqaaːrabaai waaːlmusaaːhalaai ʔinː aːlħjaːa laː tbdʔa w tnthj bsaːmj kaːn saːmj ðaːhbaː ʔilaː aːlqaːhra kj jmdˤj bʕdˤ kθjraːan waaːlmuqaaːbalaau takuwnu min wad͡ʒhajni waʔiinːaka laʕalaː χuluqin ʕaðˤjmin tusˤnaʕu aːlʔaaħðijaaa mina aːld͡ʒaldi ʔaðːn saːmj lqd ʔanqðt ljlaː ħjaːa saːmj liʔaanːa maaː taradːada bajna ʔaamrajni faaːlmuraaːdu minhu aːliaːʕtiraaːdˤu ʕalaaː fasaaːdihi waʔiirʃaaːdi aːlʕibaaːdi fij qasmi aːlmanaaːfiʕi bajnahum ħaːrb ʕdwk baːlslaːħ aːlðj jχʃaːh laː baːlslaːħ aːlðj tχʃaːh hl tʕrf kjf tlʕb kra aːlqdm ʕud ʔilaaː qitaaːli ʕaduwːi aːllːahi walakinːahaaː zalːaaun min zalːaaːti rdːt ljlaː saːmj waaːlsˤːaaːdːu ʕan ðalika ʔaan jaraaː ʔaːθaaːra aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː fij aːlðˤːaaːlimijna faʔiinːa saːmj mn aːlʃːrtˤa ʔan tdʕh w ʃʔanh kaːn saːmj fj ħfl warawaaː ʃahru bnu ħawʃabin ʕan ʔaabij ʔaumaaːmaaa qaaːla saːmj bʕjd ʕn aːlχtˤr aːlwaladu marijdˤun man aːstaʁnaaː biaːallːahi aːktafaaː lm jkn saːmj jʕrf kjf jsˤbħ mslmaː ʕnd aːlnaːzla tʕrf ʔaχaːk hnaːk aːlʕdjd mn aːld͡ʒaːmʕaːt fj kjwtw waʔaarsalnaːhu ʔiilaː miaːʔiaai ʔaalfin ʔaaw jazjdwna wakaðlika ħaqːat kalimatu rabːika ʕalaaː aːlːaðjna kafarwaː ʔaanːahum ʔaasˤħaːbu aːlnːaːri hðh tfaːħa ʔajdˤaːan aːntðˤr saːmj lstːa ʔajːaːm snd͡ʒls w nntðˤr ʔaraːd saːmj aːlʕjʃ fj bld ʔislaːmj qm btnsˤjb ljnks waʔaubːahaaa aːlmustaqilːijna wsˤl ʔaχjraː ʔiinːa aːllːaha jaʕlamu maː jadʕwna min dwnihi min ʃajʔin wahuwa aːlʕazjzu aːlħakjmu mʃjt mʕh sʔasaːʕdk fj tnðˤjfh laː tns aːlwsˤl tmː aːħtd͡ʒaːz ljlaː mn ʔad͡ʒl ʕlaːd͡ʒhaː walaw ʔaanːahum sˤabarwaː ħatːaː taχrud͡ʒa ʔiilajhim lakaːna χajranaː lahum waaːllːahu ʁafwrun raħjmun liʔaanːa maaː jaʔatijhi biaːltˤːabʕi min ʁajri takalːufin aːlʔibtsaːma klma mʕrwf mn ʁjr ħrwf waaːlbuʔusu marðalaaun maː rʔajki tamahːal fij aːlsːajri ʕani aːlnːabaʔii aːlʕaðˤjmi sʔaqwm bʁsl aːlsˤħwn bmaː ʔank tˤbχta waʔiiðaː quriʔia ʕalajhimu aːlqurʔaːnu laː jasd͡ʒudwna walaʔiin jafʕala maaː lam jaqul ʔaad͡ʒmalu min ʔaan jaquwla maaː lam jafʕal haðaaː hal jakuwnu mansuwbanaː ʔilaaː aːlsːaχaaːʔi fajuħmadu  ʔaaw χaaːrid͡ʒanaː ʕanhu fajuðamːu faaːlmulqijaːti ðikranaː lan tanfaʕakum ʔaarħaːmukum walaː ʔaawlaːdukum jawma aːlqijaːmaai jafsˤilu bajnakum waaːllːahu bimaː taʕmalwna basˤjrun ʔaaħfaðˤu aːldːarsa lm ʔakn ʔanwi ʔan ʔaχbrh hw jdrs aːlʔind͡ʒljzjːa twm jʕrf ʕljh aːlmʁaːdra lqd aːstjqðˤ saːmj ʔaχjraː mn ʁjbwbth waʔaamaaːnun min aːlmalaaːmaai jwsf aːlsˤdjq kaːn saːmj mdrːsaː mħtrmaː d͡ʒdːaː lqd sˤfʕth fj aːlwd͡ʒh waqaaːla aːlʃːaʕbijːu maaː ʔaadrakt ʔaumːij θumːa tuʔuawːalu ʔilaaː taqaaːtˤuʕi aːlmutawaaːsˤilijna  watabaaːʁudˤi hl maː zaːl ðlk aːlħljb sˤaːlħaːan llʃrb walaaː takun ʕabda ʁajrik waqad d͡ʒaʕalak aːllːahu ħurːanaː wamuħasːinaau aːlqabaaːʔiiħi smʕt waːldtj tʁnj fj aːlħmaːm liʔaanːa aːlʃːuħːa jamnaʕu min ʔaadaaːʔi aːlħuquwqi ʃadːa ʕalajhi barðaʕaaan fajasijru fajalqaaː aːlrːad͡ʒula fajaquwlu aːltˤːarijqu qad d͡ʒaaːʔa aːlʔaamijru lahum fjhaː faːkihaaun walahum maː jadːaʕwna laː trtdi ħðaːʔaː fj aːlmsd͡ʒd hw jθjraː ʔaʕsˤaːbj ħqːaː wajatˤwfu ʕalajhim ʁilmaːnun lahum kaʔaanːahum luʔuluʔuun maknwnun walilːahi mulku aːlsːamaːwaːti waaːlʔaardˤi jaʁfiru liman jaʃaːʔu wajuʕaðːibu man jaʃaːʔu wakaːna aːllːahu ʁafwranaː raħjmanaː fahuwa ʔaan laaː jaqnaʕa biaːlkifaaːjaai wajatˤluba aːlzːijaaːdaaa waaːlkaθraaa kaːn saːmj ʔaːtjanaː mn hnaːk waħwrun ʕjnun kaːn saːmj jlkm ljlaː ħtːaː ʕndmaː kaːnt ħaːmlaː bʕdːa ʔaʃhr warubːamaaː tawahːama baʕdˤu man χalaaː min fadˤlin kaːn saːmj jʕlm ʔanː ljlaː lm tkn fj χtˤr fasˤaaːra bihaðihi aːlnːisbaai min aːlmaʕluwmaaːti aːlfikrijːaai hðh aːlsjaːra tħtaːd͡ʒ lʔisˤlaːħ qijla ʔaafajakuwnu kaðːaaːbanaː  qaaːla laaː fʔin qljl aːlħb baːlʕql sˤaːlħ wʔin kθjr aːlħb baːld͡ʒhl faːsd laː ʔadrj ʔajn mwqf aːlbaːsˤ ʔiin hðaː ʔiilːaː qawlu aːlbaʃari lm jkn saːmj jkrh aːlmslmjn ʔiið d͡ʒaːʔa rabːahu biqalbin saljmin ʔasˤbħt ljlaː aːlʔaːn mmrːdˤa χaːsˤːa ln nnsaːhm ʔabdaː salaːmun qawlanaː min rabːin raħjmin aːʕtrft ljlaː ʔanːhaː tχaːsˤmt mʕ zwd͡ʒhaː saːmj fj aːljwm aːlðj aːχtfaː fjh ʕrːdˤ saːmj nfsh lχtˤr aːlkʃf jasbaħu aːlʁulaːamu fij aːlnːahri laː jmkn ʔan jkwn ðlk sˤħjħaːan mn aːlmstħjl ʔan jtʕlːm aːlmrʔa aːlsːbaːħa bdrws mraːsla aːllːʁa aːlʔalbaːnjːa d͡ʒmjla d͡ʒdːaː tˤlb saːmj mn ljlaː ʔan tʕtˤjh rqmhaː waaːllːajli ʔiiðaː ʕasʕasa tʔaχrt bsbb zħma aːltˤrjq aːlʃdjda faqaaːla lilmutawakːili bihi ʔaan jaʕtamida maaː aːd͡ʒtarama min kabaaːʔiirihi waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi liaːbnihi hal ʃajʔun χajrun min aːlðːahabi waaːlfidˤːaai  qaaːla hʔulaːʔ aːlθlaːθa bnaːth χalaqa aːllːahu aːlsːamaːwaːti mawdˤwʕaaun χurid͡ʒti kaj ʔaatanazːaha waqad ʔaanʃadanij baʕdˤu ʔaahli hðaː aːlqaːmws ʔafdˤl mn ðaːk wd͡ʒdt lh ʕmlaː jatanaqːalu kaθijranaː fij daaːrihi min makaaːn ʔilaaː makaaːn wajunʃidu qawla ʔaabij aːlʕataaːhijaai waman lam jatanaaːha tˤalabuhu aːstadaaːma kadːuhu wataʕabuhu wasˤuhajbun kaaːna ʔaatˤawʕa lilːahi subħaaːnahu wataʕaaːlaaː min ʔaan jakuwna bihaðihi aːlmanzilaai aːlːaðjna hum ʕan sˤalaːtihim saːhwna lqd ħsːn aːld͡ʒhaːz kaːn saːmj jħbː ʔaflaːm aːlʔakʃn lqd kaːd ʔan jfqd saːmj ħjaːth mn jtʔalm ʔakθr sjʕrf ʔakθr ʔasˤʕd saːmj naːfðth lw tzwːd͡ʒt bʔamːhaː lmaː dχlt mstʃfaː baːlsːd͡ʒn aːlmʔubːd wakafːu aːlnːafsi ʕan haðihi aːlħaaːli bimaaː jasˤudːuhaaː min aːlzːawaaːd͡ʒiri ʔaaslamu wahuwa biðawij aːlmuruwʔaai ʔaad͡ʒmalu waaːstakbara huwa wad͡ʒunwduhu fij aːlʔaardˤi waʔaaqbala baʕdˤuhum ʕalaː baʕdˤin jatasaːʔalwna waʔiinːaː lad͡ʒamjʕun ħaːðirwna taaːllːahi ʔiin kunːaː lafj dˤalaːlin mubjnin watakuwnu ʕuqbanaː ʔiðaaː mitːa bajːana lahaaː maaː taʔatij min aːlχajri wataðaru min aːlʃːarːi qaaːluwaː samiʕnaaː waʕasˤajnaaː waʔauʃribuwaː fij quluwbihimu aːlʕid͡ʒla bikufrihim fadawlaau aːld͡ʒaaːhili min aːlmumkinaaːti  wadawlaau aːlʕaaːqili min aːlwaaːd͡ʒibaaːti aːlħirsˤu waaːlʃːarahu wasuwʔu aːlðˤːanːi wamanʕu aːlħuquwqi qalijla aːlħijlaai ʔaħbt ʃaːbaː ʔasˤʁr mnhaː snaː saːʕdnaː bʕdˤnaː waqasːama muʕaaːwijaau radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu qitˤaaːfanaː faʔaaʕtˤaaː jasmaʕwna ʔin aːlʔardˤja aːlχʃbja d͡ʒmjla ʔaan juħsina ʔilajnaaː aːltːawfijqa fijmaaː manaħa tzdaːd aːlħwaːdθ jwmaːan bʕd jwm waaːlʔiisʕaaːfu fij aːlnːawaaːʔiibi nawʕaaːni waaːd͡ʒibun watabarːuʕun dˤmːnj ʔilaː sˤdrh kaːn nfs saːmj tfwħ mnh raːʔiħa aːlkħwl ʔiðaaː aːtːasaʕtu tazajːanat biaːld͡ʒuwdi wadˤarabahum biaːlfaaːqaai waaːlfaqri wamalaʔaa quluwbahum ruʕbanaː kaaːalːaðij ħukija ʕan aːbni waaːlmanʕa ʔiðaaː kaaːnaaː liʁajri ʕilːaain ʔaafdˤajaaː ʔilaaː ðamːi aːlmamnuwʕi ʔanaː laː ʔantqdk kaːn saːmj msjħjːaː qbl ʔan jʕtnq aːlʔislaːm kaːn saːmj jtklːm mʕ ljlaː laaː tazuwlu qadamaaː aːbni ʔaːdama ħatːaaː jusʔaala ʕan θalaaːθin kaðːabat qawmu lwtˤin aːlmursaljna lqd wdˤʕt hðaː aːlmwqʕ fj mfdˤlaːtj kaðːabat qablahum qawmu nwħin waʕaːdun wafirʕawnu ðuw aːlʔaawtaːdi laː jʕrf ʔaħd aːsmh hðihi aːlnːaːru aːlːatj kuntum bihaː tukaðːibwna waraaːbatˤuwaː fijhi taʔawijlaaːni jʕml saːmj fj ʕjaːda mħlːjːa lm jsmʕ ʔaħd ʕn saːmj mnð aːld͡ʒmʕa sˤbaːħaː χaːfidˤaaun raːfiʕaaun watasˤawːuruhu lhðh aːldːrd͡ʒa waχalaqa aːllːahu aːlsːamaːwaːti waaːlʔaardˤa biaːlħaqːi walitud͡ʒzaː kulːu nafsin bimaː kasabat wahum laː juðˤlamwna aːsˤtˤħb saːmj ljlaː ʔilaː ʕjaːda ʔiʕaːda tʔahjl waʔaanʃada aːlʔaasˤmaʕijːu ʔaħbː saːmj hðaː aːlmkaːn ʔatt ljlaː w aːsˤtˤħbtnj walaqad dˤarabnaː lilnːaːsi fj hðaaː aːlqurʔaːni min kulːi maθalin laʕalːahum jataðakːarwna wafij aːltːawraaːai liʔaanːa aːlʔaadˤraaːra bihaaː ʔaaʕamːu kaːnt ljlaː ftaːa mʃhwra fj aːlθːaːnwjːa maː aːlðj ħmlhaː ʕlaː fʕl ʃjʔ khðaː walajsa ʕatˤabun ʔilːaaː wahija lahu sababun  waʕalajhi ʔaalabːu laː tns ʔan tfkːr qbl bdʔa aːlħdjθ mn ðaːk aːlrd͡ʒl saːmj mslm mnð stː snwaːt fadaʕ maaː jarijbuk ʔilaaː maaː laaː jarijbuk walajsa fijmaaː ʔaafdˤaaː ʔilaaː waaːħidin minhumaaː χajrun jurd͡ʒaaː wahuwa d͡ʒadijrun ʔaan jakuwna ʃarːanaː jutːaqaaː maːhj χtˤtˤk ljwm aːlʔaħd ʔinːa aːlbalaaːʔa muwakːalun biaːlmantˤiqi twqf ʕn mħaːwla ʔibhaːd͡ʒj lqd aːknʃf aːlʔad͡ʒwba bnfsh waaːlħalijmu ʔilːaaː fij aːlʁadˤabi walaaː tamjijzun limustaħiqːin ʔiðaː ʕurifa aːlsbb btˤl aːlʕd͡ʒb hw lm jkn mdrːsj laaː ʔaaraaːk aːllːahu makruwhanaː tnaːwlt tˤʕaːm aːlftˤwr aːlsaːʕa aːlsaːbʕa w aːlnsˤf sˤbaːħaːan waaːlθːaaːliθi ħajaaːʔuuhu min nafsihi fakaaːna ðalika ʔaaʃrafa lilbaaːðili ʔant tʕlm ʔanːj ʔaħbːh ʔaljs kðlk walafaqijhun waaːħidun ʔaaʃadːu ʕalaaː aːlʃːajtˤaaːni min ʔaalfi ʕaaːbidin lim ʔaʕlam kam sajatˤwlu aːlʔid͡ʒtimaːʕ hl ðhbt ʔilaː aːlmtd͡ʒr wasˤaaːra aːlħilmu mudabːiranaː lilʔaumuwri aːlmuʁdˤibaai biqadrin laaː jaʕtarijhi naqsˤun biʕadami aːlʁadˤabi ʔaʕd͡ʒbt tlk aːlqsˤːa saːmj ʔinh mwd͡ʒwd fj aːlbjt aːlʔaːn jaaː rasuwla aːllːahi ʔaadʕu lij biaːlmaʁfiraai faʔaaðina lahu aːlʕaaːlimu waaːd͡ʒtinaaːʔi aːlʔaawzaaːri fij muχaaːlafatihi sʔaqaːtl ħtaː aːlnfs aːlʔaχjr θumːa ʕafawnaaː ʕankum min baʕdi ðaaːlika laʕalːakum taʃkuruwna rʔaaː saːmj ljlaː fj aːlʕjaːda biʔaanːa rabːaka ʔaawħaː lahaː tuqalːabu fij aːlħadˤari min ʁajri qilːaain walaaː safarin waʔaabsˤir fasawfa jubsˤirwna kaːnt d͡ʒθːa saːmj aːlhaːmda ttˤfw fj aːlmsbħ aːlχatˤaʔau fij ʔiʕtˤaaːʔi maaː laaː janbaʁij wamanʕu maaː janbaʁij waaːħidun tfaːd͡ʒʔat zwd͡ʒtj qaːla rabːu aːlmaʃriqi waaːlmaʁribi wamaː bajnahumaː ʔiin kuntum taʕqilwna sʔaːχðk ʔilaː mkaːn ʔaːmn ʕaːml aːlnaːs bmaː tħb ʔan jʕaːmlwk bh ðˤulma aːlʁadˤabi waqaaːla d͡ʒaʕfaru bnu muħamːadin aːlfitnaau ħasˤaaːdun lilðˤːaaːlimajni mutːakiʔijna ʕalajhaː mutaqaːbiljna aːlːaðj χalaqaka fasawːaːka faʕadalaka :  liʔaanːahu kaaːna d͡ʒaaːhilanaː ʔaːkj hw klbj kaːn saːmj jħbː ʔan jtbaːhaː faaːltamasahaaː aːlnːaaːsu fawad͡ʒaduwhaaː  faqaaːluwaː lahu qad radːa aːllːahu raaːħilatak fasˤalːi waqaaːla d͡ʒaʕfaru bnu muħamːadin ʔiin jwħaː ʔiilajːa ʔiilːaː ʔaanːamaː ʔaanaː naðjrun mubjnun waqaaːluwaː quluwbunaaː ʁulfun bal laʕanahumu aːllːahu bikufrihim faqalijlanaː maaː juʔuminuwna aːsmʕi lj jaː ljlaː sˤafwaaːna ʔinːij laʔaafraħu biʔiifaaːdatij aːlmutaʕalːima ʔaakθara min faraħij biaːstifaaːdatij min aːlmuʕalːimi waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi χajru aːlmizaaːħi laaː junaaːlu  waʃarːuhu laaː juqaaːlu liʔaanːa aːlʕaaːdaaa tˤabʕun θaaːnin ʁdˤb aːld͡ʒaːhl fj qwlh wʁdˤb aːlʕaːql fj fʕlh aːlʔamjn laː tχwnh waːlχaːʔin laː tʔamnh snqtlk srqt ljlaː saːmj ʕlaː saːmj ʔan jhtmː bʃʔuwnh qul lilːaðjna ʔaːmanwaː jaʁfirwaː lilːaðjna laː jard͡ʒwna ʔaajːaːma aːllːahi lijad͡ʒzija qawmanaː bimaː kaːnwaː jaksibwna saːmj laː jrjd aːlχsˤaːm walaaː juhmiluhu θiqaaan biqudratihi ʕalajhi ʔiʕzf lj mqtˤwʕa lʃwbaːn naːdaː saːmj klː aːlqsm bʕbaːra "ʔaʁbjaːʔ" kaːn saːmj tˤbjbaː jtqaːdˤaː raːtbaː mʕtbraː w jtmtːʕ bsmʕa d͡ʒjːda wamaː jastawij aːlʔaaʕmaː waaːlbasˤjru ʔið lajsa jaraaː qadˤaaːʔa aːllːahi ʕadlanaː waʔaaʕqabahu aːltːawakːulu nadama aːlχaaːʔiibijna ʔajː nwʕ mn aːlrːd͡ʒaːl ʔant ʔaan jatˤluba minhaaː qadra kifaaːjatihi qul huwa aːlːaðj ʔaanʃaʔaakum wad͡ʒaʕala lakumu aːlsːamʕa waaːlʔaabsˤaːra waaːlʔaafʔiidaaa qaljlanaː maː taʃkurwna faqaaːla lahu ʕumaru radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu wakaaːna baʕdˤu muluwki aːltˤːawaaːʔiifi ʔiðaaː ʁadˤiba ʔaulqija ʕindahu mafaaːtijħu turabi aːlmuluwki fajazuwlu ʁadˤabuhu waqaaːla mud͡ʒaaːhidun knt mhddaː qaaːla min ʔaajːi ʕaqijlin  qaaːla min banij χafaaːd͡ʒaaa waʔiiðaaː aːld͡ʒaħjmu suʕːirat waqalːamaaː tad͡ʒidu miθlahu malħuwðˤanaː ʔaaw mumawːalanaː maħðˤuwðˤanaː aːlsˤjn dwla kbjra d͡ʒdaːan qaːl sananðˤuru ʔasˤdqt ʔam knt mn aːlkaːðbjn wanafsuhu ʔilajhi munqaaːdaaun saːmj ʔaːmn mn aːlχtˤr waman d͡ʒaːʔa biaːlsːajːiʔiaai fakubːat wud͡ʒwhuhum fij aːlnːaːri hal tud͡ʒzawna ʔiilːaː maː kuntum taʕmalwna ʔiinːahu kaːna laː juʔuminu biaːllːahi aːlʕaðˤjmi ʔiinːa aːlsːaːʕaaa laʔaːtijaaun laː rajba fjhaː walkinːa ʔaakθara aːlnːaːsi laː juʔuminwna ʔiðaaː ʔaaħsant aːlqawla faʔaaħsin aːlfiʕla lm jlbθ saːmj w ʔan ʕlm ʔanː frjd ʃχsˤ χtˤjr d͡ʒdːaː ʔaʕlm ʔanːnj ln ʔansaːk ʔabdaː ʔaχð ʔaχth mʕh hnaːk sbb ʔaːχr waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi ʔaasˤliħ nafsak linafsik jakun aːlnːaaːsu tabaʕanaː lak waqaaːla aːlfadˤlu bnu sahlin lirad͡ʒulin saʔaalahu ħaaːd͡ʒaaan tabsˤiraaan waðikraː likulːi ʕabdin munjbin ʔaχbr saːmj ljlaː ʔanːh aːntðˤr ħjaːth klːhaː kj jqaːbl ftaːa mθlh stwaːd͡ʒh aːlʔaswʔ ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː ʔisʕaːfaːt ʔawlja kaːnt mlaːbs saːmj mltˤːχa bdm ljlaː qaaːluwaː aːlʔaːna d͡ʒiʔita biaːlħaqːi faðabaħuwhaaː wamaaː kaaːduwaː jafʕaluwna waqaaːla aːbnu sijrijna aːlkalaaːmu ʔaawsaʕu min ʔaan jusˤarːaħa fijhi biaːlkaðibi ħalabat aːlfataaːau aːlbaqaraaa kaːn saːmj mdrːsaː bwðjːaː waʕaðˤuma fijhaaː χatˤaruhu aːlrjaːdˤa d͡ʒjda lsˤħtk ʔataː saːmj ʔilaː aːlmsd͡ʒd qbl aːlʔaðaːn waaːlrːahbaaa takufːu ʕan aːlmaʕsˤijaai aːstdaː saːmj mlaːbs zwd͡ʒth wafij aːlsːamaːʔi rizqukum wamaː twʕadwna man kaaːnat wilaaːjatuhu fawqa qudraain takabːara lahaaː ʃʕrt ljlaː ʔanːhaː turkt rbħ saːmj bʕdˤ aːlmaːl mn td͡ʒaːra qaːm bhaː fj aːlsːwq aːlsːwdaːʔ aːtbʕ tlk aːlsjaːra kaːn saːmj nwr ħjaːa ljlaː wawaqaʕa aːlfadˤlu bnu sahlin ʕalaaː qisˤːaai saaːʕin saʕaaː ʔilajhi saːmj jqrʕ ʕlaː baːb ljlaː kaːn saːmj jʕrf sˤwt ljlaː jrjd saːmj ʔan jtqdːm fj ħjaːth fabalaʁa ðalika muʕaaːwijaaa faqaaːla faʔaamːaaː fj ttwjbaː mljwn d͡ʒmla bnhaːja aːlsna wjwm jnaːdjhm fjqwl ʔajn ʃrkaːʔij aːlðjn kntm tzʕmwn hw mʔurχ ʔajn tqʕ ʕjaːdth  faʔiinːa kawaaːmina aːlʔaaχlaaːqi baaːdijaaun fij aːlsˤːuwari waaːlʔaaʃkaaːli sntħdθ ħwl ðlk ʁdaːan maː qlth hw mħdˤ hraːʔ jaː ʔajhaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː aːtqwaː aːllh wkwnwaː mʕ aːlsˤaːdqjn χrbʃwaː fj kraːsj θm qjl lhm ʔajn maː kntm tʃrkwn ʔaalːaaː tatːabiʕani ʔaafaʕasˤajta ʔaamrij waaːðkur ʕibaaːdanaaː ʔiibraaːhijma waʔiisħaaːqa wajaʕquwba ʔauwlij aːlʔaajdij waaːlʔaabsˤaaːri hlːaː ʔaqrrt aːqtraːħj  wlaː nklf nfsaː ʔilaː wsʕhaː wldjnaː ktaːb jntˤq baːlħq whm laː jðˤlmwn qd sˤdqt aːlrʔujaː ʔinaː kðlk nd͡ʒzj aːlmħsnjn ʔaqdːr nsˤjħtk d͡ʒdaːan wlqd sˤrfnaː fj hðaː aːlqrʔaːn ljðkrwaː wmaː jzjdhm ʔilaː nfwraː dʕnaː nnhj aːlwðˤjfa fadaʕaaː rabːahu ʔaanːij maʁluwbun faaːntasˤir ql ʔinmaː ʔadʕw rbj wlaː ʔaʃrk bh ʔaħdaː ʔanaː sʕjd min ʔad͡ʒlihaː aːnhaːr sʕr aːllħm hl aːstmtʕt bmʃaːhda aːlflm  waʕilmin naaːfiʕin jastahdij bihi man dˤalːa θm ʔaʁrqnaː bʕd aːlbaːqjn ljkfr aːllh ʕnhm ʔaswʔa aːlðj ʕmlwaː wjd͡ʒzjhm ʔad͡ʒrhm bʔaħsn aːlðj kaːnwaː jʕmlwn maː hw d͡ʒjd lk d͡ʒjd lj ʔajdˤaː hðaː aːlʃaːj d͡ʒjd tˤrʔat kθjr mn aːltʁjraːt ʕlaː aːlmd͡ʒtmʕ mʔuχranaː hðaː bjaːn llnaːs whdaː wmwʕðˤa llmtqjn ʔilːaaː ʔaasaaːʔa aːlʕamala libuʕdi himːatihi ʔasˤħjħ ʔan aːlʔawrwbjjn laː jstħmwn kl jwm  nsbħ fj aːlbħr ðhb llmnzl ʕlj rd͡ʒlh waʕindahum qaaːsˤiraaːtu aːltˤːarfi ʕijnun kθjraːan maː tʃrb ʔaχtj aːlkbraː aːlʃaːj baːlħljb aːʕtˤnj frsˤa ʔajn aːlqiʃda  mtaː bdʔata draːsa aːllʁa aːlaːnd͡ʒljzja  θumːa ʔaadbara jasʕaaː waliðalika qijla aːlʕulamaaːʔu ʁurabaaːʔu likaθraai aːld͡ʒuhːaaːli hl ʔant daːʔimaː fj aːlmnzl fj aːlmsaːʔ  ʔanti ʔimjlj naːdranaː maː jhdj zwd͡ʒth waʔiinːa aːlːaðijna laaː juʔuminuwna biaːlʔaːχiraai ʕani aːlsˤːiraaːtˤi lanaaːkibuwna lm jtwqf ʕn aːldˤħk hðaː aːlmrʃħ lmd͡ʒls aːlʃjwχ jlʕb ʔajdˤaːan ʕaːlm mn aːlʕlb ʔaqlʕ ʕn aːltdχjn aːlʕaːm aːlmaːdˤj tlk msʔuwljtk maaː jalfiðˤu min qawlin ʔiilːaaː ladajhi raqijbun ʕatijdun walaː tamnun tastakθiru laqad sˤaraχat fij ʕuruwqinaaː aːldiːmaaː namuwtu namuwtu wajaħjaaː aːlwatˤan hðaː ktaːb sˤʁjr faramazuwaː biʔaawsˤaaːfihi ʔin qmt bχtˤʔi ʔaːχr  fstfʃl qaːlt lj aːlkθjr ʕnk hðaː baːldˤbtˤ maː knt ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔiljh rataʕnaaː fij aːldːunjaaː d͡ʒaaːhilijna lijakuwnuwaː ʔaaqwaaː manaʕaaan wajadanaː lnltqj mra ʔaχraː qrjbaːan maaː ʔaaʕd͡ʒabu aːlʔaaʃjaaːʔi  faqaaːla lm aːtwqʕ   ʔalbs fstaːnaːan zhrj nħn fj tˤrjqnaː ʔilaː aːlmnzl walaaː ʔilaaː aːlmubaaːjanaai waaːlmuʃaaːqːaai tˤarijqanaː ljs ʕndj ʔilaː ʕʃra ktb fljdʕ naːdjh ʔinaː d͡ʒʕlnaːh qrʔaːnaː ʕrbjaː lʕlkm tʕqlwn klnaː nrʁb baːlnd͡ʒaːħ kf ʕn aːltħdjq kjf aːsttˤʕt fʕl hðaː ʔarjd ʔan ʔasaːfr aːntʃr aːlχbr bsrʕa waʕamːaaː siwaaːhu ʁaaːfilun twqʕt ʔank stnbhr ldaː mnːaːd mwqf baːlqrb mn mnzlh lndχl ʔilaː aːlmnzl bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi aːlr tilka ʔaːjaaːtu aːlkitaaːbi waqurʔaːnin mubijnin aːlʔasʕaːr mrtfʕa hl ʔant bħaːd͡ʒa ʔilaː aːlmaːl  ʔiilːaaː tˤarijqa d͡ʒahanːama χaaːlidijna fijhaaː ʔaabadanaː wakaaːna ðalika ʕalaaː aːllːahi jasijranaː waːlðjn kðbwaː bʔaːjaːtnaː wlqaːʔ aːlʔaːχra ħbtˤt ʔaʕmaːlhm hl jd͡ʒzwn ʔilaː maː kaːnwaː jʕmlwn kðbt ʕaːd aːlmrsljn ʔiinːaaː sanulqij ʕalajka qawlaː θaqijlaː dʕ ʕnk hðaː aːktb aːsmk hnaː falaaː ʔauqsimu bimawaaːqiʕi aːlnːud͡ʒuwmi waːlqmr ʔiðaː tlaːhaː lm jχtˤr hðaː fj baːlj ʔabdaː nzl twm mn aːlʃd͡ʒra hðh hdja mtwaːdˤʕa lk bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi tˤh ʔijtˤaːljaː bld d͡ʒmjl d͡ʒdaː lʕlː aːld͡ʒwː d͡ʒmjl ʔarjd ʔan ʔaraː mntd͡ʒaːtkm θumːa kalːaaː sajaʕlamuwna kjfa tʕlmjn hðaː  ʔinh jʃʕrnj baːlʁθjaːn wlqd ʔarslnaː nwħaː wʔibraːhjm wd͡ʒʕlnaː fj ðrjthmaː aːlnbwa waːlktaːb fmnhm mhtd wkθjr mnhm faːsqwn wld ʔijtˤaːljaː rabːanaaː waʔaːtinaaː maaː waʕadtanaaː ʕalaaː rusulika walaaː tuχzinaaː jawma aːlqijaaːmaai ʔiinːaka laaː tuχlifu aːlmijʕaaːda sjkwn zwd͡ʒaː sˤaːlħaː qrr ʔan jsˤbħ qaːdˤjaː lakinːahu ʔaanaaː bdʔat ʔabkj sʔard͡ʒʕ ħaːlaːan snsmh ʕlaː aːlχrtˤwm ʔawd aːlsfr ʔilaː ʔijtˤaːljaː nħnu swf nusaːʕdka, mwaːfq ktbt ʕʃrjn jmknk mʕaːld͡ʒa hðaː aːlaːmr  ʔajn tħs baːlwd͡ʒʕ  lqd ʔalħ ʕlaː ʔahmja aːlslm wlm nk ntˤʕm aːlmskjn wmaː ʔin aːqtrb ʔakθr ħtaː sʔal aːlʁraːbjn: maː baːlkmaː ʔajhaː aːlʁraːbjn ʔinaː kðlk nfʕl baːlmd͡ʒrmjn ʔanaː ʁjr mtfaːd͡ʒʔia saːmj lm jstwʕb fʕljaː χtˤwra maː fʕlh takalːamuwaː fiaː aːlʕilmi   ʔaaqdaːrukum hl ʔant mdχn  wd͡ʒʕlhaː klma baːqja fj ʕqbh lʕlhm jrd͡ʒʕwn wad͡ʒunuwdu ʔiiblijsa ʔaad͡ʒmaʕuwna sjqtlnj twm ʔin ʕrf ʔanːj qltu lka hðaː ʔam ʔabrmwaː ʔamraː fʔinaː mbrmwn hl tʕrf kjf tstχdm fʔas qaaːla aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː narfaʕu darad͡ʒaaːtin man naʃaaːʔu ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː tˤbjb ʔanaː mtʔakd ʔanh sjstqjl mn mnsˤbh ldaː twm sˤdjq jʕjʃ fj bwstˤn min aːlʕilmi ʔaan laaː taħtaqira ʃajʔianaː min aːlʕilmi liʔaanːahu jaʃʁaluhum ʕan aːlʕilmi wajaqtˤaʕuhum ʕan aːltːawafːuri ʕalajhi stnfʕk rħla ʔilaː aːlχaːrd͡ʒ wamahːadtːu lahu tamhijdanaː hw laː jʕlm ʔaχbrhaː maː ʔaχbrtka bh hw ʕrdˤnaː sˤwraan ʔamh θumːa latusʔaalunːa jawmaʔiiðin ʕani aːlnːaʕijmi bl aːlðjn kfrwaː jkðbwn lqd "laː, ʔanaː laː ʔarjd ʔaj brtqaːl ʕlaː aːlʔitˤlaːq" waqaaːla ʕumaru bnu aːlχatˤːaaːbi radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu liqaaːʔu aːlʔiiχwaaːni d͡ʒalaaːʔu aːlʔaaħzaaːni kaðalika wazawːad͡ʒnaaːhum biħuwrin ʕijnin walajsa bimuʁnin fij aːlmawadːaai ʃaaːfiʕun ʔiðaaː lam jakun bajna aːldˤːuluwʕi ʃafijʕu waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi kjf nimti aːlljla aːlmaːdˤja kaːn ʕlj ʔan ʔaχbr ʔaħdaː ʔilaː mn jhmh aːlʔamr ʔanaː aːlmnaːfsh mʕk jrkdˤ twm bsrʕa kbjra rʔaaː twm ʃχsˤaː jnzːl sˤnaːdjqaː χʃbja mn ʃaːħna ʔinhu aːlwqt lifʕl ʃjʔiaːan maː walakinːa χajrakum man ʔaaχaða min haðihi wahaðihi waaːdˤrib lahum maθalanaː aːlmuʔuminijna aːlmʕrfa laː tmθl ʃjʔiaː  w aːlχjaːl hw kl ʃjʔ famaaː minkum min ʔaaħadin ʕanhu ħaaːd͡ʒizijna wʔan ljs llʔinsaːn ʔilaː maː sʕaː fij banij ʔisraaːʔiijla faqaaːla llkaːfrjn ljs lh daːfʕ wʔanzlnaː mn aːlsmaːʔ maːʔ bqdr fʔasknaːh fj aːlʔardˤ wʔinaː ʕlaː ðhaːb bh lqaːdrwn wad͡ʒaʕaluwaː aːlmalaaːʔiikaaa aːlːaðijna hum ʕibaaːdu aːlrːaħmani ʔiinaaːθanaː ʔaaʃahiduwaː χalqahum satuktabu ʃahaaːdatuhum wajusʔaaluwna mtaː jħjn dwrj wnqlb ʔafʔidthm wʔabsˤaːrhm kmaː lm jʔumnwaː bh ʔawl mra wnðrhm fj tˤʁjaːnhm jʕmhwn aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʕan aːlzːubajri ʔimsaaːkun fad͡ʒaðaba ʕimaaːmatahu ʔilajhi waqaaːla qaːl lj ʔalaː ʔaqwd bsrʕa waʔiiðaaː kaaːna ðalika fahuwa kaaːlsˤːuwraai aːlmumaθːalaai jaruwquk ħusnuhaaː ʔaajːumaaː ʔaaħabːu ʔilajk ʔaaχuwk ʔaaw sˤadijquk  qaaːla dħwraː wlhm ʕðaːb waːsˤb bdt wħjda wmaː tʃaːʔwn ʔilaː ʔan jʃaːʔ aːllh ʔin aːllh kaːn ʕljmaː ħkjmaː ʔant laː tʕlm maː qlh lj qaaːluwaː rabːanaaː ʁalabat ʕalajnaaː ʃiqwatunaaː wakunːaaː qawmanaː dˤaaːlːijna qaːlwaː jaː nwħ qd d͡ʒaːdltnaː fʔakθrt d͡ʒdaːlnaː fʔatnaː bmaː tʕdnaː ʔin knt mn aːlsˤaːdqjn wajaʕadˤːa ʕalajhi naaːd͡ʒiðahu ʔaχd͡ʒl mn mnaːdaːtk baːbnj "aːlʃʕwr mtbaːdl" "maːðaː ʔiðn aːχrd͡ʒ mn bjtj" ʔin aːsttˤʕt  tʕaːl mʕnaː hnaːk st d͡ʒml baːllʁa aːlmnʁwlja ʕlaː mwqʕ ttwjbaː ħtaː aːlʔaːn waqaaːla ʕijsaaː aːbnu marjama ʕalajhi aːlsːalaaːmu aːldːunjaaː qantˤaraaun faaːʕburuwhaaː walaaː taʕmuruwhaaː aːlnːaaːsu kulːuhum ʕijaaːlu aːllːahi taħta ðˤilaaːlihi faʔaaħabːuhum tˤurːanaː ʔilajhi ʔaabarːuhum liʕijaaːlihi waaːlbirːu nawʕaaːni hl mn ʔaħd jʕlm kjfja aːlqjaːm bhðaː fdˤlaːan hdʔi mn srʕtk ʕnd aːqtraːbk mn tqaːtˤʕ aːltˤrq dʕnaː nnqsm fʔiðaː nfχ fj aːlsˤwr flaː ʔansaːb bjnhm jwmʔið wlaː jtsaːʔlwn hl trjdjn mʃaːhda mqaːbla kra aːlqaːʕda ʕlaː aːltlfaːz ʔink ʕdaːʔij ʔaaw nurijanːaka aːlːaðij waʕadnaaːhum faʔiinːaaː ʕalajhim muqtadiruwna waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi ʃafijʕu aːlmuðnibi ʔiqraaːruhu  watawbatuhu aːʕtiðaaːruhu ʔanti mnfʕla jaː wajlataː lajtanj lam ʔaatːaχið fulaːnanaː χaljlanaː w ʔaχjraːan wsˤlnaː ʔilaː aːlqrja waʔiinːahu liħubːi aːlχajri laʃadjdun faaːsˤfaħ ʕanhum waqul salaːmun fasawfa jaʕlamwna fadˤlu aːlʕilmi χajrun min fadˤli aːlʕibaaːdaai bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi waaːlfad͡ʒri waʔiin kaaːna kulːun minhu kaθijranaː ʕaːda maː jsˤlːj saːmj sˤlaːa aːlʕʃaːʔ qbjl ðhaːbh ʔilaː aːlnːwm ʔafrʁ d͡ʒjbk laː ʔaħd jnsaː bldj km ʕmrh ʕaːd ʔilaː aːlrːsm qaːlwaː subħaːnaka ʔaanta walijːunaː min dwnihim bal kaːnwaː jaʕbudwna aːld͡ʒinːa ʔaakθaruhum bihim muʔuminwna faqaaːla jaaː rabːi law kaaːna lak ħimaaːrun laʕalafth maʕa ħimaaːrij wafiʕlu qalijli aːlχajri ʔaafdˤalu min tarkihi aːlbrtqaːl jħtwj ʕlaː fjtaːmjn sj lqd ʔatʕbtnj hðh aːlrħla rʁm qsˤr mdthaː ʔinːa haðaaː aːlħaqːa θaqijlun marijːun aːlsˤbr ʕnd aːlsˤdma aːlʔawlaː ʔaðl aːlbχl ʔaʕnaːq aːlrd͡ʒaːl walaaː tuʔuaaːχiðnij bimaaː jaquwluwna warutbaaan turtaqaaː faman kamulat fijhi fahuwa ʕanqaaːʔu muʁribin saːmj laː jħml msdːsh mʕh ldjhaː aːbn jħbh aːld͡ʒmjʕ laaː juʕrafu aːld͡ʒawaaːdu ʔilːaaː fij aːlʕusraai ʔinːhaː aːntkaːsa mrjra fij ʁadˤabik liʔaanːa aːlmazħa hazlun lqd qaːblnaː mdrːsnaː aːntʃr χbr ðlk hd͡ʒwm wabiʔiirʁaaːbihi ʔin danaaː ðj quwːaain ʕinda ðij aːlʕarʃi makjnin waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlʔaudabaaːʔi maʃuwraau aːlmuʃfiqi aːlħaaːzimi ðˤafarun  wamaʃuwraau ʁajri aːlħaaːzimi χatˤarun ʔiinːaː ʔaarsalnaː ʕalajhim ħaːsˤibanaː ʔiilːaː ʔaːla lwtˤin nad͡ʒːajnaːhum bisaħarin ʔaðˤn ʔan ʔaʕjaːd aːlmjlaːd mhma hl bʔimkaːnk aːltːklːm baːlbrtʁaːljːa waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi laaː tamnaʕuwaː aːlʕilma ʔaaħadanaː faʔiinːa aːlʕilma ʔaamnaʕu lid͡ʒaaːnibihi wamanaʕa ħusna ħaaːlihi waːsˤl saːmj smaːʕ tlk aːlʔasˤwaːt waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlfusˤaħaaːʔi quwːaau aːlminani min dˤaʕfi aːlmunani ʕaːda maː jðkr mqwlaːt lʃjksbjr aːlmutaʕamːiqu fij aːlʕilmi kaaːlsːaaːbiħi fij aːlbaħri lajsa jaraaː ʔaardˤanaː χajru aːlrːizqi maaː jakfij waχajru aːlðːikri aːlχafijːu walaaː ʔaan juʕaaːridˤahu fij ʔaamrihi fajuradːu maħruwmanaː masluwbanaː waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi ʃarːu aːlmaaːli maaː lazimak ʔiθmu maksabihi waħurimta ʔaad͡ʒra ʔinfaaːqihi aːlħaaːsidu muʁtaaːðˤun ʕalaaː man laaː ðanba lahu hl jumknnj aːstʕaːra sjaːrtk lhðh aːlljla kulːun jaraaː ʔaanːa aːlʃːabaaːba lahu fij kulːi mablaʁi laðːaain ʕuðraaː waliðalika qaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi bʕdˤ aːlθʕaːbjn saːma kaːn saːmj jtħdːθ mʕ ljlaː tˤwl aːlbaːl jhdm aːld͡ʒbaːl waʃaaːwirhum fij aːlʔaamri laaː tukθir mina aːldˤːaħiki kulːu ʃajʔin jaħtaaːd͡ʒu ʔilaaː aːlʕaqli hl hðh sˤwrk wataaːbiʕanaː maħquwranaː wamaː huwa biqawli ʃaːʕirin qaljlanaː maː tuʔuminwna wabaʃːiri aːlmuʔuminjna biʔaanːa lahum mina aːllːahi fadˤlanaː kabjranaː ʔamdˤaː saːmj aːllːjla fj aːlʕjaːda aːlħud͡ʒraau muðˤlimaaun wataʁajːuru zamaaːnihimaaː ðhb saːmj ʔilaː aːlqsm ʔiinːahu laqurʔaːnun karjmun ʔisχaaːtˤu aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː fij muʕaaːradˤatihi baːlnsba lj fʔin klb saːmj jbdw bχjr ʕaːʃ saːmj ħjaːa nzjha mn ktb hðh aːlqsˤjda aːltˤːijaraau wasuwʔu aːlðˤːanːi waʔaafdˤaluhaaː ʕilmu aːldːijni ntfaːʔil bh ʔaaʔiiðaː kunːaː ʕiðˤaːmanaː naχiraaan ðˤlm aːlʔaqaːrb ʔaʃd wqʕaː mn aːlsjf waljaʕlam ʔaanːahu min furasˤi zamaaːnihi mʕlwm ʔanː ljlaː lm tstħqː ʔan tmwt bhðh aːltˤːrjqa aːlfðˤjʕa lm jstħqː saːmj ʔan jmwt bhðh aːltˤːrjqa aːlfðˤjʕa jawma naqwlu lid͡ʒahanːama hali aːmtalaʔati wataqwlu hal min mazjdin waʔiiðaaː aːustuʃirta falaaː tuʕad͡ʒːil ħatːaaː tanðˤura kaːnt ljlaː fj wdˤʕ χtˤjr wakaaːda aːlħasadu ʔaan jaʁliba aːlqadara aːtːsˤl saːmj bsˤdjq kj jqlːh laaː taħmilanːa ʕalaaː jawmik hamːa ʁadik wawaʕada bihi min taʔajijdihi tlʕb aːltns kl jwm lm ʔaʕrf kjf ʔad͡ʒjb ʕlaː sʔuaːlh man ʔaakθara min ðikri aːlmawti radˤija min aːldːunjaaː biaːljasijri maː aːlðj d͡ʒaːʔ bk ʔilaː hnaː waʔiinːa aːlfud͡ʒːaːra lafj d͡ʒaħjmin waqaaːla ʕabdu aːllːahi bnu aːlħasani liaːbnihi muħamːadin jaː lk mn wʁd waʔaaχlaaːqin mursalaain aːbqa mkaːnk ʔanaː ʔatːsˤl bsjːaːra ʔisʕaːf jbdw saːmj mθlki fad͡ʒaʕalnaːhum salafanaː wamaθalanaː lilʔaːχirjna hl stlʕb mʕj fatabasːama rasuwlu aːllːahi sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama waqaaːla ħukija ʔaanːa aːlmuʔuabːaðu samiʕa dˤaħika aːlχadːaaːmi fij qaːla rabːj ʔaaʕlamu bimaː taʕmalwna ln jmsːnj ʔaħd ʔaʕtˤaː saːmj ljlaː ħqna ʔaraːd twm ʔan tʕrf aːlmuʔuminu jaʁbitˤu waaːlmunaaːfiqu jaħsudu waqaaːla ʕijsaaː aːbnu kaaːalːaðij ħukija ʕan aːlʔaasˤmaʕijːi ʔaanːa aːlrːaʃijda saʔaalahu jawmanaː ʕan ʔaansaaːbi baʕdˤi aːlʕarabi faqaaːla walilʔiiʕd͡ʒaaːbi mubaaːjinanaː waaːljasijri aːltːaaːfihi min sˤijaaːnaai aːlsːaaːʔiilijna tħjaː aːlmlka lqd bdʔa saːmj ħjaːth lltːw liltˤːaaːwuwsi rijʃun d͡ʒamijlun lqd aːntht ħjaːa saːmj ʔaaw χaaːmarahu fijhaaː wahmun lm ʔanaː mwd͡ʒwd waʔaaʕðˤamu ʁararanaː tʕrːf saːmj ʕlaː ðlk aːlsːlaːħ jmkn ltwm ʔan jqwl ʃjʔiaː mn ʔajn aːbtkr hðaː aːlħasadu jaʔakulu aːlħasanaaːti kamaaː taʔakulu aːlnːaaːru aːlħatˤaba saːmj mdrːsnaː fj aːlrːjaːdˤa knt ʔatsaːʔil sjtχrd͡ʒ twm fj ʔaktwbr mn jrjd ʔijðaːʔ saːmj jχtˤːtˤ saːmj ʔan jtzwːd͡ʒ fwr maː jtχrːd͡ʒ mn aːlθːaːnwjːa ʃʁːl saːmj d͡ʒhaːz aːlʔinðaːr waqilːaau muχaaːlatˤaai aːlʔaakfaaːʔi waʔaamtˤarnaː ʕalajhim matˤaranaː fasaːʔa matˤaru aːlmunðarjna ʔiinːahum kaːnwaː laː jard͡ʒwna ħisaːbanaː faʔiin kaaːna lahu takalːama waʔiin kaaːna qabːaħahu aːllːahu ʔaatarawnahu law zaaːduwhu faʕala  waʕazalahu kaːn faːdˤl fj ħfl tbdw hðh aːllːʕba χtˤjra nwʕaː maː ʔinːa lilːahi taʕaaːlaaː fij ʔaaθnaaːʔi kulːi miħnaain minħaaun ʔinːamaaː ʔauθijbu kulːa ʔinsaaːnin ʕalaaː qadri ʕaqlihi lima tuħibːu aːldːaraaːhima wahija tudijnuk min aːldːunjaaː  faqaaːla mawʕiduk aːld͡ʒanːaau zħf saːmj ʕbr naːfðth lm jkn ʕnd saːmj ʔaħd jnaːqʃ mʕh mʃaːklh hðaː ktaːb qdjm waʕarija ʕan tamjijzin ʔaanːa ðalika huwa aːlmuruwʔaau aːlkaaːmilaau ħatːaaː ʔaanːahu lajunaaːfisu fij aːlħaqijri fadˤlanaː min rabːika ðlika huwa aːlfawzu aːlʕaðˤjmu hunaːlika aːbtulija aːlmuʔuminwna wazulzilwaː zilzaːlanaː ʃadjdanaː wakaðalika qaaːla aːlnːabijːu walajsa ʔilaaː maaː juksibuhu aːlkibru min aːlmaqti ħadːun lqd qdːm tstqaːlth qbl ʔakθr mn ʃhr sˤaħijħanaː lak waaːlθːaaːnij kafːu aːllːisaaːni ʕan aːlʔaaʕraaːdˤi waðarijʕaaun ʔilaaː ʔinkaaːrihi ʔajn snʔakl falaː ʔauqsimu biaːlʃːafaqi mn aːlsˤʕb bmkaːn ʔan jsˤdːq aːlnaːs sbb qtl bʕdˤ aːlʔamhaːt ʔatˤfaːlhn ʔilaː ʔanhaː aːlħqjqa ʔaknt mʕ ʔaħd qdːm saːmj ljlaː ltˤaːlb mslm maː sbb ʁdˤbhn ʔinħnt ʔinːa aːllːaha juħibːu aːlħalijma aːlħajijːa samiʕtuhu jaquwlu aːnaː aːʕml ħtaː fj ʔajaːm aːlʔaħd wataraknaː fjhaː ʔaːjaaan lilːaðjna jaχaːfwna aːlʕaðaːba aːlʔaaljma faʃakawaː ðalika ʔilaaː ʔiblijsa twd͡ʒːh saːmj mbaːʃra ʔilaː mnzl ʔabjh wamaː ʔaadraːka maaː aːlħaːqːaau ʔaadˤħaaː aːlʃːaaːriʕu muzdaħimanaː liʔaanːahu laaː jaraaː ʔaanːahu ʕalaaː aːlsːafahi waaːstidaaːmaai aːlbaðaaːʔi wasuʔiila rasuwlu wajasˤrifa ʕanːaaː subula aːlrːadaaː ʔahlaː jaː twm huwa aːlːaðj juħjj wajumjtu faʔiiðaː qadˤaː ʔaamranaː faʔiinːamaː jaqwlu lahu kun fajakwnu waħiljaaun zajːana aːllːahu bihaaː ʕawaaːtˤila aːlʔaaħsaaːbi hl aːldjaːnaːt ʔilaːhja ʔam χlq aːlʔinsaːn ʔaraːd saːmj qraːʔa tlk aːlrːsaːla aːlnːaaːsu θalaaːθaau ʔaasˤnaaːfin qlt lh ʔinːnj mʕ twm wamaː ʔaarsalnaːka ʔiilːaː mubaʃːiranaː wanaðjranaː faʔiiðaaː ʕalimt maaː d͡ʒahilt smʕ saːmj dˤd͡ʒːa maː lknːh lm jkn mtʔakːdaː mn tˤbjʕthaː waʔaakθaru tad͡ʒribaaan draːd͡ʒth zrqaːʔ qrʕ saːmj ʕlaː baːb ljlaː w lm tstd͡ʒb ldaː maːrj ʃχsˤjːa qwjːa lm tkn mfaːd͡ʒʔaa waʔiiðaaː aːld͡ʒibaːlu sujːirat θumːa tawalːajtum ʔiilːaaː qalijlanaː minkum waʔaantum muʕridˤuwna mdrːsj jkrhnaː ʔatʕlmjn ʔilaː ʔajn aːntql faʃaːribwna ʃurba aːlhjmi kaːn saːmj jstmʕ lmwsjqaː aːlrːwk aːlmsjħjːa lm hðaː mhm waʔauzlifati aːld͡ʒanːaau lilmutːaqjna waʕalaaː qadri aːlʕinaaːjaai bihi jakuwnu aːd͡ʒtinaaːʔu θamaratihi llsˤdq wd͡ʒh waːħd wllkðb ʔalf wd͡ʒh waʔaːχira maaː nazala min aːltːawraaːai ʔiðaaː lam tastaħi faaːsˤnaʕ maaː ʃiʔit waʔiin kaaːna naðˤijrij tafadˤːalt ʕalajhi waaːlnːifaaːqu luʔumun ðhb saːmj lħdˤwr aːldːrs waaːllːahu χalaqakum wamaː taʕmalwna waaːlnːaaːsu minhu fij salaaːmaain ʔaqnʕth ʔanh kaːn mχtˤʔiaː faʔaabdaaː sˤafħaaa ʕuquwqihi jqjs ħraːrth ʔaħbbnj aːlmdrːs tʕrf ʔanː d͡ʒwn kaːn jħbhaː lm jkn ʕnd saːmj ʔajː sˤdjq jmlk sjːaːra ʔaːnðaːk waʔaamːaaː aːlħirsˤu fajaslubu fadˤaaːʔiila aːlnːafsi tzwːd͡ʒti twm mn ʔad͡ʒl maːlh fqtˤ qaːm mdjr mdrstj btˤrd ðlk aːlmdrːs mn aːlmdrsa watadˤħakwna walaː tabkwna kaːn saːmj jntðˤr fqtˤ wafamu aːld͡ʒaaːhili mutˤlaqun kulːamaaː ʃaaːʔa ʔaatˤlaqa biʔisamaaː aːʃtarawaː bihi ʔaanfusahum ʔaan jakfuruwaː bimaaː ʔaanzala aːllːahu baʁjanaː kaːn aːld͡ʒmjʕ jʕlm ʔanː saːmj kaːn fj aːlʕjaːda waʔiinːamaaː jaχtasˤːu biħasadi min ʕalaaː ʔaħbk ʔaktb rsaːla bali aːlsːaːʕaau mawʕiduhum waaːlsːaːʕaau ʔaadhaː waʔaamarːu ħasaraaːtu aːlħasadi wasaqaaːmu aːld͡ʒasadi θumːa aːnsˤarafa masruwranaː liʔaanːahaaː χisˤaaːlun murakːabaaun min aːlʁadˤabi falaaː jaħmilanːaka ðalika ʕalaaː aːlrːaʁbaai fij aːld͡ʒahli qdːm saːmj qrsˤaː lljlaː lijakuwna lahu maʕa tablijʁi aːlrːisaaːlaai ðˤuhuwru aːliaːχtisˤaaːsˤi bihi wamanzilaau aːltːafwijdˤi ʔilajhi laː ʔaðˤn ʔan twm bmzaːd͡ʒ aːlʕml ħaːljaː jbjn aːlwdˤʕ fj ʔafʁaːnstaːn ʔahdaːf ʔamrjkaː wħaːd͡ʒtnaː ʔilaː aːlʕml aːlmʃtrk fawarabːi aːlsːamaːʔi waaːlʔaardˤi ʔiinːahu laħaqːun miθla maː ʔaanːakum tantˤiqwna ʔaqbħ mn χnzjr ʔalħː saːmj ʕlaː aːlʔamr wahuwa min nafsihi fij ʕanaaːʔin ʔijːaaːkum wataħkijma aːlʃːahawaaːti ʕalaaː ʔaanfusikum faʔiinːa ʕaaːd͡ʒilahaaː ðamijmun ʔarsl ħkjmaː wlaː twsˤh lmaːðaː tχlːaː saːmj ʕnːj ʔarfʕ mn aːlsmaːʔ waðalika fadˤijlaaun hw fj aːlχdma ʔafdˤːl ʔan ʔamwt bdlaː mn ʔan ʔamdˤj ħjaːtj klːhaː mʕk ʕalaaː qadri aːlmaʁaaːrisi jakuwnu aːd͡ʒtinaaːʔu aːlʁaaːrisi hj mdrːstnaː fj aːlʕrbjːa ʔaatard͡ʒuw ʔaan tasuwda bilaaː ʕanaaːʔin wakajfa jasuwdu ðuw aːldːaʕaai aːlbaχijlu waaːlsːababu aːlsːaaːdisu laː ʃjʔ mn hðaː ħdθ ðawaːtaː ʔaafnaːnin lmaːðaː laː jdʕwnh "saːmj" bklː bsaːtˤa wamaaː laaː sababa lahu had͡ʒrun wahaðaaː farqu maaː bajna aːlħirsˤi waaːlʃːarahi waʔiiðaaː aːnqalabwaː ʔiilaː ʔaahlihimu aːnqalabwaː fakihjna hnaːk ʔiħtmaːl ʔan tndlʕ aːlħrb kaːld͡ʒraːd: laː jbqaː wlaː jðr klː aːlmdrːsjn kaːnwaː hnaː waliðalika warada aːlʃːarʕu biaːlnːahji ʕan aːlwisˤaaːli bajna sˤawmi aːljawmajni ʕaːda mn aːlʕjaːda hnaːk χmswn mqaːtˤʕa fj aːlʔitħaːd aːlfdraːlj faaːlʔaawlaaː biaːlʔiinsaaːni taqdijru ħaaːlajhi kaːn aːlmdrːs jsχr mn d͡ʒsmj fʕljːaː wasukuwtanaː min nufuwrihi qaaːla aːlʃːaaːʕiru maː hw mktwb fj aːlrːsaːla waʔiinːaka latulaqːaaː aːlqurʔaːna min ladun ħakjmin ʕaljmin ʔiilhi aːlnːaːsi sʔal saːmj ljlaː ʕn sbb tχlːjhaː ʕnh sjrzqwn btˤfl w ʕljkm aːlslaːm jmknk aːlʕwda ʔilaː aːlbjt lw ʔardt kaħimaaːri aːlsːuwʔi ʔin ʔaaʃbaʕtahu ramaħa aːlnːaaːsa waʔiin d͡ʒaaːʕa nahaq waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi waqaaːla ʕumaru bnu aːlχatˤːaaːbi radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu aːltːabasːumu duʕaaːbaaun kaːn saːmj mdrːs rqsˤ ʔarjd ʔan ʔastʕjd θqa maːrj bj ʔaʕrf tlk aːlsˤbja kaːnt ħjaːa saːmj mʕrːdˤa llχtˤr lst smjnaː wabiaːlʃːubhaai min ʔaafʕaaːlihaaː raaːdˤijanaː laqad ħaqːa aːlqawlu ʕalaː ʔaakθarihim fahum laː juʔuminwna wadaʕaaː ʔilaaː aːliaːstiθqaaːli waaːlmalaaːli aːljaːbaːn bld sˤnaːʕj kun lihawaaːk musawːifanaː tanaaːfasuwaː fij aːlʕamali aːlsˤːaaːliħi kaːnaː saːmj w ljlaː jqdˤjaːn aːlkθjr mn aːlwqt mʕaː fj ʁrfthaː ʔatsaːʔl ʕmːaː ħdθ lh w ld͡ʒmaːl qaːla rabːukum warabːu ʔaːbaːʔiikumu aːlʔaawːaljna bdʔa dwaːʔ saːmj jʔuθːr fjh ħðˤaːan mwfːqaːan ʔanaː mrtbtˤ baːlʕml kmaː jsbb aːstmraːr hðaː aːlnzaːʕ tkaːljf baːhðˤa wmsˤaːʕb sjaːsja d͡ʒma fahija aːlmaaːdːaau aːlkaaːfijaau waqaaːla χaaːlidu bnu sˤafwaaːna liʔiijaaːsi bni muʕaaːwijaaa ʔajn aːlmʃkla ðalika χajrun fijhi taʔawijlaaːni ʔaafaraʔaajta aːlːaðj tawalːaː aːnhaː ljst ʁltˤtj ʔinːa fij aːlmaʕaaːrijdˤi lamanduwħaaan ʕan aːlkaðibi ʔaqaːm saːmj sˤdaːqa mʕ zmjlh fj aːlʁrfa ʔaaʔiinːakum lataʔatwna aːlrːid͡ʒaːla ʃahwaaan min dwni aːlnːisaːʔi bal ʔaantum qawmun tad͡ʒhalwna ʔad͡ʒrt ljlaː aːtːsˤaːlaː tˤaːlba sjːaːra ʔisʕaːf waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami aːlχajru fij tarki aːltˤːijaraai ʔanaː fj aːntðˤaːr aːbniki lnlʕb aːlwrq lm jkn saːmj d͡ʒzʔaː mn ħjaːtj ʔaχð saːmj ljlaː ʔilaː aːlmrkz aːlsˤːħːj kaaːna ħatfuhu fij ʔaaʁlabi χisˤaaːli aːlχajri ʕalajhi rawaaː ʃarijku bnu ʔaabij namirin waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi aːliaːstiʃaaːraau ʕajnu aːlhidaaːjaai waqad χaaːtˤara man aːstaʁnaaː biraʔajihi saːmj jmʃj ʔintħrt aːlfaʔaru jaχaaːfu mina aːlhirːi jbaːlʁ twm daːʔimaː maaː aːlħaːqːaau d͡ʒaaːda lakum hiʃaaːmun biaːldːunjaaː wad͡ʒudtum ʕalajhi biaːlbukaaːʔi liʔaanːahu jaʔatij aːlrːad͡ʒula aːlmutamakːina ʕinda aːlʔaamijri falaaː jazaaːlu jaqaʕu fijhi ħatːaaː jaqlaʕahu rmaː saːmj aːlʔaqraːsˤ fj aːlqmaːma lmaːðaː ʔanaː liʔaanːahumaaː jaslubaaːni aːlfadˤaaːʔiila hj mħðˤwðˤa maaː huwa  faʔiinːa haðajni liʕiðˤami ʃaʔanihimaaː laaː jusʔaalu ʕanhumaaː ʔilːaaː ʕulamaaːʔu aːldːijni watasmaħu fij aːltˤːalabi kaːn saːmj mʕrːdˤaː lħkm baːlsːd͡ʒn mdaː aːlħjaːa waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlʁanijːu liʔaanːa aːlmusrifa juχtˤiʔiu fij aːlzːijaaːdaai saːmj muʕħb bhðaː aːlmkaːn ʔatˤlq aːlʃrtˤj rsˤaːsˤa tħðjrja twm sjsˤbħ mʕlm d͡ʒjd km jwmaːan tħtaːd͡ʒ ʕaːdaan llwsˤwl ʔilaː hnaːk fasˤabːa ʕalajhim rabːuka sawtˤa ʕaðaːbin liʔaanːahu jastaqilːu fij aːlnːaqlaai binafsihi fjma ʔaanta min ðikraːhaː lam jaħdˤur ʕalijːun aːlbaaːriħaaa walaaː tad͡ʒbun ʕan aːlkaθijri faʔiinːak ʔaakθaru minhu tʃaːd͡ʒr mʕ aːlmdrːs wamin aːlsːaraaːʔiiri maχzuwnahaaː kaːn saːmj ʕlaː aːlʕks mn ðlk tmaːmanaː wamina aːlnːaaːsi man jaquwlu ʔaːmanːaaː biaːllːahi wabiaːljawmi aːlʔaːχiri wamaaː hum bimuʔuminijna ʔaafabihðaaː aːlħadjθi ʔaantum mudhinwna naðˤartu fij kitaaːbin mufijdin liʔaanːa aːlwaʕda tˤuʕmun waaːlʔiind͡ʒaaːza tˤaʕaaːmun laː jsttˤjʕwn aːldraːsa lʔanhm mtʕbwn d͡ʒdaː waʔiinːamaaː aːlqurabu maaː aːustuħsinat fij aːlʕaqli ħatːaaː ʔaanzala aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː jaksibuhu min ʁajri ħilːihi bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi waaːlʃːamsi wadˤuħaːhaː nħn fj aːlmtħf lqd ʔahaːnhaː fasˤaaːra aːlsːalaaːmu ʔiðanaː naaːfijanaː lilħasadi walan juʔuaχːira aːllːahu nafsanaː ʔiiðaː d͡ʒaːʔa ʔaad͡ʒaluhaː waaːllːahu χabjrun bimaː taʕmalwna fj sˤuħufin mukarːamaain laː jʕlm saːmj mn tˤʕnh ʕalajhim naːrun muʔusˤadaaun hw jdrs aːlħqwq fj haːrfrd ʔanaː mdrːs lltːrd͡ʒma aːld͡ʒhl mwt aːlʔaħjaːʔ walakinːaaː natˤlubuhu linanqusˤa fij kulːi jawmin min aːld͡ʒahli wanazdaaːda fij kulːi jawmin min aːlʕilmi wajaħfaðˤak ʕinda aːlmaʁijbi wafaqada min ʃuruwtˤi aːlmuruwʔaai sinaaːdahaaː ʔaawalajsa aːlːaðj χalaqa aːlsːamaːwaːti waaːlʔaardˤa biqaːdirin ʕalaː ʔaan jaχluqa miθlahum balaː wahuwa aːlχalːaːqu aːlʕaljmu saːmj ljs md͡ʒrːd tˤbjb fqtˤ bl hw d͡ʒrːaːħ waʔaaħraaːhum biaːlðˤːafari fij mud͡ʒaaːhadatihi  qaaːla faʔaasˤbaħat kaaːlsˤːarjmi man ʕaaːʃara aːlnːaaːsa biʕubuwsi wad͡ʒhihi waaːstatˤaaːla ʕalajhim binafsihi tˤaʕaaːmun maʔakuwlun frʁ saːmj mn ʁsl aːlnːwaːfð watakθura ðunuwbuhu ʔijːaːk wlms ʃtˤjrtj faʔiinːa aːlbuχla bihi lawmun waðˤulmun  waaːlmanʕu minhu ħasadun waʔiiθmun kaːn saːmj mrtdjaː d͡ʒwaːrbh lknːh lm jkn mrtdjaː ħðaːʔh jaðhabu aːlʕumːaaːlu ʔiilaaː aːlmasˤnaʕi ʔiðaaː aːnsˤarafat ʕanhu tabiʕaaːtu aːlmatˤaaːlibi tqlːsˤt ʃrka saːmj bsbb aːlksaːd aːlkbjr sʔakwn hnaː tˤwaːl aːljwm ʕlj ʔan ʔaʁaːdr hðh aːlmdjna kaːn saːmj kaːmnaː fj aːntðˤaːr ljlaː sˤdqaː laː ʔadrj lmaːðaː ħdθ hðaː kl maː ʕljk fʕlh hw ħfðˤ hðh aːld͡ʒmla ʕn ðˤhr qlb waruwija ʕanhu sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʔaanːahu qaaːla lm jʕd ldjnaː skr bʕdˤ aːlʔasˤdqaːʔ laː ʁnaː ʕnhm faʔaamːaaː ʔifdˤaaːlu aːliaːsˤtˤinaaːʕi fanawʕaaːni ʔaaħaduhumaaː maaː ʔaasadaaːhu d͡ʒuwdanaː fij ʃakuwrin laː ʔaħd sjtzwːd͡ʒ mn faːdˤl ʔaħdˤr ʔawlaːdk mʕk wamaː naħnu bimuʕaðːabjna mtaː bunj hðaː aːlmʕbd kaðːabat qablahum qawmu nwħin fakaðːabwaː ʕabdanaː waqaːlwaː mad͡ʒnwnun waaːzdud͡ʒira twqːft aːbna saːmj ʕn aːrtdaːʔ aːlħd͡ʒaːb ʔaaw ħikmaain tanʃuruhaaː naːsˤijaain kaːðibaain χaːtˤiʔiaain tˤljnaː aːlmnzl baːllwn aːlʔaχdˤr mbaːrk liʔaanːa sultˤaaːna aːlhawaaː qawijːun waχuð bijadika dˤiʁθanaː faaːdˤrib bihi walaː taħnaθ ʔiinːaː wad͡ʒadnaːhu sˤaːbiranaː niʕma aːlʕabdu ʔiinːahu ʔaawːaːbun aːlmslmwn laː jʔaklwn aːlχnzjr lʔanːh lħm fjh χtˤr snltqj bhm aːlljla ʔanaː ʃkwr kθjraː lkwnj mslmaː aːljwm qaːla rabːi ʔiinːj ðˤalamtu nafsj faaːʁfir lj faʁafara lahu ʔiinːahu huwa aːlʁafwru aːlrːaħjmu hl jsˤdq ʔaħd twm fʕlaː wakilaaːhumaaː maðmuwmun  wahuwa fijhimaaː maluwmun ʕan ʕaaːʔiiʃaaa radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhaaː qaaːlat maʕa ʔaanːa aːlħarijsˤa laaː jastazijdu biħirsˤihi zijaaːdaaan ʕalaaː rizqihi siwaaː ʔiðlaaːli nafsihi waqaaːdathu ʔilajhi aːlħaaːd͡ʒaau hl hnaːk ħjaːa ʕlaː kwkb aːlmrjχ aːlklb sˤdjq aːlʔinsaːn aːlwfj waqaaːla aːbnu masʕuwdin ʔaunðirukum fudˤuwla aːlmantˤiqi walahaaː aːlnːaaːsa ʕan maħaaːsini fadˤlihi bimusaaːwij ʔaadabihi jasʔaaluhu man fij aːlsːamaːwaːti waaːlʔaardˤi kulːa jawmin huwa fj ʃaʔanin kamaaː qaaːla ʔaakθamu bnu sˤajfijːin fajawmaʔiiðin laː jusʔaalu ʕan ðanbihi ʔiinsun walaː d͡ʒaːnːun fatuðʕinu liruʃdihaaː waʔaaðinat lirabːihaː waħuqːat aːlmatˤaru kaθijrun waaːdˤrib fij aːlʔaardˤi ʕawdanaː wabadʔanaː ħtaː wʔin ʔardnaː aːlqjaːm bðlk fljs ldjnaː wqt jlʕb aːlʔawlaːd baːllʕb hl ðhb faːdˤl ʔilaː aːlmstʃfaː man ʕamila fij aːlsːirːi ʕamalanaː jastaħij minhu fij aːlʕalaaːnijaai falajsa linafsihi ʕindahu qadrun walajsa man ʔaamkanahu ʃajʔun min ðaaːtihi  kaman aːstawd͡ʒabahu biʔaːlatihi  waʔaadawaaːtihi ʔanaː laː ʔanwj mqaːblth tʕrːf faːdˤl ʕlaː ljlaː baːlkaːd faliðalika ʔaaʕwaza aːstijfaaːʔu ʃuruwtˤihaaː ʔilaaː d͡ʒumalin jatanabːahu aːlfaaːdˤilu ʕalajhaaː bijaqiðˤatihi ʕaːd saːmj ʔilaː ʕaːdaːth aːlqdjma jaaː bunajːa ʔiðaaː aːustuʃhidta faaːʃhad swf ʔad͡ʒʕlh jsmʕ lqd d͡ʒmʕ bjnhmaː ʔiʕd͡ʒaːb mtbaːdl fkːr d͡ʒjːdaː bmaː stfʕl linad͡ʒʕalahaː lakum taðkiraaan wataʕijahaː ʔauðunun waːʕijaaun kmn jrbj aːlðʔib tanazːalu ʕalaː kulːi ʔaafːaːkin ʔaaθjmin kaːn jtsˤrːf bʁraːba aːlnd͡ʒda waqad qaaːla muʕaaːwijaau radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu wabalaaːdaau aːlmad͡ʒbuwri hl aːlħqjba aːlswdaːʔ lk rʔas aːlħkma mχaːfa aːllh wajubaaːdira bihi χijfaau ʕad͡ʒzihi waʕalaaː aːlχulatˤaaːʔi tanakːuranaː ʔinːamaaː bihim jahaaːbunaaː ʔaaʕdaaːʔuunaaː waʕanaaːʔin χajrin min daʕaain dˤanijnanaː biaːlʔaasraaːri ʕan d͡ʒamijʕi aːlχalqi dwrk jaː saːmj ʔaaχuwka lan jataʕarːadˤa lilbardi maaː haðaaː  faqijla lahaaː aːltˤfl, aːlðj wsˤl aːlbaːrħa, kaːn aːχj aːlsˤʁjr ʔiinːa rabːahum bihim jawmaʔiiðin laχabjrun aːlsˤːabru sitrun min aːlkuruwbi waʕawnun ʕalaaː aːlχutˤuwbi laː jnksr aːlblaːstjk bshwla aːlbjt mn θlaːθ tˤwaːbq tahðijbahaaː hw tˤwjl d͡ʒdːaː liʔaanːahaaː tudaaːwij kulːa d͡ʒurħin maː sbb klː hðh aːldˤːd͡ʒːa faʔaamːaaː aːlʃːartˤu aːlʔaawːalu maː aːlðj ħdθ hnaː rʔat ljlaː bndqjːa daːχl sjːaːra saːmj faʔaaʕðˤim waʔaawsˤala taʔadijbahaaː dumiːrat aːtˤlaːnts ʔaam lahum ʃurakaːʔu faljaʔatwaː biʃurakaːʔiihim ʔiin kaːnwaː sˤaːdiqjna kaːn jʔatj ʔilaː hnaː kj jtlqː aːlʕlaːd͡ʒ ʔajn qrʔa hðaː ln ʔansaː ðlk aːlʃʕwr ʔabdaː twqːf faːdˤl ʕn tnaːwl dwaːʔih ʔad͡ʒbn mn nʕaːma ʔiinːahaː ʃad͡ʒaraaun taχrud͡ʒu fj ʔaasˤli aːld͡ʒaħjmi wahaðaaː ʔaawsatˤuhaaː faʔaamːaaː aːlʕafwu ʕan aːlhafawaaːti td͡ʒaːwz faːdˤl tlk aːlmrħla faaːlfaqru ʔin mfaːtjħ aːlʔamwr aːlʕzaːʔim wad͡ʒaʕalnaː ðurːijːatahu humu aːlbaːqjna kaːn saːmj bħaːd͡ʒa lʔaʃχaːsˤ ʔaːχrjn mn ħwlh ʔinːa min ʔaadabihi saːmj hw mdjr aːlʕjaːda hnaːk ʔamr maː w ʔarjd ʔan ʔaʕrfh sʔaftqd bwstˤn waðilːaai aːliaːd͡ʒtidaaːʔi falaaː jumajːizu bajna mustaħiqːin wamaħruwmin hl nsjt tħjːtj kaːn saːmj qd ʔaʕdː mlaːbsh jaaː rasuwla aːllːahi ʔaajːu aːlnːaaːsi ʔaaʃarːu  qaaːla hl nsj maːlh md͡ʒdːdaː aːtːibaaːʕa aːlhawaaː watˤuwla aːlʔaamali jbdw saːmj kraːmbw ʔaan jaqtasˤira fij aːlsːuʔuaaːli ʕalaaː maaː daʕathu ʔilajhi aːldˤːaruwraau fawajlun lilmusˤalːjna waaːlhaðra jutlifu aːlmaħad͡ʒːaaa ʔiið nusawːjkum birabːi aːlʕaːlamjna kaːn ʕljk qbwl nsˤjħth waʔaawlaaː aːlʕuluwmi aːld͡ʒhl dˤlaːm aːstrd͡ʒʕt ljlaː sˤħːthaː kaːn ʕlaː wʃk ʔan jfqd ʕjnh saːmj jħbːk wajatad͡ʒanːabuhaaː aːlʔaaʃqaaː hðaː mkaːn aːlħaːdθa waqaaːbala aːlʕuquwqa biaːlʕuquwqi wabaʕda aːlkaʃfi waaːlrːawijːaai mustaqijmanaː faðwqwaː falan nazjdakum ʔiilːaː ʕaðaːbanaː watawaqːaaː masˤaaːriʕa kajdihi mdː jdh ʔilaː aːltfaːħa laʕalːanaː natːabiʕu aːlsːaħaraaa ʔiin kaːnwaː humu aːlʁaːlibjna stmtˤr qrjbaːan liʔaanːahu jasˤduru ʕan mahaaːnaai aːlnːafsi wadanaaːʔaai aːlhimːaai faaːliaːʕtibaaːru biħaqːi aːlsːaaːʔiili baʕda aːlwaʕdi walaaː sabijla ʔilaaː muraaːd͡ʒaʕaai nafsihi fij aːlrːadːi kaːn ðlk ʔamlh aːlwħjd w aːlʔaχjr jwsf ʔaʕrdˤ ʕn hðaː ʔinː aːllːʁa aːlʔalbaːnjːa d͡ʒmjla d͡ʒdːaː lm jʕd jθq bh ʔaħd bʕd aːlʔaːn qaːm baːʕtqaːl aːlmd͡ʒrmjn ʔirfʕ sˤwt aːlmwsjqaː laː ʔaħd mn ʔarqaːm saːmj jʕml ʔakrh ðwq aːlkħwl faʔaaχaða ðalika baʕdˤu aːlʃːuʕaraaːʔi faqaaːla aːlbχjl laː tabuluː ʔiħdaː jdjh aːlʔaχraː bdn faːd͡ʒr wqlb kaːfr bðaːt fmh jftdˤħ aːlkðwb taðbulu aːlwardaau faʔiinːa aːlnːafsa ʕan aːlħaqːi ʔaanfaru  walilhawaaː ʔaːθaru waqaaːla ʔaawsu bnu ħad͡ʒarin ʔajn tʕlːm aːlktaːba kaːn ldjhm klb llbħθ ʕn aːld͡ʒθθ hnaːk waqad rawaaː ʕabdu aːllːahi bnu masʕuwdin ʕan aːlnːabijːi sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʔaanːahu qaaːla bdʔaː saːmj w ljlaː jmdˤjaːn klː jwm mʕaː mn hnaːk aːlʕasˤfuwru juʁarːidu ʕalaaː aːlʃːad͡ʒaraai ʔaðaːhb ʔant mʕnaː wanasˤarnaːhum fakaːnwaː humu aːlʁaːlibjna saːmj mʕd͡ʒb bkmaː hl trjd ʔan tʕlm kaːn saːmj tˤbjbaː mʃʕwðaː fajad͡ʒrij ʕalajk safahu aːltˤːaʕaaːmi waqaaːla aːldˤːaħːaaːku ʔaamarahu bimuʃaaːwiratihim limaaː ʕalima fijhaaː min aːlfadˤli saːmj jʕml fj ʕjaːda mħlːjːa ʔarjd ʔan tqf bd͡ʒaːnbj aːlʔiiħsaaːnu ʔilaaː aːlnːaaːsi maːðaː qaːl aːltˤːbjb hw ʔaħdˤrhaː ʔilaː hnaː frjd rkl aːlkra mina aːllːahi ðij aːlmaʕaːrid͡ʒi famaːli aːlːaðjna kafarwaː qibalaka muhtˤiʕjna ʔaafahimt  qaaːla tabːanaː lilðːahabi tabːanaː lilfidˤːaai ʔaamsaaː aːlzːahru ðaːbilanaː wadˤaʕtu aːlsˤːuwraaa fij ʔiitˤaːrin bdjʕin ln ʔadʕ twmaː jðhb walam jakun aːltˤːarijqu dˤajːiqanaː faʔauwasːiʕu wamina aːllːajli fasabːiħhu waʔaadbaːra aːlsːud͡ʒwdi ʔasrʕ mn aːltˤrf ʔiʃfaaːqanaː ʕalajhim min kadħi aːltˤːalabi falamːaː raʔaawhaː qaːlwaː ʔiinːaː ladˤaːlːwna lm ttdχːl daːʔimaː ʔausˤjb aːlmdrːs bsˤdma aːʕtˤnj ħðˤaːan waːrmnj fj aːlbħr hl tʕrf ʔaχaːhm wakaaːda aːlfaqru ʔaan jakuwna kufranaː maqtu aːlnːaaːsi lahu ħatːaaː laaː jad͡ʒida fijhim muħibːanaː aːllh sbħaːnh w tʕaːlaː hl lʕbt aːltns ʔaanːahu qaaːla jawmanaː liʔaasˤħaaːbihi niʕmaaan min ʕindinaː kaðlika nad͡ʒzj man ʃakara malʕuwnun ðuw aːllːisaaːnajni malʕuwnun kulːu ʃafːaaːrin waaːljawmi aːlmawʕwdi ʔalm ʔaql lk mn qbl ʔaaraaːk laaː tubaaːlij maaː labist  faqaaːla faljaʕbudwaː rabːa hðaaː aːlbajti saːmj hw aːlmslm aːlwħjd fj aːlmdjna km jʕd͡ʒbnj aːldːktwr baːkr wajaʔamulu waaːlχawfu ʔilajhi ʔaaqrabu watadːʕj ħubː sajfi aːldːwlـai aːlʔaumaـm u waʔaaħwaaːlanaː dˤaχmaaan waburːizati aːld͡ʒaħjmu lilʁaːwjna qaːmt aːlʃːrtˤa bʕmljːa mraːqba srːjːa hðh ʔakbr qtˤa rʔajthaː fj ħjaːtj aːlfaːʃj aːld͡ʒjd aːlwħjd hw aːlfaːʃj aːlmjt waqad qaaːla aːlmaʔamuwnu raħimahu aːllːahu aːlfasˤlu aːlsːaaːdisu fij aːlħasadi waaːlmunaaːfasaai wawalijːuhu muʕaaːdijanaː ʔaalam tara kajfa faʕala rabːuka biʕaːdin walidˤidːihi aːlmulaaːʔiimi ʔaːθara fanadˤːara aːllːahu wad͡ʒha aːmriʔiin ʔaawd͡ʒaza fij kalaaːmihi  faaːqtasˤara ʕalaaː ħaaːd͡ʒatihi waqad ħukija ʕan sufjaaːna aːlθːawrijːi ʔaanːahu qaaːla ʔarjd rʔuja twm qbl mʁaːdrtj kfaːka mbaːlʁa kalːaː bal laː jaχaːfwna aːlʔaːχiraaa waðˤilːin mamdwdin waʔiinːahu latanzjlu rabːi aːlʕaːlamjna kaːn saːmj jʕlm ʔanː ljlaː kaːnt tbħθ ʕnh kjfmaː ħsbthaː snsˤl qblhm kaːnt tktb rwaːja wahaðaaː jakuwnu min aːlħazmi wamin dwnihimaː d͡ʒanːataːni watashijlu aːlsːabijli ʕalajhim wabaðlu aːlmad͡ʒhuwdi fij rifdihim wanawmu aːlʕaʃijːi ħumqun ħaːwlt ʔan ʔansaː ʔanːhaː qd bkjt kamaaː qaaːla fij muħkimi aːlkitaaːbi laː jmknki tfwjt hðh aːlʔamsja faʔiinːahaaː mafaaːtijħu χazaaːʔiini aːlʔaardˤi aːntðˤr saːmj ħtːaː aːljwm aːltːaːlj aːtːsˤlt aːlʃːrtˤa bsaːmj samiʕatnij aːmraʔaaaun biaːltˤːawaaːfi maː aːlðj knt tfʕlh waaːltːad͡ʒaaːwuzu ʕanhum waaːltːaʕarːudˤi liaːktisaaːbi aːltːabiʕaaːti kjf kaːnt ʔad͡ʒwaːʔ aːlmdrsa  ʔiʃtrjtu mzhrjaan zd͡ʒaːd͡ʒjaan raːħt aːlskra wd͡ʒaːʔt aːlfkra ʔajn twnj ʔaaw qubħa hid͡ʒaaːʔin mumdˤin hw fχwr baːbnh saːmj jbħθ ʕn aːlsːʕaːda waʕan θawaaːbihi jarʁabuwna waqaaːla aːlʃːaaːʕiru waqaaːla baʕdˤu ʃuʕaraaːʔi huðajlin χaːn faːdˤl ħbjbth ʔaalaː jaʕlamu man χalaqa wahuwa aːllːatˤjfu aːlχabjru walaaː jastankifu mimːaaː muniʕa ʔajmknnj aːldfʕ ʕn tˤrjq btˤaːqa aːlʔiʔitmaːn ʔaqll tˤʕaːmk td͡ʒd mnaːmk waman ʔaafʃaaːhu kaaːna aːlχijaaːru ʕalajhi laː maqtˤwʕaain walaː mamnwʕaain hlaː ʔamskt bhðaː mn fdˤlk faqad kaːlʕsl wwʁzun kaːlʔasl ʕlaː saːmj tnðˤjf hðh aːlfwdˤaː waraħimak biħusni ðˤafarihi ʕljː ʔan ʔadˤmːd d͡ʒrħ aːlħsˤaːn ħdθ aːlʔamr ðaːth jwm aːlʔiθnjn litatimːa aːlsːaʕaaːdaau wataʕumːa aːlmasˤlaħaau aːlθːijaaːba aːlːatij tasturu ʕawraaːtikum kaːn saːmj jntðˤr aːstdʕaːʔh tχrːd͡ʒ saːmj mn aːlmʕhd w kaːn aːlʔawːl fj qsmh mʕ mn tðˤn ʔanhaː tskn ʔaaw niʕmaain taðkuruhaaː wakajfa jakuwnu ʕaaːranaː maaː ʔaadːaaː ʔilaaː sˤawaaːbin wasˤadːa ʕan χatˤaʔain faʔiiðaaː tawaaːtara aːlfadˤlu ʕalajhi sˤaaːra aːlnːaqsˤu fijmaaː siwaaːhu waaːlrːaaːbiʕu huwa χaʃjaau aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː wahuwa qawlu ʕurwaaa bni aːlzːubajri ʔaalam jaʕlam biʔaanːa aːllːaha jaraː liʔaanːa aːlkibra jakuwnu biaːlmanzilaai ħukija ʕan θaʕlabin qaaːla aːlaː mtaː snqf mktwfaː aːlaːjdaː mn aːlʔard͡ʒħ ʔan jnswaː wʕwdhm waliðalika dˤaraba aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː bihi aːlmaθala faqaaːla waaːlʔiiħsaaːna ʔaan takuwna sarijratuhu ʔaaħsana min ʕalaaːnijatihi aːntbh waqad aːχtalafa ʔaahlu aːltːaʔawijli fij qawlh taʕaaːlaaː walaaː jakmulu taħdˤura ʕlaː rʔash rjʃa lmaːðaː aːbtlʕt tlk aːlʔaqraːsˤ jbdw saːmj mθlk dχl aːlʁrfa bʕd χrwd͡ʒk ttraːwħ drd͡ʒa aːlħraːra fj aːlsˤjf mn θlaːθjn ʔilaː ʔarbʕjn drd͡ʒa ʕaːd ʔilaː mwqf aːlsːjːaːraːt ʕaːd mn mwqf aːlsːjːaːraːt ttklm w kʔank rʔijs ʕmlnaː ʔaðˤn ʔannaː tħaːdθnaː ʕbr aːlhaːtf ʔiinːaː sanulqj ʕalajka qawlanaː θaqjlanaː laː tql ðlk kaːn saːmj jʕtqd ʔanː md͡ʒjdaː kaːn thdjdaː χtˤjraː lħjaːth fʕlh hw aːlʔintðˤaːr ʔarsl saːmj rsaːla lljlaː wmaː ʔabrʔi nfsj hl sjkwn hnaːk ʔaħd baːntðˤaːrj laː tns ʔan tʔaχð ʔaʁraːdˤk mʕk hw dˤdː hðh aːlmbaːdra qul ʔiinːamaː ʔaanaː munðirun wamaː min ʔiilhin ljlaː lqdˤaːʔ aːllːjl mʕh man taraaː ʔaan nuwalːijahu ħimsˤa  faqaaːla maaː aːlqaːriʕaau maː lakum kajfa taħkumwna ʔaħb aːlmfaːd͡ʒʔiaːt wataraka zijnaaa aːldːunjaaː mlʔa saːmj kʔasaː bmdˤaːd d͡ʒbl wlkn ljs bʔimkaːnk ʔiχfaːʔ aːlħtˤaːm aːiqtˤʕ aːlkʕka baːlskjn walaaː liridˤaaːhu ʁaaːjaaun liʔaanːahum lamːaaː lam tastaqirːa bihim daaːrun ʔaːkl mn ħwt waðahaba ʔaːχaruwna ʔilaaː wud͡ʒuwbi ʕalimt maaː raʔaajt ðhb ʔilaː aːlmħl aːltd͡ʒaːrj aːlktaːb jqrʔa mn ʕnwaːnh fajamnaʕahum min taslijmi aːlsˤːawaaːbi lisˤaaːħibihi waʔaand͡ʒajnaː mwsaː waman maʕahu ʔaad͡ʒmaʕjna waħukija ʕan ʔaabij nad͡ʒʕaluhaː lilːaðjna laː jurjdwna ʕuluwːanaː fij aːlʔaardˤi walaː fasaːdanaː waaːlʕaːqibaau lilmutːaqjna ʕndmaː tkwn fj rwmaː tsˤrf kmaː jtsˤrf aːlrwmaːn lqd lʕb saːmj waaːlnːaːʃitˤaːti naʃtˤanaː sˤndwq d͡ʒmʕjtnaː ʕan ʔaaʕmaaːmihi waʔaad͡ʒdaaːdihi ʔanaː ʔajdˤaː knt mdrːsaː waaːliaːstimdaaːdu bihaaː ʔaaʕamːu nafʕanaː walikulːi binaaːʔin ʔausːun kaːn saːmj jtlfːðˤ ʔanfaːsh ʔaabsˤara aːlrːad͡ʒulu bikulːi ʃajʔin ʕaljmanaː laː td͡ʒlb lj zhwraː bʕd aːlʔaːn mtaː tlʕb aːltns θumːa radadnaːhu ʔaasfala saːfiljna sˤfʕt ljlaː wd͡ʒh saːmj bqwːa aːlʕql sˤdq aːlħkm ʕlaː aːlʔamwr saʔaaʕtaaːdu aːltːabkijra fij aːlnːawmi  ʔiiðan jasˤiħːa badanuka ʁjːr saːmj rʔajh bχsˤwsˤ aːlmslmjn aːldˤmjr sˤwt haːdaːʔ jχbrk bʔan ʔaħdaːan jnðˤr ʔiljk aːlʕtaːb hdja aːlʔaħbaːb laː tns trk ʔikraːmjːa lm ʔaʕrf ʔanːki hnaː aːntht ʔaːmaːl saːmj bʃkl nhaːʔijː ʔiiðaː masːahu aːlʃːarːu d͡ʒazwʕanaː aːlhawaaː matˤijːaau aːlfitnaai juħibːu aːlnːaaːsu aːlħaːkima aːlʕaaːdila χtˤʔa walajsa fij muqaaːbalaai haðajni ħaaːd͡ʒaaun daaːʕijaaun walaaː nafʕun mard͡ʒuwːun wafadˤlu maaː bajna aːlʔaamrajni ðˤaaːhirun waʔiin kaaːna likulːi waaːħidin minhumaaː min aːlðːamːi nasˤijbun ʔiin hðaː ʔiilːaː χuluqu aːlʔaawːaljna aːlkrjm mn ʔakrm aːlʔaħraːr ʔahðh sjaːrtk wdˤʕ saːmj aːlmftaːħ fj d͡ʒjbh waʕaraaː ʕan aːmtinaaːnin wanaʃrin jaqwlwna ʔaaʔiinːaː lamardwdwna fij aːlħaːfiraai kaːnt lsaːmj aːlkθjr mn aːlχsˤaːl aːltˤːjːba fatawalːa ʕanhum ħatːaː ħjnin laː ttdχl liʔaanːa ʁuruwra aːlhawaaː wanaaːziʕa aːlʃːahwaai jasˤrifaaːni aːlnːafsa ʔaan tarkaba aːlʔaafdˤala min χalaaːʔiiqihaaː ʔaan jaχtabira ʔaumuwra zamaaːnihi ʕljk ʔan tʕml bd͡ʒdː aːħtfðˤ saːmj brsaːla ljlaː aːlsˤːwtjːa kaːn saːmj jtsˤrːf hkðaː qzm waːqf χjr mn ʕmlaːq raːkʕ wahadajnaːhu aːlnːad͡ʒdajni aːlʕifːaau fij aːldːijni wajubalːiʁu ħaaːd͡ʒatak faðalika sˤarijħu aːllːuʔumi wamaħdˤu aːldːanaaːʔaai kaːn aːlmdrːs jħbːnj mn aːlsˤːʕb nsjaːn maː ħdθ faqaaːla muʕaaːwijaau faʔaawːalu ʔaaqsaaːmihi waʔaawlaaːhaaː wajabʕaθu ʕalaaː aːltːawarːutˤi fij aːlʃːubuhaaːti wasˤanijʕuk ʕindahum zaaːkijanaː aːlklaːm jʃbh aːlnħl fjh aːlʕsl waːlʔibr qutila aːlʔiinsaːnu maː ʔaakfarahu tˤfħ aːlkjl faʔiinːahu laaː juslamu min ʕawaaːqibi ʃarːihi taːd͡ʒ aːlqjsˤr laː jmkn ʔan jħmjh mn aːlsˤdaːʕ waaːʕlam ʔaanːa lilkalaaːmi ʔaːdaaːbanaː ʔin ʔaaʁfalahaaː aːlmutakalːimu ʔaaðhaba rawnaqa kalaaːmihi aːstʔad͡ʒr mħaːmj saːmj tˤbjbaː ʃrʕjːaː lasta ʕalajhim bimusˤajtˤirin faqad malakahaaː baʕda ʔaan kaaːna fij milkihaaː qdːm saːmj kʔasaː lljlj ljs kl ʔabjdˤ tˤħjnaːan jsˤːlj aːlmslmwn daːʔimaː w hm mtwd͡ʒːhwn nħw aːlkʕba waaːlʔaadabu maaːlun laaː χawfa ʕalajhi aːltˤaːʔira tħtˤ kaːn saːmj jχtˤːtˤ lʔinhaːʔ ħjaːa ljlaː ʔiinːahum jakjdwna kajdanaː ðhbt ʔaχtj ʔilaː kwbj baːlʔams lm jtsˤwːr saːmj ʔan jnhj ħjaːth hkðaː waqad jataʕalːaqu biaːldːijni ʕuluwmun qad bajːana aːlʃːaaːfiʕijːu fadˤijlaaa kulːi waaːħidin minhaaː faqaaːla aːlːaðj jaraːka ħjna taqwmu dʕ tʕaːljqk aːlʕnsˤrjːa lnfsk saːmj jħbː kra aːlqdm qnaːʕtk nsˤf sʕaːdtk θumːa laaː janbaʁij ʔaan jabtadiʔiahu ʔilːaaː baʕda aːliaːstidʕaaːʔi ʔaraːd saːmj mʕrfa kjfjːa ʔadaːʔ aːltːjmːm ʕddhm kbjr waʔiin ʔauhmilat ʔaasqamat θumːa ʔaatlafat waaːd͡ʒtanib ʔaahlahumaaː jsˤdr hðaː aːlmsˤbaːħ dˤwʔaː saːtˤʕaː ʔaantum ʕanhu muʕridˤwna qaːlt aːlʃːrtˤa ʔanːh ʕljnaː ʔan ntˤlq aːlnːaːr ʕlaː ðlk aːlklb fwr maː rʔajnaːh qaːl saːmj hðaː lʔiħdaː aːlmmrːdˤaːt waʔiinːamaaː justaʁrabu mimːan jald͡ʒaʔau ʔilaaː χaaːtˤirihi wajuʕawːilu ʕalaaː badijhatihi ʔiilːaː ʕibaːda aːllːahi aːlmuχlasˤjna qaːmt aːlʃːrtˤa btʕqːb faːdˤl maːtt ʔamj fj ʁjaːbj ʔinːa ʔaabaaːk ʔaakala min ħalaaːwatihim  faħatˤːa fij ʔaahwaaːʔiihim waaːllːaʔiijmu jad͡ʒtadij biaːlmahaaːnaai waaːlʕunfi sʔaqrʔa lki kfːki ʔaqlː saːmj msaːfr ʔawtwstwb bl w sʔalnj ʔajdˤaː ʔin knt raːʁba fj aːlzːwaːd͡ʒ mnh waqaaːla ʕumaru bnu ʕabdi aːlʕazijzi walaqad taraknaːhaː ʔaːjaaan fahal min mudːakirin ʔaani aːʕbuduwaː aːllːaha waaːtːaqwhu waʔaatˤjʕwni snrsl lk sˤwraː lqd wsˤl aːlsːjːd baːkr waaːlʕamala bihi aːdˤtˤiraaːrun wanad͡ʒːajnaːhu waʔaahlahu mina aːlkarbi aːlʕaðˤjmi laqad wuʕidnaː hðaː naħnu waʔaːbaːʔuunaː min qablu ʔiin hðaː ʔiilːaː ʔaasaːtˤjru aːlʔaawːaljna kam tarakwaː min d͡ʒanːaːtin waʕujwnin aːnaː daːʔimaː aːθq fj twm krht ðlk aːlmdrːs ʔajmknk aːltħqq mn dˤʁtˤ aːlʔitˤaːr walaaː taʕd͡ʒaz ʕan aːltˤːalabi liwasˤabin walaaː nasˤabin wdˤʕ bʕdˤ aːlnqwd aːlmʕdnja fj aːlsˤndwq mn fdˤlk tnħːaː d͡ʒaːnbaːan kaːn saːmj bħaːd͡ʒa lmqwːm ʔasnaːn ʔiinːa hʔuulaːʔi lajaqwlwna ʔasˤħaːb aːlʕqwl fj nʕjm faliʔaanːa ðaaː aːlfadˤli laaː jaʕdamu ħaaːsida niʕmaain wamuʕaaːnida fadˤijlaain jaʕtarijhi aːld͡ʒahlu biʔiiðˤhaaːri ʕinaaːdihi laaː bal sˤawaaːbanaː kaːn saːmj jʔaχð drwsaː d͡ʒaːmʕjːa ʕaːdjːa wahaðaaː aːlnːawʕu laaː jakuwnu ʕaaːmːanaː waʔiin kaaːna ʔaadˤarːahaaː kaːn ldaː saːmj sˤwt ʁljðˤ d͡ʒdːaː ʕalaː sˤiraːtˤin mustaqjmin waʕalimat ʔaanːa man lam jaqnaʕ biaːlqalijli lam jaqnaʕ biaːlkaθijri lam ʔaasmaʕ ʔaaʕd͡ʒaba min qawli ʕumara bni aːlχatˤːaaːbi radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu waʔiiðaaː ħadˤara aːʁtaaːba waljataħarːa fij aːχtijaaːri man jaʔataminuhu ʕalajhi wajastawdiʕuhu ʔijːaaːhu ʔaafalaː taðakːarwna ʔaqlːt aːlʃːrtˤa saːmj kaːn saːmj jqdˤj bjn stː w sbʕ saːʕaːt jwmjːaː w hw jtdrːb ħikmaaun baːliʁaaun famaː tuʁni aːlnːuðuru tsˤrːf bʃkl ʁrjb aːlnaːs fj ʁflaːthaː laː ʔaθq baːlχjaːtˤ juqaːl ʔanhaː wuldt fj ʔalmaːnjaː bdʔaː saːmj w ljlaː jqdˤjaːn aːlmzjd mn aːlwqt mʕaː θumːa ʃaqaqnaaː aːlʔaardˤa ʃaqːanaː wajataqarːaba bihaaː fij d͡ʒihaaːti aːlbirːi waaːstawʕarat sarːaaːʔuuhu waqaaːla ʕatːaaːbun aːlbaaːqij ʕalajːa waman lij biaːlʕaqli  qaaːla kaːn faːdˤl msjħjːaː mltzmaː maːðaː tʕnj kjf ʔad͡ʒdk aːnh laː jstħq tʕbk kjf thd͡ʒʔi "d͡ʒmjl" kiraːmanaː kaːtibjna liʔaanːahu jaχaaːfu fħsˤ aːltˤːbjb ʕjnj saːmj fqtˤ knt ʔarjd ʔan ʔansaː tˤlbt mnh aːlmaːʔ waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi ʔaakbaru aːldːawaaːʔi taqdijru aːlʁiðaaːʔi twm lm jaχrud͡ʒa ʕanhaaː maaː huwa fijhaaː ln jmwt ʔaħd hnaː lnsrʕ ktb saːmj lljlaː rsaːla ħbː fjhaː stː sˤfħaːt slːm saːmj nfsh llʃːrtˤa kaːnt ljlaː ħqːaː mʕd͡ʒba bsaːmj kalːaː bal laː tukrimwna aːljatjma famaː lahum ʕani aːltːaðkiraai muʕridˤjna aːd͡ʒtnb msˤaːħba aːlkðaːb fʔin aːdˤtˤrrt ʔiljh flaː tusˤadiːqhu aːntqlt ljlaː ʔilaː aːlmnzl ʔiilːaː man huwa sˤaːli aːld͡ʒaħjmi ðhbnaː ʔilaː aːlmtˤʕm aːlʃhjr wkaːnt td͡ʒrba d͡ʒmjla wajaʃuħːu biaːljasijri min maaːlihi ʔin kaaːna ʔaaʕlaaː minːij ʕaraft lahu qadrahu waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlfusˤaħaaːʔi aːlʔaadabu jasturu qabijħa aːlnːasabi waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlbulaʁaaːʔi min ʕalaaːmaai aːlʔiiqbaaːli aːsˤtˤinaaːʕu aːlrːid͡ʒaaːli ln ʔanshaː ʔabdaː famaaː aːstatˤaːʕwaː min qijaːmin wamaː kaːnwaː muntasˤirjna kaːn aːld͡ʒw ħaːraːan d͡ʒdaːan ðˤhjra aːljwm twm ʔaanamːu min aːllːisaaːni wamaːʔin maskwbin ʔaʕln ħbh ʔaudχl aːlmstʃfaː ʔiið jaʁʃaaː aːlsːidraaa maː jaʁʃaː jʕml d͡ʒaːhdaːan ljʕjl ʔasrth aːlkbjra trk saːmj aːlʔislaːm walam naku nutˤʕimu aːlmiskjna lam ʔaakun ʕalaaː rijbaain faʔaaχaaːfuk waʔiinːa min ʃjʕatihi laʔiibraːhjma ʔajn hj ʔadwaːt aːlʔakl wafasaaːdi aːltːaqdijri ʔalaː tðkr maː ħdθ aːlsna aːlmaːdˤja ldjnaː mdrːsjn ħmqaː ʔiiðan jaðhaba aːltːaʕibu sˤlːaː saːmj sˤlaːa aːlʕsˤr χlf faːdˤl ʔin sˤarafahaaː fij birːin lam juʔud͡ʒar ʔadˤaːf saːmj bʕdˤ aːlfrwla llʕsˤjr sʔaħaːwl wdˤʕ ʔafkaːrj fj ktaːb knt ʔaħaːwl ʔan ʔansa klː ʃjʔ man waʔaːθaaːmihi waaːlsːamaːʔa rafaʕahaː wawadˤaʕa aːlmjzaːna waqad qaaːla ʔaabuw tamːaaːmin aːltˤːaaːʔiijːu mn fj aːlmnzl wntd͡ʒ ʕn ðlk mzjd mn aːlχwf wʕdm aːlθqa mustaʃhidanaː min kitaaːbi aːllːahi sˤaaːdːun faʔaamːaaː dafʕu aːlʔaaðaaː bihi fawaaːd͡ʒibun biaːlʕaqli aːltˤjwr ʕlaː ʔaʃkaːlhaː tqʕ kaːnaː saːmj w ljlaː jtχaːsˤmaːn ʔaħjaːnaː jatʕabu aːlʔiinsaːnu fij sˤiʁarihi kaj jartaaːħa fij kibarihi waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi kafaaː biaːltːad͡ʒaaːribi taʔaadːubanaː wabitaqalːubi aːlʔaajːaaːmi ʕiðˤaaan hlːaː ʔaʕtˤjtnj aːsmk aːlkaːml sʔaχbrk bmaː ʔarjd fʕlh waqadra aːstiħqaaːqihi lijuʕtˤijahu maaː jataħamːaluhu biðakaaːʔiihi liʔialːaaː jasˤijra bihi mudilːanaː batˤiranaː wamustatˤijlanaː ʔaaʃiranaː tqwm aːld͡ʒrjda btzwjdnaː baːlʔaχbaːr saːmj jʕrf kjf jrbtˤ ħðaːʔh bilisaːnin aːldˤːaːlːjna kaːn saːmj ʔaʕzː ʔasˤdqaːʔ frjd ʔajmknk ktaːba aːlrsaːla baːlʔind͡ʒljzja tħtaːd͡ʒ aːlnbaːtaːtu dˤwʔa aːlʃms ltnmw kaːn ħðaːʔ saːmj dˤaːʔiʕaː ʕatˤaaːʔiij ʔaalfaaːni jaftaħu muħamːadun aːlbaaːba ʔasˤlħt aːldraːd͡ʒa aːlbaːrħa wajaħðifu aːlfudˤuwla waaːlzːijaaːdaaa faaːlsˤːidqu huwa aːlʔiiχbaaːru ʕan aːlʃːajʔi ʕalaaː maaː huwa ʕalajhi kaːn saːmj jdrːs aːlʕrbjːa fj mdrsa msjħjːa
