ʕqaːrb waaːlːaðjna fj ʔaamwaːlihim ħaqːun maʕlwmun maː zaːl ðraːʕj jʔulmnj kaːnt ħjaːa saːmj fj mftrq aːltˤːrqaːt kaːlmstd͡ʒjr mn aːlrmdˤaːʔ baːlnaːr kjf td͡ʒrʔijn ʔan tklːmjnj bhðh aːlnːbra jaː sjːda wudˤʕ saːmj fj sjːaːra ʔisʕaːf lan ʔausaaːfira waħdij ʔiðaaː zaaːla maʕahaaː aːltːad͡ʒamːulu faaːqtuluwaː ʔaanfusakum ðaaːlikum χajrun lakum waχuruwd͡ʒihi ʕan d͡ʒumlaai aːlʕawaaːmː aːlmustarðalijna watarku aːldːunjaaː ʔaafdˤalu min mulaaːbasatihaaː aːʁtanim χamsanaː qabla χamsin ʔastsaːʕdhm lm jtʕrːf saːmj btaːtaː ʕlaː sˤwt ljlaː ʔiinːa ʕaðaːba rabːika lawaːqiʕun qaaːla ʔaatastabdiluwna aːlːaðij huwa ʔaadnaaːaː biaːlːaðij huwa χajrun rawaaː aːbnu masʕuwdin ʔaanːa ʔaːχira maaː nazala min aːlqurʔaːni ldjnaː mdrːs msnː hl ʔadˤʕt ʃjʔiaːan hnaː waaːlʕuquwlu lahaaː muwaaːfiqaaun d͡ʒalasa aːlwaladu kaj jastarijħa wakulːa ʃajʔin ʔaaħsˤajnaːhu kitaːbanaː naðjranaː lilbaʃari lmaːðaː tkrhnj kaːnt ljlaː tqdːm drwsaː fj mdrsa aːlʔaħd aːlsfr jwsʕ ʔaːfaːq tfkjr aːlmrʔ wajaʕlama aːlːaðjna jud͡ʒaːdilwna fj ʔaːjaːtinaː maː lahum min maħjsˤin ʕljk ʔan tʕml bd͡ʒhd ʔakbr walaaː aːlðˤːulumaːtu walaaː aːlnːwru waaːlbatˤna wamaaː waʕaaː liʔaasˤħaːbi aːljamjni ln ʔaðhb llmdrsa jwm aːlsbt wasuʔiila muħamːadu bnu ʕalijːin ʕan aːlmuruwʔaai faqaaːla aːindlʕt aːlħrb ʔaχjraːan liʔaanːa firaaːqa aːlmaʔaluwfi fij aːlʕaaːdaai ʔajn tðhb llʕml waðakara aːsma rabːihi fasˤalːaː d͡ʒ saːmj jħbː aːlħsaːʔ ʔardt qraːʔthm hðaː ʔad͡ʒml waʔiin harabta minhum tˤalabuwka waman χadamak faaːstaχdimijhi warawaaː saʕijdu bnu d͡ʒubajrin qaaːla ðhb saːmj ʔilaː tlk aːlnːaːfða nuzulanaː min ʁafwrin raħjmin ʔajn aːlmχrd͡ʒ tusˤbiħu aːlʁurfaau naðˤijfaaan walakinːij raʔaajt ðaaː aːlmaaːli mahijbanaː kaːn jʃʕr ʕlaː maː jraːm ʕndmaː fħsˤth θumːa biaːlʕaaːdaai jasˤijru kaaːlχuluqi kaːn ʕndj mdrːswn mtʕsːf laː tnsh ʔabdaː taðˤalːu aːlʕaaːmilaau muʃtaʁilaaan ʔilaː ʔajn ʔant ðaːhb walaaː min aːlħazmi ʔidˤaaːʕaau nasˤijbihi min aːltːawakːuli wakunːaː nukaðːibu bijawmi aːldːjni man ʔaaraaːda birːa aːlwaaːlidajni faljuʕtˤi aːlʃːuʕaraaːʔa wasˤaaːbiruwaː ʕaduwːakum laː ʔasttˤjʕ aːltːd͡ʒmːl fj ʃhr rmdˤaːn watarka maaː tahwaaː dawaaːʔuuhaaː waʔiin lam tuʔuminwaː lj faaːʕtazilwni rkdˤt ljlaː llnːd͡ʒaːa bħjaːthaː maːtwaː waːħdaː tlw aːlʔaːχr kaːnt aːlmdrːsa tbkj lm jsˤdr saːmj ʔajːa dˤd͡ʒːa aːlħilmu waaːlʁadˤabu aːlfasˤlu aːlrːaaːbiʕu fij aːlħilmi waaːlʁadˤabi waðˤalama faaːstaʁfara lm jkn saːmj jʃrb maːrj aːmrʔaa faːtna bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi tanzjlu aːlkitaːbi mina aːllːahi aːlʕazjzi aːlħakjmi waːldj saːmj mslmwn wahuwa aːlːaðj d͡ʒaʕala lakumu aːllːajla libaːsanaː waaːlnːawma subaːtanaː wad͡ʒaʕala aːlnːahaːra nuʃwranaː flaːn kaːlkʕba tuzaːru wlaː tustazaːru waaːliaːstirsaaːlu fij aːliaːstiʕaaːnaai lm jsttˤʕ saːmj tħmːl ðlk aːldˤːd͡ʒjd͡ʒ ʔanaː mtzwːd͡ʒ baːmrʔaa flstˤjnja dˤrb ʔaχmaːsaː bʔasdaːs maːðaː lw fʃil faʔiinːahum laʔaːkilwna minhaː famaːliʔiwna minhaaː aːlbutˤwna jd͡ʒb ʔan laː tlʕb hl fhmt "ʔanaː lm ʔafhm btaːtaː" waqijla lilʃːaʕbijːi fij naaːʔiibaain kajfa ʔaasˤbaħt  qaaːla bal ʔaaʕrifuk qaːlwaː tˤaːʔiirukum maʕakum ʔaaʔiin ðukːirtum bal ʔaantum qawmun musrifwna θumːa ʔiinːa lahum ʕalajhaː laʃawbanaː min ħamjmin wajuwħiʃu mink aːlmusˤaaːħibijna laː ttrknj wħjdaː ʔakrh rʔujtk ħzjna ʔamdˤt ljlaː jwmaː kaːmlaː bdwn tnaːwl dwaːʔ ħjwjː qaːm saːmj baːltˤːlb θm aːntðˤr ʔaan jakuwna salijma aːlfikri min hamːin qaaːtˤiʕin waʔiinːa min aːlbajaaːni lasiħranaː aːʕtnq saːmj aːlʔislaːm ħdjθaː ʔarjd aːlʕjʃ hnaː waʔiiðaaː aːlʕiʃaːru ʕutˤːilat sʔal mdrːsaː ʔaːχr maʔaχuwðun biwizrihaaː wqʕ saːmj fj ħbː ftaːa mslma aːsmhaː ljlaː mtaː tdrs laː ʔaʕrf kjf ʔaʃkrk ʔatraː aːlfrnsja sˤʕba kaːn aːlħfl d͡ʒjːdaː llʁaːja aːlʕdl ʔasaːs aːlmulk wafij jadihi zijaaːdaaan ʕan kifaaːjatihi ʔamː saːmj msjħjːa d͡ʒjːda ʔaʕrf ðlk aːlwld saːmj jħbː aːlʔakl aːlmsˤrj wamaː waʔatwnj muslimjna ʔiin ʕudta ʔiilaaː aːlðːanbi falan ʔausaaːmiħaka knt mdʕwaː lm jkn saːmj naːʔimaː walaaː tusrifuwaː taʔawijlaaːni sʔaðhb aːlʕifːaau waaːlnːazaaːhaau waaːlsˤːijaaːnaau rʔaːnj baːlqwaːnjn ħraːra aːltˤqs ttzaːjd smʕt ljlaː ʔasˤwaːtaː ʁrjba lmaːðaː tdrs kalːaː sajaʕlamwna waaːlʕuduwlu ʕan aːlkalaaːmi aːlmustarðali naħnu χalaqnaːkum falawlaː tusˤadːiqwna falaaː taʕdil ʕan biaːlsːuʔuaaːli ʕan naqsˤihim kaːn saːmj jʕlm ʔajn hw sˤfːh ʔinj ʔasˤlj aːstjqðˤ saːmj brsaːla sˤwtjːa mn ljlaː wadawlaau aːlʕaaːqili kaaːlnːasijbi aːlːaðij jaħinːu ʔilaaː aːlwasˤlaai smʕ twm sˤwtaː ljlaː aːlkθjr mn aːlʔasˤdqaːʔ aːlmʃtrkjn ʔiinːaː ʔaarsalnaːka ʃaːhidanaː wamubaʃːiranaː wanaðjranaː tˤaaːra aːlʕasˤfuwru waaːlmunqatˤiʕu ʕanhum waħʃijːanaː walaaː aːstawlat ʕalajhi rutˤuwbaau aːlharimi wabalːiʁ biʔaawd͡ʒazi lafðˤin ʁaaːjaaa aːltːaqwijmi dʕaː saːmj aːllh kj jʁfr lh ʔiin huwa ʔiilːaː ʕabdun ʔaanʕamnaː ʕalajhi wad͡ʒaʕalnaːhu maθalanaː libanj ʔiisraːʔijla raʔaajtu rasuwla ʔaatˤaaːʕahu waʔaawʕada bihi min aːlʕiqaaːbi liman ʕasˤaaːhu aːntqln ʔilaː mnzlj aːlʔaml ljs aːstraːtjd͡ʒja mn aːlsˤʕb trd͡ʒma aːlqsˤaːʔid aːlʃʕrja ʔilaː lʁa ʔaχraː saːmj jtðkːr ðlk aːlmnzl falaaː jastatˤijʕu sˤabranaː ʕalaaː balwaaː maːðaː jntðˤr faːdˤl ʕaːd bwb ʔilaː aːlbjt mtʔaχraːan waaːlnːafʕu aːlθːaaːnij zijaaːdaau aːlʕilmi waʔiitqaaːnu aːlħifðˤi waχasˤːa aːlsˤːabijːa aːħsn aːlðˤn jaː ʔaχj tazdaħimu aːlmadijnaau biaːlsːukːaaːni famin ðalika satruhu ʕan ʔiðaaːʕaain jastatˤijlu lahaaː  waʔiiχfaaːʔuuhu ʕan ʔiʃaaːʕaain jastadilːu bihaaː tʔakːd mn ðlk bnfsk lnlʕb aːlkra tħlːj baːlsˤːbr w aːntðˤri naːwlnj aːlqlm baʕda ʔaan tubqij ʕalajk maaː aːħtaqanat min ʔaawzaaːri wusˤuwlihaaː ʔilajk lqd wqf twm bd͡ʒaːnbk ʔaajːuhaaː aːlmaliku ʕalajk biaːliaːʕtidaaːli fij kulːi aːlʔaumuwri kaːn faʔaatbaʕwhum muʃriqjna jaðhabu aːltːilmjðu ʔiilaaː aːlmadrasaai km ʕmrk laː ʔaʕrf ʔilːaː hðaː faʔiiðaaː taqarːara lahu aːlrːaʔaju ʔaamdˤaaːhu falam waʔaaʕtˤathu qijaaːdahaaː waqaːla ʔiinːj ðaːhibun ʔiilaː rabːj sajahdjni waʔaamːaaː aːlnːamijmaau faʔiin ʔaawatˤʔaahu aːtːasaʕa bikaθraai aːlʔaansˤaaːri waaːlʃːijaʕi jaː twm "jaː maːrj" warubːamaaː kaaːnat dˤaaːrːaaan jnbʁj ʕlaː saːmj ʔan jtmtːʕ bħjaːth maː hw ʔafdˤl mkaːn jmkn ʃraːʔ aːllːħm mnh bikam taʃtarija aːlburtuqaːlaaa  man ħaaːðara lam jahlaʕ ʔinhaː ttnaːwl aːlʕʃaːʔ wamin sunani rasuwli aːllːahi sˤalawaaːtu aːllːahi ʕalajhi bimaaː judˤaaːhijhi waqaaːla aːlbuħturijːu tlqːt ljlaː ħkmaː baːlmʔubːd hnaːk aːθnaː ʕʃr ʃhranaː fj aːlsna man kafara faʕalajhi kufruhu waman ʕamila sˤaːliħanaː faliʔaanfusihim jamhadwna ʔajː mnhm hw fj aːlmlʕb ʔaanːaː sˤababnaaː aːlmaːʔa sˤabːanaː walaw naʃaːʔu lamasaχnaːhum ʕalaː makaːnatihim famaaː aːstatˤaːʕwaː mudˤijːanaː walaː jard͡ʒiʕwna balaaː jaaː rasuwla aːllːahi waʔaabaaːħahu waħaðˤarahu waqalbanaː ʃaaːkiranaː jaħtariqu aːlħatˤabu waaːlqudraau ʔaafdˤalu min aːlʕad͡ʒzi ʔiinːaː hadajnaːhu aːlsːabjla ʔiimːaː ʃaːkiranaː waʔiimːaː kafwranaː ʔiðaaː ðˤanantum falaaː tuħaqːiquwaː ʔaamːaː mani aːstaʁnaː wabiqawlihi wasaraaːbijla taqijkum baʔasakum aːldːuruwʕa aːlːatij taqij aːlbaʔasa wahuwa aːlħarbu θumːa qaraʔaa aːntql saːmj llʕjʃ fj wlaːja ʔaːχraː ʔaʕndk krjm lʔaʃʕa aːlʃms faʔiiðaː bizjnaain aːlkawaːkibi ʕaːlimu aːlʁajbi waaːlʃːahaːdaai aːlʕazjzu aːlħakjmu falamːaː ʔaaslamaː watalːahu lild͡ʒabjni ʔatħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja kl jwm mħrr hðaː aːlmqaːl naːqd mʃhwr waħaʃwuk fijmaaː bajna ðalika bawlun waʕaðiraaun fasˤaaːrat aːltˤːijaraau min simaaːti aːlʔiidbaaːri waaːtˤːiraaːħuhaaː min ʔimaaːraaːti aːlʔiiqbaaːli waqaaːla bazard͡ʒamharu walaw ʔaalqaː maʕaːðjrahu nʃʔa saːmj w hw jraː waːldjh jtχaːsˤmaːn d͡ʒiʔiti kaj ʔaataʕalːama ʔaħdhm ʕlaː aːlbaːb baːrk aːllh fjk ʔarsl saːmj aːlʕdjd mn aːlrːsaːʔil lljlaː ʔaʃd͡ʒʕ mn djk lqd tˤʕnt mdrːsj ħdːd saːmj mwʕdaː laːd͡ʒtmaːʕ ʔaːχr mʕ rʔijs aːlʃːrtˤa aːlmwmnaːlmhjmnaːlwaːħd aːlʔaħd waaːallːahi jaaː rasuwla aːllːahi laqad sˤadaqt fij aːlʔauwlaaː wamaaː kaðabt fij aːlʔauχraaː rsb fj aːmtħaːnaːth bsbb qla aːlmðaːkra ʔibra fj kwma qʃ ðhb saːmj ʔilaː hnaːk laːsˤtˤħaːb ljlaː ʔaatawaːsˤawaː bihi bal hum qawmun tˤaːʁwna kaːn aːlmdrːs qd ðhb laaː tuʔuaaːχi ʃaaːʕiranaː faʔiinːahu jamdaħuk biθamanin wajahd͡ʒuwk mad͡ʒːaaːnanaː ʔiðaaː ʕanːa walam juraaːʕi sˤiħːaaa dawaaːʕijhi aːlhawaaː ʔilahun juʕbadu min duwni aːllːahi kaːn aːlmdrːs lʔijmaː llʁaːja bdʔat ljlaː trtdj aːlħd͡ʒaːb fj ftra ʃhr rmdˤaːn ʕaːd mn aːlmsd͡ʒd waaːlθːaaːnij maaː takuwnu aːlmuwaaːdˤaʕaau fij furuwʕihi waʔausˤuwlihi falawlaː ʔiiðaː balaʁati aːlħulqwma aːχlʕ nʕlajk ʔiiði aːlʔaaʁlaːlu fj ʔaaʕnaːqihim waaːlsːalaːsilu jusħabwna ljlaː ftaːa d͡ʒmjla laː jmknnj rʔujth faʔiinːa aːlʕajna raaːʔiidu aːlʃːahwaai aːʃtraː twm ʃraːbaː mn ʔaːla aːlbjʕ aːlʔaːlj laː tnðˤr ʔilaː aːlχlf saːmj mħðˤwðˤ bkwnh mslmaː aːljwm ðhb ʔibn saːmj ʔilaː aːld͡ʒaːmʕa aːlrfjq qbl aːltˤrjq wabiʃrun maqbuwlun saːmj jtwqːʕ ʔanː ljlaː stsaːmħh maː d͡ʒnsjth ʔadˤaːʕ aːlmdrːs wrqa aːmtħaːnj waʔiin ʔaamsakahu fahuwa zaaːduhu ʔilaaː aːlnːaaːri faʔiiðaaː takalːamta faʕalajk ʔaaw lak mtaː nsˤl ʔiinaːhum ʕlaː ʕlm wʔaχjranaː wd͡ʒdt mfaːtjħhaː aːlmfqwda rmaː aːlkra waaːltːaklijfu jad͡ʒmaʕu ʔaamranaː bitˤaaːʕaain wanahjanaː ʕan maʕsˤijaain waʔaamːaː ʕaːdun faʔauhlikwaː birjħin sˤarsˤarin ʕaːtijaain kaːn saːmj jʕlm ʔajn hw qsmh waʔiin kaaːna naqlu aːltˤːibaaːʕi ʕasiranaː lak biaːlrːijaaːdˤaai waaːltːadrijd͡ʒi jashulu minhaaː maaː aːustusˤʕiba rʔajt ðlk bʔam ʕjnj sjtqaːʕd ʔabj aːlrbjʕ aːlmqbl ʔajqðˤ mn ðʔib ðhb saːmj ljsˤtˤaːd aːljwm aːlqitˤːu ʔaaluwfun jnaːsbhaː aːlfstaːn aːlʔazrq laaː tuhmil duruwsaka ʃtˤbt aːlʃːrtˤa ʔasmaːʔ aːlʕdjd mn aːlmʃtbhjn baːlrːʁm mn mʃaːrka d͡ʒmjʕ skːaːn aːlmdjna fj aːlbħθ laː ʔaħd wd͡ʒd aːltˤːfl aːlsˤːʁjr faːdˤl qaːlwaː rabːunaː jaʕlamu ʔiinːaː ʔiilajkum lamursalwna sʔaðhb lʔiqlaːl saːmj mn mnzl ljlaː aːqtrbt ljlaː nħw saːmj w qbːlth fj d͡ʒanːaːti aːlnːaʕjmi ʔiinːa aːlmutːaqjna fj d͡ʒanːaːtin wanaʕjmin saːmj laː jzaːl mrjdˤaː ʕndnaː hw fj aːlʁrfa aːlsːaːdsa rʔajt saːmj fj aːlmtˤaːr hl knt tʃrb wahaðihi ħaaːlu man laaː jaraaː linafsihi qadranaː nadanaː qmnaː mn θwra dˤd ʔiħdaː aːlʔimbraːtˤwrjaːt fabaʃːarnaːhu biʁulaːmin ħaljmin qd jχlq mn ðˤhr aːlʕaːlm d͡ʒaːhlaːan walaaː juʔuχaðu minhaaː ʕadlun walaaː hum junsˤaruwna waʔiið qulnaaː lilmalaaːʔiikaai aːsd͡ʒuduwaː liʔaːdama fasad͡ʒaduwaː ʔiilːaaː ʔiiblijsa ʔaabaaːaː waaːstakbara wakaaːna mina aːlkaaːfirijna laː tzaːl ljlaː fj χtˤr jaaː rasuwla aːllːahi ʔinːaaː nazalnaaː daaːranaː fakaθura fijhaaː ʕadadunaaː nd͡ʒħt aːlħmla wfaːz hw fj aːlʔintχaːbaːt jsttˤjʕ aːldb tslq aːlʃd͡ʒra kaːn ldjː mdrːs msˤaːb bd͡ʒnwn aːlaːrtjaːb fanaːdawaː sˤaːħibahum fataʕaːtˤaː faʕaqara ʔaaw ʔaaħramahaaː ʔaad͡ʒranaː maðχuwranaː taʔaχijrij ʕamala aːljawmi liʁadin qaːla firʕawnu wamaː rabːu aːlʕaːlamjna lilːahi maː fij aːlsːamaːwaːti waaːlʔaardˤi ʔiinːa aːllːaha huwa aːlʁanijːu aːlħamjdu kaːnt sˤdjqa saːmj tχwnh ʕlj ʃħn haːtfj aːld͡ʒwaːl waħasbu man haðaaː ʔaad͡ʒruhu ʔaan jaltamisa ʕalajhi ʔaad͡ʒranaː watasahːalat ʕalajhi ʔaaʃd͡ʒaaːnuhu lm jkn saːmj jrjd ʔan jqdˤj wqtaː fj aːlsːd͡ʒn waqabla aːlʁurwbi snsaːʕdh ʔin tˤlb mnaː ʔaʕz mn aːlwld wld aːlwld maː salakakum fj saqara waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlrːaħmani bnu zajdin fij qawlh taʕaaːlaaː saːmj jħbː ʕsˤjr aːlbtˤːjχ aːlʔaħmr aːdːʕaː saːmj ʔanːh mmrːdˤ fj mstʃfaː baːlqaːhra ʕndmaː kaːn fj snː aːlsːaːdsa ʕʃr fqtˤ waqad qijla fij taʔawijli qawlh taʕaaːlaaː aːsˤtˤħb saːmj ljlaː mn aːlmtˤaːr waaːlmasʔiuwlu ʁajra mutamakːinin walajsa bifaaːʕilin daːʔimaː maː ʔansaː ʔasmaːʔ aːlnːaːs waqaaːla muslimu bnu qutajbaaa lirad͡ʒulin aːʕtaðara ʔilajhi laː ʔaʕlm mn ʔajn ʔatt wamaʁaaːrimuhu maχbuwraaan wad͡ʒaːʔat kulːu nafsin maʕahaː saːʔiiqun waʃahjdun hl tʕrf aːllh "nʕm ʔaʕrfh" sjtmː ʔiʁlaːq aːlʕjaːda kaːn saːmj fj ʁjbwba bsbb nqsˤ aːlsːkːr fj aːldːm maːðaː qlt ʁaaːmat aːlsːamaaːʔu walam tumtˤir lmaːðaː tbkjn jaː maːrj ʃrb aːlqljl salaːmun ʕalaː ʔiil jaːsjna saːmj wqʕ ʕn aːlħsˤaːn wamaaː ðˤalamuwnaaː walaaːkin kaaːnuwaː ʔaanfusahum jaðˤlimuwna ʔiinːaː kaðlika nafʕalu biaːlmud͡ʒrimjna hl ʔaʕd͡ʒbki aːlʕrdˤ hl jhm jastˤaʕu faχarad͡ʒa d͡ʒaðilanaː fariħanaː aːlsˤiːjtu wlaː aːlʁnaː waʔiimːaaː ʃaħijħun jurawːidˤu nafsahu tawtˤiʔiaaan lnsaːʕd bʕdˤnaː falamːaː d͡ʒaːʔathum ʔaːjaːtunaː mubsˤiraaan qaːlwaː hðaː siħrun mubjnun wabiaːlnːafsi maqhuwranaː aːhlaː wshlaː bk aːsmj haːd͡ʒr maː aːlðj qaːlh ʔahwa ʕlaː maː jraːm aːlbqr jʕtˤjnaː aːlħljb ʕan d͡ʒadːihi nmrː daːʔimanaː bd͡ʒaːnb mktb aːlbrjd fj tˤrjqnaː ʔilaː aːlʕml waqubħi ðikrihi fij dahrihi lmaːðaː ʃrbt tlk aːlʔaqraːsˤ ʔaanaaːʕimaaun hij ʔaam χaʃinaaun  bjn wʕdh wʔind͡ʒaːzh ftra nbj bjnhm daːʔ aːldˤraːʔir t waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlʕulamaaːʔi ʔiðaaː tˤalaba rad͡ʒulaaːni ʔaamranaː ðˤafira bihi ʔaaʕðˤamuhumaaː muruwʔaaan χajrun manʃuwrun waʃarːun mastuwrun rkn saːmj sjːaːrth rtb ʁrftk watawalːa ʕanhum ħatːaː ħjnin kaːn jdˤaːd͡ʒʕ mdrːsth jmknk ʔan tbdʔa waaːdˤrib lahum maθalanaː ʔaasˤħaːba aːlqarjaai ʔiið d͡ʒaːʔahaaː aːlmursalwna faʕasˤawaː raswla rabːihim faʔaaχaðahum ʔaaχðaaan raːbijaaan waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlbulaʁaaːʔi likulːi θawbin laaːbisun  walikulːi ʕilmin qaaːbisun maaː wad͡ʒadt ʔilaaː waqtij haðaaː man jaʕrifu mawlida haðajni min naaːsˤiħin waðarnj waaːlmukaðːibjna ʔauwlij aːlnːaʕmaai wamahːilhum qaljlanaː laː tns waʔiiðaaː dˤaaːqa labisa ʔaaħsanahaaː kaːn saːmj msjħjːaː ʔind͡ʒjljːaː mχlsˤaː waqaaːla baʕdˤu ʔaahli aːltːaʔawijli fij qawlh taʕaaːlaaː laaː tuʔuaaːχiðnij bimaaː nasijtu maːðaː tqwljn waaːtːabiʕ maː jwħaː ʔiilajka min rabːika ʔiinːa aːllːaha kaːna bimaː taʕmalwna χabjranaː ʔad͡ʒml aːlʕjwn wʔakðbhaː ʕjwn aːlnsaːʔ kaːn aːld͡ʒw baːrdaːan aːlbaːrħa ʔaχtˤʔa saːmj fj ktaːba bʕdˤ aːlklmaːt klbj χaːʔif mn aːlmaːʔ fij aːlħamjmi θumːa fij aːlnːaːri jusd͡ʒarwna fjhimaː ʕajnaːni nadˤːaːχataːni waaːlsːuʔuaaːlu mabðalaaun nħn dˤd aːlħrb laː tns ʔanːh twd͡ʒd ħaːlaːt aːstθnaːʔijːa tˤlb faːdˤl mn daːnja ʔan tʔatj mʕh wasaʔaala aːlmuʁijraaa faqaaːla qaːla fabiʕizːatika laʔauʁwijanːahum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕjna kaːn saːmj jdˤrb aːld͡ʒdaːr w jtrk fjh θqwbaː aːlʔasd mlk aːlʁaːba lqd d͡ʒʔinaː ldʕwtk llʕʃaːʔ liʔaanːa maaː ʔaadːaaː ʔilaaː aːlχajri fahuwa fij nafsihi nfhm ðlk tilka ʔiiðanaː qismaaun dˤjzaː wamaː juʁnj ʕanhu maːluhu ʔiiðaː taradːaː walaqad ʔaarsalnaː fjhim munðirjna nql saːmj ljlaː ʔilaː aːlmrkz aːlsˤːħːj aːlbaːrħa kaːn jwm aːlχmjs ʔasˤbħ saːmj mdrːsj fj aːlʕlwm aːlʔislaːmjːa swf ʔaðhb lʔastdfʔi aːlθld͡ʒ jnhmr wamaː ʔaːtajnaːhum min kutubin jadruswnahaː wamaː ʔaarsalnaː ʔiilajhim qablaka min naðjrin tad͡ʒifːu aːlʔardˤu liʔaanːa ʁaaːjatahu ʔaan jaʕdama aːlʔaafaaːdˤilu fadˤlahum jkrh saːmj klː maː jrbtˤh bljlaː ðlika ʕaːlimu aːlʁajbi waaːlʃːahaːdaai aːlʕazjzu aːlrːaħjmu aːlħjaːa mstmrːa baːlnːsba lsaːmj ʔarjdkmaː ʔan tsʕdaː hija waʔiin ʔaadnatnij minhaaː faqad sˤaaːnatnij ʕanhaaː ħatːaaː rubːamaaː ʔaafdˤaaː bisˤaaːħibihi ʔilaaː aːltːalafi min ʁajri nikaaːjaain fij ʕaduwːin walaaː ʔidˤraaːrin bimaħsuwdi walaaː nihaaːjaaun maħduwdaaun jaqnaʕu bihaaː ʔaam lahum ʔiilhun ʁajru aːllːahi subħaːna aːllːahi ʕamːaː juʃrikwna laaː tusrifuwaː fij aːltːaħrijmi wahaðaaː qawlu aːlsːudːijːi ʔanaː ʔadrs aːltˤːb waʔiið qaaːla rabːuka lilmalaaːʔiikaai ʔiinːij d͡ʒaaːʕilun fij aːlʔaardˤi χalijfaaan jaaː rasuwla aːllːahi maaː ʔaaqsˤarahaaː man lahu ʔaad͡ʒrun ʕalaaː aːllːahi ʕazːa wad͡ʒalːa faljaqum aːlsjf ʔasˤdq ʔanbaːʔ mn aːlktb sjf aːlsltˤaːn tˤwjl tχaːsˤmaː saːmj w ljlaː fj aːlmħlː ʔamaːm aːld͡ʒmjʕ mn aːlwaːdˤħ ʔanː mdrːsk ljs ldjh ʔaχlaːq ʔant lst ʔad͡ʒnbjːaː fj aːlʕjaːda θumːa d͡ʒaːʔahum maː kaːnwaː jwʕadwna nħn nħb bʕdˤnaː aːlbʕdˤ faʔiinːa aːlrːaʁbaaa waaːlrːahbaaa ʔiðaaː aːd͡ʒtamaʕaaː ʕalaaː aːlnːafsi ðalːat lahumaaː waaːnqaaːdat laː jʕtqd saːmj ʔanː ljlaː tʕrːft ʕljh ħrs aːlħaːrs aːlljl btˤwlh tʕrːdˤ saːmj llaːħtraːq bjnmaː kaːn fj ʁjbwba waaːktisaaːbi aːlʔaaʕdaaːʔi ħjaːa saːmj kaːrθa brmːthaː waqaaːla baʃːaaːrun ʔaaʔaantum ʔaaʃadːu χalqanaː ʔaami aːlsːamaːʔu banaːhaː maː mn tˤrjqa ʔaχraː waqijla lihindi binti aːlħasani waaːlbaʁdˤaaːʔu tuʔuawːalu ʔilaaː aːlʕadaaːwaai kaːnt ljlaː tfwħ mnhaː raːʔiħa aːlkħwl stʃʕr btħsːn ʁdaː ʔaʕdk bðlk laaː turaaːfiq aːlʔaaʃraaːra lakum fjhaː faːkihaaun kaθjraaun minhaː taʔakulwna θumːa lijaħðar aːtːibaaːʕahu fijmaaː jud͡ʒaaːnibu aːldːijna wajudˤaaːdːu aːlħaqːa muwaaːfaqaaan liraʔajihi wamutaaːbaʕaaan lihawaaːhu tʁlːb saːmj ʕlaː mhaːd͡ʒmh w qtlh waaːħfaðˤuwaː furuwd͡ʒakum fahuwa fij aːχtijaaːrihi maluwmun hal jaħsunu bihi ʔaan jaraaː liwaħʃi aːlbahaaːʔiimi ʕalajhi fadˤlanaː ljlaː mmrːdˤa ðaːt ʃhaːda "ʔaːh ʔiðn ʔanti waːħda mnːaː" ʔiinːa aːlːaðjna fatanuwaː aːlmuʔuminjna waaːlmuʔuminaːti θumːa lam jatwbwaː falahum ʕaðaːbu d͡ʒahanːama walahum ʕaðaːbu aːlħarjqi wamaː ʔaarsalnaː fj qarjaain min naðjrin ʔiilːaː qaːla mutrafwhaː ʔiinːaː bimaː ʔaursiltum bihi kaːfirwna ʔauʁlqt aːlʕjaːda kaːn saːmj jlʕn kaːn saːmj ʕaːda maː jdχl w jʁaːdr aːlmstʃfaː aːns ʔamrhm jaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlːaðjna ʔaːmanwaː ʔaatˤjʕuwaː aːllːaha waʔaatˤjʕuwaː aːlrːaswla walaː tubtˤilwaː ʔaaʕmaːlakum ʁaːlbaː maː ʔansaː ʔan ʔafrʃ ʔasnaːnj faðakːir ʔiin nafaʕati aːlðːikraː waman kaaːna mutawaqːiʕanaː lam jakun mutawad͡ʒːiʕanaː waqad ʔaanbaʔaa aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː fij kitaaːbihi aːlʕazijzi ʔaaχbaaːranaː waʔiiðkaaːranaː faqaaːla subħaaːnahu wataʕaaːlaaː ðhb saːmj lʔiqlaːl ʔaχth mn aːlmdrsa ʔauwlʔiika fj d͡ʒanːaːtin mukramwna waman kaaːna min qalijli aːldːunjaaː laaː jaʃbaʕu bʁaːθ aːltˤjr ʔakθrhaː fraːχaːan bqdr aːlrʔaj tʕtbr aːlrd͡ʒaːl wbaːlʔaːmaːl jntðˤr aːlmʔaːl qaːl nʕm kaːn saːmj jrjd ʔan jmdˤj wqtaː ʔakθr mʕ ljlaː knt aːnaː wtwm fj bwstˤn fj ʃhr ʔaktwbr aːlʕaqlu ħajθu kaaːna maʔaluwfun ktb saːmj lljlaː rsaːla ħbː tˤwjla saːmj jrwj ħjaːth fj mdwːna msˤwːra likajlaaː taʔasawaː ʕalaaː maaː faaːtakum walaaː tafraħuwaː bimaaː ʔaːtaaːkum hw jħbːhaː w hj tħbːh ʔajdˤaː wajasˤifuhu bifadˤaaːʔiiħa jansubuhaaː ʔilajhi faʔiin kaaːna aːldːaaːʕij dijnijːanaː tʕrːdˤt ljlaː ldˤrb ʃdjd hðaː aːlmdrːs jχjfnj saːmj jħbː ʔaʃrtˤa aːlhntaːj aːlmrswma kaːn saːmj jstmʕ llmwsjqaː aːlmsjħjːa waʔiilahij raaːziqu aːltˤːifli aːlsˤːaʁijri kamaaː ʔaanːahu raaːziqu aːlwaladi aːlkabijri qaaːla faaːlzːijaaːdaau min aːlχajri χajrun wajulbisuk θawba aːlwaqaaːri ʔaħqːaː sjðhb twm ʔilaː bwstˤn lwħdh waaːlmukaaːfaʔaaau ʕitqun ʔaan jaʕlama ʔaanːa tˤawaaːriqa aːlʔiinsaaːni min dalaaːʔiili fadˤlihi waħusˤːila maː fij aːlsˤːudwri hw ljs ʁjwraː waaːlbaðaaːʔu min aːld͡ʒafaaːʔi waaːld͡ʒafaaːʔu fij aːlnːaaːri faqaaːla hija aːlsˤːabru ʕalaaː aːlbalwaaː aːlʕafwu ʕan aːlhafawaaːti tzdaːd d͡ʒmaːlaːan jwmaːan bʕd jwm ʔaħbːt ljlaː aːlʔaħsˤna waħadu aːlħilmi dˤabtˤu aːlnːafsi ʕan ʔamskh laː ʔarjd aːltːfkjr fjh liʔaanːa aːlʕaqla juwd͡ʒibu dafʕa aːlmadˤaaːrːi waaːd͡ʒtilaaːba aːlmanaaːfiʕi ʔaaw sakata fasalima walaaː jaħijqu aːlmakru aːlsːajːiʔii ʔilːaaː biʔaahlihi kaːn saːmj jrtdj mlaːbs nswjːa tˤwaːl aːlwqt ʔinːnaː snrd͡ʒʕ fj aːlʔasbwʕ aːlqaːdm nʕrf θumːa sˤubːwaː fawqa raʔasihi min ʕaðaːbi aːlħamjmi waʕad͡ʒibwaː ʔaan d͡ʒaːʔahum munðirun minhum waqaːla aːlkaːfirwna hðaː saːħirun kaðːaːbun hl mn aːlsˤħjħ ʔanh ʔaraːd aːlðhaːb lʔalmaːnjaː ʔanaː fj aːlsˤf aːlθaːmn waħukija ʔaanːa aːmraʔaaaan ʔaatat aːlnːabijːa sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama faqaaːlat waqad qaaːla aːlħasanu aːlbasˤrijːu raħimahu aːllːahu wazajtwnanaː wanaχlanaː waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami ʔiðaaː tamːa aːlʕaqlu naqasˤa aːlkalaaːmu ʔauħibːu ʔaan ʔausaaːfira ʔaatːaχaðnaːhum siχrijːanaː ʔaam zaːʁat ʕanhumu aːlʔaabsˤaːru ʔaad͡ʒru aːlmuʕalːimi kaʔaad͡ʒri aːlsˤːaaːʔiimi aːlqaaːʔiimi ʔin kunt maaː qult faʁafara aːllːahu lij ðarnj waman χalaqtu waħjdanaː waqaaːla nasˤru bnu ʔaaħmada aːlχubzu ʔaaruzːijːin ʔauʕd͡ʒb saːmj bðlk ħqːaː bali aːlːaðjna kafarwaː fj takðjbin d͡ʒfː hðaː aːlqlm mʃaː baːsmraːr fasaːhama fakaːna mina aːlmudħadˤjna knːaː nħbː juʔutaaː wlaː jaʔatij waʔauχraː lam taqdirwaː ʕalajhaː qad ʔaaħaːtˤa aːllːahu bihaː wakaːna aːllːahu ʕalaː kulːi ʃajʔin qadjranaː wadaːʕijanaː ʔiilaaː aːllːahi biʔiiðnihi wasiraːd͡ʒanaː munjranaː faqaaːla lahu aːbnuhu ʔaabuw bakrin lqd ʁjːr saːmj ħjaːa ljlaː fjhimaː ʕajnaːni tad͡ʒrijaːni d͡ʒbaːn kaːldd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa waʔaani aːʕbudwnj hðaː sˤiraːtˤun mustaqjmun aːlθːawbu naðˤijfun ʔaqsaː mn sˤχra ljs baːldˤrwra waqaaːla aːlfadˤlu bnu sahlin lm jħdˤr saːmj ʔilaː mwʕdh fj aːlmħkma dʕaː saːmj ljlaː llbqaːʔ ltnaːwl aːlʁðaːʔ ʔakθrwaː mn aːlaːstʁfaːr mn aːlsˤːʕb ʕljː ktˤbjb ʔan ʔaqwl hðaː ʕn tˤbjb ʔaːχr lkn hðh hj aːlħqjqa ʔinj ʔanðˤr fħsb zmjl aːlʕml aːdʕaː ʔan aːlħaːfla faːtth aːlqrʃ aːlʔabjdˤ jnfʕ fj aːljwm aːlʔaswd ʕalːimuwaː walaaː tuʕanːifuwaː faʔiinːa aːlmuʕalːima χajrun min aːlmuʕanːifi hl ʔabdw d͡ʒjːda subħaːna rabːi aːlsːamaːwaːti waaːlʔaardˤi rabːi aːlʕarʃi ʕamːaː jasˤifwna sʔakrːr kj laː tnsaː ðlk wad͡ʒaʕalahu min ʕazaaːʔiimi aːltːaqwaaː fijmaaː aːftaradˤahu waħaθːa ʕalajhi ln ʔansaːhm ʔabdaː ʔaanaaː saaːbiqu aːlʕarabi tðkːrt ʔamwraː kθjra waaːʃtaʕala aːlrːaʔasu ʃajbanaː ʔawdː ʔan ʔaqdˤj aːlmzjd mn aːlwqt mʕ ʕmːtj waaːlːaðj d͡ʒaːʔa biaːlsˤːidqi wasˤadːaqa bihi ʔauwlʔiika humu aːlmutːaqwna saːmj jkrh hðh aːlklma kaːn ldaː ljlaː ʔarbʕa ʔatˤfaːl mn ʔarbʕa rd͡ʒaːl mχtlfjn waːsˤl saːmj ʔirsaːl aːlrːsaːʔil lljlaː wfj jwm mn aːlʔajaːm  aːntħr waaːfzaʕ ʔilaaː aːstiʃaaːraai aːlʕulamaaːʔi faʔiinːij qarijbun madˤat ʔaabwaaːbun tadˤamːanat fusˤuwlanaː raʔaajtu ʔitbaaːʕahaaː bimaaː lam ʔauħibːa aːlʔiiχlaaːla bihi ʔiinːahu huwa jubdiʔiu wajuʕjdu aːlχaaːdimu naðˤːafa aːlʁurfaaa hðh aːlbjʔia mfʕma baːlħjaːa fajaʕtaqiduwna ʔaanːa qawlahu ħaqːun mutːabaʕun qbltu rsaːltk baːlʔams kaaːalːaðij rawaaːhu ʕatˤaaːʔun ʕan d͡ʒaaːbirin qaaːla lqd aːtːsˤlt bh ltfkjrh bhðaː aːlʔamr mn frtˤi wqwʕnaː baːlχtˤʔa ntʕlm waʔiiðaː masːahu aːlχajru manwʕanaː waʔiiðaː ðukːirwaː laː jaðkurwna aːirfʕ jdk aːljsraː aːlʔaːn ln jʔaχðnj ʔaħd ʕlaː mħml aːld͡ʒdː km msd͡ʒdaː jwd͡ʒd fj ʔistˤnbwl maːlj ʔaraːkm njaːmaːan fj blhnjːa ʔaːsf trkt ljlaː aːlθːaːnwjːa χʃjt ljlaː ʕlaː ħjaːthaː liʔaanːahum ðaaːquwaː min tˤaʕmi aːldːunjaaː maaː lam jaðuqhu aːlʃːabaaːbu waʕanhu ʕalajhi aːlsˤːalaaːau waaːlsːalaaːmu ʔaanːahu qaaːla ʔaamaaː tamnaʕu haʔuulaaːʔi aːlʁilmaaːni  faqaaːla ʔaanuwʃirwaaːna ʁrq saːmj fj msbħ ħðːrthaː fasabːiħ biaːsmi rabːika aːlʕaðˤjmi walaaː nafʕun juwaaːzij dˤurːahu wahuwa aːlðˤːilːu aːlːaðij jald͡ʒaʔau ʔilajhi aːlmudˤtˤarːuwna  waaːlħimaaː aːlːaðij jaʔawij ʔilajhi aːlχaaːʔiifuwna θalaaːθu χisˤaaːlin laaː tad͡ʒtamiʕu ʔilːaaː fij karijmin lan ʔaubtˤiʔia fij aːlmaʃj kalːaː laː tutˤiʕhu waaːsd͡ʒud waaːqtarib sʔarjk bʕdˤ aːlsˤwr laaː jamnaʕukum min aːlmaʕruwfi sˤaʁijruhu waqad ʔaadˤalːwaː kaθjranaː walaː tazidi aːlðˤːaːlimjna ʔiilːaː dˤalaːlanaː rad͡ʒulun taridu ʕalajhi aːlʔaumuwru fajusadːiduhaaː biraʔajihi tsbːb aːlksaːd aːlkbjr fj zjaːda ħaːdːa fj mʕdːl aːld͡ʒrjma waaːlʔiiʁdˤaaːʔu ʕan aːld͡ʒaaːhili χajrun min muʃaaːkalatihi ʔaafaraʔaajta ʔiin matːaʕnaːhum sinjna maːðaː ħsˤl hnaː ʔaðˤnː ʔanːj laː ʔastħqːk waʔiilaaː aːld͡ʒibaːli kajfa nusˤibat ʕndmaː jʃjχ aːlθʕlb tntf wbrh aːlʁrbaːn qaːla rabːi ʔiinːj daʕawtu qawmj lajlanaː wanahaːranaː waaːld͡ʒawaaːbu aːlθːaaːnij kaːn saːmj mndhʃaː llʁaːja hlːaː ʔaχfdˤt sˤwt aːltlfaːz waʔiin kuntunːa turidna aːllːaha waraswlahu waaːldːaːra aːlʔaːχiraaa faʔiinːa aːllːaha ʔaaʕadːa lilmuħsinaːti minkunːa ʔaad͡ʒranaː ʕaðˤjmanaː ʔaχð saːmj ljlaː ʔilaː qaːʕa mθlːd͡ʒaːt lm jkn faːdˤl jrjd ʔan jqdˤj wqtaː fj aːlsːd͡ʒn qaːl saːmj ʔanː aːlʔislaːm djn d͡ʒmjl aːlðˤaːfaru baːldˤʕjf hzjma kaːn saːmj aːld͡ʒahlu bimaqaaːdijri aːlħuquwqi  waaːltːabðijru huwa aːld͡ʒahlu bimawaaːqiʕi aːlħuquwqi qul maː jaʕbaʔau bikum rabːj lawlaː duʕaːʔuukum faqad kaðːabtum fasawfa jakwnu lizaːmanaː lm jkn saːmj jʃʕr mslm w laː jqwm bʔajː ʃjʔ mn hðaː qad aːqtaradˤa θumːa qadˤaaː faʔaaħsana ʔanqdˤ saːmj ħjaːa ðlk aːlklb wasalaːmun ʕalaaː aːlmursaljna hðaː aːlmdrːs jrhb aːlʔatˤfaːl ʔaħb aːlqsˤsˤ aːlmsˤwra saːmj jħbː salaːmanaː ʔiʃtrjtu ʔinaːʔan mn aːlzd͡ʒaːd͡ʒ aːstmr aːld͡ʒw aːlmmtˤr ʕʃra ʔajaːm mtwaːsˤla musawːamaaan ʕinda rabːika lilmusrifjna kaːn saːmj jħfr ħfraː fj aːlbstaːn laː ttklm fj ʁrfa aːlqraːʔa wud͡ʒwhun jawmaʔiiðin χaːʃiʕaaun wajuðˤhiru min aːlʔaafʕaaːli fadˤaaːʔiiħahaaː ʔiðaaː lam jaʃqa aːlmarʔu ʔilːaaː bimaaː ʕamila faqad saʕida waʔiin tad͡ʒaaːwaza bihaaː aːlħaqːa fij miqdaaːri ħusni ʔaarðaaːlanaː faaːlkaðibu jamnaʕu minhu aːlʕaqlu wajasˤudːu ʕanhu aːlʃːarʕu waðalika mutːadˤiħun fij aːlfusˤuwli aːlːatij naðkuruhaaː ʔiðaaː subirat wahija θamaaːnijaaun aːlʕlm nwr waːld͡ʒhl ðˤlaːm waʔiið ʔaaχaðnaaː mijθaaːqakum warafaʕnaaː fawqakumu aːltˤːuwra ʔaakala aːlðːiʔibu aːlχaruwfa ʔaan d͡ʒaːʔahu aːlʔaaʕmaː wamaː ʔaarsalnaːka ʔiilːaː kaːfːaaan lilnːaːsi baʃjranaː wanaðjranaː walkinːa baːlkaːd bdʔanaː ʔasrʕaː laaː tukθar mina aːlkalaːami  walaaː tantˤiq bimaaː laaː taʕlam ʔad͡ʒrj td͡ʒrba lbnaːʔ dwla mn aːlsˤfr waʔaabʕaθa ʕalaaː ðamːihi ðhb saːmj ʔilaː aːlmsd͡ʒd jwm aːld͡ʒmʕa jaaː aːlħml aːlsˤːabru ʕalaaː maaː taqtadˤijhi ʔaawqaaːtuhu min razijːaain qad ʔaad͡ʒhadahu aːlħuznu ʕalajhaaː w ʔant ʕʃ jwmaːan blaː hm tʕʃ jwmaːan χaːldaːan waqaaːla qawmun waman kataba aːlħadijθa aːlʔaardˤa kifaːtanaː walaaː tastadijmu baʕdahaaː ʔin knt tðˤn aːltʕljm mklfanaː  faːntðˤr ħtaː traː maː jklfk aːld͡ʒhl twm ljs mtrd͡ʒm hl bʔimkaːnkm ʔid͡ʒraːʔ bʕdˤ aːltʕdjlaːt ʕlaː hðh aːlbdˤaːʕa ʔilaː aːlsjnmaː  maː aːlðj jʔaklh kjn  aːlbrka ʕmjqa d͡ʒdːanaː waaːlnːaaːʃiraaːti naʃranaː wafaaːkihaaan waʔaabːanaː ʔanaː bbsaːtˤa laː ʔaʕrf maːðaː ʔaqwl ʕml daːrwjn jʁjr kl ʃjʔ aːnʃr aːlʔisbraːntw faʔaand͡ʒajnaaːhu waʔaahlahu ʔiilːaaː aːmraʔaatahu kaaːnat mina aːlʁaaːbirijna jʕtbrwnh btˤlaːan fʔiðaː aːlnd͡ʒwm tˤmst stwaːd͡ʒhk kθjr mn aːlsˤʕwbaːt ʕsˤaːhaː daːlk aːlwld samiʕtu rsuwla aːllhi sˤalːaaː aːllhu ʕalajhi wasalːama jaquwlu: qaːm ljħjjnj faqaaːla lahum wamanaaːaa aːlθːaaːliθaaa aːlʔauχraaː waaːmtanaʕa min ħaaːsidijhi jaaː bunajːa aːlʁarijbu man lajsa lahu ħabijbun lqd nðˤft ħðaːʔik  ʔaljs kðlk  kaʔaamθaaːli aːllːuʔuluʔui aːlmaknuwni θumːa nunad͡ʒːij aːlːaðijna aːtːaqawaː wanaðaru aːlðˤːaaːlimijna fijhaaː d͡ʒiθijːanaː ʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlwaaːriθuwna waaːlmalaku ʕalaaː ʔaard͡ʒaaːʔiihaaː wajaħmilu ʕarʃa rabːika fawqahum jawmaʔiiðin θamaaːnijaaun aːnt ħjaːtj sʔafkr fjk kl jwm bʕd rħjlj rbnaː ʔaχrd͡ʒnaː mnhaː fʔin ʕdnaː fʔinaː ðˤaːlmwn bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlnːaaːsu aːtːaquwaː rabːakum ʔiinːa zalzalaaa aːlsːaaːʕaai ʃajʔun ʕaðˤijmun jnbʁj ʔalaː tutad͡ʒaːhl hðh aːlmʃkla bsrʕa walaaː tamʃi fij aːlʔaardˤi maraħanaː ʔiinːaka lan taχriqa aːlʔaardˤa walan tabluʁa aːld͡ʒibaaːla tˤuwlanaː laː tqlq ʔalm ʔaql ʔan kl ʃʔi sjd͡ʒrj ʕlaː maː jraːm wlqd ʔaːtjnaː mwsaː whaːrwn aːlfrqaːn wdˤjaːʔ wðkraː llmtqjn jnbʁj ʔan tqrʔa ktbaː mfjda ʔaadbaaːrahum walaaː jaltafit minkum ʔaaħadun waaːmdˤuwaː ħajθu tuʔumaruwna ʁaːdr faːdˤl mnzlh fj aːlʕaːʃra sˤbaːħaː tntd͡ʒ aːld͡ʒzaːʔir aːlsjaːraːt fkfaː baːllh ʃhjdaː bjnnaː wbjnkm ʔin knaː ʕn ʕbaːdtkm lʁaːfljn famaaːli aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː qibalaka muhtˤiʕijna falamːaaː raʔaawhu zulfaaan sijʔiat wud͡ʒuwhu aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː waqijla haðaaː aːlːaðij kuntum bihi tadːaʕuwna wakaaːna huwa aːlχaaːmisu aːlhaaːliku aːlːaðij qaaːla fijhi ʕalijːu bnu ʔaabij tˤaaːlibin radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu sunwjmka aːlmaːʔ ʔaχdˤr lqd aːχtˤʔat baːχtbaːr fħsˤ aːlħml qaːl rb ʔinj qtlt mnhm nfsaː fʔaχaːf ʔan jqtlwn ʔanta jmknka daːʔimaːan aːlqdwm hnaː qaːl hðaː fraːq bjnj wbjnk sʔanbʔik btʔawjl maː lm tsttˤʕ ʕljh sˤbraː ʔarjd ʔan ʔarsl hðaː aːltˤrd ʔilaː kndaː ʕjnaː jʃrb bhaː ʕbaːd aːllh jfd͡ʒrwnhaː tfd͡ʒjraː aːðhab ʔaanta waʔaaχuwka biʔaːjaaːtij walaaː tanijaaː fij ðikrij bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm tbaːrk aːlðj bjdh aːlmlk whw ʕlaː kl ʃjʔ qdjr kaːn aːlkwn ħjnhaː mzjd͡ʒaː saːχnaː mn aːld͡ʒzjʔiaːt lahu mulku aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waaːlʔaardˤi waʔiilaaː aːllːahi turd͡ʒaʕu aːlʔaumuwru hjʔitu aːlnðˤaːm bħjθ laː jsttˤjʕ ʔilaː aːld͡ʒðr aːlwsˤwl ʔilaː aːlʃaːʃa aːlʔidaːrja ʔauqsm bʔanː laː ʃjʔ ħsˤl hm jħbwn tswnjwkj ʔijkjdaː jħbhaː kθjraː ʔaan taquwluwaː ʔiinːamaaː ʔaunzila aːlkitaaːbu ʕalaaː tˤaaːʔiifatajni min qablinaaː waʔiin kunːaaː ʕan diraaːsatihim laʁaaːfilijna qblt χdj ʔanta mn ʔajna tʕlm hðaː  wlaː tχznj jwm jbʕθwn ʔafħsb aːlðjn kfrwaː ʔan jtχðwaː ʕbaːdj mn dwnj ʔawljaːʔ ʔinaː ʔaʕtdnaː d͡ʒhnm llkaːfrjn nzlaː dhsth sjaːra liʔaanːahaaː takuwnu baʕdˤanaː watabʕijdˤu aːlmaʕnaaː ʔaaʃkalu lahu wabaʕdˤuhu laaː juʁnij ʕan kulːihi mnːaːd jbjʕ aːldːrːaːd͡ʒaːt aːlhwaːʔijːa waʔiin kaaːduwaː lajaftinuwnaka ʕani aːlːaðij ʔaawħajnaaː ʔiilajka litaftarija ʕalajnaaː ʁajrahu waʔiiðanaː laaːtːaχaðuwka χalijlanaː ðhbnaː ʔilaː lndn ʔanaː fqtˤ sʔatrk hðh hnaː watˤalħin mːandˤuwdin fawarabːika lanasʔaalanːahum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna hl hðh sˤwra ʔanta rsmtahaː bnfsk ʔin dˤjʕt mftaːħj fln ʔaqdr ʕlaː ftħ aːlbaːb bal naħnu maħruwmuwna tbaː ʔinh ljʔulmnj ʔan ʔaraː hwjtj tðbl qawlun maʕruwfun wamaʁfiraaun χajrun min sˤadaqaain jatbaʕuhaaː ʔaaðanaː waaːllːahu ʁanijːun ħalijmun twm ʔaraːd aːlʕaʃaaːʔ fj aːlsrjr laː jmlk mnzl mnːaːd ʕlːjːa fqaːl ʔaʕtˤjk zbdaːan kʔanh aːldbs wahadajnaaːhu aːlnːad͡ʒdajni ʔaaw ðanbun sˤaʁijrun tastaʁfiru lahu quwːaau wasaaːʔiilihi bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi waaːlsːamaaːʔi waaːltˤːaaːriqi wasabːiħuwhu bukraaan waʔaasˤijlanaː bqj aːlbaːb mʁlqanaː tˤwaːl aːljwm ʔauʕtˤjk χams dqaːʔiq lħl hðh aːlmʃkla sttzwːd͡ʒ brd͡ʒl θrjː qaːl std͡ʒdnj ʔin ʃaːʔ ʕljh ʔin kntm tʕlmwn fafahːamnaaːhaaː sulajmaaːna wakulːanaː ʔaːtajnaaː ħukmanaː waʕilmanaː wasaχːarnaaː maʕa daaːwuwda aːld͡ʒibaaːla jusabːiħna waaːltˤːajra wakunːaaː faaːʕilijna kaːn mnːaːd jbqj aːld͡ʒhr baːlswʔ mn aːlqwl ʔilaː mn ðˤlm wkaːn aːllh smjʕaː ʕljmaː tard͡ʒiʕuwnahaaː ʔiin kuntum sˤaaːdiqijna aːnaː mʃ faːhm aːnaː ʕaːjz mwbjlk baːj knt ʔafkr hl trjd aːlzwaːd͡ʒ saːmj mtwtːr ʔinnaː ʔiilajhi fij jawmin kaaːna miqdaaːruhu χamsijna ʔaalfa sanaain ldj ʕjnjn ʔaħqaː maːt ʔabj ʔin aːlðjn hm mn χʃja rbhm mʃfqwn wabanajnaaː fawqakum sabʕanaː ʃidaaːdanaː ʔiinːa aːllha taʕaaːlaaː tˤajːibun faʔiiðaaː lam jakun ʔaːlifanaː maʔaluwfanaː taχatˤːafathu ʔaajdij ħaaːsidijhi ttʁðaː aːlħjtaːn ʕlaː aːlʔasmaːk aːlsˤʁjra aːldnjaː ʕbrt ʕn aːjaːm w sjnjn w aːlaːnsaːn aːlmskjn lhaː ʃhjd wkl ʔinsaːn ʔalzmnaːh tˤaːʔirh fj ʕnqh wnχrd͡ʒ lh jwm aːlqjaːma ktaːbaː jlqaːh mnʃwraː ʔaflm jnðˤrwaː ʔilaː aːlsmaːʔ fwqhm kjf bnjnaːhaː wzjnaːhaː wmaː lhaː mn frwd͡ʒ maːðaː tnwj bðlk ʔanaː fqtˤ aːbðl qsˤaːraː d͡ʒhdj naːsˤja kaːðba χaːtˤʔia walaaː jamliku aːlːaðijna jadʕuwna min duwnihi aːlʃːafaaːʕaaa ʔiilːaaː man ʃahida biaːlħaqːi wahum jaʕlamuwna whdjnaːh aːlnd͡ʒdjn ʔaam lakum ʔaajmaaːnun ʕalajnaaː baaːliʁaaun ʔiilaaː jawmi aːlqijaaːmaai ʔiinːa lakum lamaaː taħkumuwna wajaaː qawmi maaː lij ʔaadʕuwkum ʔiilaaː aːlnːad͡ʒaaːai watadʕuwnanij ʔiilaaː aːlnːaaːri hðaː maː jqwlh aːlnaːs rbnaː aːʁfr lj wlwaːldj wllmʔumnjn jwm jqwm aːlħsaːb kjf qutil twm  liʔaanːa aːlsːaʕaaːdaaa lajsat bikaθraai aːlmaaːli fakam min mukθirin ʃaqijːun wamuqilːin saʕijdun ʔaðhb ʔaħjaːnaːan  wʔaħjaːnaːan ʔauχraː laː ʔaðhb jd͡ʒb aːn tltzm bnðˤaːmk aːlʁðaːʔij ʔanaː fʕlaː ʔaqdr sˤħbtk ʔaʕtqd ʔank ðhbt bʕjdaː twm ʔataːa jwm aːlʔiθnjn wʕaːd ʔilaːa aːlbjt fj aːljwm aːltaːlj waːlðjn ʔiðaː ʔasˤaːbhm aːlbʁj hm jntsˤrwn ʔanaː laː ʔaʃrb aːlqhwa sʔatsˤl bika kul sˤbaːħ fk rqba ħaːwl tðkr maːðaː ħdθ laː ʔadʕj fhm aːlnsaːʔ htˤl aːlmtˤr wql ʔinj ʔanaː aːlnðjr aːlmbjn maʕluwmun min ħaaːli aːlʕuqalaaːʔi ʕalaaː aːχtilaaːfihim jwmʔið jsˤdr aːlnaːs ʔaʃtaːtaː ljrwaː ʔaʕmaːlhm hðh aːlθlaːd͡ʒa θqjla d͡ʒdaː waqad rawaaː ʕabdu aːllːahi bnu ʕumara radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhumaaː qaaːla laʔauqatˤːiʕanːa ʔaajdijakum waʔaard͡ʒulakum min χilaaːfin θumːa laʔausˤalːibanːakum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna ʔin aːllh ʕaːlm ʁjb aːlsmaːwaːt waːlʔardˤ ʔinh ʕljm bðaːt aːlsˤdwr lmaːðaː tbkjn, jaː ħbjbtj  hl tʕtqd ʔan aːlaːħtraːr aːlʕaːlmj hw ntjd͡ʒa lʕml aːlbʃr baːrjs ʔiħdaː ʔakθr mdn aːlʕaːlm zjaːraan waʔiin kaaːna aːllːahu taʕaaːlaaː qad ʔaaʃraka bajnahumaaː fij aːlbirːi wad͡ʒamaʕa bajnahumaaː fij aːlwasˤijːaai wafij aːlʔaaʕdaaːʔi ʕinda aːlmukaaːʃafaai waaːlmud͡ʒaaːharaai wsˤaːħbth wbnjh lm jkn baːb mnzl saːmj mqflaː ʔaʔant mʔulf hðaː aːlktaːb  fawarabːika lanaħʃuranːahum waaːlʃːajaaːtˤijna θumːa lanuħdˤiranːahum ħawla d͡ʒahanːama d͡ʒiθijːanaː hl jwd͡ʒd ʃjʔi fj ðhnk  ʔalqwaː ʔaslħtkm ʔin btˤʃ rbk lʃdjd wamaaː raʔaajt miθla aːlnːaaːri naaːma haaːribuhaaː tanzijlanaː mimːan χalaqa aːlʔaardˤa waaːlsːamaaːwaaːti aːlʕulaaː maaː taquwlu fij sˤalaaːai aːllːajli  faqaaːla man lam jarʁab biθalaaːθin bulija bisitːin lhðaː aːllħm raːʔiħa krjha klaː snktb maː jqwl wnmd lh mn aːlʕðaːb mdaː laː tqlq bʃʔan ʔamr khðaː kaːn jd͡ʒb btr ðraːʕ twm waaːlːaðijna kafaruwaː biʔaːjaaːtinaaː hum ʔaasˤħaaːbu aːlmaʃʔaamaai hl ʔadˤʕta mftaːħa mnzlk qrʔat aːlbaːrħa rwaːja mθjra llʔihtmaːm wawaʔadi aːlbanaaːti wʔaʕtˤaː qljlaː wʔakdaː aːlːaðijna jariθuwna aːlfirdawsa hum fijhaaː χaaːliduwna ħatːaaː ʔiiðaaː d͡ʒaaːʔuwaː qaaːla ʔaakaðːabtum biʔaːjaaːtij walam tuħijtˤuwaː bihaaː ʕilmanaː ʔaamːaaːðaaː kuntum taʕmaluwna liʔaanːa aːlmaʕaaːnija ʃawaaːridu tadˤilːu biaːlʔiiʁfaaːli ʔanaː ʕaːlq θumːa kalːaaː sawfa taʕlamuwna aːlʔaχtˤaːʔ hj mʕlmjn hl jwd͡ʒd maːʔ hnaː liʔaanːa aːlʔiinsaaːna dunjaaː nafsihi taʕalːamuwaː aːlʕilma qabla ʔaan jurfaʕa twm jħb aːlbjrwqraːtˤja kθjraː ʔinnaː sˤbja ʔanaː lst mdrsaːan ʔamrnj ʔan ʔaqwm bhðaː  fqmt bh mra ʔaχraː ʔaawa ʔaːbaaːʔuunaaː aːlʔaawːaluwna wnzʕnaː maː fj sˤdwrhm mn ʁl ʔiχwaːnaː ʕlaː srr mtqaːbljn juwlid͡ʒu aːllːajla fij aːlnːahaaːri wajuwlid͡ʒu aːlnːahaaːra fij aːllːajli wahuwa ʕalijmun biðaaːti aːlsˤːuduwri fjhmaː ʕjnaːn td͡ʒrjaːn laː tqm btrwjʕ aːlʔaːmnjn wʔiðaː aːlqbwr bʕθrt ʕaːm sʕjd lkl aːld͡ʒzaːʔirjjn waʔiinːamaaː tad͡ʒiduhu fij baʕdˤihi faʕadluhu fijhim jakuwnu biʔaarbaʕaai ʔaaʃjaaːʔa wajastad͡ʒijbu aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aːlsˤːaaːliħaaːti wajazijduhum min fadˤlihi waaːlkaaːfiruwna lahum ʕaðaaːbun ʃadijdun waðalːalnaaːhaaː lahum faminhaaː rakuwbuhum waminhaaː jaʔakuluwna wkðlk nsˤrf aːlʔaːjaːt wljqwlwaː drst wlnbjnh lqwm jʕlmwn maaː ʔauħibːu ʔaan ʔaabsutˤa ʔaamalij ʔilaaː ʔaan taðhaba ʔilaaː baʁdaaːda watad͡ʒijʔa wllðjn kfrwaː brbhm ʕðaːb d͡ʒhnm wbʔis aːlmsˤjr faʕalajk biðaaːti aːldːijni taribat jadaaːk tlk ʔaːjaːt aːllh ntlwhaː ʕljk baːlħq wʔink lmn aːlmrsljn ħatːaaː ʔaaqsama bihi fij kitaaːbihi faqaaːla subħaaːnahu wataʕaaːlaaː wakaaːna fij aːlmadijnaai tisʕaau rahtˤin jufsiduwna fij aːlʔaardˤi walaaː jusˤliħuwna hl taʕalama aːljaːbaːnja ʔajdˤaːan nðˤf ʁrfth jwm aːlaːħd tˤbʕaː jursalu ʕalajkumaaː ʃuwaaːðˤun mːin nːaaːrin wanuħaaːsun falaː tantasˤiraaːni maː tqwlh sˤħjħ θumːa radadnaaːhu ʔaasfala saaːfilijna wʔatˤjʕwaː aːllh wʔatˤjʕwaː aːlrswl waːħðrwaː fʔin twljtm faːʕlmwaː ʔanmaː ʕlaː rswlnaː aːlblaːʁ aːlmbjn hlaː ʔarjtnj rχsˤtk  sjdj  waʔaatˤijʕuwaː aːllːaha waaːlrːasuwla laʕalːakum turħamuwna ʔiinːaaː d͡ʒaʕalnaaː fij ʔaaʕnaaːqihim ʔaaʁlaaːlanaː fahija ʔiilaaː aːlʔaaðqaaːni fahum muqmaħuwna wlqd ʕhdnaː ʔilaː ʔaːdm mn qbl fnsj wlm nd͡ʒd lh ʕzmaː ʔaakmalu aːlrːaaːħaai maaː kaaːnat ʕan kadːi aːltːaʕabi aːnfshm falam jazdad fij aːldːunjaaː zuhdanaː aːlχtˤaːb aːlðj ʔalqaːh aːlrʔijs ʔams ʔasʕd ʔansˤaːrh ʔawd ʔan ʔaqdm ʕlaː tˤlb bal qaaːluwaː ʔaadˤʁaaːθu ʔaaħlaaːmin bali aːftaraaːhu bal huwa ʃaaːʕirun faljaʔatinaaː biʔaːjaain kamaaː ʔaursila aːlʔaawːaluwna wqaːl mwsaː ʔin tkfrwaː ʔantm wmn fj aːlʔardˤ d͡ʒmjʕaː fʔin aːllh lʁnj ħmjd wwd͡ʒdk dˤaːlaː fhdaː ʔaafaʔaaminuwaː ʔaan taʔatijahum ʁaaːʃijaaun ʕml aːljwm ʔilaː aːlʁd wamin makrihim ʕalaaː taħarːuzin hm jʕlmwn hðaː klh kʔanhn aːljaːqwt waːlmrd͡ʒaːn aːlðjn hm fj sˤlaːthm χaːʃʕwn waaːntˤalaqa aːlmalaʔau minhum ʔaani aːmʃuwaː waaːsˤbiruwaː ʕalaaː ʔaːlihatikum ʔiinːa haðaaː laʃajʔun juraaːdu aːnh sjʔatj qrjbaː ʔinhu wsˤl mʕ ftaːa ħsnaːʔ ʕlj ðraːʕhu kaːd twm jʁrq naːdraː maː jktb rsaːʔilaː lʔabwjh jrbħ ʔakθr mn χms mʔia dwlaːr ʃhrjaː bhðaː aːlʕml qaːl ʔafrʔajtm maː kntm tʕbdwn faːsˤbr lħkm rbk wlaː ttˤʕ mnhm ʔaːθmaː ʔaw kfwraː ʔinːhnː mʕj tʕaːnj zwd͡ʒtj mn sˤʕwbaːt kj tnaːm laː tnðˤr ʔiljh sjd ʁrjn  ʔant mtˤlwb ʕlaː aːlhaːtf qutltaː fj aːlmʕrka aːdfʕ baːltj hj ʔaħsn aːlsjʔia nħn ʔaʕlm bmaː jsˤfwn faðarnij waman jukaðːibu bihaðaaː aːlħadijθi sanastadrid͡ʒuhum min ħajθu laaː jaʕlamuwna kaðːaba ʔaasˤħaaːbu aːlʔaajkaai aːlmursalijna lmaːðaː ʔistʁrqa hðaː wqtaːan tˤwjlaːan ʔalm ttʕrf ʕnhm ʔin aːlðjn kfrwaː wmaːtwaː whm kfaːr ʔawlʔik ʕljhm lʕna aːllh waːlmlaːʔika waːlnaːs ʔad͡ʒmʕjn ttwjbaː ʔadaːa jmkn ʔan jstχdmhaː hðaː qtˤ fakaðːabuwhu faʔaaχaðahum ʕaðaaːbu jawmi aːlðˤːulːaai ʔiinːahu kaaːna ʕaðaaːba jawmin ʕaðˤijmin ʔaʕtqd ʔanhu ħaːn aːlwqt lʔijqaːðˤ rwbirt ʔin aːlʕjʃ fj aːlχaːrd͡ʒ hw ʔafdˤl tˤrjqa ltʕlm lʁa ʔad͡ʒnbja wʔanaː laː ndrj ʔaʃr ʔarjd bmn fj aːlʔardˤ ʔam ʔaraːd bhm rbhm rʃdaː waːlnaːʃraːt nʃraː fajawmaʔiiðin laaː jusʔaalu ʕan ðanbihi ʔiinsun walaaː d͡ʒaaːnːun bl qaːlwaː mθl maː qaːl aːlʔawlwn qaːl aːlmlʔa mn qwmh ʔinaː lnraːk fj dˤlaːl mbjn ʔaħb smaːʕ aːlmwsjqaː mʕk fkðbwh fʔand͡ʒjnaːh waːlðjn mʕh fj aːlflk wʔaʁrqnaː aːlðjn kðbwaː bʔaːjaːtnaː ʔinhm kaːnwaː qwmaː ʕmjn ʃkraː lk ʕlaː msaːʕdtk waaːlħaθːu ʕalaaː aːlʕamali bihi min ʁajri ʔihmaaːlin lahu waqawma nuwħin mːin qablu ʔiinːahum kaaːnuwaː hum ʔaaðˤlama waʔaatˤʁaaː jd͡ʒb ʔan nntðˤr ʔarjd ʃχsˤ jmknh aːltħdθ baːllʁa aːlfrnsja ʔanaː ħzjn ʔarjd ʔan ʔazwr kwrjaː ʔanti kjf ʕrfti ðlk  wlaː tħsbn aːlðjn qtlwaː fj sbjl aːllh ʔamwaːtaː bl ʔaħjaːʔ ʕnd rbhm jrzqwn jawma jataðakːaru aːlʔiinsaaːnu maaː saʕaaː ʔajn jskn ʕmk  ʔaan laaː taraaːhaaː biʕajni aːlrːidˤaaː wʔazlft aːld͡ʒna llmtqjn waaːld͡ʒibaaːla ʔaawtaaːdanaː fd͡ʒʕlnaːhaː nkaːlaː lmaː bjn jdjhaː wmaː χlfhaː wmwʕðˤa llmtqjn fqrbh ʔiljhm qaːl ʔalaː tʔaklwn wnaːdaː ʔasˤħaːb jasˤifuwna qrrt aːlðhaːb ʔilaː ʔamrjkaː bdlaː mn ʔawrwbaː laː jmknhaː wdˤʕ klmtjn mʕanaː baːlʔisbaːnja  lknhaː tdʕj ʔanhaː mstwhaː mtwstˤ bjʕ aːlmnzl bθmn rχjsˤ ql sjrwaː fj aːlʔardˤ faːnðˤrwaː kjf kaːn ʕaːqba aːlðjn mn qbl kaːn ʔakθrhm mʃrkjn waaːlʕamːu ʁamːun waaːlχaaːlu wabaaːlun qrrt ʔan tstqjl waaːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aːlsˤːaaːliħaaːti ʔauwlaʔiika ʔaasˤħaaːbu aːld͡ʒanːaai hum fijhaaː χaaːliduwna ʔanaː fj naːdj aːlmwsjqaː klaː ʔinh tðkra ħtaː ʔiðaː d͡ʒaːʔwaː qaːl ʔakðbtm bʔaːjaːtj wlm tħjtˤwaː bhaː ʕlmaː ʔamaːðaː kntm tʕmlwn wnsˤrnaːh mn aːlqwm aːlðjn kðbwaː bʔaːjaːtnaː ʔinhm kaːnwaː qwm swʔ fʔaʁrqnaːhm ʔad͡ʒmʕjn sħqaː jaː lh mn mχaːdʕ lm jkn jsˤʁaː lnaː lmaː ntˤqnaː hkðaː dχl aːld͡ʒaːmʕa fbʔaj ʔaːlaːʔ rbkmaː tkðbaːn walaqad ʔaahlaknaaː maaː ħawlakum mina aːlquraaː wasˤarːafnaaː aːlʔaːjaaːti laʕalːahum jard͡ʒiʕuwna laː ʔaʕtqd ʔannaː snsttˤjʕ ʔan nħl hðh aːlmʃkla bʔanfsnaː wlw d͡ʒaːʔthm kl ʔaːja ħtaː jrwaː aːlʕðaːb aːlʔaljm nħn kndjwn sʔal djmaː: " aːltlfaːz aːldwlj  maː aːlðj ttħdθ ʕnh jaː sˤaːʔib  " wd͡ʒmʕ fʔawʕaː ʔanaː ʔaːkl wʔaʃrb maː kl mn qaːl qwlaː wfaː ʔaðlk lk  ʔanti trjdjn aːltˤlaːq, ʔaljs kðlk  aːlrfdˤ jʔulm ʔasʔalk sʔuaːlaːan waʔiinːamaaː aːlʔaaʁlabu ʔaan jakuwna baʕdˤu fadˤaaːʔiilihi biaːltˤːabʕi wʔanaː knaː nqʕd mnhaː mqaːʕd llsmʕ fmn jstmʕ aːlʔaːn jd͡ʒd lh ʃhaːbaː rsˤdaː wajad͡ʒʕaluwna limaaː laaː jaʕlamuwna nasˤijbanaː mimːaaː razaqnaaːhum taaːllːahi latusʔaalunːa ʕamːaaː kuntum taftaruwna watataʔaalːafu aːlʔaaʕdaaːʔa biaːlmusˤaaːharaai ħatːaaː jard͡ʒiʕa aːlmunaaːfiru muʔuaaːnisanaː qd kaːnt ʔaːjaːtj ttlaː ʕljkm fkntm ʕlaː ʔaʕqaːbkm tnksˤwn ʔam lhm ʔaːlha tmnʕhm mn dwnnaː laː jsttˤjʕwn nsˤr ʔanfshm wlaː hm mnaː jsˤħbwn walaaː nafʕa biaːlʕadwi qabla aːlqudraai wad͡ʒaaːʔa aːlsːaħaraau firʕawna qaaːluwaː ʔiinːa lanaaː naqdˤun limaaː ðakarnaaː qablu min tarki fudˤuwlihaaː aːnhm mʃʁwlwn d͡ʒdaː faːstd͡ʒbnaː lh wnd͡ʒjnaːh mn aːlʁm wkðlk nnd͡ʒj aːlmʔumnjn waʔaanʃada aːlmubarːidu ʕan ʔaabij sulajmaaːna aːlʁanawijːi waːldj jħbnaː juʕrafu aːlmud͡ʒrimuwna bisijmaaːhum fajuʔuχaðu biaːlnːawaaːsˤij waaːlʔaaqdaaːmi ðaːk sjrkun fʔahlknaː ʔaʃd mnhm btˤʃaː wmdˤaː mθl aːlʔawljn kaːn ʕljh ʔan jbħθ ʕn ʁrfth bnfsh ʔanaː ʁnjtu ʔaʁnjaan qaːl djmaː  mχrd͡ʒanaː haːtfh: " aːntðˤrj  ʔaʕrf mn jsttˤjʕ ʔan jslfnj bʕdˤ aːlmaːl " maħabːaaun fij aːlʔaahli fatˤaaːʕatuhaaː tamnaʕu aːltːaqsˤijra  waʃafaqatuhaaː tarudːu ʕan aːlsːarafi waaːltːabðijri ʔiinːa ðalika laħaqːun taχaaːsˤumu ʔaahli aːlnːaaːri tʕd͡ʒbnj wðˤjftki tʔakl aːlbwma aːllħm kaːn mnːaːd jqtˤn mʕ waːldjh fj hðaː aːlmnzl aːlsˤːʁjr hwa ʔaħdˤr aːltˤʕaːm ldˤjfhu wqdm lhu aːlmʔawaːa lm tkn ʔaljs mwd͡ʒwda fj aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕ  ʔaljs kðlk  bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi ʔiiðaaː d͡ʒaaːʔa nasˤru aːllːahi waaːlfatħu wahaðaaː min χidaʕi aːld͡ʒahli waʁuruwri aːlkasali ʔiilːaaː mawtatanaaː aːlʔauwlaaː wamaaː naħnu bimuʕaðːabijna waːlðjn jbjtwn lrbhm sd͡ʒdaː wqjaːmaː ʔaχbrnj maː aːlðj jmknnj fʕlh lmsaːʕdtk rbmaː twm jʕrf ʃjʔiaːan ljs bmqdwrj ʔinhaːʔ aːlʕml qbl ħlwl aːlʁd lakin laaː jaqdaħu tarku maaː baqija fijmaaː madˤaaː kaman ʔaakmala ʕibaaːdaaːtin waʔaaχalːa biʁajrihaaː waʔiinːa rabːaka huwa jaħʃuruhum ʔiinːahu ħakijmun ʕalijmun qaaːluwaː bal wad͡ʒadnaaː sjrwaː fj aːlʔardˤ θm aːnðˤrwaː kjf kaːn ʕaːqba aːlmkðbjn walaqad sˤabːaħahum bukraaan ʕaðaaːbun mustaqirːun kaːnt d͡ʒdtj tqwl daːʔimaːan: " laː ttnfs wtʃrb fj nfs aːlwqt " wanaʕuwðu bik min ʃarːi aːlsːalaaːtˤaai waaːlhaðri walaqad ʔaarajnaaːhu ʔaːjaaːtinaaː kulːahaaː fakaðːaba waʔaabaaː waaːtruki aːlbaħra rahwanaː ʔiinːahum d͡ʒundun muʁraquwna aːlħqjqa  jusˤliħ lakum ʔaaʕmaaːlakum wajaʁfir lakum ðunuwbakum waman jutˤiʕi aːllːaha warasuwlahu faqad faaːza fawzanaː ʕaðˤijmanaː aːlːaðijna laaː juʔutuwna aːlzːakaaːaa wahum biaːlʔaːχiraai hum kaaːfiruwna faʔaamːaaː man ʔauwtija kitaaːbahu bijamijnihi fajaquwlu haaːʔuumu aːqraʔuwaː kitaaːbijah ħaːwl twm ʔijqaːf maːrj mn ʃrb ʔaːχr zd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa mn aːlnbjð ðlk d͡ʒzaːʔ ʔaʕdaːʔ aːllh aːlnaːr lhm fjhaː daːr aːlχld d͡ʒzaːʔ bmaː kaːnwaː bʔaːjaːtnaː jd͡ʒħdwn walaaː taʕalːamuwaː aːlʕilma litud͡ʒaaːdiluwaː bihi aːlʕulamaaːʔa maːrj kaːnt fχwra bd͡ʒmaːlhaː mn tkwn ʔahm bkθjr mmaː tmlk waʔaanʃadt libaʕdˤi ʔaahli aːlʔaadabi watarfaʕu aːlʕabda aːlmamluwka ħatːaaː tud͡ʒlisahu mad͡ʒaaːlisa aːlmuluwki hl ttħdθ aːllaːtfja qaːmwaː btd͡ʒrba lmʕrfa maː aːðaː kaːn aːlʕqaːr qd ħsn aːlðaːkra wlw rħmnaːhm wkʃfnaː maː bhm mn dˤr lld͡ʒwaː fj hw χjr mmaː jd͡ʒmʕwn waʔiinːa laka lʔaad͡ʒranaː ʁajra mamnuwnin waqijla ħiljaau aːlmarʔi kaθraau ʔiχwaaːnihi ʔisbaːnjaː dwla mtqdma hl ʔantm bχjr waːlʔardˤ wdˤʕhaː llʔanaːm ʔaχːrnj zħaːm aːlsjr walaaː tamnun tastakθiru rsaːʔilhu ʔasˤbħt ʔaql ʔahmja tnaːm aːlʔafkaːr aːlχdˤraːʔ aːlʕdjma aːllwn ʁaːdˤba jwsf ʔaʕrdˤ ʕn hðaː waːstʁfrj lðnbk ʔink knt mn aːlχaːtˤʔijn ʔauwlaʔiika aːlmuqarːabuwna ʔaːmul ʔalaː ʔadˤtˤr ʔilaː aːstχdaːm hðaː aːlmsds liʔaanːa maʕquwlahu ʔin ʔaaħasːa wamaʕquwla kulːi ðij ħisːin jaʃhadu bifasaaːdi haðaaː aːltːasˤawːuri kaːn aːlsˤndwq θqjlaːan d͡ʒdaːan lðlk lm jsttˤʕ rfʕh fanaaːdawaː sˤaaːħibahum fataʕaaːtˤaaː faʕaqara wkm ʔahlknaː qblhm mn qrn hl tħs mnhm mn ʔaħd ʔaw tsmʕ lhm rkzaː aːnh jħb aːlʃaːj waqaaːla bazard͡ʒamharu ʔin jakun aːlʃːuʁlu mad͡ʒhadaaan  faaːlfaraaːʁu mafsadaaun ʔaħbk wʔarjd aːlzwaːd͡ʒ bk ʔiinːahaaː ʕalajhim muʔusˤadaaun laː jħdθ frqaːan swaːʔ ðhbt aːljwm aːw ʁdaːan ʕaːda maː ʔansaː ʔismh aːktʃft aːlkθjr mn aːlʔamwr ʕnh wʔamaː ʔin ʔan nwaːd͡ʒh hða aːlmʃkla fabiʔaajːi ħadijθin baʕdahu juʔuminuwna zjnb ʔanaː bħθt fj kl mkaːn hnaːk mχtˤtˤ ltwsjʕ aːlʃrka mtaː tstjqðˤ jwm aːlʕtˤla hj tħbː ʔatˤfaːlhaː waːlħmd llh rb aːlʕaːlmjn maːrkw ðhb aːlj naːdj ljlj mʕ d͡ʒaːrh famani aːftaraaː ʕalaaː aːllːahi aːlkaðiba min baʕdi ðalika faʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlðˤːaaːlimuwna twqfj ʕn ʁjðˤ ʔaχjki hðaː ʔaχj faʔaamːaaː aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː faʔauʕaðːibuhum ʕaðaaːbanaː ʃadijdanaː fij aːldːunjaaː waaːlʔaːχiraai wamaaː lahum min naaːsˤirijna waðalika ʔaawkadu ʔaasbaaːbi aːlʔaulfaai ʔanti laː tsttˤjʕjn tħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja, hl tsttˤjʕjn aːld͡ʒw mmtˤr aːktʃft lltw ʔan zwd͡ʒtj qd χaːntnj lm ʔalqa mnhu rfdˤanaː qtˤː wsˤdhaː maː kaːnt tʕbd mn dwn aːllh ʔinhaː kaːnt mn qwm kaːfrjn faːljwm nnd͡ʒjk bbdnk ltkwn lmn χlfk ʔaːja wʔin kθjraː mn aːlnaːs ʕn ʔaːjaːtnaː lʁaːflwn wʔaðnt lrbhaː wħqt faqaaːla aːlʔaːna laaː ʔaardˤaaːk lahaaː ktbn ʔiljh rsaːla lknh lm jrdː wħraːm ʕlaː qrja ʔahlknaːhaː ʔanhm laː jrd͡ʒʕwn qutlwaː fj aːlmʕrk waʕada aːllːahu aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aːlsˤːaaːliħaaːti lahum maʁfiraaun waʔaad͡ʒrun ʕaðˤijmun wmaː ʔarslnaːk ʔilaː rħma llʕaːlmjn kaːn saːmj fj bjt ljlaː aːljwm fʔasr bʕbaːdj ljlaː ʔinkm mtbʕwn twm jʃrb aːlʃaːmbaːnjaː ʔið naːdaː rbh ndaːʔ χfjaː hl ʁslt ʃʕrk aːljwm jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː aːtːaquwaː aːllːaha waðaruwaː maaː baqija mina aːlrːibaaː ʔiin kuntum muʔuminijna bl kðbwaː baːlsaːʕa wʔaʕtdnaː lmn kðb baːlsaːʕa sʕjraː fabiʔaajːi ʔaːlaːʔ rabːikumaaː tukaðːibaaːni ðalika biʔaanːahum kaaːnat taʔatijhim rusuluhum biaːlbajːinaaːti fakafaruwaː faʔaaχaðahumu aːllːahu ʔiinːahu qawijːun ʃadijdu aːlʕiqaaːbi hl aːlʔawz jraːa aːllh qaːlt ʔinj ʔaʕwð baːlrħmn mnk ʔin knt tqjaː fʔin lm tʔatwnj bh flaː kjl lkm ʕndj wlaː tqrbwn aːqdr     hnaː twm ldjh mnaːʕa mn ðlk aːlmrdˤ hw ktb aːlktaːb wanaħnu ʔaaqrabu ʔiilajhi minkum walakin laaː tubsˤiruwna waliman χaaːfa maqaaːma rabːihi d͡ʒanːataaːni lmaːðaː fqtˤ laː tχbrnaː bmaː tfkr bh  jaaː ʔaabati ʔiinːij qad d͡ʒaaːʔanij mina aːlʕilmi maaː lam jaʔatika faaːtːabiʕnij ʔaahdika sˤiraaːtˤanaː sawijːanaː bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi tabaaːraka aːlːaðij bijadihi aːlmulku wahuwa ʕalaaː kulːi ʃajʔin qadijrun hl tʕlm km aːlsaːʕa  ʔaanaaː aːlmaliku aːlʃːaaːbːu waːllh ʔaʕlm bʔaʕdaːʔikm wkfaː baːllh wljaː wkfaː baːllh nsˤjraː lqd rsːχ saːmj aːħtraːm aːlʔaːχrjn fj ðhn ʔabnaːʔih ħaːwl twm ʔijqaːf maːrj ʕn aːltħdθ mʕ d͡ʒwn min aːlzːaʕfaraaːni waʔaawraθakum ʔaardˤahum wadijaaːrahum waʔaamwaaːlahum waʔaardˤanaː lam tatˤaʔiuwhaaː wakaaːna aːllːahu ʕalaaː kulːi ʃajʔin qadijranaː wamaʕðuwrun fij aːstiʕaaːnatihi hw laː jqwl aːlmuʃrikuwna faʔaaχbara ʔaanːa aːlħaðara ʕalajhi juksibu haðihi aːlʔaawsˤaaːfa  wajuħdiθu haðihi aːlʔaaχlaaːqa ʔinːij ʔaaʕlamu ʔaanːij musaaːfirun waʔaanːahaaː daaːru bulʁaain waʔiinːa aːlʕasˤaaː min aːlklaːb hw aːljwm jʃʕr ʔanh ʔafdˤl bkθjr man kafara faʕalajhi kufruhu waman ʕamila sˤaaːliħanaː faliʔaanfusihim jamhaduwna ʔajmknk ʔan tʕlːmnj kjf ʔastχdm aːlʁsːaːla hʔulaːʔ aːlʔaχwaːt ljswaː ʕalajhi wasalːama liʔaabij hurajraaa radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu ʔahw ʔamrjkj balaaː qaaːdirijna ʕalaaː ʔaan nːusawːija banaaːnahu aːljaːbaːn bld jħjtˤ bh aːlbħr w ljdh mnaːχ mʕtdl jaː lhaː mn qsˤːain ħzjna wamarːa muħamːadu bnu waaːsiʕin raħmaau aːllːahi ʕalajhi biqawmin faqijla wanazaʕnaaː maaː fij sˤuduwrihim min ʁilːin ʔiiχwaaːnanaː ʕalaaː sururin mutaqaaːbilijna ʕalaaː ʔaan nːubadːila ʔaamθaaːlakum wanunʃiʔiakum fij maaː laː taʕlamuwna ʔanta kjf tʕrf hðaː  lbs srwaːlaːa nðˤjfaːa aːltʕljm jʕnj ʔakθr mn md͡ʒrːd aːlðhaːb ʔilaː aːlmdrsa kaːn saːmj jsˤrχ waʕda aːllːahi laaː juχlifu aːllːahu waʕdahu walakinːa ʔaakθara aːlnːaaːsi laaː jaʕlamuwna wʔantm ħjnʔið tnðˤrwn waaːlʔaamaaːnaai ʕalajhaaː ʔiðaː aːstqlt ʕn ʕmlk  fswf tqtˤʕ ʕljk χtˤ aːlrd͡ʒʕa hj hnaː mn ʔad͡ʒlj waaːlmuftaqiru ʔilaaː aːlʃːajʔi ʕaaːd͡ʒizun bihi ʕndmaː tʃklt ʔawlaː aːlnd͡ʒwm ʔataːħ lnaː tlskwb haːbl tχmjn maːħdθ fj ðlk aːlwqt wanumakːina lahum fij aːlʔaardˤi wanurija firʕawna wahaaːmaaːna wad͡ʒunuwdahumaaː minhum maaː kaaːnuwaː jaħðaruwna ʔiilaaː aːllːahi mard͡ʒiʕukum wahuwa ʕalaaː kulːi ʃajʔin qadijrun wanaħnu ʔaaqrabu ʔiilajhi minkum walakin lːaː tubsˤiruwna kaːn sqwtˤ d͡ʒdaːr brljn ħqaːan mnaːsba baːlʁa aːlʔahmja saraaːbijluhum min qatˤiraaːnin wataʁʃaaː wud͡ʒuwhahumu aːlnːaaːru fahuwa fij ʕijʃaain raaːdˤijaain ʔin hw ʔilaː ðkr llʕaːlmjn kuluwaː waaːrʕawaː ʔaanʕaaːmakum ʔiinːa fij ðalika laʔaːjaaːtin liʔauwlij aːlnːuhaaː ðhbt ʔilaː aːlmdjr ʔaːmlaː ʔan ʔastfjd mn zjaːda fj aːlraːtb fj mθl hðaː aːlwqt mn aːlʕaːm aːlmaːdˤj  kaːn msaːfranaː ʔilaː aːlflbjn twqf ʕn mdˤaːjqa ʔaχjk qaːlwaː sbħaːnk laː ʕlm lnaː ʔilaː maː ʕlmtnaː ʔink ʔant aːlʕljm aːlħkjm laː ʔarjd ʔan ʔaχsrka wamaaː ʔaursiluwaː ʕalajhim ħaaːfiðˤijna waaːtlu ʕalajhim nabaʔaa aːlːaðij ʔaːtajnaaːhu ʔaːjaaːtinaaː faaːnsalaχa minhaaː faʔaatbaʕahu aːlʃːajtˤaaːnu fakaaːna mina aːlʁaaːwijna jrjd fnd͡ʒaːnaː waːħdaː mn aːlʃaːj fqtˤ maːðaː tfdˤl wʔin maː nrjnk bʕdˤ aːlðj nʕdhm ʔaw ntwfjnk fʔinmaː ʕljk aːlblaːʁ wʕljnaː aːlħsaːb qaaːluwaː aːtˤːajːarnaaː bika wabiman maʕaka qaaːla tˤaaːʔiirukum ʕinda aːllːahi bal ʔaantum qawmun tuftanuwna ʔiilːaaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aːlsˤːaaːliħaaːti falahum ʔaad͡ʒrun ʁajru mamnuwnin waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlʔaudabaaːʔi rubːa ʕilmin lam tuʕd͡ʒam fusˤuwluhu faaːstuʕd͡ʒima maħsˤuwluhu hl stqwm aːjraːn bdˤrb "flstˤjn aːlmħtlh" klː ʕaːmin wʔantm bχjr ʔanaː ʔinsaːn sˤaːdq waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlbulaʁaaːʔi ʕuquwdu aːlʁaaːdiri maħluwlaaun  waʕuhuwduhu madχuwlaaun wmaː ʕlmnaːh aːlʃʕr wmaː jnbʁj lh ʔin hw ʔilaː ðkr wqrʔaːn mbjn knt mtʕba d͡ʒdaː aːljwm bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm qd ʔaflħ aːlmʔumnwn ʔiinːaaː ʔaanʃaʔanaaːhunːa ʔiinʃaaːʔ qmjsˤhaː kaːn mltˤχaːan baːlsˤlsˤa qaaːluwaː jaaː ʔaabaaːnaaː maaː laka laaː taʔamanːaaː ʕalaaː juwsufa waʔiinːaaː lahu lanaaːsˤiħuwna laː jmknk ʃraːʔ aːlsʕaːda ʔiin kaaːnat ʔiilːaaː sˤajħaaan waaːħidaaan faʔiiðaaː hum d͡ʒamijʕun ladajnaaː muħdˤaruwna biaːlʕaaːdaai mad͡ʒraaː aːltˤːabʕi mn aːlðj aːtsˤl bʔaːn wamizaaːd͡ʒuhu min tasnijmin ʕad͡ʒibt liman jaħtamij min aːlʔaatˤʕimaai limadˤarːaaːtihaaː ʔinhaː ʔatˤwl mnj bkθjr aːlħaqːu min rabːika falaaː takun mina aːlmumtarijna aːrjdu aːlðhaːb ʔilaː tˤwkjw waʔiin kaaːna ðuw ʕusraain fanaðˤiraaun ʔiilaaː majsaraain waʔaan tasˤadːaquwaː χajrun lakum ʔiin kuntum taʕlamuwna ʔaafaman jatːaqij biwad͡ʒhihi suwʔa aːlʕaðaaːbi jawma aːlqijaaːmaai waqijla lilðˤːaaːlimijna ðuwquwaː maaː kuntum taksibuwna aːlfatħi laaː janfaʕu aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː ʔiijmaaːnuhum walaaː hum junðˤaruwna wakaaːna ʔaad͡ʒwada qurajʃin fij zamaaːnihi qaːl maː mknj fjh rbj χjr fʔaʕjnwnj bqwa ʔad͡ʒʕl bjnkm wbjnhm rdmaː qulnaaː aːld͡ʒasadu kulːuhu ʔaalaːa whija aːlqalbu ʔaχtˤtˤ ldʕwa dˤjwf kθjrjn ʔilaː ħfl aːlaːfttaːħ wamatˤʕamuhu ħaraaːmun wamaʃrabuhu ħaraaːmi nrfʕ aːlʔaʕlaːm fj aːlʔaʕjaːd aːlwtˤnja wajawma taquwmu wajabsutˤuwaː ʔiilajkum ʔaajdijahum waʔaalsinatahum biaːlsːuwʔi wawadːuwaː law takfuruwna jatˤuwfu ʕalajhim wildaaːnun muχalːaduwna twm aːʃtkj mn aːlmʁsˤ bʕdmaː aːkl maː tˤbχth maːrj waʔaamːaaː biʔaanːahum kafaruwaː biʔaːjaaːtinaaː waqaaːluwaː ʔaaʔiiðaaː kunːaaː ʕiðˤaaːmanaː warufaaːtanaː ʔaaʔiinːaaː lamabʕuwθuwna χalqanaː d͡ʒadijdanaː fj kθjr mn aːlʔaħjaːn laː jkwn aːlħb wħdh kaːfjanaː lnd͡ʒaːħ ʕlaːqa maː hl ʔatmmt kl wðˤaːʔifk  bajnahumaaː barzaχun laaː jabʁijaaːni liʔaanːa aːlχijaaːra fij kulːi ʃajʔin huwa aːlʔaaqalːu  faliðalika qalːa wufuwru aːlʕaqli waaːlfadˤli faʔaasri biʕibaaːdij lajlanaː ʔiinːakum mutːabaʕuwna jaʕnij aːlχatˤːa wllh maː fj aːlsmaːwaːt wmaː fj aːlʔardˤ wkfaː baːllh wkjlaː jaː ʔajhaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː ʔiðaː lqjtm fʔia faːθbtwaː waːðkrwaː aːllh kθjraː jastaqijma sʔalth ʕmaː fʕlh aːlbaːrħa waʔiiðaaː fasadat aːldːunjaaː kaaːna ʔisʕaaːduhaaː makranaː qaaːla haʔuulaaːʔi banaaːtij ʔiin kuntum faaːʕilijna aːlbʕdˤ jħbwn aːlqtˤtˤ  waːlbʕdˤ aːlʔaːχr jfdˤl ʁjr mmnwn swf ʔafʕlhaː swaːʔaːan waːfqt ʔam lm twaːfq ʔinːa aːlʕadla mijzaaːnu aːllːahi aːlːaðij wadˤaʕahu lilχalqi rabːu aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waaːlʔaardˤi wamaaː bajnahumaaː faaːʕbudhu waaːsˤtˤabir liʕibaaːdatihi hal taʕlamu lahu samijːanaː ʔajn tʕlmt aːlʔind͡ʒljzja  laː ʔaðˤnː ʔanː bmqdwrj fʕl ðlk lknːj sʔaħaːwl nħn χlqnaːkm flwlaː tsˤdqwn ʔanaː lwħdj waðukira ʔaanːa ʔibraaːhijma bna aːlmahdijːi daχala ʕalaaː aːlmaʔamuwni waʕindahu d͡ʒamaaːʕaaun jatakalːamuwna fij aːlfiqhi faqaaːla daːʔimaː maː jsʔal ʔasʔila saːðd͡ʒa famaaː lahum ʕani aːltːaðkiraai muʕridˤijna aːlwaladu ʔaanwatˤu wkðlk nfsˤl aːlʔaːjaːt wltstbjn sbjl aːlmd͡ʒrmjn faqarːabahu ʔiilajhim qaaːla ʔaalaaː taʔakuluwna liʔaanːa aːlʔaamala huwa fij θaaːnij ħaaːlin ʔanaː mʕk hnaː aːlʔaːn waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami aːlʔaadˤdaaːdu laaː tatːafiqu  waaːlʔaaʃkaaːlu laaː taftariqu hðh qsˤjda raːʔiʕa wlqd d͡ʒʔinaːhm bktaːb fsˤlnaːh ʕlaː ʕlm hdaː wrħma lqwm jʔumnwn waħusni aːlmutaaːrakaai baʕda aːlwartˤaai wʔin kaːn ðw janfaʕuhu ðalika huwa aːldˤːalaaːlu aːlbaʕijdu ðaːk aːlmnzl mlkj hðaː aːlrsm jʕwd taːrjχh aːlaː aːlqrn aːlχaːms ʕʃr jaː jħjaː χð aːlktaːb bqwa wʔaːtjnaːh aːlħkm sˤbjaː wmaː jnbʁj llrħmn ʔan jtχð wldaː aːlmrsljn waːlbħr aːlmsd͡ʒwr lwnhaː ʔaħmr ʔinh jʕml tˤwaːl aːljwm waqaaːla ʔaabuw aːldːardaaːʔi wamaaː χalaqnaaː aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waaːlʔaardˤa wamaaː bajnahumaaː laaːʕibijna dʕnaː nħsˤl ʕlaː mubijnanaː ʔasˤjb ʔabj bðaːt aːlrʔia aːlʃhr aːlmaːdˤj wlqd trknaːhaː ʔaːja fhl mn mdkr wʔin rbk lhw aːlʕzjz aːlrħjm walaʕalːa baʕdˤa man juħibːu ʔaan junsaba ʔilaaː aːlkarami junkiru ħadːa aːlsːaχaaːʔi sˤfʕ mnːaːd baːja wʔinhm lnaː lʁaːʔiðˤwn wmaː kaːn aːllh ljʕðbhm wʔant fjhm wmaː kaːn aːllh mʕðbhm whm jstʁfrwn qaaːluwaː ʔiinːamaaː ʔaanta mina aːlmusaħːarijna waʔaanaaː aːχtartuka faaːstamiʕ limaaː juwħaaː hl jd͡ʒb ʔan tðhbj ʔilaː mktb aːlbrjd  tħtaːd͡ʒ aːld͡ʒzaːʔir ʔilaː aːlmaːʔ wadaaːru ʁinanaː liman tazawːada minhaaː ħqaː  jd͡ʒb ʔan nqwm bʃjʔ ħjaːl hðaː aːlʔamr ʔalʁwaː zjaːrthm ʔilaː lndn fakun kamaaː ʃiʔit smja fad͡ʒaʕalahu ʁuθaaːʔan ʔaaħwaaːaː wasˤadːahaaː maaː kaaːnat taʕbudu min duwni aːllːahi ʔiinːahaaː kaaːnat min qawmin kaaːfirijna waqadˤajnaaː ʔiilajhi ðalika aːlʔaamra ʔaanːa daaːbira haʔuulaaːʔi maqtˤuwʕun musˤbiħijna tħdːθ ʕn mrdˤhaː ħjnmaː bdʔat aːlnd͡ʒwm aːlbdaːʔija fj ʔidˤaːʔa aːlkwn srq aːlmaːl aːnaː mhnds kaːn saːmj mʃwːʃaː faʔaatbaʕuwhum muʃriqijna ʔanaː ʃdjda aːlfχr bʔabj waman jaʕʃu ʕan ðikri aːlrːaħmani nuqajːidˤ lahu ʃajtˤaaːnanaː fahuwa lahu qarijnun aːld͡ʒbl mʁtˤaː baːlθlwd͡ʒ tilka ʔaːjaaːtu aːlkitaaːbi aːlmubijni famin ħaqːihim ʔaan jaʕrifuwaː ħaqːahu  wajastabtˤinuwaː ʔaahlahu wabihim min aːlħaaːd͡ʒaai waaːlʕad͡ʒzi maaː wasˤafnaaː wʔant ʔajdˤanaː kaːdt ʃaːħnaun tdhsunij hl ldjkm maːʔ mʕdnj wanujasːiruka liljusraaː ʔalm d͡ʒahanːama lamuħijtˤaaun biaːlkaaːfirijna sˤʕd ʔilaː sjaːrth manθuwri aːlħikami aːlʕuquwqu θaklu man lam juθkal laː ʔaħd jrjd ðlk mtaː tnwj aːlsfr ʔilaː aːljaːbaːn  wθmwd aːlðjn d͡ʒaːbwaː aːlsˤχr baːlwaːd fj ʔajaːmnaː hðh  bʔimkaːn ʔaj waːħd ʔan jħsˤl ʕlaː aːlktb wʔamaː ʔin kaːn mn aːlmkðbjn aːldˤaːljn waqijla libaʕdˤi aːlzːuhːaaːdi wmaː kaːn lnaː ʕljkm mn sltˤaːn bl kntm qwmaː tˤaːʁjn wajatˤuwfu ʕalajhim ʁilmaaːnun lahum kaʔaanːahum luʔuluʔuun maknuwnun d͡ʒʕlnh jʕml hðh aːlktb lnaː laː jzʕd͡ʒnj ʔan tdχn ʔaħsnt ʕmlaː jstʁrq aːlsjr mn aːlmħtˤa ʔilaː aːlmdrsa ʕʃrjn dqjqa ʕaːmla waqaaːla d͡ʒumhuwru aːlmutakalːimijna ʔinkaaːru ðalika waaːd͡ʒibun  waaːldːafʕu ʕanhu laaːzimun wabaʕdˤuhaaː biaːltːatˤabːuʕi aːld͡ʒaaːrij wad͡ʒaaːʔat kulːu nafsin maʕahaaː saaːʔiiqun waʃahijdun mn χʃj aːlrħmn baːlʁjb wd͡ʒaːʔ bqlb mnjb wkaːnwaː jqwlwn ʔaʔiðaː mtnaː wknaː traːbaː wʕðˤaːmaː ʔaʔinaː lmbʕwθwn ʔanaː ldj d͡ʒaːr ʔafrjqj-ʔamrjkj ʔinhu aːðˤhrhaː ʕlj wqaːl mwsaː jaː qwm ʔin kntm ʔaːmntm baːllh fʕljh twklwaː ʔin kntm mslmjn laː tʕtmd ʕlaː waːldjk kθjraːan ʔilaː χaːsˤth d͡ʒaːʔ wχaːsˤth lm tqblh bal qaaːluwaː miθla maaː qaaːla aːlʔaawːaluwna hl ʃkrtihi, hl qlti ʃkraːan lk  tbdʔa biχuruwd͡ʒihaaː ʕan aːlʔaawlaaː ʔilaaː maaː lajsa biʔaawlaaː aːld͡ʒzaːʔir mθjra llaːhtmaːm ʔilːaaː ʔaan jastawija aːlnːafʕaaːni fajakuwnu aːlʔaaχðu ʕamːan aːuʃtuhira ðikruhu waaːrtafaʕa qadruhu ʔaawlaaː ʔanaː ʔaħbh maːðaː ʕlmatk  wasafarun baʕijdun hl ʕndk waːħd ʔakbr qljlanaː mn hðh  taħakamwaː bʔanfusakum kaːnt aːntqaːdaːth qaːsja d͡ʒdaː waman ʕasˤathu nafsuhu kaaːna bimaʕsˤijaai ʁajrihaaː ʔaawlaaː aːlkaːlsjwm ljs mn dˤmn ħmjth hl tfhmnj  ʁdˤba aːlsjf wħlm aːlʔanbjaːʔ lijaʔakuluwaː min θamarihi wamaaː ʕamilathu ʔaajdijhim ʔaafalaaː jaʃkuruwna wjwm jqwl naːdwaː ʃrkaːʔij aːlðjn zʕmtm ħaːsd ʔiðaː ħsd faʔiiðan qad lazima ʔaan nasˤifa ħaaːla aːlʔaansaaːbi  wamaaː jaʕridˤu lahaaː min aːlʔaasbaaːbi fusˤila saːmj ʕn ʔamːh lmdːa ʔasaːbjʕ raħmaaan min rabːika ʔiinːahu huwa aːlsːamijʕu aːlʕalijmu fijhaaː sururun marfuwʕaaun jsttˤjʕ aːld͡ʒmjʕ tʁðja qaːʕda aːlbjaːnaːt bd͡ʒml tħwj mfrdaːt d͡ʒdjda ʔanta jmknk aːlrqsˤ, ʔaljs kðlk  ʔant lm tʕml bmaː fjh aːlkfaːja ʔaaʕrifu ʔaanaːhu lam huwa ħaaːdiθun biaːlqasˤdi maːðaː nʔakl aːlljla  laː jbdw bʔan twm jʕrf aːlkθjr ʕn maːrj twm laː jχaːf mn aːlmwt wlqd ʔaχðnaːhm baːlʕðaːb fmaː aːstkaːnwaː lrbhm wmaː jtdˤrʕwn lm jkn mnːaːd jrjd aːlʕwda ʔilaː ðlk aːlmnzl qjl ʔan ʃaːʕraː ʕðˤjmaː qd skn hnaː faʔiiðaaː kaaːna ðaaː riʔiaaːsaain ʔaalhathu  waʔiin kaaːna ðaaː maʕijʃaain qatˤaʕathu ʔawd aːn aːdʕwk ʔilaː aːlʕʃaːʔ ʔawd lw saːʕdtnj tˤaːb jwmk hl trjdnj ħqaːan ʔan ʔafʕl hðaː  jaħlifuwna lakum litardˤawaː ʕanhum faʔiin tardˤawaː ʕanhum faʔiinːa aːllːaha laaː jardˤaaː ʕani aːlqawmi aːlfaaːsiqijna walamaaː d͡ʒaaːza wuruwdu aːlʃːarʕi biʔiiqraaːri ʔaahli aːlðːimːaai ʕalaaː aːlkufri ʔinhm ʔatwn ʔilj mnzlnaː, nħn ln nðhb ʔilj mnzlhm lki jaː msˤru aːlsaːlaːma wslaːmanaː jaː blaːdj kaðalika maaː ʔaataaː aːlːaðijna min qablihim min rasuwlin ʔiilːaaː qaaːluwaː saaːħirun ʔaaw mad͡ʒnuwnun sfjna aːlʃħn wsˤlt mbkra baːrbʕ saːʕaːt sˤdjqk hnaː ʔarjd ʔan ʔazwr ʔind͡ʒltraː jwmaː fnaːdaːhaː mn tħthaː ʔalaː tħznj qd d͡ʒʕl rbk tħtk srjaː «hl ʔant d͡ʒaːhz» «ʔaʕtqd» aːldjk jʔuðn saʔaalathu lmaː kaːn jbkj fsˤl lrbk waːnħr kjf jlaːħaðˤ aːlχtˤʔa  ʔiiðaaː tutlaaː ʕalajhi ʔaːjaaːtunaaː qaaːla ʔaasaaːtˤijru aːlʔaawːalijna nfʕlhaː aːlʔaːn ʔaw wamin lam jarʁab fij aːlmaʕruwfi bulija biaːlnːadaaːmaai waaːlχusraaːni maːðaː tfʕlwn  kaðːabat ʕaaːdun aːlmursalijna  tmnːjt ʔan ʔasˤbħ bjtˤrjːa ʕaːʃ aːlkθjr mn aːltd͡ʒaːrb aːlsjʔia waðˤaaːhira ʁadrihim wafaaːʔan ʔilaː mn ʔataː aːllh bqlb sljm km ħbːa maːnʁw trjd  law kaaːna haʔuulaaːʔi ʔaːlihaaan maaː waraduwhaaː wakulːun fijhaaː χaaːliduwna ʔamtˤrt kθjraːan aːlʃhr aːlmaːdˤj ʕljnaː ʔan nʔaχð ʃbaːbh bʕjn aːlaːʕtbaːr kjf ʕlmta maːðaː kaːnt trjd twm fχwr d͡ʒdaː bmaːrj ʔaljs kðlk ʕaaːlimu aːlʁajbi waaːlʃːahaaːdaai aːlʕazijzu aːlħakijmu laː ʔasttˤjʕ smaːʕk d͡ʒjdaː ʔinːa lij ʔaumːanaː ʔaanaaː mutˤijʕuhaaː ʔauqʕiduhaaː ʕalaaː ðˤahrij hl qblth  " nʕm qblth " qaːl rb aːħkm baːlħq wrbnaː aːlrħmn aːlmstʕaːn ʕlaː maː tsˤfwn ʔaħrz twm hdfanaː jħlfwn baːllh lkm ljrdˤwkm waːllh wrswlh ʔaħq ʔan jrdˤwh ʔin kaːnwaː mʔumnjn wanariθuhu maaː jaquwlu wajaʔatijnaaː fardanaː ʔaani aːʁduwaː ʕalaaː ħarθikum ʔiin kuntum sˤaaːrimijna ʔiið qaaːla lahum ʔaaχuwhum sˤaaːliħun ʔaalaaː tatːaquwna wamaaː kaaːna bihi sˤalaaːħu aːldːunjaaː wqaːl aːlmlʔa aːlðjn kfrwaː mn qwmh lʔin aːtbʕtm ʃʕjbaː ʔinkm ʔiðaː lχaːsrwn waʔaasbaaːbu aːlʔaulfaai χamsaaun wahija aːldːijnu waaːlnːasabu waaːlmusˤaaːharaau waaːlmawadːaau waaːlbirːu wʔin d͡ʒhnm lmwʕdhm ʔad͡ʒmʕjn hw ħrdˤ ʕlaː aːlʃʁb ʔaðˤnːhu jχfj ʃjʔianaː fajatabahrad͡ʒa biaːlsˤːulaħaaːʔi walajsa minhum jħb tnaːwl aːlsltˤa baːllħm ðlk bʔan aːllh nzl aːlktaːb baːlħq wʔin aːlðjn aːχtlfwaː fj aːlktaːb lfj ʃqaːq bʕjd tħwjl aːlʔasˤwaːt aːlaː nsˤwsˤ bjdˤa aːljwm χjr mn dd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa aːlʁd aːlʃrka ʕaːnt mn χsaːra waːħd bljwn jn aːlsna aːlmaːdˤja bl waʔauħibːu muʕaaːwijaaa waχabara minhaaː kunha ʔiʃfaaːqihaaː raaːdˤa nafsahu litaθbuta ʕalaaː ʔaaħadi ħaaːlaaːtihaaː faʔiinːa ʔaaʁraaːdˤa aːlnːaaːsi maʕa aːχtilaaːfi ʔaahwaaːʔiihim laaː tatːafiqu ʕalaaː satri salijmin waʔiiχfaaːʔi mufijdin aːlaː maːðaː tnðˤr  faman kaaːnat hid͡ʒratuhu ʔiilaaː aːllhi warasuwlihi fahid͡ʒratuhu ʔiilaː aːllhi warasuwlihi fj aːljwm aːltaːlj twχaː aːlħðr ʔaaw bmðˤhr d͡ʒmjl ʔiinːa aːlʔiinsaaːna lafij χusrin fjhaː jfrq kl ʔamr ħkjm mn aːχtrʕ aːlbjaːnw  aːlħb w aːlkrh ʃʕwraːn mtʕaːksaːn wakulːu ʃajʔin faʕaluwhu fij aːlzːuburi ldj aːlqljl mn aːlmaːl, mʕ ðlk wahum janðˤuruwna qaːl ʔad͡ʒʔitnaː ltχrd͡ʒnaː mn ʔardˤnaː bsħrk jaː mwsaː jurijdu ʔaan juχrid͡ʒakum min ʔaardˤikum bisiħrihi famaaːðaaː taʔamuruwna ʔinkm lfj qwl mχtlf ʔinːa aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː wjwm nħʃrhm d͡ʒmjʕaː θm nqwl llðjn ʔaʃrkwaː ʔajn ʃrkaːʔukm aːlðjn kntm tzʕmwn nʃkr kl mn qdwm ʕndnaː kaːn saːmj jsˤtˤħb aːlftjaːt jqtlhnː θmː jrmj d͡ʒθθhnː fj aːlʁaːbaːt waaːlqamara qadːarnaːhu manaːzila ħatːaː ʕaːda kaaːlʕurd͡ʒwni aːlqadjmi aːrjnj aːlsˤwra jd͡ʒb ʔan ʔaurzq bʔibn faʔaaχrad͡ʒa lahu tˤaʕaaːmanaː wanafaqaaan waðˤulma aːldːaaːlːaai tadˤijʕu quwːatuhu bikasalihi ʔajn ʔant d͡ʒmjla kaːlwrda jaʕnij ħasada aːbni ʔaːdama liʔaaχijhi ħatːaaː qatalahu waqad qijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami min ʔaawkadi aːlħilmi raħmaau aːld͡ʒuhːaaːli jtħdθ bsrʕa kbjra ʔaðkr ʔanj qaːblt ðlk aːlrd͡ʒl mn qbl fj kaːmbrdd͡ʒ marfwʕaain mutˤahːaraain wamina aːllːajli faaːsd͡ʒud lahu wasabːiħhu lajlanaː tˤawjlanaː liʔaanːa aːlʕaaːlima biaːstidʕaaːʔiihi mutawafːirun rabːu aːlmaʃriqajni warabːu aːlmaʁribajni lm jftħ saːmj rsaːla ljlaː ħtːaː waʔaamːaaː ʔaːdaaːbu aːlmuwaaːdˤaʕaai waaːliaːsˤtˤilaaːħi fadˤarbaaːni ʔakl wħmd χjr mn ʔakl wsˤmt aːdːʕaː saːmj ʔanːh tˤbjb ʔarχsˤ mn aːltmr fj aːlbsˤra man ʔauʕtˤija faʃakara waʔiiħbaaːtˤi aːlʔaad͡ʒri laː jsttˤjʕ ʔaħdun msaːʕdtj tħsˤːlt ljlaː ʕlaː ʃhaːda mmrːdˤa waribħu tid͡ʒaaːraain nħn mn nfs aːld͡ʒaːmʕa maːðaː trjd ʔan tʔakl saːmj laː jħbː aːlmslmjn waħukija ʔaanːa aːlrːaʃijda ħabasa rad͡ʒulanaː θumːa saʔaala ʕanhu baʕda zamaaːnin min ʃarːi maː χalaqa faljadʕu naːdijahu liʔaanːa aːlmukaaːfiʔia ʔaaʕaðru wamadχala aːlʃːarːi masluwkanaː daʕwaaun mustad͡ʒaaːbaaun ʔaan laaː jarfaʕa bikalaaːmihi sˤawtanaː mustankaranaː walaaː janzaʕid͡ʒa lahu aːnziʕaaːd͡ʒanaː mustahd͡ʒananaː jatˤijru aːlðːubaːbu ldaː saːmj sˤdjq mslm aːtˤlbwaː aːlʕlm mn aːlmhd ʔilaː aːllħd ʔaχbr saːmj btlk aːlsːrqa ln tsmʕnaː saːmj ðaːhb ʔilaː aːld͡ʒaːmʕa tħrːk aːlʔaːn aːstmrːt ljlaː fj aːlħrka ʔaantum waʔaːbaːʔuukumu aːlʔaaqdamwna tχaːsˤmaː saːmj w ljlaː ħwl mʃkl ʔidmaːnhaː ʕlaː aːlkħwl ʔiinːaː χalaqnaaː aːlʔiinsaːna min nutˤfaain ʔaamʃaːd͡ʒin nabtaljhi fad͡ʒaʕalnaːhu samjʕanaː basˤjranaː nħn ʔasˤdqaːʔ qdaːmaː ʔafdˤl rkwb aːldraːd͡ʒa ʔiinːaː lamuʁramwna walanuðjqanːahum mina aːlʕaðaːbi aːlʔaadnaː dwna aːlʕaðaːbi aːlʔaakbari laʕalːahum jard͡ʒiʕwna waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlʔaudabaaːʔi man lam jaʃkur limunʕimihi aːstaħaqːa qatˤʕa aːlnːiʕmaai kjf kaːnt biaːldˤːaraʕi wajuħrama biaːlʔaubːahaai lkl ʃʕaːʕ mnħaː wtˤwjla w ʔitd͡ʒaːh ʔaaχbara ʔaanːa aːltˤːarijqa ʔilaaː aːld͡ʒanːaai aːħtimaaːlu aːlmakaaːrihi  waaːltˤːarijqa ʔilaaː aːlnːaaːri aːtːibaaːʕu aːlʃːahawaaːti hl bʔimkaːnj zjaːrtk ʁdaː walaaː muʃijra kaðij nusˤħin wamaqdiraain fij muʃkili aːlʔaamri faaːχtar ðaaːka muntasˤiħanaː waaːlχasˤlaau aːlχaaːmisaau faʔiinːa haðihi aːlʔaumuwra tamnaʕu min aːlʔiiðaaːʕaai saaːra aːlqitˤaaːru ʔanaː msrwra lʕdm wd͡ʒwdj hnaːk kaːn saːmj mhtmːaː bʃʔuwnh fqtˤ ʔijlaːfihim riħlaaa aːlʃːitaːʔi waaːlsˤːajfi ʔad͡ʒbr saːmj ljlaː ʕlaː aːlðːhaːb mʕh haː qd wsˤlt aːlzll jʃʕr twm baːlmsʔuwlja ʕmaː ħdθ biʔaajdj safaraain ʔaaʔaulqija aːlðːikru ʕalajhi min bajninaː bal huwa kaðːaːbun ʔaaʃirun wajastaʁnij ʕan aːlʕuluwfaai biraʕjihi ʔaaʔaantum ʔaanʃaʔatum ʃad͡ʒaratahaː ʔaam naħnu aːlmunʃiʔiwna waðalika biaːstinzaaːlihi ʕanhu ʔin ʕalaaː ʔaan jastawlija ʕalajhi ħubːu aːlmaaːli wabuʕdu aːlʔaamali fajabʕaθuhu ħubːu aːlmaaːli ʕalaaː aːlħirsˤi fij tˤalabihi waʃahwaai saaːʕaain ʔaawraθat ħuznanaː tˤawijlanaː aːtːibaaːʕu aːldːijni fij aːd͡ʒtinaaːbihi waʕaːdun wafirʕawnu waʔiiχwaːnu lwtˤin ʔanaː aːlmsʔuwl ʕn hðh aːlʕjaːda ʔauwlʔiika lahum rizqun maʕlwmun jmθːl traːmb maː jstħqːh aːlʔamrjkjːwn waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami ʕuquwbaau aːlħaaːsidi min nafsihi qaaːla ʔaabuw tamːaaːmin aːltˤːaaːʔiijːu ʔin qaaːla qawlanaː ħaqːaqahu bifiʕlihi waʔaanʃada θaʕlabun waħukija ʔaanːa ʔaaʕraaːbijːanaː ʔaataaː aːbna ʔaabij ðiʔibin fasaʔaalahu ʕan masʔaalaai tˤalaaːqin faʔaaftaaːhu bitˤalaaːqi aːmraʔaatihi ʔaafdˤalu aːlʕudːaai aːlsˤːabru ʕalaaː aːlʃːidːaai nħn ħqːaː nħbː hðaː aːlmdrːs dˤħːaː saːmj bljlaː kj juχrd͡ʒ nfsh mn aːlmʔazq ʔaabʁadˤukum ʔilajːa aːlmutafajhiqu aːlmikθaaːru waaːlmuliħːu aːlmihðaaːru man kaθura mizaaːħuhu zaaːlat hajbatuhu saːmj χtˤjbj ʔaħb fjh sˤdqh man ʔaaʕtˤaaː fadˤla maaːlihi fahuwa χajrun lahu ʔaani aːʕmal saːbiʁaːtin waqadːir fij aːlsːardi waaːʕmalwaː sˤaːliħanaː ʔiinːj bimaː taʕmalwna basˤjrun waminhaaː ʔaan jantaqila ʕan faʕatawaː ʕan ʔaamri rabːihim faʔaaχaðathumu aːlsˤːaːʕiqaau wahum janðˤurwna ʕaːd ʔilaː ðlk aːlmtd͡ʒr d͡ʒnt ʕlaː nfshaː braːqʃ aːld͡ʒhl ʃr aːlʔasˤħaːb waaːlθːaaːnij ʔaanːahu ʔaaraaːda aːltˤːarijqa waliðalika qijla laaː muruwʔaaa limuqilːin θumːa ʔaaʁraqnaː baʕdu aːlbaːqjna haː hw aːlʕnwaːn aːʕlam ʔaanːa aːlkalaaːma tard͡ʒumaaːnun juʕabːiru ʕan mustawdaʕaaːti aːldˤːamaaːʔiiri fj hðh aːlðˤrwf aːlqawijːu aːlʔaamjnu ðhb saːmj ljdrs kajfa qaaːla kaːn saːmj jħbː aːlʃːd͡ʒaːr ʔaatutrakwna fj maː haːhunaː ʔaːminjna ʔasˤjbt qdm aːlħsˤaːn jnbʁj ʕlaː saːmj ʔan jhtmː bʃʔuwnh qtl saːmj ljlaː maː hw aːlwqt aːlðj tħbh saːʔil aːlbχjl mħrwm wmaːlh mktwm saːrt bh aːlruːkbaːnu saːfr td͡ʒd ʕwdˤaː ʕmaː tfaːrqh mtaː stʕwd wasujːirati aːld͡ʒibaːlu fakaːnat saraːbanaː bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi ʔaalam naʃraħ laka sˤadraka waqaaːla kisraaː lilmuwbadi d͡ʒmʕt aːlʃːrtˤa aːlkθjr mn aːlʔadlːa mn saːħa aːld͡ʒrjma kaːn ʔaħdhm jntðˤr faːdˤl lamːaaː ʕarafa ʔaahlu aːlnːaqsˤi ħaaːlahum ʕinda ðawij aːlkamaaːli aːstaʕaaːnuwaː biaːlkibri lijuʕaðˤːima sˤaʁijranaː kj jsbħ ʔilaː aːld͡ʒzjra aːlʔaχraː kaːn ʕlaː saːmj ʔan jʕbr ħwdˤaː mljʔiaː bʔasmaːk aːlqrʃ ʔaaʕiduk aːljawma waʔaaħbuwk ʁadanaː biaːlʔiind͡ʒaaːzi litaðuwqa ħalaaːwaaa aːlʔaamali waʔaatazajːanu biθubuwti aːlwafaaːʔi man ʔaadːabak  qaaːla wakam ʔaarsalnaː min nabijːin fij aːlʔaawːaljna faljanðˤuri aːlʔiinsaːnu ʔiilaː tˤaʕaːmihi sfħsˤh aːldːktwr baːkr walaaː jaχlitˤu maʕa aːltːasˤawːuri taʕzijaaan ʔanaː waːθq mn msaːʕdtk lj waʔaanːahu huwa ʔaaʁnaː waʔaaqnaː ʔawqf aːlʃːrtˤj sjːaːra ljlaː wamiθlu haðaaː aːld͡ʒawaaːbi laaː justaʁrabu min ʔaanbijaaːʔi aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː aːlːaðijna ʔaamadːahum biwaħjihi srq saːmj sˤfħa mn dftr wsˤfaːt aːltˤːbjb θumːa tawalːajtum min baʕdi ðaaːlika falawlaaː fadˤlu aːllːahi ʕalajkum waraħmatuhu lakuntum mina aːlχaaːsirijna waqijla lisufjaaːna maaː aːlzːuhdu fij aːldːunjaaː  qaaːla aːlzːuhdu fij aːlnːaaːsi aːʕlam ʔaanːa aːlχajra waaːlʃːarːa maʕaaːnin kaaːminaaun tuʕrafu bisimaaːtin daaːlːaain kamaaː qaaːlat aːlʕarabu fij ʔaamθaaːlihaaː lubsaaun maʃhuwraaun walubsaaun maħquwraaun hl ldjk ʔalm fj aːlbtˤn ʔarsl saːmj rsaːla haːtfjːa ʔaχraː lljlaː lnnsaː klːjːa maː ħdθ aːllːjla aːlmaːdˤja ʔaan jakuwna qad kafːa ʕan sajːiʔii ʕamalihi faqaːla ʔiinːj saqjmun lam jaħdˤur muħamːadun maʕa ʔaaχijh qwl hðaː shl qaaːla faʔiinːa aːllːaha ʕazːa wad͡ʒalːa jakrahu waχajrun minhu man ʔiðaaː nasijt ðakːarak jʃrbwn aːlħljb ħajθu jaquwlu ʔin aːlmtqjn fj d͡ʒnaːt wʕjwn aːntˤlqwaː ʔilaː maː kntm bh tkðbwn tnzjl aːlʕzjz aːlrħjm maː rʔaj twm ħjaːl hðaː kaːn qd rn aːld͡ʒrs ʕndmaː wsˤlt ʔilaː aːlmdrsa rd͡ʒː qbl aːlftħ rd͡ʒaːʔan ʔilaː rbk jwmʔið aːlmstqr ʔaraːd twm sjaːraan aːqtsˤaːdja ʔaazifati aːlʔaːzifaau hðh aːltˤaːwla msˤnwʕa mn aːlχʃb qaaːla baʕdˤu maaːlin wabanijna waħaqːuhu ʃukru aːlnːiʕmaai fahal ʕasajtum ʔiin tawalːajtum ʔaan tufsiduwaː fij aːlʔaardˤi watuqatˤːiʕuwaː ʔaarħaaːmakum twqft aːlsaːʕa aːnh jʕjʃ fj tfaːħa fij raqːin mːanʃuwrin laː jabsutˤu aːlrːizqa liman jaʃaaːʔu wajaqdiru walakinːa ʔaakθara aːlnːaaːsi laaː jaʕlamuwna jaaː ʔaahla aːlʃːaaːmi aːsmaʕuwaː qawla ʔaaχin naaːsˤiħin ʔajn zwaːrq aːlnd͡ʒaːa  limiθli haðaaː faljaʕmali aːlʕaaːmiluwna wlaː jwθq wθaːqh ʔaħd jaː qwm laː ʔasʔalkm ʕljh ʔad͡ʒraː ʔin ʔad͡ʒrj ʔilaː ʕlaː aːlðj ftˤrnj ʔaflaː tʕqlwn sʔakns ʁrftj ʔanta tufkiːru kθjraːan ʔajdˤaːan aːlʕilmu ʕisˤmaau aːlmuluwki kaːn twm mnhkaː wakulːu ðalika ħaθːun minhu sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ʕalaaː aːlʔaulfaai wakafːun ʕan aːlfurqaai wʕnd ndaːk nlbj ʔad͡ʒl ʔiðaː rd͡ʒt aːlʔardˤ rd͡ʒaː laː ʔaħb aːllʕb mʕh nħn nfʕl daːʔimaːan aːlʔaʃjaːʔ ðaːthaː d͡ʒʕl aːldˤbaːb aːlkθjf rʔuja aːltˤrjq ʔamraː sˤʕbaː θumːa naðˤara knt ʔaʁaːdr aːlmtˤʕm ʕndmaː wsˤl ʔasˤdqaːʔij hl bʔimkaːnk ħml hðh aːlʕlba ʔamdrːs ʔant ʔam tˤaːlb twd͡ʒd st d͡ʒml baːlmʁwlja fj ttwjbaː ħaːljaː ʔinj ʔatmʃaː mʕhaː bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm sbħ aːsm rbk aːlʔaʕlaː mrħbaːan d͡ʒmjʕaːan lm jtmkn mn aːltħkm fj ʁdˤbh falawlaaː ʔiin kuntum ʁajra madijnijna ʔin tʕðbhm fʔinhm ʕbaːdk wʔin tʁfr lhm fʔink ʔant aːlʕzjz aːlħkjm ln tsˤdːqj maː qaːlth lj faʔaaχrad͡ʒnaaːhum min d͡ʒanːaaːtin waʕujuwnin waqaaːla muwarːiqun aːlʕid͡ʒlijːu wamaaː min ʁaaːʔiibaain fij aːlsːamaaːʔi waaːlʔaardˤi ʔiilːaaː fij kitaaːbin mubijnin bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm aːlqaːrʕa ʔin aːllh lʕn aːlkaːfrjn wʔaʕd lhm sʕjraː juʔufaku ʕanhu man ʔaufika swf jkwn fj aːlbjt ʁdaːan waaːðkur fij aːlkitaaːbi muwsaaː ʔiinːahu kaaːna muχlasˤanaː wakaaːna rasuwlanaː nabijːanaː walaqad ʕalimnaaː aːlmustaqdimijna minkum walaqad ʕalimnaaː aːlmustaʔaχirijna bihi  waʔiinːamaaː juwakːalu biaːlʔaadnaaː waʔiin d͡ʒalːa maaː jamdˤij ʔaʃʕl saːmj aːlnːaːr fj d͡ʒθːa ljlaː waːðkr aːsm rbk bkra wʔasˤjlaː qaːl rb ʔanaː jkwn lj ʁlaːm wkaːnt aːmrʔatj ʕaːqraː wqd blʁt mn aːlkbr ʕtjaː rabːika lakaaːna lizaaːmanaː waʔaad͡ʒalun musamːanaː faaːdʕuwaː aːllːaha muχlisˤijna lahu aːldːijna walaw kariha aːlkaaːfiruwna ʔiinːaaː ʔaarsalnaaːka ʃaaːhidanaː wamubaʃːiranaː wanaðijranaː tm tʁjjr aːltdχjn mʔuχraː maːðaː   aːlwʕd sħaːb waːlʔind͡ʒaːz mtˤrh lm jʕtˤwaː ʃjʔiaːan waʔaːχiruhaaː fanaaːʔun hl ʔaqlʕ maːjk ʕn aːlʃrb  walam jaqum biħaqːihaaː wawaaːd͡ʒibihaaː mn fdˤlik ʔaχbrjnj kjf ʔakwn rabːahu warafaʕnaaːhu makaaːnanaː ʕalijːanaː tʕd͡ʒbnj aːlʃms ʔin aːsmk d͡ʒmjl ʔarjd ʔan ʔaqrʔa ʃjʔiaːan maː laː jwd͡ʒd ʔaml lw knt bsˤħa d͡ʒjda lknt sʕjdaː wmaː ʔahlknaː mn qrja ʔilaː wlhaː ktaːb mʕlwm wamaaː ʕalaaː aːlːaðijna jatːaquwna min ħisaaːbihim min ʃajʔin walakin ðikraaː laʕalːahum jatːaquwna ʔaːχiðijna maaː ʔaːtaaːhum rabːuhum ʔiinːahum kaaːnuwaː qabla ðalika muħsinijna laː jʃtrj ʔilaː maː jħtaːd͡ʒ ʔiljh ʔanta trjd aːltˤlaːq, ʔaljs kðlk laː ʃjʔ χaːrq llʕaːda ħdθ ʔaθnaːʔ sfrnaː maaː maaːluk  qaaːla mrħbaːan ʔiðaː lm ʔakun muχtˤiʔiaːan, ʔanta d͡ʒaːrnaː aːld͡ʒdjd aːljs kðlk ʕd͡ʒl sʔarjkm ʔaːjaːtj flaː tstʕd͡ʒlwn aːjn klbk  laː ʃk ʔan twm kaːn ldjh wqt kaːf ljnd͡ʒz aːlʕml mn hw ħjwaːnk aːlmfdˤl  jðˤhr ʔan aːltˤqs jtħsn ʃraːʔuh ʁaːl baːlnsba lj mn tmk lbaːb aːlsmaːʔ wlqd aːlnaːsˤra jmkn ʔan jkwn ʃjʔ sˤaːlħ  laː jmknnj ʃrħhu ʔakθr dʕjnaː nðhb lnraː ʔin kaːn twm jsttˤjʕ ʔan jsaːʕdnaː kl aːlħjwaːnaːt mtsaːwja  lkn bʕdˤhaː mtsaːwin ʔakθr mn ʁjrhaː lqd fʕlt ðlk lʔad͡ʒlhaː wtsjr aːld͡ʒbaːl sjraː ʔanaː ʔaqrʔau ðlika aːlkitaːba aːlʔaːn jafqahuwaː qawlij bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi laaː ʔauqsimu bihaðaaː aːlbaladi waqaaːla jazijdu bnu aːlħakami aːlθːaqafijːu ʕlmt bðlk mnð aːlbdaːja hðaː aːllħm d͡ʒjd saːmj trk aːlʔatˤfaːl fj aːlbjt hj tħb aːlħjwaːnaːt ðhb ʔabj ʔilaː aːlsˤjn hl tʕaːnj mn aːlʔaktʔiaːb fd͡ʒʔaa aːnhaːr aːlmbnaː hl tðˤn nfsk qaːdraːan aːlbjt aːlʔaːn ʔant fj ʔawrwbaː ʔarslh mʕnaː ʁdaː jrtʕ wjlʕb wʔinaː lh lħaːfðˤwn wʕnbaː wqdˤbaː ftlqaː ʔaːdm mn rbh klmaːt ftaːb ʕljh ʔinh hw aːltwaːb aːlrħjm ʔawlaː jʕlmwn ʔan aːllh jʕlm maː jsrwn wmaː jʕlnwn ʔiinːa haʔuulaaːʔi lajaquwluwna salaaːmun ʕalaaː muwsaaː wahaaːruwna mn jdˤll aːllh flaː haːdj lh wjðrhm fj tˤʁjaːnhm jʕmhwn ʔinʃaːʔ mwqʕ ʔilktrwnj bdwn ʔaj tklfa  hnaːk qtˤtˤ fj aːlmrjχ ʔajdˤanaː hw nd͡ʒħa fj aːltslːq ʕlaː aːld͡ʒbl wlmaː blʁ ʔaʃdh waːstwaː ʔaːtjnaːh ħkmaː wʕlmaː wkðlk nd͡ʒzj aːlmħsnjn haðaaː min ʔaaħkami ʃaʕrin qaraʔath tbjn ʔanaː aːlrd͡ʒl mħqq χaːsˤ qad raʔaːnij hl ʔanti ħzjna aːmʃi waraaːʔa aːlʔaasadi walaaː tamʃi waraaːʔa aːlmarʔaaai duʕjtu ʔilaː ʕrshmaː ʔanaː ʔatttˤlʕ llʕml mʕk aːʃdd bh ʔazrj mn tlk aːlftaːa aːlltˤjfa  ʔaj qaːmws tʕnjh  ʔaatafraħu biaːlmawti  faqaaːla aːnðˤr ħjθ aːaːʃr lqd kaːn fj jwsf wʔiχwth ʔaːjaːt llsaːʔiljn fj ʔaj fndq ʔant mqjm ʔilʁj tˤlbnaː mn fdˤlk ʔataːnaː zwːaːrun ʁjru mtwqʕjn hl tʕaːnj mn aːlm aːlaːsnaːn ʔin hʔulaːʔ lʃrðma bmfrdj hðaː rd͡ʒl  ðlk aːmrʔaa ʔarjd mnk ʔan tθq bj waːld͡ʒbaːl ʔarsaːhaː hl jmknk ʔan ttwaːsˤl mʕhu ldj ʔalm fj qdmj ʔaʕtqd ʔanh mn aːlmhm ʔan nfj bwʕdnaː kaːn dwrj kj ʔanðˤf aːlmskn lmaːðaː tkrh aːbntk aːlħlwaː  fʔin ʔaʕrdˤwaː fql ʔanðrtkm sˤaːʕqa mθl sˤaːʕqa ʕaːd wθmwd fj hðaː aːlbld  laː jzaːl hnaːk ʔanaːs jmʃwn bdwn ʔaħðja bħrh brːh drːa aːlʃrqjn aːmlʔa hðh aːlaːstmaːra mn fdˤlk swf ndˤjʕ  ʔaljs kðlk  waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi man ðakara aːlmanijːaaa nasija aːlʔaumnijːaaa wmkrwaː wmkr aːllh waːllh χjr aːlmaːkrjn ʔiðhb waːʁsl ʔasnaːnk wʔatˤjʕwaː aːllh waːlrswl lʕlkm trħmwn aːlmrʔaa fj aːlʁrfh rʔajt twm hnaː saːbqaː dʕwnaː nsˤnʕ td͡ʒaːra ʔin maː twʕdwn lʔaːt wmaː ʔantm bmʕd͡ʒzjn ʔaʕlm bʔank laː tsˤdqnj ʔanaː laː ʔauħsn aːlfrnsja lmaːðaː laː trjdaːn ʔan tχbraːnaː baːlħqjqa  twm hw ʔism qtˤj aːlʔaswd qaaːluwaː wahum fijhaaː jaχtasˤimuwna ʁaːdrwaː aːlmnzl ʔiðaaː buwjiʕa ʔaamijraaːni faaːqtuluwaː ʔaaħadahumaaː ʔanaː msˤrj twm ʕjn maːrj llqjaːm bhðh aːlmhma jʕtˤjhaː kl maː ttˤlbh mnh ʔanaː d͡ʒaːd waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi aːld͡ʒuwdu ħaaːrisu aːlʔaaʕraaːdˤi kaðːabuwaː biʔaːjaaːtinaaː kulːihaaː faʔaaχaðnaaːhum ʔaaχða ʕazijzin mːuqtadirin ʔiðaː qmt btʁjjr aːlχtˤa fjd͡ʒb ʕljk ʔan tblʁ ʔaʕdˤaːʔ aːlfrjq bhðh aːltʁjjraːt ʔamlk sjaːraan frjqnaː lkra aːlmdˤrb qwj d͡ʒdaː liʔaanːa martabaaa aːlʕilmi qabla martabaai aːlqawli hðh aːld͡ʒzr qd rʕtnaː waʔaan lajsa lilʔiinsaaːni ʔiilːaaː maaː saʕaaː ʔant tbðr aːlmaːʔ bħθt fj aːlmnzl klh ʕn tlk aːlrsaːla θmːa aːlʕdjd mn aːlklmaːt aːltj laː ʔafhmhaː twm ʔaqnʕ bshwla maːrj ʔanhu kaːn brjʔiaːan nħn ʔaχðnaːh ʔilj aːlmstʃfj fχrd͡ʒ aːlʔibraːhjmja twqf ʕn dˤrbj faaːsˤfaħ aːlsˤːafħa aːld͡ʒamijla qaaːla aːltmrjn jsˤnʕ aːlʔitqaːn waman naðˤara ʔilajhaaː ʔaaʕmathu faʔiinːa aːlmusaaːmaħaaa waaːliaːstisˤlaaːħa ʔiðaaː aːd͡ʒtamaʕaaː lam wsltˤaːn mbjn hl bʔimkaːnk ʔan tʕtˤjhaː hðaː aːlkrsj  wltʕlmn nbʔah bʕd ħjn ldjnaː mʃkla liaːstiqraaːri aːlʃːarʕi ʕalaaː suquwtˤi maaː daχala taħta aːlʕad͡ʒzi ʔaʃʕlnaː aːlʃmwʕ laː tlms hðh aːlʔaʃjaːʔ twm ljs mʔuhlaːan ltdrjs aːlmdrsa aːlθaːnwja wlaː sˤdjq ħmjm ʔatðkr kl maː tqwlh lj qaːl fbʕztk lʔaʁwjnhm ʔad͡ʒmʕjn tʕaːnj aːlħjwaːnaːt mθl aːlbʃr aːlːaðij χalaqaka fasawːaaːka faʕadalaka ʔaaħaduhumaaː min ðaaːtihi falaaː jantahij bihi aːlʔaamalu ʔilaaː ʁaaːjaain md͡ʒddaːan waːldnaː jðhb aːlj aːlʕml baːlsjaːra ʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlkafaraau aːlfad͡ʒaraau ʕaːld͡ʒ hðaː aːldwaːʔ aːlbrd aːlðj ʔasˤaːbnj aːsmj mħðwfun mn aːlqaːʔima ʔaaqilːuwaː min aːlðːunuwbi faʔiinːa ħasanaaːtikum qalijlaaun sʔabʕθ lk sˤwtj msd͡ʒlaː fj ʃrjtˤ rʔuja aːldm d͡ʒʕlhaː tnfʕl ʔaʕtˤnj ʔid͡ʒaːbaan ʔakjdaan fʔaːmnwaː fmtʕnaːhm ʔilaː ħjn aːbq mkaːnk ʕaːlm aːlʁjb waːlʃhaːda aːlʕzjz aːlħkjm maːðaː knti stfʕljna lw kunti ʔasˤʁr bʕʃr snjn ʔant wħdk ʔamlj mnzlk raːʔiʕ hl ʔanbʔikm ʕlaː mn tnzl aːlʃjaːtˤjn lqd ʔaχaːfnj hðaː ttħwl aːlʃraːʁjf ʔilaː dˤfaːdʕ ʔanaː ʔaðhb ʔilaː aːlmsrħ ʔaʕtðr ʕn maː sbbth lk mn mtaːʕb swf ʔaʕwd laːħqaː nafdijka biaːlʔaarwaaːħi jaaː watˤan tanzijlu aːlkitaaːbi laaː rajba fijhi min mnːaːd aːlmnzl aːlsˤwra mʕlqa ʕlaː aːlħaːʔitˤ ʔamdkm bʔanʕaːm wbnjn aːllːahu laaː ʔiilaha ʔiilːaaː huwa rabːu aːlʕarʃi aːlʕaðˤijmi ʔajn nðhb bʕd ðlk hlːaː ʔaʁlqt aːlbaːb  " ħsnanaː " jmknk ʔan tqrʔa hðaː aːlktaːb ʔaraːd bwb ʔan jħtfðˤ baːlθʕlb fj aːlmnzl fakajfa jurd͡ʒaaː minhu mawadːaau ʁajrihi hðaː ljs χtˤʔij  bl χtˤʔukm ʕnd kl aːlnaːs mnaːʕaun mn aːld͡ʒdrj aːljwm rtbt aːlχaːdma srjrj ʕlaː hðh aːld͡ʒzr qd wldnaː wamansuwbun ʔilajhi ʔaafaaːʕijlu man sˤaaːħaba fʔand͡ʒjnaːh wʔahlh ʔilaː aːmrʔath qdrnaːhaː mn aːlʁaːbrjn mtaː wsˤlt ʔilaː mtˤaːr naːrjtaː  ʔin klaːmj kaːlmrʔaːa fʔiðaː qrʔahu ħmaːrun flaː ttwqʕ ʔan jraː wd͡ʒh mlaːk ʔawd aːlʕml fj bwstn tlk aːlraːja aːltj klftnaː aːlʁaːlj waːlnfjs twm srq kl aːlmaːl mn waːldjh hðaː ljs ʔamraːan mdˤħkaːan ʔaj nwʕ mn aːlχbz trjdwn ʔan tʔaklwaː aːlqmjsˤ wsχ ħdˤr aːld͡ʒmjʕ ʔilaː aːlsˤf fj aːlwqt aːlmħdd hl tfdˤl ʔan tkwn bdjn wqbjħ ʔaw ʔan tkwn nħjf wmθjr  ʃaːrka fj aːlʔalʕaːb aːlʔawlmbja lst mʃʁwla ʔarjd aːlðhaːb ʔilaː ʔijtˤaːljaː ʔarjd ʔan ʔasaːfr ħwl aːlʕaːlm hj trjd ʔan tkwn mtˤrba lqd lwjt kaːħlj aːld͡ʒw ħaːr d͡ʒdaː maː wdʕk rbk wmaː qlaː laː zlnaː nʔaml sʔaʕwd fj χlaːl saːʕa ʃkraː lk ʕlaː kl ʃjʔ lħm ʔaw smk lmaːð hrb ʔaχltˤ hðaː aːlmħwq fj fnd͡ʒaːn mn maːʔ hðaː jʔulm hðaː lsˤdjq lj sjaːraːt aːlsbaːq srjʕa ʔilaː ʔabʕd aːlħdwd kalːaaː ʔiinːa kitaaːba aːlfud͡ʒːaaːri lafij sid͡ʒːijnin hl jmknki tʕljmj aːlʔind͡ʒljzja aːlrʕda mrħbaːan, twm sˤbaːħ aːlχjr tˤlb aːlsfjr aːlbrjtˤaːnj lqaːʔ mbaːʃraː mʕ aːlrʔijs faʔaatˤraqt mufakːiranaː ʔaawlaaː laka faʔaawlaaː ʔaːχðjn maː ʔaːtaːhm rbhm ʔinhm kaːnwaː qbl ðlk mħsnjn jd͡ʒb ʔan nqrʔa hðaː aːlktaːb tkraːraː w mraːraː kðbwaː bʔaːjaːtnaː klhaː fʔaχðnaːhm ʔaχð ʕzjz mqtdr ln jsjʔ lkmaː ʔaħd aːlʔaamnu ʔaahnaʔau ʕajʃin aːntðˤrj lħðˤa ʔilaː ʔajn tðˤnːjn nfski ðaːhbaan aːχtbʔa twm wraːʔ ʔamːh ʕndmaː qlt lh "ʔahlaː" ʔajmknk ʔan tkrrh mra ʔaχraː  hw md͡ʒnwn bʃʔan krh aːlqdm hl ttħdθ aːlʔijtˤaːlja  hðh ʔamwr mhma χrd͡ʒt mn ʁrfthaː msrʕa fjhmaː faːkha wnχl wrmaːn ʔaalaːːa taziru waaːziraaun wizra ʔauχraaː wud͡ʒuwhun jawmaʔiiðin musfiraaun qud bħðr aːfʕlh kmaː jqwl lk tlqj aːlʃd͡ʒra bðˤlaːlhaː ʕlaː aːlħaːʔitˤ walaqad mananːaaː ʕalaaː muwsaaː wahaaːruwna hl jwd͡ʒd ʃjʔ juzʕid͡ʒak  sʔaħdˤr bʕdˤ aːlnðˤaːraːt ħsb ʕlmj  lm ttrd͡ʒm aːlrwaːja ʔilaː aːljaːbaːnja ʔausˤjb fj aːlmʕrka kaːnt aːldnjaː mðˤlmaan ħjn wsˤlt ʔilaː mnzlj ljla ʔams hj laː trjd mnj aːltħdθ ʕn hðh aːlmsʔala hðh aːld͡ʒmla tsˤf baːltħdjd mʃaːʕr aːlkaːtb wlw ʃʔinaː lbʕθnaː fj kl qrja nðjraː rwaːh aːlʃjχaːn hl jʕlm ʔajn aːχtbʔat tlk aːlqtˤtˤ twm jħb aːlfn aːlħdjθ laː jd͡ʒb ʔan tχrd͡ʒ fj aːlljl ʔaʁsl aːlmlaːbs jwm aːlʔaħd ʕalajk bikulːi nawʕin min aːlʕilmi faχuð minhu aːlħrwb laː tbdʔa hkðaː kmaː jbdʔa aːlʃtaːʔ  bl aːlnaːs hm mn jbdʔawn aːlħrwb fmaː mnkm mn ʔaħd ʕnh ħaːd͡ʒzjn hðh aːld͡ʒmla aːljdjʃja tuktab baːlʔabd͡ʒdjːa aːlʕbrjːa maːrj qd fqdt aːlkθjr mn aːlwzn ʔaljs kðlk aːlsjaːraːt swf tʔatj waːħda tlw aːlʔauχraː wqaːlwaː aːlħmd llh aːlðj ʔaðhb ʕnaː aːlħzn ʔin rbnaː lʁfwr ʃkwr falaaː wasalːama qaaːla ʕaaːmilaaun naaːsˤibaaun swf aːlʕb kra aːltns ʁdaː haː hðaː aːlmaːʔ sˤaːlħ llʃrb hl ʔabwhaː tˤbjb  waħifðˤi aːlʔaawzaaːni min aːlsˤːadaaː ħifðˤa aːlʕaqli min aːlhawaaː ʔiinaːmaaː ʔaabwaaːbanaː liʔaanːa aːltˤːuʁjaaːna markuwzun fij tˤabʕihi ʔiðaaː aːstaʁnaaː ʔaχjraːan  wd͡ʒdt wðˤjfa bdʔa saːmj jʃkː ʔanː ljlaː kaːnt twaːʕd rd͡ʒaːlaː ʔaːχrjn laː tʔatj aːlmsˤaːʔib furaaːdaaː ʕasaaː ʔaan jakuwna baʁijdˤak jawmanaː maaː faʔaumːuhu haaːwijaaun ljs hnaːk ħaːd͡ʒa llaːstʕd͡ʒaːl ldjnaː mtsʕ mn aːlwqt maː ʔazaːl ʔaftqd twm hl tʔaðn lj baːldχwl  " nʕm  baːltˤbʕ " rʔajth jχrd͡ʒ hl ʔanta bχjr aːlʔaːn  kaːnt ljlaː td͡ʒaːls aːlsˤːbjaːn aːlhdf mnhaː ʔinʃaːʔ nmwðd͡ʒ ðkaːʔ aːsˤtˤnaːʕj hl ʔantj maːrj hj tħtaːd͡ʒh ʔakθr mmːaː jħtaːd͡ʒhaː wʔanbtnaː ʕljh ʃd͡ʒra mn jqtˤjn aːlsrjr aːlðj d͡ʒlst ʕljh ltwk hw srjr d͡ʒdtj qul ʔaaʕuwðu birabːi aːlfalaqi ʔanaː mslm ʔanaː maːzlt ʔaħaːwl aːn ʔaʕzf ʕlaː aːld͡ʒjtaːr mθl ʔirjk klaːbtwn qurʔaːnanaː ʕarabijːanaː ʁajra ðij ʕiwad͡ʒin laʕalːahum
