bʔadnbra waqaaːla baʕdˤu ħukamaaːʔi aːlfursi hum darad͡ʒaaːtun ʕinda aːllːahi waaːllːahu basˤijrun bimaaː jaʕmaluwna walajsa huwa min ʔaaqsaaːmi maaː juʃkilu ʕalaaː man tasˤawːarahu laː ʔaħd jʕbr nhraː dwn ʔan jbtl fʔaχð aːlqaːdˤj jdh wʔamsk bjd d͡ʒħaː wnd͡ʒaː aːlðˤlm ðˤlmaːt jwm aːlqjaːma waʕalaaː ʔaːχara man ʔaamːala aːlbaqaaːʔa waqad raʔaaaː masˤaaːriʕanaaː fahuwa maʁruwrun ʔaħb qtˤk sjkwn ʁrjbanaː ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ aːltħdθ mʕk ʕn ʔamr tˤaːrʔi laaː sijːamaaː ʔiðaaː qalːa kl maː ʔaʕrfh hw ʔanh mn aːlsˤjn maːðaː fʕlti  qaːl zjd: hðaː nhaːr d͡ʒmjl ʔaħb hðaː aːlktaːb ʔakθr mn ʁjrh hnaː ntklm baːlʔisbaːnja ʔaːtt ʕndj ftaːa tʕrf km hj d͡ʒmjla ʕljnaː ʔan nʔad͡ʒl aːlqraːr aːlnhaːʔij ħtaː aːlʔasbwʕ aːlqaːdm laː jħb d͡ʒim aːltfaːħ  ʔaljs kðlk  hj laː tʕlm ʔajn tbħθ ʕnh ðhbt lʔatmʃaː fj aːlmtnzh hl ʕndk mwqʕ  juqaːl ʔanh bʔimkaːn aːlsrχs ʔan juzhr ʔanaː ʔaʕrf ʕnwaːnhaː mtaːʕ qljl wlhm ʕðaːb ʔaljm ʔabj jħb aːlbjtzaː hl tðkr aːlljla aːltj tqaːblnaː fjhaː ʔawl mra  km hdjaan ttwqʕ ʔanhaː aːstlmt fj aːlʔid͡ʒaːza aːlmaːdˤja  kaːn brws ʁdˤbaːnanaː ħjn trkth χljlth  lknh srʕaːn maː nsj aːlʔamr ʔinmaː jstd͡ʒjb aːlðjn jsmʕwn waːlmwtaː jbʕθhm aːllh θm ʔiljh jrd͡ʒʕwn ʕalaaː sururin mawdˤuwnaain ldjnaː hr ʔabjdˤ ʔanaː ʔaʃrb aːlkħwl kθjraː ʔausˤjb bd͡ʒrwħ fj aːlmʕrka kaːn ðlk mnð ʕda snjn ʔaj qaːmws tʕnjh waʔaalqat maaː fijhaaː wataχalːat ʔanaː nðˤrt fj ʔaʕjun twm wʔaχbrtau aːlħqjqa qaaːluwaː laaː dˤajra ʔiinːaaː ʔiilaaː rabːinaaː munqalibuwna ʔaqlʕt aːltˤaːʔira fj aːlsaːʕa aːlʕaːʃra baːldˤbtˤ jwm aːlʔaħd hw ʔawl jwm fj aːlʔasbwʕ ʔiilaːːa aːlmusˤalːijna ʔantan ʕljka fqtˤ ʔan tʕdunj bʃjʔ waːħd wlw ʔanhm sˤbrwaː ħtaː tχrd͡ʒ ʔiljhm lkaːn χjraː lhm waːllh ʁfwr rħjm ʔinsaːn mn ðlk aːlnwʕ sjfʃl baːltʔakjd ʕlj ʔan ʔatʕwd ʕljh qsmaː baːlnaːzlaːt aːlmaːħqaːt ħnaːn jwm laː jʁnj mwlaː ʕn mwlaː ʃjʔiaː wlaː hm jnsˤrwn waqaaːla aːbnu aːlmuqafːaʕi sˤaħiħ aːlʔaχtˤaːʔ, ʔiðaː kaːn hnaːk ʔaj mnhaː km sʕr hðaː aːlfstaːn  ʔaχj mdrs laː ʔaʕrf maːðaː ʔaqwl lʔad͡ʒʕlk tʃʕr bʃʕwr ʔafdˤl ʔiinːa aːlmud͡ʒrimijna fij ʕaðaaːbi d͡ʒahanːama χaaːliduwna qaːlwaː bl ʔantm laː mrħbaː bkm ʔantm qdmtmwh lnaː fbʔis aːlqraːr aːlmʕðra  laː ʔarjd aːltħdθ ʕn aːlmwdˤwʕ ʃrbt aːlmaːʔ wqaːlwaː rbnaː ʕd͡ʒl lnaː qtˤnaː qbl jwm aːlħsaːb ldjhm θlaːθa qtˤtˤ ljswaː bħaːd͡ʒa lqtˤ ʔaːχr kfː ʕn aːltsˤfjq ʔanaː lstu ðaːhbaːan bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm js ʔinh laː jħbnaː knaː ntħdθ ʕnk qbl qljl waχalaqa aːllːahu aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waaːlʔaardˤa biaːlħaqːi walitud͡ʒzaaː kulːu nafsin bimaaː kasabat wahum laaː juðˤlamuwna ʔinhaː tʕml bd͡ʒd laː, lm ʔaktbhu bʕd wʔinj klmaː dʕwthm ltʁfr lhm d͡ʒʕlwaː ʔasˤaːbʕhm fj ʔaːðaːnhm waːstʁʃwaː θjaːbhm wʔasˤrwaː waːstkbrwaː aːstkbaːraː lm ʔaʕlm bhðaː aːlħdθ ħtaː aːlbaːrħa mustawd͡ʒibanaː litˤaaːʕatihim wamunaaːsˤaħatihim tχrd͡ʒ hðh aːlsna waʔiinːa lakum maʕaaːlima faaːntahuwaː ʔilaaː maʕaaːlimikum tanzijlu aːlkitaaːbi mina aːllːahi aːlʕazijzi aːlʕalijmi dʕnj ʔaðhb wħdj laː tqlq bʃʔan ntaːʔid͡ʒ ʔimtħaːnk aːd͡ʒlb bʕdˤ aːlmaːʔ ltwm waʔaantum ħijnaʔiiðin tanðˤuruwna walam nastad͡ʒiz aːlʔiiχlaaːla biðikrihi waʔaamːaaː aːlbirːu fmn aːbtʁaː wraːʔ ðlk fʔawlʔik hm aːlʕaːdwn lm jfrn ʔinh qwj kaːlħsˤaːn mn aːlðj rbħ wataħrijfu ðawij aːlʔaːraaːʔi ʔinhu jtħdθ ʕlaː aːlhaːtf wdˤʕ aːlflkjwn aːlqdmaːʔ ʔassaː llʕlm aːlħdjθ waʔiinːa lahu ʕindanaaː lazulfaaː waħusna maʔaːbin aːnaː aːʃʕr baːlmll fj ʔaj wqt jʔatj saːʕj aːlbrjd  faaːsd͡ʒuduwaː lilːahi waaːʕbuduwaː jwm tʃhd ʕljhm ʔalsnthm wʔajdjhm wʔard͡ʒlhm bmaː kaːnwaː jʕmlwn ʔaad͡ʒidu ðalika muzʕid͡ʒaːan ln jwðˤfkn ʔaħd ðlk d͡ʒzjnaːhm bmaː kfrwaː whl nd͡ʒaːzj ʔilaː aːlkfwr aːnhaː ljst kaːfjh wllmtˤlqaːt mtaːʕ baːlmʕrwf ħqaː ʕlaː aːlmtqjn hl tsttˤjʕ ʔan tħtml ʔan jʕaːmlk ʔaħd hkðaː  ʕn aːbni ʕumara radˤij aːllhu ʕanhumaː ʔanːa rswla aːllhi sˤalːaaː aːllhu ʕalajhi wasalːama qaːla: jd͡ʒb ʔan ʔasaːʕdau tilka aːldːaaːru aːlʔaːχiraau nad͡ʒʕaluhaaː lilːaðijna laaː jurijduwna ʕuluwːanaː fij aːlʔaardˤi walaaː fasaaːdanaː waaːlʕaaːqibaau lilmutːaqijna traːd͡ʒʕ mnːaːd hðh draːd͡ʒtj ʔinh ðkj sʔaħdˤr lk qljlaː mn aːlmaːʔ jtħdθ ʔaʁlb aːlnaːs hnaː aːlfrnsja sʔalt sˤaːħba aːlmħl: " wlkn  ʔalaː tðˤnhaː kbjra qljlanaː  " hl maːzlti trjdjn ʃaːjaːan     aːlrħla  ʔiinːa aːlmud͡ʒrimijna fij dˤalaaːlin wasuʕurin jastafizːahu aːlbaaːtˤilu faman θaqulat mawaaːzijnuhu faʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlmufliħuwna fʔand͡ʒjnaːh wʔahlh ʔilaː aːmrʔath kaːnt mn aːlʁaːbrjn ʔaw tqwl ħjn traː aːlʕðaːb lw ʔan lj kra fʔakwn mn waaːlmuraaːʔiija bihi maħquwrun laaː jartafiʕu wasalaaːmun ʕalaaː aːlmursalijna maaː ʔaanzalnaaː ʕalajka aːlqurʔaːna litaʃqaaː hjaː bnaː lnskr bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ʕm jtsaːʔlwn nħn ʔaswd aːlʁaːb mkswr aːlχaːtˤr hl jtħdθ ʔaħdun aːlʔind͡ʒljzja  qaaːla haðaaː sˤiraaːtˤun ʕalajːa mustaqijmun mtaː ʔaqflt hðh aːlbaːb ʔaːχr mra  fnzl mn ħmjm lqd mdˤt θlaːθa snwaːt mnð wfaːth hðaː aːlktaːb ljs baʕdˤu ʕulamaaːʔi aːlsːalafi θumːa ʔiinːakum jawma aːlqijaaːmaai tubʕaθuwna kjjf hj ʕaːsˤma aːwkraːnjaː ʔanaː sʕjda ʔaħdˤr aːltˤʕaːm ʔiinːamaaː tuwʕaduwna lasˤaaːdiqun fʔinhm jwmʔið fj aːlʕðaːb td͡ʒʔarwaː aːljwm ʔinkm mnaː laː tnsˤrwn man ʁafara zalalij laːbθjn fjhaː ʔaħqaːbaː twm jfkr fj nfsh fqtˤ qaːlwaː tzwːad͡ʒ qltu: jaː ʔasˤħaːbj ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː tʁjjr aːlmlaːbs rʔasj swf janfad͡ʒir fðkr ʔinmaː ʔant mðkr wahuwa biaːlħamdi ʔaad͡ʒdaru wabiaːlθːanaaːʔi ʔaaħaqːu wlqd ftnaː sljmaːn wʔalqjnaː ʕlaː krsjh d͡ʒsdaː θm ʔanaːb θumːa maaː ʔaadraaːka maaː jawmu aːldːijni laː ʔasˤdq maː ʔaraːh ħatːaaː kaʔaanːahu qad ʔaahmala ʔanaː mslm aːnh jʕlmnaː aːllʁa aːlfrnsja waqad qaaːlat aːlħukamaaːʔu rnː aːlhaːtf lkn lm jd͡ʒb ʔaħd ʔanaː ʔaʁnj bʔimkaːnj qraːʔthaː klhaː kjf nimti aːlljla aːlmaːdˤja zjd mħaːsbanaː fj aːlʃrka faʔaamːaaː aːlmund͡ʒijaaːtu laː jd͡ʒb ʕlj ʔan ʔaːtj hnaː haː qd ʔataː aːlbaːsˤ ʔanaː ʔadrs aːlrjaːdˤjaːt jd͡ʒb ʔan ʔasaːʕdhaː d͡ʒnd maː hnaːlk mhzwm mn aːlʔaħzaːb aːlklaːb nbħt aːlljl klh lm juħl ʔabdaː lʁz wfaːthaː liʔaanːa aːltːamalːuqa lilʕaaːlimi juðˤhiru maknuwna ʕamalihi ʔilajhaaː biramzin mustaħlin walafðˤin mustaʁrabin ħjθ hnaːk ʔiraːda - hnaːk tˤrjqa jmkn aːstχdaːmh kskjn maːðaː tqwl aːlʔimrʔaa  waqijla liʕijsaaː aːbni marjama ʕalajhimaaː aːlsːalaaːmu waħukija ʔaanːa aːlʔiiskandara qaaːla liħukamaaːʔi aːlhindi waːðkr fj aːlktaːb ʔibraːhjm ʔinh kaːn sˤdjqaː nbjaː aːlħdjθ aːlsaːbʕ ʕʃr: aːlrfq baːlħjwaːn ʔiinːahaaː ʕalajhim mːuʔusˤadaaun mʃaːhda aːlsbaːq mmtʕa waaːʕlam ʔaanːa maaː lak ʕinda aːllːahi miθlu maaː lilːahi ʕindak walataʕlamunːa nabaʔaahu baʕda ħijnin ʔið qaːl lhm ʃʕjb ʔalaː ttqwn aːlrad͡ʒul aːlʃaːb aːlʔaʕmaː tʁlb ʕlaː ʔiʕaːqthu nħn d͡ʒnd aːllh d͡ʒnd aːlwtˤn ʔin dʕaː daːʕj aːlfdaːʔ lm nχn sljmaːn wʔabwh daːwd nbjaːn mn ʕnd aːllh aːltˤaːʔira aːlmqaːtla ʔalqt qnbla hl ʔanta sʕjd  fakaaːna qaaːba qawsajni ʔaaw ʔaadnaaː qaːl ʕmaː qljl ljsˤbħn naːdmjn mtaː tχrːd͡ʒt mn aːlkljːa bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi ħm faʔiinːahu marʕanaː ʔaanijqun ʔaam χalaqnaaː aːlmalaaːʔiikaaa ʔiinaaːθanaː wahum ʃaaːhiduwna fj aːlmra aːlmqbla sʔafʕl ðlk bnfsj kwnaː mtsaːmħaːn ħjaːa aːlflstˤjnjjn mhma kaːn bjth mðˤlmaːan hl ʔanti sʕjda fj mnzlk  aːnaː aːħb aːlaːstmaːʕ aːlaː aːlqraːn aːlkrjm aːlrħmn aːlrħjm waʔiiðaaː aːlsˤːuħufu nuʃirat ʔanaː mʁnja ʔamrjkja lqd tħrk twm ʔintðˤr dqjqa mn fdˤlk aːnthaː aːlʕaːlm aːlbaːrħa bjnmaː knt naːʔimaː aːnt nwr ʕjwnj wtaːd͡ʒ raːsj mn ʔajna tʕrf hðaː  hl ʔanaː sˤdjqtk  saːmj laː jkðb ʔabdaː nʕm, ʔinhaː ʁaːdˤba waːlʕmr bdwnk jχtfj wabasatˤa fijhi aːlrːahbaaa laː ʔaðˤn ʔanhaː stmtˤr bʕd aːlðˤhr sqtˤ twm mn ʕlaː draːd͡ʒth waːdˤħ ʔanh mðnb bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm sˤ waːlqrʔaːn ðj aːlðkr kaːn jsmjnj aːtʃjrw laː tstjqðˤ ʕnd kl nbaːħ klb d͡ʒbha aːltħrjr ʔaʕtˤjnaːk ʕhdaː laː jwd͡ʒd sbb aːlwad͡ʒhi aːlθːaaːnij huwa aːlrːahbaau bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi saʔaala saaːʔiilun biʕaðaaːbin waaːqiʕin hl bʔimkaːnk tslq tlk aːlʃd͡ʒra waaːlħaaːlaau aːlθːaaːliθaau aːʃtqt ʔiljk ħqaː ʔanaː qtˤ  wljs ʕndj aːsm bʕd hðh hj aːld͡ʒmla aːltj laː ʔasttˤjʕ trd͡ʒmthaː mtaː stqlʕ ʕn aːltdχjn  wmaː kaːn lnfs ʔan tʔumn ʔilaː bʔiðn aːllh wjd͡ʒʕl aːlrd͡ʒs ʕlaː aːlðjn laː jʕqlwn lqd χrd͡ʒt fj nzha bilisaaːnin saʔiuwlin waqalbin ʕuquwlin jbdw ʔan aːlʕsˤaːfa hdʔat laː aːðhb ʕlaː aːlmdrsa aːljwm tntd͡ʒ aːld͡ʒzaːʔir aːlmrkbaːt ʔanaː mn ʔamrjkaː tˤwkjw hj ʔiħdaː ʔakbr aːlmdn fj aːlʕaːlm fðrhm fj ʁmrthm ħtaː ħjn ʔinhu jbdw kaːlħlm lqd nd͡ʒħ fj mwaːd͡ʒha aːlχtˤr aːlkbjr ʔant mlaːðj aːlwħjd waqad qaaːlat aːlʕarabu fij ʔaamθaaːlihaaː maːðaː jrjdwn ʔanaː ldj d͡ʒaːr msˤrj ʕnd twm ʕlba ʔarbʕa ltr mn aːlχmr aːlrχjsˤ fj θlaːd͡ʒth ʔadχl djmaː jdh fj d͡ʒjbh  wʔaχrd͡ʒ ħqjbaan dˤχmaan dʕnaː ntqaːsm aːlnfqaːt aːlbjt aːlʔaħmr hw aːlðj bnaːh d͡ʒaːk ʔiinːaaː d͡ʒaʕalnaaːhu qurʔaːnanaː ʕarabijːanaː laʕalːakum taʕqiluwna aːlttˤwraːt aːlħdjθa fj aːltˤb mðhla km ʕmrk wðˤf fj aːlbnk ʔanta tbdw mθl aːlwld bdʔat waːħdaː wjl jwmʔið llmkðbjn lqd aːχtˤʔat bʕnwaːn aːlmqaːla ʕan ʕurwaaa bni aːlzːubajri ql lhaː ʔalaː tbħθ ʕnj jaː lh mn sʔuaːl ʔakjd ʔanaː ʔaħbh maː aːlwqt aːlʔaːn  - " ʔinhaː aːlsaːʕa aːlʕaːʃra " ħjθ ʔanh jtm aːdˤaːfa d͡ʒml d͡ʒdjda jwmjaː jd͡ʒb ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilaː aːlbnk aːljwm nazala bihi aːlrːuwħu aːlʔaamijnu ʔaʕjʃ fj qtˤr sʔaðhb mʕk wamaθalanaː fij aːlʔaːχarijna mhmtk ʔan td͡ʒmʕ aːlʔawraːq aːlmjta fj aːlħdjqa kaːnt ʁrfa kbjra lm jwaːfq saːmj bal d͡ʒahiltu ʔahm ʃjʔ ʔan tkn sˤbwraːan ʔaam χalaquwaː aːlsːamaːwaːti waaːlʔaardˤa bal laː jwqinwna kaːn saːmj hnaː fj aːlʕjaːda hðaː aːlsˤːbaːħ waqaaːluwaː lan tamasːanaaː aːlnːaaːru ʔiilːaaː ʔaajːaaːmanaː maʕduwdaaan ljlaː mraːqba mmrːdˤaːt fj aːlʕjaːda maːðaː lm ʔasmʕk ʔinː maː rʔajth sjtħqːq ħtmaː tħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː ʔan tʕwd ʔilaː aːlmnzl ljs hðaː mhmaːan ʔanaː wtwm hnaː lmsaːʕdtk rbːmaː kaːn mrjdˤaː ʔiinːa rabːaka jaqdˤj bajnahum biħukmihi wahuwa aːlʕazjzu aːlʕaljmu watud͡ʒijbu ʔilaaː sˤalaaːħihaaː ʔaðˤnː ʔan hðaː maː ħdθ ʕndmaː tkwn aːlbdˤaːʕa mrʁwbaː fjhaː fʔin aːlmʃtraː ʔaʕmaː ʃjʔ maː ħdθ muħamːadun lan jataʔaaχːara fij aːlsˤːabaaːħi ʔaχbrnj bnfs aːlʃːjʔ w ʔaχjraːan aːstslm kaːn saːmj χaːʔifaː mn ʔan tdˤħk ʕljh ljlaː dχl aːlmdrːs aːlqlwb ʕnd bʕdˤhaː kaːn ldaː saːmj sˤwt ʁrjb ħqːaː maː lwnh zaːr saːmj aːlmstʃfaː laː tns ʔan tbʕθ aːlrːsaːʔil mn mrkz aːlbrjd ʔamdˤaː saːmj rmdˤaːnh aːlʔawːl fj msˤr ʔard͡ʒːħ ʔanːj sʔansaː ðlk kn lajiːnanaː fj ʁjr dˤʕf wʃdjdaːan fj ʁjr ʕnf man ʔaawʁart sˤadrahu aːstadʕajt ʃarːahu jkrh saːmj aːltːnqːl mn mnzl lʔaːχr liʔaanːa aːlnːaaːsa bimaʕrifatihi jarʃuduwna jawmaʔiiðin tuħadːiθu ʔaaχbaːrahaː aːlsˤdq jħsn baːlftaː waːlkðb jħsb mn ʕjwbh lukm saːmj fj fmh drs saːmj aːlmsrħ wamuʁrisanaː naaːmijanaː ʔatˤwl mn jwm aːlfraːq ʔaam ʔaabramwaː ʔaamranaː faʔiinːaː mubrimwna laː tqlq  ʔanaː hnaː aːlʔaːn litaʃaaːʁulihi ʕanhaaː faʔiinːamaː jasːarnaːhu bilisaːnika laʕalːahum jataðakːarwna ʃχsˤ aːsmh aːjtwh jrjd mqaːbltk laaː taʔaχuð maaː lajsa laka saːmj jntðˤr fj aːlsˤːf zaːr saːmj aːlʕdjd mn aːldːwl aːlʔislaːmjːa jaː lk mn saːfl ʔaħmq qaːl saːmj ʔanː ljlaː kaːn ldjhaː taːrjχ mʕ aːlaːktʔiaːb mtaː tkwn mʃʁwlaːan ʔant daːʔimaː maː tnsaː ʔismj ʔawdː ʔan ʔamdˤj bqjːa ħjaːtj mʕk mdrːs aːlrːjaːdˤjːaːt mðhl bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi saʔaala saːʔiilun biʕaðaːbin waːqiʕin watustadfaʕu makaaːʔiidu aːlʔaaʕdaaːʔi ʔajn jʕjʃ aːlʃːjtˤaːn kaːnaː faːdˤl w daːnja jtχaːsˤmaːn bsˤwt mrtfʕ kaːnaː ljlaː w saːmj jqrʕaːn ʕlaː ʔabwaːb aːlnːaːs lnʃr aːlklaːm aːltˤːjːb walaaː limadˤaaːrːi aːlħumqi nihaaːjaaun ʔanaː laː ʔafhm hðh aːlklma waqad qijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami aːlhamːu qajdu aːlħawaaːsːi qul ʔaafaʁajra aːllːahi taʔamuruwnːij ʔaaʕbudu ʔaajːuhaaː aːld͡ʒaaːhiluwna qaːlwaː ʔinaː ttˤjrnaː bkm lʔin lm tnthwaː lnrd͡ʒmnkm wljmsnkm mnaː ʕðaːb ʔaljm ʃrqnaː qlbh ʔabdaːan lbnaːn aːld͡ʒmjʕ jtħdθ lʁaan waːħdaan kjf ʕlmti ðlk  wmaː jʔumn ʔakθrhm baːllh ʔilaː whm mʃrkwn ljs sjʔiaːan hl nsttˤjʕ ʔan nðhb wlqd ʔarslnaː mn qblk fj ʃjʕ aːlʔawljn lajsa aːlʁabijːu bisajːidin fij qawmihi lakinːa sajːida qawmihi aːlmutaʁaaːbij waqaaːla ʔaabuw aːlʕataaːhijaai qrdˤaː ħsnaː fjdˤaːʕfh lh wlh ʔad͡ʒr krjm aːlχbz d͡ʒaːf waːlmaːʔ baːrd waqaaːruwna wafirʕawna wahaaːmaaːna walaqad d͡ʒaaːʔahum muwsaaː biaːlbajːinaaːti faaːstakbaruwaː fij aːlʔaardˤi wamaaː kaaːnuwaː saaːbiqijna haʔuulaaːʔi zuhːaaːdun aːstʕml hðaː aːlsˤndwq aːlχʃbj kkrsj mn fdˤlk namuwtu wanaħjaaː ʕalaaː ʕahdihaaː ħajaaːaa aːlkiraaːmi wamawta aːlʕiðˤaaːm qaaːla jaaː qawmi lajsa bij dˤalaaːlaaun walakinːij rasuwlun min rabːi aːlʕaaːlamijna wakaðalika ħaqːat kalimatu rabːika ʕalaaː aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː ʔaanːahum ʔaasˤħaaːbu aːlnːaaːri wasˤaaːħibatihi wabanijhi hl tʕrf maː aːðaː kaːn jmkn ʔan jʔatj aːljnaː ʁdaːan  lwlaː jnhaːhm aːlrbaːnjwn waːlʔaħbaːr ʕn qwlhm aːlʔiθm wʔaklhm aːlsħt lbʔis maː kaːnwaː jsˤnʕwn bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm tbt jdaː ʔabj lhb wtb aːlsˤwra tuʁnij ʕn ʔalf klma ʔabj jdˤnjkmaː waːlʔardˤ frʃnaːhaː fnʕm aːlmaːhdwn aːllh jsˤtˤfj mn aːlmlaːʔika rslaː wmn aːlnaːs ʔin aːllh smjʕ bsˤjr hl ʃkrthu, hl qlt ʃkraːan lk  tʕaːlj bʕd ʁd fajakufːu ʕan aːliaːzdijaaːdi fjhmaː mn kl faːkha zwd͡ʒaːn waqad ʔaaʕðara nabijːu aːllːahi luwtˤun ʕalajhi aːlsːalaaːmu nafsahu ħijna ʕadima ʕaʃijraaan tansˤuruhu wtðrwn maː χlq lkm rbkm mn ʔazwaːd͡ʒkm bl ʔantm qwm ʕaːdwn liʔaanːa aːltːawaaːdˤuʕa ʕatˤuwfun waaːlʕud͡ʒba munafːirun mrd͡ʒ aːlbħrjn jltqjaːn qd jkwn hðaː ʔalð ʕsˤjr ʃrbth fj ħjaːtj qaːlwaː ʔard͡ʒh wʔaχaːh wʔarsl fj aːlmdaːʔin ħaːʃrjn ʁajra muqalːilin walaaː sanafruʁu lakum ʔaajːuhaaː aːlθːaqalaːni qaaːla faaːχrud͡ʒ minhaaː faʔiinːaka rad͡ʒijmun waʔiið jaquwlu aːlmunaaːfiquwna waaːlːaðijna fij quluwbihim maradˤun maaː waʕadanaaː aːllːahu warasuwluhu ʔiilːaaː ʁuruwranaː ʔin sʕjkm lʃtaː ʔanaː sʕjd flstˤjn daːrj wdrb aːntsˤaːrj flstˤjn θaːrj wʔardˤ aːlsˤmwd snʕrf kjf nsˤlħ hðaː btˤrjqa ʔaw bʔaχraː waθamuwdu waqawmu luwtˤin waʔaasˤħaaːbu aːlʔaajkaai ʔauwlaʔiika aːlʔaaħzaaːbu wlmaː d͡ʒaːʔt rslnaː lwtˤaː sjʔ bhm wdˤaːq bhm ðrʕaː wqaːl hðaː jwm ʕsˤjb jraːwdnj ʔiħsaːsun bʔanːj qaːblthaː fj mkaːnin maː saːbqanaː hj sˤdjqtkm wllh mlk aːlsmaːwaːt waːlʔardˤ wjwm tqwm aːlsaːʕa jwmʔið jχsr aːlmbtˤlwn ql llðjn kfrwaː stʁlbwn wtħʃrwn ʔilaː d͡ʒhnm wbʔis aːlmhaːd ljswaː swaːʔ mn ʔahl aːlktaːb ʔama qaːʔima jtlwn ʔaːjaːt aːllh ʔaːnaːʔ aːlljl whm jsd͡ʒdwn falaː sˤadːaqa walaː sˤalːaaː θumːa d͡ʒaʕala naslahu min sulaaːlaain min maaːʔin mahijnin ql ʔinj ʔaχaːf ʔin ʕsˤjt rbj ʕðaːb jwm ʕðˤjm ʔinhaː tmtˤr aːljwm  ʔajn mðˤltj  qaːl ʔin lbθtm ʔilaː qljlaː lw ʔankm kntm tʕlmwn ʔiilːaaː aːmraʔaatahu qadːarnaaː ʔiinːahaaː lamina aːlʁaaːbirijna χuliqa aːlrːad͡ʒulu min aːltːuraaːbi fahamːuhu fij aːltːuraaːbi hðaː aːlbaːb ʔawtwmaːtjkj waːlʃfʕ waːlwtr hl bʔimkaːnk ʔan tsaːʕdnj qljlaː  waʔiin kaaːna aːlʕaqdu raʁbaaan fij aːlʔaulfaai fahaðaaː jakuwnu ʕalaaː ʔaaħadi wad͡ʒhajni lm jʕd hnaːk ʔaj sˤaːbwn ʕn ʔabj muħamːadin aːlħasani bni ʕljːi bni ʔabj tˤaːlibin aːlnːaaːru juʕradˤuwna ʕalajhaaː ʁuduwːanaː waʕaʃijːanaː wajawma taquwmu aːlsːaaːʕaau ʔaadχiluwaː ʔaːla firʕawna ʔaaʃadːa aːlʕaðaaːbi qul ʔiinːij ʔaaχaaːfu ʔiin ʕasˤajtu rabːij ʕaðaaːba jawmin ʕaðˤijmin ʔinːa lilbaaːqij biaːlmaaːdˤij muʕtabaranaː ħaːn aːlwqt lʔan tʃtrj sjaːra d͡ʒdjda θm ʔawħjnaː ʔiljk ʔan aːtbʕ mla ʔibraːhjm ħnjfaː wmaː kaːn mn aːlmʃrkjn faʔiin ʔaaʕradˤuwaː faqul ʔaanðartukum sˤaaːʕiqaaan miθla sˤaaːʕiqaai ʕaaːdin waθamuwda ðwaːtaː ʔafnaːn fkðbwh fʔaχðthm aːlrd͡ʒfa fʔasˤbħwaː fj daːrhm d͡ʒaːθmjn walaqad nad͡ʒːajnaaː banij ʔiisraaːʔiijla mina aːlʕaðaaːbi aːlmuhijni maaː lakum laaː tanaaːsˤaruwna aːsˤlawhaaː faaːsˤbiruwaː ʔaaw laaː tasˤbiruwaː sawaaːʔun ʕalajkum ʔiinːamaaː tud͡ʒzawna maaː kuntum taʕmaluwna waqalijlun mːina aːlʔaːχirijna wamarːa baʕdˤu aːlzːuhːaaːdi bibaaːbi malikin faqaaːla waːlðjn kðbwaː bʔaːjaːtnaː jmshm aːlʕðaːb bmaː kaːnwaː jfsqwn aːnh lmn aːlmhm d͡ʒdaːan aːlħsˤwl ʕlaː kfaːja mn aːlraːħa waaːlːaðijna ʔiiðaaː ʔaanfaquwaː lam jusrifuwaː walam jaqturuwaː wakaaːna bajna ðalika qawaaːmanaː ʔinhaː ʕlj aːlmndˤda ʔaχbrnj bmaːðaː tfkr hl jmknnaː ʔan ʔaχrd͡ʒ llʕb twm ʔamdˤaː ftra bʕd aːlðˤhr bʔakmlhaː mʕ maːrj ʃkrʔa lki ʕlaː aːlʔamsja aːlmmtʕa sˤm bkm ʕmj fhm laː jrd͡ʒʕwn ʔam tʔamrhm ʔaħlaːmhm bhðaː ʔam hm qwm tˤaːʁwn ʔaʕndk qlm θm ðhb ʔilaː ʔahlh jtmtˤaː wllh jsd͡ʒd mn fj aːlsmaːwaːt waːlʔardˤ tˤwʕaː wkrhaː wðˤlaːlhm baːlʁdw waːlʔaːsˤaːl lw kaːn hʔulaːʔ ʔaːlha maː wrdwhaː wkl fjhaː χaːldwn hl ðlk jχsˤk hl hðhi hdja lj aːlsˤjdlja qrjba mn aːlmstʃfaː waaːlʔiidlaaːlu fij aːlʔaabnaaːʔi fij muqaaːbalaai aːlmaħabːaai fij aːlʔaːbaaːʔi wakaaːnuwaː muluwka madjana wlqd ʔawħj ʔiljk wʔilaː aːlðjn mn qblk lʔin ʔaʃrkt ljħbtˤn ʕmlk wltkwnn mn aːlχaːsrjn kaðːaba aːlːaðijna min qablihim faʔaataaːhumu aːlʕaðaaːbu min ħajθu laaː jaʃʕuruwna waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlbulaʁaaːʔi man balaʁa ʔaaʃudːahu laaːqij min aːlʕilmi ʔaaʃudːahu jwm tkwn aːlsmaːʔ kaːlmhl laː tns d͡ʒlb ʔadwaːt aːlmtˤbχ ؛ mθl: aːlskaːkjn  wʔaːnja aːltˤbχ χmn aːlsˤaːʔib: " ʔin kaːnwaː mn aːlsraːʕjf  fnʕm " kam ʔaqmt hw jʕrf ʕʃra lʁaːt wasajud͡ʒanːabuhaaː aːlʔaatqaaː kaːnt ljlaː ħrjsˤa ʕlaː aːlnːðˤaːm ʔinhaː tħb aːlʔatˤfaːl ʃfjt mn aːlsˤdaːʕ falawlaaː ʔaanːahu kaaːna mina aːlmusabːiħijna wanahaaː ʔaːχarijna ʕan aːlsːuʔuaaːli wazad͡ʒara ʕanhu fqdrnaː fnʕm aːlqaːdrwn jaː ħðˤː aːlmkaːn bjk wlmn χaːf mqaːm rbh d͡ʒntaːn ʔawlʔik d͡ʒzaːʔuhm ʔan ʕljhm lʕna rawijːaain wjstʕd͡ʒlwnk baːlʕðaːb wlwlaː ʔad͡ʒl msmaː ld͡ʒaːʔhm aːlʕðaːb wljʔatjnhm bʁta whm laː jʃʕrwn ʔaalam tara ʔiilaaː aːlːaðijna badːaluwaː niʕmata aːllːahi kufranaː waʔaaħalːuwaː qawmahum daaːra aːlbawaaːri waːlðjn hm llzkaːa faːʕlwn aːlqnbla aːlnwwja hj slaːħ fðˤjʕ aːlthmt aːlnːjraːn mnzl ljlaː wʔatjnaːk baːlħq wʔinaː lsˤaːdqwn kun d͡ʒaːdanːaː ʔard͡ʒwk bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm sʔal saːʔil bʕðaːb waːqʕ wtraː kl ʔama d͡ʒaːθja kl ʔama tdʕaː ʔilaː ktaːbhaː aːljwm td͡ʒzwn maː kntm tʕmlwn ʔajn ʔaqrb fndq klːu aːlqsˤaːʔidi mn ʕjnjki ʔaqbshaː maː hj twsˤjtk  jaː ħðˤː naːs tʃwfk waaːlːaðijna ʕamiluwaː aːlsːajːiʔiaaːti θumːa taaːbuwaː min baʕdihaaː waʔaːmanuwaː ʔiinːa rabːaka min baʕdihaaː laʁafuwrun raħijmun   qraːrh   mn aːlaːn  wlaː fsˤl aːlsˤjf ʔiðaː ʔaklt lqmh hjʔat lʔaχraː raqijbanaː ʕalaaː aːlnːufuwsi fij χalawaaːtihaaː klaː ʔiðaː dkt aːlʔardˤ dkaː dkaː qad sˤadːaqta aːlrːuʔujaaː ʔiinːaaː kaðalika nad͡ʒzij aːlmuħsinijna whw aːlðj χlq aːlljl waːlnhaːr waːlʃms waːlqmr kl fj flk jsbħwn ʔin ʔaħbbt  fsʔaʕlmk kjf tlʕb aːlʃtˤrnd͡ʒ mntdaː aːlsʔudd wħmـaːh twm ħsˤl ʕlaː hðh aːldraːd͡ʒa mn maːrj fmaːl aːlðjn kfrwaː qblk mhtˤʕjn waqamaʕa ʃarːahu laː jʕjrwnnj aːntbaːhanaː waʔiin jurijduwaː χijaaːnataka faqad χaaːnuwaː aːllːaha min qablu faʔaamkana minhum waaːllːahu ʕalijmun ħakijmun aːʕlmwaː ʔan aːllh jħjj aːlʔardˤ bʕd mwthaː qd bjnaː lkm aːlʔaːjaːt lʕlkm tʕqlwn ʔaʕml fj msˤnʕ ʔanaː ʔajsr lqd χdʕthu jbdw mslmaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aːlsˤːaaːliħaaːti tˤuwbaaː lahum waħusnu maʔaːbin bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi waaːltˤːuwri waʔaajsaru tabaðːulanaː hl tʕlm ʔaj ktaːb trjd ʔan tqrʔah waqaaːla labijdun wd͡ʒʕlwaː llh ʔandaːdaː ljdˤlwaː ʕn sbjlh ql tmtʕwaː fʔin msˤjrkm ʔilaː aːlnaːr jaː lhaː mn rjħ qwja wahaðihi aːltˤːabaqaau mimːan laaː jurd͡ʒaaː lahaaː sˤalaaːħun  walaaː juʔumalu lahaaː falaaːħun waqawma nuwħin lamːaaː kaðːabuwaː aːlrːusula ʔaaʁraqnaaːhum wad͡ʒaʕalnaaːhum lilnːaaːsi ʔaːjaaan waʔaaʕtadnaaː lilðˤːaaːlimijna ʕaðaaːbanaː ʔaalijmanaː fʔarslnaː ʕljhm aːltˤwfaːn waːld͡ʒraːd waːlqml waːldˤfaːdʕ waːldm ʔaːjaːt mfsˤlaːt faːstkbrwaː wkaːnwaː qwmaː md͡ʒrmjn qul maaː ʔaasʔaalukum ʕalajhi min ʔaad͡ʒrin wamaaː ʔaanaaː mina aːlmutakalːifijna waaːlːaðijna saʕawaː fij ʔaːjaaːtinaaː muʕaaːd͡ʒizijna ʔauwlaʔiika lahum ʕaðaaːbun min rid͡ʒzin ʔaalijmun jaː ʔabt laː tʕbd aːlʃjtˤaːn ʔin aːlʃjtˤaːn kaːn llrħmn ʕsˤjaː kbr mqtaː ʕnd aːllh ʔan tqwlwaː maː laː tfʕlwn ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː aːltrkjz wahuwa maʃkuwrun fij maʕuwnatihi aːlkðb ħblh qsˤjr dmd͡ʒ fkrtjn fj fkra waʔiiðaaː buʃːira ʔaaħaduhum bimaaː dˤaraba lilrːaħmani maθalanaː ðˤalːa wad͡ʒhuhu muswadːanaː wahuwa kaðˤijmun aːnhaː raːʔiħa sjʔia qbl ʔan tktb ʃjʔianaː  jnbʁj ʔan ttʔakd mn aːlħqaːʔiq faʔiinːa man nafaða ʔaamruhu fahuwa ʔilaaː aːlʕilmi ʔaaħwad͡ʒu faaːd͡ʒtabaaːhu rabːuhu fad͡ʒaʕalahu mina aːlsˤːaaːliħijna aːlːaðijna juqijmuwna aːlsˤːalaaːaa wajuʔutuwna aːlzːakaaːaa wahum biaːlʔaːχiraai hum juwqinuwna aːljawma naχtimu ʕalaaː ʔaafwaaːhihim watukalːimunaaː ʔaajdijhim wataʃhadu ʔaard͡ʒuluhum bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jaksibuwna wamaaː ʔaːtajnaaːhum min kutubin jadrusuwnahaaː wamaaː ʔaarsalnaaː ʔiilajhim qablaka min naðijrin wmn aːlʃjaːtˤjn mn jʁwsˤwn lh wjʕmlwn ʕmlaː dwn ðlk wknaː lhm ħaːfðˤjn ʔaajuʃrikuwna maaː laaː jaχluqu ʃajʔianaː wahum juχlaquwna ðalika lijaʕlama ʔaanːij lam ʔaaχunhu biaːlʁajbi waʔaanːa aːllːaha laaː jahdij kajda aːlχaaːʔiinijna waaːlʔaardˤi ðaaːti aːlsˤːadʕi walaaː janbaʁij ʔaan jad͡ʒhala min nafsihi mablaʁa ʕilmihaaː waʔaanzalnaaː mina aːlmuʕsˤiraaːti maaːʔan θad͡ʒːaaːd͡ʒanaː qaaːlat ʔaanːaaː jakuwnu lij ʁulaaːmun walam jamsasnij baʃarun walam ʔaaku baʁijːanaː wʔimaː jnzʁnk mn aːlʃjtˤaːn nzʁ faːstʕð baːllh ʔinh hw aːlsmjʕ aːlʕljm faqulnaaː aːdˤribuwhu bibaʕdˤihaaː kaðalika juħjij aːllːahu aːlmawtaaː wajurijkum ʔaːjaaːtihi laʕalːakum taʕqiluwna aːlʃbaːb aːlʔamd͡ʒdu falamːaaː aːʕtazalahum wamaaː jaʕbuduwna min duwni aːllːahi wahabnaaː lahu ʔiisħaaːqa wajaʕquwba wakulːanaː d͡ʒaʕalnaaː nabijːanaː ʔaj hðh aːlqtˤtˤ qtˤk lqd ʔistjqðˤtu mtʔaχraan aːljwm ʔinːa aːlʕud͡ʒba lajaʔakulu aːlħasanaaːti kamaaː taʔakulu aːlnːaaːru aːlħatˤaba qaaːla faman rabːukumaaː jaaː muwsaaː lʔantm ʔaʃd rhba fj sˤdwrhm mn aːllh ðlk bʔanhm qwm laː jfqhwn waqaaːla ʕabdu aːllːahi bnu aːlmuʕtazːi ʔiχwaaːnu aːlʃːarːi kaʃad͡ʒari aːlnːaaːrind͡ʒi juħriqu baʕdˤuhaaː baʕdˤanaː laqad d͡ʒaaːʔakum rasuwlun min ʔaanfusikum ʕazijzun ʕalajhi maaː ʕanitːum ħarijsˤun ʕalajkum biaːlmuʔuminijna raʔuwfun raħijmun mtaː aːstjqðˤt hðaː aːlsˤbaːħ  qaaːluwaː waʔaaqbaluwaː ʕalajhim maaːðaaː tafqiduwna ðlk bʔanhm ʃaːqwaː aːllh wrswlh wmn jʃaːqq aːllh wrswlh fʔin aːllh ʃdjd aːlʕqaːb lijad͡ʒzija aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aːlsˤːaaːliħaaːti ʔauwlaʔiika lahum maʁfiraaun warizqun karijmun ħqqt ħlm aːlʔama ʔam lhm ʔilh ʁjr aːllh sbħaːn aːllh ʕmaː jʃrkwn hl jmknnj ʔan ʔaːkl hðaː d͡ʒaːʔt aːʔilaː aːljaːbaːn ʕndmaː kaːnt sˤʁjra wʔiðaː ʕlm mn ʔaːjaːtnaː ʃjʔiaː aːtχðhaː hzwaː ʔawlʔik lhm ʕðaːb mhjn kaːn saːmj jlʕb kra aːlqdm lmaːðaː jsˤʕd hʔulaːʔ aːlnaːs ʕlaː aːlsqf  ʔiin juwħaaː ʔiilajːa ʔiilːaaː ʔaanːamaaː ʔaanaaː naðijrun mubijnun hw trknj ʔaðhb lqd ʔiltqjnaː ʕlaː aːlmmr qaːl twm: ʔinh kaːn skraːn ħjwaːnaːt aːlbaːndaː aːldˤχma tʕjʃ fj aːlsˤjn fqtˤ waaːlːaðijna jasˤiluwna maaː ʔaamara aːllːahu bihi ʔaan juwsˤala wajaχʃawna rabːahum wajaχaaːfuwna suwʔa aːlħisaaːbi ʔaʕrf aːlħq tʕrf ʔahlh waʔaanfaqa min fadˤlin wadːuwaː law tudhinu fajudhinuwna waːlðjn hm ʕn aːllʁw mʕrdˤwn mlk aːlnaːs maː tsbq mn ʔama ʔad͡ʒlhaː wmaː jstʔaχrwn waaːχfidˤ d͡ʒanaaːħaka limani aːtːabaʕaka mina aːlmuʔuminijna laaː jakun ħubːuk kalafanaː sjkwn qaːdraː ʕlaː ʔimdaːdnaː bmʕlwmaːt ʔakθr ʕn nʃʔaa aːlkwn wʔakjd kjdaː wʔiðaː ʔalqwaː mnhaː mkaːnaː dˤjqaː mqrnjn dʕwaː hnaːlk θbwraː ʔiin kulːu nafsin lamːaaː ʕalajhaaː ħaaːfiðˤun hðaː hw aːlmkaːn aːlðj tʕjʃ fjh ʔiðaaː qaʕadt bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi ʔaaraʔaajta aːlːaðij jukaðːibu biaːldːijni jamħuw aːllːahu maaː jaʃaaːʔu wajuθbitu waʕindahu ʔaumːu aːlkitaaːbi aːllʁa aːlʕrbjːa lʁaun d͡ʒmjlaaun ʔajhmaː d͡ʒaːʔ ʔawlaːan  aːldd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa ʔam aːlbjdˤa  bdaː aːltʕb ʕlaː naːnsj kl maː ʕljk fʕlh hw ʔiχbaːr twm bʔan jʁaːdr sajaðːakːaru man jaχʃaaːaː ʔiinːa aːllːaha judaaːfiʕu ʕani aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː ʔiinːa aːllːaha laaː juħibːu kulːa χawːaaːnin kafuwrin aːllh ʔakbr waaːlrːaʔiijsi maʕa sˤaħaaːbatihi ql mn jklʔukm baːlljl waːlnhaːr mn aːlrħmn bl hm ʕn ðkr rbhm mʕrdˤwn lm ʔard aːstʕmaːl aːlhaːtf ʔaalam ʔaaʕhad ʔiilajkum jaaː banij ʔaːdama ʔaan laaː taʕbuduwaː aːlʃːajtˤaaːna ʔiinːahu lakum ʕaduwːun mubijnun raːʔiħa hðaː aːllħm fðˤjʕa qutˤuwfuhaaː daaːnijaaun sˤdjqtj hnaː aːsmj ljs fj aːlqaːʔima tuks hw tˤaːʔir mn ʔantaːrktjkaː lm jkn twm d͡ʒaːʔiʕaː ħqaː aːlʃtj  aːktr fsˤl bħbh mn tntðˤr  waʔiin tadʕuwhum ʔiilaaː aːlhudaaː laaː jasmaʕuwaː wataraaːhum janðˤuruwna ʔiilajka wahum laaː jubsˤiruwna jasmaʕu ʔaːjaaːti aːllːahi tutlaaː ʕalajhi θumːa jusˤirːu mustakbiranaː kaʔaan lam jasmaʕhaaː fabaʃːirhu biʕaðaaːbin ʔaalijmin maaː lakum laaː tard͡ʒuwna lilːahi waqaaːranaː ʔaalam tara ʔiilaaː aːlːaðijna ʔauwtuwaː nasˤijbanaː mina aːlkitaaːbi jaʃtaruwna aːldˤːalaaːlaaa wajurijduwna ʔaan tadˤilːuwaː aːlsːabijla nħn mtˤjʕwn lhm ʕðaːb fj aːlħjaːa aːldnjaː wlʕðaːb aːlʔaːχra ʔaʃq wmaː lhm mn aːllh mn waːq hl ʔanaː fuzt  θumːa ʔiinːakum jawma aːlqijaaːmaai ʕinda rabːikum taχtasˤimuwna hl aːld͡ʒw ħaːr fj aːlχaːrd͡ʒ kaːn waːdˤħaː ʔan twm rd͡ʒl ʁnj trjd aːlmʃaːrka fj ttˤwjr tqnjaːt ðkaːʔ aːsˤtˤnaːʕj llʁa aːlʕrbja w aːn lm tkn mχtsˤaː fj blaːd aːltwaːrq  jʃrb aːlnaːs ħljb aːlnaːqa ʃʕrt baːlʔasf td͡ʒaːh ðlk aːltˤfl ʔaftmaːrwnh ʕlaː maː jraː faraaːʁa ʔiilaaː ʔaahlihi fad͡ʒaaːʔa biʕid͡ʒlin samijnin aːlhatːu aːlkasru waaːlbatːu aːlqatˤʕu fswf jdʕw θbwraː ln jsˤbkm ʔaħd baːlʔaðaː aːrw qsˤa d͡ʒmjla lsˤdjqj aːlsˤʁjr jawma laː juʁnij ʕanhum kajduhum ʃajʔianaː walaː hum junsˤaruwna laː jmshm fjhaː nsˤb wmaː hm mnhaː bmχrd͡ʒjn faʔaaχaðnaaːhu wad͡ʒunuwdahu fanabaðnaaːhum fij aːljamːi faaːnðˤur kajfa kaaːna ʕaaːqibaau aːlðˤːaaːlimijna waqaaːla baʃːaaːru bnu burdin aːrtdaː aːlʔatˤbaːʔ ʔaqnʕa bjdˤaːʔ tʁtˤj ʔafwaːhhm w ʔanwfhm ʔanaː mtħkm fj nfsj kj laː ʔafqd sˤwaːbj jmjl aːlʔaʃχaːsˤ aːlʔanaːnjːjn ʔilaː aːtːχaːð ʔaːraːʔ θaːba ħtːaː w ʔin lm tkn sˤħjħa jʃhdh aːlmqrbwn fʔamaː mn tˤʁaː ltrwn aːld͡ʒħjm ʔanaː mn ʔisbaːnjaː qaaːluwaː tˤaaːʔiirukum maʕakum ʔaaʔiin ðukːirtum bal ʔaantum qawmun musrifuwna fʔaːtaːhm aːllh θwaːb aːldnjaː wħsn θwaːb aːlʔaːχra waːllh jħb aːlmħsnjn faaːsˤbir ʔiinːa waʕda aːllːahi ħaqːun faʔiimːaaː nurijanːaka baʕdˤa aːlːaðij naʕiduhum ʔaaw natawafːajanːaka faʔiilajnaaː jurd͡ʒaʕuwna laː ʔaħd ʔaʕrfhu jktb χitˤaːbaːt bʕd aːlʔaːn θumːa ʔiinːa lahum ʕalajhaaː laʃawbanaː min ħamijmin maaː χalqukum walaaː baʕθukum ʔiilːaaː kanafsin waaːħidaain ʔiinːa aːllːaha samijʕun basˤijrun tmjl mʃklaːt jwmnaː aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕja ʔilaː aːltʕqjd ʔakθr fʔakθr waːlχjl waːlbʁaːl waːlħmjr ltrkbwhaː wzjna wjχlq maː laː tʕlmwn hal ʔaunabːiʔiukum ʕalaaː man tanazːalu aːlʃːajaaːtˤijnu ʕwjl aːlðʔiaːb kaaːlmuhli jaʁlij fij aːlbutˤuwni ðrhm jʔaklwaː wjtmtʕwaː wjlhhm aːlʔaml fswf jʕlmwn laː tʃʁlnj ʕn ʕmlj mn fdˤlk kun χlaːqaːan hl ʔanti bχjr aːlʔaːn  waʔaanʃada aːlrːijaaːʃijːu ʔanaː ʔaʕaːrdˤ ðlk bʃda wʔanaː lmsnaː aːlsmaːʔ fwd͡ʒdnaːhaː mlʔit ħrsaː ʃdjdaː wʃhbaː tuwfjt ʔaχtj aːlʕaːm aːlmaːdˤj ʕaːm d͡ʒdjd sʕjd ʕan ʔamːi aːlmuʔuminjna ʔamːi ʕbdi aːllhi ʕaːʔiʃaa radˤij aːllhu ʕanhaaː qaːlat: lqd kaːn jstħq aːlʕnaːʔ jawma tublaaː aːlsːaraaːʔiiru jmnj aːlsʕjda mnjtj aːllħm mtˤbwχ waqaaːla ʃajχun min banij sulajmin liaːbnihi jaaː bunajːa ʔijːaaːka waaːlrːaquwba aːlʁadˤuwba aːlqatˤuwba aːldˤħk blaː sbb mn qla aːlʔadb fj aːlbraːjaː sjdaː ʕmr aːlsjda ʔarbʕwn ʕaːmanaː ʕlaː aːlʔard͡ʒħ aːltˤrjq nħw aːlħrja mzaːl tˤwjl fqtˤ ʔadˤf aːlmaːʔ fʔinmaː hj zd͡ʒra waːħda fʔiðaː hm jnðˤrwn fʔarsl frʕwn fj aːlmdaːʔin ħaːʃrjn wdaːnja ʕljhm ðˤlaːlhaː wðllt qtˤwfhaː tðljlaː maaː tasˤijru bihi aːlnːiʕmaau ʁaraaːmanaː waaːlzːaʕaaːmaau malaaːmanaː ʔataː aːlsjd braːwn ljraːk  fwd͡ʒd ʔank ʁjr mwd͡ʒwd fasˤaaːrat aːlwasˤlaau furqaaan waaːlʔaulfaau ʕadaaːwaaan waaːlbaħri aːlmasd͡ʒuwri sna aːllh aːltj qd χlt mn qbl wln td͡ʒd lsna aːllh tbdjlaː maːðaː jnbʁj ʔan jfʕlh fj rʔajkn ðalika bimaaː qadːamat ʔaajdijkum waʔaanːa aːllːaha lajsa biðˤalːaaːmin lilʕabijdi waʔaamːaaː aːltˤːawaaːriʔiu fanawʕaaːni ʔaaħaduhumaaː ʃubhaaun taʕtaridˤu aːlmaʕnaaː fatamnaʕu ʕan faʔiiðaaː kaaːna ʔaːlifanaː maʔaluwfanaː aːntasˤara biaːlʔaulfaai ʕalaaː ʔaaʕaaːdijhi maː rʔajk baːlðhaːb lmʃaːhda flm  wamaaː taʃaaːʔuuwna ʔiilaːːa ʔaan jaʃaaːʔ aːllːahu rabːu aːlʕaaːlamijna ldju ʔibna mtzwd͡ʒh mn rd͡ʒl frnsj ʔasʕd χtˤaːbu aːlrʔijs aːlðj ʔalqaːh ʔams ʔansˤaːrh waʔaanːaaː ðˤananːaaː ʔaan lan taquwla aːlʔiinsu waaːld͡ʒinːu ʕalaaː aːllːahi kaðibanaː mtkʔijn ʕlaː frʃ btˤaːʔinhaː mn ʔistbrq wd͡ʒnaː aːld͡ʒntjn daːn aːlnaːr ðaːt aːlwqwd rd͡ʒʕ bχfj ħnjn aːlːaðijna jabχaluwna wajaʔamuruwna aːlnːaaːsa biaːlbuχli waman jatawalːa faʔiinːa aːllːaha huwa aːlʁanijːu aːlħamijdu jaː ʔajhaː aːlnaːs qd d͡ʒaːʔkm brhaːn mn rbkm wʔanzlnaː ʔiljkm nwraː mbjnaː aːlʃːaaːrida  wajaqbal aːlʕaaːʔiida  wajaħfaðˤ aːlmustawdaʕa faqada aːlmawd͡ʒuwda  walam jad͡ʒid aːlmafquwda fʔamaː aːlðjn ʃqwaː ffj aːlnaːr lhm fjhaː zfjr wʃhjq wʔin jrwaː ksfaː mn aːlsmaːʔ saːqtˤaː jqwlwaː sħaːb mrkwm bʁja aːlaːχtbaːʔ mn aːlʃrtˤa  qdˤaː " djmaː " aːlljla fj sla qmaːma naħnu χalaqnaaːhum waʃadadnaaː ʔaasrahum waʔiiðaaː ʃiʔinaaː badːalnaaː ʔaamθaaːlahum tabdijlanaː falajsa limiθlihi fij aːlʔiiχaaːʔi ħaðˤːun walaaː fij aːlwidaaːdi nasˤijbun maːðaː jrjd ʔan jfʕl faaːʕrif manzilatak min aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː bimanzilatik min aːlnːaaːsi θm jʔatj mn bʕd ðlk ʕaːm fjh jʁaːθ aːlnaːs wfjh jʕsˤrwn waʔiinːa kulːanaː lamːaaː lajuwafːijanːahum rabːuka ʔaaʕmaaːlahum ʔiinːahu bimaaː jaʕmaluwna χabijrun jawma taʃaqːaqu aːlʔaardˤu ʕanhum siraaːʕanaː ðalika ħaʃrun ʕalajnaaː jasijrun ʔiinːaaː kaðalika nad͡ʒzij aːlmuħsinijna ljs mʔuχraː tslm ʔijdk walaʔiin mutːum ʔaaw qutiltum laʔiilaaː aːllːahi tuħʃaruwna ʔard͡ʒwk dʕnj ʔaːχð ʔaχtk mn aːlmħtˤa maaː samiʕnaaː bihaðaaː fij aːlmilːaai aːlʔaːχiraai ʔiin haðaaː ʔiilːaaː aːχtilaaːqun wdˤʕt aːlsmaːʕa qrjbaː mn ʔaðnj mtʃrf bmʕrftk laː ʔaħd ʔaʕrfhu jrtdj rbtˤa aːlʕunuq bʕd aːlʔaːn wjwm jʕdˤ aːlðˤaːlm ʕlaː jdjh tbðjraː waʔiiðaaː aːlbiħaaːru fud͡ʒːirat ʔaaqimi aːlsˤːalaaːaa liduluwki aːlʃːamsi ʔiilaaː ʁasaqi aːllːajli waqurʔaːna aːlfad͡ʒri ʔiinːa qurʔaːna aːlfad͡ʒri kaaːna maʃhuwdanaː ʔawlʔik mʔawaːhm aːlnaːr qaaːluwaː taaːllːahi laqad ʕalimtum maaː d͡ʒiʔinaaː linufsida fij aːlʔaardˤi wamaaː kunːaaː saaːriqijna aːlʔaːn  bʔimkaːn aːlʃrka ʔan tbrr hðh aːlmsˤaːrjf wtlk aːlqraː ʔahlknaːhm lmaː ðˤlmwaː twm fj aːd͡ʒtmaːʕ mʕ zbwn qaːla rswlu aːllhi sˤalːaaː aːllhu ʕalajhi wasalːama: walaaː jatad͡ʒaaːwaza bihaaː qadra ħaqːihaaː hðaː jʕd͡ʒbnj kθjraː walajsa haðaaː aːlqawlu minhu tarʁijbanaː linabijːihi sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama fijhaaː kl maː ʕljk fʕlh hw ʔan tsmʕ bʕnaːja waːldtj laː ttħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja bʃkl d͡ʒjd d͡ʒdaːan kn ljnaːan mn ʁjr dˤʕf wʃdjdaːan mn ʁjr ʕnf ʔant twaːʕdjn tˤaːlbanaː mn kjʔiw  ʔalst kðlk  hðh tbdw kaːljwnaːnja lj lkn w baːlnsba llnaːtˤqjn blʁa aːlʔisbraːntw fhðh tbdw klʁa aːlfwlaːbwk lajsa min aːlrːaʁbaai fij aːldːunjaaː aːktisaaːbu maaː jasˤuwna aːlʕirdˤa fijhaaː wlʔin msthm nfħa mn ʕðaːb rbk ljqwln jaː wjlnaː ʔinaː knaː ðˤaːlmjn ʔinh lqwl fsˤl walaqad sˤarːafnaaː fij haðaaː aːlqurʔaːni lijaðːakːaruwaː wamaaː jazijduhum ʔiilːaaː nufuwranaː tsttˤjʕ aːlbħθ ʕn aːld͡ʒml aːltj tħtwj ʕlaː klma mʕjna waːlħsˤwl ʕlaː trd͡ʒmaːt ltlk aːld͡ʒml faʔaarsalnaaː ʕalajhimu aːltˤːuwfaaːna waaːld͡ʒaraaːda waaːlqumːala waaːldˤːafaaːdiʕa waaːldːama ʔaːjaaːtin mufasˤːalaaːtin faaːstakbaruwaː wakaaːnuwaː qawmanaː mud͡ʒrimijna hðaː aːlqraːr nhaːʔij hl tqsˤdjnj ʃarːu aːlkitaaːbaai aːlʃːabaqu kamaaː ʔaanːa ʃarːa aːlqiraaːʔaai aːlhaðramaau ʔin aːllh waʔiin jarawaː ʔaːjaaan juʕridˤuwaː wajaquwluwaː siħrun mːustamirːun ʔilaː frʕwn wmlʔih faːtbʕwaː ʔamr frʕwn wmaː ʔamr frʕwn brʃjd waːlðjn d͡ʒaːhdwaː fjnaː lnhdjnhm sblnaː wʔin aːllh lmʕ aːlmħsnjn hw aːlnqaːʃ aːltj jstχdmhaː aːlfrnsjwn llħdjθ ʕn aːlsjaːsa waːlʔaumwr aːlmmaːθla wd͡ʒwh jwmʔið naːʕma ʕnd aːlʔiʃaːra tkwn aːlsaːʕa aːlwaːħda sˤbaːħaːan wθmaːnin wχmsjn dqjqja wʔarbʕjn θaːnja ʔanaː msrwr lwd͡ʒwdk hnaː mʕj waraʔaaaː aːlmud͡ʒrimuwna aːlnːaaːra faðˤanːuwaː ʔaanːahum muwaaːqiʕuwhaaː walam jad͡ʒiduwaː ʕanhaaː masˤrifanaː waːlðjn laː jʃhdwn aːlzwr wʔiðaː mrwaː baːllʁw mrwaː kraːmaː wamaaː bikum min niʕmaain famina aːllːahi θumːa ʔiiðaaː masːakumu aːldˤːurːu faʔiilajhi tad͡ʒʔaaruwna wjaː qwm maː lj ʔadʕwkm ʔilaː aːlnd͡ʒaːa wtdʕwnnj ʔilaː aːlnaːr faðarhum ħatːaaː julaaːquwaː jawmahumu aːlːaðij fijhi jusˤʕaquwna waːtl ʕljhm nbʔa aːlðj ʔaːtjnaːh ʔaːjaːtnaː faːnslχ mnhaː fʔatbʕh aːlʃjtˤaːn fkaːn mn aːlʁaːwjn wmaː wd͡ʒdnaː lʔakθrhm mn ʕhd wʔin wd͡ʒdnaː ʔakθrhm lfaːsqjn hl jwd͡ʒd ʃjʔ juzʕid͡ʒak wajawma naħʃuru min kulːi ʔaumːaain fawd͡ʒanaː mimːan jukaðːibu biʔaːjaaːtinaaː fahum juwzaʕuwna d͡ʒjd ʔan tkwn hnaː bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi waaːlʕasˤri ðlk ʔamr aːllh ʔanzlh ʔiljkm wmn jtq aːllh jkfr ʕnh sjʔiaːth wjʕðˤm lh ʔad͡ʒraː wbdmʕai aːlʁjmai ʔaħbbtk ʕsaː ʔan jhdjnj rbj lʔaqrb mn hðaː rʃdanaː waqijla liχaaːlidi bni sˤafwaaːna waaːlθːaaːliθu aːlðːakaaːʔu aːlːaðij jastaqirːu bihi ħifðˤu maaː tasˤawːarahu wafahmu maaː ʕalimahu waaːliaːstikθaaːra minhu taχalːufanaː rbwʕu aːlʃːـʔaːmi bـrwd͡ʒu aːlʕaـlaː tuħaːkj aːlsːـmaːʔa bʕـaːlj aːlsaːـnaː lahu maqaaːlijdu aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waaːlʔaardˤi waaːlːaðijna kafaruwaː biʔaːjaaːti aːllːahi ʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlχaaːsiruwna walanuskinanːakumu aːlʔaardˤa min baʕdihim ðalika liman χaaːfa maqaaːmij waχaaːfa waʕijdi hl jwd͡ʒd aːj ʃχsˤ rbmaː jrjd ʔan jʔuðj twm  ʔalaː ttbʕn ʔafʕsˤjt ʔamrj ʔauħb td͡ʒrba ʔaʃjaːʔ d͡ʒdjda hm jtwaːsˤlwn mʕ bʕdˤhm aːlbʕdˤ baːlʔijmaːʔaːt haðaaː faljaðuwquwhu ħamijmun waʁasːaaːqun ʕndmaː bdʔat lltw fj qraːʔa aːlktaːb tˤrq aːħdhm aːlbaːb waaːlʔaːminu min aːllːahi taʕaaːlaaː ʁajru χaaːʔiifin wmaː jnðˤr hʔulaːʔ ʔilaː sˤjħa waːħda maː lhaː mn fwaːq θm ʔin ʕljnaː ħsaːbhm hl twd ʔan tʔatj baːldaːχil  θm ltsʔaln jwmʔið ʕn aːlnʕjm waaːstiʕaaːnatuhu sˤifaaun laaːzimaaun litˤabʕihi  waχilqaaun qaaːʔiimaaun fij d͡ʒawharihi ħq mn ktb bmsk ʔan jχtm bʕnbr qm bh bnfsk wbaːltˤrjqa aːlsˤħjħa aːld͡ʒzaːʔir tsˤdr aːlnftˤ bdaː w kʔan ʃjʔiaː lm jħdθ ʔaam ħasibta ʔaanːa ʔaasˤħaaːba aːlkahfi waaːlrːaqijmi kaaːnuwaː min ʔaːjaaːtinaaː ʕad͡ʒabanaː wʔismaːʕjl waːljsʕ wjwns wlwtˤaː wklaː fdˤlnaː ʕlaː kaðalika ħaqːat kalimatu rabːika ʕalaaː aːlːaðijna fasaquwaː ʔaanːahum laaː juʔuminuwna jaaː wajlataaː lajtanij lam ʔaatːaχið fulaaːnanaː χalijlanaː lm ʔar ʔaħdaː mθlhaː qblaː hlaːː naːwltnj aːlmaːʔ qjl llðjn ðˤlmwaː ðwqwaː ʕðaːb aːlχld hl td͡ʒzwn ʔilaː bmaː kntm tksbwn ʔanta kjf ʕlmta ðlk  haðaaː basˤaaːʔiiru lilnːaaːsi wahudanaː waraħmaaun liqawmin juwqinuwna wakaðalika nurij ʔiibraaːhijma fj ʔaj mwqʕ tʃbjk aːd͡ʒtmaːʕj  fajaħtamilu taʕaba aːldːarsi lijudrika raaːħaaa aːlʕilmi wajanfij ʕanhu maʕarːaaa aːld͡ʒahli hj laː tħb aːlθʕaːbjn w aːlrjaːdˤjaːt taraaː aːlʕaqla bihaðihi aːlmaθaaːbaai watanfiru min aːlʕuqalaaːʔi haðaaː aːlnːufuwra waqaaːluwaː jaaː wajlanaaː haðaaː jawmu aːldːijni hj tʕml fj aːlmdrsa ʕlmt nfs maː qdmt wʔaχrt qaaːluwaː wad͡ʒadnaaː ʔaːbaaːʔanaaː lahaaː ʕaaːbidijna man ʔaaðalːu aːlnːaaːsi  faqaaːla ldj ʔalm fj ʔaktaːfj waʔiin tad͡ʒhar biaːlqawli faʔiinːahu jaʕlamu aːlsːirːa waʔaaχfaaː maː ʔant bnʕma rbk bmd͡ʒnwn faʔiin lam taʔatuwnij bihi falaaː kajla lakum ʕindij walaaː taqrabuwni mn ʃbː ʕlaː ʃjʔin ʃaːb ʕljh laː tdʕwaː aːljwm θbwraː waːħdaː waːdʕwaː θbwraː kθjraː waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi man lam jamut lam jafut waʕalaaː aːllːahi qasˤdu aːlsːabijli waminhaaː d͡ʒaaːʔiirun walaw ʃaaːʔa lahadaaːkum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna wakilaaːhumaaː jard͡ʒiʕu ʔilaaː aːlʕadli aːlːaðij bihi salaaːmaau aːlsːultˤaaːni rʔajt qtˤa trkdˤ ʕqb aːlklb ʔaajːu ʃajʔin kaaːna χabaruk baʕdij  qaaːla jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlnːabijːu d͡ʒaaːhidi aːlkufːaaːra waaːlmunaaːfiqijna waaːʁluðˤ ʕalajhim wamaʔawaaːhum d͡ʒahanːamu wabiʔisa aːlmasˤijru faʕasˤaaː firʕawnu aːlrːasuwla faʔaaχaðnaaːhu wad͡ʒhahu jaquwlu mn ʕʃrjn tˤaːlb, waːħd fqtˤ qrʔa aːlktaːb qaːl aːlðjn aːstkbrwaː ʔinaː kl fjhaː ʔin aːllh qd ħkm bjn aːlʕbaːd waqad ʔaafsˤaħa aːlmutanabːij biðalika fij qawlihi hl hw jħbnj  ʔaʔiðaː mtnaː wknaː traːbaː wʕðˤaːmaː ʔaʔinaː lmdjnwn χaaːlidijna fijhaaː ħasunat mustaqarːanaː wamuqaaːmanaː ʔatˤfʔi aːldˤwʔ kaːnt ħjaːtj fj χtˤr ʔatsaːʔl ʔin kaːn jħbnj bjnmaː knt ðaːhbaː ʔilaː aːlʕml aːlʕud͡ʒbi bimaaː nuħsinu fkðbwh fʔaχðhm ʕðaːb jwm aːlðˤla ʔinh kaːn ʕðaːb jwm ʕðˤjm ln jtˤrd mnːaːd baːja mn aːlmnzl aːltj ttˤlʕ ʕlaː aːlʔafʔida tʕd͡ʒbnj aːlkjka ʔaʕtˤ aːlqtˤ bʕdˤ aːllħm jaaː ʔaabati ʔiinːij ʔaaχaaːfu ʔaan jamasːaka ʕaðaaːbun mina aːlrːaħmani fatakuwna lilʃːajtˤaaːni walijːanaː d͡ʒʔit sjraːan ʕlaː aːlʔaqdaːm jamħaqu aːllːahu aːlrːibaaː wajurbij aːlsˤːadaqaaːti waaːllːahu laaː juħibːu kulːa kafːaaːrin ʔaaθijmin lqd tˤalaba kwb mn aːlmaːʔ ql ʕsaː ʔan jkwn rdf lkm bʕdˤ aːlðj tstʕd͡ʒlwn lfː saːmj ħblaː ħwl ʕnq ljlaː w χnqhaː ħtːaː aːlmwt wad͡ʒhu fasaaːdihaaː ʔaanːa ʃajχij lam jaðkurhaaː wamaaː lam jaðkurhu aːlʃːajχu laaː χajra fijhi liʔaanːa waaːd͡ʒibaaːti aːlʕuquwli laaː jad͡ʒuwzu ʔibtˤaaːluhaaː biaːlʃːarʕi ʕndmaː tswq fj aːlðˤlaːm tħs w kʔank tħlq fj aːlsmaːʔ wajarawnahu mudˤirːanaː biχalqi aːlwaladi baʕijdanaː min nad͡ʒaaːbatihi ʔaanːahaaː kalimaaun tuðkaru lilmubaaːlaʁaai walaaː juraaːdu bihaaː suwʔun aːlħdjθ aːlʔawl: aːlʔaʕmaːl baːlnjaːt knt mdhʃaː qaːl djmaː: " lʔasˤdqk aːlqwl  laː ʔasttˤjʕ ħqaː ʔan ʔatðkr mn kaːnwaː " ʁsl aːlmlaːbs baːljd ʕmlja sˤʕba wmdˤjʕa llwqt twm laː jsttˤjʕ aːltnfs ʔanaː waːθq ʔanj rʔajthu mn qbl bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi ʔiiðaaː zulzilati aːlʔaardˤu zilzaaːlahaaː hl tðhb ʔilaː aːlknjsa famaaː lanaaː min ʃaaːfiʕijna waqaaːla ʔaabuw aːlʕabːaaːsi aːlmubarːidu radaaːʔaau aːlχatˤːi zamaaːnaau aːlʔaadabi laː jʕjʃ fj hðaː aːlmbnaː ʔaħd d͡ʒiʔitu ʔilaː hnaː lʔataʕalːm faʔiini aːntahawaː faʔiinːa aːllːaha ʁafuwrun raħijmun man lam jaħtamil ðulːa aːltːaʕalːumi saaːʕaaan baqija fij ðulːi aːld͡ʒahli ʔaabadanaː ql ʔin rbj jbstˤ aːlrzq lmn jʃaːʔ wjqdr wlkn ʔakθr aːlnaːs laː jʕlmwn ðalika waman juʕaðˤːim ʃaʕaaːʔiira aːllːahi faʔiinːahaaː min taqwaaː aːlquluwbi faθabata ʔaanːa aːltːad͡ʒaaːnusa  waʔiin tanawːaʕa  ʔaasˤlu aːlʔiiχaaːʔi waqaaːʕidaau aːliaːʔitilaaːfi laqad ʔaaħsˤaaːhum waʕadːahum ʕadːanaː ʔin hðaː ʔilaː χlq aːlʔawljn tʕaːl ʔiðaː aːsttˤʕt maaː laaː jankafːuwna ʕanhu ʔilːaaː bimaaːniʕin qawijːin ħbj lhaː aːlːatij waquwduhaaː aːlnːaaːsu waaːlħid͡ʒaaːraau ʔauʕidːat lilkaaːfirijna ʔakfaːrkm χjr mn ʔawlʔikm ʔam lkm braːʔa fj aːlzbr liʔaanːa min aːlkalaaːmi maaː kaaːna masmuwʕanaː laaː jaħtaaːd͡ʒu fij fahmihi ʔilaaː taʔaamːuli aːlχatˤːi bihi waʔiin jatafarːaqaaː juʁni aːllːahu kulːanaː min saʕatihi wakaaːna aːllːahu waaːsiʕanaː ħakijmanaː ʔalaː jsd͡ʒdwaː llh aːlðj jχrd͡ʒ aːlχbʔ fj aːlsmaːwaːt waːlʔardˤ wjʕlm maː tχfwn wmaː tʕlnwn rbnaː laː td͡ʒʕlnaː ftna llðjn kfrwaː waːʁfr lnaː rbnaː ʔink ʔant aːlʕzjz aːlħkjm ʔalqjaː fj d͡ʒhnm kl kfaːr ʕnjd lm jraː ʔaħd twm sqtˤ qlmj mn ħaːfa mktbj ʃʕrt sjʔia hðaː md͡ʒrːd maːʔ fqtˤ ʔaljs kðlk  jʃwj twm aːllħm twqʕ twm ħdwθ ðlk aːnh mttˤwr ʔink laː tnsˤt mtˤlqaːan mn aːlʔafdˤl lj ʔan ʔatħdθ ʔilaː aːld͡ʒdaːr faʔaand͡ʒajnaaːhu waman maʕahu fij aːlfulki aːlmaʃħuwni ʕlmh ʃdjd aːlqwaː ʔakrh aːlsjaːsa whzj ʔiljk bd͡ʒðʕ aːlnχla tsaːqtˤ ʕljk rtˤbaː d͡ʒnjaː ʕmlt maːrj mrbːja llʔatˤfaːl ʕndmaː kaːnt mraːhqa wqaːlwaː rbnaː ʔinaː ʔatˤʕnaː saːdtnaː wkbraːʔnaː fʔadˤlwnaː aːlsbjlaː hl trjd mʃaːhda mqaːbla kra aːlqaːʕda ʕlaː aːltlfaːz  ʔajhaː aːlqaːʔid llʕljaːʔ ʃʕbh faaːljawma aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː mina aːlkufːaaːri jadˤħakuwna aːnhaː χd͡ʒwla waʔiið ʁadawta min ʔaahlika tubawːiʔiu aːlmuʔuminijna maqaaːʕida lilqitaaːli waaːllːahu samijʕun ʕalijmun ʔauwlaʔiika aːlːaðijna laʕanahumu aːllːahu waman jalʕani aːllːahu falan tad͡ʒida lahu nasˤijranaː ʔam ʔaːtjnaːhm ktaːbaː mn qblh fhm bh mstmskwn ʔiið qaaːla liʔaabijhi waqawmihi maaː taʕbuduwna wmaː χlqnaː aːlsmaːwaːt waːlʔardˤ wmaː bjnhmaː laːʕbjn qaaːluwaː laqad ʕalimta maaː lanaaː fij banaaːtika aːlmalaku faqaaːla: aːqraʔa kaːnt wðˤjfa aːlnsaːʔ aːlrʔijsja ħtaː zmn qrjb hj ʔan jtzwd͡ʒn wjldn aːlʔatˤfaːl wnaːdjnaːh mn d͡ʒaːnb aːltˤwr aːlʔajmn wqrbnaːh nd͡ʒjaː mrħbaː aːld͡ʒmjʕ ʔiinːaaː daːʔim χjr mn kθjr mnqtˤʕ mn sjkwn dˤħjth aːltaːlja  waqaaːla aːbnu aːlmuʕtazːi man aːtːaχaða ʔiχwaaːnanaː kaaːnuwaː lahu ʔaaʕwaaːnanaː ʔarjd aːlslaːm qul limani aːlʔaardˤu waman fijhaaː ʔiin kuntum taʕlamuwna wʔin hðh ʔamtkm ʔama waːħda wʔanaː rbkm faːtqwn jaː ʔajhaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː aːtqwaː aːllh waːbtʁwaː ʔiljh aːlwsjla wd͡ʒaːhdwaː fj sbjlh lʕlkm tflħwn hl rʔajt aːlħaːdθ ħqaː  jbʃrhm rbhm brħma biaːlmalaaːʔiikaai ʔiin kunta mina aːlsˤːaaːdiqijna qaaːla rabːi aːnsˤurnij ʕalaaː aːlqawmi aːlmufsidijna maː fʕlth ʔanta kaːn χaːtˤʔiaːan ljd͡ʒzj aːllh kl nfs maː ksbt ʔin aːllh srjʕ aːlħsaːb bal hum min aːlʔaaʕdaaːʔi aːlmaħðuwrijna fij bidˤʕi sinijna lilːahi aːlʔaamru min qablu wamin baʕdu wajawmaʔiiðin jafraħu aːlmuʔuminuwna kalaːːa lamːaaː jaqdˤi maaː ʔaamarahu mn aːlshl aːlwqwʕ fj ʕaːdaːt sjʔia tatad͡ʒaaːfaaː d͡ʒunuwbuhum ʕani aːlmadˤaaːd͡ʒiʕi jadʕuwna rabːahum χawfanaː watˤamaʕanaː wamimːaaː razaqnaaːhum junfiquwna ʔatʔatwn aːlðkraːn mn aːlʕaːlmjn waqaaːla sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama liʕadijːi bni ħaaːtimin waqaaːla muʕaaːðu bnu d͡ʒabalin radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi aːlr tilka ʔaːjaaːtu aːlkitaaːbi aːlmubijni waqaaːla aːlmaliku waaːlθːaaːminu tˤuwlu aːlʕumuri waaːtːisaaːʕu aːlmudːaai ؛ lijantahija biaːliaːstikθaaːri ʔilaaː maraaːtibi aːlkamaaːli waman jaʕmal miθqaaːla ðarːaain ʃarːanaː jarahu aːlʕilmu θalaaːθaau ʔaaʃbaaːrin faman naaːla minhu ʃibranaː ʃamaχa biʔaanfihi waðˤanːa ʔaanːahu naaːlahu ħsb aːlqrʔaːn  fmaː aːlnd͡ʒwm ʔilaː msˤaːbjħ tustʕml kmqðwfaːt lrd͡ʒm aːlʃjaːtˤjn hl bʔimkaːnk aːlʔimdˤaːʔ mn fdˤlk ʔanaː ʔarjd ʔan tuħibnj fmaː lh mn qwa wlaː naːsˤr bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmani aːlrːaħijmi waaːlmursalaaːti ʕurfanaː wlkl ʔama rswl fʔiðaː d͡ʒaːʔ rswlhm qdˤj bjnhm baːlqstˤ whm laː jðˤlmwn aːlħdjθ aːlθaːlθ ʕʃr: mn kmaːl aːlʔijmaːn ʔauwlaʔiika ʕalajhim sˤalawaaːtun min rabːihim waraħmaaun waʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlmuhtaduwna wanawʕun laaː jumkinu liaːχtilaaːfi ʔaasbaaːbihi wataʁaaːjuri ʃuruwtˤihi walaqad sabaqat kalimatunaaː liʕibaaːdinaaː aːlmursalijna hl twd ʔan tʔatj baːldaːχil hl tʕrf ʃjʔiaː ʕn ʕaːʔiltk  waqaaːla ʕabdu aːllːahi bnu aːlmuʕtazːi aːld͡ʒaaːhilu karawdˤaain ʕalaaː mazbalaain lqd tˤlb mnj maːl laaː tadʕuwaː aːljawma θubuwranaː waaːħidanaː waaːdʕuwaː θubuwranaː kaθijranaː laː jsmʕwn ʔilaː aːlmlʔi aːlʔaʕlaː wjqðfwn mn kl d͡ʒaːnb jaː ʔajhaː aːlnaːs aːʕbdwaː rbkm aːlðj χlqkm waːlðjn mn qblkm lʕlkm ttqwn klwaː wtmtʕwaː qljlaː ʔinkm md͡ʒrmwn ʔanaː sʕjd d͡ʒdaːan aːlʔaːn ʔam tsʔalhm ʔad͡ʒraː fhm mn mʁrm mθqlwn ʔaaw dijnun ħaaːd͡ʒirun rwaːh aːltːirmðjː wqaːla ħdjθun ħasanun wfj bʕdˤi aːlnːusaχi ħsnun sˤħjħun ljs ldjnaː maːʔ hl jmknk ʔan tχbrnj kjf ʔasˤl ʔilaː aːlmħtˤa  wmaː ʔadˤlnaː ʔilaː aːlmd͡ʒrmwn waqad χuliqnaaː baʕdahum fajanbaʁij ʔaan nanðˤura lilːaðij karihnaaːhu minhum fanad͡ʒtanibahu ʔanaː ʔatttˤlʕ lʔid͡ʒaːza aːlsˤjf ʔinhu jtħdθ aːlbrbrja lʔiustaːðj waʔaamːaaː biniʕmaai rabːika faħadːiθ fakajfa binafsi ʁajrihi aːnaː d͡ʒaːʔiʕ d͡ʒdaː laː aːsttˤjʕ aːntðˤaːr wqt aːlaːftˤaːr dʕnaː ntħlaː baːlʔiχlaːsˤ fqtl kjf qdr ʔanaː d͡ʒaːdunː jaː twm fðhbt ʔilaː baːʔiʕ aːldbs twm tˤbjb waʔaadˤalːa firʕawnu qawmahu wamaaː hadaaː ħjaːth mljʔia baːlmʃaːkl lw kaːn ldj maː jkfj mn aːlmaːl laːʃtrjt tlk aːlħqjba wljħmln ʔaθqaːlhm wʔaθqaːlaː mʕ ʔaθqaːlhm wljsʔaln jwm aːlqjaːma ʕmaː kaːnwaː jftrwn faːsmʕwhaː waːstd͡ʒjbwaː llndaː ħaːwl twm ʔan jqtlnj dʕwnaː nnqsm ʔilaː frq aːlnːaðˤaru ʔilaaː maħalːaai aːlʔaamwaaːti ʔin aːlmtqjn fj ðˤlaːl wʕjwn waːsʔal aːlqrja aːltj knaː fjhaː waːlʕjr aːltj ʔaqblnaː fjhaː wʔinaː lsˤaːdqwn tʕtqd ʔannj ʔanaː mn fʕlhaː ʔaljs kðlk fad͡ʒaʕalnaaːhaaː nakaaːlanaː limaaː bajna jadajhaaː wamaaː χalfahaaː wamawʕiðˤaaan lilmutːaqijna d͡ʒbl jsmw ʕlaː hðh aːldnaː wahuwa qaaːdirun ʕalaaː aːstisˤlaaːħi man juʕaaːdijhi biħusni sˤanaaːʔiiʕihi waʔaajaaːdijhi bnsˤr aːllh jnsˤr mn jʃaːʔ whw aːlʕzjz aːlrħjm wajud͡ʒaaːniba ʔaahla aːlrːijabi mn fdˤlk aːktbhaː ʔanaː ʔaʕrf ʔanka maː zlt tħbnj kðbt θmwd btˤʁwaːhaː wahumaaː sababaaːni fij ʁajri aːlmutanaaːkiħajni laː tubqij walaː taðaru wʕlaː kl aːlʕbaːd km lnjlki mn ʔajaːdi kθjr mn aːlnaːs jqwmwn bðlk mudːaaun wad͡ʒidːaaun waqarijħaaun waʃahwaaun ldj aːlkθjr mn aːlaːʕmaːl jtwd͡ʒb ʕlj aːlqjaːm bhaː qbl aːlʁd wad͡ʒaʕalnaaː fijhaaː d͡ʒanːaaːtin min naχijlin waʔaaʕnaaːbin wafad͡ʒːarnaaː fijhaaː mina aːlʕujuwni fajawmaʔiiðin laaː juʕaðːibu ʕaðaaːbahu ʔaaħadun aːħmr wd͡ʒhh kaːltlmjð aːlsˤʁjr hðaː jʕd͡ʒbnj frwħ wrjħaːn wd͡ʒnt nʕjm famakaθa ʁajra baʕijdin faqaaːla ʔaaħatˤtu bimaaː lam tuħitˤ bihi wad͡ʒiʔituka min sabaʔiin binabaʔiin jaqijnin aːnχfdˤt drd͡ʒa ħraːra aːld͡ʒw ʔilaː maː tħt aːlsˤfr hðaː aːljwm ʔajdˤaːan ʔaajaħsabu ʔaan lam jarahu ʔaaħadun rkz ʕlaː aːlʔaʃjaːʔ aːltj thm ħqaː frʃ ʃqa d͡ʒdjda jqtdˤj nfqaːt kbjra waːstʕjnwaː baːlsˤbr waːlsˤlaːa wʔinhaː lkbjra ʔilaː ʕlaː aːlχaːʃʕjn hðaː aːllħm mnqwʕ qul huwa aːlːaðij ðaraʔaakum fij aːlʔaardˤi waʔiilajhi tuħʃaruwna jaaː ʔaajːuhaaː aːlːaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː ʔaatˤijʕuwaː aːllːaha warasuwlahu walaaː tawalːawaː ʕanhu waʔaantum tasmaʕuwna ʔinh laː jqsˤd ʔan jʕaːml aːlʔaːχrjn bqswa ʔinhaː tˤbjʕth fħsb waaːʕlam ʔaanːa maaː ʔaaχtˤaʔaka lam jakun lijusˤijbaka wamaaː ʔaasˤaaːbaka lam jakun lijuχtˤiʔiaka laaː jaʁurːanːaka taqalːubu aːlːaðijna kafaruwaː fij aːlbilaaːdi ʔaħdˤr ʔilaː aːlmdrs baːlħaːfla ʔilaː ħmjmaː wʁsaːqaː wajuʕalːimuhu aːlkitaaːba waaːlħikmaaa waaːltːawraaːaa waaːlʔiind͡ʒijla mn lm jqnʕ baːljsjr lm jktf baːlkθjr kf ʕn lwj ðraːʕj jqʕ mktbnaː aːlrʔijsj fj mdjna ʔawsaːkaː hl tχbz χbz falamːaaː d͡ʒaaːʔahaaː nuwdija ʔaan buwrika man fij aːlnːaaːri waman ħawlahaaː wasubħaaːna aːllːahi rabːi aːlʕaaːlamijna jsbħn waːltˤjr wknaː faːʕljn  waʔaanːa aːld͡ʒuwda baðlu aːlmawd͡ʒuwdi  wahaðaaː takalːufun jufdˤij ʔilaaː aːld͡ʒahli biħuduwdi aːlfadˤaaːʔiili ðalika biʔaanːahum ʃaaːqːuwaː aːllːaha warasuwlahu waman bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm waːlljl ʔiðaː jʁʃaː aːldːunjaaː daaːru sˤidqin liman sˤadaqahaaː ʔaʃkrk ʕlaː nsˤjħtk ʔiinːahumaaː min ʕibaaːdinaaː aːlmuʔuminijna ʔaaw janaaːluhu min nakbaain laː jsmʕwn aːlħq fmn ʃaːʔ aːtχð ʔilaː rbh mʔaːbaː wʔinh lhdaː wrħma llmʔumnjn ljs ldj ʃjʔ ʔaːχr ʔaqwlh lilːaðijna juʔuluwna min nisaaːʔiihim tarabːusˤu ʔaarbaʕaai ʔaaʃhurin faʔiin faaːʔuwaː faʔiinːa aːllːaha ʁafuwrun raħijmun fstaːnk d͡ʒmjl d͡ʒdaː θm sˤdqnaːhm aːlwʕd fʔand͡ʒjnaːhm wmn nʃaːʔ wʔahlknaː aːlmsrfjn aːld͡ʒzaːʔirjwn waːlʔatraːk ʔiχwa lqd χaːb ðˤnj fjk ql kl mtrbsˤ ftrbsˤwaː fstʕlmwn mn ʔasˤħaːb huwa aːlːaðij jusˤalːij ʕalajkum wamalaaːʔiikatuhu lijuχrid͡ʒakum mina aːlðˤːulumaaːti ʔiilaaː aːlnːuwri wakaaːna biaːlmuʔuminijna raħijmanaː ʔiinːij wad͡ʒadtu aːmraʔaaaan tamlikuhum waʔauwtijat min ʔaumuwrun ʔin lam taχlusˤ fij aːlʔaakfaaːʔi ʔaasraʕa fijhim taqaaːtˤuʕu aːlʔaaʕdaaːʔi fafasaduwaː waʔaafsaduwaː ʔanta kjf tʕrf hðaː wtˤwr sjnjn ʔarjd ʔan tχrd͡ʒ mn aːlmdjna ʔaunʃiʔi ttwjbaː lʔidˤaːfa wd͡ʒmʕ aːlʔamθla ʕlaː aːld͡ʒml bʔajːa lʁa trjd ʔan ttklm mʕj  ħaːwlnaː aːlʔid͡ʒtmaːʕ ʕlaː aːlʔaql mra fj aːlʔasbwʕ " w mn aːlðjn tlʕb mʕhm  " waqaaːla aːlːaðij nad͡ʒaaː minhumaaː waaːdːakara baʕda aːlmlʔa mn qwm frʕwn ʔin hðaː lsaːħr ʕljm fakajfa tatːaquwna ʔiin kafartum jawmanaː jad͡ʒʕalu aːlwildaaːna ʃijbanaː ʔajn jmknnj ʔistlaːm tðkrtj  fasubħaaːna aːllːahi ħijna tumsuwna waħijna tusˤbiħuwna ttqn lʁaːt ʕdjda aːlðj ʔaħsn kl ʃjʔ χlqh wbdʔa χlq aːlʔinsaːn mn tˤjn tʔaqlmaː mʕ aːltʁjjr bsrʕa faːlmdbraːt ʔamraː ʔant dqjq aːlmlaːħðˤa walaqad d͡ʒaaːʔakum muwsaaː biaːlbajːinaaːti θumːa aːtːaχaðtumu aːlʕid͡ʒla min baʕdihi waʔaantum ðˤaaːlimuwna jaː bnj ʔisraːʔijl aːðkrwaː nʕmtj aːltj ʔanʕmt ʕljkm wʔanj fdˤltkm ʕlaː aːlʕaːlmjn qaːl klaː faːðhbaː bʔaːjaːtnaː ʔinaː mʕkm mstmʕwn maː sbb ʁdˤbhaː maθalu aːlʕaduwːi aːldˤːaaːħiki ʔilajk kaaːlħanðˤalaai aːlχadˤraaːʔi ʔaawraaːquhaaː ʔaalaaː ʔiinːahum min ʔiifkihim lajaquwluwna whw maː sjslːtˤ dˤwʔaː ʔakθr ʕn hðh aːlħqba aːllħm njʔ ʔaːn ldjhaː qlb ħnwn waʕalaaːmaaːtin wabiaːlnːad͡ʒmi hum jahtaduwna waqad laħaðˤa ʔaabuw tamːaaːmin aːltˤːaaːʔiijːu haðaaː aːlmaʕnaaː fij ʃaʕrihi faqaaːla ftsaːbq aːlrfaːq laːntʃaːlh qaːʔiljn haːt jdk wʔið qaːl ʔibraːhjm lʔabjh ʔaːzr ʔattχð ʔasˤnaːmaː ʔaːlha ʔinj ʔaraːk wqwmk fj dˤlaːl mbjn maː hj aːld͡ʒuml aːltj tfdˤlhaː  lltˤfl aːlħq fj aːltrbja w aːltʕljm θumːa limaaː fij aːlsːultˤaaːni min ħiraaːsaai aːldːijni waaːldːunjaaː waaːlðːabːi ʕanhumaaː wadafʕi aːlʔaahwaaːʔi minhu ʔisħb aːlʔaːχr   aːn     aːlχlf wqjlh jaː rb ʔin hʔulaːʔ qwm laː jʔumnwn wasumːuwaː ħafadaaan litaħafːudihim fij aːlχidmaai wasurʕatihim fij aːlʕamali faaːliqu aːlʔiisˤbaaːħi wad͡ʒaʕala aːllːajla sakananaː waaːlʃːamsa waaːlqamara ħusbaaːnanaː ðalika taqdijru aːlʕazijzi aːlʕalijmi mħmd sˤlaː aːllh ʕljh wslm wld fj mka rkl twm ðlk aːlsˤndwq kl maː ʔasttˤjʕ fʕlh fj aːlwqt aːlħaːlj hw aːld͡ʒlws hnaː waːlʔistmaːʕ aːlmaaːlu waaːlbanuwna zijnaau aːlħajaaːai aːldːunjaaː waaːlbaaːqijaaːtu aːlsˤːaaːliħaaːtu χajrun ʕinda rabːika θawaaːbanaː waχajrun ʔaamalanaː wamaaː taʃaaːʔuwna ʔiilːaaː ʔaan jaʃaaːʔa aːllːahu rabːu aːlʕaaːlamijna fʔasqtˤ ʕljnaː ksfaː mn aːlsmaːʔ ʔin knt mn aːlsˤaːdqjn jntðˤr twm rdanːaː wħmlt aːlʔardˤ waːld͡ʒbaːl fdktaː dka waːħda hl trjd ʔan tðhb ʔilaː ħdjqa aːlħjwaːn bʕd ðˤhr hðaː aːljwm  waʔiiðaaː duʕuwaː ʔiilaaː aːllːahi warasuwlihi lijaħkuma bajnahum ʔiiðaaː farijqun minhum muʕridˤuwna lnrsl ʕljhm ħd͡ʒaːra mn tˤjn aːllːahu jabsutˤu aːlrːizqa liman jaʃaaːʔu min ʕibaaːdihi wajaqdiru lahu ʔiinːa aːllːaha bikulːi ʃajʔin ʕalijmun qaːla: faʔiinːahu d͡ʒibrijlu ʔaataaːkum juʕalːimukum dijnakum qul ʔaaruwnija aːlːaðijna ʔaalħaqtum bihi ʃurakaaːʔa kalːaaː bal huwa aːllːahu aːlʕazijzu aːlħakijmu sahlun ʕalaaː man ʕalimahu lqd ʔautuhm bsrqa ʕðˤaːm aːldjnaːsˤwraːt waʔiinːa rabːaka lahuwa aːlʕazijzu aːlrːaħijmu walahu man fij aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waaːlʔaardˤi waman ʕindahu laaː jastakbiruwna ʕan ʕibaaːdatihi walaaː jastaħsiruwna qaːl ʔatʕbdwn maː tnħtwn kajfa laaː jaħtamij min aːlðːunuwbi limaʕarːaaːtihaaː hl trjd tðhb ʔilaː hnaːk  aːlbaːb mʁlq jaaː banij aːlsːaaːʔiibi qad dˤuwijtum faaːnkiħuwaː fij aːlʁaraaːʔiibi maaː ʔaaʃhadtuhum χalqa aːlsːamaaːwaaːti waaːlʔaardˤi walaaː χalqa ʔaanfusihim wamaaː kuntu mutːaχiða aːlmudˤilːijna ʕadˤudanaː nntðˤru mnka ʔan tunafiːða lnaː maː wʕdtah lnaː ðaːt mra aːllh ltˤjf bʕbaːdh jrzq mn jʃaːʔ whw aːlqwj aːlʕzjz ʔalaː tʕbdwaː ʔilaː aːllh ʔinnj lkm mnh nðjr wbʃjr kaːn aːllʕb fj aːlħdjqa mmtʕaː ʔarjd aːlʃraːʔ jsˤwm aːlmslmwn fj ʃhr rmdˤaːn mn ʃrwq aːlʃms ħtaː ʁrwbhaː waʔiinːij kulːamaaː daʕawtuhum litaʁfira lahum d͡ʒaʕaluwaː ʔaasˤaaːbiʕahum fij ʔaːðaaːnihim waaːstaʁʃawaː θijaaːbahum waʔaasˤarːuwaː waaːstakbaruwaː aːstikbaaːranaː waʔaaχalːa bimasnuwnaaːtihaaː wahajʔiaaːtihaaː faqad ʕaqːa jawmahu waðˤalama nafsahu ʔin aːlðjn aːʃtrwaː aːlkfr baːlʔijmaːn ln jdˤrwaː aːllh ʃjʔiaː wlhm ʕðaːb ʔaljm ln tnfʕkm ʔarħaːmkm wlaː ʔawlaːdkm jwm aːlqjaːma jfsˤl bjnkm waːllh bmaː tʕmlwn bsˤjr tħqq ħwlhaː ʔanaː lstu fj wdˤʕ jsmħ bʔan ʔaqblhaː fʔinmaː jsrnaːh blsaːnk ltbʃr bh aːlmtqjn wtnðr bh qwmaː ldaː maː hw fnk aːlmfdˤl hl θwb aːlkfaːr maː kaːnwaː jfʕlwn ql ʔinmaː aːlʕlm ʕnd aːllh wʔinmaː ʔanaː nðjr mbjn faqult ʔaalajsa ʔiðaaː suʔiila aːlħaaːfiðˤu faʔaasˤaaːba baaːna fadˤluhu  qaaːla naʕam wkðlk nfsˤl aːlʔaːjaːt wlʕlhm jrd͡ʒʕwn aːlʕlm jrfrf kaðalika nafʕalu biaːlmud͡ʒrimijna drs saːmj aːltˤːb waaːallːahu subħaaːnahu wataʕaaːlaaː ʔaaʕlamu laː fjhaː ʁawlun walaː hum ʕanhaː junzafwna ʔaqaːm saːmj sˤdaːqa mʕ sˤdjq ljlaː faʔaalqaː mwsaː ʕasˤaːhu faʔiiðaː hija talqafu maː jaʔafikwna dˤrb saːmj ljlaː w ʔafqdhaː wʕjhaː ħsn wahuwa aːlʁafwru aːlwadwdu waʔaanːa ʃawaaːhida aːlħaaːli tuχrid͡ʒuhu ʕan talbijsi aːlkaðibi aːnsnj wadaχala ʔaabuw ħaaːzimin ʕalaaː biʃri bni marwaaːna faqaaːla ʔiin naʃaʔa nunazːil ʕalajhim mina aːlsːamaːʔi ʔaːjaaan faðˤalːat ʔaaʕnaːquhum lahaː χaːdˤiʕjna wamaʔaθuwmanaː kamaʔad͡ʒuwrin ljtka turaːfiqunaː saːmj ðaːhb ʔilaː aːld͡ʒaːmʕa hðaː aːlʕaːm maaː aːlmuruwʔaau fijkum  qaaːla fahuwa mamnuwʕun minhu fij aːlʕaqli waaːlʃːarʕi wakaaːna aːlnːud͡ʒħu ʕindahu maʔamuwlanaː tˤlaː aːlbaːb baːllwn aːlʔazrq wad͡ʒaʕala aːlqamara fjhinːa nwranaː wad͡ʒaʕala aːlʃːamsa siraːd͡ʒanaː saːmj jʃʕr baːlwħda laː ʔaʕlm ʔilaː ʔajn ʔanðˤr tqtaːt tlk aːlħjwaːnaːt ʕlaː aːlʕʃb wataaːbaʕahaaː ʕalaaː haðihi aːlʃːahwaai waʔaamːaaː aːlnːawʕu aːlθːaaːnij min aːlbirːi fahuwa aːlmaʕruwfu wajatanawːaʕu ʔaajdˤanaː nawʕajni qawlanaː waʕamalanaː ʔaan jatˤluba aːlzːijaaːdaaa wajaltamisa aːlkaθraaa lijasˤrifahaaː fij wud͡ʒuwhi aːlχajri ʔanaː mn aːlmmlka aːlʕrbja aːlsʕwdja juwdˤaʕa fij kulːi mawdˤiʕin min ħaqːin waʁajri ħaqːin aːlħjaːa tsˤbħ raːʔiʕa ʔiðaː trkk aːlnaːs w ʃʔank srt btmaːjl nħw aːlmdrːs waʔiiðaaː aːlrːusulu ʔauqːitat wajawma jaħʃuruhum d͡ʒamjʕanaː θumːa jaqwlu lilmalaːʔiikaai ʔaahʔuulaːʔi ʔiijːaːkum kaːnwaː jaʕbudwna ʔaan jaqðifa fij qalbajkumaaː suwʔanaː waaːnfasˤala biʔaadawaaːtihi fajurijdu min ʁajrihi linafsihi maaː laaː jad͡ʒiduhu min nafsihi linafsihi laːbiθjna fjhaː ʔaaħqaːbanaː aːnðˤr ʔinːh qtˤː jaħsˤidu aːlfalaːaħu aːlqamħa waaːʕlam ʔaanːa aːlfaqra d͡ʒundu aːllːahi aːlʔaakbara juðilːu bihi kulːa d͡ʒabːaaːrin ʕanijdin jatakabːaru waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi biħusni aːltːaʔaanːij tashulu aːlmatˤaaːlibu wafij kulːi zamaaːnin ʕamalanaː fadˤlanaː mina aːllːahi waniʕmaaan waaːllːahu ʕaljmun ħakjmun waʕan ʔaabij hurajraaa qaaːla walawlaaːk maaː taχaaːlad͡ʒahu aːlʃːakːu fijhi fahaðaaː maaː aːqtadˤaaːhu haðaaː aːlfasˤlu min ʃuruwtˤi aːlmuruwʔaai ʔaan jaʕlama ʔaanːa suruwrahu maqruwnun bimusaaːʔaai ʁajrihi jaaː bunajːa aːlʕaqlu bilaaː ʔaadabin kaaːlʃːad͡ʒari aːlʕaaːqiri stunʃr rwaːjthaː aːld͡ʒdjda aːlʃhr aːlqaːdm dʕ aːlʔajaːm tfʕl maː tʃaːʔ wtˤb nfsaː bmaː ħkm aːlqdˤaːʔ aːldm laː jsˤjr maːʔ waqijla lilmuhalːabi bni ʔaabij sˤufraaa ʔijːaaːkum waaːliaːmtinaaːna biaːlmaʕruwfi faʔiinːahu jubtˤilu aːlʃːukra laː ʃk ʔan twm jstmtʕ waqaaːla ʕabdu aːllːahi bnu aːlzːubajri waʔiijːaaːka waʔiird͡ʒaaːʔahu faʔiinːa aːlʔiird͡ʒaaːʔa jufsidu ʃatˤra sˤalaaːħihi lnnsaː ðlk aːtːfqnaː ʕljː ʔan ʔasaːʕdh wamaː ʔaursilwaː ʕalajhim ħaːfiðˤjna ʕdn ʔilaː aːlmsˤrf waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi lijakun aːstiħjaaːʔuuk min nafsik ʔaakθara min aːstiħjaaːʔiik min ʁajrik ʔasˤlħt aːldraːd͡ʒa baːlʔams hðh qsˤa d͡ʒdjda baːlnsba lj laː tns maː qlth lk lltːw liʔaanːa taqalːuba aːlʔaaħwaaːli sakaraaun tuðˤhiru min aːlʔaaχlaaːqi maknuwnahaaː waqad kaaːna sˤuhajbu bnu sinaaːnin mazːaaːħanaː faqaaːla lahu aːlnːabijːu sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama fij taʔawijli qawlh taʕaaːlaaː tˤlb saːmj mn ljlaː ʔan tntðˤr jawma jaχrud͡ʒwna mina aːlʔaad͡ʒdaːθi siraːʕanaː kaʔaanːahum ʔiilaː nusˤubin jwfidˤwna ʔaafaman kaːna muʔuminanaː kaman kaːna faːsiqanaː laː jastawwna dfʕt ljlaː maːlaː lsaːmj wajamħaqu aːlʔaad͡ʒra ʕmaː aːlʕjn wlaː ʕmaː aːlqlb ʔaan junazːila aːllːahu min fadˤlihi ʕalaaːaː man jaʃaaːʔu min ʕibaaːdihi waħukija ʔaanːa ʕabda aːlmaliki bna marwaaːna qaaːla lilʃːaʕbijːi ftħ aːlmdrːs aːlbaːb walaaː burhaaːnu aːlsˤːaaːdiqijna falaaː aːqtaħama aːlʕaqabaaa faliʔaanːa maaː laaː daaːʕija lahu haðajaaːnun farubːamaaː kaaːna aːstidraaːkuhu aːlsˤːawaaːba minhaaː ʔaashala bisalaaːmaai aːlnːafsi min ʃubhaai aːlhawaaː waqaaːla rad͡ʒulun liʃurajħin aːlqaaːdˤij waʔiinːamaaː jutˤfiʔiu aːlχajru aːlʃːarːa kamaaː jutˤfiʔiu aːlmaaːʔu aːlnːaaːra hðaː hudanaː waaːlːaðjna kafarwaː biʔaːjaːti rabːihim lahum ʕaðaːbun min rid͡ʒzin ʔaaljmun waqaaːla χaaːlidun aːlrːabaʕijːu falawlaː ʔiin kuntum ʁajra madjnjna waʔiinːamaaː qaaːla ðalika sˤalːaaː aːllːahu ʕalajhi wasalːama ħasmanaː limawaaːdːi aːlkibri waθamwda famaː ʔaabqaː χajru aːlʔaamwaaːli maaː ʔaaχaðth min aːlħalaaːli wasˤarafth fij aːlnːawaaːli rbːmaː laː ʔaħbːh kmaː ʔaħbbtk hl tʕrf mtaː sjʕwdwn tzdaːd aːlħwaːdθ snaan bʕd sna faʔaamːaaː maaː kaaːna muʕtabaranaː fij aːlsːaaːʔiili faθalaaːθaau ʃuruwtˤin tmː ʔidχaːl saːmj ʔilaː mstʃfaː llʔamraːdˤ aːlʕqljːa ʔaalam jarawaː kam ʔaahlaknaː qablahum mina aːlqurwni ʔaanːahum ʔiilajhim laː jard͡ʒiʕwna tsmːaː ʔalmaːnjaː «dwjtʃlaːnd» baːlʔalmaːnjːa waʔaanːahu huwa rabːu aːlʃːiʕraː walaw naʃaːʔu laʔaarajnaːkahum falaʕaraftahum bisjmaːhum walataʕrifanːahum fj laħni aːlqawli waaːllːahu jaʕlamu ʔaaʕmaːlakum lhðaː trkt wðˤjftj ʔiinːa aːlːaðjna laː juʔuminwna biaːlʔaːχiraai zajːanːaː lahum ʔaaʕmaːlahum fahum jaʕmahwna wamanaːaa aːlθːaːliθaaa aːlʔauχraː ʔinː mkaːnk fj hðh aːlʕjaːda waʔaanːahu huwa ʔaadˤħaka waʔaabkaː wahaðihi ʔaawsatˤu ħaaːli aːlmuqtaniʕi waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlbulaʁaaːʔi man ʔaaħsana ʔilaaː d͡ʒaaːrihi faqad dalːa ʕalaaː ħusni nid͡ʒaaːrihi warubːamaaː kaaːna libaʕdˤi aːlsːalaaːtˤijni raʁbaaun fij aːlʕilmi lifadˤijlaai nafsihi ʔiinːamaaː aːlmuʔuminwna ʔiiχwaaun faʔaasˤliħwaː bajna ʔaaχawajkum waaːtːaquwaː aːllːaha laʕalːakum turħamwna hðaː aːltˤaːʔir laː jmknh aːltˤjraːn ʔanaː ħtaː lm ʔaʕrf ʔanh twm aːlʁrjb lw sˤħ ʔaħsn mn ʔalf ʔaχ ħatːaaː laaːna qijaaːduhaaː  wahaaːna ʕinaaːduhaaː wabaaːna lahu min quwːaai χaaːtˤirihi faʔaaʕtˤaaːhum aːlʔaamwaaːla kaːn saːmj jħbː aːlħjaːa aːlsːʕjda wahuwa aːχtijaaːru aːllːafðˤi aːlːaðij jatakalːamu bihi wawaʕijduhu tarhijbanaː waʁalabahaaː baʕda ʔaan kaaːna fij ʁalbihaaː walaqad ʔaːtajnaː banj ʔiisraːʔijla aːlkitaːba waaːlħukma waaːlnːubuwːaaa ʔaalajsa aːllːahu biʔaaħkami aːlħaːkimjna kaːnt rsaːla saːmj mktwba jdwjːaː waʔaasˤħaːbu aːlʔaajkaai waqawmu tubːaʕin kulːun kaðːaba aːlrːusula faħaqːa waʕjdi sʔakwn hnaː tˤwaːl aːlʔasbwʕ waʔiiðaaː qadˤaaːaː ʔaamranaː faʔiinːamaaː jaquwlu lahu kun fajakuwnu hl ʔanti qaːsˤra kaːnt ljlaː tntðˤr fj aːlðˤːlaːm qaaːla baʕdˤu aːlħukamaaːʔi ʔiðaaː aːsˤtˤanaʕat aːlmaʕruwfa faaːsturhu walibujwtihim ʔaabwaːbanaː wasururanaː ʕalajhaː jatːakiʔiwna baaːta aːlmisˤbaaːħu mutːaqidanaː wakaaːna juqaaːlu aːsmaaːni mutadˤaaːdːaaːni bimaʕnanaː waaːħidin aːltːawaaːdˤuʕu waaːlʃːarafu ʕaːʃ saːmj biʕamalihi ʔauħbitˤa ʔaad͡ʒruhu ʕlːm d͡ʒdː saːmj ħfjdh kjf jtˤlq aːlnːaːr fahaðaaː farqun maaː bajna aːlħuzni waaːlʁadˤabi qijla lilħad͡ʒːaaːd͡ʒi kajfa wad͡ʒadt manzilak biaːlʕiraaːqi  qaaːla ʕaːd lltwː lm jtbdˤːʕ aːlmrʔa hnaːk ħtːaː ʔiinːa aːlmud͡ʒrimjna fj dˤalaːlin wasuʕurin hðh hj daːʔira aːlaːrtjaːb waːlʃqaːq aːltj jd͡ʒb ʕljnaː ʔinhaːʔhaː baʕda ðalika ʔaakaaːnat lak ʔilaaː haðaaː ħaaːd͡ʒaaun  qaaːla laaː θumːa kaːna mina aːlːaðjna ʔaːmanwaː watawaːsˤawaː biaːlsˤːabri watawaːsˤawaː biaːlmarħamaai waʔaanːa aːliaːstiqsˤaaːʔa fijhaaː ħazmun wasuʔiila baʕdˤu aːlʔaudabaaːʔi ʕan sˤifaai aːllːaʔiijmi wamunija biaːlʔiimsaaːki waaːliaːdːiχaaːri laː ʔarjd aːlqjaːm bʕmlh njaːba ʕnh dˤjwfk jntðˤrwn wasˤuliba raʔasuhu ʕalaaː qasˤrihi laː jnbʁj ʔan nnsaː ðlk ʔabdaː qrːr saːmj ʔan jʔud͡ʒːl draːsth aːld͡ʒaːmʕjːa saʕjuk fij aːlnːaaːsi maʃkuwranaː  waʔaad͡ʒruk ʕinda aːllːahi maðχuwranaː zaaːda aːlnːajlu wajaχaaːfu sˤawlatak raaːhibun waqad ruwija ʔaanːa ʕalqamaaa bna ʕulaaːθaaa qaaːla jaaː rasuwla aːllːahi ʕiðˤnij qutˤwfuhaː daːnijaaun fijhi ʔaarbaʕaai taʔawijlaaːtin waqaaːla ʕawnu bnu ʕabdi aːllːahi faʔiinːa ħisaaːbahu jatˤuwlu waaːlsːababu aːlθːaaːliθu faaːdˤa aːlnːahru kajfa qadːara ʕljnaː tkraːr hðaː ʁdaː kaːn aːlmdrːs ltˤjfaː d͡ʒdːaː wamina aːlːaðijna ʔaaʃrakuwaː jawadːu ʔaaħaduhum law juʕamːaru ʔaalfa sanaain wamaaː huwa bimuzaħziħihi ħqːqt aːlʃːrtˤa ʔakθr ʕmqaː fj ħjaːa saːmj aːldˤaːmn ʁaːrm aːllːahumːa ʔinːij tasˤadːaqtu biʕirdˤij ʕalaaː ʕibaaːdik waʔiinːamaaː aːlmuraaːʕaaːau hija aːlmuruwʔaau laaː maaː aːntˤabaʕat ʕalajhi min fadˤaaːʔiili aːlʔaaχlaaːqi lm jql lj faːdˤl ʔajː ʃjʔ waaːlnːufuwsu bihaaː maʕðuwraaun ʔarjd aːltħdːθ mʕ ʃqjqtj laː jħtrq aːlblaːstjk bshwla kaːn ʔaswʔ mdrːs lj jaaː ʔaamijra aːlmuʔuminijna ʔaaʕan muwd͡ʒidaain ʔaaw χijaaːnaain  faqaaːla hðh aːlnaːfða dˤd aːlrsˤaːsˤ lm jql twm ʃjʔiaː ðaː ʔahmja waaːlqalːaaːʕu huwa aːlsːaaːʕij aːlːaðij jaqaʕu fij aːlnːaaːsi ʕinda aːlʔaumaraaːʔi faaːlmudabːiraːti ʔaamranaː ʔaaħaduhumaaː tnaːwl aːltːħlja ʔaaʕadːa aːllːahu lahum ʕaðaːbanaː ʃadjdanaː ʔiinːahum saːʔa maː kaːnwaː jaʕmalwna man χaʃija aːlrːaħmna biaːlʁajbi wad͡ʒaːʔa biqalbin munjbin haː hw hl rʔajth aːlnːwaːfðu maftuwħaaun waʔiiðaː ʕalima min ʔaːjaːtinaː ʃajʔianaː aːtːaχaðahaː huzuwanaː ʔauwlʔiika lahum ʕaðaːbun muhjnun ʕljk ʔan tqwm baːlwaːd͡ʒb wamaː ʕalːamnaːhu aːlʃːiʕra wamaː janbaʁj lahu ʔiin huwa ʔiilːaː ðikrun waqurʔaːnun mubjnun bdʔa saːmj jmdˤj aːlmzjd mn aːlwqt mʕ ljlaː faðlika jawmaʔiiðin jawmun ʕasjrun aːlʃːamsu waaːlqamaru biħusbaːnin waʔiinːa jwnusa lamina aːlmursaljna aːlklaːb aːlnbaːħa naːdraːan aːldːaraaːhimu maraaːhimu faʔaːminwaː biaːllːahi waraswlihi waaːlnːwri aːlːaðj ʔaanzalnaː waaːllːahu bimaː taʕmalwna χabjrun ʕajnanaː jaʃrabu bihaaː aːlmuqarːabwna waman jaʕʃu ʕan ðikri aːlrːaħmni nuqajːidˤ lahu ʃajtˤaːnanaː fahuwa lahu qarjnun ʔanaː w saːmj ʔasˤdqaːʔ waʔiinːahu laħasraaun ʕalaaː aːlkaːfirjna ʔanqðhaː twm mn aːlħrjq kaːn aːlħðaːʔ aːlðj ʔaʕtˤjth lsaːmj sˤʁjraː ʕljh waħamalnaːhu waaːlkitaːba faminhum muhtadin wakaθjrun minhum faːsiqwna saːmj jʕjʃ ħjaːth kaːn saːmj jdχl aːlmstʃfaː kθjraː walaaː taqul maaː laaː tafʕalu faʔiinːak laaː taχluw fij ðalika min ðanbin taksibuhu fij sˤifaai aːlmalbuwsi wakajfijːatihi waaːstawfaaː ħaqːahu biaːltːasˤarːufi waaːljaqiðˤaai waʔiinːahu lafj zuburi aːlʔaawːaljna waqijla liħamːaaːdin aːlrːaaːwijaai famaːliʔiwna minhaaː aːlbutˤwna ʔin ʔardt fsʔastmʕ ʔiljk tawaaːdˤuʕuk fij ʃarafik ʔaaʃrafu lak min ʃarafik waman kaaːna sˤaaːdiqa aːlnːijːaai fijhi lam jakun lahu himːaaun fijmaaː jad͡ʒidu budːanaː minhu waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami ʔatzld͡ʒ aːllːaʔiijmu ʔiðaaː ʁaaːba ʕaaːba qaːla ʔaalam nurabːika fjnaː waljdanaː walabiθta fjnaː min ʕumurika sinjna aːlʕasˤfuwru lam juʁarːid kajfa ʕaqluhu  qaaːluwaː ðlika biʔaanːahum ʔaːmanwaː faðˤaltum tafakːahwna wamutaχatˤːijanaː ʔilaaː aːltimaaːsi maaː laaː jastawd͡ʒibuhu liʔaanːahu biaːlzːawd͡ʒaai waaːlχaaːdimi mutˤaaːʕun fij ʔaamrihi waqaaːla ʕumaru bnu aːlχatˤːaaːbi radˤija aːllːahu minhu wamin ʁajrihi qaaːla fakufːa ʕan aːlʃːarːi jakufːa ʕank aːlʃːarːu ʔiilaː rabːika jawmaʔiiðin aːlmustaqarːu lajlaau aːlqadri χajrun min ʔaalfi ʃahrin d͡ʒaːʔ twm fj ʔaːχr lħðˤa mn aːχtrʕ hðh ʕjnin walaaː juqdaru ʕalaaː ħasˤrihaaː wakaaːna biaːlrːadːi χalijqanaː ʔijaːk wsˤaːħb aːlswʔ fʔinh jħsn mnðˤrh wjqbħ ʔaθrh ʔijaːk wmaː jʕtðr mnh sˤaaːra aːlbardu qaaːrisanaː ʔilaːma jrmz ðlk aːlrːaðaaːʔiila waʔiin salimat minhaaː ljs lj ʔaχ stqdˤj ljlaː bqjːa ħjaːthaː χlf aːlqdˤbaːn ðˤl aːlbaːb mʁlqaːan laː tns ʔanːh jd͡ʒb ʔan tʃtrj qljlaː mn aːlbsˤl raːjtnaː ħmraːʔ w swdaːʔ juwaaːrij sawʔaːtikum ʔaaj jasturu ʕawraaːtikum wasumːijat aːlʕawraau sawʔaaa qaːlwaː naħnu ʔauwlw quwːaain waʔauwlw baʔasin ʃadjdin waaːlʔaamru ʔiilajki faaːnðˤurj maːðaː taʔamurjna qaaːluwaː wamaaː hija jaaː rasuwla aːllːahi  qaaːla ʔiinːahaː tarmj biʃararin kaaːlqasˤri maː aːld͡ʒdjd waaːltˤːurafi aːlmuʃtahaaːai liʔaanːahu qad ʔaadˤaaːʕahu biaːlʃːuħːi wabadːadahu biaːlbuχli waħarama nafsahu ʁanijmaaa muknatihi lm tkn tħbːnj tlk aːlmdrːsa maːðaː ħdθ fj aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕ waʔaabuw ʃimaaːlin aːlʔaasadijːu ʔaadˤalːa raaːħilatahu faaːltamasahaaː aːlnːaaːsu falam jad͡ʒiduwhaaː lisaʕjihaː raːdˤijaaun rbː ʔaχin lk lm tldh ʔamk hl sjmdˤj aːlflstˤjnjːwn mʔia sna ʔaχraː mn aːlmʕaːnaːa wataʃhadu ʔiðaaː ʁibta aːlʃːad͡ʒaraau muθmiraaun aːʕtqd saːmj ʔanː ljlaː kaːnt mslma waradːi munaaːsˤaħatihaaː ʔiðaː qsˤrt jdk ʕn aːlmkaːfʔaa fljsˤl lsaːnk baːlʃkr waaːlθːaaːnij ʔaan jakuwna aːlʕilmu bihaaː saaːbiqanaː waaːlkulːu ʕalajhaaː muwaaːfiqanaː faʔaamːaaː aːlwaaːd͡ʒibu famaaː aːχtasˤːa biθalaaːθaai ʔaasˤnaaːfin wahum aːlʔaahlu waaːlʔiiχwaaːnu waaːld͡ʒijraaːnu wamaaː ʔauwtijtum min aːlʕilmi ʔilːaaː qalijlanaː waman d͡ʒazaʕa min ʕiqaaːbihi waqafa ʕinda ʔaawaaːmirihi aːlhawaaːʔu mutad͡ʒadːidun ʔiið ʔaarsalnaː ʔiilajhimu aːθnajni fakaðːabwhumaː faʕazːaznaː biθaːliθin faqaːlwaː ʔiinːaː ʔiilajkum mursalwna fad͡ʒaʕalahu ʁuθaːʔan ʔaaħwaː aːljaʔasu min χajri musˤaaːbihi waqad rawaaː naaːfiʕun ʕan aːbni ʕumara radˤija aːllːahu ʕanhu ʔauwlʔiika aːlmuqarːabwna waʔaanːa kulːa jawmin jamurːu bihaaː jaðhabu minhaaː biʃatˤrin wajaʔaχuðu minhaaː binasˤijbin aːlqtˤtˤ tkrh aːlbll waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlbulaʁaaːʔi aːlsˤːaaːdiqu musˤaaːnun χalijlun  waaːlkaaːðibu muhaaːnun ðalijlun ʔinːhaː aːmrʔaa ʃd͡ʒaːʕa jaqraʔau muħamːadun kitaaːbanaː waaːʕlam ʔaanːa aːlsˤːabra ʕalaaː sitːaai ʔaaqsaaːmin  wahuwa fij kulːi qismin minhaaː maħmuwdun waʔaan jakuwna θawaaːbu aːlmusˤijbaai ʔaard͡ʒaħa ʕindak min baqaaːʔiihaaː waqaaːla ʕamruw bnu aːlʕaaːsˤi ʔaakrimuwaː sufahaaːʔakum faʔiinːahum jaquwnakum wamutˤaaːlaʕaai ðij aːlʕaqli aːlrːaaːd͡ʒiħi aːnðˤr ʔiljː mn fdˤlk dʕaː saːmj ljlaː ʔilaː aːltˤːaːbq aːlʕlwj lm jkn bʔimkaːnk mʕrfa ðlk hl twm daːʔimaː jtklm mn ʔad͡ʒlk waʔaakθaru aːlʃːarːi maʕa ʔaakθari aːlfuqaraaːʔi waaːlʔaaʁnijaaːʔi lntklːm ʕn maː ħsˤl aːlbaːrħa wsˤl saːmj ʔilaː aːlʕjaːda laː ʔaʕrf maːðaː sʔafʕl bʕd aːlʔaːn waʔiimːaaː lijaχdaʕahum bitadlijsi nafsihi biaːlmadħi waaːlʔiitˤraaːʔi aːlfaʔaraau kitaːbanaː min qablihi fahum bihi mustamsikwna waqaaːla baʕdˤu aːlʔaudabaaːʔi laaː sajfa kaaːlħaqːi  walaaː ʕawna kaaːlsˤːidqi wamusaaːmaħaau taχfijfin liʕad͡ʒzin ʔaam kajfa jad͡ʒuwzu lahum aːlʃːuħːu bimaaː ʔin baðaluwhu zaaːda wanamaaː ʔaawalam jakun lahum ʔaːjaaan ʔaan jaʕlamahu ʕulamaːʔu banj ʔiisraːʔijla ʔaanːa libaaːsa aːltːaqwaaː huwa aːlʔiijmaaːnu wahuwa qawlu qataaːdaaa waaːlsːudːijːi waaːlʔaamru aːlθːaaːnij ʔaan juqasˤːira ʕan tˤalabi kifaaːjatihi  wajazhada fij aːltimaaːsi maaːdːatihi saːmj laː jsˤtˤħb ʔajː ʃχsˤ wajaraaː ʔaanːa maʕarːaaa aːlkaðibi ʁunmun farːat min qaswaraain waʔiijːaaːka wad͡ʒamʕa aːlfudˤuwli bdʔaː saːmj w ljlaː jqdˤjaːn klː jwm mʕaː faljaʔatwaː biħadjθin miθlihi ʔiin kaːnwaː sˤaːdiqjna falamːaaː kaaːna ħusnu aːlðˤːanːi bihaaː juʕmij ʕan masaaːwiʔiihaaː hðaː mdrːsj aːld͡ʒdjd kjf ʕrft mkaːn twaːd͡ʒdj waaːlsːaaːʔiibaaːtu aːlnːitaaːd͡ʒu aːntðˤr saːmj ʔatˤfʔi aːldˤwʔ laː jmknnj aːlnwm nrjd aːltːmsːk bnmtˤ ħjaːtnaː aːlqdjm bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi waaːlðːaːrijaːti ðarwanaː aːrtdaː saːmj bdla llʃːrtˤa waʔiin tˤalaba bihi aːld͡ʒazaaːʔa kaaːna taaːd͡ʒiranaː mutarabːiħanaː laaː jastaħiqːu ħamdanaː walaaː madħanaː aːqtrb saːmj mnːj w mn ljlaː w ħjːaːnaː knːaː ndˤħk lqd nsjt ʃjʔiaː ʔaljs kðlk wahuwa ʕubajdu bnu aːlʔaabrasˤi mn ʔataː lrʔujtnaː fj brmnd͡ʒhaːm waqaaːla hiʃaaːmu bnu ʕabdi aːlmaliki bni marwaaːna aːklt qtˤaː wajusqawna fjhaː kaʔasanaː kaːna mizaːd͡ʒuhaː zand͡ʒabjlanaː saːmj jntðˤr sjːaːra ʔad͡ʒra wakilaaːhumaaː ʃajnun wad͡ʒazaaːʔa aːlsˤːafħi walaqad ʔaahlaknaː maː ħawlakum mina aːlquraː wasˤarːafnaaː aːlʔaːjaːti laʕalːahum jard͡ʒiʕwna waaːltːalaaːfija jusˤliħu ʃatˤra fasaaːdihi lm lm tχbrnj bhðaː fj aːlʕjaːda ʔiðaː kaːn hðaː aːlklaːm sˤħjħanaː fsndˤtˤr lqbwl aːlntjd͡ʒa aːlzːahru ðaːbilun waʔiinːj ʕuðtu birabːj warabːikum ʔaan tard͡ʒumwni famaː lanaː min ʃaːfiʕjna ʔaqaːm saːmj sˤdaːqa mʕ tˤlba ʔaːχrjn mn aːlsːna aːlʔawlaː aːlʔaːnsa maːrj aːusrt bwaːstˤa tnjn qwj jdʕj twm aːltdbjr jθmr aːljsjr waːltbðjr jbdd aːlkθjr trk aːlðnb ʔajsr mn aːlaːʕtðaːr ʕljnaː aːlħsˤwl ʕlaː ntaːʔid͡ʒ hðaː aːsm mslm waqijla lirad͡ʒulin kajfa kitmaaːnuk lilsːirːi  qaaːla ʔaad͡ʒħadu aːlχabara waʔaaħlifu lilmustaχbiri aːtːsˤl saːmj bsˤdjq kj jsˤtˤħbh aːʃtdj jaː ʔazma tnfrd͡ʒj bʕdˤ aːlħlm ðl bʕdˤ aːlʕfw dˤʕf bismi aːllːahi aːlrːaħmni aːlrːaħjmi sˤ waaːlqurʔaːni ðij aːlðːikri
